Te sabbe ^b^rukkhādīsū^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. ‘‘Kālo ghasati bhūtānīti (jā. 1.2.190), bhūtā loke samussaya’’nti (dī. ni. 2.220; saṃ. ni. 1.186) ca ādīsu avisesena sattavācakopi bhūtasaddo, upari devādipadehi sattavisesānaṃ gahitattā idha tadavasiṭṭhā bhūtasaddena gayhantīti āha ^b^‘‘no ca kho avisesenā’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘cātumahārājikānañhi heṭṭhā sattā idha bhūtāti adhippetā’’^eb^ti. Yo hi sattanikāyo paripuṇṇayoniko catūhipi yonīhi nibbattanāraho, tatthāyaṃ bhūtasamaññā aṇḍajādivasena bhavanato.

[03]^b^Bhūte^eb^ti vuttadesāadesite bhūte. ^b^Bhūtato sañjānātī^eb^ti iminā ‘‘bhūtā’’ti lokavohāraṃ gahetvā yathā tattha taṇhādimaññanā sambhavanti, evaṃ viparītasaññāya sañjānanaṃ pakāsīyati. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā ‘‘pathavito sañjānātī’’ti ettha vuttanayānusārena sakkā jānitunti āha ^b^‘‘vuttanayamevā’’^eb^ti. Yathā suddhāvāsā sabbadā abhāvato imaṃ desanaṃ nāruḷhā, evaṃ nerayikāpi sabbamaññanānadhiṭṭhānato. Eteneva ekaccapetānampettha asaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Apare pana ‘‘diṭṭhimaññanādhiṭṭhānato tesampettha saṅgaho icchitoyevā’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Samaṅgibhūtaṃ paricārenta’’ntiādinā sutte ^b^vuttanayena^eb^. ^b^Rajjatī^eb^ti ‘‘subhā sukhitā’’ti vipallāsaggāhena tattha rāgaṃ janeti. Evamettha rajjanto ca na kevalaṃ dassanavaseneva, savanādivasenapi rajjatevāti dassento ^b^‘‘disvāpi…pe… utvāpī’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha ghāyanādivasena rajjanaṃ tehi anubhūtagandhamālādivasena ceva visabhāgavatthubhūtānaṃ tesaṃ ^a^M1.0082^ea^ paribhogavasena ca yathānubhavaṃ anussaraṇavasena ca veditabbaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ bhūte taṇhāmaññanāya maññatī^eb^ti vuttanayena bhūte paṭicca chandarāgaṃ janento tesaṃ paṭipattiṃ assādento abhinandanto abhivadanto ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanto ‘‘īdisī avatthā mama anāgatamaddhānaṃ siyā’’tiādinā vā pana nayena tattha nandiṃ samannānento bhūte taṇhāmaññanāya maññatīti attho. ^b^Appaṭiladdhassa^eb^ khattiyamahāsālādibhāvassa, ^b^sampattiṃ vipatti^eb^nti jātivasena ukkaṭṭanihīnataṃ. ^b^Dahatī^eb^ti ṭhapeti. ^b^Yo^eb^^a^V1.0073^ea^^b^evarūpo māno^eb^ti yo eso ‘‘ayaṃ pubbe mayā sadiso, idāni ayaṃ seṭṭho ayaṃ hīnataro’’ti uppanno māno. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati mānātimāno^eb^ti ayaṃ bhārātibhāro viya purimaṃ sadisamānaṃ upādāya mānātimāno nāmāti attho.

[03]^b^Niccā^eb^tiādīsu uppādābhāvato ^b^niccā,^eb^ maraṇābhāvato ^b^dhuvā,^eb^ sabbadā bhāvato ^b^sassatā^eb^. Aniccapaṭipakkhato vā ^b^niccā,^eb^ thirabhāvato ^b^dhuvā,^eb^ sassatisamatāya ^b^sassatā,^eb^ jarādivasena vipariṇāmassa abhāvato ^b^avipariṇāmadhammā^eb^ti maññati. ^b^Sabbe sattā^eb^ti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādayo anavasesā sañjanaṭṭhena sattā. ^b^Sabbe pāṇā^eb^ti ‘‘ekindriyo pāṇo dvindriyo pāṇo’’tiādivasena vuttā anavasesā pāṇanaṭṭhena ^b^pāṇā. Sabbe bhūtā^eb^ti anavasesā aṇḍakosādīsu bhūtā sañjātāti ^b^bhūtā. Sabbe jīvā^eb^ti sāliyavagodhūmādayo anavasesā jīvanaṭṭhena ^b^jīvā^eb^. Tesu hi so virūhabhāvena jīvasaññī. ^b^Avasā abalā avīriyā^eb^ti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthīti dasseti. ^b^Niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatāti^eb^ ettha ^b^niyatī^eb^ti. ^b^Niyatatā,^eb^ acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇi viya avijahitapakatitā. ^b^Saṅgatī^eb^ti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tattha saṅgamo. ^b^Bhāvo^eb^ti sabhāvoyeva, kaṇḍakānaṃ tikhiṇatā, kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ parimaṇḍalāditā, migapakkhīnaṃ vicittavaṇṇāditāti evamādiko. Evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāve ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā. Yena hi yathā bhavitabbaṃ, so tatheva bhavati. Yena na bhavitabbaṃ, so na bhavatīti dasseti. ^b^Chasvevābhijātīsū^eb^ti kaṇhābhijātiādīsu chasu eva abhijātīsu ṭhatvā sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti, aññā sukhadukkhabhūmi natthīti dasseti. ^b^Vā^eb^-saddena antādibhede diṭṭhābhinivese saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Upapatti^eb^nti ^a^M1.0083^ea^ iminā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye bhūtānaṃ sahabyataṃ ākaṅkhatīti dasseti. ^b^Sukhuppatti^eb^nti iminā pana tattha tattha uppannassa sukhuppattiṃ. ^b^Ekacce bhūte niccā^eb^tiādinā ekaccasassatikadiṭṭhiṃ dasseti. ^b^Ahampi bhūtesu aññatarosmī^eb^ti iminā pana catutthaṃ ekaccasassatikavādaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Yato kutocī^eb^ti issarapurisādibhedato yato kutoci. ^b^Ekā taṇhāmaññanāva labbhatī^eb^ti idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayena itaramaññanānampi sambhavo niddhāretabbo. Vuttappakāreyeva bhūte taṇhādiṭṭhīhi abhinandatītiādinā vattabbattā āha ‘‘vuttanayamevā’’ti. ^b^Yojanā kātabbā^eb^ti ‘‘yo bhūtapaññattiyā upādānabhūte khandhe parijānāti, so tīhi pariññāhi parijānātī’’tiādinā yojanā kātabbā. Apare panettha bhūtagāmopi bhūta-saddena saṅgahitoti rukkhādivasenapi ^a^V1.0074^ea^ maññanāvibhāgaṃ yojetvā dassenti, tathā mahābhūtavasenapi, taṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ natthi.

[03]^b^Bhūmivisesādinā bhedenā^eb^ti bhūmivisesaupapattivisesādivibhāgena. ^b^Iddhiyā^eb^ti puññavisesanibbattena ānubhāvena. Kiñcāpi deva-saddo ‘‘viddhe vigatavalāhake deve’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.110; 3.102; 5.146-148; ma. ni. 1.486; a. ni. 10.15; itivu. 27) ajaṭākāse āgato, ‘‘devo ca thokaṃ thokaṃ phusāyatī’’tiādīsu meghe, ‘‘ayañhi deva kumāro’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.34, 35, 36) khattiye āgato, ‘‘pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricāreti devo maññe’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.183; ma. ni. 2.211) viya idha upapattidevesu āgato, deva-saddena pana vattabbasatte anavasesato uddharitvā tato idhādhippete dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘te tividhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sesā cha kāmāvacarā idha devāti adhippetā^eb^ itaresaṃ padantarehi nivattitattāti adhippāyo. Bhūtā devāti gahitesu sattesu taṇhādimaññanānaṃ pavattākārenapi tividhalakkhaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘bhūtavāre vuttanayena veditabbā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Aññatarassa upāsakassa pajāpati abhirūpā hotī’’tiādīsu (pārā. 168) ^b^pajāpati^eb^-saddo gharaṇiyaṃ āgato, ‘‘pajāpati kāmadāyī suvaṇṇavaṇṇā me pajā hotū’’tiādīsu diṭṭhigatikaparikappite, ‘‘pajāpatissa devarājassa ^a^M1.0084^ea^ dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyāthā’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.249) devajeṭṭhake, idha pana adhipatīti vadanti, taṃ upari brahmuno gayhamānattā tesaṃ matimattaṃ. ^b^Devāna^eb^nti cātumahārājikādidevānaṃ. ^b^Mahārājādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sakkasuyāmasantussitasunimmitavasavattino gahitā. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti mahārājādīnaṃ. ^b^Sattasaṅkhātāyā^eb^ti kāmabhūmiyaṃ sattasaṅkhātāya. ^b^Pajāpati^eb^nti pajāpatibhāvaṃ. Pajāpatibhāvena hi mānaṃ jappento pajāpatiṃ mānamaññanāya maññatīti vutto.

[03]^b^Ekā diṭṭhimaññanāva yujjatī^eb^ti vuttaṃ, pajāpatino pana samipataṃ salokataṃ vā ākaṅkhato, tathābhāvāya cittaṃ paṇidahato, tathāladdhabbāya sampattiyā attano seyyādibhāvaṃ dahato ca taṇhāmānamaññanāpi sambhavantīti sakkā viññātuṃ. ^b^Ye ca dhammā^eb^ti āyuvaṇṇādike vadati. ^b^Pajāpati^eb^nti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayena itaramaññanānampi sambhavo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Brūhito^eb^ti ^a^V1.0075^ea^ parivuddho. ^b^Guṇavisesehī^eb^ti jhānādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehi uttarimanussadhammatāya. Brahma-saddassa satipi avisesato visiṭṭhavācakatte yattha yattha panassa guṇavisesayuttādirūpā pavatti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sahasso^eb^ti sahassiyā lokadhātuyā adhipatibhūto. ^b^Paṭhamābhinibbatto^eb^ti paṇītena paṭhamajhānena nibbatto, paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ abhinibbatto. ^b^Gahitāti veditabbā^eb^ padhānaggahaṇena appadhānānampi kenaci sambandhena gahitabhāvasiddhito. Ettha ca ^b^brahmā^eb^ti mahābrahmā adhippeto. So hi vaṇṇavantatāya ceva dīghāyukatāya ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahanto brahmāti ^b^mahābrahmā,^eb^ tassa pana purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti ^b^brahmapurohitā,^eb^ parisāyaṃ bhavā paricārakāti ^b^brahmapārisajjā^eb^ti veditabbā. Ukkaṭṭhekapuggalabhāvato pajāpatismiṃ viya brahmani maññanā vattatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pajāpativāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā’’ti. Tathā hi bahupuggalabhāvasāmaññato ābhassaravārādīnaṃ bhūtavārasadisatā vuttā.^eb^

[03]Yathāvuttapabhāya ābhāsanasīlā vā ^b^ābhassarā. Ekatalavāsino^eb^ti idaṃ jhānantarabhūmīnaṃ viya heṭṭhuparibhāvābhāvato vuttaṃ, ṭhānāni ^a^M1.0085^ea^ pana nesaṃ paricchinnāneva. Ābhassarehi parittā ābhā etesanti ^b^parittābhā. Appamāṇā ābhā etesanti appamāṇābhā. ^eb^

[03]^b^Subhā^eb^ti sobhanā pabhā. Kañcanapiṇḍo viya sassirikā ^b^kañcanapiṇḍasassirikā^eb^. Tattha sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe bhā-saddassa rassattaṃ, antima-ṇa-kārassa ha-kārañca katvā ^b^‘‘subhakiṇhā’’^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Subhā^eb^ti ca ekagghanā niccalā pabhā vuccati, parittā subhā etesanti ^b^parittasubhā^eb^. Appamāṇā subhā etesanti ^b^appamāṇasubhā^eb^.
[03]^b^Vipulaphalā^eb^ti vipulasantasukhāyuvaṇṇādiphalā.

[03]Satipi devabrahmādīnaṃ puññaphalena jhānaphalena ca paṭipakkhābhibhave yesaṃ pana puthujjanāsaññasattesu abhibhūvohāro pākaṭo niruḷho ca, tesaṃ vasenāyaṃ desanā pavattāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘asaññabhavassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. Yathā pajāpativāre ‘‘idhekacco pajāpatismiṃyevā’’tiādinā maññanāpavatti dassitā, tathā idhāpi taṃ dassetuṃ sakkāti āha ^b^‘‘sesaṃ pajāpativāre vuttanayamevā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Bhūtavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Evaṃ ^a^V1.0076^ea^ sattavasena bhūmikkamadassane suddhāvāsānaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ niddhārento ^b^‘‘evaṃ bhagavā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^anāgāmikhīṇāsavā^eb^ti anāgāmino ca khīṇāsavā ca. Kiñcāpi suddhāvāsā attheva anekakappasahassāyukā, ukkaṃsaparicchedato pana soḷasakappasahassāyukāva, na tato paranti āha ^b^‘‘katipayakappasahassāyukā’’^eb^ti. Kāmarūpabhavesu pavattamānāpi ākāsānañcāyatanādidhammā arūpāvacarabhāvato taṃbhūmikavohāraṃ na labhantīti ^b^‘‘tatrūpapannāyevā’’^eb^ti avadhāretvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhibhūvāre vuttanayena veditabbā^eb^ yathārahanti adhippāyo. Na hettha vaṇṇavantatādi sambhavatīti. ^b^Pajāpativāre^eb^^b^vuttanayenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0086^ea^ ettha ‘‘ahamasmi arūpo pahīnarūpapaṭighasañño’’tiādinā mānamaññanā veditabbā.
[06]Ākāsānañcāyatanavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rūpamukhena maññanāvatthudassanaṃ saṅkhepoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vitthāratopī’’^eb^ti. Tampi hi ‘‘yattha neva pathavī, na āpo, na tejo, na vāyo, na ākāsānañcāyatana’’ntiādiggahaṇaṃ viya saṅkhepato pañcavokārabhavadassanaṃ hotīti.

[03]^b^Diṭṭha^eb^nti yaṃ cakkhudvārena katadassanakiriyāsamāpanaṃ, yañca cakkhu dvayaṃ passati passissati sati sambhave passeyya, taṃ sabbakālanti visesavacanicchāya abhāvato diṭṭhanteva vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘duddha’’nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rūpāyatanassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. Ayañca nayo ^b^sutā^eb^dīsupi yojetabbo. ^b^Sattā^eb^ti rūpādīsu sattā visattāti sattā. Sañjanaṭṭhena sāmaññasaddopi cesa satta-saddo ‘‘itthirūpe’’ti visayavisesitattā idha purisavācako daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Rattā^eb^ti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakārakena chandarāgena rattā sārattā. ^b^Giddhā^eb^ti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā. ^b^Gadhitā^eb^ti ganthitā viya lobhena dummocanīyabhāvena ārammaṇe paṭibaddhā. ^b^Mucchitā^eb^ti kilesavasena visaññībhūtā viya anaññakiccā mucchaṃ mohaṃ āpannā. ^b^Ajjhosannā^eb^ti visaye aññasādhāraṇe viya katvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā viya ṭhitā. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇādiākārena. ^b^Maṅgalaṃ amaṅgala^eb^nti īdisaṃ diṭṭhaṃ maṅgalaṃ, īdisaṃ amaṅgalanti ^a^V1.0077^ea^. ^b^Rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassananayenā^eb^ti idaṃ vedanādiarūpadhamme, rūpāyatanavinimuttasabbadhamme vā attato gahetvā tato ajjhattikaṃ, bāhiraṃ vā rūpāyatanaṃ tassokāsabhāvena parikappetvā ‘‘so kho pana me ayaṃ attā imasmiṃ rūpāyatane’’ti maññanto diṭṭhasmiṃ maññatīti imaṃ nayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Pathavito maññatī’’tiādīsu yathā ‘‘saupakaraṇassa attano vā parassa ^a^M1.0087^ea^ vā’’tiādimaññanāpavatti dassitā, evaṃ ‘‘diṭṭhato maññatī’’tiādīsu sakkā taṃ dassetunti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ pathavīvāre vuttanayeneva veditabba’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Āhaccā^eb^ti visayaṃ anvāya, patvāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘upagantvā’’ti. Aññamaññasaṃsilese^eb^ti cakkhurūpasotasaddā viya dure ahutvā aññamaññaṃ alliyane.

[03]^b^Manasā viññātaṃ^eb^ kevalanti attho. Itarānipi hi manasā viññāyantīti. Sesehi sattahi āyatanehi paññattiyā asaṅgahitattā tampi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dhammārammaṇassa vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Dvīsupi vikappesu lokuttarānampi saṅgaho āpannoti āha ^b^‘‘idha pana sakkāyapariyāpannameva labbhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vitthāro^eb^ti maññanānaṃ pavattanākāravitthāro. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etesu sutavārādīsu.
[06]Diṭṭhasutavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samāpannakavārenā^eb^ti samāpannakappavattiyā, rūpāvacarārūpāvacarajhānappavattiyāti attho. Sā hi ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe ekākārena pavattatīti katvā ‘‘ekatta’’nti vuccati, evañca katvā vipākajjhānappavattipi idha samāpannakavāraggahaṇeneva gahitāti daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Asamāpannakavārenā^eb^ti kāmāvacaradhammappavattiyā. Upacārajjhānenapi hi cittaṃ na sammā ^b^ekattaṃ^eb^ gatanti vuccatīti.

[03]^b^Yojanā^eb^ti maññanāyojanā. ^b^Bhinditvā^eb^ti vibhajitvā. ^b^Sāsananayenā^eb^ti pāḷinayena. Tattha ‘‘ekattaṃ maññatī’’tiādīsu ‘‘vedanaṃ attato samanupassatī’’tiādinā nayena, ‘‘nānattaṃ maññatī’’tiādīsu ^a^V1.0078^ea^ pana ‘‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī’’tiādinā nayena vuttavidhiṃ anugantvā maññanā veditabbā.

[03]^b^Pathavīvārādīsu vuttena ca aṭṭhakathānayenā^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ vedanāti maññati, mama vedanāti maññatī’’tiādinā, ‘‘ahaṃ rūpanti maññati, mama rūpanti maññatī’’tiādinā cāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathānurūpaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0088^ea^^b^vīmaṃsitvā’’^eb^ti, ekattanānattabhāvesu yo yojanānayo sambhavati, tadanurūpaṃ vicāretvāti attho. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino. ^b^Apare^eb^ti sārasamāsācariyā. Diṭṭhābhinivesaṃ vadantīti sambandho. Puthujjanassa maññanā nāma sakkāyaṃ bhinditvāva yathāupaṭṭhitavisayavaseneva pavattatīti na tattha ayamekattanayo ayaṃ nānattanayoti vibhāgavaseneva, ekattasaññī attā hotītiādīsu ca attano ekattanānattasaññitā vuttā, na pana ekattaṃ nānattanti evaṃ pavattassa diṭṭhābhinivesassa ekattanānattabhāvoti evamettha tadubhayassa idha anadhippetabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Yaṃ yathāvuttaputhujjano anavasesato gaṇhanto gahetuṃ sakkoti, taṃ tassa anavasesato gahetabbataṃ upādāya ^b^‘‘sabba’’^eb^nti vuccatīti dassento ^b^‘‘tamevā’’^eb^ti āha, sakkāyasabbanti attho. Sabbasmimpi tebhūmakadhamme ādīnavadassane asati nibbidābhāvato assādānupassanāya taṇhā vaḍḍhatevāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ assādento sabbaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññatī’’^eb^ti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – ‘‘saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 2.53, 57). ‘‘Sabbamidaṃ mayā nimmita’’nti tena nimmitamaññanāya attānaṃ seyyādito dahanto tena mānena nimmitaṃ maññatiyeva nāma nimmitamaññanāya vinā tathāmānuppattiyā abhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘attanā nimmitaṃ maññanto sabbaṃ mānamaññanāya maññatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbaṃ natthītiādinā nayenā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena niyativādādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Mahā me attā^eb^ti iminā sabbato attano vibhūtipavattivādaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Sabbaṃ sabbatthaka’’nti diṭṭhivasena – ‘‘ahaṃ sabbasmiṃ mayhaṃ kiñcanaṃ palibodho sabbasmiṃ, paro sabbasmiṃ parassa kiñcanaṃ palibodho sabbasmi’’ntiādinā nayenapettha maññanā sambhavatīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘sesaṃ pathavīvāre vuttanayena veditabba’’^eb^nti. Apica ‘‘sabboyaṃ loko purisamayo’’ti evaṃdiṭṭhiko purisasaṅkhātato sabbato, attano uppattiṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā maññanto diṭṭhimaññanāya sabbato maññati, tasmiṃyeva pana diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmaññanā mānamaññanā ca veditabbā. Taṃyeva pana sabbaṃ mayhaṃ attā kattā ^a^V1.0079^ea^ sāmīti vā maññanto ‘‘sabbaṃ ^a^M1.0089^ea^ me’’ti maññati, tathāyaṃ diṭṭhitaṇhābhinandanāhi abhinandanto sabbaṃ abhinandatīti evampettha maññanānaṃ pavatti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti sakkāyaṃ. Ukkaṃsagatasukhasahitañhi khandhapañcakaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādī nibbānanti maññati, taṃ panatthato sakkāyoyevāti. ^b^Ekadhā^eb^ti pañcavidhampi nibbānabhāvena ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Yato^eb^ti yasmā. ^b^Pañcahi kāmaguṇehī^eb^ti manāpiyarūpādīhi pañcahi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi, bandhanehi vā. ^b^Samappito^eb^ suṭṭhu appito allīno hutvā ṭhito. ^b^Samaṅgibhūto^eb^ti samannāgato. ^b^Paricāretī^eb^ti tesu kāmaguṇesu kāmakoṭṭhāsesu yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cāreti sañcāreti ito cito ca upaneti. Atha vā laḷati ramati kīḷati. Ettha dvidhā kāmaguṇā mānusakā ceva dibbā ca. Mānusakā ca mandhātukāmaguṇasadisā, dibbā paranimmitavasavattidevarājassa kāmaguṇasadisā. Evarūpe kāme upagatānañhi te diṭṭhadhammanibbānasampattiṃ paññapenti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettāvatā kho…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Diṭṭhadhammo^eb^ti paccakkhadhammo vuccati, tattha tattha paṭiladdhattabhāvassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, diṭṭhadhamme nibbānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhavūpasamanaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ. Paramaṃ uttamaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānanti ^b^paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ patto hotīti attho. ^b^Pañcadhā āgata^eb^nti yathāvuttakāmaguṇasukhassa ceva catubbidharūpāvacarajjhānasukhassa ca vasena pāḷiyaṃ pañcappakārena āgataṃ. ^b^Nibbānaṃ assādento^eb^ti paramaṃ sukhaṃ nissaraṇanti maññanāya assādento.

[03]‘‘Imasmiṃ nibbāne patte na jāyati, na jīrati, na mīyatī’’ti evampi ^b^nibbānasmiṃ maññati^eb^. ‘‘Ito paraṃ paramassāsabhūtaṃ natthī’’ti gaṇhanto ^b^nibbānato maññati^eb^. Tayidaṃ nibbānaṃ mayā adhigataṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘nibbānaṃ me’’^eb^ti ^b^maññati^eb^. Tatoyeva taṃ nibbānaṃ diṭṭhābhinandanāya abhinandati. Ayaṃ tāvettha ^b^diṭṭhimaññanā^eb^. Tasmiṃyeva pana diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato ^b^taṇhāmānamaññanāpi^eb^ niddhāretabbā.

[03]^b^Yādiso^eb^ti yathārūpo, yehi jegucchādisabhāvehi passitabboti attho. ^b^Esā^eb^ti ayaṃ. Tenassa attano suṇantānañca paccakkhasiddhatamāha. Asubhādisabhāvena saha vijjamānānaṃ rūpādidhammānaṃ kāyo samūhoti ^b^sakkāyo,^eb^ upādānakkhandhā. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti tassa bhāvabhūtena paṭikūlatādippakārena. ^b^Sabbamaññanā^eb^ti pathavīādike sarūpāvadhāraṇādivibhāgabhinne ^a^M1.0090^ea^ visaye pavattiyā anekavihitā sabbā taṇhāmaññanā.

[03]^b^Jeguccho^eb^ti ^a^V1.0080^ea^ jigucchanīyo. Tenassa asubhājaññaduggandhapaṭikūlabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Siduro^eb^ti khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvo. Tenassa aniccāddhuvakhayavayapabhaṅgurasabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Aya^eb^nti sakkāyo. ^b^Dukkho^eb^ti na sukho. Tenassa kicchakasirābādhadukkhavuttitaṃ dasseti. ^b^Apariṇāyako^eb^ti pariṇāyakarahito. Tenassa attasuññāsāravuttitaṃ dasseti. ^b^Ta^eb^nti sakkāyaṃ. ^b^Paccanīkato^eb^ti sabhāvapaṭipakkhato, subhaniccasukhāttāditoti attho. ^b^Gaṇha^eb^nti gaṇhanto, tattha subhādigāhavasena abhinivisantoti attho.

[03]Idāni tissopi maññanā upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘subhato’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā mahāpariḷāhe vipulānatthāvahe ca aggimhi salabhassa patanaṃ subhasukhasaññāya, evaṃ tādise sakkāye salabhassa taṇhāmaññanāti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘subhato…pe… taṇhāya maññanā’’^eb^ti iminā.

[03]Gūthādī kīṭako gūtharāsiṃ laddhā asampannepi tasmiṃ sampannākāraṃ pavattayamāno attānaṃ ukkaṃseti, evamanekādīnave ekantabhedini sakkāye niccasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampattimadena tattha bālo mānaṃ jappetīti imamatthamāha ^b^‘‘niccasaññaṃ…pe… mānena maññanā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yathā bālo muddhadhātuko sammūḷho koci ādāse attano paṭibimbaṃ disvā ‘‘ayaṃ maññe ādāsasāmiko, yadi ahamimaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭheyyaṃ, anatthampi me kareyyā’’ti chaḍḍetvā palāyanto tattha avijjamānameva kiñci vijjamānaṃ katvā gaṇhi, tathūpamo ayaṃ bālo sakkāye attattaniyagāhaṃ gaṇhantoti imamatthaṃ dīpeti ^b^‘‘attā…pe… diṭṭhiyā hoti maññanā’’^eb^ti iminā.
[03]^b^Sukhumaṃ mārabandhanaṃ^eb^ vepacittibandhanatopi sukhumatarattā. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘aho sukhumataraṃ kho, bhikkhave, mārabandhana’’nti.

[03]^b^Bahu^eb^nti ativiya, anekakkhattuṃ vā. ^b^Vipphandamānopi sakkāyaṃ nātivattati^eb^ saṃsāraṃ nātivattanato. Yathāha ‘‘ye te, bhikkhave, samaṇā sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapenti, te, sakkāyaṃyeva anuparidhāvanti seyyathāpi sā gaddulabandhano’’tiādi. Yathā hi sattasupi ^a^M1.0091^ea^ ucchedavikappesu saṃsāranāyikānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ sambhavati, evaṃ sassatavikappesupīti ^a^V1.0081^ea^ kathañci pana diṭṭhigatikassa bhavavippamokkho. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘sakkāyaṃ nātivattatī’’ti.
[03]^b^Saso^eb^ti so eso puthujjano. ^b^Nicca^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ.
[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti tasmā sakkāyamalīnassa jātiyādīnamanativattanato. ^b^Asātato^eb^ti dukkhato.

[03]^b^Passaṃ evamima^eb^nti asubhāniccadukkhānattasabhāvaṃ taṃ sakkāyaṃ vuttappakārena yathābhūtavipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya passanto. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti samucchedavasena sabbā maññanāyo pajahitvā. ^b^Sabbadukkhā pamuccatī^eb^ti sakalasmāpi vaṭṭadukkhato pamuccatīti.
[06]Ekattavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Adhippetassa atthassa aniyametvā vacanaṃ ^b^uddeso,^eb^ niyametvā vacanaṃ ^b^niddeso^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘yoti uddesavacanaṃ, soti niddesavacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sampiṇḍanattho^eb^ti samuccayattho. Sampiṇḍanañca sabhāgatāvasena hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘ārammaṇasabhāgenā’’^eb^ti, ārammaṇassa sabhāgatāya sadisatāyāti attho. ^b^Sekkhaṃ dasseti^eb^ sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, sekkhavisayattā ca tassa vacanassa.

[03]^b^Kenaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yasmā ñāṇena araṇīyato attho sabhāvo, tasmā kenaṭṭhena kena sabhāvena kena lakkhaṇena sekkho nāma hotīti attho. Yasmā pana sekkhadhammādhigamena puggale sekkhavohārappavatti, tasmā ^b^‘‘sekkhadhammapaṭilābhato sekkho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sekkhadhammā^eb^ nāma catūsu maggesu, heṭṭhimesu ca tīsu phalesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sekkhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā…pe… ettāvatā kho bhikkhu sekkho hotī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena sekkhalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā ^a^M1.0092^ea^ idāni suttantikapariyāyenapi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sikkhatī^eb^ti iminā sikkhāttayasamaṅgī apariniṭṭhitasikkho sekkhoti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sikkhatī’’^eb^tiādi ^a^V1.0082^ea^. Sikkhāhi niccasamāyogadīpanatthañcettha ‘‘sikkhati sikkhatī’’ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ. Atha vā sikkhanaṃ sikkhā, sā etassa sīlanti ^b^sekkho^eb^. So hi apariyositasikkhattā tadadhimuttattā ca ekantena sikkhanasīlo, na asekkho viya pariniṭṭhitasikkho tattha paṭippassaddhussukko, nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto. Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsu sikkhāsu jāto, tattha vā bhavoti ^b^sekkho^eb^. Atha vā ikkhati etāyāti ikkhā, maggaphalasammādiṭṭhi. Saha ikkhāyāti ^b^sekkho^eb^.

[03]^b^Anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī^eb^ti yā sā sīlādikā vipassanantā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā lokuttarāya paṭipadāya anulomanato anulomapaṭipadā, tassā sampādanena paripūrakārīti. Idāni taṃ paṭipadaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sīlasampanno’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sīlasampanno^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena samannāgato, paripuṇṇapātimokkhasīlo vā. Pātimokkhasīlañhi idha ‘‘sīla’’nti adhippetaṃ padhānabhāvato. Rūpādiārammaṇesu abhijjhādīnaṃ pavattinivāraṇasaṅkhātena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ pidhānena ^b^indriyesu guttadvāro^eb^. Pariyesanādivasena bhojane pamāṇajānanena ^b^bhojane mattaññū^eb^. Vigatathinamiddho hutvā rattindivaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanasikāre yuttatāya ^b^jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto^eb^. Kathaṃ pana jāgariyānuyogo hotīti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pubbarattā…pe… viharatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yathāha ‘‘kathañca pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto hoti? Idha bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi cittaṃ parisodheti, rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ caṅkamena…pe… sodheti, evaṃ kho bhikkhu pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto hotī’’ti (vibha. 519). ^b^Imasmiṃ panatthe^eb^ti ‘‘maññati, na maññatī’’ti ca vattabbabhāvasaṅkhāte atthe. ^b^No puthujjano adhippeto^eb^ ‘‘appattamānaso, anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno’’ti ca vuttattā.

[03]Sampayuttattā manasi bhavoti rāgo mānaso, mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṃ ^b^mānasaṃ,^eb^ anavasesato mānaṃ sīyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo ^a^M1.0093^ea^^b^mānasaṃ,^eb^ tannibbattattā pana arahattassa mānasatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Janesutā^eb^ti jane sakalasattaloke vissutā, patthaṭayasāti attho.

[03]Natthi ito uttaranti ^b^anuttaraṃ^eb^. Taṃ pana sabbaseṭṭhaṃ hontaṃ ekantato sadisarahitameva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anuttaranti seṭṭhaṃ,^eb^^b^asadisanti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Patthayamānassā^eb^ti taṇhāyantassa. ^b^Pajappitānī^eb^ti mānajappanāni. Yasmiñhi vatthusmiṃ taṇhāyanā patthayamānamaññanā sambhavati, tasmiṃyeva ‘‘seyyohamasmī’’tiādīni pajappitāni sambhavantīti adhippāyo. ^b^Pavedhīta^eb^nti parivāsitaṃ. ^b^Pakappitesū^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi parikappitesu ārammaṇesu. ^b^Sota^eb^nti kilesasotaṃ ^a^V1.0083^ea^. Tasmiñhi chinne itarasotaṃ chinnamevāti. ^b^Viddhasta^eb^nti vināsitaṃ. Tañca kho lomahaṃsamattampi asesetvāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘vinaḷīkata’’^eb^nti, vigatāvasesaṃ katanti attho. Adhimuttiyā idhādhippetapatthanā pākaṭā hotīti ^b^‘‘tanninno’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, na pana kusalacchandassa adhimuttibhāvato. ^b^Adhimuccanto^eb^ti okappento.

[03]^b^Sabbākāraviparītāyā^eb^ti ‘‘subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca’’ntiādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ attanā gahetabbākārānaṃ vasena tabbiparītatāya, anavasesato dhammasabhāvaviparītākāragāhiniyāti attho. ^b^Abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇenā^eb^ti asampajānanamicchājānanāni viya na dhammasabhāvaṃ appatvā nāpi atikkamitvā, atha kho avirajjhitvā dhammasabhāvassa abhimukhabhāvappattiyā abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena, ñātapariññādhiṭṭhānāya tīraṇapariññāya pahānapariññekadesena cāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pathavīti…pe… vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pathavībhāva^eb^nti pathaviyaṃ abhiññeyyabhāvaṃ. Lakkhaṇapathavī hi idhādhippetā, pariññeyyabhāvo panassā ^b^‘‘aniccātipī’’^eb^tiādinā gahitoti. ^b^Abhiññatvā^eb^ti ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi heṭṭhimamaggañāṇehi ca abhijānitvā. ^b^Māmaññī^eb^ti appahīnānaṃ maññanānaṃ vasena māti maññatīti mā, pahīnānaṃ pana vasena na maññatīti amaññī, mā ca so amaññī ca māmaññīti evamettha padavibhāgato attho veditabbo. Tattha yena bhāgena amaññī, tena maññīti na vattabbo. Yena pana bhāgena maññī, tena amaññīti na vattabboti. Evaṃ paṭikkhepappadhānaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^‘‘maññī ca na maññī ca na vattabbo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Paṭikkhepappadhānatā cettha ^a^M1.0094^ea^ labbhamānānampi maññanānaṃ dubbalabhāvato veditabbā. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘itarā pana tanubhāvaṃ gatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mā^eb^ti ca nipātapadametaṃ, anekatthā ca nipātāti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘etasmiñhi atthe imaṃ padaṃ nipātetvā vutta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nipātetvā^eb^ti ca pakatiādivibhāganiddhāraṇe anumānanayaṃ muñcitvā yathāvutte atthe paccakkhatova dassetvāti attho. ^b^Puthujjano viyā^eb^ti etenassa uparimaggavajjhataṇhāmānavasena maññanā na paṭikkhittāti dīpeti.

[03]Atha vā ^b^mā maññī^eb^ti parikappakiriyāpaṭikkhepavacanametaṃ ‘‘mā randhayuṃ, mā jīrī’’tiādīsu viya, na maññeyyāti vuttañhoti. Yathā hi puthujjano sabbaso appahīnamaññanattā ‘‘maññati’’cceva vattabbo, yathā ca khīṇāsavo sabbaso pahīnamaññanattā na maññati eva, na evaṃ sekkho. Tassa hi ekaccā maññanā pahīnā, ekaccā appahīnā, tasmā ubhayabhāvato ubhayathāpi na vattabbo. Nanu ca ubhayabhāvato ubhayathāpi vattabboti? Na. Yā hi appahīnā, tāpissa tanubhāvaṃ gatāti tāhipi so na maññeyya vibhūtatarāya ^a^V1.0084^ea^ maññanāya abhāvato, pageva itarāhi. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘mā maññī’’ti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘mā maññīti parikappakiriyāpaṭikkhepavacanametaṃ ‘mā randhayuṃ, mā jīrī’tiādīsu viya, na maññeyyāti vuttaṃ hotī’’ti. Ayañcassa amaññanā vatthuno pariññeyyattā, na asekkhassa viya pariññātattā. Yañhi ekantato parijānitabbaṃ parijānituṃ sakkā, na tattha tabbidhure viya puthujjanassa maññanā sambhavanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pariññeyyaṃ tassāti vadāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Okkantaniyāmattā^eb^ti anupaviṭṭhasammattaniyāmattā, otiṇṇamaggasotattāti attho. ^b^Sambodhiparāyaṇattā^eb^ti uparimaggasambodhipaṭisaraṇattā, tadadhigamāya ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvatoti attho. Ubhayenapi tassa avassaṃbhāvinī sesapariññāti dasseti. ^b^Pariññeyya^eb^nti parijānitabbabhāvena ṭhitaṃ, pariññātuṃ vā sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Tappaṭipakkhato ^b^apariññeyyaṃ^eb^. ^b^Puthujjanassa viyā^eb^ti etena idhādhippetaputhujjanassa pariññeyyabhāvāsaṅkā eva natthi anadhikāratoti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Mābhinandī’’^eb^ti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
[06]Sekkhavāradutiyanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabhāgo^eb^^a^M1.0095^ea^ diṭṭhasaccatādisāmaññena. Ārakā kilesehi arahanti padassa niruttinayena atthaṃ vatvā taṃ pāḷiyā samānento ^b^‘‘vuttañceta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^pāpakā^eb^ti lāmakaṭṭhena duggatisampāpanaṭṭhena ca pāpakā. Sāvajjaṭṭhena akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena ca ^b^akusalā^eb^. Saṃkilesaṃ arahanti, tattha vā niyuttāti ^b^saṃkilesikā^eb^. Punabbhavassa karaṇasīlā, punabbhavaphalaṃ arahantīti vā ^b^ponobhavikā^eb^. Saha darathena pariḷāhena pavattantīti ^b^sadarā^eb^. Dukkho kaṭuko, dukkhamo vā vipāko etesanti ^b^dukkhavipākā^eb^. Anāgate jātiyā ceva jarāmaraṇānañca vaḍḍhanena ^b^jātijarāmaraṇiyā^eb^ti. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo. Kāmañcāyaṃ suttantavaṇṇanā, abhidhammanayo pana nippariyāyoti tena dassento ^b^‘‘cattāro āsavā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Samucchinnā paṭippassaddhā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ samucchinnā eva, atha kho paṭippassaddhāpīti maggakiccena sadisaṃ phalakiccampi niddhāreti.

[03]Sīlavisodhanādinā ^a^V1.0085^ea^ garūnaṃ paṭipattiyā anukaraṇaṃ ^b^garusaṃvāso^eb^. Ariyamaggapaṭipatti eva ^b^ariyamaggasaṃvāso^eb^. ^b^Dasa ariyāvāsā^eb^ nāma pañcaṅgavippahīnatādayo. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ –

[08]‘‘Dasayime, bhikkhave, ariyāvāsā, ye ariyā āvasiṃsu vā āvasanti vā āvasissanti vā. Katame dasa? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato, ekārakkho, caturāpasseno, panuṇṇapaccekasacco, samavayasaṭṭhesano, anāvilasaṅkappo, passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro, suvimuttacitto, suvimuttapañño. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa ariyāvāsā’’ti (a. ni. 10.19).

[03]Vussatīti vā vusitaṃ, ariyamaggo, ariyaphalañca, taṃ etassa atthīti atisayavacanicchāvasena arahā ^b^‘‘vusitavā’’^eb^ti vutto. ^b^Karaṇīya^eb^nti pariññāpahānabhāvanāsacchikiriyamāha. Taṃ pana yasmā catūhi maggehi catūsu saccesu kattabbattā soḷasavidhanti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catūhi maggehi^eb^^a^M1.0096^ea^^b^karaṇīya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sammāvimuttassā^eb^ti aggamaggaphalapaññāhi samucchedapaṭippassaddhīnaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vimuttassa. ^b^Santacittassā^eb^ti tato eva sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasantacittassa. Bhinnakilesassa khīṇāsavassa ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^. ^b^Katassa^eb^ pariññādikiccassa ^b^paṭicayo^eb^ puna karaṇaṃ ^b^natthi,^eb^ tato eva ^b^karaṇīyaṃ na vijjati^eb^ na upalabbhati.

[03]^b^Bhārā^eb^ti osīdāpanaṭṭhena bhārā viyāti bhārā. Vuttañhi ‘‘bhārā have pañcakkhandhā’’tiādi (saṃ. ni. 3.22). Attano yonisomanasikārāyattanti ^b^attupanibandhaṃ,^eb^ sasantānapariyāpannattā attānaṃ ^b^avijahanaṃ^eb^. Tayidaṃ yadipi sabbasmiṃ anavajjadhamme sambhavati, akuppasabhāvāparihānadhammesu pana aggabhūte arahatte sātisayaṃ, netaresūti dassento āha ^b^‘‘attano paramatthaṭṭhena vā’’^eb^ti, uttamaṭṭhabhāvenāti attho.

[03]Suttantanayo nāma pariyāyanayoti nippariyāyanayena saṃyojanāni dassento ^b^‘‘bhavarāgaissāmacchariyasaṃyojana’’^eb^nti āha, na pana ‘‘rūparāgo’’tiādinā. ^b^Bhavesu saṃyojantī^eb^ti kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ paccayo hutvā nissarituṃ appadānavasena bandhanti. Satipi hi aññesaṃ tappaccayabhāve na vinā saṃyojanāni tesaṃ tappaccayabhāvo atthi, orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyasaṅgahitehi ca tehi taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammaniyamo bhavaniyamo ca hoti ^a^V1.0086^ea^, na ca upacchinnasaṃyojanassa katānipi kammāni bhavaṃ nibbattentīti tesaṃyeva saṃyojanaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Sammā aññāyāti^eb^ ājānanabhūtāya aggamaggapaññāya sammā yathābhūtaṃ dukkhādīsu yo yathā jānitabbo, taṃ tathā jānitvā. ^b^Cittavimutti^eb^ sabbassa cittasaṃkilesassa vissaggo. ^b^Nibbānādhimutti^eb^ nibbāne adhimuccanaṃ tattha ninnapoṇapabbhāratā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti pathavīādikaṃ. ^b^Pariññātaṃ,^eb^ na puthujjanassa viya apariññātaṃ, sekkhassa viya pariññeyyaṃ vā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti pariññātattā.

[03]Catutthapañcamachaṭṭhavārā tattha tattha kilesanibbānakittanavasena pavattattā ^b^nibbānavārā^eb^ nāma. Tattha pathavīādīnaṃ pariññātattā amaññanā, sā pana pariññā rāgādīnaṃ khayena siddhāti imassa atthassa dīpanavasena pāḷi pavattāti dassento ^b^‘‘pariññātaṃ tassāti sabbapadehi yojetvā^eb^^b^puna^eb^^a^M1.0097^ea^^b^khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti yojetabbaṃ^eb^. ^b^Esa nayo itaresū’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha ^b^itaresū^eb^ti pañcamachaṭṭhavāresu. Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷi evaṃ na dissatīti āha ^b^‘‘desanā pana ekattha vuttaṃ sabbattha vuttameva hotīti saṃkhittā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Na khayā rāgassa vītarāgo^eb^ sabbaso appahīnarāgattā. Vikkhambhitarāgo hi soti. ^b^Bāhiraka^eb^ggahaṇañcettha tathābhāvasseva tesu labbhanato, na tesu eva tathābhāvassa labbhanato. Idāni yā sā ‘‘pariññātaṃ tassā’’ti sabbapadehi yojanā vuttā, taṃ vināpi nibbānavārātthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^maññanaṃ na maññatī^eb^ti maññanā nappavattatīti attho. Maññanāya maññitabbattepi tassā vatthuantogadhattāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Yadipi pariññātapadaṃ aggahetvā nibbānavāradesanā pavattā, evampi ‘‘khayā’’tiādipadehi pariññāsiddhi eva pakāsīyatīti ko tesaṃ visesoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Maggabhāvanāpāripūridassanatthaṃ vutto,^eb^ maggakiccantā hi pariññāyoti adhippāyo. ^b^Itare…pe… veditabbā^eb^ vītarāgādikittanatoti. ^b^Dvīhi vā kāraṇehī^eb^ti yathāvuttakāraṇadvayena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti khīṇāsavassa. ^b^Ayaṃ viseso^eb^ti idāni vuccamāno viseso. Yadipi khīṇāsavo ekantena vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho eva ca hoti, yāya pana pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vītarāgatādayo savisesāti vattabbataṃ labhanti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tīsu hī’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^V1.0087^ea^. ‘‘Ratto atthaṃ na jānātī’’tiādinā (netti. 11) rāge ādīnavaṃ passato ‘‘rāgo ca nāma sukhābhisaṅgena uppajjati, sukhañca vipariṇāmato dukkhaṃ. Pageva itara’’nti sahetuke rāge ādīnavadassanaṃ dukkhānupassanāya nimittaṃ, dukkhānupassanā ca paṇidhiyā paṭipakkhabhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhaṃ paripuretīti āha ^b^‘‘rāge…pe… vītarāgo hotī’’^eb^ti. Tathā ‘‘duṭṭho atthaṃ na jānātī’’tiādinā (itivu. 88) dose ādīnavaṃ passato ‘‘doso ca nāma dukkhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati, tañca ubhayaṃ anavaṭṭhitaṃ ittaraṃ pabhaṅgū’’ti sahetuke dose ādīnavadassanaṃ aniccānupassanāya nimittaṃ, aniccānupassanā ca niccanimittādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato animittavimokkhaṃ paripūretīti āha ^b^‘‘dose…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. Tathā ‘‘mūḷho ^a^M1.0098^ea^ atthaṃ na jānātī’’tiādinā (itivu. 88) mohe ādīnavaṃ passato ‘‘moho nāma yathāsabhāvaggahaṇassa paribbhamanto’’ti mohassa vikkhambhanaṃ anattānupassanāya nimittaṃ, anattānupassanāya ca attābhinivesassa paṭipakkhabhāvato suññataṃ vimokkhaṃ paripūretīti āha ^b^‘‘mohe…pe… vītamoho hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ti yadi vītarāgatādayo vimokkhavibhāgena vuttā, evaṃ sante. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā vimokkhamukhavimokkhānaṃ vasena niyametvā na vuttaṃ, tasmā. Yaṃ kiñci arahato sambhavantaṃ vibhajitvā vuccatīti vārattayadesanā katāti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘yaṃ arahato’’^eb^tiādinā.

[03]Evaṃ vimuttivibhāgena khīṇāsavassa vibhāgaṃ vārattayadesanānibandhanaṃ dassetvā idāni avibhāgenapi tattha pariññāvisayassa anusayavisayassa ca vibhāgaṃ tassa nibandhanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘avisesenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha upekkhāvedanā visesato saṅkhāradukkhaṃ sammohādhiṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅkhāra…pe… moho’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
[06]Khīṇāsavavāratatiyādinayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yehi (dī. ni. abhi. ṭī. 1.7.cūḷasīlavaṇṇanā; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.170) guṇavisesehi nimittabhūtehi bhagavati ‘‘tathāgato’’ti ayaṃ samaññā pavattā, taṃ dassanatthaṃ ^a^V1.0088^ea^^b^‘‘aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Guṇanemittakāneva hi bhagavato sabbāni nāmāni. Yathāha –
[21]‘‘Asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni, saguṇena mahesino;
[22]Guṇena nāmamuddheyyaṃ, api nāmasahassato’’ti. (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1313; udā. aṭṭha. 53; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.76; dī. ni. abhi. ṭī. 1.7.cūḷasīlavaṇṇanā; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.170) –

[07]^b^Tathā āgato^eb^ti ettha ākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho ^b^tathā^eb^-saddo. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti paṭipādagamanattho ^b^āgata^eb^-saddo, na ñāṇagamanattho ‘‘tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgato’’tiādīsu ^a^M1.0099^ea^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.7; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.12; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.3.78; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.170; udā. aṭṭha. 18; itivu. aṭṭha. 38; theragā. aṭṭha. 1.1.3; bu. vaṃ. aṭṭha. 2.bāhiranidāna; mahāni. aṭṭha. 14) viya, nāpi kāyagamanādiattho ‘‘āgato kho mahāsamaṇo, māgadhānaṃ giribbaja’’ntiādīsu (mahāva. 63) viya. Tattha yadākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā-saddo, taṃ karuṇāppadhānattā mahākaruṇāmukhena purimabuddhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ udāharaṇavasena sāmaññato dassento yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ ekantasambandhabhāvato ^b^‘‘yathā sabbaloka…pe… āgatā’’^eb^ti sādhāraṇato vatvā puna taṃ paṭipadaṃ ^b^mahāpadānasuttā^eb^dīsu (dī. ni. 2.4) sambahulaniddesena supākaṭānaṃ āsannānañca vipassīādīnaṃ channaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ vasena dassento ^b^‘‘yathā vipassī bhagavā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^yena abhinīhārenā^eb^ti manussatta-liṅgasampatti-hetu-satthāradassana-pabbajjā-abhiññādiguṇasampatti-adhikāra-chandānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena kāyapaṇidhānamahāpaṇidhānena. Sabbesañhi sammāsambuddhānaṃ kāyapaṇidhānaṃ imināva nīhārena samijjhatīti.

[03]Evaṃ mahābhinīhāravasena ‘‘tathāgato’’ti padassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni pāramīpūraṇavasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā dānapāramiṃ pūretvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne suttantikānaṃ mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ pāramīkathā vattabbā, sā pana sabbākārasampannā ^b^cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāya^eb^ (cariyā. pakiṇṇakakathā) vitthārato niddiṭṭhā, tasmā atthikehi tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Yathā ^a^V1.0089^ea^ pana pubbe vipassīādayo sammāsambuddhā abhinīhārasampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāya suvisuddhāya paṭipadāya anavasesato sammadeva sabbā pāramiyo paripūresuṃ, evaṃ amhākampi bhagavā paripūresīti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘samattiṃ sapāramiyo pūretvā’’^eb^ti. Satipi aṅgapariccāgādīnaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca ^b^‘‘pañca mahāpariccāge’’^eb^ti visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, tatoyeva ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇampi kataṃ, pariggahapariccāgabhāvasāmaññepi dhanarajjapariccāgato puttadārapariccāgaggahaṇañca kataṃ.

[03]Gatapaccāgatikavattapūraṇādikāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya saddhiṃ abhiññāsamāpattinipphādanaṃ ^b^pubbayogo,^eb^ dānādīsuyeva sātisayapaṭipattinipphādanaṃ ^b^pubbacariyā^eb^^a^M1.0100^ea^, sā cariyāpiṭakasaṅgahitā. Abhinīhāro ^b^pubbayogo,^eb^ dānādipaṭipatti, kāyavivekavasena ekacariyā vā ^b^pubbacariyā^eb^ti keci. Dānādīnañceva appicchatādīnañca saṃsāranibbānesu ādīnavānisaṃsānañca vibhāvanavasena sattānaṃ bodhittaye patiṭṭhāpanaparipācanavasena ca pavattā kathā ^b^dhammakkhānaṃ,^eb^ ñātīnaṃ atthacariyā ^b^ñātatthacariyā,^eb^ sāpi karuṇāya vaseneva. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena lokatthacariyādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Kammassakatañāṇavasena, anavajjakammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānaparicayavasena khandhāyatanādiparicayavasena, lakkhaṇattayatīraṇavasena ca ñāṇacāro ^b^buddhicariyā,^eb^ sā pana atthato paññāpāramīyeva, ñāṇasambhāradassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Koṭī^eb^ti pariyanto, ukkaṃsoti attho.

[03]Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvā brūhetvāti sambandho. Tattha ^b^bhāvetvā^eb^ti uppādetvā. ^b^Brūhetvā^eb^ti vaḍḍhetvā. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānā^eb^diggahaṇena āgamanapaṭipadaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dasseti. Vipassanāsahagatā eva vā ^b^satipaṭṭhānā^eb^dayo daṭṭhabbā. Ettha ca ‘‘yena abhinīhārenā’’tiādinā āgamanapaṭipadāya ādiṃ dasseti, ‘‘dānapāramī’’tiādinā majjhaṃ, ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhāne’’tiādinā pariyosānanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sampatijāto^eb^ti muhuttajāto manussānaṃ hatthato muttamatto, na mātukucchito nikkhantamatto. Nikkhantamattañhi mahāsattaṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tesaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno ajinappaveṇiyā, tesaṃ hatthato manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitoti. ^b^Yathāha^eb^ bhagavā mahāpadānadesanāyaṃ. ^b^Setamhi chatte^eb^ti dibbasetacchatte. ^b^Anudhārīyamāne^eb^ti dhārīyamāne. Ettha ca chattaggahaṇeneva khaggādīni pañca kakudhabhaṇṭānipi vuttānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Khaggatālavaṇṭamorahatthakavālabījanīuṇhīsapaṭṭāpi ^a^V1.0090^ea^ hi chattena saha tadā upaṭṭhitā ahesuṃ, chattādīniyeva ca tadā paññāyiṃsu, na chattādiggāhakā. ^b^Sabbā ca disā^eb^ti dasapi disā. Nayidaṃ sabbadisāvilokanaṃ sattapadavītihāruttarakālaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimadisaṃ ^a^M1.0101^ea^ olokesi. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā ‘‘mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro’’ti āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso disā, catasso anudisā; heṭṭhā, uparīti sabbā disā anuviloketvā sabbattha attanā sadisaṃ adisvā ‘‘ayaṃ uttarā disā’’ti tattha sattapadavītihārena agamāsi. ^b^Āsabhi^eb^nti uttamaṃ. ^b^Aggo^eb^ti sabbapaṭhamo. ^b^Jeṭṭho seṭṭho^eb^ti ca tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo^eb^ti imasmiṃ attabhāve pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi.
[03]^b^Anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvenā^eb^ti saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘yañhī’’^eb^tiādinā vitthārato dasseti. Tattha ^b^etthā^eb^ti –
[21]‘‘Anekasākhañca sahassamaṇḍalaṃ,
[27]Chattaṃ marū dhārayumantalikkhe;
[26]Suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarā,
[22]Na dissare cāmarachattagāhakā’’ti. (su. ni. 693);

[03]Imissā gāthāya. Sabbaññutaññāṇameva sabbattha appaṭihatacāratāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābhassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tathā ayaṃ bhagavāpi gato…pe… pubbanimittabhāvenā^eb^ti etena abhijātiyaṃ dhammatāvasena uppajjanakavisesā sabbabodhisattānaṃ sādhāraṇāti dasseti. Pāramitānissandā hi teti.

[03]^b^Vikkamī^eb^ti agamāsi. ^b^Marū^eb^ti devā. ^b^Samā^eb^ti vilokanasamatāya samā sadisiyo. Mahāpuriso hi yathā ekaṃ disaṃ vilokesi, evaṃ sesadisāpi, na katthaci vilokane vibandho tassa ahosīti. ^b^Samā^eb^ti vā viloketuṃ yuttā, visamarahitāti attho. Na hi tadā bodhisattassa virūpabībhacchavisamarūpāni viloketuṃ ayuttāni disāsu upaṭṭhahantīti.

[03]Evaṃ ‘‘tathā gato’’ti kāyagamanaṭṭhena gata-saddena tathāgata-saddaṃ niddisitvā idāni ñāṇagamanaṭṭhena taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^nekkhammenā^eb^ti alobhappadhānena kusalacittuppādena ^a^V1.0091^ea^. Kusalā hi ^a^M1.0102^ea^ dhammā idha nekkhammaṃ, na pabbajjādayo, ‘‘paṭhamajjhāna’’nti (dī. ni. abhi. ṭī. 1.7.cūḷasīlavaṇṇanā; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.170) ca vadanti. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti pajahitvā. ^b^Gato^eb^ adhigato, paṭipanno uttarivisesanti attho. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti vā pahānahetu, pahānalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Hetulakkhaṇattho hi ayaṃ pahāya-saddo. Kāmacchandādippahānahetukaṃ ‘‘gato’’ti hettha vuttaṃ gamanaṃ avabodho, paṭipatti eva vā kāmacchandādippahānena ca lakkhīyatīti. Esa nayo ^b^padāletvā^eb^tiādīsupi. ^b^Abyāpādenā^eb^ti mettāya. ^b^Ālokasaññāyā^eb^ti vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena (dī. ni. abhi. ṭī. 1.7.cūḷasīlavaṇṇanā) upaṭṭhitāalokasañcānanena. ^b^Avikkhepenā^eb^ti samādhinā. ^b^Dhammavavatthānenā^eb^ti kusalādidhammānaṃ yāthāvanicchayena. ‘‘Sappaccayanāmarūpavavatthānenā’’tipi vadanti.

[03]Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena ‘‘abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā’’tiādinā (vibha. 508) vuttāya paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhagavato tathāgatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni saha upāyena aṭṭhahi samāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi ca mahāvipassanāhi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ñāṇenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānañhi vinibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāyaṃ ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti, tathā jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena. Tattha ‘‘anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamo’’ti samāpattivipassanānaṃ arativinodanāvijjāpadālanādīni upāyo, uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhā nivaraṇesupi saṅgahadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samāpattivihārappavesavibandhanena nīvaraṇāni kavāṭasadisānīti āha ^b^‘‘nīvaraṇakavāṭaṃ ugghāṭetvā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Rattiṃ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojetī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.251) vuttaṭṭhāne vitakkavicārā dhūmāyanāti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘vitakkavicāradhūma’’^eb^nti. Kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānupacāreyeva dukkhaṃ, catutthajjhānupacāre ca sukhaṃ pahīyati, atisayappahānaṃ pana sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘catutthajjhānena sukhadukkhaṃ pahāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Aniccassa, aniccanti ca anupassanā ^b^aniccānupassanā,^eb^ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^Niccasañña^eb^nti saṅkhatadhammesu ‘‘niccā sassatā’’ti evaṃpavattamicchāsaññaṃ. Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi ^a^M1.0103^ea^ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^Nibbidānupassanāyā^eb^ti saṅkhāresu nibbijjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya. ^b^Nandi^eb^nti sappītikataṇhaṃ. ^b^Virāgānupassanāyā^eb^ti saṅkhāresu virajjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya. ^b^Nirodhānupassanāyā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0092^ea^ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya. Yathā vā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti, evaṃ anupassanā ^b^nirodhānupassanā^eb^. Tenevāha ‘‘nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti, no samudetī’’ti. Muccitukamyatā hi ayaṃ balappattāti. Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā ^b^paṭinissaggānupassanā,^eb^ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ. ^b^Ādāna^eb^nti niccādivasena gahaṇaṃ. Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ ^b^ghanasaññā. Āyūhanaṃ^eb^ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Avatthāvisesāpatti ^b^vipariṇāmo. Dhuvasañña^eb^nti thirabhāvaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Nimitta^eb^nti samūhādighanavasena sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Paṇidhi^eb^nti rāgādipaṇidhiṃ. Sā panatthato taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnatā. ^b^Abhinivesa^eb^nti attānudiṭṭhiṃ.

[03]Aniccadukkhādivasena sabbadhammatīraṇaṃ ^b^adhipaññādhammavipassanā^eb^. ^b^Sārādānābhinivesa^eb^nti asāresu sāraggahaṇavipallāsaṃ. Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppannoti abhiniveso ^b^sammohābhiniveso^eb^. Keci pana ‘‘ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānantiādinā (ma. ni. 1.18; saṃ. ni. 2.20) pavattasaṃsayāpatti ^b^sammohābhiniveso’’^eb^ti vadanti. Saṅkhāresu leṇatāṇabhāvaggahaṇaṃ ^b^ālayābhiniveso^eb^. ‘‘Ālayaratā ālayasammuditā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.64, 67; ma. ni. 1.281; 2.337; saṃ. ni. 1.172; mahāva. 7, 8) vacanato ālayo taṇhā, sāyeva cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu ca abhinivisanavasena pavattiyā ^b^ālayābhiniveso^eb^ti keci. ‘‘Evaṃvidhā saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī’’ti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭisaṅkhānupassanā^eb^. Vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṃ, ^b^nibbānaṃ,^eb^ tattha ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena anupassanena pavattiyā ^b^vivaṭṭānupassanā,^eb^ gotrabhū. ^b^Saṃyogābhinivesa^eb^nti saṃyujjanavasena saṅkhāresu nivisanaṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhekaṭṭhe^eb^ti diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca. ^b^Oḷārike^eb^ti uparimaggavajjhakilese apekkhitvā vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanena pahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi oḷārikāti. ^b^Aṇusahagate^eb^ti aṇubhūte. Idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe apekkhitvā ^a^M1.0104^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbakilese^eb^ti avasiṭṭhasabbakilese. Na hi paṭhamādimaggehi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyantīti.

[03]^b^Kakkhaḷattaṃ^eb^ kathinabhāvo. ^b^Paggharaṇaṃ^eb^ dravabhāvo. Lokiyavāyunā bhastassa viya yena vāyunā taṃtaṃkalāpassa uddhumāyanaṃ, thaddhabhāvo vā, taṃ ^b^vitthambhanaṃ^eb^. Vijjamānepi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ yo paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhova, aññathā bhūtānaṃ paricchedasabhāvo na siyā byāpībhāvāpattito, abyāpitāva ^a^V1.0093^ea^ asamphuṭṭhatāti yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ paricchedo, tehi asamphuṭṭhabhāvo ^b^asamphuṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Tenāha bhagavā ^b^ākāsadhātuniddese^eb^ (dha. sa. 637) ‘‘asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehī’’ti.

[03]Virodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppatti ^b^ruppanaṃ^eb^. Cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ cetanāvasenetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇa’’^eb^nti. Tathā hi ^b^suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha. 92) ‘‘cakkhusamphassajā cetanā’’tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā. Abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇā ca cetanā. Yathāha ‘‘tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro? Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā’’tiādi. ^b^Pharaṇaṃ^eb^ savipphārikatā. ^b^Assaddhiye^eb^ti asaddhiyahetu. Nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Esa nayo ^b^kosajje^eb^tiādīsu. ^b^Upasamalakkhaṇa^eb^nti kāyacittapariḷāhūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ. Līnuddhaccarahite adhicitte pavattamāne paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭatāya ajjhupekkhanaṃ ^b^paṭisaṅkhānaṃ^eb^ pakkhapātupacchedato.

[03]Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā sammāvācā siniddhabhāvato sampayuttadhamme sammāvācāpaccayasubhāsitānaṃ sotārañca puggalaṃ pariggaṇhātīti tassā ^b^pariggāhalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ. Kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammanta saṅkhātāya viratiyā ^b^samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ ^b^samuṭṭhāpanaṃ^eb^ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya. Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā jīvitindriyappavattiyā, ājīvasseva vā suddhi ^b^vodānaṃ^eb^. Sasampayuttadhammassa cittassa saṃkilesapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sammadeva paggaṇhanaṃ ^b^paggaho^eb^.

[03]‘‘Saṅkhārā’’ti ^a^M1.0105^ea^ idha cetanā adhippetāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Namanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvo. ^b^Āyatanaṃ^eb^ pavattanaṃ. Āyatanānaṃ vasena hi āyasaṅkhātānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ pavatti. ^b^Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇa^eb^nti vaṭṭassa janakahetubhāvo, maggassa pana nibbānasampāpakattanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
[03]^b^Tathalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ aviparītasabhāvo. ^b^Ekaraso^eb^ aññamaññānativattanaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvo. ^b^Yuganaddhā^eb^ samathavipassanāva. Saddhāpaññā paggahāvikkhepātipi vadanti.

[03]Khīṇoti ^a^V1.0094^ea^ kilese khepatīti ^b^khayo,^eb^ maggo. Anuppādapariyosānatāya ^b^anuppādo,^eb^ phalaṃ. ^b^Passaddhi^eb^ kilesavūpasamo. ^b^Chandassā^eb^ti kattukāmatāchandassa. ^b^Mūlalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ patiṭṭhābhāvo. Samuṭṭhānabhāvo ^b^samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇapaṭipādakatāya sampayuttadhammānaṃ uppattihetutā. ^b^Samodhānaṃ^eb^ visayādisannipātena gahetabbākāro, yā saṅgatīti vuccati. Samaṃ saha odahanti anena sampayuttadhammāti vā ^b^samodhānaṃ,^eb^ phasso. Samosaranti sannipatanti etthāti ^b^samosaraṇaṃ^eb^. Vedanāya vinā appavattamānā sampayuttadhammā vedanānubhavananimittaṃ samosaṭā viya hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Gopānasīnaṃ kūṭaṃ viya sampayuttānaṃ pāmokkhabhāvo ^b^pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Tato, tesaṃ vā sampayuttadhammānaṃ uttari padhānanti ^b^tatuttari,^eb^ paññuttarā hi kusalā dhammā. ^b^Vimuttiyā^eb^ti phalassa. Tañhi sīlādiguṇasārassa paramukkaṃsabhāvena ^b^sāraṃ^eb^. Ayañca lakkhaṇavibhāgo chadhātupañcajhānaṅgādivasena taṃtaṃsuttapadānusārena porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena ca katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi pubbe vuttopi koci dhammo pariyāyantarapakāsanatthaṃ puna dassito. Tato eva ca ‘‘chandamūlakā kusalā dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā vedanāsamosaraṇā’’ti, ‘‘paññuttarā kusalā dhammā’’ti, ‘‘vimuttisāramidaṃ brahmacariya’’nti, ‘‘nibbānogadhañhi āvuso brahmacariyaṃ nibbānapariyosāna’’nti (ma. ni. 1.466) ca suttapadānaṃ vasena ^b^‘‘chandassa mūlalakkhaṇa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Tathadhammā nāma cattāri ariyasaccāni^eb^ aviparītasabhāvattā. ^b^Tathāni^eb^ taṃsabhāvattā. ^b^Avitathāni^eb^ amusāsabhāvattā. ^b^Anaññathāni^eb^ aññākārarahitattā. ^b^Jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho^eb^ti jātipaccayā sambhūtaṃ ^a^M1.0106^ea^ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ āgatabhāvo, anupavattanaṭṭhoti attho. Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca ^b^sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho,^eb^ na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotīti ^b^jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho^eb^. Itthañca jātito samudāgacchatīti ^b^jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭho,^eb^ yā yā jāti yathā yathā paccayo hoti, tadanurūpaṃ pātubhāvoti attho. ^b^Avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho^eb^ti etthāpi na avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo na hoti, na ca avijjaṃ vinā saṅkhārā uppajjanti, yā yā avijjā yesaṃ yesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ yathā yathā paccayo hoti, ayaṃ avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho paccayabhāvoti attho.

[03]Bhagavā taṃ sabbākārato jānāti passatīti sambandho. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti bhagavatā. Taṃ vibhajjamānanti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti rupāyatanaṃ. ^b^Iṭṭhāniṭṭhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena majjhattaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, tathā atītānāgatapaccuppannaparittājjhattabahiddhātadubhayādibhedaṃ. ^b^Labbhamānakapadavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpāyatanaṃ ^a^V1.0095^ea^ diṭṭhaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ sutaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ mutaṃ, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ manasā viññāta’’nti (dha. sa. 966) vacanato diṭṭhapadañca viññātapadañca rūpārammaṇe labbhati, rūpārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ majjhattaṃ parittaṃ atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā diṭṭhaṃ viññātaṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītakanti evamādīhi ^b^anekehi nāmehi^eb^.

[03]^b^Terasahi vārehī^eb^ti rūpakaṇḍe (dha. sa. 616) āgate terasa niddesavāre sandhāyāha. Ekekasmiñca vāre catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vavatthāpananayānaṃ vasena ^b^‘‘dvepaññāsāya nayehī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tathameva^eb^ aviparītadassitāya appaṭivattiyadesanatāya ca. ^b^‘‘Jānāmi abhiññāsi’’^eb^nti vattamānātītakālesu ñāṇappavattidassanena anāgatepi ñāṇappavatti vuttāyevāti daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Vidita^eb^-saddo anāmaṭṭhakālaviseso veditabbo ‘‘diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta’’ntiādīsu (dha. sa. 966) viya. ^b^Na upaṭṭhāsī^eb^ti attattaniyavasena na upagacchi. Yathā rūpārammaṇādayo dhammā yaṃsabhāvā yaṃpakārā ca, tathā ne passati jānāti gacchatīti ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti evaṃ padasambhavo veditabbo. Keci pana ‘‘niruttinayena pisodarādipakkhepena (pāṇini 6.3.109) vā dassi-saddassa lopaṃ, āgata-saddassa cāgamaṃ katvā ^b^tathāgato’’^eb^ti vaṇṇenti.

[03]Niddosatāya ^a^M1.0107^ea^^b^anupavajjaṃ^eb^. Pakkhipitabbābhāvena ^b^anūnaṃ^eb^. Apanetabbābhāvena ^b^anadhikaṃ^eb^. Atthabyañjanādisampattiyā ^b^sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ^eb^. ^b^No aññathā^eb^ti ‘‘tathevā’’ti vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekena sampādeti. Tena yadatthaṃ bhāsitaṃ, ekantena tadatthanipphādanato yathā bhāsitaṃ bhagavatā, tathevāti aviparītadesanataṃ dasseti. ^b^Gadāttho^eb^ti etena tathaṃ gadatīti ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti da-kārassa ta-kāro kato niruttinayenāti dasseti.

[03]Tathā gatamassāti ^b^tathāgato. Gata^eb^nti ca kāyavācāpavattīti attho. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti ca vutte yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ abyabhicārisambandhitāya yathāti ayamattho upaṭṭhitoyeva hoti, kāyavacīkiriyānañca aññamaññānulomena vacanicchāyaṃ kāyassa vācā, vācāya ca kāyo sambandhībhāvena upatiṭṭhatīti imamatthaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘bhagavato hī’’^eb^tiādi. Imasmiṃ pana atthe tathāvādītāya ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti ayampi attho siddho hoti. So pana pubbe pakārantarena dassitoti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsū^eb^ti etena yadeke ‘‘tiriyaṃ viya upari adho ca santi lokadhātuyo’’ti ^a^V1.0096^ea^ vadanti, taṃ paṭisedheti. Desanāvilāsoyeva ^b^desanāvilāsamayo^eb^ yathā ‘‘puññamayaṃ, dānamaya’’ntiādīsu.
[03]Nipātānaṃ vācakasaddasannidhāne tadatthajotanabhāvena pavattanato gata-saddoyeva avagatatthaṃ atītatthañca vadatīti āha ^b^‘‘gatoti avagato atīto’’^eb^ti.

[03]Atha vā abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva sammāsambodhi, etthantare mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiyā hānaṭṭhānasaṃkilesanivattīnaṃ abhāvato yathā paṇidhānaṃ, tathā gato abhinīhārānurūpaṃ paṭipannoti ^b^tathāgato^eb^. Atha vā mahiddhikatāya paṭisambhidānaṃ ukkaṃsādhigamena anāvaraṇañāṇatāya ca katthacipi paṭighātābhāvato yathā ruci, tathā kāyavacīcittānaṃ gatāni gamanāni pavattiyo etassāti ^b^tathāgato^eb^. Yasmā ca loke vidha-yutta-gata-ppakāra-saddā samānatthā dissanti. Tasmā yathāvidhā vipassīādayo bhagavanto, ayampi bhagavā tathāvidhoti ^b^tathāgato^eb^^a^M1.0108^ea^, yathāyuttā ca te bhagavanto, ayampi bhagavā tathāyuttoti ^b^tathāgato^eb^. Atha vā yasmā saccaṃ tacchaṃ tathanti ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā tathena ñāṇena āgatoti ^b^tathāgato^eb^. Evampi tathāgata-saddassa attho veditabbo.
[21]Pahāya kāmādimale yathā gatā,
[27]Samādhiñāṇehi vipassiādayo;
[26]Mahesino sakyamunī jutindharo,
[22]Tathā gato tena mato tathāgato.
[21]Tathañca dhātāyatanādilakkhaṇaṃ,
[27]Sabhāvasāmaññavibhāgabhedato;
[26]Sayambhuñāṇena jino samāgato,
[22]Tathāgato vuccati sakyapuṅgavo.
[21]Tathāni saccāni samantacakkhunā,
[27]Tathā idappaccayatā ca sabbaso;
[26]Anaññaneyyena yato vibhāvitā,
[22]Yāthāvato tena jino tathāgato.
[21]Anekabhedāsupi ^a^V1.0097^ea^ lokadhātusu,
[27]Jinassa rūpāyatanādigocare;
[26]Vicitrabhedaṃ tathameva dassanaṃ,
[22]Tathāgato tena samantalocano.
[21]Yato ca dhammaṃ tathameva bhāsati,
[27]Karoti vācāyanulomamattano;
[26]Guṇehi lokaṃ abhibhuyyirīyati,
[22]Tathāgato tenapi lokanāyako.
[21]Yathābhinīhāramato yathāruci,
[27]Pavattavācā tanucittabhāvato;
[26]Yathāvidhā yena purā mahesino,
[22]Tathāvidho tena jino tathāgatoti. (itivu. aṭṭha. 38; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.7 cūḷasīlavaṇṇanā);

[03]^b^Ārakattā^eb^tiādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0109^ea^ padānaṃ attho ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.125) buddhānussatisaṃvaṇṇanāya vuttanayeneva veditabbo. ^b^Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā^eb^ti imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa adhigamo dassito.

[03]Nanu ca (itivu. aṭṭha. 38) sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, aññathā cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni buddhañāṇānīti vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti? Na virujjhati visayappavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇañāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti vuttaṃ. Yathāha ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 1.119) ‘‘sabbaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatamanavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tatthāvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa’’ntiādi, tasmā natthi nesaṃ atthato bhedo, ekantena cetaṃ evamicchitabbaṃ, aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sāvaraṇatā asabbadhammārammaṇatā ca āpajjeyya. Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumatampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve ^a^V1.0098^ea^ yattha taṃ nappavattati, tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva na siyā. Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ, tassa cādhigamena bhagavā sabbaññū sabbavidū sammāsambuddhoti ca vuccati, na sakimeva sabbadhammāvabodhato. Tathā ca vuttaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 1.162) ‘‘vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho’’ti. Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.

[03]Etthāha – kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, udāhu kamenāti. Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatapaccuppannājjhattabahiddhādibhedena bhinnānaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ ^a^M1.0110^ea^ asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ avekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā ca sati ‘‘sabbe dhammā anattā’’ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbe dhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati. Yepi ‘‘sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tena te sabbavidūti vuccanti. Evañca katvā ‘caraṃ samāhito nāgo, tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī’’ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosānativatti. Ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya hi atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṃ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā, tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.

[03]Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattati, evampi na yujjati. Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne neyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa. Ye pana ‘‘atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā, tañca ñāṇaṃ ananumānikaṃ saṃsayābhāvato. Saṃsayānubandhañhi loke anumānañāṇa’’nti vadanti, tesampi taṃ na yuttaṃ. Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthassa avisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato. Yañhi taṃ sesaṃ, taṃ appaccakkhanti. Atha tampi paccakkhaṃ, tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti? Sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? Avisayavicāraṇabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ^a^V1.0099^ea^ ‘‘buddhavisayo bhikkhave, acinteyyo na cintetabbo, yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā’’ti (a. ni. 4.77). Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ – yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalamekadeso vā, tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati, niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato, ñātuṃ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā, ekanteneva ca sā icchitabbā ‘‘sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanapaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhapaṭibaddhā manasikārapaṭibaddhā cittuppādapaṭibaddhā’’ti (mahāni. 69, 156; cūḷani. 85; paṭi. ma. 3.5) vacanato. Atītānāgatavisayampi bhagavato ñāṇaṃ anumānāgamatakkagahaṇavirahitattā paccakkhameva.

[03]Nanu ^a^M1.0111^ea^ ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānativattiyevāti? Na, tassa visodhitattā. Visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā, tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṃ, anantañca ñāṇaṃ ñeyyaṃ viya. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyya’’nti (mahāni. 69, 156; cūḷani. 85; paṭi. ma. 3.5). Evamekajjhaṃ, visuṃ sakiṃ, kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ pathavīādibhedaṃ. ^b^Pariññāta^eb^nti parito samantato sabbākārato ñātaṃ, taṃ parijānitabbabhāvaṃ kiñci asesetvā ñātanti attho. Ayameva hi attho ‘‘pariññātanta’’nti imināpi padena pakāsitoti dassento ^b^‘‘pariññātantaṃ nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tena tena maggena kilesappahānena viseso natthī^eb^ti idaṃ taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesānaṃ buddhānaṃ sāvakānañca tena tena maggeneva pahātabbabhāvasāmaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sāvakehi buddhānaṃ kilesappahānavisesābhāvato. Tathā hi sammāsambuddhā eva savāsanakilese jahanti, na sāvakā. ^b^Ekadesamevā^eb^ti attano santānagatameva. Sasantatipariyāpannadhammapariññāmattenapi hi catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanā samijjhati. Tenevāha – ‘‘imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca paññapemī’’tiādi (saṃ. ni. 1.107; a. ni. 4.45). ^b^Aṇuppamāṇampi^eb^^a^V1.0100^ea^^b^…pe… natthi,^eb^ yato chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena buddhānaṃ mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pavattatīti vadanti.
[06]Tathāgatavārasattamanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimataṇhā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0112^ea^ purimataresu bhavesu nibbattā paccuppannattabhāvahetubhūtā taṇhā. Taggahaṇeneva ca atītaddhasaṅgahā avijjāsaṅkhārā saddhiṃ upādānena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘bhavā jātī’’ti etasmiṃ pade. ^b^Tena upapattibhavenā^eb^ti ‘‘bhavā jātī’’ti jātisīsena vuttaupapattibhavena. ^b^Bhūtassā^eb^ti nibbattassa. So pana yasmā satto nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sattassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evañca jānitvā^eb^ti iminā ^b^‘‘bhūtassa jarāmaraṇa’’^eb^nti etthāpi ‘‘iti viditvā’’ti idaṃ padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbanti dasseti.

[03]Yadipi tebhūmakā upādānakkhandhā ‘‘yaṃ kiñci rūpa’’ntiādinā (vibha. 2; ma. ni. 1.244) ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitabbā sammasitabbā ca, te pana yasmā bhagavatā ‘‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇa’’ntiādinā (dī. ni. 2.57; saṃ. ni. 2.4, 10) paṭiccasamuppādamukhena sammasitā, paṭiccasamuppādo ca pavattipavattihetubhāvato purimasaccadvayameva hoti, tasmā tadabhisamayaṃ ‘‘maññanābhāvahetu paccayākārapaṭivedho’’ti vibhāvento ^b^‘‘yaṃ bodhirukkhamūle…pe… dassento’’^eb^ti āha. Saṃkhippanti ettha avijjādayo viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepā, atīte hetuādayo ‘‘hetu, phala’’nti evaṃ saṃkhippantīti vā saṅkhepā, avijjādayo viññāṇādayo ca. Saṅkhepa-saddo bhāgādhivacananti daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘koṭṭhāsāti attho’’^eb^ti. Te pana atīte hetusaṅkhepo, etarahi phalasaṅkhepo, etarahi hetusaṅkhepo, āyatiṃ phalasaṅkhepoti cattāro saṅkhepā etassāti catusaṅkhepo, taṃ ^b^catusaṅkhepaṃ^eb^. Hetuphalasandhi, phalahetusandhi, puna hetuphalasandhīti evaṃ tayo sandhī etassāti tisandhi, taṃ ^b^tisandhiṃ^eb^. Atītapaccuppannānāgatabhedā tayo addhā etassāti tiyaddho, taṃ ^b^tiyaddhaṃ^eb^. Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅkhepe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ^b^ākārā,^eb^ atītahetuādīnaṃ vā pakārā ākārā, te ekekasaṅkhepe pañca pañca katvā vīsati ākārā etassāti vīsatākāro, taṃ ^b^vīsatākāraṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Esa^eb^^a^V1.0101^ea^^a^M1.0113^ea^^b^sabbo^eb^ti esa catusaṅkhepādipabhedo anavaseso paccayo. ^b^Paccayalakkhaṇenā^eb^ti paccayabhāvena attano phalassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayabhāvena, avinābhāvalakkhaṇenāti attho. Yathā hi taṇhaṃ vinā avijjādayo viññāṇassa paccayā na honti, evaṃ taṇhāpi avijjādike vināti. Ettha dukkhaggahaṇena viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṃ, bhavaggahaṇena ca taṇhāsaṅkhārupādānānaṃ gahitatā vuttanayā evāti na uddhaṭā.

[03]Idāni te vīsati ākāre paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyā vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘evamete’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha (paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.47) ^b^purimakammabhavasmi^eb^nti purime kammabhave, atītajātiyaṃ kammabhave kayiramāneti attho. ^b^Moho avijjā^eb^ti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho, yena mūḷho kammaṃ karoti, sā avijjā. ^b^Āyūhanā saṅkhārā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ kammaṃ karonto dānupakaraṇādi sajjanādivasena yā purimacetanāyo, te saṅkhārā. Paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe deyyadhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavo. Ekāvajjanajavanesu vā purimā cetanā āyūhanā saṅkhārā, sattamā bhavo. Yā kāci vā pana cetanā bhavo, sampayuttā āyūhanā saṅkhārā. ^b^Nikanti taṇhā^eb^ti yaṃ kammaṃ karontassa upapattibhave tassa phalassa nikāmanā patthanā, sā taṇhā nāma. ^b^Upagamanaṃ upādāna^eb^nti yaṃ kammabhavassa paccayabhūtaṃ ‘‘idaṃ kammaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi ucchijjissāmī’’tiādinā nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ, idaṃ upādānaṃ nāma. ^b^Cetanā bhavo^eb^ti dvīsu atthavikappesu vuttassa āyūhanassa avasāne vuttacetanā, tatiye pana āyūhanasampayuttacetanā bhavo. ^b^Iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā^eb^ti ime yathāvuttā mohādayo pañca dhammā atītakammabhavasiddhā etarahi paṭisandhiyā paccayabhūtāti attho.

[03]^b^Idha paṭisandhiviññāṇa^eb^nti yaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena uppannattā paṭisandhīti vuccati, taṃ viññāṇaṃ. ^b^Okkanti nāmarūpa^eb^nti yā gabbhe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ okkanti āgantvā pavisantī viya, idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. ^b^Pasādo āyatana^eb^nti idaṃ cakkhādipañcāyatanavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Phuṭṭho phasso^eb^ti yo ārammaṇaṃ phuṭṭho phusanto uppanno, ayaṃ phasso. ^b^Vedayitaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0114^ea^^b^vedanā^eb^ti yaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇena vā saḷāyatanapaccayena vā phassena sahuppannaṃ vipākavedayitaṃ, sā vedanā. ^b^Iti ime…pe… paccayā^eb^ti ime viññāṇādayo pañca koṭṭhāsikā dhammā purimabhave katassa kammassa kammavaṭṭassa paccayā, paccayabhāvato taṃ paṭicca idha etarahi upapattibhavasmiṃ upapattibhavabhāvena vā hontīti attho.

[03]^b^Idha^eb^^a^V1.0102^ea^^b^paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho^eb^ti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle asammohaṃ dasseti. Daharassa hi cittappavatti bhavaṅgabahulā yebhuyyena bhavantarajanakakammāyūhanasamatthā na hotīti. ^b^Kammakaraṇakāle^eb^ti ca iminā sabbo kammassa paccayabhūto sammoho gahito, na sampayuttova. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^Padayojanāyā^eb^ti ‘‘tasmā’’tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ sambandhena saha. ^b^Atthanigamana^eb^nti imasmiṃ aṭṭhamavāre desanatthanigamanaṃ. ^b^Nandīti evaṃ vuttānaṃ sabbataṇhāna^eb^nti ‘‘nandī dukkhassa mūla’’nti evaṃ nandanatthasāmaññato ekavacanena vuttānaṃ sabbataṇhānaṃ santānārammaṇasampayuttadhammappavattiākārādibhedena anekabhedānaṃ sabbāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ. ^b^Khayavevacanānevā^eb^ti samucchedapahānavevacanāneva. ‘‘Accantakkhayā’’ti hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Catumaggakiccasādhāraṇameta^eb^nti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ pahānakiccassa sādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññato gahaṇaṃ etaṃ khayādivacananti attho. Tesaṃ pana maggānaṃ kamena pavattanaṃ kiccakameneva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘virāgā’’^eb^tiādi vuttanti dassento ^b^‘‘tato^eb^…pe… ^b^yojetabba’’^eb^nti āha. Tathā satipi khayādisaddānaṃ pahānapariyāyabhāve pahātabbāya pana visayabhedabhinnāya taṇhāya anavasesato pahīnabhāvadīpanatthaṃ khayādipariyāyantaraggahaṇaṃ katanti dassento ^b^‘‘yāhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yathāvuttasañjananādihetubhūtāya taṇhāya pahīnattā tappahānadīpanaṃ katvā vuccamānaṃ khayādivacanaṃ na kathañci dhammataṃ vilometīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na kiñci virujjhatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Uttaravirahita^eb^nti attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthattā uttarena adhikena virahitaṃ. Ayañcassa uttaravirahatā attano seṭṭhabhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaseṭṭha’’^eb^nti. Yathā sammā-saṃ-saddā ‘‘aviparītaṃ, sāma’’nti imesaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ vadanti, evaṃ pāsaṃsasobhanatthepīti āha ^b^‘‘sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi’’^eb^nti. Bujjhi ettha paṭivijjhi cattāri ariyasaccāni, sabbampi vā neyyanti rukkho ^b^bodhi,^eb^ bujjhati etenāti pana maggo ^b^bodhi,^eb^ tathā ^a^M1.0115^ea^ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, nibbānaṃ pana bujjhitabbato ^b^bodhī^eb^ti ayamettha sādhanavibhāgo daṭṭhabbo. Paṇṇattiyampi attheva bodhi-saddo ‘‘bodhirājakumāro’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.324; cūḷava. 268). ^b^Apare^eb^ti sārasamāsācariyā. Ettha ca saupasaggassa bodhi-saddassa atthuddhāre anupasaggānaṃ udāharaṇe kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03]Lokuttarabhāvato vā tatthāpi heṭṭhimamaggānaṃ viya tatuttarimaggābhāvato ca ‘‘siyā nu kho anuttarā bodhī’’ti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāya taṃ vidhamituṃ ^b^‘‘sāvakāna’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā phalavisesabhūtehi ñāṇavisesehi ekaccehi sakalehi saddhiṃ samijjhamāno ^a^V1.0103^ea^ maggo ariyānaṃ taṃ taṃ ñāṇavisesādiṃ dento viya hotīti tassa asabbaguṇadāyakattaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena anaññasādhāraṇābhinīhārasampadāsiddhassa niratisaya-guṇānubandhassa vasena arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi nāma hotīti dasseti. Sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ aññehi sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ mahāsāvakānaṃyeva āveṇikaṃ ñāṇaṃ. ^b^Paccekaṃ saccāni buddhavantoti paccekabuddhā^eb^. Nanu ca sabbepi ariyā paccekameva saccāni paṭivijjhanti dhammassa paccattaṃ vedanīyabhāvatoti? Saccaṃ, nayidamīdisaṃ paṭivedhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yathā pana sāvakā aññasannissayena saccāni paṭivijjhanti paratoghosena vinā tesaṃ dassanamaggassa anuppajjanato, yathā ca sammāsambuddho aññesaṃ nissayabhāvena saccāni abhisambujjhanti, na evamete, ete pana aparaneyyā hutvā apariṇāyakabhāvena saccāni paṭivijjhanti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paccekaṃ saccāni buddhavantoti paccekabuddhā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Itīti karīyati uccārīyatīti ^b^itikāro,^eb^ iti-saddo. ^b^Kāraṇattho^eb^ aniyamarūpenāti adhippāyo, tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yasmā cā’’^eb^ti. Pubbe pana iti-saddaṃ pakāratthaṃ katvā ‘‘evaṃ jānitvā’’ti vuttaṃ, idhāpi taṃ pakāratthameva katvā atho yujjati. Kathaṃ? ^b^Viditvā^eb^ti hi padaṃ hetuatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ ‘‘paññāya cassa disvā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.271), ‘‘ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hotī’’ti ca evamādīsu viya, tasmā pakāratthepi iti-sadde paṭiccasamuppādassa viditattāti ayaṃ attho labbhateva. ^b^Paṭiccasamuppādaṃ viditvā^eb^ti etthāpi hetuatthe viditvā-sadde yathāvuttā atthayojanā yujjateva. Ettha ca paṭhamavikappe paṭiccasamupādassa viditatthaṃ maññanābhāvassa kāraṇaṃ ^a^M1.0116^ea^ vatvā taṇhāmūlakassa paṭiccasamuppādassa dassitattā ettha taṇhāppahānaṃ sammāsambodhiyā adhigamanakāraṇaṃ uddhatanti dassitaṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘pathaviṃ na maññatī’’^eb^tiādi nigamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dutiyavikappe pana paṭiccasamuppādavedanaṃ taṇhāppahānassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ abhisambodhiyā abhisambodhimaññanābhāvassāti ayamattho dassitoti ayametesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthavikappānaṃ viseso, tasmā ‘‘nandī dukkhassa mūla’’nti vuttaṃ.
[03]Taṃ kuto labbhatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yattha yattha hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sāsanayutti^eb^ ayaṃ sāsanepi evaṃ sambandho dissatīti katvā. Lokepi hi yaṃ-taṃ-saddānaṃ abyabhicārisambandhatā siddhā.
[03]^b^Evaṃ abhisambuddhoti vadāmī^eb^ti abhisambuddhabhāvassa gahitattā, asabbaññunā evaṃ desetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca ^b^‘‘sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dassento’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Vicitranayadesanāvilāsayutta^eb^nti ^a^V1.0104^ea^ puthujjanavārādivibhāgabhinnehi vicittehi tanti nayehi, lakkhaṇakammataṇhāmaññanādivibhāgabhinnehi vicittehi atthanayehi, abhinandanapaccayākārādivisesāpadesasiddhena desanāvilāsena ca yuttaṃ. ^b^Yathā te na jānanti, tathā desesī^eb^ti imināpi bhagavato desanāvilāsaṃyeva vibhāveti. ^b^Taṃyeva kira pathavi^eb^nti ettha pathavīgahaṇaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ āpādivasenapi, tathā ‘‘kīdisā nu kho idha pathavī adhippetā, kasmā ca bhūtarūpāniyeva gahitāni, na sesarūpānī’’tiādināpi tesaṃ saṃsayuppatti niddhāretabbā. Atha vā ^b^kathaṃ nāmida^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo pakārattho. Tena imasmiṃ sutte sabbāyapi tesaṃ saṃsayuppattiyā pariggahitattā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Anta^eb^nti mariyādaṃ, desanāya antaṃ paricchedanti attho, yo anusandhīti vuccati. ^b^Koṭi^eb^nti pariyantaṃ, desanāya pariyosānanti attho. Ubhayena sutte ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhīti vadati.

[03]^b^Antarākathā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārauddesaparipucchādīnaṃ antarā aññā ekā tathā. ^b^Vippakathā^eb^ti aniṭṭhitā sikhaṃ appattā. ^b^Kaṅkhaṇānurūpenā^eb^ti tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena. ^b^Ida^eb^nti idāni vuccamānaṃ mūlapariyāyajātakaṃ.

[03]^b^Disāpāmokkho^eb^ti ^a^M1.0117^ea^ paṇḍitabhāvena sabbadisāsu pamukhabhūto. ^b^Brāhmaṇo^eb^ti brahmaṃ aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ vedāna^eb^nti iruveda-yajuveda-sāmavedānaṃ. ^b^Pāragūti^eb^ atthaso byañjanaso ca pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gato. Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena cāti ^b^sanighaṇḍukeṭubhā,^eb^ tesaṃ. ^b^Nighaṇḍū^eb^ti rukkhādīnaṃ vevacanappakāsakaṃ satthaṃ. ^b^Keṭubha^eb^nti kiriyākappavikappo, kavīnaṃ upakārāvahaṃ satthaṃ. Saha akkharappabhedenāti ^b^sākkharappabhedā,^eb^ tesaṃ, sikkhāniruttisahitānanti attho. ^b^Itihāsapañcamāna^eb^nti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā ‘‘itiha asa, itiha asā’’ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā, tesaṃ. Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ kāyati ajjheti vedeti cāti ^b^padako,^eb^ veyyākaraṇo. ^b^Lokāyataṃ^eb^ vuccati vitaṇḍasatthaṃ. Mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpanagantho ^b^mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Tesu anūno paripūrakārīti ^b^anavayo^eb^.

[03]^b^Mante^eb^ti vede. Yadipi vedo ‘‘manto, brahmaṃ, kappo’’ti tividho, manto eva pana mūlavedo, tadatthavivaraṇaṃ brahmaṃ, tattha vuttanayena yaññakiriyāvidhānaṃ ^b^kappo^eb^. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘manteti vede’’ti. ^b^Paṇḍitā^eb^ti paññāvanto. Tathā hi te puthupaññātāya ^b^bahuṃ^eb^ sahassadvisahassādiparimāṇaṃ ganthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ^b^gaṇhanti^eb^ uggaṇhanti, javanapaññatāya ^b^lahuṃ^eb^ sīghaṃ ^b^gaṇhanti,^eb^ tikkhapaññatāya ^a^V1.0105^ea^^b^suṭṭhu^eb^ avirajjhantā ^b^upadhārenti,^eb^ satinepakkasampattiyā ^b^gahitañca nesaṃ na vinassati^eb^ na sammussatīti. ^b^Sabbampi sippa^eb^nti aṭṭhārasavijjāṭṭhānādibhedaṃ sikkhitabbaṭṭhena sippanti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ sabbaṃ bāhirakasatthaṃ mokkhāvahasammatampi na mokkhaṃ āvahatīti āha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammasamparāyahita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sampiṇḍitā hutvā^eb^ti yathā mittā, tathā piṇḍitavasena sannipatitā hutvā. ‘‘Evaṃ gayhamāne ādinā virujjheyya, evaṃ antenā’’ti cintentā ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa pubbenāparaṃ aviruddhaṃ nicchayaṃ gahetuṃ asakkontā ^b^na ādiṃ,^eb^ na antaṃ addasaṃsu.

[03]^b^Lomasānī^eb^ti lomavantāni, ghanakesamassuvānīti attho. Kesāpi hi lomaggahaṇena gayhanti yathā ‘‘lomanakhaṃ phusitvā suddhi kātabbā’’ti. Kaṇṇaṃ viyāti ^b^kaṇṇaṃ,^eb^ paññā, tāya sutvā kātabbakiccasādhanato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kaṇṇavāti paññavā’’^eb^ti.
[03]Yasmā ^a^M1.0118^ea^ sattānaṃ gacchante gacchante kāle āyuvaṇṇādiparikkhayo hoti, tasmā taṃ kālena kataṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nesaṃ āyu…pe… khādatīti vuccatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Abhiññāyā^eb^ti kusalādibhedaṃ khandhādibhedañca desetabbaṃ dhammaṃ, veneyyānañca āsayānusayacariyāvimuttiādibhedaṃ, tassa ca nesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ yāthāvato abhijānitvā. ^b^Dhammaṃ desemī^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikanibbānahitāvahaṃ saddhammaṃ kathayāmi. ^b^No^eb^^b^anabhiññāyā^eb^ti yathā bāhirakā asammāsambuddhattā vuttavidhiṃ ajānantāyaṃ kiñci takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ kathenti, evaṃ na desemīti attho. ^b^Sanidāna^eb^nti sakāraṇaṃ, veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vā pucchāya vā aṭṭhuppattiyā vā sanimittaṃ hetūdāharaṇasahitañcāti attho. ^b^Sappāṭihāriya^eb^nti sanissaraṇaṃ sappaṭiharaṇaṃ, paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena sappāṭihāriyameva katvā desemīti attho. Apare pana ‘‘yathārahaṃ iddhiādesanānusāsanipāṭihāriyasahita’’nti vadanti, anusāsanipāṭihāriyahitā pana desanā natthīti. Hitūpadesanā ^b^ovādo,^eb^ sā eva ^b^anusāsanī^eb^. Anotiṇṇavatthuvisayo vā ^b^ovādo,^eb^ otiṇṇavatthuvisayā ^b^anusāsanī^eb^. Paṭhamūpadeso vā ^b^ovādo,^eb^ itarā ^b^anusāsanī. Alañca panā^eb^ti yuttameva. ^b^Niṭṭhamagamāsī^eb^ti atthasiddhiṃ gatā.
[06]Tathāgatavārāṭṭhamanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Ayaṃ tāvettha aṭṭhakathāya līnatthavaṇṇanā.

[03]Idāni ^a^V1.0106^ea^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.149; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1ṇettinayavaṇṇanā; a. ni. ṭī. nettinayavaṇṇanā) pakaraṇanayena pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Sā panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yasmā desanāya samuṭṭhānapayojanabhājanesu piṇḍatthesu ca niddhāritesu sutarā hoti suviññeyyā ca, tasmā suttadesanāya samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamaṃ niddhārayissāma. Tattha ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ tāva pariyattiṃ nissāya mānuppādo, ^b^payojanaṃ^eb^mānamaddanaṃ. Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘sutapariyattiṃ…pe… ārabhī’’ti. Apica veneyyānaṃ pathavīādibhūtādibhedabhinne sakkāye puthujjanassa sekkhādiariyassa ca saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanavasena ^a^M1.0119^ea^ pavattivibhāgānavabodho ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ yathāvuttavibhāgāvabodho ^b^payojanaṃ,^eb^ veneyyānañhi vuttappakāre visaye yathāvuttānaṃ puggalānaṃ saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanavasena pavattivibhāgāvabodho ^b^payojanaṃ^eb^.

[03]Apica ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma desanānidānaṃ. Taṃ sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha sādhāraṇampi ajjhattikabāhirabhedato duvidhaṃ. Tattha ^b^sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma lokanāthassa mahākaruṇā. Tāya hi samussāhitassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘sattesu ca kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī’’tiādi (ma. ni. 1.283; saṃ. ni. 1.172; mahāva. 9). Ettha ca hetāvatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saṃsāramahoghato saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito. Yathā ca mahākaruṇā, evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dasabalañāṇādīni ca desanāya abbhantarasamuṭṭhānabhāve vattabbāni. Sabbampi hi ñeyyadhammaṃ, tesaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ, sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vicittanayadesanaṃ pavattesīti. ^b^Bāhiraṃ^eb^ pana ^b^sādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ dasasahassabrahmaparivāritassa sahampatimahābrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ. Tadajjhesanuttarakālañhi dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi. Asādhāraṇampi ambhantarabāhirabhedato duvidhameva. Tattha ^b^abbhantaraṃ^eb^ yāya mahākaruṇāya yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ, tadubhayaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Bāhiraṃ^eb^ pana pañcasatānaṃ brāhmaṇajātikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariyattiṃ nissāya mānuppādanaṃ, vuttameva taṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Payojanampi^eb^ sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha ^b^sādhāraṇaṃ^eb^ anukkamena yāva anupādāparinibbānaṃ ^a^V1.0107^ea^ vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya. Tenevāha ‘‘etadatthā tathā, etadatthā mantanā’’tiādi (pari. 366). Eteneva ca saṃsāracakkanivatti saddhammacakkappavatti sassatādimicchāvādanirākaraṇaṃ sammāvādapurekkhāro akusalamūlasamūhananaṃ kusalamūlasaṃropanaṃ apāyadvārapidahanaṃ saggamokkhadvāravivaraṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanaṃ anusayasamugghātanaṃ ^a^M1.0120^ea^ ‘‘mutto mocessāmī’’ti (udā. aṭṭha. 18; itivu. aṭṭha. 38) purimapaṭiññāavisaṃvādanaṃ tappaṭipakkhamāramanorathavisaṃvādanaṃ titthiyadhammanimmathanaṃ buddhadhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīnampi payojanānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Asādhāraṇaṃ^eb^ pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mānamaddanaṃ. Vuttañcetaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1) ‘‘desanākusalo bhagavā mānabhañjanatthaṃ ‘sabbadhammamūlapariyāya’nti desanaṃ ārabhī’’ti. Ubhayampetaṃ bāhiyameva. Sace pana veneyyasantānagatampi desanābalasiddhisaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanabhāvato yathādhippetatthasiddhiyā yathākāruṇikassa bhagavatopi payojanamevāti gaṇheyya, iminā pariyāyenassa abbhantaratāpi veditabbā.

[03]Apica veneyyānaṃ pathavīādibhūtādivibhāgabhinne sakkāye puthujjanassa sekkhādiariyassa ca saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanavasena pavattivibhāgānavabodho samuṭṭhānaṃ, imassa suttassa yathāvuttavibhāgāvabodho payojananti vuttovāyamattho. Veneyyānañhi vuttappakāre visaye yathāvuttānaṃ puggalānaṃ saddhiṃ hetunā maññanāmaññanānaṃ vasena pavattivibhāgāvabodho imaṃ desanaṃ payojeti ‘‘tannipphādanaparāyaṃ desanā’’ti katvā. Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ phalaṃ, taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desakaṃ desanāya payojetīti payojananti vuccati. Tathā veneyyānaṃ sabbaso ekadesato ca maññanānaṃ appahānaṃ, tattha ca ādīnavādassanaṃ, niraṅkusānaṃ maññanānaṃ anekākāravohārassa sakkāye pavattivisesassa ajānanaṃ, tattha ca pahīnamaññanānaṃ paṭipattiyā ajānanaṃ, taṇhāmukhena paccayākārassa ca anavabodhoti evamādīni ca payojanāni idha veditabbāni.

[03]Bhūmittayapariyāpannesu asaṅkhātadhammavippakatapariññādikiccasaṅkhātadhammānaṃ sammāsambuddhassa ca paṭipattiṃ ajānantā asaddhammassavanadhāraṇaparicayamanasikāraparā saddhammassavana-dhāraṇaparicayapaṭivedhavimukhā ca veneyyā imissā desanāya ^b^bhājanaṃ. Piṇḍatthā^eb^ pana ‘‘assutavā’’tiādinā ayonisomanasikārabahulīkāro akusalamūla-samāyogo olīyanātidhāvanāpariggaho upāyavinibaddhānubrūhanā micchābhinivesasamannāgamo avijjātaṇhā-parisuddhi ^a^M1.0121^ea^ vaṭṭattayānuparamo āsavoghayogaganthāgatitaṇhuppādupādānāviyogo cetokhila-cetovinibaddhābhinandana-nīvaraṇasaṅgānatikkamo ^a^V1.0108^ea^ vivādamūlāpariccāgo anusayānupacchedo micchattānativattanaṃ taṇhāmūladhammasannissayatā akusalakammapathānuyogo sabbakilesa-pariḷāhasāraddhakāyacittatāti evamādayo dīpitā honti. ‘‘Pathaviṃ pathavito sañjānātī’’tiādinā taṇhāvicaritaniddeso mānajappanā vipariyesābhiniveso saṃkileso sakkāyapariggaho bālalakkhaṇāpadeso vaṅkattayavibhāvanānuyogo bahukārapaṭipakkhadīpanā tividhanissayasaṃsūcanā āsavakkhayakathananti evamādayo dīpitā honti.
