Paṭivedho paṭighātābhāvena visaye nissaṅgacārasaṅkhātaṃ nibbijjhanaṃ. ^b^Abhisamayo^eb^ avirajjhitvā visayassa adhigamasaṅkhāto ^b^avabodho^eb^. ‘‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo’’ti paricchinditvā jānanameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^pariññāpaṭivedho^eb^. Ayaṃ yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavattiṃ gahetvā vutto, na pana maggañāṇassa ‘‘idaṃ dukkha’’ntiādināpi vattanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hissa tasmiṃ samaye’’^eb^tiādi. Pahīnassa puna appahātabbatāya pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ samucchindanaṃ pahānaṃ, pahānameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^pahānapaṭivedho^eb^. Ayampi yena kilesena appahīyamānena maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ, asati ca maggabhāvanāya yo uppajjeyya, tassa kilesassa padaghātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyā paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto. Sacchikiriyā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ, anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvā sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ idaṃ tanti yathāsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho^eb^. Ayaṃ pana yassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti, tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāvitameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto.

[03]Bhāvanā uppādanā vaḍḍhanā ca, tattha paṭhamamagge uppādanaṭṭhena, dutiyādīsu vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena, ubhayatthāpi vā ubhayathāpi veditabbaṃ. Paṭhamamaggopi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti tatthāpi vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā ^a^M1.0162^ea^ sakkā viññātuṃ. Dutiyādīsupi appahīnakilesappahānato puggalantarasādhanato uppādanaṭṭhena bhāvanā, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^bhāvanā paṭivedho^eb^. Ayampi hi yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede ^a^V1.0145^ea^ sammoho na hoti, tathā pavattimeva gahetvā vutto, tiṭṭhatu tāva yathādhigatamaggadhammaṃ yathāpavattesu phaladhammesupi ayaṃ yathādhigatasaccadhammesu viya vigatasammohova hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo’’ti (dī. ni. 1.299, 356; mahāva. 27, 57). Yato cassa dhammatāsañcoditā yathādhigatasaccadhammāvalambiniyo maggavīthito parato maggaphalapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesanibbānānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā pavattanti. Dukkhasaccadhammā hi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo. Ayañca atthavaṇṇanā ‘‘pariññābhisamayenā’’tiādīsupi vibhāvetabbā. ^b^Ekābhisamayena abhisametī^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘no ca kho aññamaññena ñāṇenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Vitaṇḍavādī panāha ‘‘ariyamaggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakaraṇaṃ, na ekābhisamayavasena. Tañhi kālena dukkhaṃ pajānāti, kālena samudayaṃ pajahati, kālena nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, kālena maggaṃ bhāveti, aññathā ekassa ñāṇassa ekasmiṃ khaṇe catukiccakaraṇaṃ na yujjati. Na hidaṃ katthaci diṭṭhampi suttaṃ atthī’’ti. So vattabbo – yadi ariyamaggañāṇaṃ nānābhisamayavasena saccāni abhisameti, na ekābhisamayavasena, evaṃ sante paccekampi saccesu nānakkhaṇeneva pavatteyya, na ekakkhaṇena, tathā sati dukkhādīnaṃ ekadesekadesameva parijānāti pajahatīti āpajjatīti nānābhisamaye paṭhamamaggādīhi pahātabbānaṃ saññojanattayādīnaṃ ekadesekadesappahānaṃ siyāti ekadesasotāpattimaggaṭṭhāditā, tato eva ekadesasotāpannāditā ca āpajjati anantaraphalattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ. Na hi kālabhedena vinā so eva sotāpanno ca asotāpanno cāti sakkā viññātuṃ.

[03]Apicāyaṃ nānābhisamayavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo ‘‘maggañāṇaṃ saccāni paṭivijjhantaṃ kiṃ ārammaṇato paṭivijjhati, udāhu kiccato’’ti? Jānamāno ‘‘kiccato’’ti vadeyya, ‘‘kiccato paṭivijjhantassa kiṃ nānābhisamayenā’’ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyānidassanena ^a^M1.0163^ea^ saññāpetabbo. Atha ‘‘ārammaṇato’’ti vadeyya, evaṃ sante tassa ñāṇassa vipassanāñāṇassa viya dukkhasamudayānaṃ accantapariññāsamucchedā na yuttā anissaṭattā. Tathā maggadassanaṃ. Na hi maggo sayameva attānaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti yuttaṃ, maggantaraparikappanāya pana anavaṭṭhānaṃ āpajjati, tasmā tīṇi saccāni kiccato, nirodhaṃ kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca paṭivijjhatīti evaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhantassa maggañāṇassa nattheva nānābhisamayo. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yo bhikkhave dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatī’’tiādi. Na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi ^a^V1.0146^ea^ …pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadampi so passatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1100) ekaccadassanasamaṅgino aññasaccadassanasamaṅgibhāvavicāraṇāyaṃ tadatthasādhanatthaṃ āyasmatā gavampatittherena ābhatattā, paccekañca saccattayadassanassa yojitattā, aññathā purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādidassanamayojaniyaṃ siyā. Na hi lokuttaramaggo lokiyamaggo viya katakārībhāvena pavattati samucchedakattā, tathā yojanena ca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo siyāti evaṃ āgamato yuttito ca nānābhisamayo na yujjatīti saññāpetabbo. Evaṃ ce saññattiṃ gacchati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce gacchati, ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ (kathā. 274) odhisokathāya saññāpetabboti.

[03]^b^Nirodhaṃ ārammaṇato^eb^ti nirodhameva ārammaṇatoti niyamo gahetabbo, na ārammaṇatovāti. Tena nirodhe kiccatopi paṭivedho siddho hoti. ^b^Tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti saccānaṃ abhisamaye. ^b^Vīsativatthukā^eb^tiādi ‘‘tīṇi saññojanānī’’ti vuttānaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. ^b^Catūsu āsavesū^eb^ti idaṃ abhidhammanayena vuttaṃ, na suttantanayena. Na hi sutte katthaci cattāro āsavā āgatā atthi. Yadi vicikicchā na āsavo, atha kasmā ‘‘sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso, ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā pahātabbā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘dassanā pahātabbā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ettha pariyāpannattā^eb^ti etena sammāsaṅkappassa viya paññākkhandhe kiccasabhāgatāya idha vicikicchāya āsavasaṅgaho katoti dasseti.

[03]Sabbo ^a^M1.0164^ea^ attaggāho sakkāyadiṭṭhivinimutto natthīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ…pe… vibhattā’’^eb^ti. Sā hi diṭṭhi ekasmiṃ cittuppāde santāne ca ṭhitaṃ ekaṭṭhaṃ, tattha paṭhamaṃ sahajātekaṭṭhaṃ, itaraṃ pahānekaṭṭhaṃ, tadubhayampi niddhāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘diṭṭhāsavehī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbathāpī^eb^ti sabbappakārena, sahajātekaṭṭhapahānekaṭṭhappakārehīti attho. ^b^Avasesā^eb^ti diṭṭhāsavato avasiṭṭhā. ^b^Tayopi āsavā^eb^ti kāmāsavabhavāsavāvijjāsavā. Tathā hi pubbe ‘‘catūsu āsavesū’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā bahū evettha āsavā pahātabbā, tasmā bahuvacananiddeso kato ‘‘ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā pahātabbā’’ti. ^b^Porāṇāna^eb^nti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ, ‘‘purātanānaṃ majjhimabhāṇakāna’’nti ca vadanti.
[03]^b^Dassanā pahātabbā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
[06]Dassanāpahātabbāasavavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃvarādīhī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0147^ea^ saṃvarapaṭisevanādhivāsanaparivajjanavinodanehi. ^b^Sabbesampī^eb^ti catunnampi ariyamaggānaṃ. ^b^Aya^eb^nti saṃvarāpahātabbādikathā ^b^pubbabhāgapaṭipadāti veditabbā^eb^. Tathā hi heṭṭhā ‘‘upakkilesavisodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā āsavakkhayapaṭipattidassanattha’’nti suttantadesanāya payojanaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi sakkā ādito eva ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetuṃ, atha kho samādinnasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro ‘‘saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.348; ma. ni. 2.168) evaṃ vuttaṃ caturāpassenapaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjamāno sammasanavidhiṃ otaritvā anukkamena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā āsave khepeti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto, evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā, na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho’’ti (a. ni. 8.20; udā. 45; cūḷava. 385).

[03]^b^Idhā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0165^ea^ ayaṃ ^b^idha^eb^-saddo sabbākārato indriyasaṃvarasaṃvutassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano, aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano cāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ sāsane’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇā. ^b^Sampalimaṭṭha^eb^nti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.6.58) ghaṃsitaṃ. ^b^Anubyañjanaso^eb^ti hatthapādahasitakathitavilokitādippakārabhāgaso. Tañhi ayoniso manasikaroto kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato ‘‘anubyañjana’’nti vuccati. ^b^Nimittaggāho^eb^ti itthipurisanimittādikassa vā kilesavatthubhūtassa vā nimittassa gāho. ^b^Ādittapariyāyanayenā^eb^ti ādittapariyāye (saṃ. ni. 4.28; mahāva. 54) āgatanayena veditabbā ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhāti yojanā. Yathā itthiyā indriyanti itthindriyaṃ, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana ^b^cakkhumeva indriyanti cakkhundriyanti^eb^. ^b^Titthakāko viyā^eb^ti titthe kāko titthakāko, nadiyā samatikkamanatitthe niyataṭṭhitiko. ^b^Āvāṭakacchapo^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03]Evaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya ^b^cakkhundriye^eb^ niyataṭṭhāno ^b^saṃvaro^eb^ cakkhundriyasaṃvaro. ^b^Muṭṭhassaccaṃ^eb^ satipaṭipakkhā akusaladhammā. Yadipi aññattha asaṅkheyyampi bhavaṅgacittaṃ nirantaraṃ uppajjati, pasādaghaṭṭanāvajjanuppādānaṃ pana antare dve eva bhavaṅgacittāni uppajjantīti ayaṃ cittaniyāmoti āha ^b^bhavaṅge ‘‘dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Javanakkhaṇe^eb^^a^V1.0148^ea^^b^pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā^eb^tiādi (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.15; dha. sa. mūlaṭī. 1352) puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhāto dussīlyasaṃvaro atthīti so manodvāravasena, itaro channampi dvārānaṃ vasena yojetabbo. Muṭṭhassaccādīnañhi satipaṭipakkhādilakkhaṇānaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ siyā pañcadvāre uppatti, na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ aviññattijanakattāti.

[03]^b^Yathā ki^eb^nti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro ‘‘cakkhudvāre asaṃvaro’’ti vuccati, taṃ nidassanaṃ kinti attho. ^b^Yathā^eb^tiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā ^a^M1.0166^ea^ viya javane asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatāsāmaññameva nidasseti, na pubbāparasāmaññaṃ, antobahisāmaññaṃ vā. Sambandho ca javanena dvārādīnaṃ ekasantatipariyāpannatāya eva daṭṭhabbo. Paccayabhāvena purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi phalanipphattiyā cakkhādi viya santaṃyeva nāma. Na hi dharamānaṃyeva ‘‘santa’’nti vuccati, tasmā sati dvārabhavaṅgādike pacchā uppajjamānaṃ javanaṃ bāhiraṃ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṃ vuttaṃ. Itarañca antonagaragharādisamānaṃ. Javanassa hi paramatthato asatipi bāhirabhāve itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve ‘‘pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha’’nti (a. ni. 1.49) ādivacanato āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo, tabbidhurasabhāvassa itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ca pariyāyato veditabbo. Javane vā asaṃvare uppanne tato paraṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattito nagaradvārasadisena javanena pavisitvā dussīlyādicorānaṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṃ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uppanne hi asaṃvare dvārādīnaṃ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyati, so ca uppajjamānoyeva dvārādīnaṃ saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ paṭibāhentoyeva pavattatīti ayañhettha asaṃvarādīnaṃ pavattinayo. Pañcadvāre rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate yathāpaccayaṃ akusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe manodvārikajavanaṃ taṃyeva ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre ‘‘itthī puriso’’tiādinā visayaṃ vavatthapetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, puna vāre rajjanādivasena javanaṃ javati, punapi yadi tādisaṃ ārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati, taṃsadisameva pañcadvāre rūpādīsu javanaṃ uppajjati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi agutta’’^eb^ntiādi. Ayaṃ tāva asaṃvarapakkhe atthavaṇṇanā.

[03]Saṃvarapakkhepi ^a^V1.0149^ea^ imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Saṃvarena samannāgato puggalo saṃvutoti vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘upetoti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekajjhaṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto’’ti padañca atthato abhinnaṃ samānaṃ katvā. ^b^Ayameva cettha attho^eb^^b^sundarataro^eb^^a^M1.0167^ea^ uparipāḷiyā saṃsandanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tathāhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yanti ādeso^eb^ti iminā liṅgavipallāsena saddhiṃ vacanavipallāso katoti dasseti, nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ paccattaputhuvacanatthaṃ. ^b^Vighātakarā^eb^ti cittavighātakaraṇā cittadukkhanibbattakā ca. Yathāvuttakilesahetukā dāhānubandhā vipākā eva ^b^vipākapariḷāhā^eb^. Yathā panettha āsavā aññe ca vighātakarā kilesavipākapariḷāhā sambhavanti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhudvārehī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva. Ettha ca saṃvaraṇūpāyo, saṃvaritabbaṃ, saṃvaro, yato so saṃvaro, yattha saṃvaro, yañca saṃvaraphalanti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti hi ^b^saṃvaraṇūpāyo^eb^. Cakkhundriyaṃ ^b^saṃvaritabbaṃ^eb^. Saṃvaraggahaṇena gahitā sati ^b^saṃvaro^eb^. Asaṃvutassāti ^b^saṃvaraṇāvadhi^eb^. Asaṃvarato hi saṃvaraṇaṃ. Saṃvaritabbaggahaṇena siddho idha ^b^saṃvaravisayo^eb^. Cakkhundriyañhi saṃvarañāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇe saṃvarīyatīti avuttasiddhoyamattho. Āsavatannimittakilesādipariḷāhābhāvo ^b^phalaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ sotadvārādīsupi yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Sabbatthevā^eb^ti manodvāre pañcadvāre cāti sabbasmiṃ dvāre.
[06]Saṃvarāpahātabbāasavavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvara^eb^ntiādīsu ‘‘sītassa paṭighātāyā’’tiādinā vuttaṃ paccavekkhaṇameva yoniso paṭisaṅkhā. ^b^Īdisa^eb^nti evarūpaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Bhavapatthanāya assādayato^eb^ti bhavapatthanāmukhena bhāvitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assādentassa. ^b^Cīvara^eb^nti nivāsanādi yaṃ kiñci cīvaraṃ. ^b^Paṭisevatī^eb^ti nivāsanādivasena paribhuñjati. ^b^Yāvadevā^eb^ti payojanaparimāṇaniyamanaṃ. Sītapaṭighātādiyeva hi yogino cīvarapaṭisevane payojanaṃ. ^b^Sītassā^eb^ti dhātukkhobhato vā utupariṇāmato vā uppannasītassa. ^b^Paṭighātāyā^eb^ti paṭibāhanatthaṃ tappaccayassa vikārassa vinodanatthaṃ. ^b^Uṇhassā^eb^ti aggisantāpato uppannassa uṇhassa. ^b^Ḍaṃsā^eb^dayo pākaṭāyeva. Puna ^b^yāvadevā^eb^ti niyatapayojanaparimāṇaniyamanaṃ. Niyatañhi payojanaṃ cīvarapaṭisevanassa hirikopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ, itaraṃ kadāci kadāci ^a^M1.0168^ea^. ^b^Hirikopīna^eb^nti sambādhaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V1.0150^ea^. Yasmiñhi aṅge vivaṭe hirīkuppati vinassati, taṃ hiriyā kopanato hirikopīnaṃ, tassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ cīvaraṃ paṭisevati.

[03]^b^Piṇḍapāta^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci āhāraṃ. So hi piṇḍolyena bhikkhanāya patte patanato tattha tattha laddhabhikkhāpiṇḍānaṃ pāto sannipātoti ‘‘piṇḍapāto’’ti vuccati. ^b^Neva davāyā^eb^ti na kīḷanāya. ^b^Na madāyā^eb^ti na balamadamānamadapurisamadatthaṃ. ^b^Na maṇḍanāyā^eb^ti na aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ pīṇanabhāvatthaṃ. ^b^Na vibhūsanāyā^eb^ti na tesaṃyeva sobhanatthaṃ, chavisampatiatthanti attho. Imāni ca padāni yathākkamaṃ moha-dosa-saṇṭhāna-vaṇṇa-rāgūpanissaya-pahānatthāni veditabbāni. Purimaṃ vā dvayaṃ attano attano saṃkilesuppattinisedhanatthaṃ, itaraṃ parassapi. Cattāripi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa pahānatthaṃ vuttānīti veditabbāni. ^b^Kāyassā^eb^ti rūpakāyassa. ^b^Ṭhitiyā yāpanāyā^eb^ti pabandhaṭṭhitatthañceva pavattiyā avicchedanatthañca cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ jīvitindriyassa pavattāpanatthaṃ. ^b^Vihiṃsūparatiyā^eb^ti jighacchādukkhassa uparamaṇatthaṃ. ^b^Brahmacariyānuggahāyā^eb^ti sāsanamaggabrahmacariyānaṃ anuggahatthaṃ. ^b^Itī^eb^ti evaṃ iminā upāyena. ^b^Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmī^eb^ti purāṇaṃ abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ paṭihanissāmi. ^b^Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī^eb^ti navaṃ bhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti. Tassā hi anuppannāya anuppajjanatthameva āhāraṃ paribhuñjati. Ettha ca abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā nāma yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā vedanā. Sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyo bhiyyo pavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati, bhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanāpi khudānimittāva aṅgadāhasūlādivedanā appavattā. Sā hi bhuttapaccayā anuppannāva na uppajjissatīti. Vihiṃsānimittatā cetāsaṃ vihiṃsāya viseso.

[03]^b^Yātrā ca me bhavissatī^eb^ti yāpanā ca me catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ bhavissati. ^b^Yāpanāyā^eb^ti iminā jīvitindriyayāpanā vuttā, idha catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanāti ayametāsaṃ viseso. ^b^Anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā^eb^ti ayuttapariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogaparivajjanena anavajjatā, parimitaparibhogena phāsuvihāro. Asappāyāparimitabhojanapaccayā aratitandīvijambhitāviññugarahādidosābhāvena vā anavajjatā, sappāyaparimitabhojanapaccayā kāyabalasambhavena ^a^M1.0169^ea^ phāsuvihāro. Yāvadatthaudarāvadehakabhojanaparivajjanena seyyasukhapassasukhamiddhasukhādīnaṃ abhāvato anavajjatā, catupañcālopamattaññīnabhojanena catuiriyāpathayogyatāpādanato phāsuvihāro. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Cattāro ^a^V1.0151^ea^ pañca ālope, abhutvā udakaṃ pive;
[22]Alaṃ phāsuvihārāya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno’’ti. (theragā. 983);
[03]Ettāvatā payojanapariggaho, majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hoti.

[03]^b^Senāsana^eb^nti sayanañca āsanañca. Yattha hi vihārādike seti nipajjati, āsati nisīdati, taṃ senāsanaṃ. ^b^Utuparissayavinodanapaṭisallānārāmattha^eb^nti utuyeva parisahanaṭṭhena parissayo, sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro, atha vā yathāvutto utu ca sīhabyagghādipākaṭaparissayo ca rāgadosādipaṭicchannaparissayo ca utuparissayo, tassa vinodanatthañceva ekībhāvasukhatthañca. Idañca cīvarapaṭisevane hirikopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ viya tassa niyatapayojananti puna ^b^‘‘yāvadevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāra^eb^nti rogassa paccanīkappavattiyā gilānapaccayo, tato eva bhisakkassa anuññātavatthutāya bhesajjaṃ, jīvitassa parivārasambhārabhāvehi parikkhāro cāti ^b^gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro,^eb^ taṃ. ^b^Uppannāna^eb^nti jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ. ^b^Veyyābādhikāna^eb^nti byābādhato dhātukkhobhato ca tannibbattarogato ca jātānaṃ. ^b^Vedanāna^eb^nti dukkhavedanānaṃ. ^b^Abyābajjhaparamatāyā^eb^ti niddukkhaparamabhāvāya paṭisevāmīti yojanā. Evamettha saṅkhepeneva pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā. ^b^Navavedanuppādanatopī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ āyatiṃ eva vipākapariḷāhā, atha kho atibhojanapaccayā alaṃsāṭakādīnaṃ viya navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbāti attho.
[06]Paṭisevanāpahātabbāasavavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Khamo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0170^ea^ khamanako. Kammaṭṭhānikassa calanaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānapariccāgoti āha ^b^‘‘calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Adhimattampi uṇhaṃ sahati,^eb^ sahanto ca na naggasamaṇādayo viya sahati, atha kho kammaṭṭhānāvijahanenāti āha ^b^‘‘sveva thero viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bahicaṅkame^eb^ti leṇato bahi caṅkame. ^b^Uṇhabhayenevā^eb^ti narakaggiuṇhabhayeneva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avīcimahānirayaṃ paccavekkhitvā’’^eb^ti, tampi ‘‘mayā anekakkhattuṃ anubhūtaṃ, idaṃ pana tato mudutara’’nti ^a^V1.0152^ea^ evaṃ paccavekkhitvā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne. ^b^Aggisantāpova veditabbo^eb^ sūriyasantāpassa parato vuccamānattā.

[03]^b^Parisuddhasīlohamasmī^eb^ti sabbathāpi ‘‘visuddhasīlohamasmī’’ti maraṇaṃ aggahetvā avippaṭisāramūlikaṃ pītiṃ uppādesi. ^b^Saha pītuppādā^eb^ti pharaṇapītiyā uppādena saheva. ^b^Visaṃ nivattitvā^eb^ti pītivegena ajjhotthataṃ daṭṭhamukheneva bhassitvā. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti sappena daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva. ^b^Cittekaggataṃ labhitvā^eb^ti ‘‘pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.466; 3.359; saṃ. ni. 5.376; a. ni. 3.96; 11.12) nayena samādhānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.

[03]Paccayesu santoso bhāvanāya ca āramitabbaṭṭhānatāya ārāmo assāti paccayasantosabhāvanārāmo, tassa bhāvo ^b^paccaya…pe… rāmatā,^eb^ tāya. ^b^Mahāthero^eb^ti vuḍḍhataro thero. Vacanameva tadatthaṃ ñāpetukāmānaṃ pathoti ^b^vacanapatho^eb^.

[03]Asukhaṭṭhena vā ^b^tibbā^eb^. Yañhi na sukhaṃ, taṃ aniṭṭhaṃ ‘‘tibba’’nti vuccati. ^b^Evaṃsabhāvo^eb^ti ‘‘adhivāsanajātiyo’’ti padassa atthamāha. ^b^Muhuttena^eb^ khaṇeva vāte hadayaṃ phāletuṃ āraddheyeva. ^b^Anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyī^eb^ti arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.

[03]^b^Evaṃ sabbatthā^eb^ti ‘‘uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sītaṃ patthayato’’tiādinā sabbattha uṇhādinimittaṃ kāmāsavuppatti veditabbā, sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā aniṭṭhanti adhippāyo. Attaggāhe sati attaniyaggāhoti āha ^b^‘‘mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti gāho diṭṭhāsavo’’^eb^ti. Sītādike upagate sahantī khamantī te attano upari vāsentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āropetvā vāsetiyevā’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0171^ea^. ^b^Na nirassatī^eb^ti na vidhunati. Yo hi sītādike na sahati, so te nirassanto vidhunanto viya hotīti.
[06]Adhivāsanāpahātabbāasavavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ahaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0153^ea^^b^samaṇo^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.6.58) ‘‘ahaṃ samaṇo, kiṃ mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā’’ti evaṃ acintetvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Paccavekkhitvā^eb^ti gāmappadesaṃ payojanādiñca paccavekkhitvā. ^b^Paṭikkamatī^eb^ti hatthiādīnaṃ samīpagamanato apakkamati. Kaṇṭakā yattha tiṭṭhanti, taṃ ^b^kaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. ^b^Amanussaduṭṭhānī^eb^ti amanussasañcārena dūsitāni, saparissayānīti attho. ^b^Samāna^eb^nti samaṃ, avisamanti attho. ^b^Akāsi vā^eb^ tādisaṃ anācāraṃ.

[03]^b^Sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātenā^eb^ti ‘‘kathaṃ parivajjanaṃ sīla’’nti yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Apica ‘‘caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī’’ti vacanato hatthiādiparivajjanampi bhagavato vacanānuṭṭhānanti katvā ācārasīlamevāti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Parivajjanāpahātabbāasavavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Itipī^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena, ayonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhitattāpi lobhādisahagatattāpi kusalapaṭipakkhatopītiādīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ vitakko akusaloti attho. Iminā nayena ^b^sāvajjo^eb^tiādīsupi attho veditabbo. Ettha ca ^b^akusalo^eb^tiādinā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kāmavitakkassa ādīnavaṃ dasseti, ^b^dukkhavipāko^eb^ti iminā samparāyikaṃ. ^b^Attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī^eb^tiādīsupi imināva nayena ādīnavavibhāvanā veditabbā. Uppannassa kāmavitakkassa anadhivāsanaṃ nāma puna tādisassa anuppādanaṃ, taṃ panassa pahānaṃ vinodanaṃ byantikaraṇaṃ anabhāvagamananti ^a^M1.0172^ea^ ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī’’ti vatvā ‘‘pajahatī’’tiādi vuttanti tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘anadhivāsento kiṃ karotīti pajahatī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Pahānañcettha vikkhambhanameva, na samucchedoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vinodetī’’^eb^tiādi vuttanti vikkhambhanavaseneva attho dassito.

[03]^b^Kāmavitakko^eb^ti sampayogato ārammaṇato ca kāmasahagato vitakko. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāmapaṭisaṃyutto^eb^^a^V1.0154^ea^^b^takko’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti hi kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena sampayutto vatthukāmasaṅkhātena paṭibaddho ca. ^b^Uppannuppanne^eb^ti tesaṃ pāpavitakkānaṃ uppādāvatthāgahaṇaṃ vā kataṃ siyā anavasesaggahaṇaṃ vā. Tesu paṭhamaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘upannamatte’’^eb^ti, sampatijāteti attho. Anavasesaggahaṇaṃ byāpanicchāya hotīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘satakkhattumpi uppanne’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ñātivitakko^eb^ti ‘‘amhākaṃ ñātayo sukhajīvino sampattiyuttā’’tiādinā gehassitapemavasena ñātake ārabbha uppannavitakko. ^b^Janapadavitakko^eb^ti ‘‘amhākaṃ janapado subhikkho sampannasasso ramaṇīyo’’tiādinā gehassitapemavaseneva janapadaṃ ārabbha uppannavitakko. Ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye attā sukhī hoti amaroti dukkarakārikāya paṭisaṃyutto amaratthāya vitakko, taṃ vā ārabbha amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhisahagato amaro ca so vitakko cāti ^b^amaravitakko. Parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti paresu upaṭṭhākādīsu sahanandikādivasena pavatto anuddayatāpatirūpako gehassitapemena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko. ^b^Lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti cīvarādilābhena ceva sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto. ^b^Anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti ‘‘aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ, na heṭṭhā katvā maññeyyuṃ, pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ kareyyu’’nti uppannavitakko.

[03]Kāmavitakko kāmasaṅkappanasabhāvattā kāmasaṅkappapavattiyā sātisayattā ca kāmanākāroti āha ^b^‘‘kāmavitakko panettha kāmāsavo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tabbiseso^eb^ti kāmāsavaviseso, rāgasahavuttīti adhippāyo. Kāmavitakkādike vinodeti attano santānato ^a^M1.0173^ea^ nīharati etenāti ^b^vinodanaṃ,^eb^ vīriyanti āha ^b^‘‘vīriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātena vinodanenā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Vinodanāpahātabbāasavavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.187) vacanato vijjāvimuttīnaṃ anadhigamo tato ca sakalavaṭṭadukkhānativatti ^b^abhāvanāya ādīnavo,^eb^ vuttavipariyāyena bhagavato orasaputtabhāvādivasena ca ^b^bhāvanāya ānisaṃso^eb^ veditabbo. ^b^Uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtā^eb^ti dutiyādimaggakkhaṇe jātā, bhāvanādhikārato dutiyamaggādipariyāpannāti attho. Nanu ca te lokuttarā eva, kasmā visesanaṃ ^a^V1.0155^ea^ katanti? Nayidaṃ visesanaṃ, visesitabbaṃ panetaṃ, lokuttarabojjhaṅgā eva adhippetā, te ca kho uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtāti. ^b^Bojjhaṅgesu asammohattha^eb^nti vipassanājhānamaggaphalabojjhaṅgesu sammohābhāvatthaṃ. Missakanayena hi bojjhaṅgesu vuccamānesu tadaṅgādivivekadassanavasena vipassanābojjhaṅgādayo vibhajitvā vuccanti, na nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgā evāti bojjhaṅgesu sammoho na hoti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāpaṭipattiyā ca sammadeva pakāsitattā. ^b^Idha panā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte, imasmiṃ vā adhikāre. ^b^Lokuttaranayo eva gahetabbo^eb^ bhāvanāmaggassa adhikatattā.

[03]^b^Ādipadāna^eb^nti (a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.418) ‘‘satisambojjhaṅga’’nti evamādīnaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vākye ādibhūtānaṃ padānaṃ. ^b^Atthato^eb^ti visesavasena sāmaññavasena ca padatthato. ^b^Lakkhaṇādīhī^eb^ti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānato. ^b^Kamato^eb^ti anupubbito. ^b^Anūnādhikato^eb^ti tāvattakato. ^b^Vibhāvinā^eb^ti viññunā.

[03]^b^Satisambojjhaṅge^eb^ti satisambojjhaṅgapade. ^b^Saraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anussaraṇaṭṭhena. Cirakatādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ ^b^apilāpanaṃ. Vuttampi ^a^M1.0174^ea^ hetaṃ^eb^ milindapañhe. ^b^Bhaṇḍāgāriko^eb^ti bhaṇḍagopako. Apilāpe karoti ^b^apilāpeti. Therenā^eb^ti nāgasenattherena. Sammosapaccanīkaṃ kiccaṃ ^b^asammoso,^eb^ na sammosābhāvamattaṃ. ^b^Gocarābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ti kāyādiārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
[03]^b^Bodhiyā^eb^ dhammasāmaggiyā, ^b^aṅgo^eb^ avayavo, ^b^bodhissa vā^eb^ ariyasāvakassa ^b^aṅgo^eb^ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Patiṭṭhānāyūhanā^eb^ oghataraṇasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.1) –

[08]‘‘Kilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi patiṭṭhānaṃ, avasesakilesābhisaṅkhārehi āyūhanā. Taṇhāvasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhivasena āyūhanā. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhānaṃ, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā āyūhanā. Līnavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, uddhaccavasena āyūhanā. Kāmasukhānuyogavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, attakilamathānuyogavasena āyūhanā. Sabbākusalābhisaṅkhāravasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, sabbalokiyakusalābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā’’ti –

[03]Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbā. Yā hi ayaṃ bodhīti vuccatīti yojetabbaṃ ^a^V1.0156^ea^. ‘‘Bujjhatī’’ti padassa paṭibujjhatīti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahatī’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana paṭibujjhanaṃ atthato catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paṭivedho, nibbānasseva vā sacchikiriyāti āha ^b^‘‘cattārī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyā^eb^ti yathā aṅgāni eva jhānamaggā, na aṅgavinimuttā, evamidhāpīti attho. ^b^Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyā^eb^ti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā^eb^ti idaṃ kāraṇattho aṅga-saddoti katvā vuttaṃ. Bujjhantīti bodhiyo, bodhiyo eva aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anubujjhantī^eb^ti vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānañca saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ bujjhanti. ^b^Paṭibujjhantī^eb^ti kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahanato paccakkhabhāvena vā paṭimukhaṃ bujjhanti. ^b^Sambujjhantī^eb^ti aviparītabhāvena sammā ca bujjhanti. Evaṃ upasaggānaṃ atthavisesadīpanatā daṭṭhabbā. Bodhi-saddo hi sabbavisesayuttaṃ bujjhanaṃ sāmaññena gahetvā ṭhito.

[03]^b^Vicinātī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0175^ea^ ‘‘tayidaṃ dukkha’’ntiādinā vīmaṃsati. ^b^Obhāsanaṃ^eb^ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa sammohassa viddhaṃsanaṃ yathā āloko andhakārassa. Yasmiṃ dhamme sati vīro nāma hoti, so dhammo ^b^vīrabhāvo. Īrayitabbato^eb^ti pavattetabbato. Kosajjapakkhato patituṃ appadānavasena sampayuttānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ ^b^paggaho^eb^. ^b^Upatthambhanaṃ^eb^ anubalappadānaṃ. Osīdanaṃ layāpatti, tappaṭipakkhato ^b^anosīdanaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Pīṇayatī^eb^ti tappeti vaḍḍheti vā. ^b^Pharaṇaṃ^eb^ paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanaṃ. ^b^Tuṭṭhi^eb^ nāma pīti. Udaggabhāvo ^b^odagyaṃ,^eb^ kāyacittānaṃ ukkhipananti attho. ^b^Kāyacittadarathapassambhanato^eb^ti kāyadarathassa cittadarathassa ca passambhanato vūpasamanato. ^b^Kāyoti^eb^ cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā. ^b^Daratho^eb^ sārambho, dukkhadomanassapaccayānaṃ uddhaccādikilesānaṃ, tappadhānānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Uddhaccādikilesapaṭipakkhabhāvo daṭṭhabbo, evañcettha passaddhiyā ^b^aparipphandanasītibhāvo^eb^ daṭṭhabbo asāraddhabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘passaddho kāyo asāraddho’’ti (ma. ni. 1.52).

[03]^b^Samādhānato^eb^ti sammā cittassa ādhānato ṭhapanato. ^b^Avikkhepo^eb^ sampayuttānaṃ avikkhittatā, yena sasampayuttā dhammā avikkhittā honti, so dhammo avikkhepoti. ^b^Avisāro^eb^ attano eva avisaraṇasabhāvo. ^b^Sampiṇḍanaṃ^eb^ sampayuttānaṃ avippakiṇṇabhāvāpādanaṃ nhānīyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya. ^b^Cittaṭṭhitipaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^ti ‘‘cittassa ṭhitī’’ti (dha. sa. 11) vacanato cittassa pabandhaṭhitipaccupaṭṭhāno. ^b^Ajjhupekkhanato^eb^ti udāsīnabhāvato. ^b^Sā^eb^ti bojjhaṅgaupekkhā ^a^V1.0157^ea^. Samappavatte dhamme paṭisañcikkhati upapattito ikkhati tadākārā hutvā pavattatīti ^b^paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇā,^eb^ evañca katvā ‘‘paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā gahaṇe majjhattatā’’ti upekkhākiccādhimattatāya saṅkhārupekkhā vuttā. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ yathāsakakiccakaraṇavasena samaṃ pavattanapaccayatā ^b^samavāhitā^eb^. Alīnānuddhatappavattipaccayatā ^b^ūnādhikatānivāraṇaṃ^eb^. Sampayuttānaṃ asamappavattihetukapakkhapātaṃ upacchindantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pakkhapātupacchedarasā’’^eb^ti. Ajjhupekkhanameva ^b^majjhattabhāvo^eb^.

[03]Sabbasmiṃ līnapakkhe uddhaccapakkhe ca atthikā patthanīyā icchitabbāti sabbatthikā, taṃ ^b^sabbatthikaṃ^eb^. Samānakkhaṇapavattīsu sattasupi sambojjhaṅgesu vācāya ^a^M1.0176^ea^ kamappavattito paṭipāṭiyā vattabbesu yaṃ kiñci paṭhamaṃ avatvā satisambojjhaṅgasseva paṭhamaṃ vacanassa kāraṇaṃ sabbesaṃ upakārakattanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbesa’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sabbesa^eb^nti ca līnuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ, aññathā sabbepi sabbesaṃ paccayāti.

[03]^b^‘‘Kasmā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā’’^eb^ti codako saddhālobhādīnampi bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati, itaro satiādīnaṃyeva bhāvanāya upakārataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^līnassā^eb^ti atisithilavīriyatādīhi bhāvanāvīthiṃ anotaritvā saṃkuṭitassa cittassa. Tadā hi passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgā na bhāvetabbā. Tañhi etehi allatiṇādīhi viya paritto aggi dussamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyā’’tiādi (saṃ. ni. 5.234). Dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgā pana bhāvetabbā, sukkhatiṇādīhi viya paritto aggi līnaṃ cittaṃ etehi susamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yasmiñca kho’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā…pe… pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya…pe… saṃvattatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.232). Tattha sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena pavattamanasikāro…pe… dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.

[03]^b^Uddhaccassā^eb^ti cittassa accāraddhavīriyatādīhi sītibhāvapatiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ anotiṇṇatāya, tadā dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgā na bhāvetabbā. Tañhi etehi sukkhatiṇādīhi viya aggikkhandho duvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ^a^V1.0158^ea^ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyā’’tiādi (saṃ. ni. 5.234). Passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgā pana bhāvetabbā, allatiṇādīhi viya aggikkhandho uddhataṃ cittaṃ etehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yasmiñca kho’’^eb^tiādi. Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘atthi, bhikkhave, kāyapassaddhi ^a^M1.0177^ea^ cittapassaddhi…pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya saṃvattatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.232). Tattha yathāssa passaddhiādayo uppannapubbā, taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena tathā manasikarontova passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma. Satisambojjhaṅgo pana sabbattha bahūpakāro. So hi cittaṃ līnapakkhikānaṃ passaddhiādīnaṃ vasena layāpattito, uddhaccapakkhikānañca dhammavicayādīnaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato rakkhati, tasmā so loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu sabbakammikāmacco viya ca rājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī’’^eb^ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234).

[03]Ñatvā ñātabbāti (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.129) sambandho. ^b^Vaḍḍhi^eb^ nāma vepullaṃ bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ uppādo evāti āha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ janetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhi^eb^vuddhiṃ pāpento ^b^nibbatteti. Vivittatā^eb^ti vivittabhāvo. Yo hi vivecanīyato viviccati, yaṃ viviccitvā ṭhitaṃ, tadubhayaṃ idha vivittabhāvasāmaññena ‘‘vivittatā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tesu purimo vivecanīyato viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātāya viviccanakiriyāya samaṅgī dhammasamūho tāya eva viviccanakiriyāya vasena vivekoti gahito. Itaro sabbaso tato tato vivittasabhāvatāya. Tattha yasmiṃ dhammapuñje satisambojjhaṅgo viviccanakiriyāya pavattati, taṃ yathāvuttāya viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātaṃ nissāyeva pavattati, itaraṃ pana tanninnatātadārammaṇatāhīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘viveke nissita’’^eb^nti. Yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ ‘‘vivekaja’’nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vivekavasena pavatto bojjhaṅgo ‘‘vivekanissito’’ti daṭṭhabbo. Nissayaṭṭho ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo. Asatipi pubbāparabhāve ‘‘paṭiccasamuppādā’’ti ettha paccayānaṃ samuppādanaṃ viya abhinnadhammādhārā nissayanabhāvanā sambhavantīti. ^b^Ayamevā^eb^ti viveko eva. Viveko hi pahānavinayavirāganirodhā ca samānatthā.

[03]Tadaṅgasamucchedanissaraṇavivekanissitataṃ vatvā paṭipassaddhivivekanissitatāya avacanaṃ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī’’tiādinā bhāvetabbānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ idha vuttattā. Bhāvitabbojjhaṅgassa hi ye sacchikātabbā phalabojjhaṅgā, tesaṃ kiccaṃ paṭipassaddhiviveko. ^b^Ajjhāsayato^eb^ti ^a^V1.0159^ea^ ‘‘nibbānaṃ sacchikarissāmī’’ti mahantājjhāsayato. Yadipi vipassanākkhaṇe saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ ^a^M1.0178^ea^ cittaṃ, saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ suṭṭhu disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne adhimuttatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitatā dāhābhibhūtassa puggalassa sītaninnacitattā viya. ^b^Na paṭisiddhā^eb^ vipassanāpādakesu kasiṇārammaṇādijhānesu satiādīnaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyattā. Anuddharantā pana vipassanā viya bodhiyā maggassa āsannakāraṇaṃ jhānaṃ na hoti, nāpi tathā ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ, na ca vipassanākiccassa viya jhānakiccassa niṭṭhānaṃ maggoti katvā na uddharanti. Ettha ca kasiṇaggahaṇena tadāyattāni āruppānipi gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Tānipi hi vipassanāpādakāni nibbedhabhāgiyāni ca hontīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tanninnabhāvasabbhāvato. Yadaggena hi nibbānaninnatā, tadaggena phalaninnatāpi siyā. ‘‘Kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihareyya’’nti (ma. ni. 1.465) ādivacanampetassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.

[03]^b^Vossagga^eb^-saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. Vossajjanañhi pahānaṃ, vissaṭṭhabhāvena nirāsaṅkapavati ca, tasmā vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena paṭipakkhassa pahānaṃ vossaggo, tathā vipassanākkhaṇe tanninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇena vissaṭṭhasabhāvato vossaggoti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Yathāvuttena pakārenā^eb^ti tadaṅgasamucchedapakārena tanninnatadārammaṇakaraṇapakārena ca. Pubbe vossagga-padasseva atthassa vuttattā āha ^b^‘‘sakalena vacanenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariṇamantaṃ^eb^ vipassanākkhaṇe, ^b^pariṇataṃ^eb^ maggakkhaṇe. Pariṇāmo nāma paripākoti āha ^b^‘‘paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcā’’^eb^ti. Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena āhitasāmatthiyassa kilesassa pariccajituṃ nibbānañca pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadasabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayañhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti yvāyaṃ ‘‘tadaṅgavivekanissita’’ntiādinā satisambojjhaṅge vutto, sesesu dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīsupi esa nayoti evaṃ tattha netabbanti attho.

[03]Evaṃ ādikammikānaṃ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṃ missakanayaṃ vatvā idāni nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgavasena atthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘idha panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Idha panā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sabbāsavasuttante. ^b^Maggo eva vossaggavipariṇāmī^eb^ bhāvanāmaggassa idha adhippetattā. ^b^Tañca kho^eb^ti satisambojjhaṅgaṃ. ^b^Samucchedato^eb^ti samucchindanato.

[03]Diṭṭhāsavassa^a^M1.0179^ea^ paṭhamamaggavajjhattā ^b^‘‘tayo āsavā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tepi anapāyagamanīyā eva veditabbā ^a^V1.0160^ea^ apāyagamanīyānaṃ dassaneneva pahīnattā. Satipi sambojjhaṅgānaṃ yebhuyyena maggabhāve tattha tattha sambojjhaṅgasabhāvānaṃ maggadhammānaṃ vasena vuttamaggattayasampayuttā bojjhaṅgāti paccekabojjhaṅge ‘‘bojjhaṅgabhāvanāyā’’ti iminā gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘maggattayasampayuttāyā’’^eb^ti āha.
[06]Bhāvanāpahātabbāasavavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Thomento^eb^ti āsavappahānassa sudukkarattā tāya eva dukkarakiriyāya taṃ abhitthavanto. ^b^Assā^eb^ti pahīnāsavabhikkhuno. ^b^Ānisaṃsa^eb^nti taṇhācchedādidukkhakkhayapariyosānaṃ udrayaṃ. ^b^Etehi^eb^ pahānādisaṃkittanehi. ^b^Ussukkaṃ janento^eb^ti evaṃ dhammassāmināpi abhitthavanīyaṃ mahānisaṃsañca āsavappahānanti tattha ādarasahitaṃ ussāhaṃ uppādento. ^b^Dassaneneva pahīnā^eb^ti dassanena pahīnā eva. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na appahīnesuyeva pahīnasaññī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sabba^eb^-saddena āsavānaṃ, āsavasaṃvarānañca sambandhavasena dutiyapaṭhamavikappānaṃ bhedo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Dassanābhisamayā^eb^ti pariññābhisamayā pariññākiccasiddhiyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiccavasenā’’^eb^ti, asammohapaṭivedhenāti attho. ^b^Samussayo^eb^ kāyo, attabhāvo vā.

[03]Anavajjapītisomanassasahitaṃ cittaṃ ‘‘attano’’ti vattabbataṃ arahati atthāvahattā, na tabbiparītaṃ anatthāvahattāti pītisampayuttacittataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘attamanāti sakamanā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tuṭṭhamanā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Attamanā^eb^ti vā pītisomanassehi gahitamanā. Yasmā pana tehi gahitatā sampayuttatāva, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pītisomanassehi vā sampayuttamanā’’^eb^ti. Yadettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyattā cāti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmā^eb^^a^V1.0161^ea^^a^M1.0180^ea^^b^taṃ dassetvā^eb^ti yasmā suttantavaṇṇanā suttanikkhepaṃ dassetvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti, yasmā cassa dhammadāyādasuttassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo, tasmā taṃ nikkhepaṃ dassetvā, kathetvāti attho. ^b^Lābhasakkāre^eb^ti (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 2.2.63) lābhasakkārasaṅkhātāya aṭṭhuppattiyāti keci, lābhasakkāre vā aṭṭhuppattiyāti apare. Yā hi lābhasakkāranimittaṃ tadā bhikkhūsu paccayabāhullikatā jātā, taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ desesīti. ^b^Yamakamahāmegho^eb^ti heṭṭhāolambanaupariuggamanavasena satapaṭalo sahassapaṭalo yugaḷamahāmegho. ^b^Tiṭṭhanti ceva^eb^ bhagavati katthaci nibaddhavāsaṃ vasante, cārikaṃ pana gacchante ^b^anubandhanti ca^eb^. Bhikkhūnampi yebhuyyena kappasatasahassaṃ tato bhiyyopi pūritadānapāramisañcayattā tadā mahālābhasakkāro uppajjīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassapī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sakkato^eb^ti sakkārappato. ^b^Garukato^eb^ti garukārappatto. ^b^Mānito^eb^ti bahumato manasā piyāyito ca. ^b^Pūjito^eb^ti mālādipūjāya ceva catupaccayābhipūjāya ca pūjito. ^b^Apacito^eb^ti apacāyanappatto. Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvāpi abhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upanenti, so sakkato. Yasmiṃ garubhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā te denti, so garukato. Yaṃ manasā piyāyanti bahumaññanti ca, so bahumato. Yassa sabbametaṃ pūjāvasena karonti, so pūjito. Yassa abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānañjalikammādivasena paramanipaccakāraṃ karonti, so apacito. Bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca loko evaṃ paṭipanno. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘tena kho pana…pe… parikkhārāna’’nti. ^b^Lābhaggayasaggapatta^eb^nti lābhassa ca yasassa ca aggaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pattaṃ.

[03]Paccayā cīvarādayo garukātabbā etesanti ^b^paccayagarukā,^eb^ āmisacakkhukāti attho. Paccayesu giddhā gadhitā paccayānaṃ bahulabhāvāya paṭipannāti ^b^paccayabāhulikā^eb^. ^b^Bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi^eb^ pakaticārittavasenāti adhippāyo aññathā apākaṭasseva abhāvato. Dhammasabhāvacintāvasena pavattaṃ sahottappañāṇaṃ ^b^dhammasaṃvego,^eb^ idha ^a^M1.0181^ea^ pana so bhikkhūnaṃ lābhagarutādhammavasena ^a^V1.0162^ea^ veditabbo. ^b^Samaṇadhammavuttī^eb^ti samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Sā^eb^ti dhammadāyādadesanā. Paṭibimbadassanavasena sabbakāyassa dassanayoggo ādāsoti ^b^sabbakāyikāadāso^eb^.

[03]Pitu-dāyaṃ, tena dātabbaṃ, tato laddhabbaṃ arahabhāvena ādiyantīti ^b^dāyādā,^eb^ puttā. Tañca loke āmisameva, sāsane pana dhammopīti tattha yaṃ sāvajjaṃ aniyyānikañca, taṃ paṭikkhipitvā, yaṃ niyyānikaṃ anavajjañca, tattha bhikkhū niyojento bhagavā avoca ^b^‘‘dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammassa me dāyādā^eb^ti mama dhammassa ogāhino, dhammabhāgabhāginoti attho. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘dhammakoṭṭhāsasseva sāmino’’ti (ma. ni. aṭṭha.1.29). ^b^Nibbattitadhammo^eb^ti asaṃkilesikānuttarādibhāvena dhammasāmaññato niddhāritadhammo. Pariyāyeti sabhāvato parivattetvā ñāpeti etenāti ^b^pariyāyo,^eb^ leso, lesakāraṇaṃ vā. Tadabhāvato ^b^nippariyāyadhammo^eb^ maggappattiyā apāyapatanādito accantameva vāraṇato. Itaro vuttavipariyāyato ^b^pariyāyadhammo^eb^ accantaṃ apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhapātanato paramparāya vāraṇato. Yathā hi lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dānasīlādi vivaṭṭaṃ uddissa nibbattitaṃ, ayaṃ taṃ asampādentampi taṃ sampāpakassa dhammassa nibbattakāraṇabhāvapariyāyena pariyāyadhammo nāma hoti, evaṃ taṃ vaṭṭaṃ uddissa nibbattitaṃ, yaṃ taṇhādīhi savisesaṃ āmasitabbato āmisanti loke pākaṭaṃ acchādanabhojanādi, tassa, taṃsadisassa ca phalavisesassa nimittabhāvapariyāyena pariyāyāmisanti vuccatīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ panidaṃ…pe… idaṃ pariyāyāmisaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Sakalameva hidaṃ, ānanda, brahmacariyassa yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.2, 3) ādivacanato sāvakehi adhigatopi lokuttaradhammo satthuyevāti vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nippariyāyadhammopi bhagavatoyeva santako’’^eb^ti. Sāvakānañhi dhammadiṭṭhipaccayassapi yonisomanasikārassa visesapaccayo paratoghoso ca tathāgatādhīnoti tehi paṭividdhopi dhammo dhammassāminoyevāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavatā hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^anuppannassa maggassā^eb^ti kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti yāva imasmā buddhuppādā asambodhavasena na uppannassa ariyamaggassa. ^b^Uppādetā^eb^ti nibbattetā. Taṃ panetaṃ maggassa ^a^M1.0182^ea^ bhagavato nibbattanaṃ, na paccekabuddhānaṃ viya sasantāneyeva, atha kho parasantānepīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā,^eb^^b^anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ maggassa uppādanaṃ sañjānanañca atthato jānanaññeva asammohapaṭivedhabhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘maggaññū maggavidū’’^eb^ti. Akkhānaṃ panassa sukusalabhāvenāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘maggakovido’’^eb^ti. Satthārā ^a^V1.0163^ea^ yathāgataṃ maggaṃ anugacchantīti ^b^maggānugā^eb^ bhagavato eva taṃ maggaṃ suṭṭhu adhigamanato. Pacchā parato sammā anu anu āgatā paṭipannāti ^b^pacchā samannāgatā^eb^.

[03]^b^Jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti jānitabbameva abhiññeyyādibhedaṃ jānāti ekantahitapaṭipattito. ^b^Passaṃ passatī^eb^ti tathā passitabbameva passati. Atha vā ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ jānātiyeva. Na hi padesañāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ ekantato jānāti. ^b^Passaṃ passatī^eb^ti dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu dhammacakkhu buddhacakkhu samantacakkhusaṅkhātehi pañcahi cakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passatiyeva. Atha vā ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānātiyeva, diṭṭhidassanassa ca abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti attho. ^b^Cakkhubhūto^eb^ti paññācakkhumayattā tassa ca pattattā sattesu ca taduppādanato dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena lokassa cakkhu viya bhūto. ^b^Ñāṇabhūto^eb^ti etassa ca evameva attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhammā bodhipakkhiyā, brahmā maggo, tehi uppannattā, tesaṃvā pattattā adhigatattā, lokassa ca taduppādanato ^b^‘‘dhammabhūto,^eb^^b^brahmabhūto’’^eb^ti ca veditabbo. ^b^Vattā^eb^ti catusaccadhammaṃ vadatīti vattā. Ciraṃ saccappaṭivedhaṃ pavattento vadatīti ^b^pavattā^eb^. ^b^Atthassa ninnetā^eb^ti dhammatāsaṅkhātaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānañca niddhāretvā dassetā, pāpayitā vā. ^b^Amatassa dātā^eb^ti amataṃ sacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tadāyattabhāvato ^b^dhammassāmī^eb^.
[21]‘‘Yā ca nibbānasampatti, sabbametena labbhati;
[22]Sukho vipāko puññānaṃ, adhippāyo samijjhati. (peṭako. 23);
[03]Nibbānapaṭisaṃyutto, sabbasampattidāyako’’ti –

[03]Evamādiṃ ^a^M1.0183^ea^ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā eva bhikkhū dānādipuññānaṃ vivaṭṭasannissayataṃ jānanti, na aññathāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pariyāyadhammopi…pe… paṭilabhatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Edisaṃ paribhuñcitabba’’nti kappiyassa ca cīvarādipaccayassa bhagavato vacanena vinā paṭiggahopi bhikkhūnaṃ na sambhavati, kuto paribhogoti āha ^b^‘‘nippariyāyāmisampī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Pariyāyāmisassa bhagavato santakabhāvo pariyāyadhammassa tabbhāveneva dīpito. Tadeva sāmibhāvaṃ ^a^V1.0164^ea^ dassentoti sambandho. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti attādhīnapaṭilābhapaṭiggahatāya attano santakattā ca. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ dhammāmise.

[03]Paccayā cīvarādayo paramā pāpuṇitabbabhāvena uttamamariyādā etassa na uttarimanussadhammā appicchatādayo cāti ^b^paccayaparamo,^eb^ lābhagarūti attho. ^b^Taṇhuppādesū^eb^ti ‘‘cīvarahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapātasenāsanaitibhavābhavahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.311; a. ni. 4.9; itivu. 105) evaṃ vuttesu catūsu taṇhuppattikoṭṭhāsesu. Appicchatāsantuṭṭhisallekhapavivekādayo ^b^appicchatādayo^eb^.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ovāde, tesu vā dhammapaṭiggāhakesu bhikkhūsu. Bhavissati vā yesaṃ tatthāti yojanā. Imasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ovāde icceva attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Adhippāyo^eb^ āmisadāyādatāya uppajjanakānatthānuppādassa dhammadāyādatāya uppajjanakāṭṭhuppattiyā ca ākaṅkhā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘passatī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^āmise upakkhalitāna^eb^nti āmisahetu vippaṭipannānaṃ. ^b^Atītakāle^eb^ti kassapasammāsambuddhakāle. ^b^Kapilassa bhikkhuno^eb^ vatthu kapilasuttena, ^b^‘‘saṅghāṭipiādittā hotī’’^eb^tiādinā lakkhaṇasuttena (saṃ. ni. 2.218) ca vibhāvetabbaṃ. Āmisagaruko appagghabhāvena kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nittejo samaṇatejena anujjalato nibbutaṅgāro viya nippabho ca hotīti yojanā. ^b^Tato^eb^ti paccayagarukabhāvato. ^b^Vivattitacitto^eb^ti vinivattitamānaso, sallekhavuttīti attho.

[03]^b^Dhammadāyādā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0184^ea^ ettāvatā antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ vacananti tena avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘mā āmisadāyādā’’^eb^ti paṭikkhepo dassito. Tatheva ca vibhāvetuṃ adhippāyānisaṃsavibhāvanesupi dassito, tathā ādīnavavibhāvanena dhammadāyādatāpaṭikkhepo. ^b^Apadisitabbā^eb^ti heṭṭhā katvā vattabbāti. ^b^Ādiyā^eb^ti ettha yasmā ^b^ā^eb^-kāro mariyādattho, tasmā dhammadāyādatāvidhurena āmisadāyādabhāvena hetubhūtena, karaṇabhūtena vā ādiyaṃ vivecanaṃ viññūhi visuṃ karaṇaṃ vavatthānassa hotīti āha ^b^‘‘visuṃ kātabbā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘viññūhi gārayhā bhaveyyāthāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Atthi me tumhesu anukampā…pe… no āmisadāyādā’’ti bhikkhūsu attano karuṇāyanākittanaṃ ^a^V1.0165^ea^ tesaṃ mudukaraṇaṃ, ‘‘ahampi tenā’’tiādi pana tatopi savisesaṃ mudukaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘atīva mudukaraṇattha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Nāḷakapaṭipadādayo^eb^ nāḷakasuttādīsu (su. ni. 684-728) āgatapaṭipattiyo. Tā pana yasmā nāḷakattherādīhi paṭipannā paramasallekhavuttibhūtā atiukkaṭṭhapaṭipattiyo, tasmā idha dhammadāyādapaṭipadāya udāharaṇabhāvena uddhaṭā. ^b^Sakkhibhūtā^eb^ti tāya paṭipattiyā vuccamānāya ‘‘kiṃ me vinā paṭipajjanako atthī’’ti asaddahantānaṃ paccakkhakaraṇena sakkhibhūtā. ^b^Imasmi^eb^nti ‘‘tumhe ca me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā’’tiādike vākye. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti ‘‘tumhe ca me’’tiādikaṃ sukkapakkhe āgataṃ pāḷipadaṃ. ^b^Vuttanayapaccanīkenā^eb^ti ‘‘tena dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvenā’’ti evaṃ kaṇhapakkhe vuttanayassa paṭipakkhena.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Thomanaṃ sutvā^eb^ti paṭipajjanakassa puggalassa pasaṃsanaṃ sutvā yathā taṃ saparisassa āyasmato upasenassa paṭipattiyā sīlathomanaṃ sutvā. ^b^Nipātapada^eb^nti iminā idha-saddassa anatthakatamāha. ^b^Pavārito^eb^ti paṭikkhepito. Yo hi bhuñjanto bhojanena titto parivesakena upanītabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, so tena pavāritena paṭikkhepito nāma hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pavāritoti…pe… vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti saṅghādike yācāpeti bhatte ^a^M1.0185^ea^ karoti etāyāti ^b^pavāraṇā,^eb^ āpattivisodhanāya attavossaggo okāsadānaṃ. Sā pana yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvutthehi kātabbā vuttā, tasmā ^b^‘‘vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Pavāreti paccaye icchāpeti etāyāti ^b^pavāraṇā,^eb^ cīvarādīhi upanimantanā. Pakārayuttā vāraṇāti ^b^pavāraṇā,^eb^ vippakatabhojanatādicaturaṅgasahito bhojanapaṭikkhepo. Sā pana yasmā anatirittabhojananimittāya āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘anatirittapavāraṇā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Yāvadatthabhojanassa pavāraṇā ^b^yāvadatthapavāraṇā,^eb^ pariyositabhojanassa upanītāhārapaṭikkhepoti attho.

[03]‘‘Bhuttāvī’’ti vacanato bhojanapāripūritā idhādhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇoti bhojanena paripuṇṇo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariyosito^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo ‘‘bhojanena bhojanakiriyāya pariyosito’’ti. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana adhippetatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ bhojana-saddassa lopo vutto. ^b^Dhāto^eb^ti titto. ^b^Sādhakānī^eb^ti ñāpakāni. Pariyositabhojanaṃ suhitayāvadatthatāgahaṇehi bhuttāvitādayo, bhuttāvitādiggahaṇehi vā itare bodhitā hontīti aññamaññaṃ nesaṃ ñāpakañāpetabbataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ chahipi padehi udarāvadehakaṃ bhojanaṃ dassitaṃ ^a^V1.0166^ea^, tañca kho parikappanāvasena. Na hi bhagavā evaṃ bhuñjati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbañcetaṃ parikappetvā vutta’’^eb^nti.

[03]‘‘Siyā eva, nāpi siyā’’ti ca idaṃ atthadvayampi idha sambhavatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idha ubhayampi vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Athā^eb^ti anantaraṃ, mama bhojanasamanantaramevāti attho. Taṃ pana yasmā yathāvuttakālapaccāmasanaṃ hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘tamhi kāle’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Apparuḷhaharite^eb^ti ruhamānatiṇādiharitarahite. Abhāvattho ca ayaṃ ^b^appa^eb^-saddo ‘‘appiccho’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.252, 336; saṃ. ni. 2.148) viya.

[03]^b^Kathitepī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo avuttasamuccayattho. Tena vāpasamīkaraṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā hesa ^b^vutta^eb^-saddo ‘‘no ca kho paṭivutta’’ntiādīsu (pārā. 289) vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati, ‘‘pannalomo paradattavutto’’tiādīsu (cūḷava. 332) jīvitavuttiyaṃ, ‘‘paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto’’tiādīsu (pārā. 92; pāci. 666; mahāva. 129; ma. ni. 3.59) apagame, ‘‘gītaṃ pavuttaṃ ^a^M1.0186^ea^ samihita’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.285) pāvacanabhāvena pavattite, loke pana ‘‘vuttaṃ parāyaṇa’’ntiādīsu (mahābhāsa 7.2.26) ajjhene dissatīti.

[03]Na ettha piṇḍapātabhojanena dhammadāyādatā nivāritā, piṇḍapātabhojanaṃ pana anādaritvā dhammānudhammapaṭipattīti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘piṇḍapātaṃ…pe… vītināmeyyā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^vītināmeyyā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānānuyogena khepeyya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ādittasīsūpamaṃ paccavekkhitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādittasīsūpama^eb^ntiādittasīsūpamasuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Kiñcāpī^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘‘yadipī’’ti iminā samānattho nipāto. Nipāto ca nāma yattha yattha vākye payujjati, tena tena vattabbatthajotako hotīti idha ‘‘piṇḍapāta’’ntiādinā anuññāpasaṃsāvasena vuccamānassa atthassa jotakoti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘anujānanapasaṃsanatthe nipāto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, anuññāpasaṃsārambhe pana ‘‘asambhāvanatthe’’ti vuttaṃ siyā purimeyeva sambhāvanāvibhāvanato adhikattānulomato ca.

[03]Ekavāraṃ pavattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ kathaṃ dīgharattaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^atricchatā^eb^ti atra icchatīti atriccho, tassa bhāvo atricchatā, atthato paralābhapatthanā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘purimeyeva sakalābhena asantuṭṭhi, paralābhe ^a^V1.0167^ea^ ca patthanā, etaṃ atricchatālakkhaṇa’’nti (vibha. aṭṭha. 849). ^b^Pāpicchatā^eb^ti asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyatā. Pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo pāpicchatā. Yathāha ‘‘asantaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā, etaṃ pāpicchalakkhaṇa’’nti (vibha. aṭṭha. 851). Mahantāni vatthūni icchati, mahatī vā tassa icchāti mahiccho, tassa bhāvo ^b^mahicchatā^eb^. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘santaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā, etaṃ mahicchalakkhaṇa’’nti. Paccavekkhamāno nivāressatīti yojanā. ^b^Assa^eb^ bhikkhuno ^b^saṃvattissati^eb^ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhepo.

[03]Mahiccho puggalo yathā paccayadānavasena paccayadāyakehi bharituṃ asakkuṇeyyo, evaṃ paccayapariyesanavasena attanāpīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘attanopi^eb^^a^M1.0187^ea^^b^upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo hotī’’^eb^ti. Saddhādeyyassa vinipātavasena pavattiyā ^b^aññassa ghare chaḍḍento^eb^. ^b^Rittapattovā^eb^ti yesu kulesu paṭipiṇḍavasena pavattati, tesaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ attano yathāladdhaṃ datvā tattha kiñci aladdhā rittapatto ^b^vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati^eb^ jighacchādubbalyenāti adhippāyo. Yathāladdhapaccayaparibhogena, puna pariyesanānāpajjanena attano subharatā, yathāladdhapaccayena avaññaṃ akatvā santosāpattiyā upaṭṭhākānaṃ subharatā veditabbā.

[03]^b^Kathāvatthūnī^eb^ti appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ kathānaṃ vatthūnīti kathāvatthūni, appicchatādayo eva. ^b^Tīṇī^eb^ti tīṇi kathāvatthūni. ^b^Abhisallekhikā^eb^ti ativiya kilese sallikhatīti abhisallekho, appiccha tādiguṇasamudāyo, so etissā atthīti abhisallekhikā, mahicchatādīnaṃ tanubhāvāya yuttarūpā appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttatā. ^b^Cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā^eb^ti kusalacittuppattiyā nivārakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovinīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā. Samathavipassanācittasseva vā vibhūtibhāvakaraṇāya sappāyā upakārikāti ^b^cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā^eb^. ^b^Ekantanibbidāyā^eb^tiādi yena nibbidādiānisaṃsena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ca nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ekantanibbidāyā^eb^ti ekaṃsena vaṭṭadukkhato nibbindanatthāya. ^b^Virāgāya nirodhāyā^eb^ti tasseva virajjanatthañca nirujjhanatthañca. ^b^Upasamāyā^eb^ti sabbakilesavūpasamāya. ^b^Abhiññāyā^eb^ti sabbassapi abhiññeyyassa abhijānanāya. ^b^Sambodhāyā^eb^ti catumaggasambodhāya. ^b^Nibbānāyā^eb^ti anupādisesanibbānāya. Etesu hi ādito tīhi vipassanā vuttā, puna tīhi maggo, itarena nibbānaṃ. Tena samathavipassanā ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sambhavatīti dasseti. ^b^Paripūressantī^eb^ti taṃsabhāvato upakārato ^a^V1.0168^ea^ ca saṃvattissanti. Appicchatādayo hi ekavārauppannā upari tadatthāya saṃvattissanti. Kathāvatthuparipūraṇaṃ sikkhāparipūraṇañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Amataṃ nibbāna^eb^nti anupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ. Itarā pana sekkhāsekkhadhammapāripūriyā paripuṇṇā. Nibbānapāripūri cettha tadāvahadhammapāripūrivasena pariyāyato ^a^M1.0188^ea^ vuttāti veditabbā. Idāni yāyaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ anukkamaparivuddhiyā guṇapāripūritā, taṃ upamāya sādhento ^b^‘‘seyyathāpī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^pāvussako^eb^ti vassānamāse uṭṭhito. So hi cirānuppavatti hoti. ^b^Pabbatakandarā^eb^ pabbatesu upaccakādhiccakāpabhavanijjharādinadiyo. ^b^Sarasākhā^eb^ti yattha upariunnatapadesato udakaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati ceva sandati ca, te. ^b^Kusobbhā^eb^ khuddakataḷākā. ^b^Kunnadiyo^eb^ti pabbatapādato nikkhantā khuddakanadiyo. Tā hi mahānadiyo otarantiyo paripūrenti. ^b^Paramadhammadāyāda^eb^nti paramaṃ uttamaṃ dhammadāyādabhāvaṃ, paramaṃ dhammadāyajjaṃ vā. ^b^Te bhikkhū^eb^ti te dhammapaṭiggāhake bhikkhū. ^b^Sanniyojento^eb^ti mūlaguṇehi appicchatādīhi yojento.

[03]^b^Uggahetvā^eb^ti atthato byañjanato ca upadhāraṇavasena gahetvā aviparītaṃ gahetvā. ^b^Saṃsandetvā^eb^ti mama desanānusārena mamajjhāsayaṃ avirajjhitvā. Yathā idheva ^b^cintesī^eb^ti yathā imissā dhammadāyādadesanāya cintesi, evaṃ aññatthāpi dhammathomanatthaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisanto cintesi. ^b^Ekajjhāsayāyā^eb^ti samānādhippāyāya. ^b^Matiyā^eb^ti paññāya. ^b^Ayaṃ desanā aggā^eb^tiādi bhagavā dhammasenāpatiṃ guṇato eva paggaṇhātīti katvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Cittagatiyā^eb^ti cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena ‘‘ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū’’ti kāyassa cittena samānagatikatādhiṭṭhānena. Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattanacittena samānagatiko hotīti? Na sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti. Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattituṃ sakkoti, ‘‘idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū’’ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti, tāva kāyagatiṃ anulomentameva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatikaṃ katvā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū’’ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva lahusaññāya sukhumasaññāya ca sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahuṃ katipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti ^a^M1.0189^ea^, evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatikabhāveneva pariṇāmito nāma hoti, na ekacittakkhaṇeneva pavattiyā. Evañca katvā ^a^V1.0169^ea^ bāhusamiñjanappasāraṇūpamāpi upacārena vinā suṭṭhutaraṃ yuttā hoti, aññathā dhammatāvilomitā siyā. Na hi dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ iddhibalena kātuṃ sakkā, bhāvaññathattameva pana sakkāti.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṃ^eb^ bhikkhūnañca ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvāti vacanaseso. Desakāle viya bhājanampi oloketvā eva mahāthero dhammaṃ katheti. ^b^Pakkantassā^eb^ti idaṃ anādare sāmivacananti dassento ^b^‘‘pakkantassa sato’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kittakenā^eb^ti kena parimāṇena. Taṃ pana parimāṇaṃ yasmā parimeyyassa atthassa paricchindanaṃ hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘kittāvatāti paricchedavacana’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Nukāro pucchāya^eb^nti ayaṃ nu-saddo idheva pucchāyaṃ āgatoti katvā vuttaṃ. Nu-saddena hettha jotiyamāno attho kiṃ-saddena parimāṇo attho parimeyyattho ca. Ettha saṃkilesapakkho vivekassa ananusikkhanaṃ āmisadāyādatā, vodānapakkho tassa anusikkhanaṃ dhammadāyādatāti. ^b^Tīhi vivekehī^eb^ti vivekattayaggahaṇaṃ tadantogadhattā vivekapañcakassa. Vivekapañcakaggahaṇe panassa sarūpena kāyaviveko gahito na siyā, tadāyattattā vā satthārā tadā payujjamānavivekadassanavasena ^b^‘‘tīhi vivekehī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aññatarampī^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi kāyavivekamattena dhammadāyādabhāvo sijjhatīti? Na, vivekadvayasannissayasseva kāyavivekassa idhādhippetattā. Evañca katvā cittavivekaggahaṇampi samatthitaṃ hoti. Na hi lokiyajjhānādhigamamattena nippariyāyato satthudhammadāyādabhāvo icchito, nibbānādhigamena pana so icchito, tasmā sabbāpi sāsane vivekānusikkhanā nibbānapoṇā nibbānapabbhārā nibbānogadhā cāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatarampī’’^eb^ti. Asati āloke andhakāro viya asati dhammadāyādatāya ekaṃsiyā āmisadāyādatāti āha ^b^‘‘āmisadāyādāva hontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Esa nayo sukkapakkhepī^eb^ti kaṇhapakkhato sādhāraṇavasena labbhamānaṃ atthasāmaññaṃ atidisati, na atthavisesaṃ tassa visadisattā, atthavisesameva vā atidisati visadisūdāharaṇūpāyañāyena. ‘‘Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatara’’nti idaṃ idha na labbhati. Tayopi ^a^M1.0190^ea^ hi vivekā, tesu eko vā itaradvayasannissayo idha labbhati.

[03]^b^Dūratopī^eb^ti dūraṭṭhānatopi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tiroraṭṭhatopī’’^eb^tiādi. Kāmaṃ ‘‘paṭibhātū’’ti ettha paṭi-saddāpekkhāya ‘‘sāriputta’’nti upayogavacanaṃ, attho pana sāmivacanavaseneva veditabboti dassento āha ^b^‘‘āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhāgo hotū^eb^ti iminābhāgattho paṭi-saddoti dasseti lakkhaṇādiatthānaṃ idha ayujjanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ saddalakkhaṇena sametī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dissatū^eb^ti ñāṇena dissatu, passatūti vā attho. ^b^Upaṭṭhātū^eb^ti ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatu. ^b^Uggahessantī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0170^ea^ vācuggataṃ karissanti. Vācuggatakaraṇañhi uggaho. ^b^Pariyāpuṇissantī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Puripucchanādinā vā atthassa citte āpādanaṃ paṭṭhapanaṃ pariyāpuṇanaṃ. ^b^Kāraṇavacana^eb^nti yathāvuttassa kāraṇabhāvena vacanaṃ ‘‘hetumhi karaṇavacana’’nti katvā. Vuttatthapaccāmasanaṃ taṃ-saddena karīyatīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yasmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ekenevākārenā^eb^ti āmisadāyādatāsiddhena ādiyatāsaṅkhātena ekeneva pakārena. Tameva hi ākāraṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘bhagavatā vuttamattha’’^eb^nti. Aññathā ‘‘satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’ti ekeneva ākārena so attho therenapi vutto. ^b^Tīhi ākārehī^eb^ti āmisadāyādapaṭipadābhūtehi tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ ananusikkhanākārehi. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ^b^‘‘idhāvuso…pe… nānusikkhantī’’^eb^ti ettakena kaṇhapakkhe uddesapāṭhena.

[03]^b^Vitthārato suvibhatto hoti^eb^ anavasesato sammadeva niddiṭṭhattā. Nanu ca uddese satthunopi ādiyatā bhagavatā gahitā, sā na niddiṭṭhāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘so ca kho’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sāvake anuggaṇhantassā^eb^ti ‘‘āmisadāyādā satthu sāvakā’’ti satthu parappavādapariharaṇatthampi ‘‘tumhehi dhammadāyādehi bhavitabba’’nti evaṃ sāvake anukampamānassa. Sāvakānaṃ taṃ na yuttaṃ sāmīciabhāvatoti yojanā. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti yadidaṃ ‘‘ettāvatāyaṃ bhagavā’’tiādinā kaṇhapakkhe uddesassa atthavibhāgadassanamukhena sambandhadassanaṃ, esa nayo sukkapakkhepi sambandhadassaneti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ tāvettha anusandhikkamayojanā’’^eb^ti, satthārā desitāya uddesadesanāya mahātherena ^a^M1.0191^ea^ desitāya ca anusandhikkamena sambandhoti attho. Yathānusandhi eva cettha anusandhi veditabbo.

[03]^b^Accantapavivittassā^eb^ti ekantaupadhiviveko viya itarepi viveko satthu ekantikāvāti. Anusikkhanaṃ nāma anu anu pūraṇanti tappaṭikkhepena āha ^b^‘‘na paripūrentī’’^eb^ti, na paribrūhentīti attho, ^b^na paripūrentī^eb^ti vā na paripālentīti attho. Yadaggena hi vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti, tadaggena na paribrūhenti, na paripālentīti vā vattabbataṃ labhantīti. Kasmā panettha ‘‘vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’’ti uddese viya avisesavacane kāyavivekasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yadi panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pucchāyā^eb^ti pucchāto aviseso siyā vibhāgassa alabbhamānattā vissajjanassa. Nanu ca ‘‘vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’’ti avisesavacanato pāḷiyaṃ vibhāgo na labbhatevāti? Na, padantarena vibhāvitattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yesañca dhammāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Byākaraṇapakkho^eb^ti vissajjanapakkho. Vissajjanañca na pucchā viya avisesajotanā ^a^V1.0171^ea^, atha kho yathādhippetatthavibhajananti adhippāyo. ^b^Iminā padenā^eb^ti ‘‘vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’’ti iminā padena kāyavivekaṃ aparipūriyamānaṃ dassetīti adhippāyo. ^b^Cittavivekaṃ upadhiviveka^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Ettha ca nappajahantī^eb^ti pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānābhāvavacanaṃ pahānalakkhaṇavivekābhāvadīpanaṃ, taṃ vatvā puna ‘‘viveke nikkhittadhurā’’ti vacanaṃ tato sātisayavivekābhāvadīpananti tadubhayavivekābhāvadassanena ‘‘yesañca dhammāna’’ntiādināva pārisesañāyena ‘‘vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’’ti iminā vivekadvayamūlabhūtakāyavivekābhāvadassanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā, bahulā eva ^b^bāhulikā^eb^ yathā ‘‘venayiko’’ti (ma. ni. 1.246; a. ni. 8.11; pārā. 8). Te pana yasmā paccayabahulabhāvāya yuttappayuttā nāma honti, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā’’^eb^ti. Sikkhāya ādarabhāvābhāvato sithilaṃ adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti ^b^‘‘sāthalikā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sithila^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, sithila-saddena vā samānatthassa sāthala-saddassa vasena ^b^‘‘sāthalikā’’^eb^ti padasiddhi veditabbā. ^b^Avagamanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhogamanaṭṭhena ^a^M1.0192^ea^, orambhāgiyabhāvenāti attho. ^b^Upadhiviveke^eb^ti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggatāya upadhīhi vivitte. ^b^Oropitadhurā^eb^ti ujjhitussāhā.

[03]^b^Aniyamenevā^eb^ti kiñci visesaṃ anāmasitvā ‘‘sāvakā’’ti aviseseneva. ^b^Niyamento^eb^‘‘therā’’tiādinā. ^b^Dasavasse upādāyā^eb^ti dasavassato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Issariye^eb^ti ‘‘seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ senāpatiṭṭhāna’’ntiādīsu viya. Acirakkhaṇobhāsena lakkhavedhako ^b^akkhaṇavedhi^eb^. ^b^Ṭhitiya^eb^nti avaṭṭhāne. ^b^Ṭhānaso^eb^ti taṅkhaṇeyeva. ^b^Tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti ādhārādheyyabhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘tadāyattavuttibhāvenā’’^eb^ti. Upekkhānubrūhanā sattasaṅkhāresu udāsīnatāpi asaṅkhatādhigamassa upāyoti tabbipariyāyato cīvarādimaṇḍanā na upadhivivekapāripūriyā saṃvattatīti āha ^b^‘‘cīvarapatta…pe… apūrayamānā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti theravāre. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti majjhimanavakavāresu. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘majjhimatherakāle’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imasmiñca kaṇhapakkhe^eb^ti imasmiñca niddesavāre kaṇhapakkhe, na uddesavāre kaṇhapakkhe. Uddesavāre pana kaṇhapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena gahetabbattho ‘‘esa nayo sukkapakkhepī’’ti atidesena dassito. ^b^Vuttapaccanīkanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘kāyavivekaṃ nānusikkhanti na paripūrentī’’tiādinā vuttassa atthassa paccanīkanayena, ‘‘kāyavivekaṃ anusikkhanti paripūrentī’’tiādinā ^a^V1.0172^ea^ nayena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ sukkapakkhe. ^b^Saṅkhepo^eb^ti atthasaṅkhepo. ^b^Yojanaparamparāyā^eb^ti gāmantato dūrabhāvena ekaṃ dve tīṇīti evaṃ yojanānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā. ^b^Araññavanapatthānī^eb^ti araññesu vanasaṇḍabhūtāni. ^b^Pantānī^eb^ti pariyantāni. ^b^Upagantuṃ yuttakālo^eb^ jarājiṇṇakālo gocaragāme dūre gamanāgamanasamatthatābhāvato. ‘‘Evaṃ guṇavantesu dinnaṃ aho sudinna’’nti ^b^paccayadāyakānaṃ pasādaṃ janenti^eb^. ^b^Pāsaṃsā^eb^ti pasaṃsitabbā. ^b^Ayampi mahāthero^eb^tiādi ekaṃ appamādavihārinaṃ vuddhataraṃ niddisitvā vadantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Paviṭṭho^eb^ vivekaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Sāyaṃ nikkhamati^eb^ yonisomanasikāraṃ upabrūhetvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti,^eb^ na yaṃ kiñci kiccantaraṃ. ^b^Samāpattiyo nibbatteti,^eb^ na moghamanasikāraṃ. ^b^Sabbathā^eb^tiādito tāva tadaṅgavasena kilesehi cittaṃ vivecento tato vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena paṭipassaddhivasenāti sabbappakārena cittavivekaṃ pūreti. ^b^Paṃsukūlāni dhāretī^eb^ti iminā bāhulikatābhāvaṃ dasseti, ^b^asithilaṃ sāsanaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0193^ea^^b^gahetvā^eb^ti iminā sāthalikatābhāvaṃ, ^b^vigatanīvaraṇo^eb^ti iminā okkamane nikkhittadhurataṃ, ^b^phalasamāpattinti^eb^ādinā pavivekapubbaṅgamataṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatrāvuso^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. Tena ‘‘lobho ca pāpako’’tiādinayappavattaṃ uparidesanaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyati. ^b^Ko anusandhī^eb^ti yā sā bhagavatā saṃkilesapakkhena saha dhammadāyādapaṭipattibhāvinī ‘‘dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā’’tiādinā desanā uddiṭṭhā, taṃ ‘‘satthu pavivittassa viharato’’tiādinā ārabhitvā aṭṭhārasavārapaṭimaṇḍitāya niddesadesanāya vibhajitvā tato paraṃ ‘‘tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako’’tiādinayāya uparidesanāya sambandhaṃ pucchati. ^b^Eva^eb^nti saṃkilesapakkhe ‘‘nappajahantī’’ti pahānābhāvadassanavasena, vodānapakkhe ‘‘pajahantī’’ti pahānasabbhāvadassanavasenāti evaṃ. Aniddhāritasarūpā yaṃ-taṃ-saddehi dhamma-saddena sāmaññato ye pahātabbadhammā vuttā, te sarūpato dassetunti yojanā. ^b^Ime teti^eb^ ettha kasmā lobhādayo eva pahātabbadhammā vuttā, nanu ito aññepi mohadiṭṭhivicikicchādayo pahātabbadhammā santīti? Saccaṃ santi, te pana lobhādīhi tadekaṭṭhatā gahitā eva hontīti vuttā. Atha vā imesaṃyevettha gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.

[03]Idāni upacayena anusandhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sāvakānaṃ yassa dhammassa dāyādabhāvo satthu abhirucito, so ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetī’’tiādinā akatthetvā ‘‘vivekaṃ anusikkhanti, te ca dhamme pajahanti, na ca bāhulikā’’tiādinā kathitattā ^a^V1.0173^ea^^b^heṭṭhā pariyāyeneva dhammo kathito^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Te ca dhamme nappajahanti, okkamane pubbaṅgamā’’tiādinā ^b^āmisaṃ pariyāyenapi kathitaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Siyā ca me piṇḍapāto’’tiādinā, ‘‘bāhulikā ca hontī’’tiādinā ca ^b^āmisaṃ nippariyāyenapi kathitaṃ^eb^. Atha vā yāyaṃ bhagavatā āmisadāyādapaṭikkhepanā dhammadāyādatā vuttā, yañca tadatthaṃ vibhajantena mahātherena attanā vivekānusikkhanādi vuttaṃ, tadubhayaṃ hetuvasena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatrāvuso, lobho cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ ^a^M1.0194^ea^. Hetunirodhena hi saṃkilesapakkhassa, nirodhahetusampādanena ca vodānapakkhassa tappāpakatā.

[03]^b^Atītadesanānidassana^eb^nti atītāya therena yathādesitāya desanāya ca paccāmasanaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘satthu pavivittassa…pe… desanāyanti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti yaṃ vuttaṃ visesato ‘‘yesaṃ dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāhā’’ti, etasmiṃ pade. Tattha hi pahātabbadhammā lobhādayo sāmaññato vuttā. ^b^Lāmakā^eb^ti nihīnā. Lobhadosā hi hetuto paccayato sabhāvato phalato nissandato saṃkiliṭṭhapakatikā, āyatiṃ dukkhassa pāpanaṭṭhena vā pāpakā. ^b^Lubbhanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti ārammaṇassa abhigijjhanalakkhaṇo. Tathā hi so lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti ‘‘lobho’’ti vuccati. Rasādīsu abhisaṅgaraso, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno, saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno. ^b^Dussanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti ārammaṇe byāpajjanalakkhaṇo. Tathā hi so dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti ‘‘doso’’ti vuccati. Rasādīsu visappanaraso, sanissayadahanaraso vā, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno, āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno.

[03]^b^Tesū^eb^tiādinā dassanena lobhadosānaṃ ekantato pahātabbatādassanaṃ. ^b^Āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṃ lābhe hotī^eb^ti idaṃ lobhassa ārammaṇaggahaṇasabhāvataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṇhāya vasena pana anugijjhanaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘aladdhaṃ patthetī’’^eb^ti āha. Alābhe paccayānaṃ āmisadāyādassa hotīti ānetvā yojanā. ^b^Alabhanto^eb^ti ettha ‘‘paccaye’’ti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Vighātavā^eb^ti ‘‘yampicchaṃ na labhati, tampi dukkha’’nti (ma. ni. 1.120; vibha. 190) vacanato icchāvighātavā. Lobho ca deyyadhamme hoti āmisadāyādassāti sambandho. Esa nayo anantarapadepi. ^b^Deyyadhamme^eb^ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ sattakelāyanādivasenapi tassa lobhuppattisabbhāvato. ‘‘Taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho’’ti evamādayo ^b^nava taṇhāmūlakā. Paripūreti^eb^ āmisadāyādoti vibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo. Āvāsamacchariyādīni ^b^pañca macchariyāni^eb^.

[03]^b^Magga^eb^nti ^a^V1.0174^ea^^a^M1.0195^ea^ ariyamaggaṃ. So hi kilese mārento gacchati, nibbānatthikehi ca maggīyati, sayaṃ vā sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nibbānaṃ maggatīti nippariyāyena ‘‘maggo’’ti vuccati. ^b^Eko anto^eb^ti itarena asammisso eko koṭṭhāso, hīnatāya vā lāmakaṭṭhena ^b^eko anto^eb^. Kāmaṃ aññepi kusaladhammā ete ante asampayogato na upenti, tehi vimuttā eva, ayaṃ pana accantavimuttiyā na upetīti āha ^b^‘‘vimutto etehi antehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti antadvayavimuttattā. ^b^Etesaṃ majjhe bhavattā^eb^ti idaṃ maggassa ubhayantavimuttatāya eva vuttaṃ, na tappariyāpannatāya, vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi paṭipajjitabbato ca. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti yathā itarena asammissaṭṭhena lāmakaṭṭhena ca lobho eko anto, tathā ^b^kāmasukhallikānuyogo^eb^ti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Maggassa anupagamanañca nesaṃ antānaṃ sabbaso appavattikaraṇeneva daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Purimanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘ete dve ante na upetī’’tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.

[03]^b^Saccāna^eb^nti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ. ^b^Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti dassanassa pariññābhisamayādibhedassa parito sabbathā nayanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena. ^b^Cakkhukaraṇī^eb^ti dhammacakkhussa karaṇī nipphādikā. Tayidaṃ satipi paṭipadāya dhammacakkhuto anaññatte avayavavasena sijjhamāno attho samudāyena kato nāma hotīti upacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati ^b^‘‘maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṃvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ñāṇāyāti^eb^ yāthāvato jānanāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘viditakaraṇaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. Visesañātabhāvāpādanañhi viditakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Vūpasamanato^eb^ti samucchindanavasena vūpasamanato. Dukkhādīnaṃ pariññeyyādibhāvo viya abhiññeyyabhāvopi maggavaseneva pākaṭo hotīti āha ^b^‘‘catunnampi saccānaṃ abhiññeyyabhāvadassanato’’^eb^ti, vibhāvanatoti attho. ^b^Sambodhoti maggo^eb^ ‘‘sambujjhati etenā’’ti katvā. ^b^Tassatthāyā^eb^ti maggakiccatthāya. Na hi maggato añño maggakiccakaro atthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggoyeva hī’’^eb^tiādi. Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā sahajātādipaccayabhāvena itare uppādeti, evaṃ sesamaggadhammāpīti evampi maggatthāya saṃvattanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sacchikiriyāya paccakkhakammāyā^eb^ti sacchikaraṇasaṅkhātapaccakkhakammāya. ^b^Nibbānāyā^eb^ti vā anupādisesanibbānāya. ^b^Upasamāyāti^eb^^a^M1.0196^ea^ iminā saupādisesanibbānaṃ gahitanti. ^b^Aya^eb^nti ‘‘sā hi saccāna’’ntiādinā yathāvutto atthanayo. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘cakkhukaraṇī’’tiādīsu padesu. ^b^Sāro^eb^ sundaro anapanīto. ^b^Ito aññathā^eb^ti ‘‘dukkhassa pariññāya diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ karotīti cakkhukaraṇī’’tiādinā atthavaṇṇanāpapañco kevalaṃ vitthāratthāya.

[03]^b^Ayamevā^eb^ti ettha ^b^aya^eb^nti iminā attano aññesañca tassaṃ parisāyaṃ ariyānaṃ maggassa ^a^V1.0175^ea^ paccakkhabhāvaṃ dasseti. Āsannapaccakkhavācī hi ayaṃ-saddo. ^b^Aññamaggapaṭisedhanattha^eb^nti aññassa nibbānagāmimaggassa atthibhāvapaṭisedhanatthaṃ. Sattāpaṭikkhepo hi idha paṭisedhanaṃ alabbhamānattā aññassa maggassa. Buddhādīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvo anaññatā. Tenāha brahmā sahampati –
[21]‘‘Ekāyanaṃ jātikhayantadassī,
[27]Maggaṃ pajānāti hitānukampī;
[26]Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe,
[22]Tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha’’nti. (saṃ. ni. 5.384, 409; mahāni. 191; cūḷani. 107, 121; netti. 170);

[03]^b^Ārakattā^eb^ti iminā niruttinayena ariya-saddasiddhimāha. ^b^Aripahānāyā^eb^ti atthavacanamattaṃ. Arayo pāpadhammā yanti apagamanti etenāti ^b^ariyo^eb^. ^b^Ariyena desito^eb^ti ettha ariyassa bhagavato ayanti ^b^ariyo^eb^. ^b^Ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti ettha ariyakaro ^b^ariyo^eb^ti uttarapadalopena ariya-saddasiddhi veditabbā. Yasmā maggaṅgasamudāye maggavohāro hoti, samudāyo ca samudāyīhi samannāgato nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhahi aṅgehi upetattā’’^eb^ti, tasmā attano avayavabhūtāni aṭṭha aṅgāni etassa santīti ^b^aṭṭhaṅgiko^eb^. Yasmā pana paramatthato aṅgāniyeva maggo, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na ca aṅgavinimutto’’^eb^ti yathā ‘‘chaḷaṅgo vedo’’ti. Sadisūdāharaṇaṃ pana dassento ^b^‘‘pañcaṅgikatūriyādīni viyā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena caturaṅginī senāti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Mārento gacchatī^eb^ti niruttinayena saddasiddhimāha. ^b^Maggatī^eb^ti gavesati. Ariyamaggo hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonto taṃ gavesanto viya hotīti. ^b^Maggīyati nibbānatthikehi^eb^ vivaṭṭūpanissayapuññakaraṇato ^a^M1.0197^ea^ paṭṭhāya tadatthaṃ paṭipattito. ^b^Gammatī^eb^ti etena ādiantavipariyāyena saddasiddhimāha yathā ‘‘kakū’’ti. ^b^‘‘Seyyathidanti nipāto’’^eb^ti vatvā tassa sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanasādhāraṇatāya ^b^‘‘katamāni tāni aṭṭhaṅgānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Nanu ca aṅgāni samuditāni maggo antamaso sattaṅgavikalassa ariyamaggassa abhāvatoti? Saccametaṃ saccapaṭivedhena, maggapaccayatāya pana yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇena paccekampi tāni maggoyevāti āha ^b^‘‘ekamekañhi aṅgaṃ maggoyevā’’^eb^ti, aññathā samuditānampi nesaṃ maggakiccaṃ na sambhaveyyāti. Idāni tamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ ^b^‘‘sammādiṭṭhimaggo ceva hetu cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Sammā aviparītaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ^a^V1.0176^ea^ etissāti ^b^sammādassanalakkhaṇā^eb^. Sammā aviparītaṃ sampayuttadhamme nibbānārammaṇe abhiniropanaṃ appanālakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^sammāabhiniropanalakkhaṇo^eb^ musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato siniddhasabhāvattā sampayuttadhamme, sammāvācappaccayasubhāsitasotārañca janaṃ sammadeva pariggaṇhātīti sammāvācā sammāpariggaho lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti ^b^sammāpariggahalakkhaṇā^eb^. Yathā kāyikā kiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hoti, tathā sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipīti ^b^sammāsamuṭṭhānalakkhaṇo sammākammanto^eb^. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya. Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā suddhi vodānaṃ, ājīvasseva vā jīvitappavattiyā suddhi vodānaṃ etenāti ^b^sammāvodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo^eb^. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ ^b^paggaho^eb^. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, tassa vā anissajjanaṃ ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Ārammaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ sammā, samaṃ vā ādhānaṃ ^b^samādhānaṃ^eb^. Sammā saṅkappeti sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhiniropetīti ^b^sammāsaṅkappo^eb^. Sammā vadati etāyāti ^b^sammāvācā^eb^. Sammā karoti etenāti sammākammaṃ, tadeva ^b^sammākammanto^eb^. Sammā ājīvati etenāti ^b^sammāājīvo^eb^. Sammā vāyamati ussahati etenāti ^b^sammāvāyāmo^eb^. Sammā sarati anussaratīti ^b^sammāsati^eb^^a^M1.0198^ea^. Sammā samādhiyati cittaṃ etenāti ^b^sammāsamādhī^eb^ti evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Micchādiṭṭhi^eb^nti sabbampi micchādassanaṃ. ^b^Tappaccanīyakilese^eb^ti ettha ^b^taṃ^eb^-saddena sammādiṭṭhi. Na hi micchādiṭṭhiyā kilesā paccanīyā, atha kho sammādiṭṭhiyā. ^b^Avijjañcā^eb^ti avijjāggahaṇaṃ tassā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pamukhabhāvato. Tenāha ‘‘avijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1). Dassananivārakassa sammohassa samugghātena ^b^asammohato^eb^. Ettha ca ^b^micchādiṭṭhiṃ…pe… pajahatī^eb^ti etena pahānābhisamayaṃ, ^b^nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotī^eb^ti etena sacchikiriyābhisamayaṃ, ^b^sampayuttadhamme^eb^tiādinā bhāvanābhisamayaṃ sammādiṭṭhikiccaṃ dasseti. Pariññābhisamayo pana nānantariyatāya atthato vutto eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Kathaṃ pana ekameva ñāṇaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri kiccāni sādhentaṃ pavattati. Na hi tādisaṃ loke diṭṭhaṃ, na āgamo vā tādiso atthīti na vattabbaṃ. Yathā hi padīpo ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe vaṭṭiṃ dahati, snehaṃ pariyādiyati, andhakāraṃ vidhamati, ālokañca vidaṃseti, evametaṃ ñāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudayepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^a^V1.0177^ea^, dukkhanirodhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇanti ^b^suttapadaṃ^eb^ (vibha. 754) ettha udāharitabbaṃ. Yathā ca sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge dukkhādīsu visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe ekāva catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati, evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādayo pubbabhāge nekkhammasaṅkappādināmakā hutvā kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ pajahanavasena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ catunnañca kiccaṃ sādhentā pavattanti. Sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānāyeva hutvā pavattatīti kāmañcettha sammādiṭṭhiyā sabbepi pāpadhammā paṭipakkhā, ujuvipaccanīkatādassanavasena pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccaniddese micchādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Teneva ca ^b^‘‘tappaccanīyakilese cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Yesaṃ kilesānaṃ anupacchindane sammādiṭṭhi na uppajjeyya, te micchādiṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhatāya tadekaṭṭhāva tappaccanīyakilesā daṭṭhabbā. Sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ kiccaniddesepi eseva nayo. Sotāpattimaggādivasena cattāro lokuttaramaggabhāvasāmaññena ekato katvā. Lobhadosā samudayasaccaṃ, yassa pana so samudayo taṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, pahānabhāvo maggasaccaṃ, yattha taṃ ^a^M1.0199^ea^ pahānaṃ, taṃ nirodhasaccanti imāni cattāri saccāni. Kasmā panettha lobhadosānaṃ visuṃ ādito ca gahaṇaṃ? Visuṃ gahaṇaṃ tāva tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena, imehi lobhadosehi āmisadāyādatā, tappahānena ca dhammadāyādatāti dassanatthaṃ, tadanusārena catusaccayojanāya evaṃ ekekassa niyyānamukhaṃ hotīti dassanatthañca. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. Ādito gahaṇaṃ pana ativiya oḷārikatāya supākaṭabhāvato vakkhamānānaṃ aññesañca pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhāvato tadekaṭṭhatāya ca veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Kujjhanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti kuppanasabhāvo, cittassa byāpajjanāti attho. ^b^Caṇḍikkaṃ^eb^ luddatā, kururabhāvoti attho. ^b^Āghātakaraṇaraso^eb^ti ‘‘anatthaṃ me acarī’’tiādinā citte āghātassa karaṇaraso. ^b^Dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^ti saparasantānassa vināsanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto. ^b^Upanandhanaṃ^eb^ nānappakārassa uparūpari nandhanaṃ viya hotīti katvā. Tathā hesa ^b^‘‘verāppaṭinissajjanaraso, kodhānupabandhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno’’^eb^ti ca vutto. ^b^Aparakāle upanāhotiādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘upanayhanā upanayhitattaṃ āṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkamma’’ntiādīnaṃ (vibha. 891) niddesapadānaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ saṅgayhati. Upanāhasamaṅgī hi puggalo verassa anissajjanato ādittapūtialātaṃ viya jalati eva, cittañcassa dhoviyamānaṃ acchacammaṃ viya, masimakkhitapilotikā viya ca na sujjhateva.

[03]^b^Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0178^ea^ udakapuñchaniyā udakaṃ viya paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanasabhāvo. Tathābhūto cāyaṃ attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkheti evāti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hessa saparasantānesu guṇaṃ makkhetīti ^b^makkho^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Yugaggāho^eb^ samadhuraggahaṇaṃ asamānassapi abhūtassa samāropanaṃ. Samabhāvakaraṇaṃ ^b^samīkaraṇaṃ^eb^. Paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena attano guṇānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti āha ^b^‘‘paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno’’^eb^ti. Tathā hesa paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attano guṇehi same karotīti ^b^paḷāso^eb^ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Parasampattikhīyanaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0200^ea^ parasampattiyā usūyanaṃ. Issati parasampattiṃ na sahatīti ^b^issā^eb^. Tathā hesā ^b^‘‘parasampattiyā akkhamanalakkhaṇā’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti parasampattiyaṃ. ^b^Anabhiratirasā^eb^ abhiratipaṭipakkhakiccā. ^b^Vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ parasampattiṃ passitumpi appadānato. ^b^Nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanato. ^b^Asukhāyanaṃ^eb^ na sukhanaṃ dukkhanaṃ, arocananti adhippāyo.

[03]Katassa kāyaduccaritādipāpassa paṭicchādanaṃ ^b^katapāpapaṭicchādanaṃ^eb^. Tassa pāpassa āvaraṇabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā,^eb^ māyā, yāya samannāgato puggalo bhasmachanno viya aṅgāro, udakachanno viya khāṇu, pilotikapaṭicchāditaṃ viya ca satthaṃ hoti. ^b^Avijjamānaguṇappakāsanaṃ^eb^ attani avijjamānasīlādiguṇavibhāvanaṃ, yena sāṭheyyena samannāgatassa puggalassa asantaguṇasambhāvanena cittānurūpakiriyāviharato ‘‘evaṃcitto, evaṃkiriyo’’ti dubbiññeyyattā kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā. Yato –
[21]‘‘Vāmena sūkaro hoti, dakkhiṇena ajāmigo;
[22]Sarena nelako hoti, visāṇena jaraggavo’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.296; vibha. aṭṭha. 894; mahāni. aṭṭha. 166) –
[07]Evaṃ vuttayakkasūkarasadiso hoti.

[03]^b^Cittassa uddhumātabhāvo^eb^ thaddhalūkhabhāvo. ^b^Appatissayavuttī^eb^ti anivātavutti. Amaddavākārena paccupatiṭṭhati, amaddavataṃ vā paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^amaddavatāpaccupaṭṭhāno,^eb^ thambho, yena samannāgato puggalo gilitanaṅgalasīso viya ajagaro, vātabharitabhastā viya ca thaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniye ca ^a^V1.0179^ea^ disvā onamitumpi na icchati, pariyanteneva carati. Karaṇassa uttarakiriyā ^b^karaṇuttariyaṃ^eb^. Visesato paccanīkabhāvo ^b^vipaccanīkatā^eb^. Parena hi kismiñci kate taddiguṇaṃ karaṇavasena ^b^sārambho^eb^ pavattati.
