Yathāvutta sīlavipatti ājīvavipattivasena ^b^dussīlo^eb^. ‘‘Iminā diṭṭhādinā ^a^V1.0214^ea^ idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ bhavissatī’’ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato ^b^kotūhalamaṅgaliko^eb^. ^b^Maṅgalaṃ paccetī^eb^ti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ maṅgalameva pattiyāyati. ^b^No kamma^eb^nti kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati. ^b^Ito bahiddhā^eb^ti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesatī^eb^ti duppaṭipannaṃ dakkhiṇārahasaññī gavesati. ^b^Pubbakāraṃ karotī^eb^ti dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamaṃ karoti. Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapariyesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.

[03]Vipattiyaṃ vuttavipariyāyena ^b^sampatti^eb^ ñātabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso – catunnampi parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ ^b^upāsakaratanaṃ^eb^. Guṇasobhākittisaddasugandhatāhi upāsakova padumaṃ ^b^upāsakapadumaṃ^eb^. Tathā ^b^upāsakapuṇḍarīko^eb^.

[03]^b^Ādimhī^eb^ti ādiatthe. ^b^Koṭiya^eb^nti pariyantakoṭiyaṃ. ^b^Vihāraggenā^eb^ti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena, ‘‘imasmiṃ gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ nāma panasaphalaṃ pāpuṇātī’’tiādinā taṃtaṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti attho. ^b^Ajjata^eb^nti ajjaicceva attho.

[03]^b^Pāṇehi^eb^^a^M1.0241^ea^^b^upeta^eb^nti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattatī’’^eb^tiādinā vatvā puna jīvitena taṃ vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento ‘‘saraṇagamanaṃ rakkhāmī’’ti uppannaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘ahañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pāṇehi upeta^eb^nti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ upetaṃ, upento ca na vācāmattena, na ekavāraṃ cittuppādanamattena, atha kho pāṇe pariccajitvāpi yāvajīvaṃ upetanti evamettha attho veditabboti.
[06]Upāsakavidhikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Bhayabheravasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āyasmā^eb^^a^V1.0215^ea^^b^sāriputto^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, evamādikanti attho. Tena ‘‘bhikkhū āmantesī’’tiādikaṃ sabbaṃ suttaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anaṅgaṇasutta’’^eb^nti. Tassa ko nikkhepo? Attajjhāsayo. Parehi anajjhiṭṭhoyeva hi mahāthero imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Keci panāhu ‘‘ekacce bhikkhū saṃkiliṭṭhacitte disvā tesaṃ cittasaṃkilesappahānāya ceva ekaccānaṃ āyatiṃ anuppādanāya ca ayaṃ desanā āraddhā’’ti. ^b^Evaṃ sabbasuttesū^eb^ti yathā ettha anaṅgaṇasutte, evaṃ ito paresūti sabbesupi suttesu anuttānāpubbapadavaṇṇanā eva karīyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Gaṇanaparicchedo^eb^ti gaṇanena paricchindanaṃ. Idañhi apparajakkhamahārajakkhatāvasena duvidhe satte paccekaṃ atthaññutānatthaññutāvasena dvidhā katvā ‘‘cattāro’’ti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. Vajjīputtakādayo viya puggalavādīti na gahetabbaṃ lokasamaññānusārena atthaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthānaṃ vasena desanāya āraddhattā, ayañca desanānayo satthu nissāya evāti dassento ^b^‘‘ayañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Tattha (a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.170) sammutiyā desanā ^b^sammutidesanā,^eb^ paramatthassa desanā ^b^paramatthadesanā^eb^. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti sammutiparamatthadesanāsu, na sammutiparamatthesu. Tenāha ^a^M1.0242^ea^^b^‘‘evarūpā sammutidesanā, evarūpā paramatthadesanā’’^eb^ti. Tatridaṃ sammutiparamatthānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ – yasmiṃ bhinne, buddhiyā avayavavinibbhoge vā kate na taṃsamaññā, sā ghaṭapaṭādippabhedā sammuti, tabbipariyāyato paramattho. Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati, tattha rūpādidhammaṃ samūhasantānavasena pavattamānaṃ upādāya puggalavohāroti āha ^b^‘‘puggaloti sammutidesanā’’^eb^ti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Uppādavayavanto sabhāvadhammā na niccāti āha ^b^‘‘aniccanti paramatthadesanā’’^eb^ti. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Nanu khandhadesanāpi sammutidesanāva. Khandhaṭṭho hi rāsaṭṭho, koṭṭhāsaṭṭho vāti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana khandhasamaññā phassādīsu tajjāpaññatti viya paramatthasannissayā tassa āsannatarā, puggalasamaññādayo viya na dūreti paramatthasaṅgahatā vuttā, khandhasīsena vā tadupādānā sabhāvadhammā eva gahitā. Nanu ca sabhāvadhammā sabbepi sammutimukheneva desanaṃ ārohanti, na samukhenāti sabbāpi desanā sammutidesanāva ^a^V1.0216^ea^ siyāti? Nayidamevaṃ desetabbadhammavibhāgena desanāvibhāgassa adhippetattā, na ca saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti.

[03]^b^Sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā^eb^ti ‘‘idhekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitāpānuyogamanuyutto’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 2.413; pu. pa. 10.25 mātikā) sammutimukhena pavattitaṃ desanaṃ sutamayañāṇuppādanavasena sutvā. ^b^Atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā^eb^ti tadanusārena catusaccasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ saha vipassanāya maggena paṭivijjhitvā. ^b^Mohaṃ pahāyā^eb^ti tadekaṭṭhehi kilesehi saddhiṃ anavasesaṃ mohaṃ pajahitvā. ^b^Visesa^eb^nti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ arahattasaṅkhātañca visesaṃ. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti tādisānaṃ vineyyānaṃ. ^b^Paramatthavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘pañcimāni, bhikkhave, indriyānī’’tiādinā (saṃ. ni. 5.472-474) paramatthadhammavasena. Sesaṃ anantaranaye vuttasadisameva. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tassaṃ sammutivasena paramatthavasena ca desanāyaṃ. ^b^Desabhāsākusalo^eb^ti nānādesabhāsāsu kusalo. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ vedāna^eb^nti nidassanamattaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ sippaganthānampīti adhippāyo sippuggahaṇañhi parato vakkhati. Sippāni vā vedantogadhe katvā ^b^‘‘tiṇṇaṃ vedāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Kathetabbabhāvena ṭhitāni,^eb^ na katthaci sannihitabhāvenāti vedānampi kathetabbabhāveneva avaṭṭhānaṃ dīpento ‘‘guyhā tayī ^a^M1.0243^ea^ nihitā gayhatī’’ti micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipati. Nānāvidhā desabhāsā etesanti ^b^nānādesabhāsā^eb^.

[03]Paramo uttamo attho ^b^paramattho,^eb^ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvo. Lokasaṅketamattasiddhā ^b^sammuti^eb^. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sammutikathāya saccatātiāha ^b^‘‘lokasammutikāraṇā’’^eb^ti, lokasamaññaṃ nissāya pavattanato. Lokasamaññāya hi abhinivesena vinā ñāpanā ekaccassa sutassa sāvanā viya na musā anatidhāvitabbato tassā. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘janapadaniruttiṃ nābhiniveseyya, samaññaṃ nātidhāveyyā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.332). ^b^Dhammāna^eb^nti sabhāvadhammānaṃ. ^b^Bhūtakāraṇā^eb^ti yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattanato. ^b^Sammutiṃ voharantassā^eb^ti ‘‘puggalo satto’’tiādinā lokasamaññaṃ kathentassa.

[03]^b^Hirottappadīpanattha^eb^nti lokapālanakicce hirottappadhamme kiccato pakāsetuṃ. Tesañhi kiccaṃ sattasantāneyeva pākaṭaṃ hotīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya taṃ vattabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Yasmiñhi cittuppāde kammaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃsantāne eva tassa phalassa uppatti ^b^kammassakatā^eb^. Evañhi kataviññāṇanāso akatāgamo vā natthīti sā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya ^a^V1.0217^ea^ dīpetabbā. Tehi sattehi kātabbā puññādikiriyā ^b^paccattapurisakāro^eb^pi santānavasena nipphādetabbato puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbo.

[03]^b^Ānantariyadīpanattha^eb^nti cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttāni, tannibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlāni, anantarapayojanāni vāti ^b^ānantariyāni,^eb^ mātughātādīni, tesaṃ dīpanatthaṃ. Tānipi hi santānavasena nipphādetabbato ‘‘mātaraṃ jīvitā voropetī’’tiādinā (paṭṭhā. 1.1.423) puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbāni, tathā ‘‘so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.556; 3.308; ma. ni. 1.77; 2.309; 3.230; vibha. 642, 643) ‘‘so anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati ekampi jāti’’ntiādinā (dī. ni. 1.244, 245; ma. ni. 1.148, 384, 431; pārā. 12) ‘‘atthi dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 3.381) ca pavattā ^b^brahmavihārapubbenivāsadakkhiṇāvisuddhikathā^eb^^a^M1.0244^ea^ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva kathāya dīpetabbā sattasantānavisayattā. ‘‘Aṭṭha purisapuggalā (saṃ. ni. 1.249), na samayavimutto puggalo’’tiādinā (pu. pa. 1) ca paramatthaṃ kathentopi lokasammutiyā appahānatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ kathesi. Etena vuttāvasesāya kathāya puggalādhiṭṭhānabhāve payojanaṃ sāmaññavasena saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmañcetaṃ sabbaṃ apariññātavatthukānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, pariññātavatthukānampi pana evaṃ desanā sukhāvahā hoti.

[03]^b^Mahājano^eb^ti lokiyamahājano. ^b^Na jānāti^eb^ ghanavinibbhogābhāvena dhammakiccassa asallakkhaṇena. Tattha ‘‘kiṃ nāmetaṃ, kathaṃ nāmeta’’nti saṃsayapakkhandatāya ^b^sammohaṃ āpajjati^eb^. Viruddhābhinivesitāya ^b^paṭisattu hoti^eb^. ^b^Jānāti^eb^ ciraparicitatthā vohārakathāya. Tato eva na ^b^sammohamāpajjati,^eb^ na paṭisattu hoti.

[03]^b^Nappajahanti^eb^ vohāramukhena paramatthassa dīpanato. Samaññāgahaṇavasena lokena ñāyati samaññāyati voharīyatīti lokasamaññā, tāya ^b^lokasamaññāya^eb^. Tassa tassa atthassa vibhāvane lokena nicchitaṃ, niyataṃ vā vuccati voharīyatīti lokanirutti, tassaṃ ^b^lokaniruttiyaṃ^eb^. Tathā lokena abhilapīyatīti lokasamaññatāya lokābhilāpo, tasmiṃ ^b^lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva^eb^ appahānato. Puggalavādino viya ^b^paramatthavasena aggahetvā^eb^.

[03]^b^Santo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0218^ea^ ettha ^b^santa^eb^saddo ‘‘dīghaṃ santassa yojana’’ntiādīsu (dha. pa. 70) kilantabhāve āgato, ‘‘ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā’’tiādīsu (vibha. 576) niruddhabhāve āgato, ‘‘adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.67; ma. ni. 1.281; 2.337; saṃ. ni. 2.172; mahāva. 7) santañāṇagocaratāya, ‘‘upasantassa sadā satimato’’tiādīsu (udā. 27) kilesavūpasame, ‘‘santo have sabbhi pavedayantī’’tiādīsu (dha. pa. 15) sādhūsu, ‘‘pañcime, bhikkhave, mahācorā santo saṃvijjamānā’’tiādīsu (pārā. 195) atthibhāve, idhāpi atthibhāveyeva. So ca puggalasambandhena vuttattā lokasamaññāvasenāti ^a^M1.0245^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘lokasaṅketavasena atthī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Atthī^eb^ti cetaṃ nipātapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ‘‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.373-374; ma. ni. 1.110; 3.154; a. ni. 6.29; 10.60) viya. ^b^Saṃvijjamānā^eb^ti padassa atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘upalabbhamānā’’^eb^ti āha. Yañhi saṃvijjati, taṃ upalabbhatīti. Aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgipuggalā nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti ^b^aṅgaṇāni,^eb^ rāgādayo. Añjati makkhetīti ^b^aṅgaṇaṃ,^eb^ malādi. Añjeti tattha ṭhitaṃ ahundaratāya abhibyañjetīti ^b^aṅgaṇaṃ,^eb^ vivaṭo bhūmipadeso. Dosādīnaṃ pavattiākāravisesatāya nānappakārā bahulappavattiyā ^b^tibbakilesā. Pāpakāna^eb^nti lāmakānaṃ. ^b^Akusalāna^eb^nti akosallasambhūtānaṃ. ^b^Icchāvacarāna^eb^nti icchāvasena pavattānaṃ. ^b^Saha aṅgaṇenā^eb^ti aṅgaṇanti laddhanāmena yathāvuttakilesena saha vattati.

[03]^b^Atthītipi na jānāti^eb^ tādisassa yonisomanasikārassa abhāvā. Yesaṃ kilesānaṃ atthitā, tesaṃ sappaṭibhayatā visesato jānitabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ime kilesā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^kakkhaḷā^eb^ti pharusā. ^b^Vāḷā^eb^ti kururā. ^b^Na gahitabbā^eb^ti na uppādetabbā. ^b^Yāthāvasarasato^eb^ti yathābhūtasabhāvato. ^b^Evañcā^eb^ti ‘‘ime kilesā nāmā’’tiādinā vuttappakārena. ^b^Yena vā tena vā^eb^ti navakammesu vā pariyattidhutaṅgādīsu vā yena vā tena vā. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Taṃ pana niddhāraṇaṃ saṅgaṇānaṅgaṇasamudāyatoti dassento ^b^‘‘catūsu puggalesū’’^eb^ti vatvā puna tadekadesato dassento ^b^‘‘tesu vā dvīsu sāṅgaṇesū’’^eb^ti āha. Tañhi dvayaṃ paṭhamaṃ hīnaseṭṭhabhāvena niddhārīyati paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhattā. Niddhāraṇañhi kvaci kutoci kenaci hotīti.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kiñcāpi aññattha ‘‘janako hetu, pariggāhato paccayo, asādhāraṇo hetu, sādhāraṇo paccayo, sabhāgo hetu, asabhāgo paccayo, pubbakāliko hetu, sahappavatto paccayo’’tiādinā ^a^V1.0219^ea^ hetupaccayā vibhajja vuccanti, idha pana ‘‘cattāro kho, bhikkhave, mahābhūtā hetū, cattāro mahābhūtā paccayā rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.85) viya hetupaccayasaddā samānatthāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ubhayenapi kāraṇameva^eb^^a^M1.0246^ea^^b^pucchatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ubhayenā^eb^ti hetupaccayavacanadvayena. ^b^Pucchati^eb^ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno desanaṃ vaḍḍhetukāmo. ^b^Kiñcāpī^eb^ti anujānanasambhāvanatthe nipāto. Kiṃ anujānāti? Samānepi dvinnaṃ sāṅgaṇabhāve tassā pajānanāppajānanahetukataṃ tesaṃ seṭṭhahīnataṃ. Kiṃ sambhāveti? Therassa vicittapaṭibhānatāya nānāhetūpamāhi alaṅkatvā yathāpucchitassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nappajānātī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Hetu ceva paccayo ca^eb^ seṭṭhahīnabhāve. Tathāakkhātabbatāpi hi tesaṃ tannimittā evāti.

[03]^b^59^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ta^eb^nti tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ hīnaseṭṭhatāya kāraṇaṃ. Opammehi ^b^pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ. Eta^eb^nti sutte anantaraṃ vuccamānaṃ vīriyārambhābhāvena aṅgaṇassa appahānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na chandaṃ…pe… sandhāyāhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kattukamyatāchandha^eb^nti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ aṅgaṇassa pahātukamyatāvasena uppajjanakakusaladhammacchandaṃ. ^b^Na janessatī^eb^ti na uppādessati. Kusalo vāyāmo nāma chandato balavāti āha ^b^‘‘tato balavataraṃ vāyāmaṃ na karissatī’’^eb^ti, chandampi anuppādento kathaṃ tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ karissatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Thāmagatavīriyaṃ^eb^ ussoḷhībhāvappattaṃ daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ. Sāṅgaṇaggahaṇeneva aṅgaṇānaṃ kilesavatthutāya cittassa saṃkiliṭṭhatāya saddhāya puna saṃkiliṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ savisesaṃ kiliṭṭhabhāvavibhāvananti āha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhutaraṃ kiliṭṭhacitto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Malinacitto^eb^tiādīsupi ‘‘tehiyevā’’ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ukkhalipucchanacoḷakassa viya vasāpītapilotikā viya ca dummocanīyabhāvena malaggahaṇaṃ ^b^malīnatā,^eb^ pīḷanaṃ hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ ^b^vibādhanaṃ^eb^ darathapariḷāhuppādanena paridahanaṃ upatāpanaṃ, ^b^kāla^eb^nti kālanaṃ, yathāgahitassa attabhāvassa khepanaṃ āyukkhayanti attho. ^b^Karissatī^eb^ti pavattessati, pāpuṇissatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathābhūto ca pāṇaṃ cajissati nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘marissatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Seyyathāpī^eb^ti upamānidassane nipāto. Tadatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Paṃsuādinā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena jallādīnaṃ saṅgaho, ^b^ghaṃsanādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena chārikāparimajjanādīnaṃ saṅgahoti. ‘‘Abhirūpāya kaññā dātabbā’’tiādīsu viya antarenapi atisayatthabodhakasaddena atisayattho ñāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘malaggahitatarāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭipucchāvacana^eb^nti anumatipucchāviseso. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0247^ea^^b^kariyamānā^eb^ti aparibhoga-apariyodapanarajopathanikkhipanehi kiliṭṭhabhāvaṃ āpādiyamānā. ^b^Opammaṃ sampaṭipādento^eb^ti yathūpanītaṃ upamaṃ upameyyatthena ^a^V1.0220^ea^ samaṃ katvā paṭipādento, saṃsandentoti attho. ^b^Sāṅgaṇo puggalo^eb^ti sāṅgaṇo tasmiṃ attabhāve asujjhanakapuggalo. Āpaṇādito kulagharaṃ ānītassa malaggahitakaṃsabhājanassa tattha laddhabbāya visuddhiyā alābhato yathā anukkamena saṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvo, evaṃ gharato nikkhantassa puggalassa pabbajjāya laddhabbāya visuddhiyā alābhato anukkamena saṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvoti dassento ^b^‘‘saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Saṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvo ca nāma pabbajitassa ājīvavipattivasena vā siyā ācāradiṭṭhisīlavipattīsu aññataravasena vāti taṃ sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tassa puggalassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Pācittiyavītikkamanaggahaṇena hi ekaccadiṭṭhivipattiyāpi saṅgaho hotīti. ^b^Ettha ṭhitassā^eb^ti etissaṃ ājīvavipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa. Iminā nayena sesesupi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. Sabbaparisasādhāraṇā mahātherassa desanā, tasmā gahapativasenapi yojetabbaṃ. Tattha ukkaṃsagatasaṃkiliṭṭhatarabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘mātughātādiānantariyakaraṇa’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Avisodhetvā^eb^ti yathā attano sīle vā diṭṭhiyā vā visuddhi hoti, evaṃ kilesamalinacittasantānaṃ avisodhetvā.

[03]^b^Bhabbapuggalo^eb^ti upanissayādisampattiyā tasmiṃ attabhāve visuddhapuggalo. ^b^Ādiṃ katvā^eb^ti iminā dhovanaghaṃsanādīhi pariyodapanaṃ ādimantaṃ katvā vadati. ^b^Suddhaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ yattha vā na rajena okirīyati. ^b^Daṇḍakammaṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘ettakā udakā, vālukā vā ānetabbā’’ti daṇḍakammaṃ katvā. ^b^Ettha ṭhitassā^eb^ti parisuddhe sīle ṭhitassa. Sammāvattapaṭipattisīlehi sīlavisuddhi dassitā. Vattapaṭipattiyāpi hi aṅgaṇānaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ siyā. Tathā hissā saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā parisuddhapariyodātabhāvo upamābhāvena vutto. ^b^Pantasenāsanavāso^eb^ kilesavikkhambhanaṃ kilesānaṃ tadaṅganivāraṇaṃ. ^b^Sotāpattiphalādhigamo…pe… arahattasacchikiriyā^eb^ti sattasupi ṭhānesu ‘‘parisuddhapariyodātabhāvo viyā’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Pabbajitassa hi visuddhi nāma heṭṭhimantena sīlavisuddhiyā vā siyā kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena vivekavāsena jhānassādhigamena vā vipassanābhāvanāya vā sāmaññaphalādhigamena vāti.

[03]^b^Rāgaṭṭhāniya^eb^nti ^a^M1.0248^ea^ rāguppattihetubhūtaṃ. Visabhāgārammaṇaṃ sandhāya vadati ^b^‘‘iṭṭhārammaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tasmi^eb^nti iṭṭhārammaṇe. ^b^Vipannassatī^eb^ti muṭṭhassati. ^b^Taṃ nimitta^eb^nti subhanimittaṃ. ^b^Āvajjissatī^eb^ti ayoniso āvajjissati. ^b^Sayameva^eb^ aññena avomisso. Kusalavārapacchindanameva cettha ^b^anuddhaṃsanaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti ‘‘sāṅgaṇo saṃkiliṭṭhacitto’’tiādi. ^b^Vuttanayānusārenā^eb^ti paṭhamavāre vuttanayānusārena. ^b^Sabba^eb^nti mātughātādiānantariyakaraṇapariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ upamāsaṃsandanavacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Ativirahābhāvato^eb^ti ^a^V1.0221^ea^ satisammosābhāvato, upaṭṭhitassati bhāvatoti attho. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti ‘‘so arāgo’’tiādi. ‘‘Dhovanaghaṃsanasaṇhachārikāparimajjanādīhī’’tiādinā ^b^dutiyavārānusārena^eb^. ‘‘Ko nu kho’’tiādi pucchāvasena āgataṃ, idaṃ nigamanavasenāti ayameva viseso.

[03]^b^60^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṅgaṇa^eb^nti tattha tattha nāmato eva vibhāvitaṃ, na pana sabhāvato, pabhedato vāti sabhāvādito vibhāvanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘nānappakārato pākaṭaṃ kārāpetukāmenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Icchāya avacarāna^eb^nti icchāvasena avacaraṇānaṃ. ^b^Otiṇṇāna^eb^nti cittasantānaṃ anupaviṭṭhānaṃ. Te pana tattha paccayavasena nibbattattā pavattā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘pavattāna’’nti. Nānappakārāna^eb^nti visayabhedena pavattiākārabhedena ca nānāvidhānaṃ. ^b^Yena^eb^kāraṇena. Na kevalaṃ lābhatthikatā eva, atha kho puññavantatā sakkatagarukatā ca ettha kāraṇabhāvena gahetabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘pakatiyāpi cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena lābhatthikopi na yo koci evaṃ cittaṃ uppādeti puññavā sambhāvanīyoti dasseti. ^b^Therā^eb^ avajjapaṭicchādanabhayena ^b^majjhimānaṃ ārocenti,^eb^ tathā majjhimā ^b^navakānaṃ,^eb^ navakā pana attano navakabhāvena ^b^vighāsādādīnaṃ ārocenti^eb^ ‘‘passatha tumhākaṃ therassa kamma’’nti. Vighāsādādayo nāma ‘‘īdisassa santike ovādatthaṃ tumhe āgatā’’ti ^b^bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocenti^eb^. ^b^Na ca maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyu^eb^nti na ca vata maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ, aho vata maṃ bhikkhū na jāneyyunti yojanā. ^b^Ṭhānaṃ kho paneta^eb^nti ettha ^b^kho^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇattho, ^b^pana^eb^-saddo vacanālaṅkāroti āha ^b^‘‘atthiyevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pubbe^eb^ icchuppādavāravaṇṇanāya ^b^vuttanayena. Iti^eb^-saddo idha āsannakāraṇatthoti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘iminā kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti āha ^a^M1.0249^ea^. ^b^Idañca^eb^ kopāppaccayānameva gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Tādisāna^eb^nti kopāppaccayādhibhūtānanti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Anuraho^eb^ti anurūpe rahasi. Evameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vihārapaccante’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Purimasadisamevā^eb^ti ‘‘lābhatthiko hī’’tiādinā vuttena purimena yojanānayena sadisameva.

[03]Codanāya paṭipuggalabhāvo, codanā ca āpattiyāti cuditakena codakassa samānabhāvo āpattiāpannatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘samānoti sāpattiko’’^eb^ti. Sappaṭipuggalenevassa codanicchāya kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘aya’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Na cāyaṃ sāpattikatāya eva samānataṃ icchati, atha kho aññathāpīti dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Aññena vā paṭipuggalena ^b^sappaṭipuggalo^eb^. Ayañhi ‘‘sappaṭipuggalova maṃ codeyyā’’ti icchati ‘‘evāhaṃ tassa paṭipuggalehi saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayo hutvā tassa upari kiñci vattuṃ kātuṃ vā labhissāmī’’ti ^b^maññamāno^eb^^a^V1.0222^ea^. Imasmiṃ pana pakkhe ^b^no appaṭipuggalo^eb^ti natthi etassa paṭipuggaloti ^b^appaṭipuggalo^eb^ti evamattho veditabbo.

[03]‘‘Aho vatā’’ti idaṃ padaṃ dissatīti sambandho, imassa puggalassa icchācāre ṭhitattā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyāti vacanato ^b^‘‘tañca kho anumatipucchāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na hesa ‘‘saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhū’’tiādinā kiñci vītikkamaṃ uddissa bhagavatā pucchitabbataṃ icchati. ^b^No maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā antaraṃ katvā^eb^ti maggabhāvanaṃ vā phalasacchikiriyaṃ vā sikhāppattavipassanānuyogaṃ vā nirodhasamāpajjanaṃ vā jhānasamāpajjanameva vā antaraṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā bhagavatā attānaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ no icchati. ^b^Niccaṃ anicca^eb^ntiādinā anumatiggahaṇavasena pucchitabbaṃ icchati, uttānameva katvā pucchitabbaṃ icchatīti attho. Upaharante passatīti sambandho. Abhabbaṭṭhānabhikkhutāya ^b^niharissanti^eb^ sāsanato.

[03]^b^Taṃ sampatti^eb^nti parivārasampattiñceva bhikkhūhi kariyamānaṃ sakkāragarukārasampattiñca. ^b^Gahetvā paribhuñjanti^eb^ mayā saṃvibhāge kariyamāne. ^b^Sayameva paññāyatī^eb^ti sayameva gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ purato attānaṃ dasseti, purato vasantaṃ pana bhikkhu purakkhatvā gacchantiyevāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Dakkhiṇodaka^eb^nti ^a^M1.0250^ea^ aggato upanīyamānaṃ dakkhiṇodakaṃ. Yato eva-kāro, tato aññattha niyamo icchito. Avadhāraṇatthaṃ vā eva-kāraggahaṇanti katvā ^b^ahameva labheyya^eb^nti ahaṃ labheyyamevāti evametaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘ahameva labheyyanti icchā nātimahāsāvajjā’’^eb^ti, aññathā yathārutavasena avadhāraṇe gayhamāne ‘‘na aññe labheyyu’’nti ayamevettha attho siyāti. ^b^Pāsādiko hotī^eb^ti idaṃ tassa aggāsanādipaccāsīsanāya kāraṇadassanaṃ.

[03]^b^Anumodana^eb^nti maṅgalāmaṅgalesu anumodanāvasena pavattetabbadhammakathaṃ. ^b^Khaṇḍānumodana^eb^nti anumodanekadesaṃ. ‘‘Pubbe anumoditapubbo anumodatū’’ti avatvā ^b^therena vuttamatteyeva^eb^.

[03]^b^Tādisesu ṭhānesū^eb^ti tādisesu pesalānaṃ bahussutānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānesu. Sabbampi ratiṃ pavattanato ^b^sabbarattikāni^eb^. ^b^Vinicchayakusalāna^eb^nti anekavihitesu kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu kaṅkhāvinayanāya taṃ taṃ pañhānaṃ vinicchaye kusalānaṃ chekānaṃ. Tesu tesu dhammakathikesu ajjhiṭṭhesu vārena dhammaṃ kathentesu ‘‘ayaṃ byatto’’ti dhammajjhesakena ajjhiṭṭhattā ^b^okāsaṃ alabhamāno^eb^.

[03]^b^Sakkaccañca^eb^^a^V1.0223^ea^^b^kareyyu^eb^nti bhikkhū yaṃ mama abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānañjalikammasāmīcikammādiṃ karonti. Taṃ ādareneva kareyyuṃ, yañca me parikkhārajātaṃ paṭiyādenti, tampi sundaraṃ sammadeva abhisaṅkhataṃ kareyyunti attho. ^b^Bhāriya^eb^nti pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukātabbaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ vidhi^eb^nti etaṃ ‘‘sakkareyyu’’ntiādinā vuttasakkārādividhiṃ. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti tena kāraṇena, bāhusaccādiguṇavisesavato eva sakkārādīnaṃ arahattāti attho. ^b^Evarūpanti^eb^ īdisaṃ ‘‘piyo garū’’tiādinā (a. ni. 7.37) vuttappakāraṃ. ^b^Evaṃ kareyyu^eb^nti evaṃ ‘‘sakkareyyu’’ntiādinā vuttappakāraṃ sakkārādiṃ kareyyuṃ. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti yoyaṃ bhikkhuvāre vuttavidhi, eseva nayo. ^b^Ito paresu^eb^ bhikkhunīvārādīsu ^b^vāresu^eb^.

[03]^b^Ahameva lābhī assa^eb^nti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva avadhāraṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Piṇḍapātassa paṇītatā upasecanādivasenāti āha ^b^‘‘sappitelamadhusakkharādipūritāna’’^eb^nti ^a^M1.0251^ea^. ^b^Mañcapīṭhādīna^eb^nti nidassanamattaṃ utusappāyānaṃ nivātānaṃ phassitatalānaṃ pihitadvārakavāḷavātapānādīnampi paṇītasenāsanabhāvato. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Sabbatthāpī^eb^ti sabbesu tesu catūsupi paccayavāresu.

[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāyakammaṃ disvā^eb^ti idaṃ na kāyakammaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, kāyakammunā pana saha pavattaṃ oṭṭhaparipphandanaṃ bhākuṭikaraṇaṃ kāyaṅgādidassanaṃ kāyakammadassanaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Vacīkammaṃ sutvā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo, tasmā kāyavikārajanakā dhammā ‘‘dissantī’’ti vuttā, vacīvikārajanakā ‘‘sūyantī’’ti. Tato eva ca te ^b^paccakkhakāle^eb^ sammukhakāle ^b^dissanti^eb^ nāma. ^b^Tirokkhakāle^eb^ asammukhakāle ^b^sūyanti^eb^ nāma. Anurūpato gahaṇaṃ ^b^anuggaho^eb^. ^b^Āraññikatta^eb^nti tassa bhikkhuno dhutaguṇattānurūpato gaṇhāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āraññikattaṃ anuggaṇhātī’’^eb^ti. Araññe nivāso assāti ^b^āraññiko^eb^. Pantaṃ pariyantaṃ dūrataraṃ senāsanaṃ assāti ^b^pantasenāsano^eb^. Taṃ pana atthamattena dassentena ^b^‘‘pantasenāsane vasatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Bhikkhāsaṅkhātānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ pāto piṇḍāpāto, taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati gavesatīti ^b^piṇḍapātiko^eb^. Piṇḍāya patituṃ carituṃ vatametassāti vā piṇḍapāti, so eva ^b^piṇḍapātiko^eb^. Dānato avakhaṇḍanato apetaṃ apadānaṃ, saha apadānena sapadānaṃ, anavakhaṇḍanaṃ. Anugharaṃ caraṇasīlo ^b^sapadānacārī^eb^. Unnatabhāvena paṃsukūlaṃ viya paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsu viya vā kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ, tassa dhāraṇaṃ idha paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti ^b^paṃsukūliko^eb^.

[03]^b^Tīhi^eb^^a^V1.0224^ea^^b^kāraṇehi lūkhaṃ veditabbaṃ^eb^ agghaphassavaṇṇaparihānito apaṃsukūlampi, ko pana vādo paṃsukūlanti adhippāyo. ^b^Thūladīghasuttakenā^eb^ti thūlena olambamānena dīghasuttakena. ^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti ettha phassenapi parihāyatīti vattabbaṃ. Tañhi tattha kharaphassampi hotiyevāti. Kasmā pana pāḷiyaṃ āraññikādiggahaṇena cattārova dhutaguṇā vuttāti? Padhānattā, taggahaṇeneva ca ito paresampi sukhaparibhogatāya gahaṇasambhavato. Yo hi āraññiko pantasenāsano, tassa abbhokāsika-rukkhamūlika-nesajjika-yathāsanthatika-sosānikaṅgāni suparipūrāni. Yo ca piṇḍapātiko sapadānacārī ca, tassa pattapiṇḍikakhalupacchābhattikaekāsanikaṅgāni. Yo pana paṃsukūliko, tassa ^a^M1.0252^ea^ tecīvarikaṅgaṃ supariharamevāti. Padhānattā hi bhagavatāpi ‘‘kadāhaṃ nandaṃ passeyyaṃ, āraññaṃ paṃsukūlika’’ntiādinā (saṃ. ni. 2.242; netti. 100) tattha tattha āraññikādayo eva gayhanti. ^b^Ettakā^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ paricchijja gahaṇametaṃ, na ettakā sabbepi ekassa ekaṃsato sambhavanti, nāpi ettakāyeva pāpadhammā pahātabbā. Na hi makkhapaḷāsādīnaṃ appahīnabhāvepi ^b^sabrahmacārī neva sakkaronti…pe… na pūjentī^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tamattha^eb^nti ‘‘yassa kassacī’’tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ. ^b^Upamāya pākaṭaṃ karonto^eb^ti anvayato byatirekato ca udāharaṇena vibhāvento. ^b^Ahikuṇapādīnaṃ atipaṭikūlajigucchanīyatā^eb^ ativiya duggandhatāya. Sā ca ahīnaṃ tikhiṇakopatāya, kukkuramanussānaṃ odanakummāsūpacayatāya sarīrassa hotīti vadanti. ^b^Imesa^eb^nti ahiādīnaṃ. ^b^Vaḍḍhetvā^eb^ti uparūpari khipanena racitaṃ katvā. Taṃ pana vaḍḍhitaṃ tena ca bhājanaṃ pūritaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘vaḍḍhetvā paripūretvā’’^eb^ti. Janassa dassanayogyaṃ dassanīyaṃ ^b^jaññaṃ,^eb^ taṃ paramaparisuddhaṃ manoharañca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘cokkhacokkha’’^eb^nti. Abhinavaniviṭṭhā mahāmātā ^b^vadhukā^eb^. Sā pana puttalābhayogyataṃ upādāya maṅgalavacanena ‘‘janī’’ti vuccati, tassā niyyamānaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ janiyā haratīti ^b^jaññaṃ^eb^. ^b^Ubhayatthā^eb^ti atthadvaye. ^b^Punarutta^eb^nti āmeḍitavacanamāha. Na manāpaṃ etassāti amanāpo, tassa bhāvo ^b^amanāpatā,^eb^ tathāpavatto cittuppādoti āha ^b^‘‘amanāpaṃ idanti…pe… adhivacana’’^eb^nti. Buddhavesattā liṅgassa ^b^parisuddhakaṃsapātisadisakā^eb^. ^b^Kuṇaparacanaṃ viya^eb^ icchāvacarehi santānassa bharitabhāvo. So pana tesaṃ appahīnatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘icchāvacarānaṃ appahāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Tena gāmantavihāraṃ anuggaṇhātī’’ti vattabbe ^b^‘‘āraññikatta’’^eb^nti pana potthake likhitaṃ. Na hi sukkapakkhe pāḷiyaṃ āraññikaggahaṇaṃ atthi, sati ca icchāvacarappahāne gāmantavihāro ekantena na paṭikkhipitabbo, icchitabbova tādisānaṃ uttarimanussadhammapaṭicchādanato ^a^V1.0225^ea^. Tathā hi vakkhati ^b^‘‘appicchatāsamuṭṭhānehī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sālivarabhattaracanaṃ viya icchāvacarappahānaṃ^eb^ manuññabhāvato tittihetuto ca.

[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Maṃ^eb^^a^M1.0253^ea^^b^ta^eb^nti ca upayogavacanaṃ paṭi-saddayogena, attho pana sampadānamevāti āha ^b^‘‘mayhaṃ tuyha’’^eb^nti ca. ^b^‘‘Samaye’’^eb^ti ^b^bhummatthe^eb^ ‘‘samaya’’nti ^b^upayogavacanaṃ^eb^. Gijjhakūṭapaṇḍavaisigilivebhāravepullapabbatānaṃ vasena ^b^samantato giriparikkhepena^eb^. ^b^Rājagahe^eb^ti samīpatthe bhummavacananti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ nissāya viharāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Purāṇayānakāraputto^eb^ti purāṇe pabbajitato pubbe yānakāraputto tathāpaññāto. ^b^Jimha^eb^nti gomuttakuṭilaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sappagatamaggasadisa’’^eb^nti. ^b^So^eb^ti paṇḍuputto. ^b^Itaro^eb^ti samiti. ^b^Cintitaṭṭhānamevā^eb^ti cintitacintitaṭṭhānameva tacchati, tañca kho na tassa cittānusārena, atha kho attano suttānusārena tacchanto yānakāraputto. ^b^Citta^eb^nti attano cittena mama cittaṃ jānitvā viya.

[03]‘‘Na saddhāya pabbajito’’ti imināva kammaphalasaddhāya abhāvo nesaṃ pakāsitoti āha ^b^‘‘assaddhāti buddhadhammasaṅghesu saddhāvirahitā’’^eb^ti. Pabbajitānaṃ jīvikā attho etesanti ^b^jīvikatthā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iṇabhayādīhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kerāṭikaṃ^eb^ vuccati sāṭheyyaṃ. Saṭhānaṃ guṇavāṇijakānaṃ kammaṃ sāṭheyyanti āha ^b^‘‘sāṭheyyañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Tucchasabhāvena māno naḷo viyāti naḷo, mānasaṅkhāto uggato naḷo etesanti ^b^unnaḷā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uṭṭhitatucchamānā’’^eb^ti. Lahukatāya vā ^b^capalā^eb^. Pharusavacanatāya ^b^kharavacanā^eb^. Tiracchānakathābahulatāya ^b^niratthakavacanapalāpino^eb^. ^b^Asaṃvutakammadvārā^eb^ti idaṃ kammadvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutabhāvo uppattidvārānaṃ asaṃvutatāya eva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Atha vā ^b^chasu indriyesū^eb^ti nimitte bhummaṃ, chasu indriyesu nimittabhūtesu asaṃvutakammadvārāti attho. ^b^Yā mattā^eb^ti bhojane ayuttapariyesana-ayuttapaṭiggahaṇa-ayuttaparibhoge vajjetvā yuttapariyesana-yuttapaṭiggahaṇa-yuttaparibhogasaṅkhātā yā mattā appamattehi ^b^jānitabbā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yuttatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jāgare^eb^ti rattindivaṃ āvaraṇiyehi dhammehi cittaparisodhanasaṅkhāte jāgare. Tesaṃ jāgaritāya adhisīlasikkhāya gāravarahitānaṃ itarasikkhāsu patiṭṭhā eva natthīti dassento ^b^‘‘sikkhāpadesu bahulagāravā na hontī’’^eb^ti vatvā tameva gāravābhāvaṃ sarūpena vibhāvento ^b^‘‘āpattivītikkamabahulā’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Pakatiyāpi ^a^V1.0226^ea^^a^M1.0254^ea^ siddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya kammaphalasaddhāya ca ^b^saddhā^eb^. ^b^Pivanti maññe^eb^ yathā taṃ dravabhūtaṃ amataṃ laddhā. ^b^Ghasanti maññe^eb^ yathā taṃ bahalapiṇḍikasudhābhojanaṃ laddhā. ^b^Attamanavācaṃ nicchārentā^eb^ ‘‘sādhu sādhū’’ti. Tameva pana sādhukāraṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā ^b^abbhanumodantā.^eb^ Ettha ca attamanavācānicchāraṇaṃ pivanasadisaṃ katvā vuttaṃ bahiddhābhāvato, manasā abbhanumodanaṃ pana abbhantarabhāvato ghasanasadisaṃ vuttaṃ. Saṅkhādanajjhoharaṇañhi ghasananti. Rassañca ekavacanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘rasse sati sāriputtassa upari hotī’’^eb^ti. Dīghañca bahuvacanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dīghe sati sabrahmacārīna’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Upari hotī’’ti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Ālasiyabyasanādīhī^eb^ti ālasiyena vā ñātibyasanādīhi vā. ^b^‘‘Mahānāgāti vuccantī’’^eb^ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘tatrā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ‘‘na gacchantīti nāgā, na āgacchantīti nāgā, na āguṃ karontīti nāgā’’ti yo vividho vacanattho icchito, taṃ vicāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘chandādīhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ pana ñeyyāvabodhāya vacanato appamattakāraṇaṃ.

[03]Sayameva ^b^āguṃ na karoti^eb^ sabbathā maggena pahīnāaguttā. So kāmayogādike ^b^sabbasaṃyoge^eb^ dasavidhasaṃyojanappabhedāni ca sabbabandhanāni ^b^visajja^eb^ jahitvā ^b^sabbattha^eb^ yakkhādīsu, sabbesu vā bhavesu kenaci saṅgena ^b^na sajjati^eb^ tīhi ca vimuttīhi ^b^vimutto,^eb^ tato eva iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā ^b^tādi,^eb^ so vuttalakkhaṇena ^b^tathattā^eb^ taṃsabhāvattā ^b^nāgo pavuccate^eb^ti attho veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evamettha attho veditabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññehi khīṇāsavanāgehi^eb^ aggasāvakattā guṇavisesayogato ^b^pujjatarā ca pāsaṃsatarā ca. Samaṃ anumodisu^eb^nti aññamaññassa subhāsitato sampaṭicchanena samappavattamodatāya samaṃ sadisaṃ abbhanumodiṃsu. Taṃ pana samanumodanaṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādinā pāḷivaseneva dasseti.
[06]Sammutiparamatthadesanākathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Anaṅgaṇasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sampanna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0227^ea^^a^M1.0255^ea^ paripuṇṇaṃ, samantato pannaṃ pattanti sampannaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ paripuṇṇasampannaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na^eb^nti ‘‘suvā’’ti vuttaṃ suvagaṇaṃ. ^b^Sampanno^eb^ti sammadeva panno gato upagato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samannāgato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sampanna^eb^nti sampattiyuttaṃ. Sā panettha rasasampatti adhippetā sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ aneḷaka’’^eb^nti, niddosanti attho. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idaṃ madhurasampannaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti. Sīlassa anavasesasamādānena akhaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā ca ^b^paripuṇṇasīlā^eb^. Samādānato paṭṭhāya acchindanato ^b^sīlasamaṅgino^eb^. Samādānato hi accantavirodhidhammānuppattiyā sīlasamaṅgitā veditabbā, cetanādīnaṃ pana sīlanalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe vattabbameva natthi. ^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.9) ^b^vuttā,^eb^ tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva vitthārakathā veditabbāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Khettapāripūrī^eb^ti nissitapāripūriyā nissayapāripūrimāha nissitakammavipattisampattivisayattā yathā ‘‘mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī’’ti. Tathā hi khettena khaṇḍapūtiādidoso vutto. ^b^Khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hotī^eb^ti aparipūraṃ hoti sassapāripūriyā abhāvato. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sassaṃ na uṭṭhetī’’^eb^ti. Pādamattassapi anekambaṇaphalanato ^b^mahapphalaṃ hoti^eb^. Kisalayapalālādibahutāya ^b^mahānisaṃsaṃ^eb^. ^b^Evameva^eb^nti yathā khittaṃ bījaṃ khaṇḍādicatudosavasena aparipuṇṇaṃ hoti, tadabhāvena ca paripuṇṇaṃ, evaṃ sīlaṃ khaṇḍādicatudosavasena aparipuṇṇaṃ hoti, tadabhāvena ca paripuṇṇanti, catudosatadabhāvasāmaññameva nidassananidassitabbavipattisampattīsu dasseti. ^b^Mahapphalaṃ hoti^eb^ vipākaphalena. ^b^Mahānisaṃsa^eb^nti vipulānisaṃsaṃ. Svāyaṃ ānisaṃso idha pāḷiyaṃ nānappakārena vitthārīyati.

[03]^b^Ettāvatā kirā^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 2.2.37; a. ni. ṭī. 3.10.71-74) ^b^kira^eb^-saddo arucisūcanattho. Tenettha ācariyavādassa attano aruccanabhāvaṃ dīpeti. ^b^Sampannasīlā^eb^ti anāmaṭṭhavisesaṃ sāmaññato sīlasaṅkhepena gahitaṃ. Tañca catubbidhanti ācariyatthero ^b^‘‘catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīle. ^b^Jeṭṭhakasīla^eb^nti (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 3.5.412) padhānasīlaṃ. ^b^Ubhayatthā^eb^ti uddesaniddese. Idha ^a^M1.0256^ea^ niddese viya uddesepi ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto^eb^ ‘‘sampannasīlā’’ti vuttattāti adhippāyo ^a^V1.0228^ea^. Sīlaggahaṇañhi pāḷiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaravasena āgataṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvaroyevā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu chasikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti. ^b^Tīṇī^eb^ti indriyasaṃvarasīlādīni. ^b^Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī^eb^ti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā pātimokkhasaṃvaroti ācariyassa sammukhattā apaṭikkhipantova upacārena pucchanto viya vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ananujānanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Chadvārarakkhāmattakamevā^eb^ti tassa sallahukabhāvamāha cittādhiṭṭhānamattena paṭipākatikabhāvāpattito. Itaradvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Paccayuppattimattaka^eb^nti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Uppādanahetukā hi paccayānaṃ uppatti. ^b^Idamattha^eb^nti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo. ^b^Nippariyāyenā^eb^ti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa parivāravasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti.

[03]Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^so^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvaro. ^b^Sesānī^eb^ti indriyasaṃvarādīni. ^b^Tassevā^eb^ti ‘‘sampannasīlā’’ti ettha yaṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva. ^b^Sampannapātimokkhā^eb^ti ettha pātimokkhaggahaṇena ^b^vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā…pe… ādimāha^eb^. Yathā aññathāpi ‘‘idha bhikkhu sīlavā hotī’’ti (mahāni. 199) puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya uddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ ‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī’’ti (vibha. 508; mahāni. 199) niddiṭṭhaṃ.

[03]^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā^eb^ti yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti ‘‘pātimokkha’’nti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvārā. Te pana yasmā evaṃbhūtā tena samannāgatā nāma honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarena samannāgatā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Aparo ^a^M1.0257^ea^ nayo (udā. aṭṭha. 31; itivu. aṭṭha. 97) – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato, puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭīyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī, maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī, sattasantāno, cittameva vā, taṃ pātiṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti ^a^V1.0229^ea^^b^pātimokkhaṃ^eb^. Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati. Vuttañhi ‘‘cittavodānā visujjhantī’’ti, ‘‘anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta’’nti (mahāva. 28) ca.

[03]Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pātī. ‘‘Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata’’nti (saṃ. ni. 2.125) hi vuttaṃ. Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. ‘‘Kaṇṭhekālo’’tiādīnaṃ viya samāsasiddhi veditabbā.

[03]Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi ‘‘cittena nīyati loko, cittena parikassatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.62). Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pātī, taṇhādisaṃkileso. Vuttañhi ‘‘taṇhā janeti purisaṃ (saṃ. ni. 1.57), taṇhādutiyo puriso’’ti (itivu. 15, 105; a. ni. 4.9) ca ādi. Tato pātito mokkhoti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^.

[03]Atha vā patati etthāti pātī, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi ‘‘chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava’’nti (saṃ. ni. 1.70; su. ni. 171). Tato ajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato pātito mokkhoti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā ‘‘patī’’ti vuccati, muccati etenāti mokkho, patino mokkho tena paññattattāti pātimokkho ^a^M1.0258^ea^. Pātimokkho eva ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttatthena mokkho cāti pātimokkho. Pātimokkho eva ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘pātimokkhantiādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhameta’’nti (mahāva. 135) vitthāro.

[03]Atha vā ^b^pa^eb^-iti pakāre, ^b^atī^eb^ti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena, samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Pati pati mokkhoti vā pātimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho. Pātimokkho eva ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Mokkho vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa patibimbabhūtoti pātimokkho ^a^V1.0230^ea^. Sīlasaṃvaro hi nibbedhabhāgiyo sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya hoti yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanatoti pātimokkho. Pātimokkhoyeva ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati mokkhābhimukhanti vā pātimokkhaṃ. Pātimokkhameva ^b^pātimokkha^eb^nti evamettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Ācāragocarasampannā^eb^ti kāyikavācasikāvītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena ceva navesiyagocaratādisaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampannā, sampannāacāragocarāti attho. ^b^Appamattesū^eb^ti atiparittakesu anāpattigamanīyesu, dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattesūti apare. ^b^Vajjesū^eb^ti gārayhesu. Te pana ekantato akusalasabhāvā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘akusaladhammesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhayadassino^eb^ti bhayato dassanasīlā, paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlā. ^b^Sammā ādiyitvā^eb^ti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvā. ^b^Sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummanti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhathā’’^eb^ti atthamāha. Sikkhāpadameva hi samādātabbaṃ sikkhitabbañcāti adhippāyo. ^b^Yaṃ kiñci sikkhākoṭṭhāsesū^eb^ti sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu mūlapaññattianupaññatisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ. Taṃ pana dvāravasena duvidhamevāti āha ^a^M1.0259^ea^^b^‘‘kāyikaṃ vācasikañcā’’^eb^ti. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe ^b^sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṃ sabba’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kasmā āraddha^eb^nti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.10.71-74) desanāya kāraṇapucchā. ^b^Sīlānisaṃsadassanattha^eb^nti payojananiddeso. Ko attho kva attho kva nipātitāti? Nayidamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Sīlānisaṃsadassanattha^eb^nti hi ettha byatirekato yaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanaṃ, taṃ imissā desanāya kāraṇanti kasmā āraddhanti vineyyānaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanatoti atthato āpanno eva hotīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sacepī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sīlānisaṃsadassanattha^eb^nti pana imassa atthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘tesa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ānisaṃso^eb^ti udayo. ‘‘Sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggalokaṃ upapajjatī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.150; 3.316; a. ni. 5.213; mahāva. 285) pana vipākaphalampi ‘‘ānisaṃso’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ko viseso^eb^ti ko phalaviseso. ^b^Kā vaḍḍhī^eb^ti ko abbhudayo. Vijjamānopi guṇo yāthāvato vibhāvito eva abhiruciṃ uppādeti, na avibhāvito, tasmā ekantato ānisaṃsakittanaṃ icchitabbamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^visakaṇṭakavāṇijo^eb^ udāhaṭo.

[03]Tattha ^a^V1.0231^ea^^b^guḷo^eb^ nāma ucchurasaṃ pacitvā cuṇṇādīhi missitvā sampiṇḍane piṇḍībhūtaṃ. ^b^Phāṇitaṃ^eb^ apiṇḍitaṃ dravībhūtaṃ. ^b^Khaṇḍaṃ^eb^ bhijjanakkhamaṃ. ^b^Sakkharā^eb^ nāma phalikasadisā. ^b^Sakkharādīni^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena macchaṇḍikānaṃ saṅgaho. Tasmiṃ kāle guḷādīsu visakaṇṭakavohāro apaccantadese pacuroti ^b^‘‘paccantagāmaṃ gantvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dārake ca palāpesuṃ^eb^ ‘‘visakaṇṭakaṃ mā gaṇhantū’’ti.

[03]^b^Piyo^eb^ti piyāyitabbo. Piyassa nāma dassanaṃ ekantato abhinanditabbaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘viyacakkhūhi sampassitabbo’’^eb^ti. Pītisamuṭṭhānapasannasommarūpapariggahañhi cakkhu ‘‘piyacakkhū’’ti vuccati. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti sabrahmacārīnaṃ. ^b^Manavaḍḍhanako^eb^ti pītimanassa paribrūhanato uparūpari pīticittassa uppādako. ^b^Garuṭṭhāniyo^eb^ti garukaraṇassa ṭhānabhūto. ^b^Jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti ñāṇena jānitabbaṃ jānāti. Yathā vā aññe ajānantāpi jānantā viya pavattanti, na evamayaṃ, ayaṃ pana jānanto eva jānāti ^a^M1.0260^ea^. ^b^Passaṃ passatī^eb^ti dassanabhūtena paññācakkhunā passitabbaṃ passati, passanto eva vā passati. ^b^Evaṃ sambhāvanīyo^eb^ti evaṃ viññutāya paṇḍitabhāvena sambhāvetabbo.

[03]^b^Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī^eb^ti sīlesu paripūrakārī eva bhaveyyāti evaṃ uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi iminā padena uparisikkhādvayaṃ anivattitameva hoti. Yathā pana sīlesu paripūrakārī nāma hoti, taṃ phalena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ajjhatta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Vipassanādhiṭṭhānasamādhisaṃvattanikatāya hi idha sīlassa pāripūrī, na kevalaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvamattaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘yāni kho pana tāni akhaṇḍāni…pe… samādhisaṃvattanikānī’’ti. Evañca katvā upari sikkhādvayaṃ sīlassa sambhārabhāvena gahitanti sīlassevettha padhānaggahaṇaṃ siddhaṃ hoti. Tathā hi cittekaggatāsaṅkhārapariggahānaṃ sīlassānurakkhaṇabhāvaṃ vakkhati. Yaṃ pana vakkhati ‘‘sikkhattayadesanā jātā’’ti (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.65), taṃ itarāsampi sikkhānaṃ idha gahitatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na padhānabhāvena gahitataṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sīlassa appamattakatāvacanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, oramattaka’’nti (dī. ni. 1.7). Taṃ puthujjanagocaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tattha na nippadesato sīlaṃ vibhattaṃ, evaṃ katvā tattha sīlamattakanti mattaggahaṇaṃ samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Anūnenā^eb^ti akhaṇḍādibhāvena, kassaci vā ahāpanena upapannena. ^b^Ākārenā^eb^ti karaṇena sampādanena. ^b^Cittasamathe^eb^ti cittasamādhāne. ^b^Yutto^eb^ti aviyutto pasuto. Yo sabbena sabbaṃ jhānabhāvanaṃ ananuyutto, so taṃ bahi nīharati nāma. Yo ārabhitvā antarā saṅkocaṃ āpajjati ^a^V1.0232^ea^, so taṃ vināseti nāma. Yo pana īdiso ahutvā jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, so ^b^anirākatajjhāno^eb^ti dassento ^b^‘‘bahi anīhaṭajjhāno’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Aniccassa tebhūmakadhammassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā ^b^aniccānupassanā^eb^. Tathā ^b^dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā^eb^ ca. Tasseva nibbindanākārena pavattā anupassanā ^b^nibbidānupassanā^eb^. Virajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā ^b^virāgānupassanā^eb^. Nirodhassa anupassanā ^b^nirodhānupassanā^eb^. Paṭinissajjanavasena pavattā anupassanā ^b^paṭinissaggānupassanā^eb^. Suññāgāragato bhikkhu tattha laddhakāyavivekatāya samathavipassanāvasena cittavivekaṃ ^a^M1.0261^ea^ paribrūhento yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā lokaṃ sāsanañca attano visesādhigamaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ suññāgārañca upasobhayamāno guṇavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena viññūnaṃ atthato taṃ brūhento nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘brūhetā suññāgārāna’’^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi. Ayameva suññāgārānubrūhanaviññuppasatthānaṃ bhājanaṃ, na senāsanapatiṭṭhāpananti dassento āha ^b^‘‘ekabhūmakādi…pe… daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suññāgāra^eb^ggahaṇena cettha araññarukkhamūlādi sabbaṃ padhānānuyogakkhamaṃ senāsanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Taṇhāvicaritadesanā^eb^ti ‘‘ajjhattikassa upādāyā’’ti (vibha. 937) ādinayappavattaṃ taṇhāvicaritasuttaṃ. ^b^Taṇhāpadaṭṭhānattā^eb^ti taṇhāsannissayattā. Na hi taṇhāvirahitā mānadiṭṭhipavatti atthi. ^b^Mānadiṭṭhiyo osaritvā^eb^ti dassetabbatāya mānadiṭṭhiyo ogāhetvāti attho. Gahaṇatthameva hi desetabbadhammassa desanāya osaraṇaṃ. ^b^Taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo papañcattayaṃ^eb^ sattasantānassa saṃsāre papañcanato anuppabandhanavasena vitthāraṇato. ^b^Sīlapadaṭṭhānattā^eb^ti sīlādhiṭṭhānattā.

[03]Adhicittasikkhā vuttāti ānetvā sambandho. Vipassanāvasena suññāgāravaḍḍhaneti yojanā. ^b^Dvepi sikkhā^eb^ti adhicittādhipaññāsikkhā. ^b^Saṅgahetvā^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhāya saddhiṃ saṅgahetvā vuttā. Yadi evamayaṃ sikkhattayadesanā jātāti sikkhattayānisaṃsappakāsanī siyāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Indriyasaṃvaro viya pātimokkhasaṃvarassa catupārisuddhisīlassa ārakkhabhūtā cittekaggatā vipassanā ca idha gahitāti tadubhayaṃ appadhānaṃ, sīlameva pana padhānabhāvena gahitanti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlānurakkhikā evā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Balavatarasukha^eb^nti ^a^V1.0233^ea^ samuppannabyādhidukkhato balavataraṃ, taṃ abhibhavituṃ samatthaṃ jhānasukhaṃ uppajjati. ^b^Balavamamattaṃ hoti,^eb^ tena daḷhāttasinehena viluttahadayo kusaladhamme chaḍḍento ^b^so tathārūpesu…pe… posetā hoti. Balavamamattaṃ vā sineho na hoti^eb^ ‘‘suddho saṅkhārapuñjo’’ti yāthāvadassanena ^a^M1.0262^ea^ ahaṃkāramamaṃkārābhāvato. Dubbhikkhabhaye khudābhibhavaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘sacepissa antāni bahi nikkhamantī’’^eb^ti. Byādhibhayaṃ sandhāyāha ‘‘ussussati visussanī’’ti. Ādi-saddena gahitaṃ corabhayaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘khaṇḍākhaṇḍiko vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhayassā^eb^ti samathavipassanādvayassa. Ettha ca ‘‘ajjhattaṃ ceto…pe… suññāgārāna’’nti imehi visesanibbedhabhāgiyabhāvāpādanena sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ samatthā eva cittekaggatāvipassanā gahitā. Yasmā parato jhānavimokkhaphalābhiññāṇādhiṭṭhānabhāvo sīlassa uddhaṭo, tasmā tassa bhiyyopi sambhārabhūtā eva cittekaggatā vipassanā tattha tattha gahitāti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Sīlādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yathāvuttacittekaggatāvipassanā saṅgaṇhāti, sīlassa vā mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ sabbaṃ kammassakatañāṇañca saṅgaṇhāti kammapathasammādiṭṭhiṃ vā. Sīlañhi tadaññampi puññakiriyāvatthu teneva parisodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti. ^b^Lābhī assa^eb^nti lābhā sāya saṃvaraṇasīlaparipūraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ kimīdisaṃ bhagavā anujānātīti? Na bhagavā sabhāvena īdisaṃ anujānāti, mahākāruṇikatāya pana puggalajjhāsayena evaṃ vuttanti dassento ^b^‘‘na cetthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^ghāsesanaṃ chinnakatho na^eb^ vācaṃ ^b^payuttaṃ bhaṇe^eb^ti chinnakatho mūgo viya hutvā obhāsaparikathānimittaviññattipayuttaṃ ghāsesanaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇe na katheyyāti attho. ^b^Puggalajjhāsayavasenā^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘yesañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Raso sabhāvabhūto ānisaṃso ^b^rasānisaṃso^eb^.

[03]^b^Paccayadānakārā^eb^ti cīvarādipaccayavasena dānakārā. ^b^‘‘Devānaṃ vā’’^eb^ti vuttavacanaṃ pākaṭīkātumāha ^b^‘‘devāpī’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.150) anisaṃsasaddo phalapariyāyopi hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ubhayametaṃ atthato eka’’^eb^nti.

[03]Sassusasurā ca tappakkhikā ca ^b^sassusasurapakkhikā^eb^. Te ñātiyonisambandhena āvāhavivāhasambandhavasena sambandhā ^b^ñātī^eb^. ^b^Sālohitā^eb^ti yonisambandhavasena. ^b^Ekalohitasambaddhā^eb^ti ekena samānena lohitasambandhena sambaddhā. ^b^Peccabhāvaṃ gatā^eb^ti petūpapattivasena nibbattiṃ ^a^M1.0263^ea^ upagatā. Te pana yasmā idha katakālakiriyā kālena katajīvitupacchedā honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kālakatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pasannacitto^eb^ti pasannacittako. Kālakato ^a^V1.0234^ea^ pitā vā mātā vā petayoniṃ upapannoti adhikārato viññāyatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mahānisaṃsameva hotī’’^eb^ti, tassa tathā sīlasampannattāti adhippāyo. Ariyabhāve pana sati vattabbameva natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anekāni kappasatasahassānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Bahukāra^eb^nti bahupakāraṃ. ^b^Upasaṅkamana^eb^nti abhivādanādivasena upagamanaṃ. ^b^Payirupāsana^eb^nti upaṭṭhānanti.

[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajjhottharitā^eb^ti madditā. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhā^eb^ti riñcanā anabhirati ananuyogo. Sīlavā bhikkhu attano sīlakhaṇḍabhayena samāhito vipassako ca paccayaghātena aratiyā ratiyā ca sahitā abhibhavitāva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sīlādiguṇayuttenevā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Cittutrāso^eb^ bhāyatīti ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^. ^b^Ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ bhāyati etasmāti ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^. Purimavārasadisattā ^b^vuttanayamevā^eb^ti atidisitvāpi puna taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sīlādiguṇayutto hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Therassa heṭṭhā nisinnattā devatāya ^b^dārakā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ^eb^ sukhena vattituṃ ^b^asakkontā^eb^ asamatthā.

[03]Adhikaṃ cetoti ^b^abhiceto,^eb^ upacārajjhānacittaṃ. Tassa pana adhikatā pākatikakāmāvacaracittehi sundaratāya sapaṭipakkhato visuddhiyā cāti āha ^b^‘‘abhikkantaṃ visuddhicitta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Adhicitta^eb^nti samādhimāha, so ca upacārasamādhi daṭṭhabbo. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ, samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ, apītijaṃ jhānasukhaṃ, satipārisuddhijaṃ jhānasukhanti catubbidhampi jhānasukhaṃ paṭipakkhato nikkhantataṃ upādāya ‘‘nekkhammasukha’’nti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘nekkhammasukhaṃ vindantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ samatthoti^eb^ iminā tesu jhānesu samāpajjanavasībhāvamāha, ‘‘nikāmalābhī’’ti pana vacanato āvajjanādhiṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇavasiyopi vuttā evāti veditabbā. ^b^Sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti etena tesaṃ jhānasukhakhippābhiññatañca dasseti. ^b^Vipulāna^eb^nti vepullaṃ pāpitānaṃ. Jhānānaṃ vipulatā nāma subhāvitabhāvena ciratarappatti, sā ca paricchedānurūpāva icchitabbbāti ‘‘vipulāna’’nti vatvā ^b^‘‘yathāparicchedeyeva vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ^eb^^b^hotī’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0264^ea^ āha. Paricchedakālañhi appatvāva vuṭṭhahanto akasiralābhī na hoti yāvadicchakaṃ pavattetuṃ asamatthattā. Idāni teyeva yathāvutte samāpajjanādivasībhāve byatirekavasena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘ekacco hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^lābhīyeva hotī^eb^ti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti icchiticchitakkhaṇe. ^b^Pāribandhike^eb^ti vasībhāvassa paccanīkadhamme. Jhānādhigamassa pana paccanīkadhammā pageva vikkhambhitā, aññathā jhānādhigamo eva na siyā. ^b^Kicchena vikkhambhetī^eb^ti kicchena visodheti. Kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandādīnaṃ viya ^a^V1.0235^ea^ aññesampi samādhipāribandhikānaṃ dūrasamussāraṇaṃ idha vikkhambhanaṃ visodhanañcāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Nāḷikāyanta^eb^nti kālamānanāḷikāyantaṃ āha.

[03]Visesena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ sabbaso vasībhāvāpāditaṃ abhiññāpādakanti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘abhiññāpādake jhāne vutte’’^eb^ti. Arūpajjhānampi pana adhiṭṭhānatāya pādakameva cuddasadhā cittaparidamanena vinā tadabhāvato. ‘‘Evamabhiññāpādake rūpāvacarajjhāne vutte rūpāvacaratāya kiñcāpi abhiññānaṃ lokiyavāro āgato’’ti ayañhettha adhippāyo. ^b^Na^eb^nti abhiññāvāraṃ. ^b^Cattāri…pe… ariyamaggā sīlānaṃ ānisaṃso^eb^ sampannasīlasseva lābhato. ^b^Pariyādiyitvā^eb^ti gahetvā.

[03]^b^Aṅgasantatāyā^eb^ti nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ sudūratarabhāvena jhānaṅgānaṃ vūpasantatāya, nibbutasabbadarathapariḷāhatāyāti attho, yato tesaṃ jhānānaṃ paṇītatarādibhāvo. ^b^Ārammaṇasantatāyā^eb^ti rūpapaṭighādivigamanena saṇhasukhumādibhāvappattasantabhāvena. Yadaggena hi nesaṃ bhāvanābhisamayasabbhāvitasaṇhasukhumākārāni ārammaṇāni santāni, tadaggena jhānaṅgānaṃ santatā veditabbā. Ārammaṇasantatāya santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā. Vimuttā visesena muttā. Ye hi jhānadhammā tathāpavattapubbabhāgabhāvanāhi tabbisesatāya sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammehi vimuttivasena pavattanti, tato eva tathāvimuttatāya pitu aṅke vissaṭṭhāṅgapaccaṅgo viya kumāro nirāsaṅkabhāvena ārammaṇe adhimuttā ca pavattanti, te vimokkhāti vuccanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vimokkhāti paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā ārammaṇe ca adhimuttattā’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0265^ea^. Yadipi ārammaṇasamatikkamavasena pattabbāni āruppāni, na aṅgātikkamavasena, tathāpi yasmā ārammaṇe avirattassa jhānasamatikkamo na hoti, samatikkantesu ca jhānesu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hoti, tasmā ārammaṇasamatikkamaṃ avatvā ^b^‘‘rūpāvacarajjhāne atikkamitvā’’^eb^ti icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Atikkamma rūpe^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘sampādetabbā, passitabbā’’ti vā kiñci padaṃ icchitabbaṃ, asutaparikappanena pana payojanaṃ natthīti ^b^‘‘santāti padasambandho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā tena virāgabhāvena tesaṃ santatāti ayampi attho vibhāvito hoti. Rūpajjhānādīnaṃ viya natthi etesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ vā phalabhūtaṃ vā rūpanti arūpā. Arūpā eva ^b^āruppā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ārammaṇato ca vipākato ca rūpavirahitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nāmakāyenā^eb^ti sahajātanāmasamūhena.

[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃyojentī^eb^ti bandhanti. Kehīti āha ^b^‘‘khandhagatī’’^eb^tiādi. Asamucchinnarāgādikassa ^a^V1.0236^ea^ hi khandhādīnaṃ āyatiṃ khandhādīhi sambandho, samucchinnarāgādikassa pana taṃ natthi katānampi kammānaṃ asamatthabhāvāpattitoti. Rāgādīnaṃ anvayato ca saṃyojanaṭṭho siddhoti āha ^b^‘‘khandhagati…pe… vuccantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parikkhayenā^eb^ti samucchedena sabbaso āyatiṃ anuppajjanena. Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ anavasesato savanato pīḷanato ^b^soto,^eb^ ariyamaggoti āha ^b^‘‘sototi ca maggassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. Taṃ sotaṃ ādito panno adhigacchīti ^b^sotāpanno,^eb^ aṭṭhamako. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṃsamaṅgīpuggalassā’’^eb^ti, paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe puggalassāti adhippāyo. Idha pana ^b^panna^eb^-saddo ‘‘phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 8.59) viya vattamānakālikoti āha ^b^‘‘maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinna’’^eb^nti. Abhītakālikatte pana sarasatova nāmalābho siyā. Virūpaṃ sadukkhaṃ saupāyāsaṃ nipātetīti ^b^vinipāto,^eb^ apāyadukkhe khipanako. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti sabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Kasmā^eb^ti avinipātadhammatāya kāraṇaṃ pucchati. Apāyaṃ gamentīti apāyagamanīyā. Sambujjhatīti ^b^sambodhi^eb^, ariyamaggo. So pana paṭhamamaggassa adhigatattā avasiṭṭho eva adhigandhabbabhāvena icchitabboti āha ^b^‘‘uparimaggattaya’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ vuttāni,^eb^na pahātabbānīti adhippāyo. Oḷārikānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ samucchindanavasena pavattamāno dutiyamaggo avasiṭṭhānaṃ tesaṃ tanubhāvāpattiyā ^a^M1.0266^ea^ uppanno nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Adhiccuppattiyā^eb^ti kadāci karahaci uppajjanena. ^b^Pariyuṭṭhānamandatāyā^eb^ti samudācāramudutāya. ^b^Abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti^eb^ tajjassa ayonisomanasikārassa anibaddhabhāvato. ^b^Mandamandā uppajjanti^eb^ vipallāsānaṃ tappaccayānañca mohamānādīnaṃ mudutarabhāvato. ^b^Bahalāva uppajjanti^eb^ vatthupaṭisevanatoti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tathā hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Sakiṃ āgamanadhammo^eb^ti paṭisandhivasena sakiṃyeva āgamanasabhāvo. ^b^Ekavāraṃyeva…pe… āgantvā^eb^ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekoyeva gahitoti dassento ^b^‘‘yopi hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha yvāyaṃ pañcamako sakadāgāmī ‘‘idha maggaṃ bhāvetvā devaloke nibbatto, tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatī’’ti vutto, tassa ekabījinā saddhiṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti? Ekabījissa ekā paṭisandhi, sakadāgāmissa dve paṭisandhiyoti idaṃ tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ. Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ, na ekaṃ attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ, so ekabījīti.

[03]^b^Heṭṭhā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0237^ea^ ‘‘amahaggatabhūmiya’’nti heṭṭhā sambandhanena. Heṭṭhābhāgassa hitāti ^b^heṭṭhābhāgiyā,^eb^ tesaṃ. ^b^Tānīti^eb^ orabbhāgiyasaṃyojanāni. ^b^Kāmāvacare nibbattatiyeva^eb^ ajjhattaṃ saṃyojanattā. Tathā hesa dūratopi āvattidhammo evāti dassetuṃ gilabaḷisamacchādayo upamābhāvena vuttā. ^b^Opapātiko^eb^ti iminā gabbhavāsadukkhābhāvamāha. ^b^Tattha parinibbāyī^eb^ti iminā sesadukkhābhāvaṃ. Tattha parinibbānatā cassa kāmaloke khandhabījassa apunārohavasenevāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anāvattidhammo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kevalā^eb^ti lokiyābhiññāhi asammissā. ^b^Lokiyapañcābhiññāyopi sīlānaṃ ānisaṃso^eb^ tadavinābhāvato. Tāpi dassetuṃ ākaṅkheyya ce…pe… evamādimāhāti yojanā. Āsavānaṃ anavasesappahānato arahattamaggoyeva visesato ‘‘āsavakkhayo’’ti vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āsavakkhaye kathite’’^eb^ti, aññathā sabbāpi chaḷabhiññā āsavakkhayo evāti. ^b^Imesaṃ guṇāna^eb^nti lokiyābhiññānaṃ ^a^M1.0267^ea^. Yathā purisassa muṇḍitaṃ sīsaṃ sikhāvirahitattā na sobhati, evaṃ desanāya sīsabhūtāpi aggamaggakathā lokiyābhiññārahitā na sobhatīti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ kathā muṇḍābhiññākathā nāma bhaveyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iddhivikubbanā^eb^ti iddhi ca vikubbanā ca. Vikubbanaggahaṇena cettha vikubbaniddhimāha, iddhiggahaṇena tadaññaṃ sabbañca abhiññākiccaṃ. ^b^Yuttaṭṭhāneyevā^eb^ti lokiyābhiññānaṃ nibbattanassa viya desanāya yuttaṭṭhāneyeva. Etena na kevalaṃ desanakkamenevāyaṃ desanā, atha kho paṭipattikkamenapīti dasseti. ^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.369) ^b^vuttā,^eb^ tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^ti heṭṭhimamaggena khepitāvasiṭṭhānaṃ āsavānaṃ arahattamaggena samucchindanato. Yasmā arahattamaggo na kevalaṃ āsaveyeva khepeti, atha kho avasiṭṭhe sabbakilesepi, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘sabbakilesānaṃ khayā’’^eb^ti. Lakkhaṇamattañhettha āsavaggahaṇaṃ, āsavānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvassapi anupagamanato anāsavaṃ. Yasmā pana tattha āsavānaṃ lesopi natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āsavavirahita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Samādhi vutto^eb^ cetosīsena yathā ‘‘cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya’’nti (saṃ. ni. 1.23, 192; peṭako. 22; mi. pa. 2.1.9) adhippāyo. ^b^Rāgato vimuttattā avijjāya vimuttattā^eb^ti idaṃ ujuvipaccanīkapaṭippassaddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na tadaññesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ appaṭippassaddhattā. Idāni tameva samādhipaññānaṃ rāgāvijjāpaṭipakkhataṃ āgamena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vuttaṃ ceta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Samathaphala^eb^nti samathassa phalaṃ lokiyasamathabhāvanāya hi vipassanāgatāya āhitaphalassa lokuttarasamathassa sarikkhakaphalo ^b^cetovimutti^eb^. ^b^Vipassanāphala^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Attanoyevā^eb^ti sutamayañāṇādinā viya parapaccayataṃ ^a^V1.0238^ea^ nayaggāhañca muñcitvā paratoghosānugatabhāvanādhigamabhūtatāya attanoyeva ^b^paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā^eb^ sayambhuñāṇabhūtāyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aparappaccayena ñatvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sabbampi ta^eb^nti sabbampi sattarasavidhaṃ taṃ yathāvuttaṃ sīlānisaṃsaṃ. Yathā ānisaṃsavante sammadeva sampādite tadānisaṃsā dassitā eva honti tadāyattabhāvato, evaṃ ānisaṃsapadhānayogyabhāvena dassite ^a^M1.0268^ea^ tadānisaṃsā dassitā eva hontīti āha ^b^‘‘sampiṇḍetvā dassento’’^eb^ti. Vuttasseva atthassa punavacanaṃ nigamananti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nigamanaṃ āhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pubbe^eb^ti desanārambhe. ^b^Evaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘sampannasīlā’’ti evamādinā ākārena vuttaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ sabbampī^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘sampannasīlā’’tiādikaṃ sabbampi vacanaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti etaṃ sampannasīlassa bhikkhuno yathāvuttasattarasavidhānisaṃsabhāgitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idameva hi ‘‘iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta’’nti vacanaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘sabbampi taṃ sīlānisaṃsaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassento’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Etthāadito chahi ānisaṃsehi parittabhūmikā sampatti gahitā, tadantaraṃ pañcahi lokiyābhiññāhi ca mahaggatabhūmikā, itarehi lokuttarabhūmikāti evaṃ catubhūmikasampadānisaṃsasīlaṃ nāmetaṃ mahantaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ, tasmā taṃsampādane sakkaccakāritā appamattena bhavitabbaṃ.
[06]Ākaṅkheyyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chādetabbaṃ ^a^V1.0239^ea^ ṭhānaṃ vasati paṭicchādetīti ^b^vatthaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ samānaṃ viya na sabbaso minoti, mānassa pana samīpe, taṃ upamānaṃ. Upamīyati etāyāti upamā, upamāya bodhakavacanaṃ ^b^upamāvacanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Katthaci^eb^ sutte. ^b^Attha^eb^nti upamiyatthaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ upamaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ atthaṃ vatvā puna upamaṃ vadanto ^b^‘‘upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassetī’’^eb^ti vutto. ^b^Atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Idāni te cattāropi pakāre sutte āgatanayeneva dassento ^b^‘‘seyyathāpissu, bhikkhave’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^dve agārā^eb^ti dve paṭivissakagharā. ^b^Sadvārā^eb^ti sammukhadvārā.

[03]^b^Svāya^eb^nti so ayaṃ evaṃ upamādassanavasenapi nānānayenapi dhammadesako bhagavā. Ekaccānaṃ veneyyānaṃ atthassa sukhāvabodho paṭhamaṃ upamādassane hetu, evaṃ paṭhamaṃ atthadassane, upamāya atthaparivāraṇe, atthena upamāparivāraṇe cā’’ti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘esa nayo sabbatthā’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0269^ea^ iminā. ^b^Dhammadhātuyā^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇassa. Tañhi dhammadhātupariyāpannattā yathāvuttadhamme ca sabbepi ñeyyadhamme ca padahati yathāsabhāvato bujjhati bodheti cāti dhātu, dhīyanti vā dhammā etāya sabbākārato ñāyanti ñāpiyanti cāti dhammadhātu. Tassā pana suṭṭhu saccasampaṭivedhavasena laddhattā ^b^suppaṭividdhattā^eb^ti, yadaggena vā ñeyyaṃ tāya suppaṭividdhaṃ, tadaggena sāpissa suppaṭividdhā evāti āha ^b^‘‘suppaṭividdhattā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Pakatipariyodātassa cittassa āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhabhāvadassanatthaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhavatthadassananti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pakatiparisuddhaṃ vattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Rajādinā^eb^ti ettharajo nāma reṇu. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena aṇutajjāridhūmādikaṃ vatthassa aparisuddhikāraṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sabbaso kilissati vinassati visuddhi etenāti saṃkileso, tena ^b^saṃkilesena paṃsurajādinā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vaṇṇavināsanena vidūsitaṃ. ^b^Malaṃ^eb^ masi. ^b^Jallikā^eb^ vuccati loṇapaṭalādi chaviyā upari ṭhitaṃ sarīramalaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^saddena sarīrajallameva assukheḷasiṅghāṇikādikaṃ tadaññamalaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Gahitattā^eb^ti pariyonandhanavasena gahitattā. Rajanti sattā tenāti raṅgaṃ, raṅgameva ^b^raṅgajātaṃ^eb^ yathā kopameva kopajātaṃ. ^b^Upanāmeyyā^eb^ti pakkhipeyya. ^b^Nīlakatthāyā^eb^ti nīlavaṇṇatthāya. ^b^Palāsanīlādiketi ādi^eb^-saddena kāḷasāmādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Haliddikakudhaselādike ^b^pītakaraṅge^eb^. Lākhāpattaṅgarasādike ^a^V1.0240^ea^^b^lohitakaraṅge^eb^. Mahārajanaloddakandulādike ^b^mandarattaraṅge^eb^. Duṭṭhu rajitavaṇṇaṃ apabhassaraṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aparisuddhavaṇṇamevassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Īdisa^eb^nti durattavaṇṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ vatthe raṅgajātaṃ sayaṃ suparisuddhaṃ samānaṃ kissa hetu kena rattavaṇṇaṃ aparisuddhaṃ hotīti raṅgajātassa niddosataṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Saṃkilesapakkhaṃ dassentena asaṃkiliṭṭhameva vatthaṃ udāharitabbanti pākaṭoyamattho, saṃkiliṭṭhavatthanidassanena pana ‘‘siyā nu kho aññopi koci viseso’’ti adhippāyena pucchati ^b^‘‘kasmā panā’’^eb^tiādinā. Itaro atthavisesoti dassento ^b^‘‘vāyāmamahapphaladassanattha’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Ettha ca saṃkiliṭṭhacittavisodhanavidhāne saṃkiliṭṭhavatthaṃ nidassatabbanti paṭiññā, vāyāmamahapphaladassanatthanti hetuattho. ^b^Yathā hī^eb^tiādi anvayattho. ^b^Na tattha jātikāḷake viyā^eb^tiādi byatirekattho. Sadisūdāharaṇaṃ pana malaggahitakaṃsapātiādi daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ cittampī^eb^tiādi ^a^M1.0270^ea^ opammatthassa upameyyaupanayanaṃ. Tattha ^b^pakatiyā^eb^ti akittimena sabhāvena. Tanti cittaṃ. Sāmaññaggahaṇañcetaṃ cittabhāvāvisesato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sakalepī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṇḍarameva^eb^ na saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ saṃkilesehi asamannāgatabhāvato. Nanu kiriyāmayacittehi vipākasantāne visesādhānaṃ labbhati, aññathā katavināsā katabbhāgamā āpajjeyyuṃ? Kiñcāpi labbhati, tassa saṃkileso vaṭṭupanissayo, asuddhi vā na hoti, asaṃkileso vivaṭṭupanissayo, visuddhi vā na hoti eva. ^b^Upakkiliṭṭha^eb^nti panetaṃ upakkilesanārahassa cittassa vasena vuttaṃ, na vipākapabandhassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pabhassaramidaṃ bhikkhave citta’’^eb^nti, ^b^‘‘paṇḍaramevā’’^eb^ti ca. ^b^Tañca kho^eb^ti pana sakasantatipariyāpannatāya nesaṃ kevalaṃ ekattanayavasena vuttaṃ, na vipākadhammānaṃ kilesāsamaṅgibhāvato. Atha vā ^b^upakkiliṭṭha^eb^nti iminā upakkilesahetu tattha vijjamānaṃ visesādhānamāha, na ‘‘saṃkiliṭṭhā dhammā’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 77ḍukamātikā) viya taṃsamaṅgitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Visodhiyamāna^eb^nti vipassanāpaññāya anukkamena sabbupakkilesehi vimociyamānaṃ. ^b^Sakkā^eb^ aggamaggakkhaṇe ^b^pabhassarataraṃ kātuṃ,^eb^ yato na puna upakkilissati. ^b^Eva^eb^ntiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṃ.

[03]Duṭṭhagatiparipūraṇavasena paṭipajjanaṃ ^b^paṭipatti^eb^. Sā eva kilesadarathapariḷāhādivasena upāyāsadukkhā, kucchitā vā gati pavatti, duggatihetūti vā ^b^duggati,^eb^ duggatiyā pana paṭipattiyā gandhabbato, tassā vā nipphannabhāvato kucchito, dukkhā ca gatīti ^b^duggati^eb^. ^b^Saṃkiliṭṭhacitto^eb^ti idaṃ tassā paṭipattiyā duggatibhāvadassanatthaṃ, na visesanatthaṃ. Na hi asaṃkiliṭṭhacittassa pāṇaghātādivasena pavatti. ^b^Saṃkiliṭṭhacitto^eb^ti lābhāsāya sabbaso kiliṭṭhacitto ^a^V1.0241^ea^. ^b^Dūteyyapahiṇagamana^eb^nti dūteyyaṃ vuccati dutakammaṃ, gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ, pahiṇagamanaṃ gharāgharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ, dūteyyagamanaṃ pahiṇagamanañca gacchati. ^b^Vejjakamma^eb^nti ananuññāte ṭhāne lābhāsāya gahaṭṭhānaṃ bhesajjaṃ karoti. ^b^Saṅghabheda^eb^kathā parato āgamissati. ^b^Veḷudānādīhī^eb^ti veḷudānapattadānapupphadānādīhi micchājīvena ^b^jīvikaṃ kappeti^eb^. ^b^Sakalampī^eb^ti ‘‘atthi anācāro, atthi agocaro’’tiādinā ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha. 513, 514) āgataṃ sabbampi anācāraṃ agocarañca caraṇavasena paripūreti.
[03]^b^‘‘Nirayampi^eb^^a^M1.0271^ea^^b^…pe… pettivisayampi gacchatī’’^eb^ti vatvā tattha pettivisayagamanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘samaṇayakkho nāma hotī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Sukkapakkhe ^b^parisuddha^eb^nti sabbaso visuddhaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ. Parisuddhattā eva ^b^pariyodātaṃ,^eb^ pabhassaranti attho. ^b^Surattavaṇṇamevassā^eb^ti suṭṭhu rattavaṇṇameva assa. ^b^Parisuddhavaṇṇamevassā^eb^ti nīlavaṇṇopissa parisuddho ca bhaveyyāti evamādiṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kaṇhapakkhe vuttapaccanīkeneva veditabbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Raṅgajāta^eb^ntiādi pana tattha vuttavaseneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Paṭipattisugati^eb^ādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭipattiduggatiādīsu vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Parisuddhacitto^eb^ti suddhāsayo. ^b^Dasa kusalakammapathe paripūretī^eb^ti idaṃ kaṇhapakkhe ‘‘dasa akusalakammapathe paripūretī’’ti vuttassa paṭipakkhadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Yathā hi tattha abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiggahaṇena kammapathasaṃsandananayena kammapathaṃ appattāya ca agāriyassa tathārūpāya micchāpaṭipattiyā saṅgaho icchito, evaṃ idhāpi anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena alobhādosāmohavasena pavattā agāriyassa sammāpaṭipatti saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na kammapathappattāvāti. ^b^Manussamahantata^eb^nti jātirūpabhogādhipateyyādivasena manussesu mahantabhāvaṃ. Dasahi ṭhānehi aññesaṃ devānaṃ abhibhavo ^b^devamahantatā^eb^. Paṭipatti sugatiyā bhājiyamānattā ^b^‘‘anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetī’’^eb^ti tathā anāgāmibhāvanaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapitā. Gahitaggahaṇena sukhānubhavaṭṭhānassa adhippetattā tadabhāvato asaññibhavaṃ anādiyanto ^b^‘‘dasasu vā brahmabhavanesū’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgo^eb^ abhijjhāyanaṭṭhena ^b^abhijjhā,^eb^ abhijjhāyanāti attho. ^b^Parabhaṇḍe chandarāgo^eb^ visamaṃ lubbhatīti ^b^visamalobho^eb^. Evampi abhijjhāvisamalobhānaṃ viseso hotīti dassento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha attano santakaṃ taṃsadisañca ^b^yuttaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ yācitaṃ, appakasirena vā sakkā laddhuṃ, taṃ ^b^pattaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Paradāragarudārāti ^b^ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ apatthaniyaṃ, yassa ^a^V1.0242^ea^ vā patthanāya byasanaṃ āpajjati, taṃ ^b^appattaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. ^b^Thero^eb^ti ^b^mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero,^eb^ yena ^b^aṭṭhakathā^eb^ potthakaṃ āropitā. So hi antevāsikesu sākacchantesu evamāha. Sopi imasmiṃyeva sutte vinibbhogo na labbhati cittasaṃkilesassa adhippetattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yutte vā’’^eb^tiādi. Ayonisomanasikāravasena ^a^M1.0272^ea^ uppajjanato sampatti āyatiñca dukkhasseva uppādanato ^b^na koci lobho avisamo nāma^eb^. ^b^Abhijjhāyanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yassa kassaci ārammaṇassa yuttassa ayuttassa appattassa ca abhijjāyanavasena abhipatthanāvasena ca pavattā taṇhā ^b^abhijjhā^eb^ti lobhato nibbisesanti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekatthametaṃ byañjanameva nāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dūsetī^eb^ti sabhāvasantaṃ asaṃkilesaṃ vināseti avisuddhaṃ karoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘obhāsituṃ na detī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ime sattā ucchijjantu vinassantū’’ti sattesu byāpajjanākārappavattiyā ^b^byāpādo navavidhāaghātavatthusambhavo^eb^ vutto. Kodho pana saṅkhāresupi pavattanato dasavidhāaghātavatthusambhavo vutto. Ubhayampi paṭighameva, pavattanānattato bhinditvā vutto. Kujjhanavaseneva ^b^cittapariyonandhano^eb^ ‘‘akkocchi maṃ avadhi ma’’ntiādinā.

[03]Suṭṭhu kataṃ karaṇaṃ ^b^sukataṃ,^eb^ tassa pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa ^b^vināsano^eb^ udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugataṃ udakaṃ puñchanto ^b^makkho^eb^. Tathā hi so paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanaṭṭhena ‘‘makkho’’ti vuccati. Idāni ^b^anagāriyassa vā^eb^tiādinā saṅkhepena vuttatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anagāriyopī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Nisinnakathāparikathādivasena dhammassa kathā dhammakathānayo, ekattādidhammanīti eva vā. Pakaraṇaṃ satta pakaraṇāni, tattha kosallaṃ ^b^dhammakathānayapakaraṇakosallaṃ^eb^. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena vinayakkame catūsu mahānikāyesu ca kosallaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Acittīkato^eb^ti cittīkārarahito. ^b^Yathā cāya^eb^nti iminā yathāyaṃ makkho cittaṃ dūseti, evaṃ paḷāsopi cittaṃ dūseti, tasmā upakkilesoti dasseti. ^b^Aniyatā gati niyāmokkamanābhāvato. Ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘rattaññū cirapabbajite puggale ajjhottharitvā ‘tvampi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito, ahampi pabbajito, tvampi sīlamatte ṭhito ahampī’ti’’ evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Yugaggāhagāhī^eb^ti ‘‘tava vā mama vā ko viseso’’ti asamampi samaṃ katvā samadhuraggāhagaṇhanako. ^b^Khīyanā^eb^ usūyanā. Attano sampattiyā nigūhanaṃ tassa parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanena hotīti ^b^‘‘parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahamānaṃ’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Kāraṇe hi gahite phalampi gahitameva hotīti. Aññathā attano pavedanakapuggalo ^b^kerāṭiko,^eb^ ‘‘nekatikavāṇijo’’tipi vadanti. Sappamukhā ^a^M1.0273^ea^ macchavālā ekā macchajāti āyatanamaccho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āyatanamaccho nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Baddhacaro^eb^ti antevāsī.

[03]Sabbaso ^a^V1.0243^ea^ amadditasabhāvena vā tabharitabhattasadisassa thaddhabhāvassa anonamitadaṇḍasadisatāya paggahitasirānivātavuttikārassa ca karaṇato ^b^vā tabharita…pe… karaṇo. Taduttarikaraṇo^eb^ti yaṃ yena kataṃ duccaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā, taduttari, tassa dviguṇaṃ vā karaṇo. Attano maṇḍanādiatthaṃ ^b^parena kataṃ alaṅkārādiṃ^eb^. ^b^Pariyāpuṇāti vā katheti vā^eb^ attano balānurūpaṃ. Kāmaṃ nikāyadvayaggahaṇādivasena pavatto sevitabbamāno eva, tathāpissa saṃkilesapakkhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mānaṃ anissāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Uṇṇativasenā^eb^ti ‘‘seyyohamasmī’’tiādinā cittassa paggahaṇavasena. Pubbe kenaci attānaṃ sadisaṃ katvā pacchā tato adhikato dahanato uppajjanako ^b^atimāno^eb^. ^b^Madaggahaṇākāro^eb^ jātiādiṃ paṭicca majjanākāro, sopi atthato māno eva. ^b^Pamādo^eb^ tathāpavatto cittuppādo.

[03]^b^Tasmā lobhamādiṃ katvā dassetī^eb^ti lobhassa ādito gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetukāmo pucchati. ^b^Paṭhamuppattito^eb^ti tattha tattha bhave sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. Sattānañhi yathādhigataṃ jhānādivisesaṃ ārabbha paccavekkhaṇā viya yathāladdhaṃ upapatibhavaṃ ārabbha nikanti eva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbasattāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Yathāsambhavaṃ itare^eb^ti itare byāpādādayo yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjanti, lobhassa viya ādito asukassa anantaraṃ asukoti vā na nesaṃ niyamo atthīti attho. Kiṃ pana ete soḷaseva cittassa upakkilesā, udāhu aññepi santīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya aññepi santīti dassento ^b^‘‘na ca ete’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yadi evaṃ kasmā ettakā eva idha vuttāti. Nayadassanavasenāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘etena pana…pe… veditabbā’’^eb^ti. Tena thinamiddhauddhaccakukkucca-vicikicchā-attukkaṃsana-paravabbhanachambhitattā- bhīrukatā-ahirikānottappa-atticchatā-pāpicchatā-mahicchatādayo saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^72^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃkilesaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0274^ea^^b^dassetvā^eb^ti saṃkiliṭṭhavattanidassanena saṅkhepena vuttaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vibhāgena dassetvā. ^b^Vodānaṃ dassento^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Evaṃ jānitvā^eb^ti ‘‘abhijjhā visamalobho ekanteneva cittassa uppakkileso’’ti sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyato ca pubbabhāgapaññāya ceva heṭṭhimamaggadvayapaññāya ca jānitvā. ^b^Pajahatī^eb^ti ettha accantappahānameva adhippetanti dassento ^b^‘‘samucchedappahānavasena ariyamaggena pajahatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Ariyamaggenā^eb^ti anāgāmimaggena. Tena hi pahānaṃ idha sabbavāresu adhippetaṃ. ^b^Kilesapaṭipāṭi^eb^ idha kilesānaṃ desanākkamo. ^b^Maggapaṭipāṭi^eb^pana catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ desanākkamopi tāya desanāya paṭipajjanakkamopi ^a^V1.0244^ea^ tāya paṭipattiyā uppattikkamopi. Tattha ye ye kilesā yena yena maggena pahīyanti, maggapaṭipāṭiṃ anoloketvā tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ tena tena maggena pahānadassanaṃ kilesapaṭipāṭi na kilesānaṃ uppattikkamo idha desanākkamo cāti dassento ^b^‘‘abhijjhā visamalobho’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yena yena pana maggena ye ye kilesā pahīyanti maggānupubbiyā, tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānadassanaṃ maggapaṭipāṭiyā pahānadassananti dassento ^b^‘‘sotāpattimaggenā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne^eb^ti ‘‘sa kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhū’’tiādinā āgato imasmiṃ pahānavāre. ^b^Ime kilesā^eb^ti ime yathāvuttā kilesā. ^b^Sotāpattimaggavajjhā vā hontu sesamaggavajjhā vā^eb^heṭṭhā dassitamaggapaṭipāṭivasena. Tattha pana ye tatiyamaggavajjhā, tesaṃ anāgāmimaggeneva pahāne vattabbaṃ natthi, yesaṃ panettha heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ idha saṅgahe kāraṇaṃ pacchā vattukāmena aggamaggavajjhānaṃ anādiyitvā kasmā tatiyamaggavajjhānameva gahaṇaṃ katanti āha ^b^‘‘ayamettha paveṇimaggāgato sambhavo’’^eb^ti, ayaṃ imassa suttassa etasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyapaveṇiyā kathāmaggo tato āgato atthasambhavo atthatatvanti attho. Tattha heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ idha saṅgahe kāraṇaṃ pacchā vattukāmo aggamaggavajjhānaṃ aggahaṇe yuttiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘so cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti catutthamaggena. ^b^Sesāna^eb^nti byāpādādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0275^ea^. ^b^Yepī^eb^ti makkhādike sandhāyāha. ^b^Taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittāna^eb^nti tesaṃ makkhādīnaṃ samuṭṭhāpakacittuppādānaṃ. Tattha makkha-paḷāsa-issā-macchariya-samuṭṭhāpakaṃ paṭighadvayacittaṃ, visesato pañcakāmaguṇalobhena saṭho māyāvī ca hoti, pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo ca anāgāmimaggeneva niravasesato pahīyati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittānaṃ appahīnattā’’^eb^ti. Tepi suppahīnā hontīti sambandho. ^b^Ta^eb^nti paṭhamamaggeneva pahānaṃ ^b^pubbāparena na sandhiyati^eb^ ‘‘yathodhi kho’’ti ettha odhivacanassa maggattayavācakattā. Ratanattaye aveccappasādo nāma ariyakantasīlaṃ viya sotāpannassa aṅgāni, te ca pahānato pacchā niddiṭṭhā, tasmā idha vuttappahānaṃ vikkhambhanapahānamevāti keci vadanti. ^b^Tesaṃ icchāmattameva^eb^ yathāvuttapahānasseva vasena aveccappasādānaṃ odhiso pahānassa vibhāvitattā, svāyamattho heṭṭhā yuttitopi pakāsitoyeva.

[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekamekena padena yojetabbaṃ,^eb^ yato ekamekassapi upakkilesassa sabhāvādito dassanaṃ niyyānamukhaṃ hoti, tathā ceva heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. Anāgāmimaggavasena pahānaṃ vatvā pasādassa uddhaṭattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anāgāmimaggena lokuttarappasādo āgato’’^eb^ti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā ‘‘lokiyo uppajjatī’’ti vuttanti? ‘‘Itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinayappavattassa lokiyattā. Nibbānārammaṇo ^a^V1.0245^ea^ eva hi lokuttaro pasādo. ‘‘Itipi so bhagavā’’tiādivacanena lokiyaṃ, aveccappasādavacanena lokuttaranti ^b^lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ pasādaṃ dassento^eb^. Avecca ratanattayaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā pasādo ^b^aveccappasādo^eb^. So pana yasmā maggenāgatattā kenaci akampaniyo appadhaṃsiyo ca hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘acalena accutenā’’^eb^ti. Tattha lokuttaro sabbaso buddhaguṇādīsu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsento tattha kiccato pavattati, itaro ārammaṇavasena te ārabbha. ^b^Taṃ vidhi^eb^nti taṃ tassa uppannappakāraṃ. ^b^Anussatiṭṭhānānī^eb^ti anussatikammaṭṭhānāni.

[03]^b^75^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Somanassādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ñāṇādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Corānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhānatāya ^b^paccanta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Paccavekkhato^eb^ti ‘‘asukasmiñca ṭhāne ime cime corā evañca evañca vināsitā’’ti paccavekkhato ^b^rañño viya^eb^.

[03]Yo ^a^M1.0276^ea^ yo odhi ^b^yathodhi^eb^. Yathā-saddo byāpanicchāyaṃ, kho saddo avadhāraṇeti dassento ^b^‘‘sakasakaodhivasena cattameva hotī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena ‘‘vanta’’ntiādīsupi avadhāretabbanti dasseti. ^b^Sakasakaodhivasenā^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘dve odhī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^yaṃmaggavajjhā^eb^ti yena maggena anavasesato pahātabbā. Anavasesappahānavasena hi taṃtaṃmaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ tadaññamaggavajjhehi asammissatā, aññathā ye sakasakaodhivasena uparimaggavajjhā, te heṭṭhimamaggehi pahīnāpāyagamanīyādisabhāvā eva tehi pahīyantīti pahānavasena sammissā siyuṃ. ^b^Tena teyeva pahīnā hontī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Tatuttaripī^eb^ti tato pahānanimittasomanassuppattito uddhampi. Paṭipakkhesu odhiso pavattikiccattā ^b^odhīti heṭṭhā tayo maggā vuccanti^eb^. ^b^Te hī^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa vivaraṇaṃ. ^b^Imassa bhikkhuno^eb^ti anāgāmiṃ sandhāyāha. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘heṭṭhāmaggattayena catta’’^eb^nti.

[03]Keci cattampi gaṇhanti, nayidamevanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘vanta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Na hi yaṃ yena vantaṃ, so puna taṃ ādiyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anādiyanabhāvadassanavasenā’’^eb^ti. Vantampi kiñci sasantatilaggaṃ siyā, nayidamevanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘mutta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘santatito vinimocanavasenā’’^eb^ti. Muttampi kiñci muttabandhanā viya phalaṃ kuhiñci tiṭṭhati, na evamidanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘pahīna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kvaci anavaṭṭhānadassanavasenā’’^eb^ti. Yathā kiñci dunnissaṭṭhaṃ puna ādāya sammadeva nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhanti vuccati, evaṃ vipassanāya nissaṭṭhaṃ ādinnasadisaṃ maggena pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭinissaṭṭha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ādinnapubbassa paṭinissaggadassanavasenā’’^eb^ti. Na kāpurisena viya parammukhena nissaṭṭhaṃ ^a^V1.0246^ea^, atha kho abhimukheneva nissaṭṭhanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭinissaṭṭha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭimukhaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Upagantabbato^eb^ti attano hitasukhaṃ paccāsīsantena ekantena adhigantabbato. ^b^Dhāraṇato^eb^ti taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ apāyapātato sandhāraṇena. ^b^Gantho^eb^^b^‘‘vedo’’ti vuccati^eb^ ‘‘vidanti etenā’’ti, vedehi ñāṇehi gato paṭipannoti ^b^vedagū^eb^. ^b^Abhijaññā^eb^ti jāneyya. ^b^Vedajātā^eb^ti uppannasomanassā. ^b^Ñāṇaṃ ‘‘vedo’’ti vuccati^eb^ ‘‘veditabbaṃ vedetī’’ti. ^b^Somanassaṃ ‘‘vedo’’ti vuccati^eb^ ārammaṇarasaṃ vindati anubhavatīti.

[03]^b^Uppanna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0277^ea^ aveccappasādaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ. ^b^Vuttappakārameva veda^eb^nti ‘‘somanassaṃ somanassamayañāṇañcā’’ti evaṃ vuttappakārameva. ^b^Atthaveda^eb^nti atthe hetuphale vedaṃ. ^b^Dhammaveda^eb^nti dhamme hetumhi vedaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aveccappasādassa hetu’’^eb^ntiādi. Idha dhammatthasaddā hetuphalapariyāyāti imamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vuttañheta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tameva atthañca dhammañcā^eb^ti attho dhammoti ca vuttaṃ aveccappasādanimittaṃ yathāvuttaṃ kilesappahānañca. ^b^Atthadhammānisaṃsabhūtaṃ veda^eb^nti yathāvuttātthadhammānisaṃsabhūtaṃ somanassamayañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ vedañca. ^b^Pāmojja^eb^nti taruṇapītiṃ āha. ^b^Paccavekkhaṇākārappavattenā^eb^ti etena paccavekkhaṇā evettha anavajjasabhāvatāya dhammoti vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Pīti jāyatī^eb^ti parappaccayaṃ balavapītimāha. ^b^Pīṇitamanassā^eb^ti passaddhiāvahehi uḷārehi pītivegehi tittacittassa. ^b^Kāyo^eb^ti nāmakāyo. ^b^Vūpasantadaratho^eb^ti kilesapariḷāhānaṃ dūrībhāvena suṭṭhu upasantadaratho. Paccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ cittassa samādhānaṃ idha adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘appitaṃ viya acalaṃ tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^76^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmaṃ ‘‘buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhi, dhamme saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī’’ti idampi tassā paccavekkhaṇāya pavattiākārapakāsanameva, idaṃ pana visesato ratanattaye uppannasomanassādippakāsanapadaṃ. ‘‘Yathodhi kho panā’’ti idampi savisesaṃ paccavekkhaṇākārappakāsanapadanti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘idāni yathodhi…pe… pakāsetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Cattāropi pana vārā paccavekkhaṇākārappakāsanavasena ceva somanassādiānisaṃsadassanavasena ca vuttāti sakkā viññātuṃ ubhayatthāpi ubhayassa vuttattā. Yadipi ariyamaggo ekacittakkhaṇiko na puna uppajjati, paṭipakkhassa pana tena suppahīnattā taṃsamaṅgī aparihānadhammo taṃsīlādibhāveneva vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘tassa anāgāmimaggasampayuttaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ dassetī’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.13; ma. ni. 3.197-198; saṃ. ni. 5.378) viya idha dhamma-saddo samādhipariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘samādhikkhandhaṃ paññākkhandhañca dassetī’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi so sampayuttadhamme ekārammaṇe avikkhipamāne ^a^V1.0247^ea^ avippakiṇṇe avisaṭe katvā samaṃ, sammā ca ādahanto tathā te dhāretīti ca vattabbataṃ arahatīti ^a^M1.0278^ea^ dhammoti ca vuccati. ^b^Anekarūpāna^eb^nti anekappakārānaṃ. Antarāyo nāma appaṭiladdhassa vā alabbhanavasena, paṭiladdhassa vā parihānavasena, tadubhayampi idha natthīti dassento ^b^‘‘maggassa vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāyā^eb^ti tassa anāgāmino piṇḍapātabhojanaṃ neva hoti antarāyāya ukkaṃsagatāya paccavekkhaṇāya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanato. Tañcassā ukkaṃsagamanaṃ hatapaṭipakkhattāti dassento ^b^‘‘maggena visuddhacittattā’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ antarāyābhāve. ^b^Etadeva^eb^ visuddhacittattameva ^b^kāraṇaṃ^eb^. Ettha ca ‘‘nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāyā’’ti iminā heṭṭhā vuttappahānaṃ anāgāmimaggenevāti siddhaṃ hoti. Anāgāmino hi sabbaso kāmarāgo pahīno hoti, rasataṇhāya abhāvato tādisapiṇḍapātaparibhogo aggamaggādhigame kathañcipi antarāyāya na hotīti. ‘‘Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vattha’’nti vadanto bhagavāādimhi attanā upanītavatthūpamaṃ anusandheti. Udakassa acchabhāvo paṅkasevālapaṇakādimalābhāvena pasannatāya, tabbipariyāyato bahalatāti āha ^b^‘‘acchanti vippasanna’’^eb^nti. Vaṇṇanibhāya vigatasaṃkilesatāya samujjalanaṃ pabhassaratāya vatthassa, taṃ pariyodātanti vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha ^b^‘‘pariyodātaṃ pabhassaratāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ukkaṃ bandheyyā^eb^ti aṅgārakapallaṃ yathā dārughaṭikaṅgārādikena na bhijjati, evaṃ tanumattikālepādinā bandheyya. Meghapaṭalato verambhavātadhārāsaṅghaṭṭanato vijjutā viya kevalaṃ vātadhārāsaṅghaṭṭanajanitā pabhā ukkāpabhā, sā pana yasmā dvinnaṃ vātadhārānaṃ vegasambhūtasaṅghaṭṭanahetukā, tasmā kāraṇavasena ^b^‘‘vātavego ukkā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
