Janako eva bhavoti adhippetoti dassento ^b^‘‘jātiyā paccayabhūto kammabhavo veditabbo’’^eb^ti āha.
[06]Jātivāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^94^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhāvanabhavanaṭṭhena bhavo duvidho. Tattha kammabhavo ‘‘bhavati etasmā upapattibhavo’’ti bhāvanaṭṭhena ^b^bhavo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana upapattibhavaṃ ‘‘bhavatīti bhavo’’ti vatvā tassa kāraṇattā kammaṃ phalūpacārena bhavoti ayamattho vutto, ubhayatthāpi upapattibhavahetubhāvanettha kammassa kammabhavapariyāyoti dassitaṃ hoti. ^b^Sabbathāpī^eb^ti bhāvanabhavanakusalākusalaupapattisampattibhavahīnapaṇītādinā sabbappakārenapi. ^b^Kāmabhavoti vuttaṃ^eb^ kāmataṇhāhetukato kāmataṇhāya ārammaṇabhāvato ca. Rūpabhavūpagakammaṃ rūpabhavo, tathā arūpabhavūpagakammaṃ arūpabhavo, taṃtaṃnibbattakkhandhā rūpārūpupattibhavā, rūpārūpabhavabhāvo pana tesaṃ ‘‘kāmabhavo’’ti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
[06]Bhavavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^95^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upādāna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0284^ea^ catubbidhampi upādānaṃ. Yathā hi kāmassādavasena, bhavassādavasena vā taṃtaṃsugatibhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ karontassa kāmupādānaṃ, evaṃ ucchedādimicchābhinivesavasenāti cattāripi upādānāni yathārahaṃ tassa tassa kusalakammabhavassa upanissayavaseneva paccayā honti, akusalakammabhavassa asahajātassa anantarassa upanissayavasenapi ārammaṇavasenapi ^a^M1.0319^ea^. Sahajātassa kāmupādānaṃ sahajāta-aññamañña-nissaya-sampayutta-atthi-avigata-hetu-vasena sattadhā, sesaupādānāni tattha hetupaccayabhāvaṃ pahāya maggapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā sattadhāva paccayā honti. Anantarassa pana anantarasamanantarānantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanavasena paccayā honti. Tassidampi ^b^sahajātādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vatthukāmaṃ upādiyati^eb^ cittaṃ, puggalo vā ^b^etenā^eb^ti attho. ^b^Ta^eb^nti vatthukāmaṃ. Kāmetīti kāmo ca so upādiyatīti upādānañcāti yojanā. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ vuttanayena.

[03]^b^Sassato attā^eb^ti idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ nidassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā esā diṭṭhi daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ purimaṃ uttarā uttarā upādiyati, evaṃ ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntiādikāpīti. ^b^Atta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ pana attavādupādānanti nayidaṃ diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Loko cā^eb^ti attaggahaṇavinimuttagahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sabbadiṭṭhigatassa^eb^ ‘‘diṭṭhupādāna’’nti ^b^etaṃ adhivacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sabbāpi diṭṭhi diṭṭhupādāna’’nti vacanato.

[03]^b^Sīlabbataṃ upādiyantī^eb^ti sīlabbataṃ ‘‘suddhimaggo’’ti upādiyanti. ^b^Etena^eb^ micchābhinivesena. ^b^Sayaṃ vā taṃ^eb^ micchābhinivesasahagataṃ. Sīlabbatasahacaraṇato ^b^sīlabbatañca taṃ^eb^ daḷhaggāhabhāvato ^b^upādānañcāti sīlabbatupādānaṃ^eb^. ^b^Evaṃ suddhīti abhinivesato^eb^ti evaṃ gosīlagovatādicaraṇena saṃsārasuddhīti abhinivesabhāvato. Etena taṃ sahacaraṇato abhinivesassa taṃsaddārahataṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Vadantī^eb^ti ‘‘atthi me attā’’tiādinā voharanti. ^b^Etena^eb^ diṭṭhigatena. ^b^Attavādamattamevā^eb^ti attāti vācāmattameva. Etena vācāvatthumattametaṃ, yadidaṃ bāhirakaparikappito attāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Taṇhā^eb^^a^V1.0285^ea^^b^kāmupādānassā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘tattha katamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ? Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati kāmupādāna’’nti vacanato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ kāmupādānaṃ. ^b^Taṇhādaḷhatta^eb^nti ca purimataṇhāupanissayapaccayato daḷhabhūtā uttarataṇhā eva. Keci panāhu –

[03]‘‘Appattavisayapatthanā ^a^M1.0320^ea^ taṇhā andhakāre corassahatthappasāraṇaṃ viya, sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ tasseva bhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ viyā’’ti. Appicchasantuṭṭhipaṭipakkhā ete dhammā pariyesanārakkhadukkhamūlāni, tasmā vuttalakkhaṇā taṇhā vuttalakkhaṇasseva upādānassa anānantarassa upanissayavasena paccayo, ārammaṇādivasenapi paccayo hotiyeva, anantarādīnaṃ pana anantarādivasena paccayo. Sabbassapi hi lobhassa taṇhāpariyāyopi kāmupādānapariyāyopi labbhatevāti. ^b^Avasesāna^eb^nti diṭṭhupādānādīnaṃ. ^b^Sahajātādivasenā^eb^ti sahajātānaṃ sahajātādivasena, asahajātānaṃ anantaraupanissayādivasenāti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
[06]Upādānavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^96^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Cakkhusamphasso’’tiādi phassassa mātito nāmaṃ viya puttassa vatthuto tassa nissayabhāvena uppattihetuttā, ārammaṇaṃ pana kevalaṃ uppattihetūti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘seṭṭhi…pe… nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kāmarāgabhāvenā^eb^ti vatthukāmassa rajjanavasena. ^b^Rūpaṃ assādentī^eb^ti rupārammaṇaṃ taṇhābhinandanāvasena abhiramamānā eva assādentī. ^b^Nicca^eb^ntiādinā diṭṭhābhinandanāmukhena rūpaṃ abhiramantī. ^b^Pecca na bhavissatī^eb^ti bhijjitvā na hoti puna anuppajjanato. ^b^Tathā saddakaṇhādayopī^eb^ti yathā rūpataṇhā kāmarāgabhāvena sassatarāgavasena ucchedarāgavasenāti ca pavattiyā tisso taṇhā, tathā saddataṇhā gandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammataṇhāpi. ^b^Taṇhāvicaritānī^eb^ti taṇhāsamudācārā, samudācāravasena pavattataṇhāti attho.

[03]^b^Ajjhattikassupādāyā^eb^ti (vibha. aṭṭha. 973; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 2.2.2) ajjhattikaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya. Upayogatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Asmīti hotī^eb^ti yadetaṃ ajjhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ ^a^V1.0286^ea^ upādāya taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samūhagāhato asmīti evaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ satīti attho. ^b^Itthasmīti hotī^eb^ti khattiyādīsu ‘‘idaṃpakāro aha’’nti evaṃ ^a^M1.0321^ea^ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena hotīti idamettha anupanidhāya gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Evamādinā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘evaṃsmīti, aññathāsmīti, bhavissanti, itthaṃ bhavissanti, evaṃ bhavissanti, aññathā bhavissanti, asasmīti, satasmīti, siyanti, itthaṃ siyanti, evaṃ siyanti, aññathā siyanti, apāhaṃ siyanti, apāhaṃ itthaṃ siyanti, apāhaṃ evaṃ siyanti, apāhaṃ aññathā siya’’nti (vibha. 973) imesaṃ taṇhāvicaritānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tattha ^b^evaṃsmī^eb^ti idaṃ samato upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ, yathā ayaṃ khattiyo, yathā ayaṃ brāhmaṇo, evaṃ ahampīti attho. ^b^Aññathāsmī^eb^ti idaṃ asamaṇo upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ, yathā ayaṃ khattiyo, yathā ayaṃ brāhmaṇo, tato aññathā ahaṃ hīno vā adhiko vāti attho. Iti imāni pubbe vuttāni dveti etāni paccuppannavasena cattāri taṇhāvicaritāni. ^b^Bhavissa^eb^ntiādīni pana cattāri anāgatavasena vuttāni. Tesaṃ purimacatukke vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ^b^Asasmī^eb^ti asatīti asaṃ. Niccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā sassato asmīti attho. ^b^Satasmī^eb^ti sīdatīti sataṃ. Aniccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā asassato asmīti attho. Iti imāni dve sassatucchedavasena vuttāni. Ito parāni ^b^siya^eb^ntiādīni cattāri saṃsayaparivitakkavasena vuttāni, tāni purimacatukke vuttanayena atthato veditabbāni. ^b^Apāhaṃ siya^eb^ntiādīni cattāri ‘‘api nāmāhaṃ bhaveyya’’nti evaṃ patthanākappanavasena vuttāni, tāni purimacatukke vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.

[03]Ettha ca sassatucchedavasena vuttā dve diṭṭhisīsā nāma, asmi, bhavissaṃ, siyaṃ, apāhaṃ siyanti ete pana cattāro suddhasīsā eva, ‘‘itthasmī’’tiādayo tayo tayoti dvādasa sīsamūlakā nāma. Evametāni dve diṭṭhisīsā, cattāro suddhasīsā, dvādasa sīsamūlakāti ajjhattikassupādāya aṭṭhārassa taṇhāvicaritāni veditabbāni.

[03]^b^Bāhirassupādāyā^eb^ti bāhiraṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya. Idampi hi upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti iminā rupena vā…pe… viññāṇena vāti evaṃ rūpādīsu ekameva ‘‘aha’’nti, itaraṃ kiñcanapalibodhabhāvena gahetvā taṇhādivasena ‘‘asmī’’ti abhinivisati, ‘‘iminā’’ti ayamettha viseso. ^b^Asmī^eb^ti iminā khaggena vā chattena vā abhisekena vā ‘‘khattiyohamasmī’’ti ^a^M1.0322^ea^ abhinivisati. ^b^Bāhirarūpādinissitānī^eb^ti bāhirāni parasantatipariyāpannāni rūpavedanādīni nissitāni. ^b^Aṭṭhārasā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘asmī’’tiādinayappavattāni aṭṭhārasa, tāni pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. ‘‘Iminā’’ti hi ^a^V1.0287^ea^ ayamevettha viseso, tasmā ‘‘dve diṭṭhisīsā’’tiādinā vuttanayeneva niddhāretvā veditabbā. Ubhayaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ katvā āha ^b^‘‘chattiṃsā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Niddesatthenā^eb^ti ‘‘chayime āvuso taṇhākāyā’’tiādiniddesapāḷiyā atthavacanena. ^b^Niddesavitthārā^eb^ti tassa ca niddesassa aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritavasena vitthārena. ^b^Vitthārassa ca puna saṅgahato^eb^ti dvīhi ākārehi vitthāritassa aṭṭhārasataṇhāvicaritapabhedassa chaḷeva tissoyevāti ca puna saṅgahaṇato ca.

[03]^b^Vipākavedanā adhippetā^eb^ visesato attānaṃ assādetabbato. Tameva hissā assādetabbataṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Assādanenā^eb^ti abhiratiyā. ^b^Mamāyantā^eb^ti dhanāyantā. ^b^Cittakārādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena iṭṭhavaṇṇārammaṇadāyakānaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Sippasandassanakādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vejjādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Vejjā hi rasāyatanojāvasena tadupatthambhitavasena ca dhammārammaṇassa dāyakā. Svāyaṃ ^b^ādi^eb^-saddo ‘‘vīṇāvādakādī’’tiādinā paccekañca yojetabbo, ^b^puttaṃ mamāyantā^eb^ti puttaṃ sampiyāyantā. Putto viya cettha vedanā daṭṭhabbā, sappāyasappikhīrādīni viya vedanāya paccayabhūtāni iṭṭharūpādiārammaṇāni, dhāti viya rūpādichaḷārammaṇadāyakā cittakārādayo daṭṭhabbā.
[06]Taṇhāvāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^97^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cakkhusamphassajā eva vedanā atītādibhedabhinnā rāsivasena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā eko vedanākāyo yathā vedanākkhandho, evaṃ sotasamphassajādikāti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘chayime āvuso vedanākāyā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘vedanākāyāti vedanāsamūhā’’^eb^ti. Cakkhusamphassato jātā ^b^cakkhusamphassajā vedanā^eb^. Sā pana upādinnāpi anupādinnāpi, tadubhayassapi saṅgaṇhantena atthavaṇṇanāya katattā āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ tāvettha sabbasaṅgāhikakathā’’^eb^ti. Idāni ‘‘vipākavidhi aya’’nti upādinnayeva ^a^M1.0323^ea^ gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘vipākavasenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Manodvāre manoviññāṇadhātusampayuttā^eb^ti tadārammaṇamanoviññāṇadhātusampayuttā.

[03]^b^Avasesāna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0288^ea^ sampaṭicchanādivedanānaṃ. ^b^Upanissayādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena anantarādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Anantarānañhi anantarādivasena, itaresaṃ upanissayavasena phasso paccayo hoti, manodvāre pana tadārammaṇavedanānaṃ manosamphasso upanissayavasena paccayo. ^b^Advārikāna^eb^nti dvārarahitānaṃ. Na hi paṭisandhiādivedanānaṃ kiñci dvāraṃ atthi. ^b^Sahajātamanosamphassasamudayā^eb^ti etenassa tāsaṃ sahajātakoṭiyā paccayabhāvamāha.
[06]Vedanāvāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^98^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cakkhuṃ nissāya uppanno samphasso ^b^cakkhusamphasso^eb^. ^b^Pañcavatthukā^eb^ti cakkhādipañcavatthukā cakkhādipañcavatthusannissayā. ‘‘Upādinnakakathā esā’’ti ^b^bāvīsati^eb^ggahaṇaṃ, pavattikathābhāvato ^b^lokiya^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Vipākamanasampayuttaphassā^eb^ti vipākamanoviññāṇasampayuttā phassā. Paccayuppannena viya paccayenapi upādinnakeneva bhavitabbanti ^b^‘‘channaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.
[06]Phassavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^99^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nidassanamattañcetaṃ, tasmā yathā ettha arūpalokāpekkhāya chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti ekaseso icchitabbo, evaṃ yesaṃ paccayuppanno upādinno, paccayo pana anupādinnotipi icchitabbo. Tesaṃ matena bāhirāyatanavasenapi ekaseso veditabbo ‘‘chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatana’’nti. Visuddhimaggopi imassa āgamassa ^a^M1.0324^ea^ atthasaṃvaṇṇanāti āha ^b^‘‘visuddhimagge…pe… vuttanayamevā’’^eb^ti. Esa nayo aññatthāpi visuddhimaggaggahaṇe.
[06]Saḷāyatanavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^100^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Namanalakkhaṇa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0289^ea^ ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanasabhāvaṃ tena vinā apavattanato. ^b^Ruppanaṃ^eb^ sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppatti. Ime pana ^b^tayo^eb^tiādinā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇavaseneva taṃsaṅkhārakkhandhaggahaṇaṃ, tasmā ye yattha asādhāraṇā, tepi atthato gahitāyevāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Upādiyitvā^eb^ti paccaye katvā. Paccayakaraṇameva hi paccayuppannassa paccayabhūtadhammānaṃ upādiyanaṃ. Samūhasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ etanti ^b^‘‘samūhatthe etaṃ sāmivacana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ tena vinā sambandhassa abhāvato. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti tasmā. ^b^Taṃ sabbampī^eb^ti taṃ bhūtupādāyapabhedaṃ sabbampi sattavīsatividhaṃ. ^b^Yassa nāmassā^eb^ti catuvokārabhave nāmassa. ^b^Viññāṇa^eb^mpi tappariyāpannameva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Rūpassā^eb^ti ekavokārabhave rūpassa. ^b^Viññāṇaṃ^eb^ pana pañcavokārabhave saṅkhāraviññāṇameva. ^b^Yassa^eb^ pañcavokārabhave nāmarūpassa. ^b^Tassa vasenā^eb^ti sahajātassa sahajātādivasena, anantarassa anantarādivasena, itarassa upanissayādivasena tassa nāmassa yathārahaṃ tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
[06]Nāmarūpavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^101^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tebhūmakavipāka^eb^ggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^Saṅkhāro yassa viññāṇassā^eb^ti ettha aṭṭhavidhopi kāmāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhāro soḷasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa, pañcavidhopi rūpāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhāro pañcavidhassa rūpāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa, dvādasavidhopi apuññābhisaṅkhāro sattavidhassa akusalavipākaviññāṇassa, catubbidhopi āneñjābhisaṅkāro ^a^M1.0325^ea^ catubbidhassa arūpāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa yathārahaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu kammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena ca paccayo hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.620) vuttanayena veditabbo.
[06]Viññāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^102^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0290^ea^ abhisañcetayitasabhāvo, āyūhanalakkhaṇoti attho. ^b^Copanavasenā^eb^ti kāyaviññattisaṅkhātacopanavasena. Tena pañcadvārikacetanā paṭikkhipati. ^b^Vacanabhedavasenā^eb^ti vācānicchāraṇavasena. Vacīviññattisamuṭṭhāpanavasenāti attho. Yathāvuttā vīsati, nava mahaggatakusalacetanā cāti ^b^ekūnatiṃsa manosañcetanā^eb^. ^b^‘‘Kusalānaṃ upanissayavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ ārammaṇavasenapīti vattabbaṃ. ^b^Sahajātādivasenā^eb^ti sahajāta-aññamañña-nissaya-sampayutta-atthi-avigatahetuvasena, anantarānaṃ anantarasamanantarānantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanasena paccayo. ^b^Api^eb^-saddena upanissayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
[06]Saṅkhāravāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^103^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Dukkhasacceaññāṇa’’^eb^nti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti aññāṇaṃ. Satipi pahātabbatte pariññeyyattavasena ^b^antogadhaṃ^eb^. ^b^Dukkhasaccañcassā^eb^ti vatthusaṅkhātaṃ sampayuttakhandhasaṅkhātañca dukkhasaccaṃ assa aññāṇassa. Taṃ hissa nissayapaccayo hoti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti dukkhasaccassa. ^b^Yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇenā^eb^ti saṅkhatāviparītasabhāvapaṭivijjhanassa nivāraṇena. Etenassa pariññābhisamayasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa vibandhakabhāvamāha. ^b^Ñāṇappavattiyā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkha’’nti ^a^M1.0326^ea^ anubujjhanākārāya pubbabhāgañāṇappavattiyā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti dukkhasacce. ^b^Appadānenā^eb^ti avissajjanena. Etenassā anubodhañāṇassapi vibandhakatamāha.

[03]^b^Tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ^eb^ antogadhābhāvato. Idha sampayuttakhandhavaseneva vatthuto samudaye aññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ekenevā^eb^ti itaraṃ kāraṇattayaṃ paṭikkhipati. Yadipi aññāṇaṃ nirodhamagge ārammaṇaṃ na karoti, kuto tadantogadhatabbatthutā, te pana jānitukāmassa tappaṭicchādanavasena anirodhamaggesu nirodhamaggaggāhahetutāvasena ca pavattamānaṃ ^b^‘‘nirodhe paṭipadāyañca aññāṇa’’^eb^nti vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭicchādanato’’^eb^tiādi. Tassattho vuttoyeva. ^b^Gambhīrattā^eb^ti sabhāveneva gambhīrattā. Agādhāpatiṭṭhābhāvena taṃvisayassa ñāṇassa uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ^b^duddasaṃ. Purimaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0291^ea^^b^pana^eb^ saccadvayaṃ. ^b^Vañcanīyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti vañcakabhāvena ayāthāvabhāvena upaṭṭhānato ^b^duddasattā gambhīraṃ,^eb^ na sabhāvato, tasmā taṃvisayaṃ aññāṇaṃ uppajjati. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ purimasaccadvaye aniccādisabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā eva niccādivipallāsavasena pavattati aññāṇanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03]Idāni niddesavibhāgenapi avijjāya saccesu pavattivibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^dukkhe^eb^ti ettakena bhummaniddesena. ^b^Saṅgahato^eb^ti pariññeyyatāya dukkhena saṅgahetabbato. Tena niddhāraṇatthaṃ dasseti. Dukkhasmiñhi avijjā niddhārīyati, na aññasmiṃ. ^b^Vatthuto^eb^ti ādhāratthaṃ. Dukkhasannissayā hi avijjā. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ti visayatthaṃ taṃ ārabbha pavattanato. ^b^Kiccato^eb^ti byāpanatthaṃ chādanavasena taṃ byāpetvā pavattanato. Iminā nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo. ^b^Avisesato^eb^ti visesābhāvato, vuttanayena dukkhādīsu pavattiākāravisesaṃ aggahetvāti attho. ^b^Sabhāvato^eb^ti sarasalakkhaṇato. Catunnampi saccānaṃ ajānanasabhāvā hi avijjā. Kāmarāgabhavarāgā kāmāsavabhavāsavāti āha ^b^‘‘sahajātādivasenā’’^eb^ti. Nanu avijjā eva avijjāsavo, so kathaṃ avijjāya paccayoti āha ^b^‘‘pubbuppannā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Avijjāvāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^104^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āsavavāre^eb^^a^M1.0327^ea^ āsava-saddattho āsavavicāro ca heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Kasmā panāyaṃ vāro vutto, nanu avijjādikāva paṭiccasamuppādadesanāti codanaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘ayaṃ vāro’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Paṭiccasamuppādapadesū^eb^ti paṭiccasamuppādakoṭṭhāsesu. Dvādasakoṭṭhāsā hi satthu paṭiccasamuppādadesanā. ^b^Tassāpi paccayadassanavasenā^eb^ti nāyaṃ kāpilānaṃ mūlapakati viya appaccayā, atha kho sappaccayāti avijjāyapi paccayadassanavasena. ^b^Āsavasamudayenā^eb^ti atītabhave āsavānaṃ samudayena etarahi avijjāya samudayo, etarahi avijjāya samudayena anāgate āsavasamudayoti evaṃ āsavāvijjānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannakabhāvena aparāparaṃ pavattamānaṃ ādikoṭiabhāveneva tannimittassa saṃsārassa ādikoṭiabhāvato anamataggatāsiddhi veditabbā.

[03]^b^Dvattiṃsa^eb^^a^V1.0292^ea^^b^ṭhānānī^eb^ti dvattiṃsa saccappaṭivedhakāraṇāni, dvattiṃsa vā catusaccakammaṭṭhānāni. ^b^Imamhā sammādiṭṭhisuttā^eb^ti yāya ariyasāvako sammādiṭṭhi nāma hoti, sā ariyā sammādiṭṭhi ettha vuttāti sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ, ito sammādiṭṭhisuttato.
[03]^b^Catusaccapariyāyehī^eb^ti catusaccādhigamakāraṇehi. ^b^Arahattapariyāyehī^eb^ti ‘‘so sabbaso rāgānusayaṃ pahāyā’’tiādinā arahattādhigamakāraṇehi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catusaṭṭhiyā kāraṇehī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Āsavavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sammādiṭṭhisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^105^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jānapadino^eb^ti ^a^V1.0293^ea^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.95) janapadavanto, janapadassa vā issarā ^b^rājakumārā^eb^. Gottavasena ^b^kurū^eb^ nāma. Tesaṃ nivāso yadi eko janapado, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘ruḷhīsaddenā’’^eb^ti. Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni (pāṇini 1.251) icchanti, ayamettha ruḷhī yathā ^a^M1.0328^ea^ aññatthāpi ‘‘aṅgesu viharati, mallesu viharatī’’ti ca. Tabbisesane pana janapada-sadde jāti-sadde ekavacanameva. ^b^Aṭṭhakathācariyā panā^eb^ti ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesatthajotano. Tena puthuatthavisayatāya evaṃ taṃ bahuvacananti ‘‘bahuke panā’’tiādinā vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ dīpeti. ^b^Sutvā^eb^ti mandhātumahārājassa ānubhāvadassanānusārena paramparāgataṃ kathaṃ sutvā. ^b^Anusaṃyāyantenā^eb^ti anuvicarantena. ^b^Etesaṃ ṭhānanti^eb^ candimasūriyamukhena cātumahārājikabhavanamāha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tattha agamāsī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Soti^eb^ mandhātumahārājā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti cātumahārājikarajjaṃ. ^b^Gahetvā^eb^ti sampaṭicchitvā. ^b^Puna pucchi^eb^ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ. ^b^Dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti^eb^ sudhammāya devasabhāya devapurassa ca catūsu dvāresu ārakkhāya adhikatattā. ^b^Dibbarukkhasahassapaṭimaṇḍita^eb^nti idaṃ ‘‘cittalatāvana’’ntiādīsupi yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsī^eb^ti bhassitvā pathaviyā āsanne ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi, ṭhatvā ca nacirasseva antaradhāyi tenattabhāvena rañño cakkavattissariyassa abhāvato. ‘‘Cirataraṃ kālaṃ ṭhatvā’’ti apare. ^b^Devabhāvo pāturahosi^eb^ devaloke pavattivipākadāyino aparāpariyāyavedanīyassa kammassa katokāsattā. Avayave siddho viseso samudāyassa visesako hotīti ^b^ekampi raṭṭhaṃ bahuvacanena voharīyati^eb^.

[03]^b^Da-kārena atthaṃ vaṇṇaya^eb^nti niruttinayena. ^b^Kammāso^eb^ti kammāsapādo vuccati uttarapadalopena yathā ‘‘rūpabhavo rūpa’’nti. Kathaṃ pana so kammāsapādoti āha ^b^‘‘tassa kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Damito^eb^ti ettha kīdisaṃ damanaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘porisādabhāvato paṭisedhito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ime pana therā^eb^ti majjhimabhāṇake vadati, te pana cūḷakammāsadammaṃ sandhāya tathā vadanti. Yakkhiniputto hi kammāsapādo alīnasattukumārakāle bodhisattena tattha damito, sutasomakāle ^a^V1.0294^ea^ pana bārāṇasirājā porisādabhāvapaṭisedhanena yattha damito, taṃ mahākammāsadammaṃ nāma. ^b^Putto^eb^ti vatvā ^b^atrajo^eb^ti vacanaṃ orasaputtabhāvadassanatthaṃ.

[03]Yehi āvasitapadeso kururaṭṭhanti nāmaṃ labhi, te uttarakuruto āgatā manussā tattha rakkhitaniyāmeneva pañca sīlāni rakkhiṃsu, tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiyā ^a^M1.0329^ea^ pacchimā janatāti, so desadhammavasena avicchedato vattamāno ^b^kuruvattadhammo^eb^ti paññāyittha, ayañca attho ^b^kurudhammajātakena^eb^ (jā. 1.3.76-78) dīpetabbo. So aparabhāge yattha paṭhamaṃ saṃkiliṭṭho jāto, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kururaṭṭhavāsīna’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yattha bhagavato vasanokāso koci vihāro na hoti, tattha kevalaṃ gocaragāmakittanaṃ nidānakathāya pakati, yathā taṃsakkesu viharati devadahaṃ nāma sakkānaṃ nigamoti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘avasanokāsato’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^106^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kasmā bhagavā imaṃ suttamabhāsī^eb^ti asādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati, sādhāraṇaṃ pana pākaṭanti anāmaṭṭhaṃ, tena suttanikkhepo pucchitoti katvā itaro ^b^‘‘kururaṭṭhavāsīna’’^eb^ntiādinā aparajjhāsayoyaṃ suttanikkhepoti dasseti. Etena bāhirasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhāvitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ajjhattikaṃ pana asādhāraṇañca ^b^mūlapariyāyasuttādiṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.373) tadā tannivāsīnaṃ sattānaṃ yebhuyyena yonisomanasikāravantatāya pubbe ca katapuññatābalena utuādisampannameva ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘utupaccayādisampannattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena bhojanādisampattiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Keci pana ‘‘pubbe kuruvattadhammānuṭṭhānavāsanāya uttarakuru viya yebhuyyena utuādisampannameva hontaṃ bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ taṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Cittasarīrakallatāyā^eb^ti cittassa sarīrassa ca arogatāya. ^b^Anuggahitapaññābalā^eb^ti laddhupakārañāṇānubhāvā, anu anu vā āciṇṇapaññātejā. ^b^Ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesū^eb^ti kāyānupassanāvasena cuddasasuṭhānesu, vedanānupassanāvasena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne, tathā cittānupassanāvasena, dhammānupassanāvasena pañcasu ṭhānesūti evaṃ ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā^eb^ti catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ yathā arahattaṃ pāpeti, evaṃ desanāvasena arahatte pakkhipitvā. Suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakasuvaṇṇamañjūsāsu pakkhittāni sumanacampakādinānāpupphāni maṇiputtādisattaratanāni ca yathā bhājanasampattiyā savisesaṃ sobhanti, kiccakarāni ^a^M1.0330^ea^ ca honti manuññābhāvato, evaṃ sīladassanādisampattiyā bhājanavisesabhūtāya kururaṭṭhavāsiparisāya desitā ^a^V1.0295^ea^ ca bhagavato ayaṃ desanā bhiyyosomattāya sobhati, kiccakārī ca hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘yathā hi puriso’’^eb^tiādinā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti kururaṭṭhe.

[03]^b^Pakatiyā^eb^ti sarasato, imissā satipaṭṭhānasuttadesanāya pubbepīti adhippāyo. ^b^Anuyuttā viharanti^eb^ satthu desanānusāratoti adhippāyo. ^b^Vissaṭṭhāttabhāvanā^eb^ti aniccādivasena kismiñci yonisomanasikāre cittaṃ aniyojetvā rūpādiārammaṇe abhirativasena vissaṭṭhacittena ^b^bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,^eb^ pamādavihāraṃ pahāya appamattena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Ekāyano^eb^ti ettha ^b^ayana^eb^-saddo maggapariyāyo. Na kevalamayanameva, atha kho aññepi bahū maggapariyāyāti paduddhāraṃ karonto ^b^‘‘maggassa hī’’^eb^tiādi vatvā yadi maggapariyāyo ayana-saddo, kasmā puna maggoti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ekamaggoti eko eva maggo. Na hi nibbānagāmī maggo añño atthīti. Nanu satipaṭṭhānaṃ idha ‘‘maggo’’ti adhippetaṃ, tadaññe ca bahū maggadhammā atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi, te pana satipaṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva gahitā tadavinābhāvato. Tathā hi ñāṇavīriyādayo niddese gahitā. Uddese pana satiyā eva gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Na dvedhāpathabhūto^eb^ti iminā imassa maggassa anekamaggatābhāvaṃ viya anibbānagāmibhāvābhāvañca dasseti. ^b^Ekenā^eb^ti asahāyena. Asahāyatā ca duvidhā attadutiyatābhāvena vā, yā ‘‘vūpakaṭṭhakāyatā’’ti vuccati, taṇhādutiyatābhāvena vā, yā ‘‘pavivittacittatā’’ti vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vūpakaṭṭhena pavivittacittenā’’^eb^ti. Seṭṭhopi loke ‘‘eko’’ti vuccati ‘‘yāva pare ekato karosī’’tiādīsūti āha ^b^‘‘ekassāti seṭṭhassā’’^eb^ti. Yadi saṃsārato nissaraṇaṭṭho ayanaṭṭho aññesampi upanissayasampannānaṃ sādhāraṇo kathaṃ bhagavatoti āha ^b^‘‘kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Imasmiṃ kho^eb^ti ettha ^b^kho^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇe, tasmā imasmiṃ yevāti attho. ^b^Desanābhedoyeva heso,^eb^ yadidaṃ maggoti vā ayanoti vā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attho paneko’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavatto^eb^ti ^a^M1.0331^ea^ kāyānupassanādimukhena tatthāpi ānāpānādimukhena bhāvanānayena pavatto. ^b^Ekāyana^eb^nti ekagāminaṃ, nibbānagāminanti attho. Nibbānañhi adutiyattā seṭṭhattā ca ‘‘eka’’nti vuccati. Yathāha ‘‘ekañhi saccaṃ na dutīyamatthī’’ti (su. ni. 890) ‘‘yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90) ca. Khayo eva antoti khayanto ^a^V1.0296^ea^, jātiyā khayantaṃ diṭṭhavāti ^b^jātikhayantadassī^eb^. Avibhāgena sabbepi satte hitena anukampatīti ^b^hitānukampī^eb^. ^b^Atariṃsū^eb^ti tariṃsu. ^b^Pubbe^eb^ti purimakā buddhā, ^b^pubbe^eb^ vā atītakāle.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ, ^b^taṃ^eb^ vā kiriyāvuttivācakattaṃ na yujjati. Na hi saṅkheyyappadhānatāya sattavācino eka-saddassa kiriyāvuttivācakatā atthi. ‘‘Sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyyā’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 7.72) viya ^b^‘‘sakiṃ ayano’’ti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ^eb^. ^b^Evaṃ atthaṃ yojetvā^eb^ti evaṃ padatthaṃ yojetvā. ^b^Ubhayathāpī^eb^ti purimanayena pacchimanayena ca. ^b^Na yujjati^eb^ idhādhippetamaggassa anekavāraṃ pavattisabbhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anekavārampi ayatī^eb^ti purimanayassa, anekañcassa ayanaṃ ^b^hotī^eb^ti pacchimanayassa ca paṭikkhepo.

[03]^b^Imasmiṃ pade^eb^ti ‘‘ekāyano ayaṃ bhikkhave maggo’’ti imasmiṃ vākye, imasmiṃ vā ‘‘pubbabhāgamaggo lokuttaramaggo’’ti saṃsayaṭṭhāne. ^b^Missakamaggo^eb^ti lokiyena missako lokuttaramaggo. Visuddhiādīnaṃ nippariyāyahetuṃ saṅgaṇhanto ācariyatthero ‘‘missakamaggo’’ti āha, itaro pariyāyahetu idhādhippetoti ^b^‘‘pubbabhāgamaggo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Saddaṃ sutvāvā^eb^ti ‘‘kālo, bhante, dhammassavanāyā’’ti kālārocanasaddaṃ sutvā. ^b^Evaṃ ukkhipitvā^eb^ti. Evaṃ ‘‘madhuraṃ imaṃ kuhiṃ chaḍḍemā’’ti achaḍḍentā ucchubhāraṃ viya paggahetvā na vicaranti. ^b^Āluḷetī^eb^ti viluḷito ākulo hotīti attho. ^b^Ekāyanamaggo vuccati pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggo^eb^ti. Ettāvatā idhādhippetatthe siddhe tasseva alaṅkāratthaṃ so pana yassa pubbabhāgamaggo, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko’’^eb^tiādikā ^a^M1.0332^ea^ gāthāpi paṭisambhidāmaggatova ānetvā ṭhapitā.

[03]^b^Nibbānagamanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati etenāti nibbānagamanaṃ, so eva aviparītasabhāvatāya attho, tena nibbānagamanaṭṭhena, nibbānādhigamupāyatāyāti attho. ^b^Magganīyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti gavesitabbatāya, ^b^‘‘gamanīyaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti vā pāṭho, upagantabbattāti attho. ^b^Rāgādīhīti^eb^. Iminā rāgadosamohānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ ‘‘rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho mala’’nti (vibha. 924) vacanato. ‘‘Abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhī’’ti pana iminā sabbesampi upakkilesānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ te visuṃ uddhaṭā. ^b^Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā^eb^ti vuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ ^a^V1.0297^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘tathā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kāmaṃ ‘‘visuddhiyā’’ti sāmaññajotanā, cittavisuddhi eva panettha adhippetāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rūpamalavasena panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Na kevalaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathā^eb^vacanameva, atha kho idamettha āhaccabhāsitanti dassento ^b^‘‘tathā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Sā panāyaṃ cittavisuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ ^b^soko^eb^. Ñātibyasanādinimittameva sokādhikatāya ‘‘kahaṃ, ekaputtaka, kahaṃ, ekaputtakā’’ti paridevavasena lapanaṃ ^b^paridevo,^eb^ āyatiṃ anuppajjanaṃ idha ^b^samatikkamo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘pahānāyā’’^eb^ti. Taṃ panassa samatikkamāvahataṃ nidassanavasena dassento ^b^‘‘ayaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Tattha ^b^yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehī^eb^ti atītesu khandhesu taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Pacchā^eb^ti parato. ^b^Te^eb^ti tuyhaṃ. ^b^Māhū^eb^ti mā ahu. ^b^Kiñcana^eb^nti rāgādikiñcanaṃ. Etena anāgatesu khandhesu saṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Majjhe^eb^ti tadubhayavemajjhe. ^b^No ce gahessasī^eb^ti na upādiyissasi ce. Etena paccuppanne khandhapabandhe upādānappavatti vuttā. ^b^Upasanto carissasī^eb^ti evaṃ addhattayagatasaṃkilesavisodhane sati nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya upasanto hutvā viharissasīti arahattanikūṭena gāthaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imaṃ gātha’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Puttā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0333^ea^ orasā, aññepi vā ye keci. ^b^Pitā^eb^ti janako. ^b^Bandhavā^eb^ti ñātakā. Ayañhettha attho – puttā vā pitā vā bandhavā vā ^b^antakena^eb^ maccunā ^b^adhipannassa^eb^ abhibhūtassa maraṇato tāṇāya na honti, tasmā ^b^natthi ñātīsu tāṇatā^eb^ti. Na hi ñātīnaṃ vasena maraṇato ārakkhā atthi, tasmā paṭācāre ‘‘ubho puttā kālakatā’’tiādinā (apa. therī 2.2.498) mā niratthakaṃ paridevi, dhammaṃyeva pana yāthāvato passāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti yathānulomaṃ pavattitāya sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya pariyosāne sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ satipaṭṭhānamaggavasena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsīti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Na hi catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathāya vinā sāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamo atthi. ^b^‘‘Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā’’^eb^ti pana idaṃ sokavinodanavasena pavattitāya gāthāya paṭhamaṃ sutattā vuttaṃ. Esa nayo itaragāthāyapi. ^b^Bhāvanā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0298^ea^ paññābhāvanā. Sā hi idhādhippetā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā rūpādīnaṃ aniccādito anupassanāpi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā, tasmā. ^b^Tepī^eb^ti santatimahāmattapaṭācārā.

[03]^b^Pañcasate core^eb^ti satasatacoraparivāre pañca core paṭipāṭiyā pesesi. Te araññaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ pariyesantā anukkamena therassa samīpe samāgacchiṃsu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘te gantvā theraṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsū’’^eb^ti. Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjīti sambandho. Therassa hi sīlaṃ paccavekkhato suparisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ūruṭṭhibhedajanitaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ vikkhambhesi. ^b^Pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^Saññapessāmī^eb^ti saññattiṃ karissāmi. ^b^Aḍḍiyāmī^eb^ti jigucchāmi. ^b^Harāyāmī^eb^ti lajjāmi. ^b^Vipassisa^eb^nti sammasiṃ.

[03]^b^Pacalāyantāna^eb^nti pacalāyanaṃ niddaṃ upagatānaṃ. ^b^Vatasampanno^eb^ti dhutacaraṇasampanno. ^b^Pamāda^eb^nti pacalāyanaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Oruddhamānaso^eb^ti uparuddhādhicitto. ^b^Pañjarasmi^eb^nti sarīre. Sarīrañhi nhārusambandhāṭṭhisaṅghātatāya idha ‘‘pañjara’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Pītavaṇṇāya paṭākāya pariharaṇato mallayuddhacittakatāya ca ^b^pītamallo. Tīsu rajjesū^eb^ti paṇḍucoḷagoḷarajjesu. Mallā sīhaḷadīpe sakkārasammānaṃ ^a^M1.0334^ea^ labhantīti ^b^tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma^eb^. ^b^Taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpādayo ‘mamā’ti na gahetabbā’’ti na tumhākavaggena (saṃ. ni. 3.33-34) pakāsitamatthaṃ attano cittamattahatthino aṅkusaṃ katvā. ^b^Jaṇṇukehi caṅkamati^eb^ ‘‘nisinne niddāya avasaro hotī’’ti. ^b^Byākaritvā^eb^ti attano vīriyārambhassa saphalatāpavedanamukhena sabrahmacārīnaṃ ussāhaṃ janento aññaṃ byākaritvā. ^b^Bhāsita^eb^nti vacanaṃ. Kassa pana tanti āha ^b^‘‘buddhaseṭṭhassa,^eb^^b^sabbalokaggavādino’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na tumhāka^eb^ntiādi tassa pavattiākāradassanaṃ. Tayidaṃ me saṅkhārānaṃ accantavūpasamakāraṇanti dassento ^b^‘‘aniccā vatā’’^eb^ti gāthaṃ āhari. Tena idānāhaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgasaṅkhātassa rogassa abhāvena arogo parinibbutoti dasseti.

[03]^b^Assā^eb^ti sakkassa. ^b^Upapattī^eb^ti devūpapatti. ^b^Punapākatikāva ahosi^eb^ sakkabhāveneva upapannattā. ^b^Subrahmā^eb^ti evaṃ nāmo. Accharānaṃ nirayūpapattiṃ disvā tato pabhuti satataṃ pavattamānaṃ attano cittutrāsaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ citta’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^utrasta^eb^nti santastaṃ bhītaṃ. ^b^Ubbigga^eb^nti saṃviggaṃ. ^b^Utrasta^eb^nti vā saṃviggaṃ. ^b^Ubbigga^eb^nti bhayavasena saha kāyena sañcalitaṃ. ^b^Anuppannesū^eb^ti anāgatesu. ^b^Kicchesū^eb^ti dukkhesu. Nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ, bhāvīdukkhapavattinimittanti ^a^V1.0299^ea^ attho. ^b^Uppatitesū^eb^ti uppannesu kicchesūti yojanā, tadā attano parivārassa uppannadukkhanimittanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Bojjhā^eb^ti bodhito, ariyamaggatoti attho. ^b^Aññatrā^eb^ti ca padaṃ apekkhitvā nissakkavacanaṃ, tasmā bodhiṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Tapasā^eb^ti tapokammato. Tena maggādhigamassa upāyabhūtaṃ dhutaṅgasevanādisallekhapaṭipadaṃ dasseti. ^b^Indriyasaṃvarā^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvaraṇato. Etena satisaṃvarasīsena sabbampi saṃvarasīlaṃ, lakkhaṇahāranayena vā sabbampi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ dasseti. ^b^Sabbanissaggā^eb^ti sabbupadhinissajjanato sabbakilesappahānato. Kilesesu hi nissaṭṭhesu kammavaṭṭaṃ vipākavaṭṭañca nissaṭṭhameva hotīti. ^b^Sotthi^eb^nti khemaṃ anupaddavataṃ.

[03]Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ^b^ñāyo,^eb^ ariyamaggoti āha ^b^‘‘ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0335^ea^. ^b^Taṇhāvānavirahitattā^eb^ti taṇhāsaṅkhātavānavivittattā. Taṇhā hi khandhehi khandhaṃ, kammunā vā phalaṃ, sattehi vā dukkhaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti vānanti vuccati. Tayidaṃ natthi ettha vānaṃ, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa vānanti ^b^nibbānaṃ,^eb^ asaṅkhatā dhātu. Parapaccayena vinā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sacchikiriyāti āha ^b^‘‘attapaccakkhatāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Nanu ‘‘visuddhiyā’’ti cittavisuddhiyā adhippetattā visuddhiggahaṇenevettha sokasamatikkamādayopi gahitā eva honti, te puna kasmā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘tattha kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sāsanayuttikovide^eb^ti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādilakkhaṇāyaṃ dhammanītiyaṃ cheke. ^b^Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpetī^eb^ti ye ye bodhaneyyapuggalā saṅkhepavitthārādivasena yathā yathā bodhetabbā, attano desanāvilāsena bhagavā te te tathā tathā bodhento taṃ tamatthaṃ ñāpeti. ^b^Taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento^eb^ti atthāpattiṃ agaṇento taṃ taṃ atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento. Na hi sammāsambuddhā atthāpattiñāpakādisādhanīyavacanāti. ^b^Saṃvattatī^eb^ti jāyati, hotīti attho. Yasmā anatikkantasokaparidevassa na kadāci cittavisuddhi atthi sokaparidevasamatikkamamukheneva cittavisuddhiyā ijjhanato, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamena hotī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana domanassapaccayehi dukkhadhammehi puṭṭhaṃ puthujjanaṃ sokādayo abhibhavanti, pariññātesu ca tesu te na honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamo dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ñāyassā^eb^ti aggamaggassa tatiyamaggassa ca. Tadadhigamena hi yathākkamaṃ ^a^V1.0300^ea^ dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamo. Sacchikiriyābhisamayasahabhāvīpi itarābhisamayo tadavinābhāvato sacchikiriyābhisamayahetuko viya vutto ^b^‘‘ñāyassādhigamo nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā’’^eb^ti. Phalañāṇena vā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā’’^eb^ti. Sampadānavacanañcetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇabhaṇana^eb^nti pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Tayidaṃ na idheva, atha kho aññatthāpi satthā akāsiyevāti dassento ^b^‘‘yatheva hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tatthāadimhi kalyāṇaṃ, ādi vā kalyāṇaṃ etassāti ^b^ādikalyāṇaṃ^eb^. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Atthasampattiyā ^b^sātthaṃ^eb^. Byañjanasampattiyā ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^. Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhapāripūrito upanetabbassa abhāvā ca ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ^eb^. Nirupakkilesato apanetabbassa abhāvā ^a^M1.0336^ea^ ca ^b^parisuddhaṃ^eb^. Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato sāsana ^b^brahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca^eb^ vo ^b^pakāsessāmī^eb^ti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.147) vuttanayena veditabbo. ^b^Ariyavaṃsā^eb^ti ariyānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ vaṃsā paveṇiyo. ^b^Aggaññā^eb^ti ‘‘aggā’’ti jānitabbā sabbavaṃsehi seṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^Rattaññā^eb^ti ‘‘cirarattā’’ti jānitabbā. ^b^Vaṃsaññā^eb^ti ‘‘buddhādīnaṃ vaṃsā’’ti jānitabbā. ^b^Porāṇā^eb^ti purātanā anadhunātanattā. ^b^Asaṃkiṇṇā^eb^ti avikiṇṇā anapanītā. ^b^Asaṃkiṇṇapubbā^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ imehī’’ti ariyehi na apanītapubbā. ^b^Na saṃkīyantī^eb^ti idānipi tehi na apanīyanti. ^b^Na saṃkīyissantī^eb^ti anāgatepi tehi na apanīyissanti. ^b^Appaṭikuṭṭhā…pe… viññūhī^eb^ti ye loke viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tehi apaccakkhatā aninditā, agarahitāti attho. ^b^Visuddhiyātiādīhī^eb^ti visuddhiādidīpanehi. ^b^Padehī^eb^ti vākyehi, visuddhiatthatādibhedabhinnehi vā dhammakoṭṭhāsehi.

[03]^b^Upaddave^eb^ti anatthe. ^b^Visuddhi^eb^nti visujjhanaṃ saṃkilesappahānaṃ. Vācuggatakaraṇaṃ ^b^uggaho^eb^. ^b^Pariyāpuṇanaṃ^eb^ paricayo. Atthassa hadaye ṭhapanaṃ ^b^dhāraṇaṃ^eb^. Parivattanaṃ ^b^vācanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Gandhārako^eb^ti gandhāradese uppanno. ^b^Pahontī^eb^ti sakkonti aniyyānamaggāti micchāmaggā, micchattaniyatāniyatamaggāpi vā. Suvaṇṇanti kūṭasuvaṇṇampi vuccati. ^b^Paṇī^eb^ti kācamaṇipi. ^b^Muttā^eb^ti veḷujāpi. ^b^Pavāḷa^eb^nti pallavopi vuccatīti^b^ rattajambunadā^eb^dipadehi te visesitā.

[03]^b^Na tato heṭṭhā^eb^ti (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 2.5.367; dī. ni. ṭī. 2.373) idhādhippetakāyādīnaṃ vedanādisabhāvattābhāvā, kāyavedanācittavimuttassa tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhāgahaṇesu vipallāsavatthūnaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pañcamassa ^a^V1.0301^ea^ pana vipallāsavatthuno abhāvā ^b^‘‘na uddha’’^eb^nti āha. Ārammaṇavibhāgena hettha satipaṭṭhānavibhāgoti. ^b^Tayo satipaṭṭhānā^eb^ti satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthuddhāradassanaṃ, na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthadassananti. ^b^Ādīsu hi satigocaro^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ samudayo, nāmarūpasamudayā cittassa samudayo, manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo’’ti satipaṭṭhānāti vuttānaṃ ^a^M1.0337^ea^ satigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttapadese saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ paṭisambhidāpāḷiyampi (paṭi. ma. 3.34) avasesapāḷippadesadassanattho ^b^ādi^eb^-saddo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Satiyā paṭṭhāna^eb^nti satiyā patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Dānādīni satiyā karontassa rūpādīni kasiṇādīni ca satiyā ṭhānaṃ hontīti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha ^b^‘‘padhānaṃ ṭhāna’’^eb^nti. Pa-saddo hi idha ‘‘paṇītā dhammā’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 14 tikamātikā) viya padhānatthadīpakoti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Ariyo^eb^ti ariyaṃ sabbasattaseṭṭhaṃ sammāsambuddhamāha. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutte (ma. ni. 3.311). Suttekadesena hi suttaṃ dasseti. Tattha hi –

[08]‘‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo…pe… marahatīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya ‘‘idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti. Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṃ odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, yadariyo…pe… arahati.

[08]Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā…pe… idaṃ vo sukhāyāti. Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti…pe… vattanti. Ekacce sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, na ceva attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Anattamanatañca attamanatañca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhato viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ…pe… arahati.

[08]Puna caparaṃ…pe… sukhāyāti. Tassa sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatañca paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati ^a^V1.0302^ea^ sato sampajāno ^a^M1.0338^ea^. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ…pe… arahatī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.311) –

[03]Evaṃ paṭighānunayehi anavassutatā, niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya tadubhayavītivattatā ‘‘satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttā. Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato, na paccekabuddhādīnaṃ. ^b^Pa^eb^-saddo ārambhaṃ joteti, ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha ^b^‘‘pavattayitabbatoti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Satiyā^eb^ karaṇabhūtāya ^b^paṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ ^b^satipaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Ana-saddo hi bahulavacanena kammatthopi hotīti.

[03]Tathāssa kattuatthopi labbhatīti ^b^‘‘patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^pa^eb^-saddo bhūsatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandhanaṃ dīpetīti ^b^‘‘okkantitvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho’’^eb^ti āha. Puna bhāvatthaṃ sati-saddaṃ paṭṭhāna-saddañca vaṇṇento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena purimavikappe sati-saddo paṭṭhāna-saddo ca katthuatthoti viññāyati. ^b^Saraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti cirakatassa cirabhāsitassa ca anussaraṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Ida^eb^nti yaṃ ‘‘satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttaṃ, idaṃ ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ suttapadese adhippetaṃ.

[03]^b^Yadi eva^eb^nti yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sati nāma eko dhammo, evaṃ sante kasmā ^b^‘‘satipaṭṭhānā’’^eb^ti bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘satibahuttā’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi bahukā etā satiyo, atha kasmā ‘‘maggo’’ti ekavacananti yojanā. ^b^Maggaṭṭhenā^eb^ti niyyānaṭṭhena. Niyyāniko hi maggadhammo, teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattupagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati, atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ maggīyatīti attanāva pubbe vuttaṃ paccāharati ^b^‘‘vuttañceta’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^catassopi cetā^eb^ti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo. ^b^Aparabhāge^eb^ti ariyamaggakkhaṇe. ^b^Kiccaṃ sādhayamānā^eb^ti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu subhasaññādividhamanena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe sakiṃyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchanti. Catubbidhakiccasādhaneneva hettha bahuvacananiddeso. ^b^Evañca satī^eb^ti maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upādāya ‘‘maggo’’ti ekavacanena ārammaṇabhedena ^a^M1.0339^ea^ catubbidhataṃ upādāya ‘‘cattāro’’ti ca vattabbatāya sativijjamānattā. ^b^Vacanānusandhinā^eb^ ‘‘ekāyano aya’’ntiādikā desanā ^b^sānusandhikāva,^eb^ na ananusandhikāti adhippāyo. Vuttamevatthaṃ nidassanena paṭipādetuṃ ^b^‘‘mārasenappamaddana’’^eb^nti suttapadaṃ (saṃ. ni. 5.224) ānetvā ^a^V1.0303^ea^^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādinā nidassanaṃ saṃsandeti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^tiādi nigamanaṃ.

[03]Visesato kāyo ca vedanā ca assādassakāraṇanti tappahānatthaṃ tesu taṇhāvatthūsu oḷārikasukhumesu asubhadukkhabhāvadassanāni mandatikkhapaññehi taṇhācaritehi sukarānīti tāni tesaṃ ‘‘visuddhimaggo’’ti vuttāni tathā ‘‘niccaṃ attā’’ti abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇesu cittadhammesu aniccānattatādassanāni sarāgādivasena saññāphassādivasena nīvaraṇādivasena ca nātippabhedātippabhedagatesu tesu tappahānatthaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ diṭṭhicaritānaṃ sukarānīti tesaṃ tāni ‘‘visuddhimaggo’’ti vuttāni. Ettha ca yathā cittadhammānampi taṇhāya vatthubhāvo sambhavati, tathā kāyavedanānampi diṭṭhiyāti satipi nesaṃ catunnampi taṇhādiṭṭhiyā vatthubhāve yo yassa sātisayapaccayo, taṃdassanatthaṃ visesaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tikkhapaññasamathayāniko oḷārikārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanto tattha aṭṭhatvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya vedanaṃ pariggaṇhātīti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Oḷārikārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato’’^eb^ti. Vipassanāyānikassa pana sukhume citte dhammesu ca cittaṃ pakkhandatīti cittadhammānupassanānaṃ mandatikkhapaññāvipassanāyānikānaṃ visuddhimaggatā vuttā.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ tatthā^eb^ti ettha tattha-saddassa ‘‘pahānattha’’nti etena yojanā. Parato ^b^tesaṃ tatthā^eb^ti etthāpi esevanayo. Pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hoti bhavoghassa vedanā vatthu, santatighanagahaṇavasena visesato citte attābhiniveso hotīti diṭṭhoghassa cittaṃ vatthu, dhammesu vinibbhogassa dukkarattā dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya duppaṭivijjhattā sammoho hotīti avijjoghassa dhammā vatthu, tasmā tesaṃ pahānatthaṃ ^b^cattārova vuttā.^eb^

[03]Yadaggena ^a^M1.0340^ea^ ca kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, tadaggena abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtā vedanā visesena byāpādakāyaganthassa vatthu, citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa attano sīlena suddhītiādi parāmasanaṃ hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu, nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthu, sukhavedanāssādavasena paralokanirapekkho ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntiādikaṃ parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu santatighanagahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ ^a^V1.0304^ea^ vatthu, dhammasabhāvānavabodhena bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā dhammā vatthu. Ye panettha avuttā, tesaṃ vuttanayena vatthubhāvo yojetabbo. Tathā hi oghesu vuttanayā eva yogāsavesupi yojanā atthato abhinnattā. Tathā paṭhamoghatatiyacatutthaganthayojanāya vuttanayā eva kāyacittadhammānaṃ itarūpādānavatthutā yojanā, tathā kāmoghabyāpādakāyaganthayojanāya vuttanayā eva kāyavedanānaṃ chandadosāgati vatthutā yojanā vā.

[03]‘‘Āhārasamudayā kāyasamudayo, phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo, (saṃ. ni. 5.408) saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa’’nti (ma. ni. 3.126; udā. 1; vibha. 225) vacanato kāyādīnaṃ samudayabhūtā kabaḷīkārāhāraphassamanosañcetanāviññāṇāhārā kāyādiparijānanena pariññātā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘catubbidhāhārapariññattha’’^eb^nti ^b^pakaraṇanayo^eb^ti ^b^nettipakaraṇavasena^eb^ suttantasaṃvaṇṇanānayo.

[03]^b^Saraṇavasenā^eb^ti kāyādīnaṃ kusalādidhammānañca upadhāraṇavasena. Saranti gacchanti nibbānaṃ etāyāti satīti imasmiṃ atthe ekatte ekasabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇaṃ samāgamo ^b^ekattasamosaraṇaṃ^eb^. Etadeva hi dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekanibbānapavesahetubhūtā vā samānatā eko satipaṭṭhānassa bhāvo ekattaṃ, tattha samosaraṇaṃ ^a^M1.0341^ea^ taṃsabhāgatā ^b^ekattasamosaraṇaṃ^eb^. Ekanibbānapavesahetubhāvaṃ pana dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni saheva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇatthena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbāni, purimasmiṃ visuṃ. ^b^Saraṇavasenā^eb^ti vā ‘‘gamanavasenā’’ti atthe sati tadeva gamanaṃ samosaraṇanti, samosaraṇe vā satisaddatthavasena avuccamāne dhāraṇatāva satīti satisaddatthantarābhāvā purimaṃ satibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, pacchimaṃ ekabhāvassāti nibbānasamosaraṇepi sahitāneva tāni satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti. ^b^Cuddasavidhena,^eb^^b^navavidhena, soḷasavidhena, pañcavidhenā^eb^ti idaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ (ma. ni. 1.107) āgatānaṃ ānāpānapabbādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tesaṃ pana antarabhedavasena tadanugatabhedavasena ca bhāvanāya anekavidhatā labbhatiyeva. Catūsu disāsu uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍasadisatā kāyānupassanāditaṃtaṃsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanānubhāvassa daṭṭhabbā.

[03]‘‘Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye’’tiādivacanato (dī. ni. 3.80; saṃ. ni. 5.372) bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā, yadidaṃ kāyānupassanādayo. Tattha yasmā kāyānupassanādipaṭipattiyā bhikkhu hoti, tasmā ‘‘kāyānupassī viharatī’’tiādinā bhikkhuṃ dasseti, bhikkhumhi taṃ niyamatoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato’’^eb^ti. Satthu cariyānuvidhāyakattā ^a^V1.0305^ea^ sakalasāsanasampaṭiggāhakattā ca ^b^sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā bhājanabhāvo^eb^.

[03]^b^Samaṃ careyyā^eb^ti kāyādivisamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya. Rāgādivūpasamena ^b^santo^eb^. Indriyadamena ^b^danto^eb^. Catumagganiyāmena ^b^niyato^eb^. Seṭṭhacaritāya ^b^brahmacārī^eb^. Kāyadaṇḍādioropanena ^b^nidhāya daṇḍaṃ^eb^. Ariyabhāve ṭhito ^b^so^eb^ evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi ^b^brāhmaṇo samaṇo bhikkhū^eb^ti veditabbo.

[03]‘‘Ayañceva kāyo bahiddho ca nāmarūpa’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.373) khandhapañcakaṃ, ‘‘sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.271, 287; pārā. 11) nāmakāyo kāyoti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyeti rūpakāye’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Asammissato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0342^ea^ ‘‘vedanādayopi ettha sitā ettha paṭibaddhā’’ti kāye vedanādianupassanāpasaṅgepi āpanne tato asammissatoti attho. Samūhavisayatāya cassa kāya-saddassa samudāyupādānatāya ca asubhākārassa ‘‘kāye’’ti ekavacanaṃ, tathā ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ‘‘citte’’ti ekavacanaṃ, vedanā pana sukhādibhedabhinnā visuṃ visuṃ anupassitabbāti dassentena ‘‘vedanāsū’’ti bahuvacanena vuttā, tatheva ca niddeso pavattito, dhammā ca paropaṇṇāsabhedā anupassitabbākārena ca anekabhedā evāti tepi bahuvacanavaseneva vuttā. Avayavīgāha-samaññātidhāvana-sārādānābhinivesanisedhanatthaṃ kāyaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgehi, tāni ca kesādīhi, kesādike ca bhūtupādāyarūpehi vinibbhujjanto ^b^‘‘tathā na kāye’’^eb^tiādimāha. Pāsādādinagarāvayavasamūhe avayavīvādinopi avayavīgāhaṃ na karonti, nagaraṃ nāma koci attho atthīti pana kesañci samaññātidhāvanaṃ siyāti itthipurisādisamaññātidhāvane nagaranidassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṅgapaccaṅgasamūho, kesalomādisamūho bhūtupādāyasamūho ca yathāvuttasamūhe tabbinimutto kāyopi nāma koci natthi, pageva itthiādayoti āha ^b^‘‘kāyo vā…pe… dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Koci dhammo^eb^ti iminā sattajīvādiṃ paṭikkhipati, avayavī pana kāyapaṭikkhepeneva paṭikkhittoti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ kāyādisaññābhidhānānītiāha ^b^‘‘yathāvutta…pe… karontī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Yaṃ passati^eb^ itthiṃ purisaṃ vā. Nanu cakkhunā itthipurisadassanaṃ natthīti? Saccametaṃ, ‘‘itthiṃ ^a^V1.0306^ea^ passāmi, purisaṃ passāmī’’ti pana pavattasaññāya vasena ‘‘yaṃ passatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Micchādassanena vā diṭṭhiyā ^b^yaṃ passati, na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ^eb^ rūpāyatanaṃ na hotīti attho viparītaggāhavasena micchāparikappitarūpattā. Atha vā taṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ na hoti acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyattā, diṭṭhaṃ vā taṃ na hoti. ^b^Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passatī^eb^ti yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ paññācakkhunā bhūtato na passatīti attho. ^b^Apassaṃ bajjhate^eb^ti imaṃ attabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paññācakkhunā apassanto ‘‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me atto’’ti kilesabandhanena bajjhati.

[03]^b^Na^eb^^a^M1.0343^ea^^b^aññadhammānupassī^eb^ti na aññasabhāvānupassī, asubhādito aññākārānupassī na hotīti attho. ^b^Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī^eb^tiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. ^b^Pathavīkāya^eb^nti kesādikoṭṭhāsapathaviṃ dhammasamūhattā ‘‘kāyo’’ti vadati, lakkhaṇapathavimeva vā anekappabhedaṃ sakalasarīragataṃ pubbāpariyabhāvena ca pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena gahetvā ‘‘kāyo’’ti vadati. ^b^Āpokāya^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Evaṃ gahetabbassā^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ mama’’nti evaṃ attattaniyabhāvena andhabālehi gahetabbassa. Idāni sattannaṃ anupassanākārānampi vasena kāyānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^aniccato anupassatī^eb^ti catusamuṭṭhānikakāyaṃ ‘‘anicca’’nti anupassati, evaṃ passanto evaṃ cassa aniccākārampi anupassatīti vuccati. Tathābhūtassa cassa niccaggāhassa lesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘no niccato’’^eb^ti tathāhesa ‘‘niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’ti (paṭi. ma. 3.35) vutto. Ettha ca ‘‘aniccato eva anupassatī’’ti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘no niccato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā eva-kārassa, uparidesanāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ.

[03]^b^Dukkhato anupassatī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – aniccassa dukkhattā tameva kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati, dukkhassa anattattā ^b^anattato anupassati^eb^. Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, taṃ anabhinanditabbaṃ, na tattha rajjitabbaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nibbindati no nandati,^eb^^b^virajjati no rajjatī’’^eb^ti. So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ ^b^nirodheti no samudeti,^eb^ samudayaṃ na karotīti attho. Evaṃ paṭipanno ca ^b^paṭinissajjati no ādiyati^eb^. Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyatannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ ^a^V1.0307^ea^ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato ‘‘pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cā’’ti vuccati, tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati ^a^M1.0344^ea^, tathābhūto ca nibbattanavasena kilese na ādiyati, nāpi adosadassitāvasena saṅkhatārammaṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭinissajjati no ādiyatī’’^eb^ti. Idānissa tāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^niccasañña^eb^nti ‘‘saṅkhārā niccā’’ti evaṃ pavattaviparītasaññaṃ. Diṭṭhicittavipallāsapahānamukheneva saññāvipallāsappahānanti saññāgahaṇaṃ, saññāsīsena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Nandi^eb^nti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayemeva.

[03]^b^Viharatī^eb^ti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘iriyatī’’^eb^ti iriyāpathaṃ pavattetīti attho. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena abhibyāpanato ^b^‘‘tīsu bhavesū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, uppajjanavasena pana kilesā parittabhūmakā evāti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātāpa-saddo pana vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vīriyassetaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. Atha vā paṭipakkhapahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati, na aññe dhammā. ^b^Ātāpī^eb^ti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti. Sammā, samantato, sāmañca pajānanto ^b^sampajāno,^eb^ asammissato vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena sammā aviparītaṃ, sabbākārapajānanena samantato, uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sayaṃ pajānantoti attho. Yadi paññāya anupassati, kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānatāti āha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sabbatthika^eb^nti sabbattha bhavaṃ sabbattha līne uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā, sabbe vā līne uddhate ca bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti ^b^sabbatthikā^eb^. Satiyā laddhūpakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte ^b^kāye^eb^ kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu ^b^kāyānupassī viharati. Antosaṅkhepo^eb^ anto olīyano, kosajjanti attho. ^b^Upāyapariggaheti^eb^ ettha sīlavisodhanādi gaṇanādi uggahakosallādi ca ^b^upāyo,^eb^ tabbipariyāyato ^b^anupāyo^eb^ veditabbo. Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassati yathāvuttaupāyaṃ na pariccajati, anupāyañca na upādiyati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘muṭṭhassati…pe… asamattho^eb^^a^M1.0345^ea^^b^hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu apariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena ^b^assa^eb^ yogino.

[03]Yasmā ^a^V1.0308^ea^ satiyevettha satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttā, tasmāssa sampayuttā dhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti āha ^b^‘‘sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā’’^eb^ti. Aṅga-saddo cettha kāraṇapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo, satiggahaṇeneva cettha samādhissati gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā. Yasmā vā satisīsenāyaṃ desanā. Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ hoti, nibbānādhigamo vā, na ca kevalā sati pavattati, tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya sampayogaṅgadassanatāti aṅga-saddassa avayavapariyāyatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Pahānaṅga^eb^nti ‘‘vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.226; ma. ni. 1.271, 287; saṃ. ni. 2.152; a. ni. 4.123; pārā. 11) viya pahātabbaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ. Yasmā ettha lokiyamaggo adhippeto, na lokuttaramaggo, tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti vedanādidhammānaṃ. Tesañhi tattha anadhippetattā ^b^‘‘atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Avisesena dvīhipi nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti katvā puna ekekena vuttaṃ pahānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘visesenā’’^eb^ti āha. Atha vā ‘‘vineyya nīvaraṇānī’’ti avatvā abhijjhādomanassavacanassa payojanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘visesenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kāyānupassanābhāvanāya hi ujuvipaccanīkānaṃ anurodhādīnaṃ pahānaṃ dassanaṃ etassa payojananti. ^b^Kāyasampattimūlakassā^eb^ti rūpa-bala-yobbanārogyādi-sarīrasampadā-nimittassa. Vuttavipariyāyato ^b^kāyavipattimūlako virodho^eb^ veditabbo. ^b^Kāyabhāvanāyā^eb^ti kāyānupassanābhāvanāya. Sā hi idha ‘‘kāyabhāvanā’’ti adhippetā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti anurodhādippahānavacanena. ^b^Yogānubhāvo hī^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Satisampajaññenā^eb^ti atisampajaññaggahaṇena. ^b^Sabbatthikakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti buddhānussati mettā maraṇassati asubhabhāvanā ca. Idañhi catukkaṃ yoginā parihariyamānaṃ ‘‘sabbatthikakammaṭṭhāna’’nti vuccati atisampajaññabalena avicchinnassa tassa pariharitabbattā, ^b^satiyā vā samatho vutto^eb^ tassā samāddhikkhandhena saṅgahitattā.

[03]^b^Tenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0346^ea^ saddatthaṃ anādiyitvā bhāvatthasseva vibhajanavasena pavattena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saha. ^b^Aṭṭhakathānayo^eb^ti saddatthassapi vivaraṇavasena yathārahaṃ vutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanānayo. ^b^Yathā saṃsandatī^eb^ti yathā atthato adhippāyato ca avilomento aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti, evaṃ veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vedanādīnaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0309^ea^^b^puna vacane^eb^ti ettha nissayapaccayabhāvavasena cittadhammānaṃ vedanāsannissitattā pañcavokārabhave arūpadhammānaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttito ca vedanāya kāyādianupassanāpasaṅgepi āpanne tadasammissato vavatthānadassanatthaṃ ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthañca dutiyavedanāgahaṇaṃ. Tena na vedanāyaṃ kāyānupassī, cittadhammānupassī vā, atha kho vedanānupassīyevāti vedanāsaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ vedanānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā ‘‘yasmiṃ samaye sukhā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā. Yasmiṃ vā pana samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye itarā vedanā’’ti vedanābhāvasāmaññe aṭṭhatvā taṃ taṃ vedanaṃ vinibbhujitvā dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dhuvabhāvaviveko dassito hoti. Tena tāsaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānadassanena aniccatāya tato eva dukkhatāya anattatāya ca dassanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hoti. ^b^Ghanavinibbhogādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ayampi attho veditabbo. Ayañhi vedanāyaṃ vedanānupassīyeva, na aññadhammānupassī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma bālo amaṇisabhāvepi udakabubbuḷake maṇiākārānupassī hoti, na evamayaṃ ṭhitiramaṇīyepi vedayite, pageva itarasmiṃ manuññākārānupassī, atha kho khaṇabhaṅguratāya avasavattitāya kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya ca aniccānattāsubhākārānupassī, vipariṇāmadukkhatāya saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca visesato dukkhānupassīyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ cittadhammesupi yathārahaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ vattabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kevalaṃ panidhā’’^eb^tiādinā idha ‘ettakaṃ veditabba’’nti veditabbaparicchedaṃ dasseti. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti iminā yathā cittaṃ dhammā ca anupassitabbā, tathā tāni anupassanto ‘‘citte cittānupassī, dhammesu dhammānupassī’’ti veditabboti imamatthaṃ atidisati.

[03]^b^Yo^eb^^a^M1.0347^ea^^b^sukhaṃ dukkhato addā^eb^ti yo bhikkhu sukhavedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya ‘‘dukkha’’nti paññācakkhunā addakkhi. ^b^Dukkhamaddakkhi sallato^eb^ti dukkhavedanaṃ pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallanti addakkhi passi. ^b^Adukkhamasukha^eb^nti upekkhāvedanaṃ. ^b^Santa^eb^nti sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikatāya paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvatāya ca santaṃ. ^b^Aniccato^eb^ti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikatoniccapaṭikkhepato ca ‘‘anicca’’nti yo addakkhi. ^b^Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu^eb^ ekaṃsena paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammā passanakoti attho.

[03]^b^Dukkhātipī^eb^ti saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhā itipi. ^b^Sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmi^eb^nti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhatānativattanato. ^b^Sukhadukkhatopi cā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0310^ea^ sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmaññāṇasukhatāya vipariṇāmaṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissopi sukhato, tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho. Rūpādi^b^-ārammaṇa^eb^chandādi-^b^adhipati-^eb^ñāṇādi-^b^sahajāta-^eb^ kāmāvacarādi-^b^bhūmi^eb^nānattabhedānaṃ kusalākusala-taṃvipākakiriyā-nānattādibhedānañca, ādi-saddena saṅkhārikāsaṅkhārikasa-vatthukāvatthukādi-nānattabhedānañca vasenāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Suññatadhammassā^eb^ti ‘‘dhammā hontī’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 121) suññatavāre āgatasuññatasabhāvassa vasena. ^b^‘‘Kāmañcetthā’’^eb^tiādinā pubbe pahīnattā puna pahānaṃ na vattabbanti codanaṃ dasseti, maggacittakkhaṇe vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnameva hotīti visuṃ visuṃ na vattabbanti. Tattha purimāya codanāya nānāpuggalaparihāro, pacchimāya nānācittakkhaṇikaparihāro. Lokiyabhāvanāya hi kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu pahīnaṃ hoti yadipi na pavatteyya, na paṭipakkhabhāvanāya tattha sā abhijjhādomanassassa appavatti hotīti puna tappahānaṃ vattabbamevāti. ^b^Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hotī^eb^ti maggasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ, lokiyabhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Pañcapi khandhā loko’’ti hi vibhaṅge (vibha. 362, 364, 366, 373) catūsupi ṭhānesu vuttanti.
[06]Uddesavāravaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^107^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bāhirakesupi ^a^M1.0348^ea^ ito ekadesassa sambhavato sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ ^b^‘‘sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassā’’^eb^ti. Tena ye ime ānāpānapabbādivasena āgatā cuddasappakārā, tadantogadhā ca ajjhattādianupassanā pakārā, tathā ^b^kāyagatāsatisutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 3.154) vuttā kesādivaṇṇasaṇṭhānakasiṇārammaṇacatukkajjhānappakārā, lokiyādippakārā ca, te sabbepi anavasesato saṅgaṇhāti. Ime ca pakārā imasmiṃyeva sāsane, na ito bahiddhāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbappakāra…pe… paṭisedhano cā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^tathābhāvapaṭisedhano^eb^ti sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa aññasāsanassa nissayabhāvapaṭisedhano. Etena ‘‘idha, bhikkhave’’ti ettha idha-saddo antogadhaevasaddatthoti dasseti ^a^V1.0311^ea^. Santi hi ekapadānipi sāvadhāraṇāni yathā ‘‘vāyubhakkho’’ti (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.374). Tenāha ^b^‘‘idheva samaṇo’’^eb^tiādi. Paripuṇṇasamaṇakaraṇadhammo hi so, yo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattako. ^b^Parappavādā^eb^ti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.

[03]Araññādikasseva bhāvanānurūpasenāsanataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imassa hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Duddamo damathaṃ anupagato goṇo ^b^kūṭagoṇo^eb^. Dohanakāle yathā thanehi anavasesato khīraṃ na paggharati, evaṃ dohapaṭibandhinī ^b^kūṭadhenu^eb^. Rūpasaddādike paṭicca uppajjanakāssādo ^b^rūpārammaṇādiraso. Pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇa^eb^nti pabbajjāto pubbe, anādimati vā saṃsāre paricitārammaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Nibandheyyā^eb^ti bandheyya. ^b^Satiyā^eb^ti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇavasena pavattāya satiyā. ^b^Ārammaṇe^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe. Daḷhanti thiraṃ, yathā satokārissa upacārappanābhedo samādhi ijjhati, tathā thāmagataṃ katvāti attho.

[03]^b^Visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhāna^eb^nti sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ, ekaccānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ, buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa, aññena kammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ ^a^M1.0349^ea^ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. ^b^Vatthuvijjācariyo viya bhagavā^eb^ yogīnaṃ anurūpanivāsaṭṭhānupadisanato. ^b^Bhikkhu dīpisadiso^eb^ araññe ekākī viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato. ^b^Phalamuttama^eb^nti sāmaññaphalaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Parakkamajavayoggabhūmi^eb^nti bhāvanussāhajavassa yoggakaraṇabhūmibhūtaṃ.

[03]^b^Assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena sikkhato^eb^ti assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassatāpajānana-sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedana-oḷārikoḷārikapaṭippassambhanavasena bhāvanānuyogaṃ sikkhato, tathābhūto vā hutvā tisso sikkhā pavattayato. ^b^Assāsapassāsanimitte^eb^ti assāsapassāsasannissayena upaṭṭhitapaṭibhāganimitte. ^b^Assāsapassāse pariggaṇhāti^eb^ rūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto, yo ‘‘assāsapassāsakammiko’’ti vutto. ^b^Jhānaṅgāni pariggaṇhāti^eb^ arūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto. ^b^Vatthu nāma karajakāyo^eb^ cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. ^b^Añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī^eb^ti visuddhadiṭṭhi ‘‘tayidaṃ dhammamattaṃ na ahetukaṃ, nāpi issarādivisamahetukaṃ, atha kho avijjādīhi eva sahetuka’’nti addhattayepi kaṅkhāvitaraṇena ^b^vitiṇṇakaṅkho^eb^ ‘‘yaṃ kiñci rūpa’’ntiādinā (ma. ni. 1.361; ma. ni. 2.113; ma. ni. 3.86; a. ni. 4.181; paṭi. ma. 1.48) kalāpasammasanavasena ^a^V1.0312^ea^^b^tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā^eb^ udayabbayānupassanādivasena ^b^vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena^eb^ maggapaṭipāṭiyā.

[03]^b^Parassa vā assāsapassāsakāye^eb^ti idaṃ sammasanacāravasenāyaṃ pāḷi pavattāti katvā vuttaṃ, samathavasena pana parassa assāsapassāsakāye appanānimittuppatti eva natthīti. ^b^Idaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhatī^eb^ti ‘‘ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā’’ti ca vuttaṃ idaṃ dhammadvayaghaṭitaṃ ekato ārammaṇabhāvena na labbhati.

[03]Samudeti etasmāti samudayo, so eva kāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti samudayadhammo, assāsapassāsānaṃ pavattihetukarajakāyādi. Tassa anupassanasīlo ^b^samudayadhammānupassī^eb^. Taṃ pana samudayadhammaṃ upamāmukhena dassento ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^bhasta^eb^nti ruttiṃ. ^b^Gaggaranāḷi^eb^nti ukkāpanāḷiṃ. ^b^Te^eb^ti karajakāyādike. Yathā assāsapassāsakāyo karajakāyādisambandhī phalabhāvena, evaṃ tepi assāsapassāsakāyasambandhino hetubhāvenāti ‘‘samudayadhammā kāyasmi’’nti vattabbataṃ ^a^M1.0350^ea^ labhantīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samudaya…pe… vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Pakativācī vā ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo ‘‘jātidhammāna’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.131; ma. ni. 3.373; paṭi. ma. 1.33) viyāti kāyassa paccayasamavāye uppajjanapakatikānupassī ^b^‘‘samudayadhammānupassī’’^eb^ti vutto. Tenāha – ‘‘karajakāyañcā’’tiādi. Evañca katvā ^b^kāyasmi^eb^nti bhummavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti. ^b^Vayadhammānupassī^eb^ti ettha ahetukattepi vināsassa yesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ abhāve yaṃ na hoti, tadabhāvo tassa abhāvassa hotu viya voharīyatīti upacārato karajakāyādiabhāvo assāsapassāsakāyassa vayakāraṇaṃ vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā bhastāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Ayaṃ tāvettha paṭhamavikappavasena atthavibhāvanā. Dutiyavikappavasena pana upacārena vināyeva attho veditabbo. Ajjhattabahiddhānupassanā viya bhinnavatthuvisayatāya samudayavayadhammānupassanāpi ekakāle na labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘kālena samudayaṃ kālena vayaṃ anupassanto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Atthi kāyo^eb^ti eva-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti ^b^‘‘kāyova atthī’’^eb^ti vatvā avadhāraṇena nivatthitaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘na satto’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya paresañca sajjāpanaṭṭhena, satvaguṇayogato vā ^b^‘‘satto’’^eb^ti parehi parikappito. Tassa sattanikāyassa pūraṇato ca cavanupapajjanadhammatāya galanato ca ^b^‘‘puggalo’’^eb^ti. Thīyati saṃhaññati ettha gabbhoti ^b^‘‘itthī’’^eb^ti. Puri pure bhāge seti pavattatīti ^b^‘‘puriso’’^eb^ti. Āhito ^a^V1.0313^ea^ ahaṃmāno etthāti ^b^‘‘attā’’^eb^ti, attano santakabhāvena ^b^‘‘attaniya’’^eb^nti. Paro na hotīti katvā ^b^‘‘aha’’^eb^nti, mama santakanti katvā ^b^‘‘mama’’^eb^nti. Vuttappakāravinimutto aññoti katvā ^b^‘‘kocī’’^eb^ti, tassa santakabhāvena ^b^‘‘kassacī’’^eb^ti parikappetabbo koci natthi, kevalaṃ kāyo eva atthīti attattaniyasuññatameva kāyassa vibhāveti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘kāyova atthī’’tiādinā vuttappakārena. ^b^Ñāṇapamāṇatthāyā^eb^ti kāyānupassanāñāṇaparaṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya. ^b^Satipamāṇatthāyā^eb^ti kāyapariggāhikasatipavattaṃ satiparaṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya. Imassa hi vuttanayena ‘‘atthi kāyo’’ti aparāparuppattivasena paccupaṭṭhitā sati bhiyyoso mattāya tattha ñāṇassa satiyā ca paribrūhanāya hoti. Tenāha^b^ ‘‘satisampajaññānaṃ vaḍḍhatthāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Imissā ^a^M1.0351^ea^ bhāvanāya taṇhādiṭṭhigāhānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘taṇhā…pe… viharatī’’^eb^ti. Tathābhūto ca loke kiñci ‘‘aha’’nti vā ‘‘mama’’nti vā gahetabbaṃ na passati, kuto gaṇheyya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na ca kiñcī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evampī^eb^ti ettha ^b^pi^eb^-saddo heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa tādisassa atthassa abhāvato avuttasamuccayatthoti dassento ^b^‘‘upari atthaṃ upādāyā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^‘‘Eva’’^eb^nti pana niddiṭṭhākārassa paccāmasanaṃ nigamanavasena katanti āha ^b^‘‘iminā pana…pe… dassetī’’^eb^ti. Pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānassa idhādhippetattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sati dukkhasacca’’^eb^nti. Sā pana sati yasmiṃ attabhāve, tassa samuṭṭhāpikā taṇhā tassāpi samuṭṭhāpikā eva nāma hoti tadabhāve abhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Appavattī^eb^ti appavattinimittaṃ, na pavattati etthāti vā ^b^appavatti^eb^. ^b^Catusaccavasenā^eb^ti catusaccakammaṭṭhānavasena. ^b^Ussakkitvā^eb^ti visuddhiparamparāya āruhitvā, bhāvanaṃ upari netvāti attho. ^b^Niyyānamukha^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇūpāyo.
[06]Ānāpānapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^108^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iriyāpathavasenā^eb^ti iriyanaṃ iriyā, kiriyā, idha pana kāyikapayogo veditabbo. Iriyānaṃ patho pavattimaggoti iriyāpatho, gamanādisarīrāvatthā. Gacchanto vā hi satto kāyena kattabbakiriyaṃ kareyya ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vāti. Tesaṃ vasena, iriyāpathavibhāgenāti ^a^V1.0314^ea^ attho. ^b^Puna capara^eb^nti puna ca aparaṃ, yathāvuttāanāpānakammaṭṭhānato bhiyyopi aññaṃ kāyānupassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathemi, suṇāthāti vā adhippāyo. ^b^Gacchanto vā^eb^tiādi gamanādimattajānanassa gamanādigatavisesajānanassa ca sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. Tattha gamanādimattajānanaṃ idha nādhippetaṃ, gamanādigatavisesajānanaṃ pana adhippetanti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha kāma’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sattūpaladdhi^eb^nti satto atthīti upaladdhiṃ sattaggāhaṃ ^b^na jahati^eb^ na pariccajati ‘‘ahaṃ gacchāmi, mama gamana’’nti gāhasabbhāvato. Tato eva ^b^attasaññaṃ^eb^ ‘‘atthi attā kārako vedako’’ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ na ^b^ugghāṭeti^eb^^a^M1.0352^ea^ nāpaneti apaṭipakkhabhāvato, ananabrūhanato vā. Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Imassa panā^eb^tiādisukkapakkhassa vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Tameva hi atthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘idaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ko gacchatī^eb^ti gamanakiriyāya kattupucchā, sā kattubhāvavisiṭṭhāttapaṭikkhepatthā dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhidassanato. ^b^Kassa gamana^eb^nti akattutāvisiṭṭhāttaggāhapaṭikkhepatthā. ^b^Kiṃkāraṇā^eb^ti pana paṭikkhittakattukāya gamanakiriyāya aviparītakāraṇapucchā ‘‘gamananti attā manasā saṃyujjati, mano indriyehi, indriyāni attehī’’ti evamādigamanakāraṇapaṭikkhepanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati^eb^ dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhito tabbinimuttassa ca kassaci abhāvato. Idāni dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha cittakiriyā ca sā vāyodhātuyā vipphāro vipphandanañcāti ^b^cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāro,^eb^ tena. Ettha ca cittakiriyaggahaṇena anindriyabaddhavāyodhātuvipphāraṃ nivatteti, vāyodhātuvipphāraggahaṇena cetanāvacīviññattibhedaṃ cittakiriyaṃ nivatteti, ubhayena pana kāyaviññattiṃ vibhāveti. ^b^‘‘Gacchatī’’^eb^ti vatvā yathā pavattamāne kāye ‘‘gacchatī’’ti vohāro hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti gantukāmatāvasena pavattacittaṃ. ^b^Vāyaṃ janetī^eb^ti vāyodhātuadhikaṃ rūpakalāpaṃ janeti, adhikatā cettha sāmatthiyato, na pamāṇato. Gamanacittasamuṭṭhitaṃ sahajātarūpakāyassa thambhanasandhāraṇacalanānaṃ paccayabhūtena ākāravisesena pavattamānaṃ vāyodhātuṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘vāyo viññattiṃ janetī’’^eb^ti. Adhippāyasahabhāvī hi vikāro viññatti, yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ca vāyogahaṇaṃ, na vāyodhātuyā eva janakabhāvato, aññathā viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo durupapādo siyā. ^b^Purato abhinīhāro^eb^ puratobhāgena kāyassa pavattanaṃ, yo ‘‘abhikkamo’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^‘‘Eseva^eb^^a^V1.0315^ea^^b^nayo’’^eb^ti atidesavasena saṅkhepato vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘tatrāpi hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Koṭito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti heṭṭhimakoṭito paṭṭhāya. ^b^Ussitabhāvo^eb^ti ubbiddhabhāvo.

[03]^b^Evaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0353^ea^^b^pajānato^eb^ti evaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva gamanādibhāvo hotīti pajānato tassa evaṃ pajānanāya nicchayagamanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti vicāraṇā ^b^vucca^eb^ti loke yathābhūtaṃ ajānantehi micchābhinivesavasena, lokavohāravasena vā. ^b^Atthi panā^eb^ti attano eva vīmaṃsanavasena pucchāvacanaṃ. ^b^Natthī^eb^ti nicchayavasena sattassa paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. ^b^Yathā panā^eb^tiādi tassevatthassa upamāya vibhāvanaṃ.

[03]^b^Nāvā mālutavegenā^eb^ti ^b^yathā^eb^ acetanā nāvā vātavegena desantaraṃ ^b^yāti, yathā^eb^ ca acetano ^b^tejanaṃ^eb^ kaṇḍo ^b^jiyāvegena^eb^ desantaraṃ ^b^yāti,^eb^ tathā acetano ^b^kāyo vātāhato^eb^ yathāvuttavāyunā nīto desantaraṃ ^b^yātī^eb^ti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sace pana koci vadeyya ‘‘yathā nāvāya tejanassa ca pellakassa purisassa vasena desantaragamanaṃ, evaṃ kāyassāpī’’ti, hotu, evaṃ icchitovāyamattho. Yathā hi nāvā tejanānaṃ saṃhatalakkhaṇasseva purisassa vasena gamanaṃ, na asaṃhatalakkhaṇassa, evaṃ kāyassāpīti kā no hāni, bhiyyopi dhammamattatāva patiṭṭhaṃ labhati, na purisavādo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yantaṃ suttavasenā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Tattha ^b^payutta^eb^nti heṭṭhā vuttanayena gamanādikiriyāvasena payojitaṃ. ^b^Ṭhātī^eb^ti tiṭṭhati. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke. ^b^Vinā hetupaccaye^eb^ti gantukāmatācitta-taṃsamuṭṭhāna-vāyodhātu-ādihetupaccayehi vinā. ^b^Tiṭṭhe^eb^ti tiṭṭheyya. ^b^Vaje^eb^ti vajeyya gaccheyya ko nāmāti sambandho. Paṭikkhepattho cettha ^b^kiṃ^eb^-saddoti hetupaccayavirahena ṭhānagamanapaṭikkhepamukhena sabbāyapi dhammappavattiyā paccayādhīnavuttitāvibhāvanena attasuññatā viya aniccadukkhatāpi vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^Paṇihito^eb^ti yathā yathā paccayehi pakārato nihito ṭhapito. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikavacana^eb^nti sabbesaṃ catunnampi iriyāpathānaṃ saṅgaṇhanavacanaṃ, pubbe visuṃ visuṃ iriyāpathānaṃ vuttattā idaṃ tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vacananti attho. Purimanayo vā iriyāpathappadhāno vuttoti tattha kāyo appadhāno anunipphādīti idha kāyaṃ padhānaṃ appadhānañca iriyāpathaṃ anunipphādaṃ katvā dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vuttoti evampettha dvinnaṃ nayānaṃ viseso veditabbo. ^b^Ṭhito^eb^ti pavatto.

[03]Iriyāpathapariggaṇhanampi ^a^V1.0316^ea^^a^M1.0354^ea^ iriyāpathavato kāyasseva pariggaṇhanaṃ tassa avatthāvisesabhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iriyāpathapariggahaṇena kāye kāyānupassī viharatī’’^eb^ti. Tenevettha rūpakkhandhavaseneva samudayādayo uddhaṭā. Esa nayo sesavāresupi. ^b^Ādinā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yathā ‘‘taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā’’ti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rupakkhandhassa udayaṃ passatīti ime cattāro āhārā saṅgayhanti, evaṃ ‘‘avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhā’’tiādayopi pañca ākārā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Iriyāpathapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^109^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catusampajaññavasenā^eb^ti (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.284; saṃ. ni. 5.368; dī. ni. abhi. ṭī. 2.214) samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno, sampajānassa bhāvo ^b^sampajaññaṃ,^eb^ tathāpavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Cattāri sampajaññāni samāhaṭāni ^b^catusampajaññaṃ,^eb^ tassa vasena. Abhikkamanaṃ ^b^abhikkanta^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamana’’^eb^nti. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ ^b^paṭikkanta^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘paṭikkantaṃ vuccati nivattana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nivattana^eb^nti ca nivattimattaṃ, nivattitvā pana gamanaṃ gamanameva. ^b^Abhiharanto^eb^ti gamanavasena kāyaṃ upanento.

[03]Sammā pajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tena attanā kātabbassa karaṇasīlo ^b^sampajānakārī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī’’^eb^ti. Sampajānasaddassa sampajaññapariyāyatā pubbe vuttāyeva. ^b^Sampajaññaṃ karotevā^eb^ti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva. Sampajānassa vā kāro etassa atthīti ^b^sampajānakārī^eb^. Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena saha atthena pavattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi. Sātthakassa sampajānanaṃ ^b^sātthakasampajaññaṃ^eb^. Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ ^b^sappāyasampajaññaṃ^eb^ abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare, aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ ^b^gocarasampajaññaṃ^eb^. Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva sampajaññaṃ ^b^asammohasampajaññaṃ^eb^. ^b^Pariggaṇhitvā^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhāya.

[03]^b^Tasmi^eb^nti ^a^V1.0317^ea^^a^M1.0355^ea^ sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitātthe. Attho nāma dhammato vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Cittakammarūpakāni viyā^eb^ti cittakammakatapaṭimāyo viya, yantapayogena vā vicittakammapaṭimāyo viya. ^b^Asamapekkhanaṃ^eb^ gehasitāññāṇupekkhāvasena ārammaṇassa ayoniso gahaṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā’’tiādi (ma. ni. 3.308). Hatthiādisammaddena ^b^jīvitantarāyo,^eb^ visabhāgarūpadassanādinā ^b^brahmacariyantarāyo^eb^.
[03]Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā, ananuvattanakathā pana tassā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘sace panā’’tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttākāraṃ paccāmasati, na ‘‘purisassa mātugāmāsubha’’ntiādikaṃ vuccamānaṃ. Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uggahetvā^eb^ti yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggahakosallassa sampādanavasena uggahetvā. ^b^Haratī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavatteti, yāva piṇḍapātapaṭikkamā anuyuñjatīti attho. ^b^Na^eb^^b^paccāharatī^eb^ti āhārūpabhogato yāva divāṭṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti.

[03]^b^Sarīraparikamma^eb^nti mukhadhovanādisarīrapaṭijagganaṃ. ^b^Dve tayo pallaṅke^eb^ti dve tayo nisajjāvāre, dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘usumaṃ gāhāpento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaggeneva, kammaṭṭhānaṃ padhānaṃ katvā evāti attho. Tena ‘‘pattopi acetano’’tiādinā (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.109) vakkhamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā avijahitvāti dasseti. ‘‘Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutara’’nti katvā ^b^‘‘cetiyaṃ vanditvā’’^eb^ti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (vibha. aṭṭha. 809; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3.128; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.275) ‘‘cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā’’ti vuttā.

[03]^b^Janasaṅgahattha^eb^nti ^a^M1.0356^ea^ ‘‘mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī’’ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahatthaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti. Yasmā ‘‘dhammakathā nāma kathetabbāyevā’’ti ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyā^eb^ vadanti, yasmā ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā. ^b^Anumodanaṃ katvā^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā’’ti ^a^V1.0318^ea^ ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Sampattaparicchedenevā^eb^ti ‘‘paricito aparicito’’tiādivibhāgaṃ akatvā sampattakoṭiyāva. ^b^Bhaye^eb^ti paracakkādibhaye.

[03]^b^Kammajatejo^eb^ti gahaṇiṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ nārohati^eb^ khudāparissamena kilantakāyattā samādhānābhāvato. ^b^Avasesaṭṭhāne^eb^ti yāguyā aggahitaṭṭhāne. ^b^Poṅkhānupoṅkha^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassa avicchedadassanavacanametaṃ, yathā poṅkhānupoṅkhapavattāya sarapaṭipāṭiyā avicchedo, evametassāpīti.

[03]^b^Nikkhittadhuro^eb^ bhāvanānuyoge. Vattapaṭipattiyā apūraṇena ^b^sabbavatthāni bhinditvā^eb^. ‘‘Kāme avītarāgo hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.320; ma. ni. 1.186) evaṃ vutta ^b^pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhacitto. Caritvā^eb^ti pavattitvā.

[03]^b^Attakāmā^eb^ti attano hitasukhaṃ icchantā, dhammacchandavantoti attho. Dhammoti hi hitaṃ, tannimittakañca sukhanti. Atha vā viññūnaṃ nibbisesattā attabhāvapariyāpannattā ca attā nāma dhammo, taṃ kāmenti icchantīti attakāmā. ^b^Usabhaṃ^eb^ nāma vīsati yaṭṭhiyo. ^b^Tāya saññāyā^eb^ti tāya pāsāṇasaññāya, ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgatāti jānantāti adhippāyo. ^b^Soyeva nayo^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ bhikkhū’’tiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto, so eva nisajjāyapi nayo. Pacchato āgacchantānaṃ chinnabhattabhāvabhayenapi yonisomanasikāraṃ paribrūheti.

[03]^b^Bahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī^eb^ti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti. Paṭipattipūjā hi ^a^M1.0357^ea^ satthupūjā, na āmisapūjā. ^b^Ṭhānacaṅkamanamevā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhātabbairiyāpathavasena vuttaṃ, na bhojanādikālesu avassaṃ kattabbanisajjāya paṭikkhepavasena.

[03]Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito ca anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha ^b^‘‘vīthiyo sallakkhetvā’’^eb^ti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuccati ‘‘pāsādikena abhikkantenā’’ti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Paccekabodhiṃ ^a^V1.0319^ea^ sacchikaroti, yadi upanissayasampanno hotīti sambandho. Evaṃ sabbattha ito paresupi. Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambharaṇaṃ, sāvakabodhiyaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca, mahāsāvakānaṃ kappasatasahassameva, itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ. ^b^Bāhiyo dārucīriyo^eb^ti bahi visaye sañjātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya bāhiyo, dārucīrapariharaṇena dārucīriyoti ca samaññāto. So hi āyasmā –

[08]‘‘Tasmā tiha te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute… mute… viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissatī’ti. Yato kho te, bāhiya, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute… mute… viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena. Yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha. Yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena, esevanto dukkhassā’’ti (udā. 10) – ettakāya desanāya arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti asammuyhanaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Attā abhikkamatī^eb^ti iminā andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti, ahaṃ ^b^abhikkamāmī^eb^ti pana iminā mānaggāhavasena, tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti. ^b^‘‘Tathā asammuyhanto’’^eb^ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ ^a^M1.0358^ea^ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘abhikkamāmī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo. Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento ^b^‘‘ekeka…pe… balavatiyo’’^eb^ti āha. Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo. Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento ^b^‘‘tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū’’^eb^ti āha. Satipi anugamanānugantabbatāvisese tejodhātu-vāyodhātu-bhāvamattaṃ sandhāya ^b^tathā^eb^-saddaggahaṇaṃ. Tattha akkantaṭṭhānato pādassa ukkhipanaṃ ^b^uddharaṇaṃ,^eb^ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato haraṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ^eb^ khāṇuādipariharaṇatthaṃ, patiṭṭhitapādaghaṭṭanapariharaṇatthaṃ vā passena ^a^V1.0320^ea^ haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ yāva patiṭṭhitapādo, tāva āharaṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇa^eb^nti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso.

[03]Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo. Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā tāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘vossajjane…pe… balavatiyo’’^eb^ti.
