Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo, patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhikkamane, tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu. ^b^Uddharaṇe^eb^ti uddharaṇakkhaṇe. ^b^Rūpārūpadhammā^eb^ti uddharaṇākārena pavattā rūpadhammā, taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca ^b^atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti^eb^ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato. ^b^Tattha tatthevā^eb^ti yattha yattha uppannā, tattha tattheva. Na hi dhammānaṃ ^a^M1.0359^ea^ desantarasaṅkamanaṃ atthi. ^b^Pabbaṃ pabba^eb^ntiādi uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atīttaro hi rūpadhammānampi pavattikkhaṇo gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca baddhadhuradhārāsamāgamatopi sīghataro. Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ paṭapaṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati, evaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ uppādenāti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭapaṭāyantā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Uppannā hi ekantato bhijjantīti.

[03]^b^Saddhiṃ rūpenā^eb^ti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, yaṃ tato sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ. Aññathā yadi rūpārūpadhammā samānakkhaṇā siyuṃ, ‘‘rūpaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ dandhanirodha’’ntiādivacanehi (vibha. aṭṭha. 26) virodho siyā, tathā ‘‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yathayidaṃ citta’’nti evamādipāḷiyā (a. ni. 1.48). Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāvento eva uppajjantīti tesaṃ taṃsabhāvanipphattianantaraṃ nirodho, rūpadhammā pana anārammaṇā pakāsetabbā, evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanivatti soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā, lahuviññāṇavisayasaṅgatimattapaccayatāya tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, visayasaṅgatimattatāya ca viññāṇassa lahuparivattitā, dandhamahābhūtapaccayatāya rūpadhammānaṃ dandhaparivattitā, nānādhātuyā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ kho ^a^V1.0321^ea^ pana tathāgatasseva, tena ca purejātapaccayo rūpadhammova vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva, tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ,^eb^^b^aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatī^eb^ti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ aññaṃ, taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayabhāveneva nirujjhatīti tato laddhapaccayaṃ aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ antaro labbheyyāti noti āha ^b^‘‘avīcimanusambandho’’^eb^ti, yathā vīci antaro na labbhati, tadevetanti avisesavidu maññanti, evaṃ anu anu sambandho cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca ^b^nadīsotova^eb^ nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattati.

[03]^b^Abhimukhaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0360^ea^^b^lokitaṃ ālokita^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘puratopekkhana’’^eb^nti. Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā, tadabhimukhaṃ pekkhanaṃ ālokitaṃ, tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha ^b^‘‘vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhana’’^eb^nti. Sammajjanaparibhaṇḍādikaraṇe olokitassa, ullokaharaṇādīsu ullokitassa, pacchato āgacchantaparissayassa parivajjanādīsu apalokitassa siyā sambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kāyasakkhi^eb^nti kāyena sacchikatavantaṃ, paccakkhakārinanti attho. So hi āyasmā vipassanākāle eva ‘‘yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto, tameva suṭṭhu niggaṇhissāmī’’ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo, tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramippatto, teneva naṃ satthā ‘‘etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando’’ti (a. ni. 1.235) etadagge ṭhapesi.

[03]^b^Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca^eb^ ālokitavilokitassa ^b^veditabbā. Tasmā^eb^ti ‘‘kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva gocarasampajaññabhāvato’’ti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati. ^b^Attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ,^eb^ khandhādikammaṭṭhānā añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo. Ālokitādisamaññāpi yasmā dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso, tasmā tassa yāthāvato jānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abbhantare’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^‘‘Paṭhamajavanepi^eb^^a^V1.0322^ea^^b^…pe… na hotī’’^eb^ti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ ‘‘itthī puriso’’ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobho, aniṭṭhe ca paṭigho uppajjati, manodvāre pana ‘‘itthī puriso’’ti rajjanādi hoti, tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgādi, evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlavasena mūlapariññā vuttā. Āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā. ^b^Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesū^eb^ti heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ^a^M1.0361^ea^ ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha. ^b^Ta^eb^nti javanaṃ. Tassa na yuttanti sambandho. ^b^Āgantuko^eb^ abbhāgato. Udayabbayaparicchinno tāvatako kālo etesanti ^b^tāvakālikāni^eb^.

[03]^b^Etaṃ^eb^ asammohasampajaññaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane paññāyamāne tabbinimutto ^b^ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi. Upanissayapaccayo^eb^ti idaṃ suttantanayena pariyāyato vuttaṃ. ^b^Sahajātapaccayo^eb^ti nidassanamattametaṃ aññamañña-sampayutta-atthiavigatādipaccayānampi labbhanato.
[03]^b^Maṇisappo nāma^eb^ ekā sappajātīti vadanti. ^b^Laḷana^eb^nti kampananti vadanti, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā laḷanaṃ.

[03]^b^Uṇhapakatiko^eb^ pariḷāhabahulo. Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā ^b^micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ^eb^. ^b^Cīvarampi acetana^eb^ntiādinā cīvarassa viya ^b^‘‘kāyopi acetano’’^eb^ti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena ^b^‘‘abbhantare’’^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento itarītarasantosassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato^eb^ti āhatacatupañcagaṇṭhiko, catupañcagaṇṭhikāhi vā hatasobho.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhavidhopi attho^eb^ti aṭṭhavidhopi payojanaviseso. Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātunāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atiharatī^eb^ti yāva mukhā abhiharati. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti tato yāva kucchi, tāva harati. ^b^Atiharatī^eb^ti vā mukhadvāraṃ atikkāmento harati. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti kucchigataṃ passato harati. ^b^Parivattetī^eb^ti aparāparaṃ cāreti. Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasaṃcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti, na kevalāti tāni ^a^V1.0323^ea^ pathavīdhātuyāpi kiccabhāvena vuttāni. ^b^Allattañca anupāletī^eb^ti vāyuādīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti, tathā anupāleti allāadīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti, tathā anupāleti allabhāvaṃ. ^b^Tejodhātū^eb^ti gahaṇīsaṅkhātā tejodhātu. Sā hi anto paviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti. ^b^Añjaso hotī^eb^ti āhārassa pavesanādīnaṃ maggo hoti. ^b^Ābhujatī^eb^ti pariyesanajjhoharaṇajiṇṇājiṇṇatādiṃ āvajjeti, vijānātīti attho. Taṃtaṃvijānananipphādakoyeva hi ^a^M1.0362^ea^ payogo ‘‘sammāpayogo’’ti vutto. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi nipphajjati, so tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti nāma tadavinābhāvato. Atha vā ^b^sammāpayogaṃ^eb^ sammāpaṭipattiṃ ^b^anvāya^eb^ āgamma ^b^ābhuja^eb^ti samannāharati. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Gamanato^eb^ti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. ^b^Pariyesanato^eb^ti gocaragāme bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. ^b^Paribhogato^eb^ti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. ^b^Āsayato^eb^ti pittādiāsayato. Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti ^b^āsayo,^eb^ āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko. Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro. Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo. Tato ^b^nidhānato^eb^. ^b^Aparipakkato^eb^ti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena avipakkato. ^b^Paripakkato^eb^ti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakkabhāvato. ^b^Phalato^eb^ti nipphattito. ^b^Nissandato^eb^ti ito cito ca vissandanato. ^b^Sammakkhanato^eb^ti sabbaso makkhanato. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.294) gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Aññe ca rogā^eb^ kaṇṇasūlabhagandarādayo. ^b^Aṭṭhāne^eb^ti manussāmanussapariggahite ayutte ṭhāne khettadevāyatanādike. Nissaṭṭhattā ^b^neva attano^eb^ kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca ^b^na parassa^eb^. ^b^Udakatumbato^eb^ti veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti chaḍḍitaudakaṃ.

[03]^b^Addhānairiyāpathā^eb^ cirappavattikā dīghakālikā iriyāpathā. ^b^Majjhimā^eb^ bhikkhācaraṇādivasena pavattā. ^b^Cuṇṇikairiyāpathā^eb^ vihāre aññatthāpi ito cito ca parivattanādivasena pavattāti vadanti. ‘‘Gateti gamane’’ti pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamaggahaṇena gamanenapi purato pacchato ca kāyassa atiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahitanti keci.

[03]Yasmā ^a^V1.0324^ea^^a^M1.0363^ea^ mahāsīvattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitā, idañcettha sampajaññavipassanācāravasena āgataṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tayidaṃ mahāsīvattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānabhutte adhippeta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sāmaññaphale^eb^ (dī. ni. 1.214; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.214; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.214) ^b^pana sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati^eb^ yāvadeva sāmaññaphalavisesadassanaparattā tassā desanāya. ^b^Satisampayuttassevā^eb^ti idaṃ yathā sampajaññakiccassa padhānatā, evaṃ satikiccassāpīti dassanatthaṃ, na satiyā sabbhāvamattadassanatthaṃ. Na hi kadāci satirahitā ñāṇappavatti atthi. ^b^Etāni padānī^eb^ti sampajaññapadāni. ^b^Vibhattānevā^eb^ti visuṃ vibhattāneva. Imināpi sampajaññassa viya satiyāpi padhānataṃyeva vibhāveti.

[03]Aparo nayo – eko bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati, tathā eko tiṭṭhanto nisīdanto sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva sayati, etthakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti. Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti ‘‘pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddā, caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkame pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā etthevaniruddhā’’ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, uṭṭhahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati, ayaṃ bhikkhu ^b^gatādīsu sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma hoti, evampi sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, tasmā yo bhikkhu yāva sakkoti, tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati ‘‘kāyo acetano, mañco acetano, kāyo na jānāti ‘‘ahaṃ mañce sayito’ti, mañco na jānāti ‘‘mayi kāyo sayito’’ti, acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito’’ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhati, ayaṃ ^b^sutte sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma hotīti.

[03]Kāyādikiriyānibbattanena ^a^M1.0364^ea^ tammayattā āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ, sabbampi vā chadvārappavattaṃ kiriyāmayapavattaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto ^b^jāgarite sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma. Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi ^b^jāgarite sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma hoti. Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ ^a^V1.0325^ea^ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyakathaṃ kathentopi ^b^bhāsite sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma. Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannopi ^b^tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma. Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāma. Rūpadhammasseva pavattiākāravisesā abhikkamādayoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Catusampajaññapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^110^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭikūlamanasikāravasenā^eb^ti (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.377) jigucchanīyatāya. Paṭikūlameva paṭikūlaṃ yo paṭikūlasabhāvo paṭikūlākāro, tassa manasikaraṇavasena. Antarenapi hi bhāvavācinaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā ‘‘paṭassa sukka’’nti. Yasmā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.182-183) vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Vatthādīhi pasibbakākārena bandhitvā kataṃ āvaṭanaṃ ^b^putoḷi. Vibhūtākāro^eb^ti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā asubhabhāvassa upaṭṭhitākāro. Iti-saddassa ākāratthataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sarūpato dassento ^b^‘‘kesādipariggahaṇenā’’^eb^ti āha.
[06]Paṭikūlamanasikārapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^111^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhātumanasikāravasenā^eb^ti pathavīdhātuādikā catasso dhātuyo ārabbha pavattabhāvanāmanasikāravasena, catudhātuvavatthānavasenāti attho. Dhātumanasikāro dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ catudhātuvavatthānanti hi atthato ekaṃ. ^b^Goghātako^eb^ti jīvikatthāya gunnaṃ ghātako. ^b^Antevāsiko^eb^ti ^a^M1.0365^ea^ kammakaraṇavasena tassa samīpavāsī. ^b^Ṭhita^eb^-saddo ‘‘ṭhito vā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.263; a. ni. 5.28) ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya, ^b^ṭhā^eb^-saddassa vā gativinivattiatthatāya aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako, idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhita’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^ākārenā^eb^ti ṭhānādinā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārena. Ṭhānādayo ^a^V1.0326^ea^ hi iriyāpathasaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya patho pavattimaggoti ‘‘iriyāpatho’’ti vuccanti. ^b^Yathāṭhita^eb^nti yathāpavattaṃ. Yathāvuttaṭṭhānamevettha ‘‘paṇidhāna’’nti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘yathāṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ṭhita^eb^nti vā kāyassa ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^Paṇihita^eb^nti tadaññairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^Ṭhita^eb^nti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^Paṇihita^eb^nti paccayakiccavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evampettha attho veditabbo. ^b^Paccavekkhatī^eb^ti pati pati avekkhati, ñāṇacakkhunā vinibbhujitvā visuṃ visuṃ passati.

[03]Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā goghātakassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^posentassā^eb^ti maṃsūpacayaparibrūhanāya kuṇḍakabhattakappāsaṭṭhiādīhi saṃvaḍḍhentassa. ^b^Vadhitaṃ mata^eb^nti hiṃsitaṃ hutvā mataṃ. ^b^Mata^eb^nti ca matamattaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tāvadevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati^eb^ yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni yathāsanniviṭṭhāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā matamattāyapi gāviyā, tesaṃ taṃsannivesassa avinaṭṭhattā. Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhujjantīti ^b^bīlā^eb^ bhāgā va-kārassa ba-kāraṃ, i-kārassa ī-kāraṃ katvā. ^b^Bīlaso^eb^ti bīlaṃ bīlaṃ katvā. ^b^Vibhajitvā^eb^ti aṭṭhisaṅghāṭato maṃsaṃ vivecetvā, tato vā vivecitamaṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘maṃsasaññā pavattatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pabbajitassa^eb^pi apariggahitakammaṭṭhānassa. ^b^Ghanavinibbhoga^eb^nti santatisamūhakiccaghanānaṃ vinibbhujanaṃ vivecanaṃ. ^b^Dhātuso paccavekkhato^eb^ti ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa. ^b^Sattasaññā^eb^ti attānudiṭṭhivasena pavattā saññāti vadanti, vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi ^a^M1.0366^ea^ tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato. Evañhi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena upameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dhātuvaseneva cittaṃ santiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dakkho^eb^ti cheko taṃtaṃsamaññāya kusalo, yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā, na vibhatte, vibhatte pana aṭṭiṃmaṃsādiavayavasamaññāti jānanako. ^b^Catumahāpatho viya catuiriyāpatho^eb^ti gāviyā ṭhitacatumahāpatho viya kāyassa pavattimaggabhūto catubbidho iriyāpatho. Yasmā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.306) ^b^vitthāritā,^eb^ tasmā tattha ^b^taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya^eb^ñca (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.306) vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
[06]Dhātumanasikārapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^112^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sivathikāya ^a^V1.0327^ea^ apaviddhauddhumātakādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ odhiso pavattānaṃ kathānaṃ tadabhidheyyānañca uddhumātakādiasubhabhāgānaṃ sivathikapabbānīti saṅgītikārehi gahitasamaññā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sivathikapabbehi vibhajitu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā^eb^ti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ. ^b^Samuggatenā^eb^ti uṭṭhitena. ^b^Uddhumātattā^eb^ti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātattā sūnattā. Setarattehi viparibhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ, purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ vā nīlaṃvinīlaṃ, vinīlameva ^b^vinīlaka^eb^nti ka-kārena padavaḍḍhanamāha anatthantarato yathā ‘‘pītakaṃ lohitaka’’nti (dha. sa. 616). ^b^Paṭikūlakattā^eb^ti jigucchanīyattā. ^b^Kucchitaṃ vinīlaṃ vinīlaka^eb^nti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.316; a. ni. 5.213; mahāva. 285). ^b^Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi^eb^ kākakaṅkādīhi. ^b^Vissandamānaṃ pubba^eb^nti vissavantaṃ pubbaṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharantapubbanti attho. ^b^Tathābhāva^eb^nti vissandamānapubbabhāvaṃ.

[03]^b^So bhikkhū^eb^ti yo ‘‘passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍita’’nti vutto, so bhikkhu. ^b^Upasaṃharati^eb^ sadisataṃ. ^b^Ayampi kho^eb^tiādi upasaṃharaṇākāradassanaṃ ^a^M1.0367^ea^. ^b^Āyū^eb^ti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ, arūpajīvitindriyaṃ panettha viññāṇagatikameva. ^b^Usmā^eb^ti kammajatejo. ^b^Evaṃpūtikasabhāvo^eb^ti evaṃ ativiya pūtikasabhāvo, na āyuādīnaṃ avigame viya mattasoti adhippāyo. Ediso bhavissatīti ^b^evaṃbhāvī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃuddhumātādibhedo bhavissatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Luñcitvā luñcitvā^eb^ti uppāṭetvā uppāṭetvā. ^b^Sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayutta^eb^nti sabbaso akhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ. ^b^Aññena hatthaṭṭhika^eb^nti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘catusaṭṭhibhedampī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Terovassikānī^eb^ti tirovassaṃ gatāni. Tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha ^b^‘‘atikkantasaṃvaccharānī’’^eb^ti. Purāṇatāya ghanabhāvavigamena vicuṇṇatā idha pūtibhāvoti so yathā hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘abbhokāse’’^eb^tiādimāha. Khajjamānatādivasena dutiyasivathikapabbādīnaṃ vavatthitatthā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Navasivathikapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Imāneva^eb^^a^V1.0328^ea^^b^dve^eb^ti avadhāraṇena appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ tattha niyameti aññapabbesu tadabhāvato. Yato hi eva-kāro, tato aññattha niyameti, tena pabbadvayassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānatāpi appaṭisiddhāti daṭṭhabbā aniccādidassanato. Saṅkhāresu ādīnavavibhāvanāni sivathikapabbānīti āha ^b^‘‘sivathikānaṃ ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā’’^eb^ti. Iriyāpathapabbādīnaṃ anappanāvahatā pākaṭā evāti ^b^‘‘sesāni dvādasāpī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Kāyānupassanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^113^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukhaṃ vedana^eb^nti ettha sukhayatīti ^b^sukhā,^eb^ sampayuttadhamme kāyañca laddhassāde karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca ^a^M1.0368^ea^ ābādhanti ^b^sukhā^eb^. Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti ^b^sukhā^eb^ti apare. Vedayati ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti ^b^vedanā. Vedayamāno^eb^ti anubhavamāno. ^b^Kāma^eb^ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ iriyāpathapabbe vuttameva. Sampajānassa vediyanaṃ^b^ sampajānavediyanaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^‘‘Vohāramattaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti etena ‘‘sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’’ti idaṃ vohāramattanti dasseti. ^b^Vatthuārammaṇā^eb^ti rūpādiārammaṇā. Rūpādiārammaṇañhi vedanāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya ‘‘vatthū’’ti adhippetaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhaveyya. Dhammavinimuttassa aññassa kattu abhāvato dhammasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vedanāva vedayatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Nitthunanto^eb^ti. Balavato vedanāvegassa nirodhane ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa avasaradānavasena nitthunanto. ^b^Vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā^eb^ti adhivāsanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā. ^b^Saha paṭisambhidāhī^eb^ti lokuttarapaṭisambhidāhi saha. Lokiyānampi vā sati uppattikāle tattha samatthataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘saha paṭisambhidāhī’’ti^eb^. ^b^Samasīsī^eb^ti vārasamasīsī hutvā, paccavekkhaṇavārassa anantaravāre parinibbāyīti attho.

[03]^b^Yathā ca sukhaṃ, evaṃ dukkha^eb^nti yathā ‘‘sukhaṃ vedayatī’’tiādinā sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, evaṃ dukkhampi. Tattha dukkhayatīti ^b^dukkhā,^eb^ sampayuttadhamme kāyañca pīḷeti vibādhatīti ^a^V1.0329^ea^ attho. Duṭṭhuṃ vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sātanti ^b^dukkhā^eb^. Dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti ^b^dukkhā^eb^ti apare. ^b^Arūpakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti arūpapariggahaṃ, arūpadhammamukhena vipassanābhinivesanti attho. Rūpakammaṭṭhānena pana samathābhinivesopi saṅgayhati, vipassanābhiniveso pana idhādhippetoti dassento āha. ^b^‘‘Rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahotipi etadeva vuccatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesī^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘yebhuyyenā’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Tadubhaya^eb^nti catudhātuvavatthānassa saṅkhepavitthāradvayamāha. ^b^Saṅkhepamanasikāravasena^eb^ mahāsatipaṭṭhāne, ^b^vitthāramanasikāravasena^eb^ rāhulovāda- (ma. ni. 2.115-117) dhātuvibhaṅgādīsu (vibha. 174-175).

[03]^b^Yebhuyya^eb^ggahaṇena ^a^M1.0369^ea^ tadaññadhammavasenapi arūpakammaṭṭhānakathāya atthitā dīpitāti taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tividho hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^abhiniveso^eb^ti anuppaveso, ārambhoti attho. Ārambhe eva hi ayaṃ vibhāgo, sammasanaṃ pana anavasesatova dhamme pariggahetvā vattati. ^b^Pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāne^eb^ti idaṃ rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, arūpamukhena pana vipassanābhiniveso yebhūyyena samathayānikassa icchitabbo, so ca paṭhamaṃ jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvā tato paraṃ sesadhamme pariggaṇhāti. ^b^Paṭhamābhinipāto^eb^ti sabbe cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyabhāvena vuccantīti phasso cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto vutto, uppannaphasso puggalo, cittacetasikarāsi vā ārammaṇena phuṭṭho phassasahajātāya vedanāya taṃsamakālameva vedeti, phasso pana obhāsassa viya padīpo vedanādīnaṃ paccayaviseso hotīti purimakālo viya vuccati, yā tassa ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇatā vuccati. ^b^Phusanto^eb^ti ārammaṇassa phusanākārena. Ayañhi arūpadhammatā ekadesena anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhu, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇañca phusanto viya saṅghaṭṭento viya ca pavattati. Tathāhesa ‘‘saṅghaṭṭanaraso’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī^eb^ti issaravatāya visavitāya sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavantī. Phassādīnañhi sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe ekadeseneva pavatti phusanādimattabhāvato, vedanāya pana iṭṭhākārasambhogādivasena pavattanato ārammaṇe nippadesato pavatti. Phusanādibhāvena hi ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ ekadesānubhavanaṃ, vedayitābhāvena gahaṇaṃ yathākāmaṃ sabbānubhavanaṃ evasabhāvāneva tāni gahaṇānīti na vedanāya viya phassādīnampi yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇena sāmibhāvānubhavanaṃ codetabbaṃ. ^b^Vijānanta^eb^nti paricchindanavasena visesato jānantaṃ. Viññāṇañhi minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minanto puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ paricchijja ^a^V1.0330^ea^ vibhāventaṃ pavattati, na saññā viya sañjānanamattaṃ hutvā. Tathā hi anena kadāci lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanāpi hoti. Imesaṃ pana phassādīnaṃ tassa tassa pākaṭabhāvo paccayavisesasiddhassa pubbābhogassa vasena veditabbā.

[03]Evaṃ ^a^M1.0370^ea^ tassa tasseva pākaṭabhāvepi ‘‘sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya’’nti (saṃ. ni. 4.46; paṭi. ma. 1.3) ‘‘sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijāna’’nti (saṃ. ni. 4.26) ca evamādivacanato sabbe sammasanupagā dhammā pariggahetabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘tattha yassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^phassapañcamakeyevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ tadantogadhattā taggahaṇeneva gahitattā catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ. Phassapañcamakaggahaṇañhi tassa sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇabhāvato, tattha ca phassacetanāggahaṇena sabbasaṅkhārakkhandhadhammasaṅgaho cetanāpadhānattā tesaṃ. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye ^b^saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha. 12) ‘‘cakkhusamphassajā cetanā’’tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā, itare pana khandhā sarūpeneva gahitā.

[03]^b^Vatthuṃ nissitā^eb^ti ettha vatthu-saddo karajakāyavisayoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ sandhāya vutta’’^eb^ntiādi. Kattha pana vuttaṃ? ^b^Sāmaññaphale. So^eb^ti karajakāyo. ^b^Pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ nāmarūpaṃ natthī^eb^ti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ. Aññathā hi khandhavinimuttampi nāmaṃ atthevāti. ^b^Avijjādihetukā^eb^ti avijjātaṇhupādānādihetukā. ^b^Vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā…pe… vicaratī^eb^ti iminā balavavipassanaṃ vatvā puna tassa ussukkāpanaṃ visesādhigamanañca dassento ^b^‘‘so’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Idhā^eb^ti imissaṃ dutiyasatipaṭṭhānadesanāyaṃ, tassā pana vedanānupassanāvasena kathetabbattā ^b^bhagavā vedanāvasena kathesi^eb^. Yathāvuttesu ca tīsu kammaṭṭhānābhinivesesu vedanāvasena kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso sukaro vedanānaṃ vibhūtabhāvatoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘phassavasena hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na pākaṭaṃ hotī^eb^ti idaṃ tādise puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ, yesaṃ ādito vedanāva vibhūtatarā hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Evañhi yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘phasso pākaṭo hoti, viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī’’ti, taṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti. ^b^Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāyā^eb^ti ca idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Tāsañhi pavatti oḷārikā, na itarāya. Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti ^b^‘‘vedanāna’’^eb^nti avisesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Yadā sukhaṃ uppajjatī^eb^tiādi sukhavedanāya pākaṭabhāvavibhāvanaṃ. ^b^Neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedetī^eb^ti tasmiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgisamaye neva dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti niruddhattā, anuppannattā ca yathākkamaṃ ^a^M1.0371^ea^ atītānāgatānaṃ ^a^V1.0331^ea^, paccuppannāya pana asambhavo vuttoyeva. Sakiccakkhaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato ^b^aniccā^eb^. Sameccasambhuyya paccayehi katattā ^b^saṅkhatā^eb^. Vatthārammaṇādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannattā ^b^paṭiccasamuppannā^eb^. Khayavayapalujjananirujjhanapakatitāya ^b^khayadhammā…pe… nirodhadhammā^eb^ti daṭṭhabbā.

[03]Kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisaṃ nāma pañca kāmaguṇā, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena saha āmisehīti ^b^āmisā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ito para^eb^nti ‘‘atthi vedanā’’ti evamādipāḷiṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayamevā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Vedanānupassanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^114^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sampayogavasena (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.381) pavattamānena saha rāgenāti ^b^sarāgaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lobhasahagata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vītarāga^eb^nti. Ettha kāmaṃ sarāgapadapaṭiyoginā vītarāgavasena bhavitabbaṃ, sammasanacārassa pana idhādhippetattā tebhūmakasseva gahaṇanti ^b^‘‘lokiyakusalābyākata’’^eb^nti vatvā ‘‘idaṃ panā’’tiādinā tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Sesāni dve dosamūlāni, dve mohamūlānīti ^b^cattāri akusalacittāni^eb^. Tesañhi rāgena sampayogābhāvato nattheva sarāgatā, tannimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitatālesoti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukavinimuttatā evettha labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘neva purimapadaṃ, na pacchimapadaṃ bhajantī’’^eb^ti. Yadi evaṃ padesikaṃ pajānanaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati dukantarapariyāpannattā tesaṃ. Akusalamūlesu saha moheneva vattatīti ^b^samoha^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā cettha saheva mohenāti samohanti purimapadāvadhāraṇampi labbhatiyeva, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Yathā pana atimūḷhatāya pāṭipuggalikanayena savisesaṃ mohavantatāya momūhacittanti vattabbato vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayaṃ visesato ‘‘samoha’’nti vuccati, na tathā sesākusalacittānīti ^b^‘‘vaṭṭantiyevā’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0372^ea^ vuttaṃ. Sampayogavasena thinamiddhena anupatitaṃ anugatanti thinamiddhānupatitaṃ pañcavidhaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittaṃ ^b^saṅkuṭitacittaṃ^eb^. ^b^Saṅkuṭitacittaṃ nāma^eb^ ārammaṇe saṅkocanavasena pavattanato. Paccayavisesavasena thāmajātena uddhaccena sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti ^b^uddhaccasahagataṃ,^eb^ aññathā ^a^V1.0332^ea^ sabbampi akusalacittaṃ uddhaccasahagatamevāti. ^b^Pasaṭacittaṃ nāma^eb^ sātisayaṃ vikkhepavasena pavattanato.

[03]Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gataṃ paṭipannanti ^b^mahaggataṃ^eb^. Taṃ pana rūpārūpabhūmikaṃ tato mahantassa loke abhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rūpārūpāvacara’’^eb^nti. Tassa cettha paṭiyogī parittamevāti āha ^b^‘‘amahaggatanti kāmāvacara’’^eb^nti. Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti ^b^sauttaraṃ,^eb^ tappaṭipakkhena ^b^anuttaraṃ,^eb^ tadubhayaṃ upādāya veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘sauttaranti kāmāvacara’’^eb^ntiādi. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanasamatthena samādhinā sammadeva āhitaṃ ^b^samāhitaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yassā^eb^ti yassa cittassa. Yathāvuttena samādhinā na samāhitanti ^b^asamāhitaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ubhayasamādhirahita’’^eb^nti. Tadaṅgavimuttiyā ^b^vimuttaṃ,^eb^ kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ. Vikkhambhanavimuttiyā ^b^vimuttaṃ,^eb^ mahaggatanti tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttīhi vimutta’’^eb^nti. Yattha tadubhayavimutti natthi, taṃ ubhayavimuttirahitanti gayhamāne lokuttaracittepi siyā āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘samuccheda…pe… okāsova natthī’’^eb^ti āha. Okāsābhāvo ca sammasanacārassa adhippetattā veditabbo. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
[06]Cittānupassanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^115^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pahātabbādidhammavibhāgadassanavasena ^a^V1.0333^ea^ pañcadhā dhammānupassanā niddiṭṭhāti ayamattho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti tamatthaṃ ulliṅgento ^b^‘‘pañcavidhena^eb^^a^M1.0373^ea^^b^dhammānupassanaṃ kathetu’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā nīvaraṇādivaseneva niddiṭṭhanti? Veneyyajjhāsayato. Yesañhi veneyyānaṃ pahātabbadhammesu paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇāni vibhāgena vattabbāni, tesaṃ vasenettha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇesu dhammānupassanā kathitā. Tathā hi kāyānupassanāpi samathapubbaṅgamā desitā, tato pariññeyyesu khandhesu āyatanesu, bhāvetabbesu bojjhaṅgesu pariññeyādivibhāgesu saccesu ca uttarā desanā desitā, tasmā cettha samathabhāvanāpi yāvadeva vipassanatthaṃ icchitā, vipassanāpadhānā vipassanābahulā ca satipaṭṭhānadesanāti tassā vipassanābhinivesavibhāgena desitabhāvaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha khandhāyatanadukkhasaccavasena missakapariggahakathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Saññāsaṅkhārakkhandhapariggahampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena sakalapañcupādānakkhandhapariggahaṃ sampiṇḍeti itaresaṃ tadantogadhattā. ‘‘Kaṇhasukkānaṃ yugandhatā natthī’’ti pajānanakāle abhāvā ^b^‘‘abhiṇhasamudācāravasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Yathā^eb^ti yenākārena. So pana ‘‘kāmacchandassa uppādo hotī’’ti vuttattā kāmacchandassa kāraṇākārova, atthato kāraṇamevāti āha ^b^‘‘yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo vakkhamānatthasamuccayattho.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ‘‘yathā cā’’tiādinā vuttapade. ^b^Subhampī^eb^ti kāmacchandopi. So hi attano gahaṇākārena ^b^‘‘subha’’^eb^nti vuccati, tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā ^b^‘‘subhanimitta’’^eb^nti ca. Iṭṭhaṃ, iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādi ^b^subhārammaṇaṃ^eb^. Ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa anupāyabhūto manasikāro ^b^anupāyamanasikāro. Ta^eb^nti ayonisomanasikāraṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti nipphādetabbe ārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte. ^b^Āhāro^eb^ti paccayo.

[03]^b^Asubhampī^eb^ti asubhajjhānampi uttarapadalopena. Taṃ pana dasasu aviññāṇakāsubhesu, kesādīsu ca pavattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kesādīsu hi saññā asubhasaññāti ^b^girimānandasutte^eb^ (a. ni. 10.60) vuttāti. Ettha ca catubbidhassa ayonisomanasikārassa yonisomanasikārassa ^a^V1.0334^ea^ ca gahaṇaṃ niravasesadassanatthaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu pana asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti, ‘‘asubha’’nti ca manasikāro idhādhippeto, tadanukūlattā vā itarepīti.

[03]Ekādasasu ^a^M1.0374^ea^ (a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.16) asubhesu paṭikūlākārassa uggaṇhanaṃ, yathā vā tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, tathā paṭipatti ^b^asubhanimittassa uggaho^eb^. Upacārappanāvahāya asubhabhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ ^b^asubhabhāvanānuyogo^eb^. Bhojane mattaññuno thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyatīti vadanti. Bhojananissitaṃ pana āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ, tabbipariṇāmassa, tadādhārassa, tassa ca udariyabhūtassa asubhatādassanaṃ, kāyassa āhāraṭṭhitikatādassanañca yo sammadeva jānāti, so visesato ^b^bhojane mattaññū^eb^ nāma, tassa ca kāmacchando pahīyateva. ^b^Asubhakammikatissatthero^eb^ dantaṭṭhidassāvī. ^b^Abhidhammapariyāyena^eb^ (dha. sa. 1159, 1503) sabbopi lobho kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Paṭighampi^eb^ purimuppannaṃ ^b^paṭighanimittaṃ^eb^ parato uppajjanakapaṭighassa kāraṇanti katvā. Mejjati hitapharaṇavasena siniyhatīti mitto, tasmiṃ mitte bhavā, mittassa vā esāti mettā, tassā ^b^mettāya^eb^.

[03]Mettāyanassa sattesu hitapharaṇassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ ^b^mettānimittassa uggaho^eb^. ^b^Odhisakānodhisakadisāpharaṇāna^eb^nti attātipiyasahāyamajjhattaverīvasena odhisakatā, sīmāsambhede kate anodhisakatā, ekādidisāpharaṇavasena disāpharaṇatā mettāya uggahaṇe veditabbā. Vihāraracchāgāmādivasena vā odhisakadisāpharaṇaṃ, vihārādiuddesarahitaṃ puratthimādidisāvasena anodhisakadisāpharaṇanti evaṃ vā dvidhā uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘odhisakānodhisakadisāpharaṇāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Uggaho ca yāva upacārā daṭṭhabbo, uggahitāya āsevanā bhāvanā. Tattha ‘‘sabbe sattā, pāṇā, bhūtā, puggalā, attabhāvapariyāpannā’’ti etesaṃ vasena pañcavidhā, ekekasmiṃ ‘‘averā hontu, abyāpajjā, anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū’’ti catudhā pavattito vīsatividhā anodhisakapharaṇā mettā, ‘‘sabbā itthiyo, purisā, ariyā, anariyā, devā, manussā, vinipātikā’’ti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā aṭṭhavīsatividhā vā, dasahi disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena pavattā dasavidhā ca, ekekāya vā disāya sattādītthādiaverādibhedena ^a^M1.0375^ea^ asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca odhibhopharaṇā veditabbā.

[03]Yena ^a^V1.0335^ea^ ayonisomanasikārena aratiādikāni uppajjanti, so aratiādīsu ^b^ayonisomanasikāro,^eb^ tena. Nipphādetabbe hi idaṃ bhummaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhitā^eb^ pantasenāsanesu adhikusalesu dhammesu ca uppajjanabhāvariñcanā. ^b^Kāyavināmanā^eb^ti kāyassa virūpenākārena nāmanā.

[03]Kusaladhammasampaṭipattiyā paṭṭhapanasabhāvatāya, tappaṭipakkhānaṃ visosanasabhāvatāya ca ārambhadhātuādito pavattavīriyanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamārambhavīriya’’^eb^nti. Yasmā paṭhamārambhamattassa kosajjavidhamanaṃ thāmagamanañca natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato balavatara’’^eb^nti. Yasmā pana aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanaṃ uparūparivisesaṃ āvahantaṃ ativiya thāmagatameva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Atibhojane nimittaggāho^eb^ti atibhojane thinamiddhassa nimittaggāho, ‘‘ettake bhutte thinamiddhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, ettake na hotī’’ti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇaggāho hotīti attho. ^b^Divā sūriyāloka^eb^nti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ rattiyaṃ manasikarontassapīti evamettha attho veditabbo. Dhutaṅgānaṃ vīriyanissitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapī’’^eb^ti.
[03]Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti ^b^‘‘avūpasamo nāma avūpasantākāro, uddhaccakukkuccamevetaṃ atthato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Bahussutassa ganthato atthato ca suttādīni vicārentassa atthavedādipaṭilābhasabbhāvato vikkhepo na hoti, yathāvidhipaṭipattiyā yathānurūpapaṭikārappavattiyā ca katākatānusocanañca na hotīti ^b^‘‘bāhusaccenapi…pe… uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī’’^eb^ti āha. Yadaggena bāhusaccena uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, tadaggena paripucchakatāvinayapakataññutāhipi taṃ pahīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Buddhasevitā ca buddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetaso vūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccapahānakārī vuttā. Buddhattaṃ ^a^M1.0376^ea^ pana anapekkhitvā vinayadharā kukkuccavinodakā kalyāṇamittā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Vikkhepo ca bhikkhuno yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti ^b^‘‘kappiyākappiyaparipucchāmahulassā’’^eb^tiādinā vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā. ^b^Pahīne uddhaccakukkucce^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^Kukkuccassa^eb^ domanassasahagatattā ^b^anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo^eb^ vutto.

[03]Tiṭṭhati ^a^V1.0336^ea^ pavattati etthāti ṭhānīyā, vicikicchāya ṭhānīyā ^b^vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā,^eb^ vicikicchāya kāraṇabhūtā dhammā. Tiṭṭhatīti vā ṭhānīyā, vicikicchā ṭhānīyā etissāti ^b^vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā,^eb^ atthato vicikicchā eva. Sā hi purimuppannā parato uppajjanakavicikicchāya sabhāgahetutāya asādhāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Kusalākusalā^eb^ti kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato akusalā. Ye akusalā, te ^b^sāvajjā asevitabbā hīnā ca^eb^. Ye kusalā, te ^b^anavajjā sevitabbā paṇītā ca^eb^. Kusalāpi vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā ^b^hīnā,^eb^ paṇītehi ^b^paṇītā. Kaṇhā^eb^ti kāḷakā, cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. ^b^Sukkā^eb^ti odātā, cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto vā ^b^kaṇhā,^eb^ sukkābhijātihetuto ^b^sukkā^eb^. Te eva ^b^sappaṭibhāgā^eb^. Kaṇhā hi ujuvipaccanīkatāya sukkehi sappaṭibhāgā, tathā sukkāpi itarehi. Atha vā kaṇhasukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca ^b^kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā^eb^. Sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāyavedanāya sappaṭibhāgā, dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgāti.

[03]Kāmaṃ bāhusaccaparipucchakatāhi aṭṭhavatthukāpi vicikicchā pahīyati, tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā āha ^b^‘‘tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā’’^eb^ti. Ratanattayaguṇāvabodhe hi ‘‘satthari kaṅkhatī’’ti (dha. sa. 1008, 1123, 1167, 1241, 1263, 1270; vibha. 915) ādivicikicchāya asambhavoti. Vinaye pakataññutā ‘‘sikkhāya kaṅkhatī’’ti (dha. sa. 1008, 1123, 1167, 1241, 1263, 1270; vibha. 915) vuttāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ karotīti āha ^b^‘‘vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassapī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Okappanīyasaddhāsaṅkhātādhimokkhabahulassā^eb^ti saddheyyavatthuno anupavisanasaddhāsaṅkhātādhimokkhena adhimuccanabahulassa ^a^M1.0377^ea^. Adhimuccanañca adhimokkhuppādanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddhāya vā ninnapoṇatā adhimutti adhimokkho.

[03]^b^Subhanimittāsubhanimittādīsū^eb^ti ‘‘subhanimittādīsu asubhanimittādīsū’’ti ādi-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha paṭhamena ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paṭighanimittādīnaṃ saṅgaho, dutiyena mettācetovimuttiādīnaṃ. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttanayamevāti.
[06]Nīvaraṇapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^116^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upādānehi ^a^V1.0337^ea^ ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā ^b^upādānakkhandā. Iti rūpa^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo idaṃ-saddena samānatthoti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ rūpa’’^eb^nti. Tayidaṃ sarūpato anavasesapariyādānaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itī^eb^ti vā pakāratthe nipāto, tasmā ^b^‘‘iti rūpa’’^eb^nti iminā bhūtupādādivasena yattako rūpassa bhedo, tena saddhiṃ rūpaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti. ^b^Sabhāvato^eb^ti ruppanasabhāvato cakkhādivaṇṇādisabhāvato ca. ^b^Vedanādīsupī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘ayaṃ vedanā, ettakā vedanā, na ito paraṃ vedanā atthīti sabhāvato vedanaṃ pajānātī’’tiādinā, ^b^sabhāvato^eb^ti ca anubhavanasabhāvato sātādisabhāvato cāti evamādinā yojetabbaṃ.
[06]Khandhapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^117^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chasu ajjhattikabāhiresū^eb^ti (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.384) ‘‘chasu ajjhattikesu chasu bāhiresu’’ti ^b^‘‘chasū’’^eb^ti padaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Kasmā panetāni ubhayāni chaḷeva vuttāni? Chaviññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato. Cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā ^a^M1.0378^ea^ pariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ, rūpāyatanameva ca ārammaṇaṃ, tathā itarāni itaresaṃ, chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto manāyatanekadeso uppattidvāraṃ, asādhāraṇañca dhammāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Cakkhatīti ^b^cakkhu,^eb^ rūpaṃ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Suṇātīti ^b^sotaṃ^eb^. Ghāyatīti ^b^ghānaṃ^eb^. Jīvitanimittatāya raso jīvitaṃ, taṃ jīvitamavhāyatīti ^b^jivhā^eb^. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo uppattidesoti ^b^kāyo^eb^. Munāti ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti ^b^mano^eb^. Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti ^b^rūpaṃ^eb^. Sappati attano paccayehi harīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti ^b^saddo^eb^. Gandhayati attano vatthuṃ sūcetīti ^b^gandho^eb^. Rasanti taṃ sattā assādentīti ^b^raso^eb^. Phusīyatīti ^b^phoṭṭhabbaṃ^eb^. Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti ^b^dhammā^eb^. Sabbāni pana āyānaṃ tananādiatthena ^b^āyatanāni^eb^. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.510-512) ^b^taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.510) ca vuttanayena veditabbo.

[03]^b^Cakkhuñca^eb^^a^V1.0338^ea^^b^pajānātī^eb^ti ettha ^b^cakkhu^eb^ nāma pasādacakkhu, na sasambhāracakkhu, nāpi dibbacakkhuādikanti āha ^b^‘‘cakkhupasāda’’^eb^nti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo’’ti (dha. sa. 596-599). ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo vakkhamānatthasamuccayattho. ^b^Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti aviparītassa attano rasassa ceva lakkhaṇassa ca vasena, rūpesu āviñchanakiccassa ceva rūpābhighātārahabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti attho. ‘‘Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.204, 400; 3.421, 425-426; saṃ. ni. 2.43-45; 4.54-55; kathā. 465, 467) samuditāniyeva rūpāyatanāni cakkhuviññāṇuppattihetu, na visuṃ visunti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpe cā’’^eb^ti puthuvacanaggahaṇaṃ, tāya eva ca desanāgatiyā kāmaṃ idhāpi ‘‘rūpe ca pajānātī’’ti vuttaṃ, rūpabhāvasāmaññena pana sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ^b^‘‘bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañcā’’^eb^ti ekavacanavasena attho vutto. ^b^Sarasalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvakiccassa ceva cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ubhayaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti cakkhuṃ upanissayapaccayavasena paccayabhūtaṃ, rūpe ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayavasena paccayabhūte ca paṭicca. Kāmañcāyaṃ suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā ^a^M1.0379^ea^, nippariyāyakathā nāma abhidhammasannissitā evāti abhidhammanayeneva saṃyojanāni dassento ^b^‘‘kāmarāga…pe… avijjāsaṃyojana’’^eb^nti āha. Tattha kāmesu rāgo, kāmo ca so rāgo cāti ^b^kāmarāgo,^eb^ so eva bandhanaṭṭhena ^b^saṃyojanaṃ^eb^. Ayañhi yassa saṃvijjati, taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojeti bandhati, iti dukkhena sattaṃ, bhavādike vā bhavantarādīhi, kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti ^b^saṃyojanaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanādīnampi yathārahaṃ attho vattabbo. ^b^Sarasalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti ettha pana sattassa vaṭṭato anissajjanasaṅkhātassa attano kiccassa ceva yathāvuttabandhanasaṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti yojetabbaṃ.

[03]Bhavassāda-diṭṭhissāda-nivattanatthaṃ ^b^kāmassāda^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Assādayato^eb^ti abhiramantassa. ^b^Abhinandato^eb^ti sapppītikataṇhāvasena nandantassa. Padadvayenapi balavato kāmarāgassa paccayabhūtā kāmarāguppatti vuttā. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Etaṃ ārammaṇa^eb^nti etaṃ evaṃsukhumaṃ evaṃdubbibhāgaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Niccaṃ dhuva^eb^nti etaṃ nidassanamattaṃ, ‘‘ucchijjissati vinassissatīti gaṇhato’’ti evamādīnampi saṅgaho icchitabbo. ^b^Bhavaṃ patthentassā^eb^ti ‘‘īdise sampattibhave yasmā amhākaṃ idaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ sulabhaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā āyatimpi sampattibhavo bhaveyyā’’ti ^a^V1.0339^ea^ bhavaṃ nikāmentassa. Evarūpaṃ sakkā laddhunti yojanā. ^b^Usūyato^eb^ti usūyaṃ issaṃ uppādayato. ^b^Aññassa maccharāyato^eb^ti aññena asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena macchariyaṃ karoto. ^b^Sabbeheva^eb^ yathāvuttehi navahi saṃyojanehi.

[03]^b^Tañca kāraṇa^eb^nti subhanimittapaṭighanimittādivibhāvaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādirūpārammaṇañceva tajjāyonisomanasikārañcāti tassa tassa saṃyojanassa kāraṇaṃ. Avikkhambhitāsamūhatabhūmiladdhuppannataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘appahīnaṭṭhena uppannassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vattamānuppannatā ^b^samudācāra^eb^ggahaṇeneva gahitā. ^b^Yena kāraṇenā^eb^ti yena vipassanāsamathabhāvanāsaṅkhātena kāraṇena. ^b^Ta^eb^ñhi tassa tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca pahānakāraṇaṃ. Issāmacchariyānaṃ apāyagamanīyatāya paṭhamamaggavajjhatā vuttā. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.241) suttapadaṃ ^a^M1.0380^ea^ kathanti? Taṃ suttantapariyāyena vuttaṃ. Yathānulomasāsanañhi suttantadesanā, ayaṃ pana abhidhammanayena saṃvaṇṇanāti nāyaṃ doso. ^b^Oḷārikassā^eb^ti thūlassa, yato abhiṇhasamuppattipariyuṭṭhānatibbatāva hoti. ^b^Aṇusahagatassā^eb^ti vuttappakāraoḷārikābhāvena aṇubhāvaṃ sukhumabhāvaṃ gatassa. Uddhaccasaṃyojanassapettha anuppādo vuttoyeva yathāvuttasaṃyojanehi avinābhāvato. Sotādīnaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānanā, tappaccayānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ uppādādipajānanā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti atidisati.

[03]^b^Attano vā dhammesū^eb^ti attano ajjhattikāyatanadhammesu, attano ubhayadhammesu vā. Imasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^ajjhattikāyatanapariggahaṇenā^eb^ti ajjhattikāyatanapariggaṇhanamukhenāti attho, evañca anavasesato saparasantānesu āyatanānaṃ pariggaho siddho hoti. ^b^Parassa vā dhammesū^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Rūpāyatanassā^eb^ti aḍḍhekādasapabhedarūpasabhāvassa āyatanassa. Rūpakkhandhe vuttanayena nīharitabbāti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Sesakhandhesū^eb^ti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhesu. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti iminā atidesena rūpakkhandhe āhārasamudayāti, viññāṇakkhandhe nāmarūpasamudayāti, sesakkhandhesu phassasamudayāti imaṃ visesaṃ vibhāveti, itaraṃ pana sabbattha samānanti. Khandhapabbe viya āyatanapabbepi lokuttaranivattanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ gahitaṃ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Āyatanapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^118^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bujjhanakasattassā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0340^ea^ kilesaniddāya paṭibujjhanakasattassa, ariyasaccānaṃ vā paṭivijjhanakasattassa. ^b^Aṅgesū^eb^ti kāraṇesu, avayavesu vā. Udayabbayañāṇuppādato paṭṭhāya sambodhipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhito nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^‘‘Satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0381^ea^ padassa attho ‘‘vicikicchaṭṭhānīyā’’ti ettha vuttanayena veditabbo.^b^ Ta^eb^nti yonisomanasikāraṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti satiyaṃ. Nipphādetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ.

[03]Sati ca sampajaññañca ^b^satisampajaññaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.385; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 2.5.232; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.418). Atha vā satipadhānaṃ abhikkantādisātthakabhāvapariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ ^b^satisampajaññaṃ^eb^. Taṃ sabbattha satokāribhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hoti. Yathā paccanīkadhammānaṃ pahānaṃ anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti, evaṃ satirahitapuggalavivajjhanā, satokārīpuggalasevanā, tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘satisampajañña’’^eb^ntiādinā.

[03]Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu vā vicayo dhammavicayo, so eva sambojjhaṅgo, tassa ^b^dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa^eb^. ^b^‘‘Kusalākusalā dhammā’’^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Tattha ^b^yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro^eb^ti kusalādīsu taṃtaṃsabhāvarasalakkhaṇādikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppanno ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo. So hi aviparītamanasikāratāya ‘‘yonisomanasikāro’’ti vutto, tadābhogatāya āvajjanāpi taggatikāva, tassa abhiṇhapavattanaṃ bahulīkāro. ^b^Bhiyyobhāvāyā^eb^ti punappunabhāvāya. ^b^Vepullāyā^eb^ti vipulabhāvāya. ^b^Pāripūriyā^eb^ti paribrūhanāya.

[03]^b^Paripucchakatā^eb^ti pariyogāhetvā pucchakabhāvo. Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, taṃ taṃ ‘‘idaṃ bhante kathaṃ, imassa ko attho’’ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khandhadhātu…pe… bahulatā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vatthuvisadakiriyā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0341^ea^ ettha cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ, tappaṭibaddhāni cīvarādīni ca idha ‘‘vatthūnī’’ti adhippetāni. Tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti, tathā karaṇaṃ tesaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ajjhattikabāhirāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Ussannadosa^eb^nti vātādiussannadosaṃ. ^b^Sedamalamakkhita^eb^nti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ^a^M1.0382^ea^ ca makkhitaṃ. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddena aññampi sarīrassa pīḷāvahaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Senāsanaṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddena pattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Avisade^eb^ sati, visayabhūte vā. Kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa tāni visayo? Antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti. ^b^Cittacetasikesu^eb^ nissayādipaccayabhūtesu. ^b^Ñāṇampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva, atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya visayassa aparisuddhatāya visayīnaṃ aparisuddhiṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Samabhāvakaraṇa^eb^nti kiccato anūnādhikabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Yathāpaccayaṃ saddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca sithilatādinā ^b^saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itarāni mandānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tato^eb^ti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho, paggahova kiccaṃ ^b^paggahakiccaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Kātuṃ na sakkotī’’ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Vikkhepapaṭipakkho, yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so ^b^avikkhepo^eb^. Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ ^b^dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi, na aññathā.

[03]^b^Tasmā^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. ^b^Ta^eb^nti saddhindriyaṃ. ^b^Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenā^eb^ti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannatādivibhāgato yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti ‘‘ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo’’ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa sātisayattā. Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti, evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena…pe… hāpetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tathā^eb^^a^V1.0342^ea^^b^amanasikārenā^eb^ti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ ^a^M1.0383^ea^ jātaṃ, tenākārena bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesavasena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya. Tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito, dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena, vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ. Iminā nayena sesindriyesupi hāpanavidhi veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vakkalittheravatthū^eb^ti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanapasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā ‘‘kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī’’tiādinā (saṃ. ni. 3.87) ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi. Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsagissajjanena atthānaṃ dassetvā –
[21]‘‘Pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane;
[22]Adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukha’’nti. (dha. pa. 381);

[03]Gāthaṃ vatvā ‘‘ehivakkalī’’ti āha. So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, saddhāya pana balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otarati. Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā tassa indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassana’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Itarakiccabheda^eb^nti upaṭṭhānādikiccavisesaṃ. ^b^Passaddhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Hāpetabba^eb^nti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā tassā. Tathāhi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato ^a^M1.0384^ea^ hāpeti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Soṇattherassa vatthū^eb^ti sukhumālasoṇattherassa ^a^V1.0343^ea^ vatthu. So hi āyasmā, satthu, santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto ‘‘mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo’’ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sesesupī^eb^ti satisamādhipaññindriyesupi.

[03]^b^Samata^eb^nti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvaṃ, tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ. Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ, yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjati, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ antadvayapātābhāvena sammadeva appanā ijjhatīti. ^b^Balavasaddho^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa byatirekamukhena samatthanaṃ. Tassattho – yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo, so ^b^mudhāpasanno hoti,^eb^^b^na^eb^ aveccappasanno. Tathā hi so ^b^avatthusmiṃ pasīdati^eb^ seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā. ^b^Kerāṭikapakkha^eb^nti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto ‘‘deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī’’tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito, evaṃbhūto ca sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati, saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī’’^eb^ti. Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho, anatthāvaho visamabhāvo, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avikkhepāvaho samabhāvo, itaro vikkhepāvaho cāti. ^b^Kosajjaṃ adhibhavati,^eb^ tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo ^a^M1.0385^ea^. ^b^Uddhaccaṃ adhibhavatī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Tadubhaya^eb^nti saddhāpaññādvayaṃ samādhivīriyadvayañca. ^b^Samaṃ kātabba^eb^nti samarasaṃ kātabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Samādhikammikassā^eb^ti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. ^b^Eva^eb^nti evaṃ sante, saddhāya thokaṃ balavabhāve satīti attho. ^b^Saddahanto^eb^ti ‘‘pathavīti manasikāramattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī’’ti acintetvā ‘‘addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī’’ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento. ^b^Okappento^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto. ^b^Ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati^eb^ samādhippadhānattā jhānassa. ^b^Ubhinna^eb^nti samādhipaññānaṃ. Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya ^a^V1.0344^ea^ paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha ^b^‘‘samatāyapī’’^eb^ti, samabhāvenapīti attho. ^b^Appanā^eb^ti lokiyāppanā. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘hotiyevā’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha ‘‘samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī’’ti (a. ni. 4.17; paṭi. ma. 2.5). Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samatā icchitā, kathaṃ satīti āha ^b^‘‘sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti līnuddhaccapakkhikesu pañcasu indriyesu. Uddhaccapakkhikekadese gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘saddhāvīriyapaññāna’’^eb^nti āha. Aññathā pīti ca gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘kosajjapakkhikena samādhinā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ, na ‘‘passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī’’ti. ^b^Sā^eb^ti sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto ^b^sabbakammiko. Tenā^eb^ti tenā sabbattha icchitabbatthena kāraṇena. ^b^Āha^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā ^b^sabbatthikā,^eb^ sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā, sabbatthiyāva ^b^sabbatthikā^eb^. ^b^Citta^eb^nti kusalacittaṃ. Tassa hi ^b^sati paṭisaraṇaṃ^eb^ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññāna^eb^nti pariyattibāhusaccavasenapi khandhāyatanādīsu appatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ. Bahussutasevanā hi sutamayañāṇāvahā. Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva ^a^M1.0386^ea^ nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘samapaññāsa…pe… puggalasevanā’’^eb^ti. Ñeyyadhammassa gambhīrabhāvavasena tapparicchedakañāṇassa gambhīrabhāvaggahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā’’^eb^ti. Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ, tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā, tassā paccavekkhaṇāti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā’’^eb^ti. Yathā sativepullappatto nāma arahā eva, evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vīriyādīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03]‘‘Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 3.250, 267; a. ni. 3.36) pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ niraye nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu tassā ādito vuttattā ca āha ^b^‘‘pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakaṭavāhanādikāle^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tadaññaṃ manussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhiyamānakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Ekaṃ buddhantara^eb^nti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesuyeva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ vā ^a^V1.0345^ea^ petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukabhāvato. Tathā hi kāḷo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassano.

[03]^b^Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvino^eb^ti vīriyāyatto ^b^eva^eb^ sabbo lokuttaro lokiyo ca visesādhigamoti evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa. ^b^Gamanavīthi^eb^nti sapubbabhāgaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ ariyamaggapaṭipadaṃ. Sā hi bhikkhuno vaṭṭanissaraṇāya gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma. ^b^Kāyadaḷhībahulo^eb^ti yathā tathā kāyassa daḷhīkammapasuto. ^b^Piṇḍa^eb^nti raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ. Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā ^b^piṇḍāpacāyanaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Nīharanto^eb^ti pattatthavikato nīharanto. ^b^Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ^eb^ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā. Manussasampatti dibbasampatti ante nibbānasampattīti ^b^tisso sampattiyo^eb^^a^M1.0387^ea^. ^b^Dātuṃ sakkhissasī^eb^ti ‘‘tayi katena dānamayena veyyāvaccamayena ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasī’’ti thero attānaṃ pucchati. ^b^Sitaṃ karontovā^eb^ti ‘‘akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta’’nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.

[03]^b^Vippaṭipanna^eb^nti jātidhammakuladhammādilaṅghanena asammāpaṭipannaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ yathā asammāpaṭipanno putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa na bhāgī, evaṃ ^b^kusītopi^eb^ teneva kusītabhāvena asammāpaṭipanno satthu santikā laddhabbāriyadhanadāyajjassa na bhāgī. ^b^Āraddhavīriyova labhati^eb^ sammāpaṭipajjanato. Uppajjati vīriyasambojjhaṅgoti yojanā. Evaṃ sabbattha.
[03]^b^Mahā^eb^ti sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo. Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento ^b^‘‘satthuno hī’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[03]Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjupagamena sakyaputtiyabhāvo sampajāyati, tasmā buddhaputtabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘asambhinnāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Alasānaṃ ^a^V1.0346^ea^ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato vajjanā ^b^kusītapuggalaparivajjanā^eb^. ‘‘Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.423; 3.75; saṃ. ni. 4.120; a. ni. 3.16; vibha. 519; mahāni. 161) bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā ^b^āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā^eb^. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘kucchiṃ pūretvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ pana jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti idaṃ dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ, thinamiddhavinodanatā sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇatāti idaṃ dvayaṃ gahitaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato. Thinamiddhavinodanaṃ ^a^M1.0388^ea^ tadadhimuttatāya eva gahitaṃ, vīriyuppādane yuttappayuttassa thinamiddhavinodanaṃ atthasiddhameva. Tattha thinamiddhavinodana-kusītapuggalaparivajjana-āraddhavīriyapuggalasevana-tadadhimuttatā paṭipakkhavidhamanapaccayūpasaṃhāravasena, apāyapaccavekkhaṇādayo samuttejanavasena vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādakā daṭṭhabbā.

[03]Purimuppannā pīti parato uppajjanakapītiyā kāraṇabhāvato ^b^‘‘pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā’’^eb^ti vuttā, tassā pana bahuso pavattiyā puthuttaṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso, yathā sā uppajjati, evaṃ paṭipatti, ^b^tassā uppādakamanasikāro^eb^.

[03]Buddhānussatiyā upacārasamādhiniṭṭhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yāva upacārā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno^eb^ti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno. Dhammaguṇe anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti. Evaṃ sesānussatīsu pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāyañca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā. ^b^Samāpattiyā…pe… samudācarantī^eb^ti idañca upasamānussatidassanaṃ. Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti. Pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādasinehābhāvena thusasamahadayatā lūkhatā, sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve’’^eb^ti.
[03]Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā ^a^V1.0347^ea^ passaddhi eva passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa ^b^passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa^eb^.

[03]^b^Paṇītabhojanasevanatā^eb^ti paṇītasappāyabhojanasevanatā. ^b^Utuiriyāpathasukha^eb^ggahaṇena sappāyautuiriyāpathaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhi tividhaṃ sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ ^a^M1.0389^ea^ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti. Ahetukaṃ sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhanti ayameko anto, issarādivisamahetukanti pana ayaṃ dutiyo, ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti. Majjhatto payogo yassa hoti majjhattapayogo, tassa bhāvo ^b^majjhattapayogatā^eb^. Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṃ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati, eteneva sāraddhakāyapuggalaparivajjanapassaddhakāyapuggalavasenānaṃ tadāvahanatā saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva ^b^samathanimittaṃ^eb^. Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto. Ekaggatābhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti ^b^abyaggo,^eb^ samādhi. So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avikkhepaṭṭhena ca abyagganimitta’’^eb^nti.
[03]Vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattapaṭipādanā ca paññāvahā vuttā, samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vatthuvisada…pe… veditabbā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Karaṇabhāvanākosallānaṃ avinābhāvato, rakkhaṇakosallassa ca tammūlakattā ^b^‘‘nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Kasiṇanimittassā^eb^ti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asubhanimittassādikassapi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti.

[03]^b^Atisithilavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paññāpayogamandataṃ pamodavekallañca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tassa paggahaṇa^eb^nti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuddharaṇaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Yasmiñca ^a^V1.0348^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya ^a^M1.0390^ea^. Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya, mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti? Evaṃ sante’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234).
[03]Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbaṃ, sā anantaraṃ vibhāvitā eva.

[03]^b^Accāraddhavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paññāpayogabalavataṃ pamoduppilāvanañca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tassa niggahaṇa^eb^nti tassa uddhatacittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni…pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti? Evaṃ bhante’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234).

[03]Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā. Tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva, samādhisambojjhaṅgassa vuccamānā, itarassa anantaraṃ vakkhati.

[03]^b^Paññāpayogamandatāyā^eb^ti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. Yathā hi dānaṃ alobhappadhānaṃ, sīlaṃ adosappadhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti, tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti, anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino ^a^M1.0391^ea^ cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti, tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā ^a^V1.0349^ea^ upasamasukhaṃ na vindati, tenāpi cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paññāpayoga…pe… nirassādaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Tassa saṃveguppādanaṃ pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādi-khuppipāsādi-aññamaññavibādhanādihetukaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanatā^eb^ti ayaṃ sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena tena saṃvejanavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā, saṃvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanācittassa tosanāti attho.

[03]^b^Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammā^eb^ti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma. ^b^Alīna^eb^ntiādīsu kosajjapakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya ^b^alīnaṃ,^eb^ uddhaccapakkhiyānaṃ anadhimattatāya ^b^anuddhataṃ,^eb^ paññāpayogasattiyā upasamasukhādhigamena ca ^b^anirassādaṃ,^eb^ tato eva ^b^ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca^eb^. Tattha alīnatāya ^b^paggahe,^eb^ anuddhatatāya ^b^niggahe,^eb^ anirassādatāya ^b^sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati,^eb^ alīnānuddhatatāhi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ. Samappavattiyā vā ^b^alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ,^eb^ samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ^b^anirassāda^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatā^eb^ti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāvaṭatāsaṅkhātaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ abhibhuyya pekkhanā vuccati.

[03]Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi samādānakiccanipphattiyā puggalassa samāhitabhāvasādhanamevāti tattha samadhurabhāvenāha ^b^‘‘upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttānusārena veditabbaṃ.

[03]Anurodhavirodhavippahānavasena ^a^M1.0392^ea^ majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato, so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha ^b^‘‘sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā’’^eb^ti. Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti ^a^V1.0350^ea^ anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassentena ^b^‘‘sattamajjhattatā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatā’’^eb^ti. Upekkhāya hi visesato rāgo paṭipakkho. Tathā cāha ‘‘upekkhā rāgabahulassa visuddhimaggo’’ti (visuddhi. 1.269).

[03]^b^Dvīhākārehī^eb^ti kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ attasuññatāpaccavekkhaṇanti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. ^b^Dvīhevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ saṅkhyāsamānatāya. ^b^Assāmikabhāvo^eb^ anattaniyatā. Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññañca kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā, so pana koci natthevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Anaddhaniya^eb^nti na addhānakkhamaṃ, na ciraṭṭhāyi ittaraṃ aniccanti attho. ^b^Tāvakālika^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
[03]^b^Mamāyatī^eb^ti mamattaṃ karoti, ‘‘mama’’nti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati. ^b^Dhanāyantā^eb^ti dhanaṃ drabyaṃ karontā.
[03]Ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca’’^eb^nti.
[06]Bojjhaṅgapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^119^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yathāsabhāvato^eb^ti aviparītasabhāvato bādhanalakkhaṇato, yo yo vā sabhāvo ^b^yathāsabhāvo,^eb^ tato, ruppanādikakkhaḷādisabhāvatoti attho. ^b^Janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpika^eb^nti pavattalakkhaṇassa dukkhassa janikaṃ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṃ. ^b^Purimataṇha^eb^nti dukkhanibbattito puretarasiddhaṃ taṇhaṃ.

[03]Sasantatipariyāpannānaṃ ^a^M1.0393^ea^ dukkhasamudayānaṃ appavattibhāvena pariggayhamāno nirodhopi sasantatipariyāpanno viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘attano vā cattāri saccānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parassa vā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi, lokasamudayañca paññapemi, lokanirodhañca paññapemi, lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadañca paññapemī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.107). Kathaṃ pana ādikampiko ^a^V1.0351^ea^ nirodhasaccāni pariggaṇhātīti? Anussavādisiddhamākāraṃ pariggaṇhāti, evañca katvā lokuttarabojjhaṅge uddissapi pariggaho na virujjhati. ^b^Yathāsambhavato^eb^ti sambhavānurūpaṃ, ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṃ sesasaccavasena samudayavayā veditabbāti attho.
[06]Catusaccapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]‘‘Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsa’’ntiādikā satta sivathikā aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānatāya itarāsaṃ uddhumātakādīnaṃ sabhāvenevāti navannaṃ sivathikānaṃ appanākammaṭṭhānatā vuttā. ^b^Dveyevā^eb^ti ‘‘ānāpānaṃ, dvattiṃsākāro’’ti imāni dveyeva. ^b^Abhiniveso^eb^ti vipassanābhiniveso, so pana sammasanīyadhamme pariggaho. Iriyāpathā ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṃ avatthāvisesamattatāya na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya. Nīvaraṇabojjhaṅgā ādito na pariggahetabbāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iriyāpatha…pe… na jāyatī’’^eb^ti. Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti, nīvaraṇādimukhena ca taṃ sampayuttā taṃnissayadhammāti adhippāyena mahāsīvatthero ^b^‘‘iriyāpathādīsupi^eb^^b^abhiniveso jāyatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Atthi nu kho me^eb^tiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṃ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṃ. Apariññāpubbikā hi pariññāti.

[03]^b^137^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmaṃ ‘‘idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū’’tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃ paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatthaṃ, desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yo hi koci, bhikkhave’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ, na bhikkhuyevāti dassento ^b^‘‘yo hi koci, bhikkhu vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Dassana^eb^maggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā ^a^M1.0394^ea^ aññā nāma, tassa phalabhāvato aggaphalampīti āha ^b^‘‘aññāti arahatta’’^eb^nti. Appatarepi kāle sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassentoti yojanā.
[03]^b^138^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Niyyātento^eb^ti nigamento.
[06]Papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06]Satipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca mūlapariyāyavaggavaṇṇanā.
[06]Paṭhamo bhāgo niṭṭhito.
[06] Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa

[03]^b^139^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suttadesanāvatthusaṅkhātassa ^a^M2.0001^ea^^a^V2.0001^ea^ atthassa uppatti aṭṭhuppatti, sā tassa atthīti ^b^aṭṭhuppattiko^eb^ti vuttovāyamattho. ^b^Lābhasakkārapaccayā^eb^ti lābhasakkāranimittaṃ, bhagavato saṅghassa ca uppannalābhasakkārahetu, attano vā lābhasakkāruppādanahetu. ^b^Titthiyaparidevite^eb^ti titthiyānaṃ ‘‘kiṃ bho samaṇoyeva gotamo samaṇo’’tiādinā vippalapanimittaṃ. ^b^‘‘Mahālābhasakkāro uppajjī’’^eb^ti vatvā samantapāsādikatthaṃ tassa uppattikāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘catuppamāṇiko hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Cattāri pamāṇāni catuppamāṇāni, catuppamāṇāni etassa atthīti ^b^catuppamāṇiko^eb^. Lokoyeva saṅgamma samāgamma vasanaṭṭhena ^b^lokasannivāso,^eb^ sattakāyoti attho. Pamināti uḷāratādivisesaṃ etenāti pamāṇaṃ (a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.65) rūpaṃ rūpakāyo pamāṇaṃ etassāti ^b^rūpappamāṇo^eb^. Tato eva rūpe pasannoti ^b^rūpappasanno^eb^. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo ^a^V2.0002^ea^. ^b^Ghoso^eb^ti pavattathutighoso (a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.65). ^b^Lūkha^eb^nti paccayalūkhatā. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti sīlādayo guṇadhammā adhippetā.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0002^ea^ puggalānaṃ. ^b^Āroha^eb^nti uccataṃ. Sā ca kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle pamāṇayuttā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Pariṇāha^eb^nti nātikisanātithūlatāvasena mitapariṇāhaṃ. ^b^Saṇṭhāna^eb^nti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ susaṇṭhitataṃ. ^b^Pāripūri^eb^nti sabbesaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ paripuṇṇataṃ avekallataṃ. ^b^Tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti tasmiṃ rūpe rūpasampattiyaṃ pamāṇabhāvaṃ upādāya. ^b^Pasādaṃ janetī^eb^ti adhimokkhaṃ uppādeti.

[03]^b^Paravaṇṇanāyā^eb^ti ‘‘amuko ediso ca ediso cā’’ti yasaguṇavacanena. ^b^Parathomanāyā^eb^ti sammukhāva parassa silāghuppādanena abhitthavanena. ^b^Parapasaṃsanāyā^eb^ti parammukhā parassa guṇasaṃkittanena. ^b^Paravaṇṇahārikāyā^eb^ti paramparavaṇṇahārikāya paramparāya parassa kittisaddūpasaṃhārena. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ thutighose.

[03]^b^Cīvaralūkha^eb^nti thūlajiṇṇabahutunnakatādiṃ cīvarassa lūkhabhāvaṃ. ^b^Pattalūkha^eb^nti anekaganthikāhatādiṃ pattassa lūkhabhāvaṃ. ^b^Vividhaṃ vā dukkarakārika^eb^nti dhutaṅgasevanādivasena pavattaṃ nānāvidhaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ.
[03]^b^Sīlaṃ vā passitvā^eb^ti sīlapāripūrivasena visuddhaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passitvā. Jhānādiadhigamasiddhaṃ ^b^samādhiṃ vā^eb^. Vipassanābhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ ^b^paññaṃ vā^eb^.

[03]Bhagavato sarīraṃ disvāti sambandho. ^b^Rūpappamāṇopi sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati^eb^ aparimitakālasamupacitapuññānubhāvanipphannāya sabbaso anavajjāya sabbākāraparipuṇṇāvayavāya rūpakāyasampattiyā samantapāsādikattā, yassā rucirabhāvo visuddhe vigatavalāhake deve puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakalābhāgamaṇḍalaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ abhibhavitvā atirocati, pabhassarabhāvo saradasamayaṃ saṃvaddhitadiguṇatejakiraṇajālasamujjalaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ abhibhavati, sommakiraṇarasasamujjalabhāvehi tadubhayehi abhibhuyya vattamānaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vijjotanasamatthaṃ mahābrahmuno pabhāsamudayaṃ abhivihacca bhāsate tapate virocati ca.

[03]Satipi ^a^V2.0003^ea^ aṅgapariccāgādīnaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca ^b^aṅgapariccāgā^eb^diggahaṇaṃ, tatthāpi ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ ^b^nayanapariccāga^eb^ggahaṇaṃ, pariccāgabhāvasāmaññepi rajjapariccāgato ^a^M2.0003^ea^^b^puttadārapariccāga^eb^ggahaṇañca kataṃ. ^b^Ādinā nayenā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pubbayogapubbacariyādihetusampattiyā, ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.157, 255) vuttāya phalasampattiyā, ‘‘so dhammaṃ desetī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.255) vuttāya sattupakārakiriyāya ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati^eb^ yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇabhāvato acchariyabbhutabhāvato ca. Sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^‘‘Cīvaralūkhaṃ disvā’’^eb^ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarenā^eb^ti matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitena tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitena sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarena. ^b^Bhāriya^eb^nti garukaṃ, dukkaranti attho. Vadhuyuvatīmajjhimitthivasena, bālayobbanapurāṇavasena vā ^b^tividhanāṭakatā. Hareṇuyūsaṃ^eb^ maṇḍalakalāyaraso. ‘‘Yāpessati nāmā’’ti nāma-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandho. Nāma-saddayogena hi anāgatakālassa viya payogo, yāpeti icceva attho. ^b^Appāṇaka^eb^nti nirassāsaṃ nirodhitassāsapassāsaṃ.

[03]^b^Samādhiguṇa^eb^nti sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ vivarati jhānādiggahaṇena. Mānadabbanimmadanena nibbisevanabhāvāpādanampi damanamevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pāthikaputtadamanādīnī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena saccakāḷavakabakadamanādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Bāveru^eb^nti evaṃnāmakaṃ visayaṃ. ^b^Sarasampanno^eb^ti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena sarena samannāgato. Tena brahmassaratākaravīkabhāṇitādassanena lakkhaṇahāranayena avasesalakkhaṇapāripūriṃ viya tadavinābhāvato buddhānaṃ desanāvilāsañca vibhāveti.
[03]^b^Hatappabhā^eb^ti buddhānubhāvena vigatatejā. ^b^Kāḷapakkhūpame^eb^ti sattānaṃ byāmohandhakārābhibhavena kāḷapakkharattūpame. ^b^Sūriye^eb^ti sūriye udayitvā obhāsenteti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Siṅghāṭake^eb^ti tikoṇaracchāyaṃ. ^b^Catukke^eb^ti sandhiyaṃ. ^b^Paridevantī^eb^ti anutthunanavasena vippalapanti. Sokādhikakato hi vacīpalāpo paridevo. ^b^Loke uppajjamāneyeva uppannā^eb^ti attano diṭṭhivādassa purātanabhāvaṃ dīpenti.

[03]^b^Sesapadesupī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0004^ea^^a^V2.0004^ea^ ‘‘idha dutiyo samaṇo’’tiādīsu sesavāresupi (a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.241-242) yathā hi ‘‘vivicceva kāmehī’’ti (pārā. 11; dī. ni. 1.226; saṃ. ni. 2.152; a. ni. 4.123) ettha kato niyamo ‘‘vivicca akusalehī’’ti (pārā. 11; dī. ni. 1.226; saṃ. ni. 2.152; a. ni. 4.123) etthāpi katoyeva hoti sāvadhāraṇasseva atthassa icchitabbattā, evamidhāpīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dutiyādayopī’’^eb^tiādi. Sāmaññaphalādhigamavasena nippariyāyato samaṇabhāvoti tesaṃ vasenettha cattāro samaṇā desitāti tamatthaṃ suttantarena samatthetuṃ ^b^‘‘tenevāhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipattikkamena desanākkamena ca sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ dutiyāditā vuttāti sotāpannassa paṭhamatā avuttasiddhāti na coditā. ^b^Phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva adhippetā^eb^ samitapāpasamaṇaggahaṇato. Kasmā panettha ^b^mahāparinibbāne^eb^ viya maggaṭṭhā tadatthāya paṭipannā ca na gahitāti? Veneyyajjhāsayato. Tattha hi maggādhigamatthāya vipassanāpi ito bahiddhā natthi, kuto maggaphalānīti dassentena bhagavatā ‘‘ñāyassa dhammassa padesavattī, ito bahiddhā samaṇopi natthī’’ti vuttaṃ. Idha pana niṭṭhānappattameva taṃtaṃsamaṇabhāvaṃ gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva gahitā ‘‘maggaṭṭhato phalaṭṭho savisesaṃ dakkhiṇeyyo’’ti. Svāyamattho dvīsu suttesu desanābhedeneva viññāyatīti.

[03]^b^Rittā^eb^ti vivittā. ^b^Tucchā^eb^ti nissārā paṭipannakasārābhāvato. Pavadanti etehīti ^b^pavādā,^eb^ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ nānādiṭṭhidīpakā samayāti āha ^b^‘‘cattāro sassatavādā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āgamissati. ^b^Te^eb^ti yathāvuttasamaṇā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘parappavādā’’ti vutte bāhirakasamaye.

[03]^b^Ya^eb^nti yasmiṃ. Bhummatthe hi idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Ñāyo vuccati saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo. Tena hi nibbānaṃ ñāyati gammati paṭivijjhatīti. So eva nibbānasampāpakahetutāya dhammoti āha ^b^‘‘ñāyassa dhammassā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ parappavādasāsanānaṃ ^b^akhettatā khettatā ca ariyamaggassa^eb^ abhāvabhāvā suparisuddhassa sīlassa suparisuddhāya samathavipassanāya ^b^abhāvato sāvato ca^eb^. Tadubhayañca durakkhātasvākkhātabhāvahetukaṃ, so ca asammāsambuddhasammāsambuddhapaveditatāyāti parājikāya ^a^M2.0005^ea^ satthu vipattihetutāya sāsanassa aniyyānabhāvoti dasseti.

[03]Idāni ^a^V2.0005^ea^ yathāvuttamatthaṃ pariyāyato ca pāḷiyā ca samatthetuṃ ^b^‘‘tenāha bhagavā’’^eb^tiādinā pāḷiṃ dassetvā upamāpadesena tattha suttaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘yasmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā ekaccānaṃ visesato sīhānaṃ purimaṃ pādadvayaṃ hatthakiccampi karoti, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘surattahatthapādo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sīhassa kesā^eb^ nāma kesarāyatanā khandhalomā. ^b^Gocariyahatthikulaṃ^eb^ nāma pakatihatthikulaṃ, yaṃ ‘‘kālāvaka’’ntipi vuccati. ^b^Ghoṭako^eb^ nāma assakhaḷuṅko. Sineruparibhaṇḍe simbalirukkhehi sañchādito paññāsayojano daho simbalidaho, taṃ parivāretvā mahantaṃ simbalivanaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘simbalidahavane’’^eb^ti. Aññatitthāvāsabhūmiyaṃ imesu samaṇesu ekacco na uppajjati, īdiso panettha vikappo natthi, sabbena sabbaṃ na uppajjantevāti dassento ^b^‘‘ekasamaṇopī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Ariyamaggaparikkhate^eb^ti ariyamagguppattiyā abhisaṅkhate, yadā sāsanikānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ariyamaggo dibbati, tadāti attho.

[03]^b^Sammā^eb^ti suṭṭhu. Suṭṭhu nadanaṃ nāma hetuyuttaṃ suṭṭhu katvā kathananti āha ^b^‘‘hetunā’’^eb^ti. So ca hetu aviparīto eva icchitabboti āha ^b^‘‘nayenā’’^eb^ti, ñāyenāti attho. Evaṃbhūto ca so yathādhippetatthaṃ karoti sādhetīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. Yadi tiracchānasīhassa nādo sabbatiracchānaekaccamanussāmanussanādato seṭṭhattā seṭṭhanādo, kimaṅgaṃ pana tathāgatasīhanādoti āha ^b^‘‘sīhanādanti seṭṭhanāda’’^eb^nti. Yadi tiracchānasīhanādassa seṭṭhanādatā nibbhayatāya appaṭisattutāya icchitā, tathāgatasīhanādasseva ayamattho sātisayoti āha ^b^‘‘abhītanādaṃ appaṭināda’’^eb^nti. Idānissa seṭṭhanādabhāvaṃ kāraṇena paṭipādento ^b^‘‘imesañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena ‘‘sammā’’ti vuttamatthaṃ samattheti. Tattha ^b^atthitāyā^eb^ti iminā sīhanādassa uttamatthataṃ dasseti. Bhūtaṭṭho hi uttamaṭṭho. Tāya eva bhūtaṭṭhatāya abhītanādatāti dassento ^b^‘‘ime samaṇā…pe… nāma hotī’’^eb^ti āha. Abhūtañhi vadato kutoci ^a^M2.0006^ea^ bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā siyāti ‘‘idhevā’’ti niyamassa aviparītataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘amhākampi…pe… appaṭinādo nāma hotī’’^eb^ti āha. Yañhi aññatthāpi atthi, taṃ idhevāti avadhāretuṃ na yuttanti.

[03]^b^140^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kho^eb^ti avadhāraṇe. Tena vijjati evāti dasseti. Yanti karaṇatthe paccattanti āha ^b^‘‘yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo^eb^ tabbinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhivipphanditassa abhāvato.
