[03]^b^Ekadā^eb^ti āmeḍitalopena niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘ekekasmiṃ kāle’’^eb^ti. ^b^Lobhadosamohā^eb^ti paṭhamamaggena pahīnāvasesā lobhadosamohā. ^b^Niravasesā pahīyanti,^eb^ aññathā dutiyamaggena kiṃ kataṃ siyāti adhippāyo. Samudācārappattaṃ pana disvā ^b^‘‘appahīnaṃ me atthī’’tipi jānāti^eb^. Evaṃ kathaṃ niravasesappahānasaññāti āha ^b^‘‘appahīnakaṃ…pe… saññī hotī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ paṭhamamaggeneva samucchinnasaṃsayassa ‘‘ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīnoti ^b^evaṃ sandheho kathaṃ uppajjatī’’^eb^ti vatvā ^b^‘‘paṇṇattiyā akovidattā’’^eb^ti kāraṇamāha. Vinayakukkuccaṃ viya hi paṇṇattiyaṃ akusalatāya ariyānampi katthaci vimatimattaṃ uppajjati yathā taṃ sabbaso appahīnasammohānanti. Attano avisaye anabhijānanaṃ paṇṇattikosallena kimettha payojanaṃ, paccavekkhaṇāmattena ayamattho sijjhatīti dassento ^b^‘‘kiṃ tassa paccavekkhaṇā natthī’’^eb^ti āha. Itaro ‘‘natthī’’ti na sakkā vattunti katvā ‘‘atthī’’ti vatvā tattha labbhamānavibhāgaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sā panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0043^ea^ paccavekkhaṇā. ^b^Sabbesa^eb^nti sabbesaṃ ariyānaṃ. Yathā paripuṇṇā na hoti, na evaṃ sabbaso na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘imāsu panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^176^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajjhatta^eb^nti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘tava santāne’’^eb^ti. ^b^Appahīno^eb^ti anavasesato appahīno. ^b^Duvidhe^eb^ti vatthukāmakilesakāme. Kilesakāmopi hi yadaggena assādīyati, tadaggena paribhuñjīyati.

[03]^b^177^eb^^b^.^eb^ Assādīyatīti assādo, sukhaṃ. Appo appamattako assādo etesūti ^b^appassādā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parittasukhā’’^eb^ti. Pariyesanadukkhādihetukaṃ ^a^M2.0047^ea^ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ tattha duccaritacaraṇena samparāyikañca dukkhamettha kāmesu bahukanti ^b^bahudukkhā. Bahupāyāsā^eb^ti bahuparikkilesā. Te pana parikkilesā vakkhamānanayena bahūyevettha diṭṭhadhammikāpīti āha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammika…pe… bahū’’^eb^ti. Te ca parikkilesā yasmā taṃsamaṅgino hitapaṭipattiyā antarāyakarā idha ceva paraloke ca ādīnavakāraṇañca pavattanti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammika…pe… bahū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ cepī^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘appassādā kāmā’’tiādinā ākārena. ^b^Nayenā^eb^ti dhammena. ^b^Kāraṇenā^eb^ti yuttiyā. Suṭṭhu diṭṭhaṃ hotīti sambandho. ^b^Vipassanāpaññāyā^eb^ti ariyamaggapaññāya. Sā cattāripi saccāni visesato passatīti ^b^vipassanā^eb^ti adhippetā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhāmaggadvayañāṇenāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pītisukha^eb^nti pītisukhavantaṃ jhānadvayaṃ. ^b^Dve magge^eb^ti heṭṭhāmagge. Āvaṭṭanasīlo ābhujanasīlo na hotīti ^b^anāvaṭṭī neva hoti^eb^ sabbaso appahīnakāmarāgachando. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Orodhanāṭakā pajahanapaññā^eb^ti ādīnavānupassanāñāṇamāha.

[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Assādopi kathito,^eb^ ‘‘appassādā’’ti hi iminā yāvatako kāmesu assādo, taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesato pariggahetvā cassa parittabhāvo dassitoti ^b^ādīnavopi kathito^eb^ saṅkhepeneva sesassāadīnavassa dassitattā. ^b^Taṃ kathetu^eb^nti taṃ nissaraṇaṃ ‘‘ekantasukhapaṭisaṃvedī’’ti iminā kathetuṃ. ^b^Imehi antehī^eb^ti ‘‘pañcime, mahānāma, kāmaguṇā’’tiādinā kāmaguṇadassanamukhena kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ ‘‘ubbhaṭṭhakā honti āsanapaṭikkhittā’’tiādinā attakilamathānuyogañca dassetvā imehi dvīhi antehi muttaṃ mama sāsananti, phalasamāpattipariyosānattā sāsanasampattiyā ^b^‘‘upariphalasamāpattisīsena sakalasāsanaṃ dassetu’’^eb^nti āha. Gijjhasadiso kūṭoti majjhepadalopīsamāso yathā ‘‘sākapatthivo’’ti (pāṇini. 2.1.60). Dutiye panettha gijjhavantatāya gijjhā kūṭe etassāti ^a^V2.0044^ea^^b^gijjhakūṭo^eb^. Uddhaṃyeva tiṭṭhanakā nisajjāya vuṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya ekaṭṭhāneneva tiṭṭhanakā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anisinnā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nigaṇṭhassā^eb^ti nāṭaputtassa. Natthi etassa parisesanti ^b^aparisesaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ saṅkhābhavacanamattamassāti āha ^b^‘‘aparisesasaṅkhāta’’^eb^nti. Niccaṭṭhena ^a^M2.0048^ea^ satata-saddena abhiṇhappavatti jotitā siyāti ^b^‘‘samita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tena nirantarappavattiṃ dassetīti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^180^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yaṃ karoti, taṃ jānātī^eb^ti dukkhassa nijjaraṇakhepanaṃ nāma viññūnaṃ kiccaṃ, viññunā ca purisena katākataṃ jānitabbaṃ, tasmā tumhehi purāṇānaṃ kammānaṃ byantibhāvaṃ karontehi paṭhamaṃ tāva ettakāni purāṇāni kammānīti jānitabbāni, tato ‘‘ettakaṃ kālaṃ katena tapasā ettakāni tāni byantikatāni, idāni ettakāni kātabbānī’’tiādinā ayaṃ vidhi purisena viya attanā kātabbakiccaṃ paricchinditabbanti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tumhehipi tathā ñātabbaṃ siyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suddhanta^eb^nti suddhakoṭṭhāsaṃ, āyatiṃ anavassavasiddhaṃ kammakkhayaṃ, tato vā dukkhakkhayanti attho. ^b^Suddhantaṃ patto atthīti pucchatī^eb^ti iminā akusalānaṃ pahānaṃ, kusalānaṃ bhāvanā ca sabbena sabbaṃ nigaṇṭhasamaye natthi sabbaso visuddhibhāvanāya abhāvato, tasmā kuto dukkhakkhayassa sambhavoti dasseti.

[03]^b^Evaṃ ajānanabhāve satī^eb^ti ‘‘ahuvamheva maya’’ntiādinā vuttappakārassa ajānane sati, tasmiṃ tumhehi aññāyamāneti attho. ^b^Luddā^eb^ti ghorā. Te pana yasmā kāyavācāhi nihīnameva karonti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘luddācārā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Lohitapāṇitveva vuccati^eb^ tajjākiriyācaraṇato. Māgavikakevaṭṭacoraghātakādayo ^b^māgavikādayo. Kakkhaḷakammā^eb^ti pharusakammā. ^b^Te nigaṇṭhesu pabbajantī^eb^ti pubbe mahādukkhasaṃvattaniyakammassa katattā hi tumhe etarahi īdisaṃ mahādukkhaṃ paccanubhavathāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Vāde^eb^ti diṭṭhiyaṃ, samayeti attho. ^b^Sukhena sukha^eb^nti ettha ^b^sukhenā^eb^ti paṭipattisukhena, sukhāya paṭipattiyāti attho. ^b^Sukha^eb^nti vimokkhasukhaṃ, idha loke sukhaṃ adhigacchantā kasivaṇijjādidukkhapaṭipattiyāva adhigacchanti, evaṃ mokkhasukhampīti adhippāyo. Sarīrāvayavasampattiyāpi bimbino sāroti ^b^bimbisāro. Te nigaṇṭhā…pe… sandhāya vadanti,^eb^ na pana bhagavato accantasantapaṇītaṃ nibbānasukhapaṭivedanaṃ jānanti. ^b^Sahasā^eb^ti ravā. ^b^Appaṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti na paṭisaṅkhāya avicāretvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāhasaṃ katvā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Aññāhi ^a^M2.0049^ea^^a^V2.0045^ea^ vedanāhi avomissaṃ ekantaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^ekantasukhaṃ,^eb^ tassa paṭisaṃvedī. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nirantarasukhapaṭisaṃvedī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kathāpatiṭṭhāpanattha^eb^nti ‘‘ekantasukhapaṭisaṃvedī’’ti evaṃ āraddhakathāya patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ. ^b^Rājavāre^eb^ti rājānaṃ uddissa āgatadesanāvāre. ^b^Sukhaṃ pucchituṃ hotīti^eb^ ‘‘yadi satta rattindivāni nappahoti, kiṃ cha rattindivāni pahotī’’tiādinā pucchanasukhaṃ hoti. ‘‘Ahaṃ kho’’tiādinā pavatto ^b^suddhavāro^eb^ suddhanissandassa phalasamāpattisukhassa vasena āgatattā. ^b^Anacchariyaṃ hoti,^eb^ satta rattindivāni pahontassa ekasmiṃ rattindive kiṃ vattabbanti. ^b^Uttānatthameva^eb^ vuttanayattā suviññeyyattā.
[06]Cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^181^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vuttānusārenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0046^ea^ ‘‘kurūsu, sakkesū’’ti ca ettha vuttanayānusārena, ‘‘bhaggā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā’’tiādinā nayena vacanattho veditabboti attho. ^b^Vatthupariggahadivase^eb^ti nagaramāpanatthaṃ vatthuvijjācariyena nagaraṭṭhānassa pariggaṇhanadivase. ^b^Athā^eb^ti pacchā. ^b^Nagare nimmite^eb^ti tattha anantarāyena nagare māpite. Tameva susumāragiraṇaṃ subhanimittaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘susumāragiri’’tvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu^eb^. Susumārasaṇṭhānattā susumāro nāma eko giri, so tassa nagarassa samīpe, tasmā taṃ susumāragiri etassa atthīti ^b^‘‘susumāragirī’’^eb^ti vuccatīti keci. ^b^Bhesakaḷā^eb^ti vuccati ghammaṇḍagacchaṃ, keci ‘‘setarukkha’’nti vadanti, tesaṃ bahulatāya pana taṃ vanaṃ bhesakaḷāvananteva paññāyittha. ^b^Bheso^eb^ nāma eko yakkho ayuttakārī, tassa tato gaḷitaṭṭhānatāya taṃ vanaṃ ^b^bhesagaḷāvanaṃ^eb^ nāma jātanti keci. ^b^Abhayadinnaṭṭhāne jātaṃ^eb^ virūḷhaṃ, saṃvaddhanti attho.

[03]^b^Icchāpetī^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci attani garahitabbaṃ vattuṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ icchaṃ uppādeti, tadatthāya tesaṃ attānaṃ vissajjetīti attho. Paṭhamaṃ dinno hitūpadeso ^b^ovādo,^eb^ aparāparaṃ dinno ^b^anusāsanī^eb^. Paccuppannātītavisayo ^a^M2.0050^ea^ vā ^b^ovādo,^eb^ anāgatavisayo ^b^anusāsanī^eb^. Otiṇṇavatthuko ^b^ovādo,^eb^ itaro ^b^anusāsanī. So cā^eb^ti evaṃ pavāretā so bhikkhu. Dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlaggāhe vipaccanīkasāte anādare puggaleti ^b^dubbaco^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dukkhena vattabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upari āgatehī^eb^ti ‘‘pāpiccho hotī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.181) āgatehi soḷasahi pāpadhammehi. Pakārehi āvahaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ, tato padakkhiṇato gahaṇasīlo padakkhiṇaggāhī, na padakkhiṇaggāhī ^b^appadakkhiṇaggāhī. Vāmato^eb^ti apasabyato, vuttavipariyāyatoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Asantasambhāvanapatthanāna^eb^nti asantehi avijjamānehi guṇehi sambhāvanassa patthanābhūtānaṃ. Paṭi-saddo paccattikapariyāyo, pharaṇaṃ vāyamanaṃ idha tathāvaṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭippharatīti paṭiviruddho paccanīko hutvā tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Apasādetī^eb^ti khipeti tajjeti. Tathābhūto ^a^V2.0047^ea^ ca paraṃ ghaṭṭento nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ghaṭṭetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭiāropetī^eb^ti yādisena vutto, tassa paṭibhāgabhūtaṃ dosaṃ codakassa upari āropeti.

[03]^b^Paṭicaratī^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 2.3.68) paṭicchādanavasena carati pavattati, paṭicchādanattho eva vā carati-saddo anekatthattā dhātūnanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭicchādetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññenañña^eb^nti paṭicchādanākāradassananti āha ^b^‘‘aññena kāraṇenā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vā^eb^ti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa dosavibhāvanaṃ kāraṇaṃ, vacanaṃ vā vuttaṃ, tato aññeneva kāraṇena, vacanena vā paṭicchādeti. ^b^Kāraṇenā^eb^ti codanāya amūlikabhāvadīpaniyā yuttiyā. ^b^Vacanenā^eb^ti tadatthabodhanena. ^b^Ko āpanno^eb^tiādinā codanaṃ avissajjetvā vikkhepāpajjanaṃ aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇanti dasseti, bahiddhā kathāapanāmanaṃ vissajjetvāti ayameva tesaṃ viseso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itthannāma’’^eb^ntiādi.
[03]Apadīyanti dosā etena rakkhīyanti, lūyanti, chijjantīti vā ^b^apadānaṃ,^eb^ (a. ni. ṭī. 2.3.2) sattānaṃ sammā, micchā vā pavattapayogo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano cariyāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anuminitabba^eb^nti ^a^M2.0051^ea^ anu anu minitabbo jānitabbo. ^b^Attānaṃ anuminitabba^eb^nti ca idaṃ paccatte upayogavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anuminitabbo tuletabbo tīretabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Attānaṃ anuminitabba^eb^nti vā attani anumānañāṇaṃ pavattetabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – appiyabhāvāvahā mayi pavattā pāpicchatā pāpicchābhāvato parasmiṃ pavattapāpicchatā viya. Esa nayo sesadhammesupi. Aparo nayo – sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyabhāvaṃ icchantena pāpicchatā pahātabbā sīlavisuddhihetubhāvato attukkaṃsanādippahānaṃ viya. Sesadhammesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccavekkhitabbo^eb^ti ‘‘na pāpiccho bhavissāmi, na pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gato’’tiādinā pati pati divasassa tikkhattuṃ vā ñāṇacakkhunā avekkhitabbaṃ, ñāṇaṃ pavattetabbanti attho. Pāpicchatādīnaṃ pahānaṃ pati avekkhitabbaṃ, ayañca attho tabba-saddassa bhāvatthatāvasena veditabbo, kammatthatāvasena pana ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘attāna’’^eb^nti paccatte upayogavacanaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Sikkhantenā^eb^ti tissopi sikkhā sikkhantena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kusalesu dhammesū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tilaka^eb^nti ^a^V2.0048^ea^ kāḷatilasetatilāditilakaṃ. ^b^Sabbappahāna^eb^nti sabbappakārappahānaṃ. ^b^Phale āgate^eb^ti phale uppanne. ^b^Nibbāne āgate^eb^ti nibbānassa adhigatattā. ^b^Bhikkhupātimokkha^eb^nti ‘‘so samaṇo, sa bhikkhū’’ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ, na upasampannānaṃ eva na pabbajitānaṃ evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā cidaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idaṃ divasassa tikkhattu’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Apaccavekkhituṃ na vaṭṭati^eb^ attavisuddhiyā ekantahetubhāvato.
[06]Anumānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ceto ^a^V2.0049^ea^ tehi khilayati thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti ^b^cetokhilā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittassa thaddhabhāvā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā tehi uppannehi cittaṃ uklāpījātaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya amanuññaṃ khettaṃ viya ca khāṇukanicitaṃ amahapphalaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kacavarabhāvā khāṇukabhāvā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Cittassā’’ti ānetvā ^a^M2.0052^ea^ sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Cittaṃ bandhitvā^eb^ti taṇhāpavattibhāvato kusalacārassa avasaracajanavasena cittaṃ baddhaṃ viya samorodhetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantī’’^eb^ti. Saddatthato pana ceto virūpaṃ nibandhīyati saṃyamīyati etehīti ^b^cetaso vinibandhā^eb^ yassa catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvappattiyā suparisuddhaṃ visesabhāgiyattā appakasireneva maggaphalāvahaṃ mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa viya, so tādisena sīlena imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ āpajjissatīti āha ^b^‘‘sīlena vuddhi’’^eb^nti. Yassa pana ariyamaggo uppajjanto virūḷhamūlo viya pādapo suppatiṭṭhito, so sāsane virūḷhiṃ āpannoti āha ^b^‘‘maggena virūḷhi’’^eb^nti. Yo sabbaso kilesanibbānappatto, so arahā sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā sativepullappatto hotīti āha ^b^‘‘nibbānena vepulla’’^eb^nti. Dutiyavikappe attho vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.

[03]Buddhānaṃ dhammakāyo viya rūpakāyopi anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttaraguṇādhiṭṭhānatāya ca apaccakkhakārīnaṃ saṃsayavatthu hotiyevāti ^b^‘‘sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā mahāpurisalakkhaṇena anubyañjanādayo rūpakāyaguṇā gahitā eva honti avinābhāvatoti ^b^‘‘dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍita’’^eb^micceva vuttaṃ, evaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbepi anantāparimeyyabhedā dhammakāyaguṇā gahitā eva hontīti ^b^sabbaññutaññāṇaggahaṇameva^eb^ kataṃ nānantariyabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Kaṅkhahī^eb^ti ‘‘aho vata te guṇā na bhaveyyuṃ, bhaveyyuṃ vā’’ti patthanuppādanavasena kaṅkhati. Purimo hi viparītajjhāsayo, itaro yathābhūtañāṇajjhāsayo. ^b^Vicinanto^eb^ti vicayabhūtāya paññāya te vivecetukāmo tadabhāvato kicchaṃ dukkhaṃ āpajjati, kicchappatti ca tattha nicchetuṃ asamatthatāyevāti āha ^b^‘‘vinicchetuṃ na sakkotī’’^eb^ti. Vigatā cikicchāti ^b^vicikicchā. Adhimokkhaṃ na paṭilabhatī^eb^ti ‘‘evameta’’nti okappanavasena guṇesu vinicchayaṃ nādhigacchati. ^b^Otaritvā^eb^ti ñāṇena anupavisitvā. ^b^Pasīditu^eb^nti ‘‘pasannarūpadhammakāyaguṇehi bhagavā’’ti pasīdituṃ. ^b^Anāvilo^eb^ akālusso hotuṃ ^b^na sakkoti^eb^. ‘‘Kaṅkhatī’’ti ^a^V2.0050^ea^ iminā dubbalā vimati vuttā, ‘‘vicikicchatī’’ti iminā majjhimā, ‘‘nādhimuccatī’’ti iminā balavatī, ‘‘na sampasīdatī’’ti iminā tividhāyapi vimatiyā vasena uppannacittakālussiyaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ātappāyā^eb^tiādito ^a^M2.0053^ea^ tapati santapati kileseti ^b^ātappaṃ,^eb^ ārambhadhātu, tadatthāya. ^b^Anuyogāyā^eb^ti yathā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avasaro na hoti, evaṃ anu anu yuñjanaṃ ^b^anuyogo,^eb^ nikkamadhātu, tadatthāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ yogāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sātaccāyā^eb^ti yathā uparūpari visesādhigamo hoti, tathā satatassa nirantarapavattassa anuyogassa bhāvo ^b^sātaccaṃ,^eb^ parakkamadhātu, tadatthāya. ^b^Padhānāyā^eb^ti santamevaṃ tividhadhātusaṃvaḍḍhitānubhāvaṃ sabbakilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ padhānasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ, tadatthāya. Ettha ca ātappāya cittaṃ na namati yathāvuttakaṅkhāvasena, pageva anuyogādiatthanti dassetuṃ cattāripi padāni gahitāni, anavasesavisesadassanatthaṃ vā. Keci pana ‘‘ātappavevacanāneva anuyogādipadānī’’ti vadanti. Ettāvatā bhagavā satthari kaṅkhāya cittassa thaddhakacavarakhāṇukabhāvena akusalabhāvādiāpādanato cetokhilabhāvaṃ dasseti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03]Sikkhāggahaṇena paṭipattisaddhammassa gahitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pariyattidhamme ca paṭivedhadhamme cā’’^eb^ti. Pariyattidhamme yattha kaṅkhāya sambhavo, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ paramparāya paṭivedhāvahabhāvādivasenapi ekaccānaṃ tattha saṃsayuppattito. Yathā ca paṭivedhe kaṅkhā vuttā, evaṃ adhigamadhammepi pavattatīti veditabbā. Tathā hi ekacce ‘‘kasiṇādibhāvanāya jhānāni ijjhantī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Kasiṇanissando āruppāti, mettādinissando catutthabrahmavihāro’’ti evamādinā kaṅkhatiyevāti. Ettha ca navalokuttaresu paññattiyaṃyeva kaṅkhāpavatti veditabbā asaṃkilesikattā lokuttaradhammānaṃ.

[03]^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti edisaṃ suppaṭipatti-ujuppaṭipatti-ñāyappaṭipatti-sāmīcippaṭipatti-saṅkhātaṃ sammāpaṭipadaṃ. ^b^Adhisīlasikkhā^eb^dayo lokuttaradhammassa anudhammabhūtā veditabbā. Evañhi maggaphalasikkhāhi imāsaṃ viseso siddho hoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘sikkhāggahaṇena paṭipattisaddhammassa gahitattā’’ti. Ettha ca yathā vicikicchā vatthuttayassa sikkhāya ca guṇesu anadhimuccanāsampasīdanavasena appaṭipattibhāvato cittassa thaddhabhāvo āsappanaparisappanavasena pavattiyā kacavarakhāṇukabhāvo ca, evaṃ sabrahmacārīsu āghātacaṇḍikkādivasena ^a^V2.0051^ea^ cittassa thaddhabhāvo ca upahananavirujjhanādivasena ^a^M2.0054^ea^ kacavarakhāṇukabhāvo ca veditabbo. Ariyasaṅghavisayā vicikicchā, puggalavisayā kāci natthīti saṅghavisayāva gahitā, sāsanikavasena cāyaṃ cetokhiladesanāti sabrahmacārīvisayova kopo gahito.

[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā vatthukāmo, evaṃ kilesakāmopi assādanīyo evāti ^b^‘‘kilesakāmepī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘rūpataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisatī’’tiādi (dī. ni. 2.400; ma. ni. 1.133; vibha. 203). ^b^Kāmaniddese^eb^ (mahāni. 1) sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena ^b^‘‘kāmā’’^eb^ti vuttā, balavakāmarāgavatthubhūtāyevettha kāmaggahaṇena gahitāti. Vinibaddhavatthubhāvena yathā visuṃ attano kāyo gahito, tathā paresaṃ tathārūpā rūpadhammā samūhaṭṭhenāti āha ^b^‘‘rūpeti bahiddhārūpe’’^eb^ti. Yathā hi pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo jhānādivisesādhigamassa vinibaddhāya saṃvattati, evaṃ attano kāye apekkhā bahiddhā ca sakaparikkhārañātimittādīsu apekkhāti. Keci panettha ‘‘rūpeti rūpajjhāne’’tiādinā papañcenti. Tadayuttaṃ jhānādhigamavinibaddhānaṃ sīlassa ca saṃkilesabhūtānaṃ cetovinibaddhabhāvena gahitattā.

[03]^b^Yāvadattha^eb^nti yāva attheti abhikaṅkhati, tāva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yattakaṃ icchati, tattaka’’^eb^nti. Nti yāvadatthaṃ udarapūraṃ bhuttaṃ. ^b^Avadehanato^eb^ pūraṇato. ^b^Seyyasukha^eb^nti seyyaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakasukhaṃ. ^b^Passasukha^eb^nti passānaṃ samparivattanena uppajjanakasukhaṃ. ^b^Niddāsukha^eb^nti niddāyanena uppajjanakasukhaṃ.
[03]^b^Sīlenā^eb^tiādi patthanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Vatasamādāna^eb^nti dhutaṅgādivatānuṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Tapo^eb^ti vīriyārambho. So hi kilesānaṃ tapanaṭṭhena niggaṇhanaṭṭhena ^b^tapacaraṇa^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chandaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti chandaṃ dhuraṃ, chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ, chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pavattivasena chandaṃ nissāya. Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena padhānabhūtā, padhānabhāvaṃ vā pattāti ^b^padhānabhūtā. Tehi dhammehī^eb^ti chandanissayena pavattasamādhinā ceva ‘‘padhānasaṅkhāro’’ti vuttavīriyena ca. ^b^Upeta^eb^nti sampayuttaṃ. Ijjhanaṭṭhena ^b^iddhi,^eb^ nipphattiatthena paṭilābhaṭṭhena cāti attho, tassā ^b^iddhiyā pādaṃ^eb^ pādakaṃ ^a^M2.0055^ea^ padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Atha vā ijjhanti tāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti ^b^iddhi,^eb^ sāva uparivisesānaṃ ^a^V2.0052^ea^ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ^b^pādo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iddhibhūtaṃ vā pādanti iddhipāda’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sesesupī^eb^ti vīriyiddhipādādīsupi. ^b^Assā^eb^ti iddhipādassa. ^b^Attho dīpito^eb^ti dīpanatthaṃ kataṃ, tasmā ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.369) tassa atthavicāro gahetabbo. Iddhipādānaṃ samādhipadhānattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vikkhambhanappahānaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti. Tesaṃ tesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppādanakiriyāya uppannānaṃ paribrūhanakiriyāya ussahanato ^b^ussoḷhī,^eb^ thāmappattā parakkamadhātu. Sā pana catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ visesapaccayabhūtā te upādāya ^b^‘‘pañcamī’’^eb^ti vuttā, sā ca yasmā samathavipassanābhāvanāsu tattha cāadimajjhapariyosānesu sādhetabbaṃ vīriyaṃ, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘ussoḷhīti sabbattha kattabbavīriyaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. Pubbabhāgiyasamathavipassanāsādhanaṃ pahātabbadhammavibhāgena bhinditvā āha ^b^‘‘pañca cetokhilappahānāni pañca vinibandhappahānānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhabbo^eb^ti yutto arahati nipphattiyā. ^b^Ñāṇenā^eb^ti maggañāṇena. ^b^Kilesabhedāyā^eb^ti kilesānaṃ samucchindanāya. ^b^Khemassā^eb^ti anupaddavassa.

[03]^b^Sambhāvanatthe^eb^ti (sārattha. ṭī. 1.11; a. ni. ṭī. 3.7.71) ‘‘api nāmevaṃ siyā’’ti vikappanattho sambhāvanattho. Evaṃ hīti evaṃ ekameva saṅkhyaṃ avatvā aparāya saṅkhyāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti yathā ‘‘dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī’’ti. ^b^Sammā adhisayitānī^eb^ti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayapariharaṇatthaṃ sammadeva upari sayitāni. ^b^Utuṃ gāhāpentiyā^eb^ti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘usmīkatānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sammā paribhāvitānī^eb^ti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānī’’^eb^ti. Ayañca kukkuṭagandhaparibhāvanā sammāadhisayanasammāparisedananipphattiyā ^b^‘‘anunipphādī’’^eb^ti (sārattha. ṭī. 1.11) daṭṭhabbā. Tehi pana saddhiṃyeva ijjhanato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tividhakiriyākaraṇenā’’^eb^ti. Kiñcāpi na evaṃ ‘‘aho vatime’’tiādinā icchā uppajjeyya, kāraṇassa pana sampāditattā atha kho bhabbāva abhinibbhijjitunti yojanā ^a^M2.0056^ea^. Kasmā bhabbāti āha ^b^‘‘te hi yasmā tāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Ettha yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ, tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehassa pariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ālokassa anto paññāyamānato, sayañca paripākagatattā.

[03]^b^Opammasampaṭipādana^eb^nti opammatthassa upameyyena sammadeva paṭipādanaṃ. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti upameyyatthena. Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyāya karaṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato ^a^V2.0053^ea^ nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ bhikkhuno ussoḷhīpannarasāni aṅgāni avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe… samannāgatabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Paṭicchādanasāmaññena avijjāya aṇḍakosasadisatāya balavavipassanāvasena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvāpatti, tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘gabbhaggahaṇakālo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhiññāpakkhe^eb^ti lokiyābhiññāpakkhe. Lokuttarābhiññā hi avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padālikāti. ^b^Gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharatī^eb^ti desanāvilāsena vineyyasantānagataṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ ghaṭṭeti, yathāṭhāne ṭhātuṃ na deti.

[03]^b^Paṭisaṅkhānappahāna^eb^nti tadaṅgappahānapubbakaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ. Pubbabhāgiyā iddhipādā pāḷiyaṃ gahitāti ^b^‘‘iddhipādehi vikkhambhanappahāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Ussoḷhipannarasaṅgasamannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidāyā’’tiādivacanato (ma. ni. 1.189) lokuttariddhipādā pana sambodhaggahaṇeneva gahitā. ^b^Magge āgate^eb^ti ussoḷhīpannarasaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno vipassanaṃ ussukkāpayato magge āgate uppanne, pāḷiyaṃ vā abhinibbhidāsambodhaggahaṇehi ^b^magge āgate. Phale āgate^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Nibbānassa pana pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā nissaraṇappahānaṃ na gahitaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Cetokhilasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vanīyati ^a^M2.0057^ea^^a^V2.0054^ea^ vivekakāmehi bhajīyati, vanute vā te attasampattiyā vasanatthāya yācanto viya hotīti vanaṃ, patiṭṭhanti ettha vivekakāmā yathādhippetavisesādhigamenāti patthaṃ, vanesu patthaṃ gahanaṭṭhāne senāsanaṃ ^b^vanapatthaṃ^eb^. Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattatīti ^b^pariyāyo,^eb^ kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘vanapatthapariyāyanti vanapatthakāraṇa’’^eb^nti. Vanapatthañhi taṃ upanissāya viharato upanissayakāraṇaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘vanapatthaṃ upanissāya viharatī’’ti. Pariyāyati desetabbamatthaṃ patiṭṭhapetīti ^b^pariyāyo,^eb^ desanā. Vanapatthaṃ ārabbha pavattā desanā ^b^vanapatthadesanā,^eb^ taṃ, ubhayatthāpi vanapatthaggahaṇaṃ lakkhaṇamattaṃ gāmādīnampettha kāraṇabhāvassa, desanāya visayabhāvassa ca labbhamānattā.

[03]^b^191^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nissāyā^eb^ti apassāya, vivekavāsassa apassayaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Na upaṭṭhātī^eb^tiādīhi tasmiṃ vanapatthe senāsanasappāyābhāvaṃ, utupuggaladhammassavanasappāyābhāvampi vā dasseti. ^b^Jīvitasambhārā^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.9.6) jīvitappavattiyā sambhārā paccayā. ^b^Samudānetabbā^eb^ti sammā ñāyena anavajjauñchācariyādinā uddhaṃ uddhaṃ ānetabbā pāpuṇitabbā. Te pana tathā samudānitā samāhaṭā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘samāharitabbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhena uppajjantī^eb^ti sulabhuppādā na honti. Etena bhojanasappāyādiabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vā^eb^ti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘rattikoṭṭhāse vā divasakoṭṭhāse vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rattiṃyeva pakkamitabbaṃ^eb^ samaṇadhammassa tattha anipphajjanato.

[03]^b^192-3^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṅkhāpī^eb^ti ‘‘yadatthamahaṃ pabbajito, na metaṃ idha nipphajjati, cīvarādi pana samudāgacchati, nāhaṃ tadatthaṃ pabbajito, kiṃ me idha vāsenā’’ti paṭisaṅkhāyapi. Anantaravāre ^b^saṅkhāpī^eb^ti ‘‘yadatthamahaṃ pabbajito, taṃ me idha nipphajjati, cīvarādi pana na samudāgacchati, nāhaṃ tadatthaṃ pabbajito’’ti paṭisaṅkhāyapīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samaṇadhammassa nipphajjanabhāvaṃ jānitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^195-7^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So^eb^^a^M2.0058^ea^^b^puggalo anāpucchā pakkamitabbaṃ, nānubandhitabbo^eb^ti ‘‘so puggalo’’ti padassa ‘‘nānubandhitabbo’’ti iminā sambandho. Yassa yena hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhenapi so bhavati ^a^V2.0055^ea^. ^b^Taṃ puggala^eb^nti ‘‘so puggalo’’ti paccattavacanaṃ upayogavasena pariṇāmetvā taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho. Atthavasena hi vibhattivipariṇāmoti. ^b^Taṃ āpucchā pakkamitabba^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Āpucchā pakkamitabba^eb^nti ca kataññutakataveditāya niyojanaṃ.

[03]^b^198^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evarūpo^eb^ti yaṃ nissāya bhikkhuno guṇehi vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, paccayehi ca na parissamo, evarūpo daṇḍakammādīhi niggaṇhāti cepi, na pariccajitabboti dasseti ^b^‘‘sacepī’’^eb^tiādinā.
[06]Vanapatthapariyāyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^199^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jātivana^eb^nti ^a^V2.0056^ea^ sayaṃjātaṃ vanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aropima’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paṭisallānatthāyā^eb^ti ekībhāvatthāya, puthuttārammaṇato vā cittaṃ paṭinivattetvā accantasante nibbāne phalasamāpattivasena allīyāpanatthaṃ. Daṇḍo pāṇimhi assāti ^b^daṇḍapāṇi^eb^. Yathā so ‘‘daṇḍapāṇī’’ti vuccati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Daṇḍavittatāyā^eb^ti daṇḍe soṇḍatāya. So hi daṇḍapasuto daṇḍasippe ca sukusalo tattha pākaṭo paññāto, tasmā daṇḍaṃ gahetvāva vicarati. ^b^Jaṅghākilamathavinodanattha^eb^nti rājasabhāya ciranisajjāya uppannajaṅghāparissamassa apanayanatthaṃ. ^b^Adhiccanikkhamano^eb^ti yādicchakanikkhamano, na abhiṇhanikkhamano. ^b^Olubbhā^eb^ti sannirumbhitvā ṭhito. Yathā so ‘‘olubbhā’’ti vutto, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘gopālakadārako viyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^200^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vadanti etenāti ^b^vādo,^eb^ diṭṭhīti āha ^b^‘‘kiṃ vādīti, kiṃ diṭṭhiko’’^eb^ti? ^b^Kimakkhāyī^eb^ti kimācikkhako, kīdisadhammakatho? ^b^Acittīkārenā^eb^ti anādarena. Tathāpucchane kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Nassateta^eb^nti nassatu etaṃ kulaṃ.

[03]^b^Atthaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0059^ea^^b^na jānātī^eb^ti atthaṃ ce ekadesena jāneyya, taṃ micchā gahetvā paṭippharitvāpi tiṭṭheyya. Tassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyāti tadassa atthājānanaṃ bhagavatā icchitaṃ. ^b^Viggāhikakatha^eb^nti viggahakathaṃ, sārambhakathanti attho. Nanu bhagavatā saddhiṃ loke puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇā nānāvādā santīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tathāgato hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na vivadati^eb^ vivādahetukānaṃ kāmadiṭṭhijjhosānānaṃ maggeneva samugghātitattā, tadabhāvato pana ^b^loko tathāgatena vivadati^eb^. Dhammavādī yathābhūtavādī dhammavādīhi na vivadati tesaṃ vivaditukāmatāya eva abhāvato, adhammavādī pana tiṇāyapi namaññamāno tehi kiñci vivadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na, bhikkhave, dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṃ vivadatī’’^eb^ti (saṃ. ni. 3.94). Adhammavādī pana asamucchinnavivādahetukattā vivadateva. Tathā cāha ^b^‘‘adhammavādīva kho, bhikkhave, vivadatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Yathā ca panā^eb^ti ettha ^b^yathā^eb^-saddo ‘‘yathā ca anuppannassa kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti, tañca ^a^V2.0057^ea^ pajānātī’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 3.122) viya kāraṇatthoti āha ^b^‘‘yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. Kāraṇākāro vā idha yathā-saddena vutto, so pana atthato kāraṇamevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Idaṃ kathaṃ idaṃ kathaṃ’’ti pavattanato kathaṃkathā, vicikicchā. Sā yassa natthi, so akathaṃkathī, taṃ ^b^akathaṃkathiṃ^eb^. Vippaṭisārakukkuccaṃ bhagavatā anāgāmimaggeneva chinnaṃ, hatthapādakukkuccaṃ aggamaggena āveṇikadhammādhigamato. Aparāparaṃ uppajjanakabhavo ^b^‘‘bhavābhavo’’^eb^ti idhādhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘punappunabbhave’’^eb^ti. Saṃvarāsaṃvaro phalāphalaṃ viya khuddakamahanto bhavo ^b^‘‘bhavābhavo’’^eb^ti vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘hīnapaṇīte vā bhave’’^eb^ti. Bhavo vuḍḍhippatto ^b^‘‘abhavo’’^eb^ti vuccati yathā ‘‘asekkhā dhammā’’ti (dha. sa. 11ṭikamātikā). ^b^Kilesasaññā^eb^ti kāmasaññādike vadati. Kilesā eva vā saññānāmena vuttā ‘‘saññā pahāya amataṃ eva pāpuṇātī’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Attano khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ dīpetī^eb^ti imināva paresañca tathattāya dhammaṃ desetīti ayampi attho vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Nīharitvā kīḷāpetvā^eb^ti nīharitvā ceva kīḷāpetvā ca, nīharaṇavasena vā kīḷāpetvā. ^b^Tivisākha^eb^nti tibhaṅgabhākuṭi viya nalāṭe jātattā ^b^nalāṭikaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^201^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kinti^eb^^a^M2.0060^ea^^b^nu kho^eb^ti kiṃ kāraṇenāti attho. ^b^Anusandhiṃ gahetvā^eb^ti pucchānusandhiṃ uṭṭhapetvā. ^b^Yatonidāna^eb^nti yaṃnidānaṃ, yaṃkāraṇāti vuttaṃ hoti. Purimapade hi vibhatti alopaṃ katvā niddeso, chājjhattikabāhirāyatanādinidānanti ayameva attho. Saṅkhāyanti saṅkhābhāvena ñāyantīti ^b^saṅkhā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘saṅkhāti koṭṭhāsā’’^eb^ti. Kāmañcettha mānopi papañco, abhinandanasabhāve eva pana gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcasampayuttā’’^eb^ti āha. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘abhinanditabba’’ntiādi. ^b^Samudācarantī^eb^ti sabbaso uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pariyādāya pavattanti. Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro, tena ca yogena ^b^purisa^eb^nti upayogavacanaṃ yathā ‘‘tathāgataṃ, bhikkhave, arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ dve vitakkā samudācarantī’’ti (itivu. 38). Taṇhādayo ca yathāsakaṃ pavattiākāraṃ avilaṅghantiyo āsevanavasena uparūpari pavattanti. Tathā hi tā ‘‘papañcasaṅkhā’’ti vuttā.

[03]^b^Kāraṇe^eb^ti pavattipaccaye. ^b^Ekāyatanampi …pe… natthī^eb^ti cakkhāyatanādi ekampi āyatanaṃ abhinanditabbaṃ abhivaditabbaṃ ajjhositabbañca natthi ce, nanu natthi eva, kasmā ‘‘natthi ce’’ti vuttanti? Saccaṃ natthi, appahīnābhinandanābhivadanājjhosānānaṃ pana puthujjanānaṃ abhinanditabbādippakārāni āyatanāni hontīti tesaṃ na sakkā natthīti vattu, pahīnābhinandanādīnaṃ pana sabbathā natthīti ‘‘natthi ce’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ahaṃ mamanti abhinanditabba^eb^nti ^a^V2.0058^ea^ diṭṭhābhinandanāya ‘‘aha’’nti taṇhābhinandanāya ‘‘mama’’nti rocetabbaṃ. ^b^Abhivaditabba^eb^nti abhinivisanasamuṭṭhāpanavasena vattabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ahaṃ mamanti vattabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ajjhositvā^eb^ti diṭṭhi taṇhā vatthuṃ anupavisitvā gāhadvayaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ viya katvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etenā^eb^ti ‘‘ettha ce natthī’’tiādivacanena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti āyatanesu. Taṇhādīnaṃ avatthubhāvadassanamukhena ^b^taṇhādīnaṃyeva appavattiṃ^eb^ kilesaparinibbānaṃ kathitanti. Tenāha bhagavā ^b^‘‘esevanto’’^eb^tiādi, ayameva abhinandanādīnaṃ natthibhāvakaro maggo, tappaṭippassaddhibhūtaṃ phalaṃ, taṃnissaraṇaṃ vā nibbānaṃ rāgānusayādīnaṃ anto avasānaṃ appavattīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ …pe… anto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti ‘‘esevanto paṭighānusayānaṃ’’tiādīsu sabbapadesu.

[03]^b^Ādiyatī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0061^ea^ pahāradānādivasena gayhati. ^b^Matthakappattaṃ kalaha^eb^nti bhaṇḍanādimatte aṭṭhatvā mukhasattīhi vitudanādivasena matthakappattaṃ kalahaṃ. Yāya karotīti sambandho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Viruddhaggāhavasena ^b^nānāgāhamattaṃ,^eb^ tathā viruddhavādavasena ^b^nānāvādamattaṃ. Evaṃ pavatta^eb^nti garukātabbesupi gāravaṃ akatvā ‘‘tuvaṃ tuva’’nti evaṃ pavattaṃ sārambhakathaṃ, yāya cetanāya yaṃ karoti, sā tuvaṃ tuvaṃ. ^b^Nissāyā^eb^ti paṭicca, nissayādipaccaye katvāti attho. Kilesānaṃ uppattinimittatā tāva āyatanānaṃ hotu tabbhāve bhāvato, nirodhanimittatā pana kathaṃ. Na hettha lokuttaradhammānaṃ saṅgaho lokiyānaṃyeva adhippetattāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘nirujjhamānāpī’’^eb^tiādi. Nāmamattena nimittataṃ sandhāya vuttoti dassento ^b^‘‘yatthuppannā, tattheva niruddhā hontī’’^eb^ti vatvā tamatthaṃ suttantarena sādhento ^b^‘‘svāyamattho’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Tattha ^b^samudayasaccapañhenā^eb^ti mahāsatipaṭṭhāne samudayasaccaniddesena. So hi ^b^‘‘kattha uppajjamānā’’^eb^tiādinā pucchāvasena pavattattā pañhoti vutto. Nanu tattha taṇhāya uppattinirodhā vuttā, na sabbakilesānanti īdisī codanā anavakāsāti dassento ^b^‘‘yatheva cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Laddhavohāre^eb^ti iminā rāgādīnaṃ appavattinimittatāya antoti samaññā nibbānassāti dasseti. Eteneva abhinandanādīnaṃ abhāvoti ca idaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭe nibbāne akusaladhammānaṃ nirodhasambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘yañhi yattha natthi, taṃ tattha niruddhaṃ nāma hotī’’^eb^ti. Yvāyaṃ appavattiyaṃ nirodhavohāro vutto, svāyamattho nirodhapañhena dīpetabbo. Na hi tattha uppajjitvā niruddhā vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhāti vuttā, atha kho appavattā evāti.

[03]^b^203^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃsampada^eb^nti ^a^V2.0059^ea^ evaṃsampajjanakaṃ evaṃ passitabbaṃ idaṃ mama ajjhesanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘īdisanti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.10.113-116) sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi avisesaggahaṇena ca ‘‘jāna’’nti iminā niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggaṇhātīti tabbisayāya jānanakiriyāya sabbaññutaññāṇameva ^a^M2.0062^ea^ karaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ. Atha vā pakaraṇavasena ‘‘bhagavā’’ti saddantarasannidhānena cāyamattho vibhāvetabbo. ^b^Passitabbameva passatī^eb^ti dibbacakkhu-paññācakkhu-dhammacakkhu-buddhacakkhu-samantacakkhu-saṅkhātehi ñāṇacakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passati eva. Atha vā ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānāti eva, diṭṭhidassanassa ca abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti attho. ^b^Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yathā cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti, evaṃ lokassa yāthāvadassanasādhanato dassanakiccapariṇāyakaṭṭhena ^b^cakkhubhūto,^eb^ paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhuñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti vā ^b^cakkhubhūto. Ñāṇabhūto^eb^ti etassa ca evameva attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Dhammā vā^eb^ bodhipakkhiyā tehi uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato, anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ pattoti ^b^dhammabhūto. Brahmā^eb^ vuccati maggo tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanattā, tañca sayambhuñāṇena pattoti ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^. Catusaccadhammaṃ vadatīti ^b^vattā^eb^. Ciraṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ pavattento vadatīti ^b^pavattā. Atthaṃ nīharitvā^eb^ti dukkhādiatthaṃ tatthāpi pīḷanādiatthaṃ uddharitvā. Paramatthaṃ vā nibbānaṃ pāpayitā, amatasacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti ^b^amatassa dātā.^eb^ Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tadāyattabhāvato ^b^dhammassāmī^eb^.

[03]^b^204^eb^^b^.^eb^ So vā uddeso attanopi hotīti thero ^b^‘‘yaṃ kho no’’^eb^ti āha. Sabbalokasādhāraṇā hi buddhānaṃ desanāti. Idāni yehi dvārārammaṇehi purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti, tāni tāva dassento papañcasaññāsaṅkhā dassetuṃ yena saḷāyatanavibhaṅgena niddeso kato, tassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhuñcā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^nissayabhāvenā^eb^ti nissayapaccayabhāvena. Nissayapaccayo ca pasādacakkhuyeva hoti, na cuddasasambhāraṃ, catucattālīsasambhāraṃ vā sasambhāracakkhunti āha ^b^‘‘cakkhupasādañca paṭiccā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ārammaṇabhāvenā^eb^ti ārammaṇapaccayabhāvena. Ārammaṇapaccayo ca catusamuṭṭhānikarūpesu yaṃ kiñci hotīti āha ^b^‘‘catusamuṭṭhānikarūpe ca paṭiccā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Ettha cakkhu ekampi viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpāyatanaṃ pana anekameva saṃhatanti ^a^M2.0063^ea^ imassa ^a^V2.0060^ea^ visesassa dassanatthaṃ nissayabhāvena ^b^‘‘cakkhupasādañca ārammaṇabhāvena catusamuṭṭhānikarūpe cā’’^eb^ti vacanabhedo kato. Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ cakkhu ekampi viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpaṃ pana anekamevāti? Paccayabhāvavisesato. Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ atthibhāveneva hoti tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati abhāvato, yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa paccayo hotīti vuccati, tannissitatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā arūpabhāvato. Atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṃ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya, itare pana paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā.

[03]Sacāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhuñcāvuso, paṭiccā’’^eb^ti ekavacanavasena vuttaṃ. Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātātthi-avigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇe eva upakārakattā tathāpi anekameva saṃhataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato. Yañhi paccayadhammaṃ sabhāvabhūtaṃ, parikappitākāramattaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ vibhāventaṃ pavattati, tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvatāya yaṃ kiñci anālambhitvā pavattituṃ asamatthassa olubbhapavattikāraṇabhāvena ālambanīyato ārammaṇaṃ nāma, tassa yasmā yathā tathā sabhāvūpaladdhi viññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayalābho, tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvaṃ vibhāventameva pavattati. Sā cassa indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavasena hoti, nāpi katipayakalāpagatavaṇṇavasena, atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassento ^b^‘‘rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’’^eb^nti bahuvacanavasenāha.

[03]Yaṃ pana ^b^paṭṭhāne^eb^ (paṭṭhā. 1.1.2 paccayaniddesa) ‘‘rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ yādisaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo, tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kīdisaṃ pana tanti ^a^M2.0064^ea^? Samuditanti pākaṭoyamattho. Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti ‘‘āyatanasallakkhaṇavasena cakkhuviññāṇādayo sallakkhaṇavisayā, na drabyasallakkhaṇavasenā’’ti, tampi suvuttameva hoti. Na cettha samudāyārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā samudāyābhogasseva abhāvato, samuditā pana vaṇṇadhammā ārammaṇapaccayā honti. Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇapaccayā honti. Na hi ^a^V2.0061^ea^ paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontā andhā samuditā passantīti? Nayidamekantikaṃ visuṃ visuṃ asamatthānampi sivikāvahanādīsu samatthatāya dassanato. Kesādīnañca yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitānaṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā, tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samuditānaṃ taṃ gahetuṃ sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṃ saṃhaccakāritā paribyattā. Etena kiṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paramāṇurūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, udāhu taṃsamudāyotiādikā codanā paṭikkhittāti veditabbā. ^b^‘‘Sotañca, āvuso, paṭiccā’’^eb^tiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāmā^eb^ti cakkhunissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjati.

[03]^b^Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā^eb^ti cakkhu, rūpaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā samodhānena. ^b^Phasso nāmā^eb^ti arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattanato phusanalakkhaṇo phasso nāma dhammo uppajjati. ^b^Sahajātādivasenā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttāya sahajātāññamaññādivasena, anantarāya anantarādivasena, itarāya upanissayavasena paccayabhāvato ^b^phassapaccayā^eb^ phassakāraṇā ^b^vedanā uppajjati^eb^. Anubhavanasamakālameva ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ hotīti ^b^‘‘tāya vedanāya yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedeti, tadeva saññā sañjānātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Cakkhudvārikā dhammā idhādhippetāti tadanusārena pana aparāparuppannānaṃ vedanādīnaṃ gahaṇe sati, yanti vā kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā ārammaṇaṃ vedeti, tasmā taṃ sañjānātīti attho. Na hi asati vedayite kadāci saññuppatti atthi. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Saññāya hi yathāsaññātaṃ vijjamānaṃ, avijjamānaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ vitakkavasena parikappeti, yathāparikappitañca taṃ diṭṭhitaṇhāmānamaññanāhi maññamāno papañcetīti vutto. Tenevāha ‘‘pathaviṃ pathavito sañjānā’’ti, ‘‘pathaviṃ pathavito ^a^M2.0065^ea^ saññatvā pathaviṃ maññatī’’tiādi (ma. ni. 1.2), ‘‘takkañca diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvā, saccaṃ musāti dvayadhammamāhū’’ti (su. ni. 892; mahāni. 121) ca. Balappattapapañcavasenevāyamatthavaṇṇanā katā, ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana paridubbalavasena.

[03]^b^Cakkhurūpādīhi kāraṇehī^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇaphassavedanāsaññāvitakkehi kāraṇabhūtehi. Akāraṇabhūtānampi tesaṃ atthitāya kāraṇaggahaṇaṃ. Pariññātā hi te akāraṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apariññātakāraṇa’’^eb^nti. Tīhipi pariññāhi apariññātavatthukaṃ. ^b^Abhibhavantī^eb^ti ajjhottharanti. ^b^Sahajātā hontī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘cakkhusamphassapaccayā vedanākkhandho atthi kusalo’tiādivacanato vedanāsaññā asahajātāpi gahetabbā. ^b^Yadi eva^eb^nti ‘‘papañcetī’’ti ettha yadi pañcadvārajavanasahajātā papañcasaṅkhā adhippetā tāsaṃ paccuppannavisayattā, ^b^kasmā atītānāgataggahaṇaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0062^ea^^b^kata^eb^nti codeti. Itaro ^b^‘‘tathā uppajjanato’’^eb^tiādinā pariharati. Tattha ^b^tathā uppajjanato^eb^ti yathā vattamānakāle, evaṃ atītakāle anāgatakāle ca cakkhudvāre papañcasaṅkhānaṃ uppajjanato atītānāgataggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, na atītesu, anāgatesu vā cakkhurūpesu cakkhudvārikānaṃ tāsaṃ uppajjanato.

[03]^b^Manañjāvuso, paṭiccā^eb^ti ettha duvidhaṃ manaṃ kevalaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ, sāvajjanaṃ vā. Duvidhā hi kathā. Uppattidvārakathāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ calitaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ manodvāraṃ nāma, cakkhādi viya rūpādinā yena taṃ ghaṭṭitaṃ tattha upari viññāṇuppattiyā dvārabhāvato. Paccayakathāyaṃ sāvajjanabhavaṅgaṃ, ‘‘manosamphassapaccayā atthi kusalo’’tiādīsu hi sāvajjanamanosamphasso icchito, na bhavaṅgamanosamphasso asambhavato. Tattha paṭhamanayaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘mananti bhavaṅgacitta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dhammeti tebhūmakadhammārammaṇa^eb^nti iminā sabhāvadhammesu eva kilesuppattīti keci, tadayuttaṃ tadupādānāyapi paññattiyā dhammārammaṇatāya vuttattā. Idha pana tebhūmakāpi dhammā labbhantīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘tebhūmakadhammārammaṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, na paññattiyā anārammaṇattā. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā akusalacittuppādā anārammaṇā nāma siyuṃ. Uppattidvārakathāyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādi viya āvajjanampi dvārapakkhikamevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘manoviññāṇanti āvajjanaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Paccayakathāyaṃ pana āvajjanaṃ gahitanti ^b^‘‘javanaṃ vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Nayadvaye dhammānaṃ sahajātavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘āvajjane^eb^^a^M2.0066^ea^^b^gahite’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Yuttamevā^eb^ti nippariyāyato yuttameva.

[03]So yāva na paccayapaṭivedho sambhavati, tāva paññattimukheneva sabhāvadhammā paññāyanti paccekaṃ apaññāpaneti āha ^b^‘‘phasso nāma eko dhammo uppajjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ phassapaññattiṃ paññapessatī^eb^ti paññapetvā tabbisayadassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādessati. ^b^Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī^eb^ti imasmiṃ cakkhuādike paccaye sati idaṃ phassādikaṃ paccayuppannaṃ hoti. ^b^Dvādasāyatanavasenā^eb^ti dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ vasena āgatena paṭiccasamuppādanayavasena. ^b^Dvādasāyatanapaṭikkhepavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotī’’ti paccayābhāvapaccayuppannābhāvadassanakkame dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ paṭikkhepavasena.

[03]^b^Sāvakena pañho kathito^eb^ti ayaṃ pañho sāvakena kathito, iti iminā kāraṇena mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha. Atha vā saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārena vibhajantena etadagge ṭhapitena mahāsāvakena pañho kathitoti iminā kāraṇena etasmiṃ pañhe mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha, heraññike ^a^V2.0063^ea^ sati kahāpaṇaṃ sayaṃ nicchinantā viya ahutvā bhagavato eva santike nikkaṅkhā hotha.

[03]^b^205^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ākaronti phalaṃ tāya tāya mariyādāya nibbattentīti ^b^ākārā,^eb^ kāraṇāni. ^b^Pāṭiyekkakāraṇehī^eb^ti channaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena visuṃ visuṃ papañcakāraṇassa niddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ. Atha vā yadipi yattakehi dhammehi yaṃ phalaṃ nibbattati, tesaṃ samuditānaṃyeva kāraṇabhāvo sāmaggiyāva phaluppattito, tathāpi paccekaṃ tassa kāraṇamevāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pāṭiyekkakāraṇehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Padehī^eb^ti nāmādipadehi ceva taṃsamudāyabhūtehi vākyehi ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akkharasampiṇḍanehī’’^eb^ti. Akkharāniyeva hi atthesu yathāvaccaṃ padavākyabhāvena paricchijjanti. ^b^Byañjanehī^eb^ti atthassa abhibyañjanato byañjanasaññitehi vaṇṇehi. Tāni pana yasmā pariyāyassa akkharaṇato ‘‘akkharānī’’ti vuccanti, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘akkharehī’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca imehi ākārehi imehi padabyañjanehi papañcasamudācārassa vaṭṭassa ca vivaṭṭassa ca dassanāttho vibhattoti yojanā. ^b^Paṇḍiccenā^eb^ti paññāya. ‘‘Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito hoti ^a^M2.0067^ea^? Yato kho bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hotī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.124) ādisuttapadavasena paṇḍitalakkhaṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘catūhi vā kāraṇehī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Saccapaṭivedhavasena paṇḍiccaṃ dassitanti paṭisambhidāvasena mahāpaññataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘mahante atthe’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Guḷapūva^eb^nti guḷe missitvā katapūvaṃ. ^b^Baddhasattuguḷaka^eb^nti madhusakkharāhi piṇḍīkataṃ sattupiṇḍaṃ. ^b^Asecitabbakaṃ^eb^ madhuādinā pageva tehi samayojitabbattā. ^b^Cintakajātiko^eb^ti dhammacintāya cintakasabhāvo. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇenevassā^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇeneva assa suttassa guṇaṃ paricchindāpetvā nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmi.
[06]Madhupiṇḍikasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^206^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dve^eb^^a^V2.0064^ea^^b^dve bhāge^eb^ti dve dve koṭṭhāse katvā. Kāmañcettha ‘‘imaṃ ekaṃ bhāgamakāsiṃ, imaṃ dutiyabhāgamakāsi’’nti vacanato sabbepi vitakkā saṃkilesavodānavibhāgena dveva bhāgā katā, aparāparuppattiyā panetesaṃ abhiṇhācāraṃ upādāya pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘dvidhā katvā’’ti āmeḍitavacananti ^b^‘‘dve dve bhāge katvā’’^eb^ti āmeḍitavacanavaseneva vutto. Atha vā bhāgadvayassa sappaṭibhāgatāya tattha yaṃ yaṃ dvayampi kho ujuvipaccanīkaṃ, taṃ taṃ visuṃ visuṃ gahetukāmo bhagavā āha ‘‘dvidhā katvā vitakke vihareyya’’nti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā tattha micchāvitakkānaṃ sammāvitakkānañca anavasesaṃ asaṅkarato ca gahitabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘imaṃ ekaṃ bhāgamakāsiṃ, imaṃ dutiyabhāgamakāsi’’^eb^nti avoca. ^b^Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena sampayutto, kāmena paṭibaddho vā. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – byāpajjati cittaṃ etenāti ^b^byāpādo,^eb^ doso. Vihiṃsati etāya satte, vihiṃsanaṃ vā tesaṃ etanti ^b^vihiṃsā,^eb^ paresaṃ viheṭhanākārena pavattassa karuṇāpaṭipakkhassa pāpadhammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Ajjhatta^eb^nti ajjhattadhammārammaṇamāha. ^b^Bahiddhā^eb^ti bāhiradhammārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Oḷāriko^eb^ti bahalakāmarāgādipaṭisaṃyutto. Tabbipariyāyena ^b^sukhumo. Vitakko^eb^^b^akusalapakkhikoyevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0068^ea^ iminā vitakkabhāvasāmaññena tatthāpi akusalabhāvasāmaññena ekabhāgakaraṇaṃ, na ekacittuppādapariyāpannatādivasenāti dasseti.

[03]Nekkhammaṃ vuccati lobhātikkantattā paṭhamajjhānaṃ, sabbākusalehi nikkhantattā sabbaṃ kusalaṃ. Idha pana kāmavitakkapaṭipakkhassa adhippetattā āha ^b^‘‘kāmehi nissaṭo nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko’’^eb^ti. ^b^So^eb^ti nekkhammavitakko. ^b^Yāva paṭhamajjhānā^eb^ti paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānaṃ etthuppanno vitakko nekkhammavitakkoyeva. ^b^Paṭhamajjhāna^eb^nti ca idaṃ tato paraṃ vitakkābhāvato vuttaṃ. Na byāpajjati cittaṃ etena, byāpādassa vā paṭipakkhoti ^b^abyāpādo,^eb^ mettāpubbabhāgo mettābhāvanārambho. Na vihiṃsanti etāya, vihiṃsāya vā paṭipakkhoti ^b^avihiṃsā,^eb^ karuṇāpubbabhāgo karuṇābhāvanārambho.

[03]Mahābodhisattānaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya laddhāvasarā sammāsaṅkappā uparūpari savisesaṃ pavattantīti āha ^b^‘‘chabbassāni…pe… pavattiṃsū’’^eb^ti. Ñāṇassa aparipakkattā ^a^V2.0065^ea^ pubbavāsanāvasena satisammosato kadāci micchāvitakkalesopi hotiyevāti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘satisammosena…pe… tiṭṭhantī’’^eb^ti āha. Yathā niccapihitepi gehe kadāci vātapāne vivaṭamatte laddhāvasaro vāto anto paviseyya, evaṃ guttindriyepi bodhisattasantāne satisammosavasena laddhāvasaro akusalavitakko uppajji, uppanno ca kusalavāraṃ pacchinditvā aṭṭhāsi, atha mahāsatto taṃmuhuttuppannameva paṭivinodetvā tesaṃ āyatiṃ anuppādāya ‘‘ime micchāvitakkā, ime sammāvitakkā’’ti yāthāvato te paricchinditvā micchāvitakkānaṃ avasaraṃ adento sammāvitakke parivaḍḍhesi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mayhaṃ ime’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^207^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pamādo nāma sativippavāsoti āha ^b^‘‘appamattassāti satiyā avippavāse ṭhitassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ātāpavīriyavantassā^eb^ti kilesānaṃ niggaṇhanavīriyavato. ^b^Pesitacittassā^eb^ti bhavavimokkhāya vissaṭṭhacittassa kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhassa. ^b^‘‘Evaṃ paṭipākatiko jāto’’^eb^ti attano attabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ somanassākāraṃ gehassitasomanassapakkhikaṃ akāsi, paññāmahantatāya sukhumadassitā.

[03]^b^Apariññāyaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0069^ea^^b^ṭhitassā^eb^ti na pariññāyaṃ ṭhitassa, apariggahitapariññassāti attho. ^b^Vitakko…pe… etāni tīṇi nāmāni labhatī^eb^ti tādisassa uppanno micchāvitakko yathārahaṃ attabyābādhako ubhayabyābādhako ca na hotīti na vattabbo taṃ sabhāvānativattanatoti adhippāyo. Anuppannānuppādauppannaparihāninimittatāya paññaṃ nirodhetīti ^b^paññānirodhiko^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anuppannāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Natthibhāvaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhānabalena vikkhambhanappahānamāha. ^b^Nirujjhatī^eb^tiādīhipi tadeva vadati. ^b^Vigatanta^eb^ntiādīhi pana samūlaṃ uddhaṭaṃ viya tadā appavattanakaṃ akāsinti vadati.

[03]^b^208^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cittavipariṇāmabhāvo^eb^ cittassa aññathattaṃ pakaticittavigamo. ^b^Anekaggatākāro^eb^ vikkhepo. Tattha vitakkena cittaṃ vihaññamānaṃ viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ gahetvā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ akāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāruñña^eb^nti paradukkhanimittaṃ cittakhedaṃ vadati. Tenevāha – ‘‘paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ manaṃ kampetīti karuṇā’’ti (ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.1). Nti karuṇāyanavasena pavattacittapakampanaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘uppajjati vihiṃsāvitakko’’ti āha,^eb^ na sattesu vihiṃsā pavattatīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Tena tena cassākārenā^eb^ti yena yena ākārena bhikkhunā anuvitakkitaṃ anuvicāritaṃ, tena ^a^V2.0066^ea^ tena ākārenassa ^b^cetaso nati hoti^eb^. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kāmavitakkādīsū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pahāsī^eb^ti kālavipallāsena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘pajahatī’’^eb^ti. Pahānaṃ panassa siddhameva paṭipakkhassa siddhattāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pahāsī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘asāmibhoge gāmikāādīyiṃsū’’ti. ^b^Bahulamakāsī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Evamevaṃ namatī^eb^ti kāmavitakkasampayogākārameva hoti, kāmavitakkasampayuttākārena vā pariṇamati. Kasanaṃ ^b^kiṭṭhaṃ,^eb^ kasīti attho, tannibbattattā pana kāraṇūpacārena sassaṃ ‘‘kiṭṭha’’nti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘sassasambādhe’’^eb^ti.^b^ Cattāri bhayānī^eb^ti vadhabandhajānigarahāni. ^b^Upaddava^eb^nti anatthuppādabhāvaṃ. ^b^Lāmaka^eb^nti nihīnabhāvaṃ. ^b^Dhandhesū^eb^ti attano khandhesu. ^b^Otāra^eb^nti anuppavesaṃ kilesānaṃ. Saṃkilesato visujjhanaṃ ^b^visuddhi,^eb^ sā eva ^b^vodāna^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vodānapakkhanti idaṃ tasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbakusalaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0070^ea^^b^nekkhammaṃ^eb^ sabbākusalapaṭipakkhatāya tato nissaṭattā. ^b^Nibbānameva nekkhammaṃ^eb^ sabbakilesato sabbasaṅkhatato ca nissaṭattā. ^b^Kiṭṭhasambādhaṃ viya rūpādiārammaṇaṃ^eb^ pamāde sati anatthuppattiṭṭhānabhāvato. ^b^Kūṭagāvo viya kūṭacittaṃ^eb^ duddamabhāvato. ^b^Paṇḍitagopālako viya bodhisatto^eb^ upāyakosallayogato. ^b^Catubbidhabhayaṃ viya micchāvitakkā^eb^ sappaṭibhayabhāvato. Paññāya vuddhi etassa atthīti ^b^paññāvuddhiko^eb^. Vihaññati cittaṃ etenāti vighāto, cetodukkhaṃ, tappakkhiko vighātapakkhiko, na vighātapakkhikoti ^b^avighātapakkhiko. Nibbānasaṃvattaniko^eb^ nibbānavaho. ^b^Ugghātīyeyyā^eb^ti uddhataṃ siyā vikkhittañca bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^Saṇṭhapemī^eb^ti sammadeva paṭṭhapemi. Yathā pana ṭhapitaṃ saṇṭhapitaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sannisīdāpemī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sannisīdāpemī^eb^ti samādhipaṭipakkhe kilese sannisīdāpento cittaṃ gocarajjhatte sannisīdāpemi. Abyaggabhāvāpādakena ^b^ekaggaṃ karomi,^eb^ yathā ārammaṇe suṭṭhu appitaṃ hoti, ^b^evaṃ sammā^eb^ sammadeva ^b^ādahāmi^eb^ samāhitaṃ karomi, yasmā tathāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ suṭṭhu ārammaṇe āropitaṃ nāma hoti, na tato paripatati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘suṭṭhu āropemīti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mā ugghātīyittā^eb^ti mā haññittha, mā ūhataṃ atthāti attho.

[03]^b^210^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Soyeva…pe… vutto^eb^ti iminā kiñcāpi ekaṃyeva kusalavitakkaṃ maggakkhaṇe viya tividhattasambhavato tividhanāmikaṃ katvā dassitaṃ viya hoti, na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pabandhapavattañhi upādāya ekattanayena ^b^‘‘soyeva byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekajātiyesu hi kusalacittesu uppanno vitakko samānākāratāya so evāti vattabbataṃ labhati yathā ‘‘sā eva tittirī, tāni eva osadhānī’’ti (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 2.2.19). Na hi tadā mahāpurisassa asubhamettākaruṇāsannissayā te vitakkā evaṃ vuttāti.

[03]^b^Samāpattiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0067^ea^^b^nissāyā^eb^ti samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā, tato vuṭṭhahitvāti attho. Vipassanāpi taruṇāti yojanā. ^b^Kāyo kilamati^eb^ samathavipassanānaṃ taruṇatāya bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesassa alabbhamānattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittaṃ haññati vihaññatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vipassanāya^eb^^b^bahūpakārā^eb^^a^M2.0071^ea^^b^samāpatti,^eb^ tathā hi vuttaṃ – ‘‘samādhiṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvetha, samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.5; 4.99; 5.1071).

[03]Yathā vissamaṭṭhānaṃ yodhānaṃ parissamaṃ vinodeti, tathā parissamavinodanatthaṃ phalakehi kātabbaṃ vissamaṭṭhānaṃ phalakakoṭṭhako, samāpattiyā pana vipassanā bahukāratarā samādhiparipanthakānaṃ, sabbesampi vā kilesānaṃ vimathanena dubbalabhāvāpajjanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipassanā thāmajātā samāpattimpi rakkhati,^eb^^b^thāmajātaṃ karotī’’^eb^ti. Nanu cevaṃ itarītarasannissayadoso āpajjatīti? Nayidamekantikaṃ, itarītarasannissayāpi kiccasiddhi loke labbhatīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Gāmantaṃ āhaṭesū^eb^ti gāmasamīpaṃ upanītesu. ^b^Etāgāvoti sati uppādanamattameva kātabbaṃ^eb^ yathā gāvo rakkhitabbā, tadabhāvato. ^b^Tadā^eb^ti samathavipassanānaṃ thāmajātakāle. Anupassanānaṃ lahuṃ lahuṃ uppattiṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘ekappahāreneva āruḷhova hotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, kameneva pana anupassanāpaṭipāṭiṃ ārohati.

[03]^b^215^eb^^b^.^eb^ Evaṃ bhagavā attano appamādapaṭipadaṃ, tāya ca laddhaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ visesaṃ dassento hetusampattiyā saddhiṃ phalasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni sattūpakārasampattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘seyyathāpī’’^eb^tiādimāhāti evaṃ ettha anusandhi veditabbā. Araññalakkhaṇayoggamattena ^b^araññaṃ^eb^. Mahāvanatāya ^b^pavanaṃ^eb^. Pavaddhañhi vanaṃ pavanaṃ. ^b^Catūhi yogehī^eb^ti jighacchāpipāsābhayapaṭipattisaṅkhātayogehi. ^b^Khemaṃ^eb^ anupaddavataṃ. Suvatthiṃ anupaddavaṃ āvahatīti ^b^sovatthiko^eb^. Pītiṃ kuṭṭhiṃ gameti upanetīti ^b^pītigamanīyo^eb^. Pītaṃ pānatitthaṃ gacchatīti ^b^pītagamanīyo. Sākhādīhī^eb^ti kaṇṭakasākhākaṇṭakalatāvanehi. Anāsayagāmitāya udakasanniruddhopi ^b^amaggo^eb^ vutto, itarāni apītigamanīyatāyapi. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena gahanaṃ pariggaṇhāti. Okemigaluddakassa gocare caratīti ^b^okacaro,^eb^ dīpakamigo. Araññe mige disvā tehi saddhiṃ palāyeyyāti ^b^dīgharajjubandhanaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Idha vasantī^eb^ti migānaṃ āsayaṃ vadati, tato āsayato ^b^iminā maggena nikkhamanti. Ettha^eb^^a^V2.0068^ea^^b^carantī^eb^ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne gocaraṃ gaṇhanti. ^b^Ettha^eb^^b^pivantī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0072^ea^ etasmiṃ nipānatitthe udakaṃ pivanti. ^b^Iminā maggena pavisantī^eb^ti iminā maggena nipānatitthaṃ pavisanti. ^b^Maggaṃ pidhāyā^eb^ti pakatimaggaṃ pidahitvā. ^b^Na tāva kiñci karoti^eb^ anavasese vanamige ghātetukāmo.

[03]^b^Avijjāya aññāṇā hutvā^eb^ti avijjāya nivutattā ñāṇarahitā hutvā, nandīrāgena upanītā rūpārammaṇādīni ābandhitvā. Palobhanato ^b^okacaraṃ nandīrāgo^eb^ti. Byāmohanato ^b^okacārikaṃ avijjāti katvā dasseti. Tesa^eb^nti okacarokacārikānaṃ. ^b^Sākhābhaṅgenā^eb^ti tādisena lūkhataragandhena sākhābhaṅgena. ^b^Manussagandhaṃ apanetvā^eb^ tassa sākhābhaṅgassa gandhena. ^b^Sammatto^eb^ti sammajjito byāmuñcho.

[03]Buddhānaṃ khemamaggavicaraṇaṃ kummaggapidhānañca ^b^sabbalokasādhāraṇampi^eb^ atthato veneyyapuggalāpekkhamevāti dassento ^b^‘‘aññātakoṇḍaññādīnaṃ bhabbapuggalāna’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Ūhato^eb^ti samūhato nīhatoti āha ^b^‘‘dvedhā chetvā pātito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nāsitā^eb^ti adassanaṃ gamitāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbena sabbaṃ samugghāṭitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Hitūpacāra^eb^nti sattānaṃ hitacariyaṃ.
[06]Dvedhāvitakkasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^216^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dasakusalakammapathavasenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0069^ea^ idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ vaṭṭapādakasamāpatticittassapi idha adhicittabhāvena anicchitattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipassanāpādakāṭṭhasamāpatticitta’’^eb^nti. Atha vā anuttarimanussadhammasaṅgahitameva kevalaṃ ‘‘pakaticitta’’nti vattabbanti dassento ^b^‘‘dasakusalakammapathavasena uppannaṃ cittaṃ cittamevā’’^eb^ti vatvā yadettha adhicittanti adhippetaṃ, taṃ tadeva dassento ^b^‘‘vipassanāpādakāṭṭhasamāpatticitta’’^eb^nti āha. Itarassa panettha vidhi na paṭisedhetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vipassanāya sampayuttaṃ adhicittanti keci. ^b^Anuyuttenā^eb^ti anuppannassa uppādanavasena, uppannassa paribrūhanavasena anu anu yuttena. ^b^Mūlakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Gahetvā viharanto^eb^ti bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto. Bhāvanāya appanaṃ appattopi adhicittamanuyuttoyeva tadatthepi taṃsaddavohārato.

[03]Yehi ^a^M2.0073^ea^ phalaṃ nāma yathā uppajjanaṭṭhāne pakappiyamānaṃ viya hoti, ^b^tāni nimittāni^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāraṇānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kālena kāla^eb^nti ettha ^b^kālenā^eb^ti bhummatthe karaṇavacananti āha ^b^‘‘samaye samaye’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nanu ca…pe… nirantaraṃ manasi kātabba^eb^nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu ca bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannattā abbudanīharaṇavidhiṃ dassentena bhagavatā ^b^‘‘pañca nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasi kātabbānī’’^eb^ti ayaṃ desanā āraddhāti? ‘‘Adhicittamanuyuttenā’’ti vuttattā avicchedavasena bhāvanāya yuttappayutto adhicittamanuyutto nāmāti codakassa adhippāyo. Itaro bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassāadikammikassa kadāci bhāvanupakkilesā uppajjeyyuṃ, tato cittassa visodhanatthāya yathākālaṃ imāni nimittāni manasi kātabbānīti ‘‘kālena kāla’’nti satthā avocāti dassento ^b^‘‘pāḷiyañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^imānī^eb^ti imāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni pañca nimittāni. ^b^Abbuda^eb^nti upaddavaṃ.

[03]^b^Chandasahagatā rāgasampayuttā^eb^ti taṇhāchandasahagatā kāmarāgasampayuttā. ^b^Iṭṭhāniṭṭhāsamapekkhitesū^eb^ti iṭṭhesu piyesu, aniṭṭhesu appiyesu, asamaṃ asammā pekkhitesu. ^b^Asamapekkhana^eb^nti gehassitāññāṇupekkhāvasena ārammaṇassa ayoniso gahaṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā’’tiādi (ma. ni. 3.308). ^b^Te^eb^ parivitakkā. ^b^Tato nimittato añña^eb^nti tato chandūpasaṃhitādiakusalavitakkuppattikāraṇato ^a^V2.0070^ea^ aññaṃ navaṃ nimittaṃ. ‘‘Manasikaroto’’ti hi vuttaṃ, tasmā ārammaṇaṃ, tādiso purimuppanno cittappavattiākāro vā nimittaṃ. ^b^Kusalanissitaṃ nimitta^eb^nti kusalacittappavattikāraṇaṃ ^b^manasi kātabbaṃ^eb^ citte ṭhapetabbaṃ, bhāvanāvasena cintetabbaṃ, cittasantāne vā saṅkamitabbaṃ. Asubhañhi asubhanimittanti. Saṅkhāresu uppanne chandūpasaṃhite vitakketi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Evaṃ ^b^‘‘dosūpasañhite’’^eb^tiādīsu yathārahaṃ taṃ taṃ padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Yattha katthacī^eb^ti ‘‘sattesu saṅkhāresū’’ti yattha katthaci. ^b^Pañcadhammūpanissayo^eb^ti pañcavidho dhammūpasaṃhito upanissayo.

[03]Evaṃ ^b^‘‘chandūpasañhite’’^eb^tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imassa hatthā vā sobhanā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^‘‘asubhato^eb^^a^M2.0074^ea^^b^upasaṃharitabba’’^eb^nti vatvā upasaṃharaṇākārassa dassanaṃ ^b^‘‘kimhi sārattosī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Chavirāgenā^eb^ti chavirāgatāya kāḷasāmādivaṇṇanibhāya. ^b^Kuphaḷapūrito^eb^ti pakkehi kuṇapaphalehi puṇṇo. ‘‘Kaliphalapūrito’’ti vā pāṭho.

[03]^b^Assāmikatāvakālikabhāvavasenā^eb^ti idaṃ pattaṃ anukkamena vaṇṇavikārañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca patvā chiddāvachiddaṃ bhinnaṃ vā hutvā kapālaniṭṭhaṃ bhavissati. Idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikāraṃ jiṇṇatañca upagantvā pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati. Sace pana nesaṃ sāmiko bhaveyya, na nesaṃ evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyāti evaṃ assāmikabhāvavasena, ‘‘anaddhaniyaṃ idaṃ tāvakālika’’nti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvavasena ca manasikaroto.

[03]^b^Āghātavinaya…pe… bhāvetabbā^eb^ti – ‘‘pañcime, bhikkhave, āghātapaṭivinayā. Yattha hi bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo’’tiādinā nayena āgatassa ^b^āghātavinayasuttassa^eb^ (a. ni. 5.161) ceva ^b^kakacūpamovāda^eb^(ma. ni. 1.222-233)^b^ chavālātūpamā^eb^dīnañca (itivu. 91) vasena āghātaṃ paṭivinodetvā mettā bhāvetabbā.

[03]^b^Garusaṃvāso^eb^ti garuṃ upanissāya vāso. ^b^Uddeso^eb^ti pariyattidhammassa uddisāpanañceva uddisanañca. ^b^Uddiṭṭhaparipucchana^eb^nti yathāuggahitassa dhammassa atthaparipucchā. ^b^Pañca dhammūpanissāyā^eb^ti garusaṃvāsādike pañca dhamme paṭicca. ^b^Mohadhātū^eb^ti moho.

[03]^b^Upanissitabbā^eb^ti upanissayitabbā, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^Yattappaṭiyatto^eb^ti yatto ca gāmappavesanāpucchākaraṇesu ussukkaṃ āpanno sajjito ca hotīti attho. ^b^Athassa moho pahīyatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0071^ea^ assa bhikkhuno evaṃ tattha yuttappayuttassa pacchā so moho vigacchati. ^b^Evampī^eb^ti evaṃ uddese appamajjanenapi. Puna ^b^evampī^eb^ti atthaparipucchāya kaṅkhāvinodanepi. ^b^Tesu tesu ṭhānesu attho pākaṭo hotī^eb^ti suyyamānassa dhammassa tesu tesu padesu ‘‘idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, idha samādhi, idha paññā’’ti so so attho vibhūto hoti. Idaṃ cakkhurūpālokādi ^a^M2.0075^ea^^b^imassa^eb^ cakkhuviññāṇassa ^b^kāraṇaṃ, idaṃ^eb^ sālibījabhūmisalilādi ^b^imassa^eb^ sāliaṅkurassa ^b^kāraṇaṃ. Idaṃ na kāraṇa^eb^nti tadeva cakkhurūpālokādi sotaviññāṇassa, tadeva sālibījādi kudrusakaṅkurassa na kāraṇanti ṭhānāṭṭhānavinicchaye cheko hoti.

[03]^b^Ārammaṇesū^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānesu. ^b^Ime vitakkā^eb^ti kāmavitakkādayo. Sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbākusalapaṭipakkhāti katvā ‘‘pahīyantī’’ti vattabbe na sabbe sabbesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtāti ‘‘pahīyanti evā’’ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imānī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Kusalanissita^eb^nti kusalena nissitaṃ nissayitabbaṃ. ^b^Kusalassa paccayabhūta^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ, kusaluppattikāraṇaṃ yathāvuttāsubhanimittādimeva vadati. ^b^Sāraphalake^eb^ti candanamaye sāraphalake. ^b^Visamāṇi^eb^nti visamākārena tattha ṭhitaṃ āṇiṃ. ^b^Haneyyā^eb^ti pahareyya nikkhāmeyya.

[03]^b^217^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭo^eb^ti āturo, duggandhabādhatāya pīḷito. ^b^Dukkhito^eb^ti sañjātadukkho. ^b^Imināpi kāraṇenā^eb^ti akosallasambhūtatāya kusalapaṭipakkhatāya gehassitarogena sarogatāya ca ^b^ete akusalā^eb^ viññugarahitabbatāya jigucchanīyatāya ca ^b^sāvajjā^eb^ aniṭṭhaphalatāya nirassādasaṃvattaniyatāya ca ^b^dukkhavipākā^eb^ti evaṃ tena tena kāraṇena akusalādibhāvaṃ ^b^upaparikkhato^eb^.
[21]‘‘Āturaṃ asuciṃ pūtiṃ, passa nande samussayaṃ;
[22]Uggharantaṃ paggharantaṃ, bālānaṃ abhinandita’’nti. (apa. therī 2.4.157) –
[07]Evamādi ^b^kāyavicchandanīyakathādīhi^eb^ vā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena –
[21]‘‘Tasseva tena pāpiyo, yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhati;
[22]Kuddhaṃ appaṭikujjhanto, saṅgāmaṃ jeti dujjaya’’nti. (theragā. 442) –
[07]Evamādi paṭighavūpasamanakathādikāpi saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^218^eb^^b^.^eb^ Na ^a^V2.0072^ea^ saraṇaṃ ^b^asati,^eb^ ananussaraṇaṃ. Amanasikaraṇaṃ ^b^amanasikāro. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisīditabba^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānamanasikāreneva nisīditabbaṃ. ^b^Uggahito dhammakathāpabandho^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānassa upakāro dhammakathāpabandho. ^b^Muṭṭhipotthako^eb^ti muṭṭhippamāṇo pārihāriyapotthako. ^b^Samannānentenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0076^ea^ samannāharantena. ^b^Okāso na hoti^eb^ āraddhassa pariyosāpetabbato. Āraddhassa antagamanaṃ anārambhovāti theravādo. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti upajjhāyassa. ^b^Pabbhārasodhanaṃ^eb^ kāyakammaṃ, ārabhanto eva vitakkaniggaṇhanatthaṃ saṃyuttanikāyasajjhāyanaṃ vacīkammaṃ, dassanakiccapubbakammakaraṇatthaṃ tejokasiṇaparikammanti tīṇi kammāni ācinoti. Thero tassa āsayaṃ kasiṇañca savisesaṃ jānitvā ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ vihāre’’^eb^tiādimavoca. Tenassa yathādhippāyaṃ sabbaṃ sampāditaṃ. ^b^Asatipabbaṃ nāma^eb^ asatiyā vitakkaniggahaṇavibhāvanato.

[03]^b^219^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vitakkamūlabhedaṃ pabba^eb^nti vitakkamūlassa tammūlassa ca bhedavibhāvanaṃ vitakkamūlabhedaṃ pabbaṃ. Vitakkaṃ saṅkharotīti vitakkasaṅkhāro, vitakkapaccayo subhanimittādīsupi subhādinā ayonisomanasikāro. So pana vitakkasaṅkhāro saṃtiṭṭhati etthāti ^b^vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṃ,^eb^ asubhe subhantiādi saññāvipallāso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vitakkānaṃ mūlañca mūlamūlañca manasi kātabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vitakkānaṃ mūlamūlaṃ gacchantassā^eb^ti upaparikkhanavasena micchāvitakkānaṃ mūlaṃ uppattikāraṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā gacchantassa. Yāthāvato jānantassa pubbe viya vitakkā abhiṇhaṃ nappavattantīti āha ^b^‘‘vitakkacāro sithilo hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tasmiṃ sithilībhūte matthakaṃ gacchante^eb^ti vuttanayena vitakkacāro sithilabhūto, tasmiṃ vitakkānaṃ mūlagamane anukkamena thirabhāvappattiyā matthakaṃ gacchante. ^b^Vitakkā sabbaso nirujjhantī^eb^ti micchāvitakkā sabbepi gacchanti na samudācaranti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā vā anavasesā pahīyanti.

[03]^b^Kaṇṇamūle patita^eb^nti sasakassa kaṇṇasamīpe kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ paharantaṃ viya upapatitaṃ. Tassa kira sasakassa heṭṭhā mahāmūsikāhi khatamahāvāṭaṃ umaṅgasadisaṃ ahosi, tenassa pātena mahāsaddo ahosi. ^b^Palāyiṃsu^eb^ ‘‘pathavī udrīyatī’’ti. ^b^Mūlamūlaṃ gantvā anuvijjeyya^eb^nti ‘‘pathavī bhijjatī’’ti yatthāyaṃ saso uṭṭhito, tattha gantvā tassa mūlakāraṇaṃ yaṃnūna vīmaṃseyyaṃ. Pathaviyā bhijjanaṭṭhānaṃ gate ‘‘ko jānāti, kiṃ bhavissatī’’ti saso ‘‘na sakkomi sāmī’’ti āha. Ādhipaccavato hi yācanaṃ saṇhamudukaṃ. ^b^Duddubhāyatī^eb^ti duddubhāti saddaṃ karoti. Anuravadassanañhetaṃ. ^b^Bhaddante^eb^ti migarājassa piyasamudācāro, migarāja, bhaddaṃ te atthūti attho. ^b^Kimeta^eb^nti kiṃ etaṃ, kiṃ tassa mūlakāraṇaṃ? ^b^Duddubha^eb^nti idampi tassa anuravadassanameva. Evanti yathā sasakassa mahāpathavībhedanaṃ ravanāya ^a^V2.0073^ea^ micchāgāhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M2.0077^ea^ amūlaṃ, evaṃ vitakkacāropi saññāvipallāsasamuṭṭhāno amūlo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vitakkāna’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^220^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhidanta^eb^nti abhibhavanadantaṃ, uparidantanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uparidanta’’^eb^nti. So hi itaraṃ musalaṃ viya udukkhalaṃ visesato kassaci khādanakāle abhibhuyya vattati. ^b^Kusalacittenā^eb^ti balavasammāsaṅkappasampayuttena. ^b^Akusalacitta^eb^nti kāmavitakkādisahitaṃ akusalacittaṃ. ^b^Abhiniggaṇhitabba^eb^nti yathā tassa āyatiṃ samudācāro na hoti, evaṃ abhibhavitvā niggahetabbaṃ, anuppattidhammatā āpādetabbāti attho. ^b^Ke ca tumhe^eb^ satipi cirakālabhāvanāya evaṃ adubbalā ^b^ko cāhaṃ^eb^ mama santike laddhappatiṭṭhe viya ṭhitepi idāneva appatiṭṭhe karonto iti evaṃ ^b^abhibhavitvā^eb^. Taṃ pana abhibhavanākāraṃ dassento ^b^‘‘kāmaṃ taco cā’’^eb^tiādinā caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyapaggaṇhanamāha. ^b^Atthadīpika^eb^nti ekantato vitakkaniggaṇhanatthajotakaṃ. ^b^Upama^eb^nti ‘‘seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, balavā puriso’’tiādikaṃ upamaṃ.

[03]^b^221^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pariyādānabhājanīya^eb^nti yaṃ taṃ ādito ‘‘adhicittamanuyuttena bhikkhunā pañca nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasi kātabbānī’’ti niddiṭṭhaṃ, tattha tassa nimittassa manasikaraṇakālapariyādānassa vasena vibhajanaṃ. Nigamanaṃ vā etaṃ, yadidaṃ ‘‘yato kho, bhikkhave’’tiādi. Yathāvuttassa hi atthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti. Tathāpaṭipannassa vā vasībhāvavisuddhidassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘yato kho, bhikkhave’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Satthācariyo^eb^ti dhanubbedācariyo. Yathā hi sasanato asatthampi satthaggahaṇeneva saṅgayhati, evaṃ dhanusippampi dhanubbedapariyāpannamevāti.

[03]Pariyāyati parivitakketīti ^b^pariyāyo^eb^. Vāroti āha ^b^‘‘vitakkavārapathesū’’^eb^ti, vitakkānaṃ vārena pavattanamaggesu. ^b^Ciṇṇavasī^eb^ti āsevitavasī. ^b^Paguṇavasī^eb^ti subhāvitavasī. Sammāvitakkaṃyeva yathicchitaṃ tathāvitakkanato, itarassa panassa setughātoyevāti.
[06]Vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca sīhanādavaggavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^222^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Moḷi^eb^nti ^a^M2.0078^ea^^a^V2.0074^ea^ kesaracanaṃ. ^b^Vehāyasa^eb^nti ākāse. ^b^Ratanacaṅkoṭavarenā^eb^ti ratanasilāmayavaracaṅkoṭakena sahassanetto sirasā paṭiggahi. ‘‘Suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakavarenā’’tipi (bu. vaṃ. aṭṭha. 23 dūrenidānakathā; jā. aṭṭha. 1.2 avidūrenidānakathā) pāṭho.

[03]^b^Sā^eb^ti moḷi. Moḷi etassa atthīti moḷiko, moḷiko eva ^b^moḷiyo. Phagguno^eb^ti pana nāmaṃ. ^b^Saṅkhā^eb^ti samaññā. Velīyati khaṇamuhuttādivasena upadisīyatīti ^b^velā,^eb^ kāloti āha ^b^‘‘tāyaṃ velāyaṃ…pe… ayaṃ kālavelā nāmā’’^eb^ti. Velayati paricchedavasena tiṭṭhatīti ^b^velā,^eb^ sīmā. Velayati saṃkilesapakkhaṃ cālayatīti ^b^velā,^eb^ sīlaṃ. Anatikkamanaṭṭhopi cassa saṃkilesadhammanimittaṃ acalanameva. Viññupurisābhāve chapañcavācāmattaṃ ^b^ovāde pamāṇaṃ nāma.^eb^^b^Davasahagataṃ katvā^eb^ti kīḷāsahitaṃ katvā.

[03]^b^Missībhūto^eb^ti ananulomikasaṃsaggavasena missībhūto. ^b^‘‘Avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī’’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ vivarituṃ ‘‘tāpanapacanakoṭṭanādīnī’’tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Adhikaraṇampi karotī^eb^ti ettha yathā so adhikaraṇāya parisakkati, taṃdassanaṃ ^b^‘‘imesaṃ bhikkhūna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Adhikaraṇaṃ ākaḍḍhatī^eb^ti adhikaraṇaṃ uddissa te bhikkhū ākaḍḍhati, adhikaraṇaṃ vā tesu uppādento ākaḍḍhati. ^b^Uddesapadaṃ vā^eb^ti padaso uddesamattaṃ vā. ^b^Neva piyakamyatāyā^eb^ti neva attani satthuno piyabhāvakāmatāya. ^b^Na bhedādhippāyenā^eb^ti na satthuno tena bhikkhunā bhedādhippāyena. ^b^Atthakāmatāyā^eb^ti moḷiyaphaggunassa hitakāmatāya.

[03]^b^224^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avaṇṇabhāsane^eb^ti ^a^V2.0075^ea^ bhikkhunīnaṃ aguṇakathane. Chandādīnaṃ vatthubhāvato kāmaguṇā gehaṃ viya gehaṃ, te ca te sitā nissitāti ^b^gehassitā^eb^ti vuttā. Taṇhāchandāpi tāsaṃ kattukāmatāpīti ubhayepi ^b^taṇhāchandā, paṭighachandā^eb^ pana tesaṃ kattukāmatā eva. Phalikamaṇi viya pakatipabhassarassa cittasantānassa upasaṅgo viya vipariṇāmakāraṇaṃ rāgādayoti āha ^b^‘‘rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇata’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Hitānukampī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0079^ea^ karuṇāya paccupaṭṭhāpanamāha. ‘‘Yassantarato na santi kopā’’tiādīsu (udā. 20) viya ^b^antara^eb^-saddo cittapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘dosantaroti dosacitto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^225^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dubbacatāya ovādaṃ asampaṭicchanto citteneva ^b^paṭiviruddho aṭṭhāsi. Gaṇhiṃsu^eb^ cittaṃ, hadayagāhiniṃ paṭipajjiṃsūti attho. ^b^Pūrayiṃsu^eb^ ajjhāsayanti attho. ^b^Ekasmiṃ samaye^eb^ paṭhamabodhiyaṃ. Ekāsanaṃ bhojanassa ^b^ekāsanabhojanaṃ,^eb^ ekavelāyameva bhojanaṃ. Tañca kho pubbaṇhe evāti āha ^b^‘‘ekaṃ purebhattabhojana’’^eb^ntiādi. Sattakkhattuṃ bhuttabhojanampi imasmiṃ sutte ekāsanabhojananteva adhippetaṃ, na ekāsanikatāya ekāya eva nisajjāya bhojanaṃ. ‘‘Appaḍaṃsa…pe… samphassa’’ntiādīsu viya ^b^appa^eb^-saddo abhāvatthoti āha ^b^‘‘nirābādhataṃ, niddukkhata’’^eb^nti. Padhānādivasena sallahukaṃ akicchaṃ uṭṭhānaṃ ^b^sallahukauṭṭhānaṃ. Na ekappahārenā^eb^ti na ekavārena, na ekasmiṃyeva kāleti adhippāyo. ^b^Dve bhojanānī^eb^ti ‘‘aparaṇhe rattiya’’nti kālavasena dve bhojanāni. ^b^Pañca guṇe^eb^ti appābādhādike pañca ānisaṃse. ^b^Satuppādakaraṇīyamattamevā^eb^ti satuppādamattakaraṇīyameva, nivāretabbassa punappunaṃ samādapanañca nāhosi.

[03]^b^Maṇḍabhūmī^eb^ti ojavantabhūmi, yattha parisiñcanena vinā sassāni kiṭṭhāni sampajjanti. Yuge yojetabbāni yoggāni, tesaṃ ācariyo ^b^yoggācariyo,^eb^ tesaṃ sikkhāpanako. Gāmaṇihatthiādayopi ‘‘yoggā’’ti vuccantīti āha pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘assadammasārathī’’^eb^ti. Catūsu maggesu ^b^yena yena maggena icchati^eb^. Javasamagādibhedāsu gatīsu ^b^yaṃ yaṃ gatiṃ. Taṃ taṃ^eb^ maggaṃ ^b^āruḷhāva^eb^ otiṇṇāyeva. ^b^Neva vāretabbā^eb^ rasmiviniggaṇhanena. ^b^Na vijjhitabbā^eb^ patodalaṭṭhiyā. ^b^Gamanamevā^eb^ti ime yuttā mama icchānurūpaṃ mandaṃ gacchanti, samaṃ gacchanti, sīghaṃ gacchantīti khuresu nimittaggahaṇaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sārathinā tesaṃ gamanameva passitabbaṃ hoti, na tattha niyojanaṃ ^a^V2.0076^ea^. ^b^Tehipi^eb^ bhikkhūhi. ^b^Pajahiṃsu^eb^ pajahitabbaṃ. ^b^Sāladūsanā^eb^ti sālarukkhavisanāsakā. ^b^Aññā ca valliyo^eb^ sālarukkhe vinandhitvā ṭhitā. ^b^Bahi nīharaṇenā^eb^ti sālavanato bahi chaḍḍanena. ^b^Susaṇṭhitā^eb^ti saṇṭhānasampannā, ^b^mariyādaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0080^ea^^b^bandhitvā^eb^ti ālavālasampādanavasena mariyādaṃ bandhitvā. ^b^Kipillapuṭakaṃ^eb^ tambakipillakapuṭakaṃ. ^b^Sukkhadaṇḍakaharaṇaṃ^eb^ ālavālabbhantarā.

[03]^b^226^eb^^b^.^eb^ Videharaṭṭhe jātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya ^b^vedehikā^eb^. Paṇḍā vuccati paññā, tāya itā gatā pavattāti ^b^paṇḍitā. Gahapatānī^eb^ti gehasāminī. ^b^Soraccenā^eb^ti saṃyamena. ^b^Nivātavuttī^eb^ti paṇipātakārī. ^b^Nibbutā^eb^ti nibbutaduccaritapariḷāhā. ^b^Uṭṭhāhikā^eb^ti uṭṭhānavīriyavatī. ^b^Kibbisā^eb^ti kurūrā.

[03]^b^227^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ akkhantiyā dosaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti ‘‘guṇavanto’’ti loke patthaṭakittisaddānampi akkhantinimittaṃ ayasuppattiguṇaparihāniādiṃ akkhamatāyāadīnavaṃ pakāsetvā. ^b^Vacanapathe^eb^ti vacanamagge yuttakālādike. Saṇhābhāvopi hi vacanassa pavattiākāroti katvā ‘‘vacanapatho’’ tveva vutto. ^b^Tesaṃyeva^eb^ kālādīnaṃ. Mettā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, uppannaṃ mettacittaṃ etesanti ^b^uppannamettacittā^eb^. Puna ‘‘kālena vā, bhikkhave’’tiādi (pari. 362, 363) pāḷi dhammasabhāvadassanavasena pavattā ‘‘paraṃ codanāvasena vadantā nāma imehi ākārehi vadantī’’ti. ^b^Adhimuñcitvā^eb^ti abhirativasena tasmiṃ puggale bhāvanācittaṃ muñcitvā vissajjetvā. So puggalo ārammaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^tadārammaṇaṃ,^eb^ mettacittaṃ. Yadi evaṃ padesavisayaṃ taṃ kathaṃ nippadesavisayaṃ viya hotīti codento ^b^‘‘kathaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karotī’’^eb^ti āha, itaro ^b^‘‘pañca vacanapathe’’^eb^tiādinā pariharati. Idha ^b^tadārammaṇañcā^eb^ti tasseva mettacittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvāti pāḷiyaṃ vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puna tassevā’’^eb^tiādi. Sabbā sattakāyasaṅkhātā pajā etassa atthīti ^b^sabbāvanto^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sabbāvanta’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Vipulenā^eb^ti mahājanārammaṇena. Mahantapariyāyo hi vipula-saddo, mahattañcettha bahukabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anekasattārammaṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tañca puggala^eb^nti pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalaṃ. ^b^Cittassā^eb^ti mettāsahagatacittassa. Ettha ca mettāsahagatena cetasā viharissāmāti sambandho. Tattha kathanti āha ^b^‘‘tañca puggalaṃ sabbañca lokaṃ tassa cittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā adhimuccitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^228^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tadatthadīpika^eb^nti ^a^V2.0077^ea^^a^M2.0081^ea^ yā mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ sammadeva bhāvetvā ṭhitassa nibbikārato kenaci vikāraṃ na āpādetabbatā, tadatthajotikaṃ. ^b^Apathavi^eb^nti pathavī na hotīti apathavī. ^b^Nippathavi^eb^nti sabbena sabbaṃ pathavībhāvābhāvaṃ. ^b^Tiriyaṃ pana aparicchinnā^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu cakkavāḷapabbatehi taṃ taṃ cakkavāḷaṃ paricchindati? Na, tadaññacakkavāḷapathaviyā ekābaddhabhāvato. Tiṇṇañhi cakkānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ antareyeva pathavī natthi lokantaranirayabhāvato. Cakkavāḷapabbatantarehi sambaddhaṭṭhāne pathavī ekābaddhāva. Vivaṭṭakāle hi saṇṭhahamānāpi pathavī yathāsaṇṭhitapathaviyā ekābaddhāva saṇṭhahati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tiriyaṃ pana aparicchinnā’’^eb^ti. Imināva gambhīrabhāvena vuttaparimāṇato paraṃ natthīti dīpitaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^229^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Haliddī^eb^ti haliddivaṇṇaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ kiñci pītakavaṇṇa’’^eb^nti. Vaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ assa atthīti rūpī, na rūpīti ^b^arūpī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘arūpo’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sanidassanabhāvapaṭikkhepato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^230^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañca yojanasatānī^eb^ti himavantato samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ, na anotattadahamukhato. Aññā nadiyo upādāya labbhamānaṃ gambhīrataṃ appameyyaudakatañca gahetvā ^b^‘‘gambhīrā appameyyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana tiṇukkāya tāpetabbattābhāvadassanaparametanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘etena payogenā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^231^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tūlinī viya ^b^tūlinī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘simbalitūlalatātūlasamānā’’^eb^ti. Sassaranti evaṃpavatto saddo ^b^sassarasaddo^eb^. Anuravadassanañhetaṃ. Tathā ^b^bhabbharasaddo^eb^. Sabbametaṃ mettāvihārino cittassa dūsetuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvadassanaparaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – yathā mahāpathavī kenaci purisena apathaviṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, yathā ākāse kiñci rūpaṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ na sakkā, yathā gaṅgāya udakaṃ tiṇukkāya tāpetuṃ na sakkā, yathā ca biḷārabhastaṃ thaddhaṃ pharusañca samphassaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, evamevaṃ mettāya cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapurisena kenaci pariyāyena cittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti.

[03]^b^232^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ocarakā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0082^ea^^a^V2.0078^ea^ parūpaghātavasena hīnakammakārino. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nīcakammakārakā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anadhivāsanenā^eb^ti akkhamanena. ^b^Mayhaṃ ovādakaro na hotī^eb^ti paramhi anatthakārimhi cittapadosanena āghātuppādanena mama sāsane sammāpaṭipajjamāno nāma na hoti.

[03]^b^233^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṇu^eb^nti appakaṃ tanu parittakaṃ. ^b^Thūla^eb^nti mahantaṃ oḷārikaṃ. Vacanapathassa pana adhippetattā taṃ sāvajjavibhāgena gahetabbanti āha ^b^‘‘appasāvajjaṃ vā mahāsāvajjaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Khantiyā idaṃ bhāriyaṃ na hotīti avocuṃ ^b^‘‘anadhi…pe… passāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dīgharatta^eb^nti cirakālaṃ, accantamevāti attho. Accantañca hitasukhaṃ nāma aññādhigamenevāti āha ^b^‘‘arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto’’^eb^ti.
[06]Kakacūpamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^234^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bādhayiṃsū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0079^ea^ (sārattha. ṭī. pācittiya 3.417) haniṃsu. Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho, anatikkamanaṭṭhena tasmiṃ antarāye niyuttā, antarāyaṃ vā phalaṃ arahanti, antarāyassa vā karaṇasīlāti ^b^antarāyikā.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ānantariyadhammā^eb^ti ānantariyasabhāvacetanādhammā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – cutianantaraphalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttā, tannibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlā, anantarapayojanāti vā ānantarikā, te eva ^b^ānantariyā^eb^ti vuttā. Kammāni eva antarāyikāti ^b^kammantarāyikā. Mokkhasseva antarāyaṃ karoti, na saggassa^eb^ micchācāralakkhaṇābhāvato. Na hi bhikkhuniyā dhammarakkhitabhāvo atthi. Pākatikabhikkhunīvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, ariyāya pana pavattaṃ apāyasaṃvattaniyameva. Nandamāṇavako cettha nidassanaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ samānacchandatāvasena vā asaggantarāyikatā, mokkhantarāyikatā pana mokkhatthapaṭipattiyā vidūsanato, abhibhavitvā pana pavattiyaṃ ^a^M2.0083^ea^ saggantarāyikatāpi na sakkā nivāretunti. Ahetukadiṭṭhiakiriyadiṭṭhinatthikadiṭṭhiyova niyatabhāvaṃ pattā ^b^niyatamicchādiṭṭhidhammā. Paṭisandhidhammā^eb^ti paṭisandhicittuppādamāha. Paṇḍakādiggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ sabbāyapi ahetukapaṭisandhiyā vipākantarāyikabhāvato. Yā hi ariye upavadati, sā cetanā ^b^ariyūpavādadhammā. Tato para^eb^nti khamāpanato upari. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāsīhanādassa līnatthapakāsane vuttameva. ^b^Yāva bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānāti^eb^ pārājikaṃ āpanno. ^b^Na vuṭṭhāti^eb^ sesaṃ garukāpattiṃ. ^b^Na deseti^eb^ lahukāpattiṃ.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ bhikkhu^eb^ ariṭṭho. ^b^Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvā^eb^ti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena sāvajjaṃ kāmaguṇaparibhogarasaṃ samānetvā. ^b^Upanento viyā^eb^ti bandhanaṃ upanento viya. ‘‘Ghaṭento viyā’’tipi pāṭho. ^b^Upasaṃharanto viyā^eb^ti sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto viya ekantasāvajje anavajjabhāvapakkhepena. ^b^Pāpaka^eb^nti lāmakaṭṭhena duggatisampāpanaṭṭhena ca pāpakaṃ. Setukaraṇavasena ^b^mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya. Sabbaññutaññāṇena^eb^ ‘‘sāvajja’’nti diṭṭhaṃ ‘‘anavajja’’nti gahaṇena tena ^b^paṭivirujjhanto^eb^. Ekantato anantarāyikanti gahaṇena ^b^vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhanto^eb^. Kāmakaṇṭakehi ariyamaggasammāpaṭipatti na upakkilissatīti vadanto ^b^‘‘ariyamagge khāṇukaṇṭakādīni^eb^^a^V2.0080^ea^^b^pakkhipanto’’^eb^ti vutto. Paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadasaṅkhāte, ‘‘abrahmacariyaṃ pahāyā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.8, 194) ādidesanāsaṅkhāte ca ^b^āṇācakke^eb^.

[03]Pucchamānā ^b^samanuyuñjanti nāma^eb^. Pucchā hi anuyogoti. Tenādhigatāya laddhiyā anuvajjanatthaṃ paccanubhāsanena puna paṭijānāpanaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ, taṃ panassa ādāya samādāpanaṃ viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘samanugāhanti nāmā’’^eb^ti. Tassā pana laddhiyā anuyuñjitāya vuccamānampi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakamevāti tassa pucchanaṃ ^b^samanubhāsanaṃ. Anudahanaṭṭhena^eb^ anupāyapaṭipattiyā sampati āyatiñca anudahanaṭṭhena. ^b^Mahābhitāpanaṭṭhena^eb^ anavaṭṭhitasabhāvatāya. ^b^Ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena^eb^ muhuttaramaṇīyatāya. ^b^Tāvakālikaṭṭhena^eb^ parehi abhibhavanīyatāya. ^b^Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgapalibhañjanaṭṭhena^eb^ chedanabhedanādiadhikaraṇabhāvena. Ugghāṭasadisatāya ^a^M2.0084^ea^^b^adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena^eb^. Avaṇe vaṇaṃ uppādetvā anto anupavisanasabhāvatāya ^b^vinivijjhanaṭṭhena^eb^. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānatthanimittatāya ^b^sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayaṭṭhena.^eb^^b^Diṭṭhithāmenā^eb^ti tassā diṭṭhiyā thāmagatabhāvena. ^b^Diṭṭhiparāmāsenā^eb^ti diṭṭhisaṅkhātaparāmasanena. Diṭṭhiyeva hi dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasanena parāmāso. ^b^Abhinivissā^eb^ti taṇhābhinivesapubbaṅgamena diṭṭhābhinivesena ‘‘idamevettha tatha’’nti abhinivisitvā. ^b^Yasmā hi abhinivesanaṃ tattha abhiniviṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.^eb^Tasmā āha^b^ ‘‘adhiṭṭhahitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^235^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Natthīti vattukāmopī^eb^ti attano laddhiṃ niguhetukāmatāya avajānitukāmopi. ^b^Sampaṭicchati^eb^ paṭijānāti. ^b^Dve kathāti^eb^ visaṃvādanakathaṃ sandhāya vadati. Abhūtakathā hi pubbe pavattā bhūtakathāya vasena dve kathāti vuccati.
[03]^b^236^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kassa kho nāmā^eb^ti iminā satthā ‘‘na mama tuyhaṃ tādisassa atthāya dhammadesanā nāma bhūtapubbā’’ti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khattiyassa vā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Ñāṇamayā usmā etassa atthīti usmī, tathārūpehi paccayehi anusmīkato tasmiṃ attabhāve paṭivedhagabbhoapi ^b^usmīkato^eb^ti vikatabhāvato paññābījamassa imasmiṃ dhammavinaye api nu atthīti bhagavā bhikkhū pucchati. Te ^b^paṭikkhipantā vadanti^eb^ ṭhānagatena duccaritena ñāṇupahatabhāvaṃ sampassantā. ^b^Nittejabhūto^eb^ti nittejaṃ bhūto tejohānippatto. Tato eva bhikkhūnampi ^a^V2.0081^ea^ sammukhā oloketuṃ asamatthatāya ^b^pattakkhandho^eb^ adhomukho. Sahadhammikaṃ kiñci vattuṃ avisahanato ^b^appaṭibhāno. Sampattūpaganti^eb^ sampattiāvahaṃ. ^b^Paṭippassambhento^eb^ti paṭisedhento.

[03]^b^237^eb^^b^.^eb^ Antarāyakaraladdhiyā sabhāvavibhāvanena ^b^parisaṃ sodheti. Nissāreti^eb^ nīharati avisuddhadiṭṭhitāya. ^b^Kassaci^eb^ buddhānubhāvaṃ ajānantassa. Tassa hi evaṃ bhaveyya ‘‘sahasā kathita’’nti. Na hi kadāci buddhānaṃ sahasā kiriyā nāma atthi. ^b^Assā^eb^ti ‘‘kassacī’’ti vuttabhikkhussa. ^b^Sutvāpi^eb^^a^M2.0085^ea^^b^tuṇhībhāvaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti athāpi siyāti sambandho. ^b^Taṃ sabba^eb^nti ‘‘sace hī’’tiādinā vuttaṃ sabbaṃ parikappanaṃ. ^b^Na karissantī^eb^ti parisāya laddhiṃ sodhetīti sambandho. ^b^Laddhiṃ pakāsento^eb^ti mahāsāvajjatāvasena pakāsento. ^b^Saññāvitakkehī^eb^ti subhanimittānubyañjanaggāhādivasena pavattehi saññāvitakkehi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kilesakāmasampayuttehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Methunasamācāra^eb^nti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ.
