Tadaññampi pana – ‘‘apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ parimaddanaṃ nahāpanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyatī’’tiādinā (a. ni. 7.50) āgataṃ visabhāgavatthuvisayaṃ āmisaparibhogaṃ. ‘‘Aññatreva kāmehi aññatra kāmasaññāhi aññatra kāmavitakkehi samācarissatī’’ti ^b^netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati^eb^.

[03]^b^238^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yoniso paccavekkhaṇena natthi ettha chandarāgoti nicchandarāgo, taṃ ^b^nicchandarāgaṃ^eb^. Kadāci uposathikabhāvena samādinnasīlāpi honti kadāci noti ^b^anibaddhasīlānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Sīlasamādānabhāvato ^b^antarāyakaraṃ^eb^. Vatthukāmānaṃ ^b^sacchandarāgaparibhogañca^eb^. Apaccavekkhaṇena ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ āvaraṇakaraṃ^eb^. Paccayānaṃ ^b^sacchandarāgaparibhogañca^eb^. Ayaṃ ariṭṭho duggahitāya pariyattiyā vasena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati, attānañca khanati, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatīti evaṃ saññā mā hontūti ^b^duggahitāya pariyattiyā dosaṃ dassento āha. Uggaṇhantī^eb^ti sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggataṃ karontā dhārenti cāti attho.

[03]^b^Sutta^eb^ntiādinā navappabhedampi pariyattidhammaṃ pariyādiyati. Kathaṃ suttaṃ navappabhedaṃ? Sagāthakañhi suttaṃ ^b^geyyaṃ,^eb^ niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ ^b^veyyākaraṇaṃ,^eb^ tadubhayavinimuttañca suttaṃ udānādivisesasaññāvirahitaṃ natthi, yaṃ suttaṅgaṃ siyā, maṅgalasuttādīnañca suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya, geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya, tathā ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānanti? Vuccate –
[21]Suttanti ^a^V2.0082^ea^ sāmaññavidhi, visesavidhayo pare;
[22]Sanimittā nirūḷhattā, sahatāññena naññato. (dī. ni. ṭī. 1ṇidānakathāvaṇṇanā; a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.6; sārattha. ṭī. 1.bāhiranidānakathā);

[03]Sabbassapi ^a^M2.0086^ea^ hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ ^b^sāmaññavidhi^eb^. Tenevāha āyasmā mahākaccāno ^b^nettiyaṃ^eb^ (netti. 1.saṅgahavāra) ‘‘navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī’’ti. ‘‘Ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ (pāci. 655, 1242), sakavāde pañca suttasatānī’’ti (dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā; kathā. aṭṭha. nidānakathā) evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ. Tadekadesesu pana geyyādayo ^b^visesavidhayo^eb^ tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā. Tathā hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṃ tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ ‘‘geyya’’nti vadanti. Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Pucchāvissajjanañhi ‘‘byākaraṇa’’nti vuccati, byākaraṇameva veyyākaraṇaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati geyyādisaññānaṃ anokāsabhāvato, ‘‘gāthāvirahe satī’’ti visesitattā ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu, sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu, ‘‘vuttañheta’’nti (itivu. 1) ādivacanasambandhesu, abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthā-udāna-itivuttaka-abbhutadhamma-saññā patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā, satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo. Yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ, taṃ suttaṅgaṃ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanatoti. Nanu ca sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā evāti? Na tadavatthā sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi pubbe ‘‘gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimitta’’nti.

[03]Yañca vuttaṃ ‘‘gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā’’ti (khu. pā. 5.1; su. ni. 261), taṃ na, ^b^niruḷhattā^eb^. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttabhāvo. Na hi ^a^M2.0087^ea^ tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni, kintu suttabhāveneva. Teneva hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘suttanāmaka’’nti nāmaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ‘‘sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā’’ti ^a^V2.0083^ea^, tadapi natthi, yasmā ^b^sahatāññena^eb^. Saha gāthāhīti hi sagāthakaṃ, sahabhāvo ca nāma atthato aññena hoti, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttapadeso atthi, yo ‘‘saha gāthāhī’’ti vucceyya, na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi. Yadapi vuttaṃ ‘‘ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā’’ti, tadapi ^b^na aññato^eb^. Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā, ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti. Evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Atthattha^eb^nti atthabhūtaṃ yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ. Anatthampi keci vipallāsavasena ‘‘attho’’ti gaṇhantīti ‘‘atthattha’’nti visesetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Kāraṇattha^eb^nti kāraṇabhūtaṃ atthaṃ, sīlaṃ samādhissa kāraṇaṃ, samādhi vipassanāyāti evaṃ tassa tassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ atthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīla’’^eb^ntiādi. Tenetaṃ dasseti – imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, tañca yāvadeva samādhatthaṃ, samādhi vipassanattho, vipassanā maggatthā, maggo phalattho, vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ yāvadeva vivaṭṭādhigamatthanti jānituṃ na sakkontīti. Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘attha’’nti iminā bhāsitatthapayojanatthānaṃ gahitatā veditabbā. ^b^Na pariggaṇhantī^eb^ti na vicārenti, nijjhānapaññākkhamā na honti, nijjhāyitvā paññāya rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo. ^b^Iti^eb^ evaṃ etāya pariyattiyā ^b^vādappamokkhānisaṃsā^eb^ attano upari parehi āropitavādassa niggahassa mokkhapayojanā hutvā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti. ^b^Vādappamokkho^eb^ vā nindāpamokkho. ^b^Yassa cā^eb^ti yassa ca sīlādipūraṇena pattabbassa, maggassa vā tadadhigamena pattabbassa, phalassa vā tadadhigamena pattabbassa, anupādāvimokkhassa vā atthāya. ^b^Dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,^eb^ ñāyena pariyāpuṇantīti adhippāyo. ^b^Nānubhonti^eb^ na vindanti. ^b^Tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitā^eb^ upārambhamānadappamakkhapaḷāsādihetubhāvena ^b^dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti^eb^.

[03]^b^239^eb^^b^.^eb^ Alaṃ ^a^M2.0088^ea^ pariyatto gado assāti ^b^alagaddo^eb^ anunāsikalopaṃ da-kārāgamañca katvā. Vaṭṭadukkhakantārato nittharaṇatthāya pariyatti ^b^nittharaṇapariyatti^eb^. Bhaṇḍāgāre niyutto bhaṇḍāgāriko, bhaṇḍāgāriko viya bhaṇḍāgāriko, dhammaratanānupālako. Aññaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti ^b^bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti^eb^. ‘‘Vaṃsānurakkhakovā’’ti avadhāraṇaṃ sīhāvalokanañāyena ^b^tantidhārakova paveṇipālakovā^eb^ti purimapadadvayepi yojetabbaṃ.

[03]Yadi tantidhāraṇādiatthaṃ buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti, kasmā ‘‘khīṇāsavassā’’ti visesetvā vuttaṃ, nanu ekaccassa puthujjanassapi ayaṃ nayo labbhatīti anuyogaṃ ^a^V2.0084^ea^ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yo panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Attano ṭhāne^eb^ti nittharaṇaṭṭhāne. Kāmaṃ puthujjano ‘‘paveṇiṃ pālessāmī’’ti ajjhāsayena pariyāpuṇāti. Attano pana bhavakantārato anittiṇṇattā tassa sā pariyatti nittharaṇapariyatti eva nāma hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puthujjanassā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Nijjhānaṃ khamantī^eb^ti nijjhānapaññaṃ khamanti. Tattha tattha āgate sīlādidhamme nijjhāyitvā paññāya rocetvā yāthāvato gahetabbā honti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idha sīla’’^eb^ntiādi. Na kevalaṃ suggahitaṃ pariyattiṃ nissāya maggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyā, paravādaniggahasakavādapatiṭṭhāpanādīnipi ijjhantīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paravāde’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahitvā’’tiādi (dī. ni. 2.268). ^b^Icchiticchitaṭṭhāna^eb^nti diṭṭhiviniveṭhanādivasena icchitaṃ icchitaṃ pāḷipadesaṃ. ^b^Mocetu^eb^nti apanetuṃ. Ahitāya dukkhāya asaṃvattanampi tadabhāve uppajjanakahitasukhassa kāraṇameva tasmiṃ sati bhāvatoti. Suggahitālagaddassapi hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^240^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uttaranti etenāti uttaro, sinanti bandhantīti setu, uttaro ca so setu cāti ^b^uttarasetu^eb^. Kūlaṃ paratīraṃ vahati pāpetīti ^b^kullaṃ. Kalāpaṃ katvā baddho^eb^ti veḷunaḷādīhi kalāpavasena baddho. ^b^Aṇunti^eb^ idaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiārammaṇaṃ saññojanaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Thūla^eb^nti ^a^M2.0089^ea^ itaraṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhi^eb^nti yathābhūtadassanaṃ, vipassananti attho. ^b^Evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodāta^eb^nti tebhūmakesu dhammesu ñātaṃ ‘‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’’ti, evaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesābhāvena sabbaso visuddhaṃ, parisuddhattā eva pariyodātaṃ. ^b^Na allīyethā^eb^ti nikantivasena na nissayetha. ^b^Na kelāyethā^eb^ti na mamāyetha. ^b^Na dhanāyethā^eb^ti dhanaṃ drabyaṃ na kayirātha. ^b^Ubhayatthā^eb^ti samathe vipassanāya ca.

[03]^b^Asaddhamme^eb^tiādīsu asataṃ hīnajjhāsayānaṃ dhammoti ^b^asaddhammo^eb^. Gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammoti ^b^gāmadhammo^eb^. Kilesānaṃ vassanasabhāvatāya ^b^vasaladhammo^eb^. Kilesehi dūsitattā thūlattā ca ^b^duṭṭhullo^eb^. Udakasuddhipariyosānatāya ^b^odakantiko^eb^. ‘‘Dhammāpi vo pahātabbā’’ti ^b^imināpi ovādena^eb^ bhikkhū uddissa kathentopi ^b^ariṭṭhaṃyeva niggaṇhāti^eb^.

[03]^b^241^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tividhaggāhavasenā^eb^ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhavasena. Yadi evaṃ ^b^‘‘ahaṃ mamāti gaṇhātī’’^eb^ti gāhadvayameva kasmā vuttanti? Nayidamevaṃ tatthāpi gāhattayasseva vuttattā. ‘‘Aha’’nti ^a^V2.0085^ea^ hi iminā mānadiṭṭhiggāhā vuttā ‘‘ahamasmī’’ti gāhasāmaññato. ^b^Diṭṭhipi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ purimuppannāya diṭṭhiyā uttaradiṭṭhiyā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā sassatadiṭṭhiyā ca kāraṇabhāvato. ^b^Ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ pañca khandhā, rūpārammaṇādīni ca. ^b^Diṭṭhiyā paccayo^eb^ avijjā-phassa-saññā-vitakka-ayonisomanasikāra-pāpamittaparatoghosādiko diṭṭhiyā upanissayādipaccayo. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 1.124)‘‘katamāni aṭṭha diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni avijjāpi phassopi saññāpi vitakkopi ayonisomanasikāropi pāpamittopi paratoghosopi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna’’ntiādi. ^b^Rūpārammaṇā^eb^ti ruppanasabhāvadhammārammaṇā. ^b^Rūpaṃ pana attāti na vattabbaṃ^eb^ idha ‘‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.81, 345) imassa gāhassa anadhippetattā. So hi ‘‘yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna’’ntiādinā parato vuccati. Idha pana ‘‘rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, attani rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ attāna’’nti ime tayo gāhā adhippetāti keci, tadayuttaṃ. Yasmā rūpaṃ attā na hoti, attaggāhassa pana ālambanaṃ hoti, attasabhāveyeva vā rūpādidhamme ārabbha attadiṭṭhi uppajjati, na attānaṃ tassa paramatthato anupalabbhanato, tasmā rūpādiārammaṇāva attadiṭṭhīti katvā ^a^M2.0090^ea^ vuttaṃ, rūpaṃ pana ‘‘attā’’ti na vattabbanti ayamettha attho. ‘‘Yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna’’ntiādinā pana vipassanāpaṭivipassanā viya diṭṭhianupassanā nāma dassitā.

[03]Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ sampattagāhindriyavisayatāya patvā gahetabbatā. Tañhi tassa attano visayaṃ paribhutvā sambandhaṃ hutvā gaṇhāti. ^b^Avasesāni sattāyatanāni viññātaṃ nāma^eb^ manasā viññātabbato. Aññathā itaresampi viññātatā siyā. ^b^Patta^eb^nti adhigataṃ. ^b^Pariyesita^eb^nti gavesitaṃ. ^b^Anuvicarita^eb^nti cintitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘manasā’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca pattapariyesanānaṃ apaṭikkhepassa, visuṃ, ekajjhaṃ paṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkoṭikaṃ dassetvā pattapariyesitehi anuvicaritassa bhedaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘lokasmiñhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pariyesitvā pattaṃ^eb^ paṭhamaṃ cetasā pacchā kāyena pattattā ^b^pattaṃ nāma. Pariyesitvā nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ nāma^eb^ kevalaṃ pariyesitabhāvato. ^b^Apariyesitvā pattañca nopattañca^eb^ manasā anuvicaritabbato ^b^manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma^eb^.

[03]Ayañca vikappo ākulo viyāti ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pattaṭṭhenā^eb^ti pattabhāvena pattatāsāmaññena. ^b^Apariyesitvā nopattaṃ manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma^eb^ pattiyā pariyesanāya ca abhāvato. ^b^Sabbaṃ vā eta^eb^nti ‘‘pariyesitvā pattampī’’tiādinā vuttaṃ catubbidhampi. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ’’tiādivacanena. ^b^Viññāṇārammaṇā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo kathitā^eb^ pārisesañāyena ^a^V2.0086^ea^. Evaṃ pārisesañāyapariggahe kiṃ payojananti āha ^b^‘‘desanāvilāsenā’’^eb^tiādi. Yesaṃ vineyyānaṃ desetabbadhammassa sarūpaṃ anāmasitvā ārammaṇakicca-sampayuttadhamma-phalavisesādi-pakārantaravibhāvanena paṭivedho hoti, tesaṃ tappakārabhedehi dhammehi, yesaṃ pana yena ekeneva pakārena sarūpeneva vā vibhāvane kate paṭivedho hoti, tesaṃ taṃ vatvā dhammissarattā tadaññaṃ niravasesākāravibhāvanañca ^b^desanāvilāso^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhādiārammaṇavasena viññāṇaṃ dassita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Yaṃ rūpaṃ esā diṭṭhi ‘‘loko ca attā cā’’ti gaṇhāti. Taṃ rūpaṃ sandhāya ‘‘so loko so attā’’ti vacanaṃ vuttanti yojanā. ^b^So pecca^eb^^b^bhavissāmī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0091^ea^ uddhamāghātanikavādavasenāyaṃ diṭṭhīti āha ^b^‘‘so ahaṃ paralokaṃ gantvā nicco bhavissāmī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dhuvo^eb^ti thiro. ^b^Sassato^eb^ti sabbadābhāvī. ^b^Avipariṇāmadhammo^eb^ti jarāya maraṇena ca avipariṇāmetabbasabhāvo, nibbikāroti attho. ^b^Tampi dassana^eb^nti tampi tathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhidassanaṃ attānaṃ viya taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhavisesena gaṇhāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etaṃ mamā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Diṭṭhārammaṇā^eb^ti diṭṭhivisayā. Kathaṃ pana diṭṭhi diṭṭhivisayā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘vipassanāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paṭivipassanākāle^eb^ti yamakato sammasanādikālaṃ sandhāyāha. Tattha akkharacintakānaṃ sadde viya, vedajjhāyīnaṃ vedasatthe viya ca diṭṭhiyaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ diṭṭhiggāhappavatti daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^Samanupassatī^eb^ti padassa ca tasso samanupassanā atthoti yojanā. Tena samanupassanā nāma catubbidhāti dasseti. Tattha ñāṇaṃ tāva samavisamaṃ sammā yāthāvato anupassatīti ^b^samanupassanā^eb^. Itarā pana saṃkilesavasena anu anu passantīti ^b^samanupassanā^eb^. Yadi evaṃ hotu tāva diṭṭhisamanupassanā micchādassanabhāvato, kathaṃ taṇhāmānāti? Taṇhāyapi sattānaṃ pāpakaraṇe upāyadassanavasena paññāpatirūpikā pavatti labbhateva, yāya vañcananikatisāciyogā sambhavanti. Mānopi seyyādinā dassanavaseneva tathā attānaṃ ūhatīti taṇhāmānānaṃ samanupassanāpatirūpikā pavatti labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Avijjamāne^eb^ti ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’ti evaṃ gahetabbe taṇhāvatthusmiṃ ajjhattakhandhapañcake anupalabbhamāne vinaṭṭhe. ^b^Na paritassati^eb^ bhayaparittāsataṇhāparittāsānaṃ maggena samugghātitattā.

[03]^b^242^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catūhi kāraṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘asati na paritassatī’’ti vuttampi itarehi tīhi saha gahetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Catūhi kāraṇehī^eb^ti catukkoṭikasuññatākathanassa kāraṇehi. ^b^Bahiddhā asatī^eb^ti bāhire ^a^V2.0087^ea^ vatthusmiṃ avijjamāne. Sā panassa avijjamānatā laddhavināsena vā aladdhālābhena vāti pāḷiyaṃ – ‘‘ahu vata me, taṃ vata me natthi, siyā vata me, taṃ vatāhaṃ na labhāmī’’ti vuttanti tadubhayaṃ parikkhāravasena vibhajitvā tattha paritassanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bahiddhā parikkhāravināse’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^yānaṃ^eb^ ‘‘ratho vayha’’nti evamādi. ^b^Vāhanaṃ^eb^ hatthiassādi.

[03]^b^Yehi^eb^^a^M2.0092^ea^^b^kilesehī^eb^ti yehi asantapatthanādīhi kilesehi. ^b^Evaṃ bhaveyyā^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘ahu vata me’’tiādinā codanādi bhaveyya. ^b^Diṭṭhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānapariyuṭṭhānābhinivesānusayāna^eb^nti ettha aparāparaṃ pavattāsu diṭṭhīsu yā parato uppannā diṭṭhiyo, tāsaṃ purimuppannā diṭṭhiyo kāraṇaṭṭhena ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni^eb^. Adhikaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^diṭṭhādhiṭṭhānāni,^eb^ pariyuṭṭhānappattiyā sabbāpi ^b^diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānāni^eb^. ‘‘Idameva saccaṃ moghamañña’’nti (ma. ni. 2.202, 427; 3.27-29; udā. 55; mahāni. 20; netti. 59) pavattiyā ^b^abhinivesā^eb^. Appahīnabhāvena santāne sayantīti ^b^anusayā^eb^ti evaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānādīnaṃ padānaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Taṇhādīhi kampaniyatāya sabbasaṅkhārāva iñjitānīti ^b^sabbasaṅkhāraiñjitāni^eb^. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti upadhi, khandhāva upadhi ^b^khandhūpadhi^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tadeva ca āgamma taṇhā khīyati virajjati nirujjhatīti yojanā. ^b^Ucchijjissāmi nāmassū^eb^tiādīsu nipātamattaṃ, saṃsaye vā. ^b^Tāso^eb^ti attaniyābhāvaṃ paṭicca taṇhāparittāso ceva bhayaparittāso ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tāso heso’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^No cassaṃ,^eb^^b^no ca me siyā^eb^ti ‘‘aha’’nti kira koci no cassaṃ, ‘‘me’’ti ca kiñci no siyāti. Tāsappatīkāradassanañhetaṃ.

[03]^b^243^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ vutte’’tiādinā, pucchānusandhivasena pavattāya ‘‘chayimāni, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiṭṭhānānī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.241) vā. Sāpi hi ajjhattakhandhavināse paritassanakaṃ dassetvā aparitassanakaṃ dassentī pavattāti tassanakassa suññatādassanaṃ akiccasādhakampi suññatādassanamevāti imesaṃ vasena ^b^‘‘catukkoṭikā suññatā kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Bahiddhā parikkhāra^eb^nti bāhiraṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakañca sattopakaraṇaṃ. Tañhi jīvitavuttiyā parikkhārakaṭṭhena ‘‘parikkhāro’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pariggahaṃ nāma katvā^eb^ti ^b^‘‘mama^eb^ ida’’nti pariggahetabbatāya pariggahitaṃ nāma katvā. Sabbopi diṭṭhiggāho ‘‘attā nicco dhuvo sassato, attā ucchijjati vinassatī’’tiādinā attadiṭṭhisannissayoyevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukhā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo’’^eb^ti. Ayāthāvaggāhinā abhinivesanapaññāpanānaṃ upatthambhabhāvato diṭṭhi eva nissayoti ^b^diṭṭhinissayo. Pariggaṇheyyā^eb^ti niccādivisesayuttaṃ katvā ^a^V2.0088^ea^ pariggaṇheyya. Kimevaṃ pariggahetuṃ sakkuṇeyya ^a^M2.0093^ea^? ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti ‘‘taṃ, bhikkhave, attavādupādānaṃ upādiyetha, taṃ, bhikkhave, diṭṭhinissayaṃ nissayethā’’ti etesupi.

[03]^b^244^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Attani vā satī^eb^ti yassa attano santakabhāvena kiñci attaniyanti vucceyya, tasmiṃ attani sati, so eva pana attā paramatthato natthīti adhippāyo. Sakkā hi vattuṃ bāhirakaparikappito attā ‘‘paramattho’’ti? Siyā khandhapañcakaṃ ñeyyasabhāvattā yathā taṃ ghaṭo, yadi pana tadaññaṃ nāma kiñci abhavissa, na taṃ niyamato viparītaṃ siyāti? Na ca so paramatthato atthi pamāṇehi anupalabbhamānattā turaṅgamavisāṇaṃ viyāti. ^b^Attaniye vā parikkhāre satī^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ nāma attano santaka’’nti tassa kiñcanabhāvena nicchite kismiñci vatthusmiṃ sati. Attano idanti hi attaniyanti. ^b^Ahanti satī^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ nāmāya’’nti ahaṃkāravatthubhūte paramatthato niddhāritasarūpe kismiñci sati tassa santakabhāvena mamāti kiñci gahetuṃ yuttaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Mamāti sati ‘‘aha’’^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. Iti paramatthato attano anupalabbhamānattā attaniyaṃ kiñci paramatthato natthevāti sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ anattatāya anattaniyataṃ, anattaniyatāya ca anattakataṃ dasseti. ^b^Bhūtato^eb^ti bhūtatthato. ^b^Tathato^eb^ti tathasabhāvato. ^b^Thirato^eb^ti ṭhitasabhāvato nibbikārato.

[03]^b^Yasmā hutvā na hotī^eb^ti yasmā pubbe asantaṃ paccayasamavāyena hutvā uppajjitvā puna bhaṅgupagamena na hoti, tasmā na niccanti ^b^aniccaṃ,^eb^ adhuvanti attho. Tato eva ^b^uppādavayavattito^eb^ti uppajjanavasena nirujjhanavasena ca pavattanato. Sabhāvavigamo idha ^b^vipariṇāmo,^eb^ khaṇikatā ^b^tāvakālikatā,^eb^ niccasabhāvābhāvo ^b^eva niccapaṭikkhepo^eb^. Aniccadhammā hi teneva attano aniccabhāvena atthato niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘na niccanti anicca’’nti. Uppādajarābhaṅgavasena rūpassa nirantarabādhatāti paṭipīḷanākārenassa ^b^dukkhatā. Santāpo^eb^ dukkhadukkhatādivasena santāpanaṃ paridahanaṃ, tato evassa dussahatāya ^b^dukkhamatā^eb^. Tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānatāya ^b^dukkhavatthukatā^eb^. Sukhasabhāvābhāvo eva ^b^sukhapaṭikkhepo^eb^. ^b^Vipariṇāmadhamma^eb^nti jarāya maraṇena ca vipariṇamanasabhāvaṃ. Yasmā idaṃ rūpaṃ paccayasamavāyena ^a^M2.0094^ea^ uppādaṃ, uppādānantaraṃ jaraṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati, bhinnañca bhinnameva, nāssa kassaci saṅkamoti bhavantarānupagamanasaṅkhātena saṅkamābhāvena vipariṇāmadhammataṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘bhavasaṅkanti upagamanasabhāva’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pakatibhāvavijahanaṃ^eb^ sabhāvavigamo nirujjhanameva. Nti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ rūpaṃ. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘no hetaṃ, bhante’’ti rūpassa taṇhādiggāhānaṃ vatthubhāvapaṭikkhepena. Rūpañhi uppannaṃ ṭhitiṃ ^a^V2.0089^ea^ mā pāpuṇātu, ṭhitippattaṃ mā jīratu, jarappattaṃ mā bhijjatu, udayabbayehi mā kilamiyatūti na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo atthi, svāyamassa avasavattanaṭṭho anattatāsallakkhaṇassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘avasavattanākārena rūpaṃ, bhante, anattāti paṭijānantī’’^eb^ti. Nivāsikārakavedakādhiṭṭhāyakavirahena tato suññatā ^b^suññaṭṭho,^eb^ sāmibhūtassa kassaci abhāvo ^b^assāmikaṭṭho,^eb^ yathāvuttavasavattibhāvābhāvo ^b^anissaraṭṭho,^eb^ paraparikappitāttasabhāvābhāvo eva ^b^attapaṭikkhepaṭṭho^eb^.

[03]Yasmā aniccalakkhaṇena viya dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, tadubhayena anattalakkhaṇaṃ suviññāpayaṃ, na kevalaṃ, tasmā tadubhayenettha anattalakkhaṇavibhāvanaṃ katanti dassento ^b^‘‘bhagavā hī’’ti^eb^ādimāha. Tattha ^b^aniccavasenā^eb^ti aniccatāvasena. ^b^Dukkhavasenā^eb^ti dukkhatāvasena. ^b^Na upapajjatī^eb^ti na yujjati. Tameva ayujjamānataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhussa uppādopī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā attavādī attānaṃ niccaṃ paññapeti, cakkhuṃ pana aniccaṃ, tasmā cakkhu viya attāpi anicco āpanno. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yassa kho panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^vetī^eb^ti vigacchati nirujjhati. ^b^Iti cakkhu anattā^eb^ti cakkhussa udayabbayavantatāya aniccatā, attano ca attavādinā aniccatāya anicchitattā cakkhu anattā.

[03]Kāmaṃ ^b^anattalakkhaṇasutte^eb^ (saṃ. ni. 3.59; mahāva. 20) – ‘‘yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā, tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattatī’’ti rūpassa anattatāya dukkhatā vibhāvitā viya dissati, tathāpi ‘‘yasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, tasmā anattā’’ti pākaṭatāya sābādhatāya rūpassa attasārābhāvo vibhāvito, tato eva ca ‘‘na labbhati rūpe evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī’’ti rūpe kassaci anissaratā, tassa ca avasavattanākāro dassitoti āha ^b^‘‘dukkhavasena anattataṃ^eb^^a^M2.0095^ea^^b^dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha^eb^nti yaṃ vatthu aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā, yaṃ pana niccaṃ tadabhāvato, taṃ sukhaṃ yathā taṃ nibbānanti adhippāyo. ^b^Yaṃ ta^eb^nti kāraṇaniddesovāyaṃ, yasmā rūpaṃ aniccaṃ, taṃ tasmāti attho. ^b^Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā^eb^ti ettha vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ^b^Anicca^eb^nti iminā ghaṭādi viya paccayuppannattā rūpaṃ aniccanti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Imināva nayena ‘‘anattā’’ti vattuṃ labbhamānepi ^b^‘‘anattā’’ti vattā nāma natthi. Evaṃ dukkhanti vadantī^eb^ti etthāpi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ ‘‘akkhisūlādivikārappattakāle viya paccayuppannattā dukkhaṃ rūpa’’ntiādinā. ^b^Duddasaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ^eb^. Tathā hi sarabhaṅgādayopi satthāro nāddasaṃsu, kuto paññāpanā. ^b^Tayidaṃ^eb^ anattalakkhaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Tasmātihā^eb^tiādinā ^a^V2.0090^ea^ tiyaddhagatarūpaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘etarahi aññadāpī’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana yādisaṃ tādisampi tathā vuttanti ajjhattādivisesopi vattabbo. ^b^Pi^eb^-saddena vā tassāpi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^245^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ukkaṇṭhatī^eb^ti nābhiramati. Aññattha ‘‘nibbidā’’ti balavavipassanā vuccati, sānulomā pana saṅkhārupekkhā ‘‘vuṭṭhānagāminī’’ti, sā idha kathaṃ nibbidā nāma jātāti āha ^b^‘‘vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hī’’^eb^tiādi. Iminā sikhāpattanibbedatāya vuṭṭhānagāminī idha nibbidānāmena vuttāti dasseti.

[03]‘‘So anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusatī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.414, 415) vatvā ‘‘saññā kho poṭṭhapāda paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇa’’nti (dī. ni. 1.416) vuttattā ^b^saññagganti vuttā^eb^ lokiyāsu pahānasaññāsu sikhāpattabhāvato. ^b^Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuttā^eb^ idappaccayatādassanassa matthakappattīti katvā. Tato parañhi asaṅkhatārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti. Tenāha – ‘‘pubbe kho susima dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa’’nti (saṃ. ni. 2.70). ^b^Pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅganti vuttā^eb^ maggādhigamassa paripanthabhūtasabbasaṃkilesavisuddhi padhānikassa yogino, padhānabhāvanāya vā jātaṃ aṅganti katvā. ^b^Paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttā^eb^ paramukkaṃsagatapaṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhibhāvato. ^b^Atammayata^eb^nti ettha ^b^tammayatā nāma^eb^ taṇhā, kāmataṇhādīsu tāya tāya nibbattattā tammayaṃ nāma tebhūmikappavattaṃ, tassa ^a^M2.0096^ea^ bhāvoti katvā. Tassā taṇhāya pariyādānato vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā ^b^atammayatā^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Nissāyā^eb^ti taṃ atammayataṃ paccayaṃ katvā. ^b^Āgammā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Nānattā^eb^ti nānāsabhāvā bahū anekappakārā. ^b^Nānattasitā^eb^ti nānārammaṇanissitā rūpādivisayā. ^b^Ekattā^eb^ti ekasabhāvā. ^b^Ekattasitā^eb^ti ekaṃyeva ārammaṇaṃ nissitā. ^b^Taṃ nissāyā^eb^ti taṃ ekattasitaṃ upekkhaṃ paccayaṃ katvā. ^b^Etissā^eb^ti etissā upekkhāya. ^b^Pahānaṃ hotī^eb^ti aññāṇupekkhato pabhuti sabbaṃ upekkhaṃ pajahitvā ṭhitassa ‘‘atammayatā’’ti vuttāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya arūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhāya vipassanupekkhāya ca pahānaṃ hotīti ^b^pariyādānanti vuttā^eb^ti. Sabbasaṅkhāragatassa muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhānassa sikhāpattabhāvato vuṭṭhānagāminī muñcitukamyatā paṭisaṅkhānanti ca vuttā. Mudumajjhādivasena pavattiākāramattaṃ, atthato ^a^V2.0091^ea^^b^ekatthā^eb^ muñcitukamyatādayo, ^b^byañjanameva nānaṃ. Dvīhi nāmehī^eb^ti gotrabhu, vodānanti imehi dvīhi nāmehi.

[03]^b^Virāgoti maggo,^eb^ accantameva virajjati etenāti ^b^virāgo,^eb^ tena. ^b^Maggena^eb^ hetubhūtena. ^b^Vimuccatī^eb^ti paṭippassaddhivimuttivasena vimuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘phalaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Mahākhīṇāsavo^eb^ti pasaṃsāvacanaṃ yathā ‘‘mahārājā’’ti. Tathā hi taṃ pasaṃsanto satthā ^b^‘‘ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho itipī’’^eb^tiādimāhāti. Tadatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘idāni tassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Yathābhūtehī^eb^ti yāthāvato bhūtehi. ^b^Durukkhipanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti pacurajanehi ukkhipituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena. Nibbānanagarappavese vibandhanena paligho viyāti ^b^palighoti vuccati^eb^. Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ anaṅgato tālāvatthu asive ‘‘sivā’’ti samaññā viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīsacchinnatālo viya katā’’^eb^ti. Punabbhavassa karaṇasīlo, punabbhavaṃ vā phalaṃ arahatīti ^b^ponobhaviko^eb^. Evaṃbhūto pana punabbhavaṃ deti nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘punabbhavadāyako’’^eb^ti. ^b^Punabbhavakhandhānaṃ paccayo^eb^ti iminā jātisaṃsāroti phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ vuttanti dasseti. ^b^Parikkhāti vuccati^eb^ santānassa parikkhipanato. ^b^Saṃkiṇṇattā^eb^ti sabbaso kiṇṇattā vināsitattā. ^b^Gabbhīrānugataṭṭhenā^eb^ti gambhīraṃ anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena. ^b^Luñcitvā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0097^ea^ uddharitvā. ^b^Etānī^eb^ti kāmarāgasaññojanādīni. ^b^Aggaḷāti vuccanti^eb^ avadhāraṇaṭṭhena. Aggamaggena patito mānaddhajo etassāti ^b^patitamānaddhajo^eb^. Itarabhāroropanassa purimapadehi pakāsitattā ^b^‘‘mānabhārasseva oropitattā pannabhāroti adhippeto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Mānasaṃyogeneva visaṃyuttattā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañcapi khandhe avisesato asmīti gahetvā pavattamāno ‘‘asmimāno’’ti adhippetoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpe asmīti māno’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Nagaradvārassa parissayapaṭibāhanatthañceva sobhanatthañca ubhosu passesu esikatthambhe nikhaṇitvā ṭhapentīti āha ^b^‘‘nagaradvāre ussāpite esikatthambhe’’^eb^ti. Pākāraviddhaṃsaneneva parikkhāya bhūmisamakaraṇaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘pākāraṃ bhindanto parikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eva^eb^ntiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Santo saṃvijjamāno kāyo dhammasamūhoti ^b^sakkāyo,^eb^ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. ^b^Dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇā^eb^ dukkhakkhandhe āgatā. Akkhirogasīsarogādayo ^b^aṭṭhanavuti rogā^eb^. Rājabhayādīni ^b^pañcavīsati mahābhayāni^eb^.

[03]^b^246^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anadhigamanīyaviññāṇata^eb^nti ^a^V2.0092^ea^ ‘‘idaṃ nāma nissāya iminā nāma ākārena pavattatī’’ti evaṃ duviññeyyacittataṃ. ^b^Anvesa^eb^nti paccatte ekavacananti āha ^b^‘‘anvesanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sattopi tathāgatoti vuccati^eb^ ‘‘tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.65) viya. Satto hi yatheko kammakilesehi itthattaṃ āgato, tathā aparopi āgatoti ‘‘tathāgato’’ti vuccati. ^b^Uttamapuggalo^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Khīṇāsavopī^eb^ti yo koci khīṇāsavopi ‘‘tathāgato’’ti adhippeto. Sopi hi yatheko catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu sūpaṭṭhitacitto satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ arahattaṃ āgato adhigato, tathā aparopi āgatoti ‘‘tathāgato’’ti vuccati. ^b^Asaṃvijjamāno^eb^ti paramatthato anupalabbhanīyo. ^b^Avindeyyo^eb^ti na vinditabbo, duviññeyyoti attho.

[03]^b^Tathāgato satto puggaloti na paññapemi^eb^ paramatthato sattasseva abhāvatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Kiṃ paññapessāmi^eb^ paññattiupādānassapi dharamānakassa ^a^M2.0098^ea^ abhāvato. ‘‘Anuppādo khemaṃ, anuppatti khema’’ntiādinā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā pakkhandhanavasena pavattaṃ aggaphalasamāpattiatthaṃ ^b^vipassanācittaṃ vā^eb^.

[03]^b^Tucchā^eb^ti karaṇe nissakkavacananti āha ^b^‘‘tucchakenā’’^eb^ti. Vinayatīti vinayo, so eva ^b^venayiko. Tathā ma^eb^nti tathābhūtaṃ maṃ. Paramatthato vijjamānassa hi sattassa abhāvaṃ vadanto sattavināsapaññāpako ca nāma siyā, ahaṃ pana paramatthato avijjamānaṃ taṃ ‘‘natthī’’ti vadāmi. Yathā ca loko voharati, tatheva taṃ voharāmi, tathābhūtaṃ maṃ ye samaṇabrāhmaṇā ‘‘venayiko samaṇo gotamo’’ti vadantā asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantīti yojanā. Appaṭisandhikassa khīṇāsavassa carimacittaṃ nirupādānato anupādāno viya jātavedo parinibbutaṃ idaṃ nāma nissitanti na paññāyatīti vadanto kimettāvatā ucchedavādī bhaveyya, nāhaṃ kadācipi atthi, nāpi koci atthīti vadāmi. Evaṃ sante kiṃ nissāya te moghapurisā sato sattassa nāma ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapetīti vadantā asatā…pe… abbhācikkhantīti ayamettha adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Mahābodhimaṇḍamhīti bodhimaṇḍa^eb^ggahaṇena sattasattāhamāha. Tena dhammacakkapavattanato (saṃ. ni. 5.1081; mahāva. 13; paṭi. ma. 2.30) pubbe vuttaṃ tantidesanaṃ vadati ^a^V2.0093^ea^. ^b^Catusaccameva paññapemī^eb^ti etena saccavimuttā satthudesanā natthīti dasseti. Ettha ca – ‘‘pubbe ceva etarahi ca dukkhañceva paññapemi dukkhassa ca nirodha’’nti vadanto bhagavā nāhaṃ kadācipi ‘‘attā ucchijjati, vinassatī’’ti vā, ‘‘attā nāma koci atthī’’ti vā vadāmi. Evaṃ sante kiṃ nissāya te moghapurisā ‘‘sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapetī’’ti asatā tucchena abbhācikkhantīti dasseti. ^b^Pare^eb^ti amāmakā, mama ovādassa abhājanabhūtāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘saccāni…pe… asamatthapuggalā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Adhippāyenā^eb^ti iminā tesaṃ adhippāyamattaṃ, rosanavihesanāni pana tathāgatassa ākāsassa vilikhanaṃ viya na sambhavantiyevāti dasseti. Āhanati cittanti ^b^āghāto^eb^. Appatītā honti etenāti ^b^appaccayo^eb^. Cittaṃ na abhirādhayatīti ^b^anabhiraddhi. Atuṭṭhī^eb^ti tuṭṭhipaṭipakkho tathāpavatto cittuppādo, kodho eva vā.

[03]^b^Pare^eb^ti ^a^M2.0099^ea^ aññe ekacce. Ānandanti pamodanti etenāti ^b^ānando,^eb^ pītiyā evetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sobhanamanatā ^b^somanassaṃ,^eb^ cetasikasukhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Uppilati purimāvatthāya bhijjati visesaṃ āpajjatīti uppilaṃ, tadeva uppilāvitaṃ, tassa bhāvo ^b^uppilāvitattaṃ^eb^. Yāya uppannāya kāyacittaṃ vātapūritabhattā viya uddhumāyanākārappattaṃ hoti, tassā gehassitāya odaggiyapītiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā^eb^ti dukkhameva uppajjati nirujjhati ca, na añño satto nāma atthīti evaṃ jānituṃ asamatthā ‘‘attā nāma atthī’’ti evaṃdiṭṭhino appahīnavipallāsā. Uttamaṃ pasādanīyaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^tathāgatampi akkosanti,^eb^ kimaṅgaṃ pana bhikkhūti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^247^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anattaniyepi khandhapañcake micchāgāhavasena attaniyasaññāya pavattassa chandarāgassa pahānaṃ. ^b^Amhākaṃ neva attā^eb^ti yasmā rūpavedanādiyeva attaggāhavatthu tabbinimuttassa lobhaneyyassa abhāvato. Etaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ na amhākaṃ rūpaṃ, na viññāṇaṃ, tasmā amhākaṃ neva attāti yojanā. Ajjhattikassa vatthuno neva attāti paṭikkhittattā bāhiravatthu attaniyabhāvena paṭikkhittaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘amhākaṃ cīvarādiparikkhāropi na hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Khandhapañcakaṃyevā^eb^ti bāhiravatthuṃ nidassanaṃ katvā khandhapañcakaṃyeva ^b^na tumhākanti pajahāpeti. Na uppāṭetvā^eb^ kandaṃ viya. ^b^Na luñcitvā vā^eb^ kese viyāti. Iminā rūpādīnaṃ nāmamukhena pahānaṃ icchanti. Ulliṅgitamatthaṃ ^b^chandarāgavinayena pajahāpetī^eb^ti sarūpato dasseti.

[03]^b^248^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Taṃ ^a^V2.0094^ea^ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā’’tiādi desanā ^b^tiparivaṭṭaṃ. Yāva imaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti ‘‘evaṃ svākkhāto’’ti yāvāyaṃ pāḷipadeso. Suviññeyyabhāvena akkhātattāpi ^b^svākkhāto^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sukathitattā eva uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito’’^eb^ti. Tiriyaṃ vidāraṇena ^b^chinnaṃ,^eb^ dīghaso phālanena ^b^bhinnaṃ,^eb^ tato eva tattha tattha sibbitagaṇṭhikatajiṇṇavatthaṃ pilotikā, tadabhāvato ^b^chinnapilotiko,^eb^ pilotikarahitoti attho. Iriyāpatha-saṇṭhapanāvijjamānajhāna-vipassanāni chinnāya avijjamānāya paṭipattiyā sibbanagaṇṭhikaraṇasadisāni, tādisaṃ idha natthīti āha ^b^‘‘na hettha…pe… atthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhatī^eb^ti pesalehi ^a^M2.0100^ea^ saddhiṃ saṃvāsavasenapi patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati, visesādhigamavasena pana vattabbameva natthi.

[03]^b^Kāraṇḍavaṃ niddhamathā^eb^ti vipannasīlatāya kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva nirapekkhā apanetha. ^b^Kasambuñcāpakassathā^eb^ti kasaṭabhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhagataṃ sambhinnaṃ paggharitakuṭṭhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ viya apakassatha nikkaḍḍhatha. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Saṅghārāmo nāma sīlavantānaṃ kato, na dussīlānaṃ, yato etadeva. ^b^Tato palāpe vāhetha, assamaṇe samaṇamānine^eb^ti yathā palāpā antosārarahitā ataṇḍulā bahi thusena vīhi viya dissanti, evaṃ pāpabhikkhū antosīlarahitāpi bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti, tasmā ‘‘palāpā’’ti vuccanti, te palāpe vāhetha odhunātha vidhamatha. Paramatthato assamaṇe vesamattena samaṇamānine evaṃ ^b^niddhamitvāna…pe…^eb^^b^patissatā^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^kappayavho^eb^ti kappetha, karothāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Patissatā^eb^ti pati pati satā sampajānantā suṭṭhu pajānantā. ^b^Patissatā^eb^ vā sappatissā aññamaññaṃ sagāravā. Athevaṃ suddhā suddhehi saṃvāsaṃ kappentā diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena ^b^samaggā^eb^. Anukkamena paripākagatapaññatāya ^b^nipakā^eb^. Sabbassevimassa dukkhavaṭṭassa ^b^antaṃ karissatha,^eb^ parinibbānaṃ pāpuṇissathāti attho.
[03]^b^Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ natthi paññāpanāya^eb^ sabbaso samucchinnavaṭṭamūlakattā.

[03]Dhammaṃ anussaranti, dhammassa vā anussaraṇasīlāti ^b^dhammānusārino^eb^. Evaṃ ^b^saddhānusārino^eb^pi veditabbā. ^b^Paṭipannassā^eb^ti paṭipajjamānassa, sotāpattimaggaṭṭhopi adhippeto. ^b^Adhimatta^eb^nti balavaṃ. ^b^Paññāvāhī^eb^ti paññaṃ vāheti, paññā vā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti paññāvāhītipi vadanti. ^b^Paññāpubbaṅgama^eb^nti paññaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussaratīti ^b^dhammānusārī^eb^. ^b^Saddhāvāhī^eb^ti saddhaṃ vāheti, saddhā vā ^a^V2.0095^ea^ imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti saddhāvāhītipi vadanti. ^b^Saddhāpubbaṅgama^eb^nti saddhaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhāya sarati anussaratīti saddhānusārī. ^b^Saddhāmatta^eb^nti ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinā buddhasubuddhatāya saddahanamattaṃ. Matta-saddena aveccappasādaṃ nivatteti. ^b^Pemamatta^eb^nti yathāvuttasaddhānusārena uppannaṃ tuṭṭhimattaṃ. Sinehoti keci. ^b^Evaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnānanti^eb^^a^M2.0101^ea^ kalāpasammasanādivasena āraddhavipassanānaṃ. ^b^Ekā saddhā^eb^ti vipassanānusārena svākkhātadhammatā siddhā, tato eva ekā seṭṭhā uḷārā saddhā uppajjati. ^b^Ekaṃ pema^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Sagge ṭhapitā viya hontī^eb^ti tesaṃ saddhāpemānaṃ saggasaṃvattaniyatāya abyabhicārībhāvamāha. ^b^Cūḷasotāpannoti vadanti^eb^ ekadesena saccānubodhe ṭhitattā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Alagaddūpamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^249^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Piyavacana^eb^nti ^a^V2.0096^ea^ piyasamudācāro. Viññujātikā hi paraṃ piyena samudācarantā ‘‘bhava’’nti vā, ‘‘devānaṃ piyo’’ti vā, ‘‘āyasmā’’ti vā samudācaranti, tasmā sammukhā sambodhanavasena ‘‘āvuso’’ti, tirokkhaṃ ‘‘āyasmā’’ti ayampi samudācāro. Mahākassapauruvelakassapādayo aññepi kassapanāmakā atthīti ^b^‘‘katarassa kassapassā’’^eb^ti pucchanti. ^b^Raññā^eb^ti kosalaraññā. ^b^‘‘Sañjāniṃsū’’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti kumārakassapassa, ‘‘sañjāniṃsū’’ti vuttasañjānanassa vā. ^b^Puññāni karonto^eb^ti kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca nibbattitvā dānādīni puññāni bhāvento. ^b^Osakkante^eb^ti parihāyamāne. ^b^Paṭhama^eb^nti kumārikākāle. ^b^Satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi^eb^ taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinayakammenevassā bhikkhuniyā pabbajjāya arogabhāvaṃ.

[03]^b^Paññattivibhāvanā^eb^ti ‘‘andhavana’’ntveva paññāyamānassa vibhāvanā. ^b^Olīyatī^eb^ti saṅkucati saṇikaṃ vattati. ^b^Bhāṇako^eb^ti sarabhāṇako. ^b^Yaṃ atthi, taṃ gahetvā^eb^ti idāni pariyesitabbaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, yathāgataṃ pana yaṃ atthi, taṃ gahetvā. ^b^Balavaguṇe^eb^ti adhimattaguṇe. Kassapabhagavato kāle niruḷhasamaññāvasena vacanasantatiyā avicchedena ca imasmimpi buddhuppāde taṃ ‘‘andhavana’’ntveva paññāyittha, uparūparivaḍḍhamānāya pathaviyā upari rukkhagacchādīsu sañjāyantesupīti. ^b^Sekkhapaṭipada^eb^nti sekkhabhāvāvahaṃ visuddhipaṭipattiṃ.

[03]^b^Aññatara^eb^-saddo ^a^M2.0102^ea^ apākaṭe viya pākaṭepi vattati eka-saddena samānatthattāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abhijānātī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhayabheravadassitampi abhikkanta-saddassa atthuddhāraṃ idha dassento evaṃ heṭṭhā tattha tattha katā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā parato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ suttapadese yathārahaṃ vattabbāti nayadassanaṃ karoti. Kañcanasannibhattacatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘chaviya’’^eb^nti. Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇo’’ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare. Vaṇṇīyati kittīyati ugghosananti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ thuti. Vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarato vavatthapīyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ kulavaggo. Vaṇṇīyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāvīyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇanaṃ dīgharassādivasena saṇṭhahananti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ saṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati aṇumahantādivasena pamīyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāramāpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti ^a^V2.0097^ea^^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ rūpāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena vaṇṇa-saddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe pavatti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Anavasesattaṃ^eb^ sakalatā kevalatā. ^b^Kevalakappā^eb^ti ettha keci īsaṃ asamattā kevalā kevalakappāti vadanti, evaṃ sati anavasesattho eva kevala-saddo siyā. Anatthantarena pana kappa-saddena padavaḍḍhanaṃ katvā kevalā eva kevalakappā. Tathā vā kappanīyattā paññapetabbattā kevalakappā. ^b^Yebhuyyatā^eb^ bahulabhāvo. ^b^Abyāmissatā^eb^ vijātiyena asaṅkaro suddhatā. ^b^Anatirekatā^eb^ taṃmattatā visesābhāvo. ^b^Kevalakappa^eb^nti kevalaṃ daḷhaṃ katvāti attho. Kevalaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavivittattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘visaṃyogādianekattho’’^eb^ti. Kevalaṃ etassa adhigataṃ atthīti ^b^kevalī,^eb^ sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo.

[03]^b^Kappa-saddo^eb^ panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappanīyapade labbhamānaṃ okappasaddamattaṃ nidasseti, aññathā kappa-saddassa atthuddhāre okappanīyapadaṃ anidassanameva siyā. ^b^Samaṇakappehī^eb^ti vinayasiddhehi ^a^M2.0103^ea^ samaṇavohārehi. ^b^Niccakappa^eb^nti niccakālaṃ. ^b^Paññattī^eb^ti nāmaṃ. Nāmañhetaṃ tassa āyasmato, yadidaṃ kappoti. ^b^Kappitakesamassū^eb^ti kattarikāya cheditakesamassu. ^b^Dvaṅgulakappo^eb^ti majjhanhikavelāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgulatāvikappo. ^b^Leso^eb^ti apadeso. Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā, ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahitoti āha ^b^‘‘anavasesaṃ samantato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Samaṇasaññāsamudācārenā^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ samaṇo’’ti evaṃ uppannasaññāsamuṭṭhitena samudācārena, tannimittena vā tabbohārena. ^b^Pubbayoge^eb^ti pubbayogakathāyaṃ. ^b^Papañco esā^eb^ti eso tumhesu āgatesu yathāpavatto paṭisanthāro kathāsamudācāro ca amhākaṃ papañco. Ettakampi akatvā samaṇadhammameva karomāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Ariyabhūmiṃ patto^eb^ti anāgāmiphalaṃ adhigato. Pakkusātikulaputtaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Vibhajitvā^eb^ti vibhāgaṃ katvā. ^b^Turitālapanavasenā^eb^ti turitaṃ ālapanavasena. Tena dullabho ayaṃ samaṇo, tasmā sīghamassa pañho kathetabbo, iminā ca sīghaṃ gantvā satthā pucchitabboti turitaṃ ālapīti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Yathā vā’’^eb^tiādinā pana vacanālaṅkāravasena dvikkhattuṃ ālapati. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘bhikkhu bhikkhū’’ti evaṃ dvikkhattuṃ avoca.

[03]Vammikapariyāyena ^a^V2.0098^ea^ karajakāyaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā dassentī devatā ^b^‘‘ayaṃ vammiko’’^eb^ti āha. Tāya pana bhāvatthassa abhāsitattā saddatthameva dassento ^b^‘‘purato ṭhitaṃ…pe… ayanti āhā’’^eb^ti avoca. Sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Maṇḍūka^eb^nti thalamaṇḍūkaṃ. So hi uddhumāyikāti vuccati, na udakamaṇḍūko. Tassa nivāsato vāto mā kho bādhayitthāti ^b^‘‘uparivātato apagammā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ devatā iminā nīhārena ime pañhe therassa ācikkhīti? Keci tāva āhu – yathāsutamatthaṃ upamābhāvena gahetvā attano paṭibhānena upameyyatthaṃ manasā cintetvā taṃ bhagavāva imassa ācikkhissati. Sā ca desanā atthāya hitāya sukhāya hotīti ‘‘ayaṃ vammiko’’tiādinā upamāvaseneva pannarasa pañhe therassa ācikkhi. Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kira bārāṇasiyaṃ eko seṭṭhi aḍḍho mahaddhano mahantaṃ nidhānaṃ ^a^M2.0104^ea^ nidahitvā palighādiākārāni kānicipi laṅgāni tattha ṭhapesi. So maraṇakāle attano sahāyassa brāhmaṇassa ārocesi – ‘‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne mayā nidhānaṃ nidahitaṃ, taṃ mama puttassa viññutaṃ pattassa dassetī’’ti vatvā kālamakāsi. Brāhmaṇo sahāyakaputtassa viññutaṃ pattakāle taṃ ṭhānaṃ dassesi. So nikhanitvā sabbapacchā nāgaṃ passi, nāgo attano puttaṃ disvā ‘‘sukheneva dhanaṃ gaṇhatū’’ti apagacchi. Svāyamattho tadā loke pākaṭo jāto. Ayaṃ pana devatā tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute uraṃ datvā sāsane pabbajito pañcahi sahāyakabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samaṇadhammamakāsi. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘pañca bhikkhū nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā’’tiādi. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘yathāsutamatthaṃ upamābhāvena gahetvā’’tiādi. Apare pana ‘‘devatā attano paṭibhānena ime pañhe evaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā therassa ācikkhī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Devaputte nissakkaṃ^eb^ devaputtapañhattā tassa atthassa.

[03]^b^251^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbattoti ^b^cātumahābhūtiko^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catumahābhūtamayassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vamati^eb^ uggiranto viya hotīti attho. ^b^Vantako^eb^ti ucchaḍḍako. ^b^Vantussayo^eb^ti upacikāhi vantassa mattikāpiṇḍassa ussayabhūto. ^b^Vantasinehasambaddho^eb^ti vantena kheḷasinehena sampiṇḍito. ^b^Asucikalimalaṃ vamatī^eb^ti ettha mukhādīhi pāṇakānaṃ niggamanato pāṇake vamatīti ayampi attho labbhateva. ^b^Ariyehi vantako^eb^ti kāyabhāvasāmaññena vuttaṃ. Dukkhasaccapariññāya vā sabbassapi tebhūmakadhammajātassa pariññātattā sabbopi kāyo ariyehi chandarāgappahānena vanto eva. ^b^Taṃ sabba^eb^nti yehi tīhi aṭṭhisatehi ussito, yehi nhārūhi sambaddho, yehi maṃsehi avalitto, yena allacammena pariyonaddho, yāya chaviyā rañjito, taṃ aṭṭhiādisabbaṃ accantameva jigucchitvā virattatāyavantameva. ^b^‘‘Yathā cā’’^eb^tiādinā vattabbopamatopi vammiko viya vammikoti imamatthaṃ dasseti.

[03]Sambhavati ^a^V2.0099^ea^ etasmāti sambhavo, mātāpettiko sambhavo etassāti ^b^mātāpettikasambhavo^eb^. Tassa. Upaciyati etenāti upacayo’ odanakummāsaṃ upacayo etassāti ^b^odanakummāsūpacayo^eb^. Tassa. Adhuvasabhāvatāya ^a^M2.0105^ea^^b^aniccadhammassa,^eb^ sedagūtha-pitta-semhādi-dhātukkhobha-garubhāvaduggandhānaṃ vinodanāya ^b^ucchādetabbadhammassa,^eb^ parito sambāhanena ^b^parimadditabbadhammassa,^eb^ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvatāya ^b^bhedanadhammassa,^eb^ tato eva vikiraṇasabhāvatāya ^b^viddhaṃsanadhammassā^eb^ti dhamma-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. ^b^Tanuvilepanenā^eb^ti kāyāvalepanena ucchādanavilepanena. ^b^Aṅgapaccaṅgābādhavinodanatthāyā^eb^ti tādisasamuṭṭhāna-sarīravikāravigamāya. Yasmā sukkasoṇitaṃ āhāro, ucchādanaṃ parimaddanañca yathārahaṃ uppādassa, vuḍḍhiyā ca paccayo, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘mātāpettika…pe… kathito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uccāvacabhāvo^eb^ti yathārahaṃ yojetabbo – odanakummāsūpacaya-ucchādanaparimaddanaggahaṇehi ^b^uccabhāvo, vaḍḍhī^eb^. Mātāpettikasambhavaggahaṇena ^b^samudayo^eb^. Itarehi ^b^avacabhāvo, parihāni, atthaṅgamo^eb^ pakāsito. Aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ saṇṭhapanampi hi vaṭṭapaccayattā vaṭṭanti.

[03]^b^Kodho^eb^ dhūmoti ettha dhūmapariyāyena kodhassa vuttattā dhūma-saddo kodhe vattatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhūmo viya dhūmo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhasmanī^eb^ti ^b^bhasmaṃ. Mosavajja^eb^nti musāvādo. Dhūmo eva ^b^dhūmāyitaṃ^eb^. Icchā dhūmāyitaṃ etissāti ^b^icchādhūmāyitā,^eb^ pajā. Icchādhūmāyitasaddassa taṇhāya vutti vuttanayo eva. ^b^Dhūmāyanto^eb^ti vitakkasantāpena saṃtappento, vitakkentoti attho. ^b^Palipo^eb^ti dukkaramahākaddamaṃ. ^b^Timūla^eb^nti tīhi mūlehi patiṭṭhitaṃ viya acalaṃ pavattanti vuttaṃ. ^b^Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsitā^eb^ti rajasabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ‘‘rajo’’ti ca dhūmasabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ‘‘dhūmo’’ti ca mayā pakāsitā. ^b^Pakatidhūmo^eb^ viya aggissa kilesaggijālassa paññāṇabhāvato. ^b^Dhammadesanādhūmo^eb^ ñāṇaggisandhīpanassa pubbaṅgamabhāvato. ^b^Ayaṃ rattiṃ dhūmāyanā^eb^ti yā divā kattabbakammante uddissa rattiyaṃ anuvitakkanā, ayaṃ rattiṃ dhūmāyanā.

[03]^b^Sattannaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti idaṃ sutte (cūḷani. mettagūmāṇavapucchāniddesa 28) āgatanayena vuttaṃ. Suttañca tathā ārādhanaveneyyajjhāsayavasena. Tadekaṭṭhatāya vā tadaññakilesānaṃ. ^b^Sundarapañño^eb^ti ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāya paññāya sundarapañño.

[03]^b^Eta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0106^ea^ ‘‘sattha’’nti etaṃ ^b^adhivacanaṃ^eb^ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ sasanato samucchindanato. Nti vīriyaṃ. ^b^Paññāgatikameva^eb^ paññāya hitasseva adhippetattā. Lokiyāya paññāya ārambhakāle lokiyavīriyaṃ ^a^V2.0100^ea^ gahetabbaṃ, lokuttarāya paññāya pavattikkhaṇe lokuttaravīriyaṃ gahetabbanti yojanā. ^b^Atthadīpanā^eb^ti upameyyatthadīpanī upamā.

[03]^b^Gāmato^eb^ti attano vasanagāmato. ^b^Mante^eb^ti āthabbanamante. Te hi brāhmaṇā araññe eva vācenti ‘‘mā aññe assosu’’nti. ^b^Tathā akāsī^eb^ti cattāro koṭṭhāse akāsi. Evamettha vammikapañhasseva vasena upamā āgatā, sesānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā vuttanayena veditabbā.

[03]Laṅganaṭṭhena nivāraṇaṭṭhena ^b^laṅgī,^eb^ paligho. ^b^Ñāṇamukhe^eb^ti vipassanāñāṇavīthiyaṃ. ^b^Patatī^eb^ti pavattati. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasenā^eb^ti catusaccakammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanena tassa atthaparipucchāvasena ceva vipassanāsaṅkhāta-atthavinicchaya-paripucchāvasena ca. Sabbaso ñātuṃ icchā hi paripucchā. Vipassanā ca aniccādito sabbatebhūmakadhammānaṃ ñātuṃ icchati. Evaṃ vipassanāvasena avijjāpahānamāha, uparikattabbasabbhāvato na tāva maggavasena.

[03]^b^Valliantare vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo paṃsuantare vā mattikantare vāti avuttavikappattho. ^b^Cittāvilamattakovā^eb^ti cittakkhobhamattakova. ^b^Aniggahito^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhānabalena anivārito. ^b^Mukhavikulanaṃ^eb^ mukhasaṅkoco. ^b^Hanusañcopanaṃ pāpeti^eb^ antojappanāvatthāyaṃ. ^b^Disā vilokanaṃ pāpeti^eb^ yattha bādhetabbo ṭhito, taṃdassanatthaṃ nivārakaparivāraṇatthaṃ. ^b^Daṇḍasatthābhinipāta^eb^nti daṇḍasatthānaṃ parassa upari nipātanāvatthaṃ. Yena kodhena aniggahitena mātādikaṃ aghātetabbaṃ ugghātetvā ‘‘ayuttaṃ vata mayā kata’’nti attānampi hanati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paraghātanampi attaghātanampi pāpetī’’^eb^ti. Yena vā parassa haññamānassa vasena ghātakopi ghātanaṃ pāpuṇāti, tādisassa vasenāyamattho veditabbo. Kodhasāmaññena hetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paraṃ ghātetvā attānaṃ ghātetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paramussadagato^eb^ti paramukkaṃsagato. Daḷhaṃ parissayamāvahatāya ^b^kodhova kodhūpāyāso^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘balavappatto’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Dvedhāpathasamā^eb^^a^M2.0107^ea^^b^hoti^eb^ appaṭipattihetubhāvato.

[03]^b^Kusaladhammo na tiṭṭhati^eb^ nīvaraṇehi nivāritaparamattā. Samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato paṭhamaṃ samathena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanaṃ hoti, vipassanā pana tadaṅgavaseneva tāni nīharatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vikkhambhanatadaṅgavasenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Kummova ^a^V2.0101^ea^ aṅgāni sake kapāle’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.17) kummassa aṅgabhāvena visesato pādasīsāni eva vuccantīti āha ^b^‘‘pañceva aṅgāni hontī’’^eb^ti. Vipassanācārassa vuccamānattā adhikārato sammasanīyānameva dhammānaṃ idha gahaṇanti ^b^‘‘sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammā’’^eb^ti visesaṃ katvāva vuttaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana’’nti.

[03]Sunanti koṭṭanti etthāti ^b^sūnā,^eb^ adhikuṭṭananti āha ^b^‘‘sūnāya uparī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asinā^eb^ti maṃsakantanena. ^b^Ghātiyamānā^eb^ti haññamānā vibādhiyamānā. ^b^Vatthukāmānaṃ upari katvā^eb^ti vatthukāmesu ṭhapetvā te accādhānaṃ katvā. ^b^Kantitā^eb^ti chinditā. ^b^Koṭṭitā^eb^ti bilaso vibhajitā. ^b^Chandarāgappahāna^eb^nti chandarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānaṃ.

[03]^b^Sammattā^eb^ti mucchitā sammūḷhā. ^b^Nandīrāgaṃ upagamma vaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍhentī^eb^ti sammūḷhattā evāadīnavaṃ apassantā nandīrāgassa ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā taṃ paribrūhenti. ^b^Nandīrāgabaddhā^eb^ti nandīrāge laggattā tena baddhā. ^b^Vaṭṭe laggantī^eb^ti tebhūmake vaṭṭe sajjanti. Tattha sajjattā eva ^b^dukkhaṃ patvāpi na ukkaṇṭhanti^eb^ na nibbindanti. Idha anavasesappahānaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘catutthamaggena nandīrāgappahānaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Anaṅgaṇasutte^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.63) ^b^pakāsito eva^eb^ ‘‘chandādīhi na gacchantī’’tiādinā. ^b^‘‘Buddho so bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi ‘‘namo karohī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.249, 251) vuttanamakkārassa karaṇākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Bodhāyā^eb^ti catusaccasambodhāya. Tathā damathasamathataraṇaparinibbānāni ariyamaggavasena veditabbāni. Samathaparinibbānāni pana anupādisesavasenapi yojetabbāni. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānaṃ ahosī^eb^ti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. ^b^Etassa pañhassā^eb^ti etassa pannarasamassa pañhassa attho. Evaṃ itaresupi vattabbaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ khīṇāsavaguṇehi matthakaṃ pāpento yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi, na ^a^M2.0108^ea^ pucchitānusandhināti adhippāyo. Nanu ca pucchāvasenāyaṃ desanā āraddhāti? Saccaṃ āraddhā, evaṃ pana ‘‘pucchāvasiko nikkhepo’’ti vattabbaṃ, na ‘‘pucchānusandhivasena niṭṭhapitā’’ti. Antarapucchāvasena desanāya aparivattitattā ārambhānurūpameva pana desanā niṭṭhapitā.
[06]Vammikasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^252^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahāgovindena ^a^V2.0102^ea^ pariggahitatākittanaṃ tadā magadharājena pariggahitūpalakkhaṇaṃ. Tassa hi so purohito. ^b^Mahāgovindo^eb^ti purātano eko magadharājāti keci. Gayhatīti gaho, rājūnaṃ gaho ^b^rājagahaṃ^eb^. Nagara-saddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. ^b^Aññepettha pakāre^eb^ti rājūhi disvā sammā patiṭṭhāpitattā tesaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi ^b^rājagahaṃ^eb^. Ārakkhasampattiādinā anatthuppattihetutāya upagatānaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ gahaṃ gahabhūtantipi ^b^rājagahaṃ,^eb^ ārāmarāmaṇīyakādīhi rājate, nivāsasukhatādinā sattehi mamattavasena gayhati, pariggayhatīti vā ^b^rājagaha^eb^nti evamādike pakāre. ^b^Buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle cā^eb^ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Veḷūhi parikkhittaṃ ahosi,^eb^ na pana kevalaṃ kaṭṭhakapavanameva. Rañño uyyānakāle patiṭṭhāpitāṭṭālakavasena ^b^aṭṭālakayuttaṃ^eb^.

[03]Jananaṃ jāti, jātiyā bhūmi jātibhūmaṃ, jāyi vā mahābodhisatto etthābhi jāti, sā eva bhūmīti jātibhūmaṃ, sā imesaṃ nivāsoti ^b^jātibhūmakā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘jātibhūmakāti jātibhūmivāsino’’^eb^ti. Kassa panāyaṃ jātibhūmīti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ kho panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tena anaññasādhāraṇāya jātiyā adhippetattā sadevake loke supākaṭabhāvato visesanena vināpi visiṭṭhavisayova idha jāti-saddo viññāyatīti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbaññubodhisattassa jātaṭṭhānasākiyajanapado’’^eb^ti. Tatthapi kapilavatthusannissayo padesoti āha ^b^‘‘kapilavatthāhāro’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sākiyamaṇḍalassā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0109^ea^ sākiyarājasamūhassa. Dasannaṃ appicchakathādīnaṃ vatthu dasakathāvatthu, appicchatādi. Tattha suppatiṭṭhitatāya tassa lābhī ^b^dasakathāvatthulābhī. Tatthā^eb^ti dasakathāvatthusmiṃ.

[03]Garukaraṇīyatāya dhammo garu etassāti dhammagaru, tassa bhāvo ^b^dhammagarutā,^eb^ tāya. ^b^‘‘Ajjhāsayena veditabbo’’^eb^ti vatvā na kevalaṃ ajjhāsayeneva, atha kho kāyavacīpayogehipi veditabboti ^a^V2.0103^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘dhammagarutāyeva hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tiyāmarattiṃ dhammakathaṃ katvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘kumbhakārassa nivesane tiyāmarattiṃ vasanto dhammakathaṃ katvā’’ti evaṃ vacanasesavasena attho veditabbo. Aññathā yathālābhavasena atthe gayhamāne tiyāmarattiṃ dhammakathā katāti āpajjati, na ca taṃ atthi. Vakkhati hi ‘‘bahudeva rattinti diyaḍḍhayāmamatta’’nti. Dasabalādiguṇavisesā viya dhammagāravahetukā parahitapaṭipattipi sabbabuddhānaṃ majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya sadisā evāti imassa bhagavato dhammagāravakittane ^b^‘‘kassapopi bhagavā’’^eb^tiādinā kassapabhagavato dhammagāravaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Cārikaṃ nikkhamī^eb^ti janapadacārikaṃ carituṃ nikkhami. Janapadacārikāya akāle nikkhantattā kosalarājādayo vāretuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Pavāretvā hi caraṇaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ. Puṇṇāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ paccāsīsanto bhagavā ^b^‘‘kiṃ me karissasī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Anahātovā^eb^ti dhammasavanussukkena sāyanhe buddhāciṇṇaṃ nhānaṃ akatvāva. Attahitaparahitapaṭipattīsu ekissā dvinnañca atthitāsiddhā catubbidhatā paṭipattikatā eva nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭipannako ca nāma…pe… catubbidho hotī’’^eb^ti. Paṭikkhepapubbakopi hi paṭipanno atthato paṭipannattho evāti. Kāmaṃ attahitāya paṭipanno tāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sāsanaṃ sobhati, na pana sāsanaṃ vaḍḍheti appossukkabhāvato, na ca kāruṇikassa bhagavato sabbathā manorathaṃ pūreti. Tathā hi bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekasaṭṭhiyā ca arahantesu jātesu ^a^M2.0110^ea^ – ‘‘caratha, bhikkhave, bahujanahitāyā’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.86-88; mahāva. 32) bhikkhū parahitapaṭipattiyaṃ niyojesi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhagavā na pucchati, kasmā? Na mayhaṃ sāsanassa vuḍḍhipakkhe ṭhito’’^eb^ti.

[03]Samudāyo appakena ūnopi anūno viya hotīti bākulattheraṃ catuttharāsito bahi katvāpi ^b^‘‘asītimahātherā viyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Asītimahātherasamaññā vā avayavepi aṭṭhasamāpattisāmaññā viya daṭṭhabbā. Īdise ṭhāne bahūnaṃ ekato kathanaṃ mahatā kaṇṭhena ca kathanaṃ satthu cittārādhanamevāti tehi bhikkhūhi tathā paṭipannanti dassento ^b^‘‘te bhikkhū meghasaddaṃ sutvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Guṇasambhāvanāyā^eb^ti vakkhamānaguṇahetukāya sambhāvanāya sambhāvito, na yena kenaci kiccasamatthatādinā.
[06]Garudhammabhāvavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Appa-saddassa ^a^V2.0104^ea^ parittapariyāyataṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^‘‘byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viyā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hi tassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Appa^eb^-saddo panettha abhāvatthoti sakkā viññātuṃ ‘‘appābādhatañca sañjānāmī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.225; 2.134) viya.

[03]^b^Atricchatā nāma^eb^ (a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.63) atra atra icchāti katvā. ^b^Asantaguṇasambhāvanatā^eb^ti attani avijjamānaṃ guṇānaṃ vijjamānānaṃ viya paresaṃ pakāsanā. ^b^Saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū^eb^ti vattapaṭipattikārakavisesalābhīti jānātu ‘‘vattapaṭipattiāpāthakajjhāyitā’’ti evamādinā. ^b^Santaguṇasambhāvanā^eb^ti icchācāre ṭhatvā attani vijjamānasīladhutadhammādiguṇavibhāvanā. Tādisassa hi paṭiggahaṇe amattaññutāpi hoti.
[03]^b^Gaṇhantoyeva ummujji^eb^ aññesaṃ ajānantānaṃyevāti adhippāyo.

[03]Appicchatāpadhānaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena catubbidhaṃ icchāpabhedaṃ dassetvā punapi puggalādhiṭṭhānena catubbidhaṃ icchāpabhedaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘aparopi catubbidho^eb^^a^M2.0111^ea^^b^appiccho’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Dāyakassa vasa^eb^nti dāyakassa cittavasaṃ. ^b^Deyyadhammassa vasa^eb^nti deyyadhammassa appabahubhāvaṃ. ^b^Attano thāma^eb^nti attano yāpanamattakathāmaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekabhikkhupi na aññāsi^eb^ sosānikavatte sammadeva vuttittā. ^b^Abbokiṇṇa^eb^nti avicchedaṃ. ^b^Dutiyo maṃ na jāneyyā^eb^ti dutiyo sahāyabhūtopi yathā maṃ jānituṃ na sakkuṇeyya, tathā saṭṭhi vassāni nirantaraṃ susāne vasāmi, tasmā ^b^ahaṃ aho sosānikuttamo^eb^.

[03]^b^Dhammakathāya janataṃ khobhetvā^eb^ti lomahaṃsanasādhukāradānacelukkhepādivasena sannipatitaṃ itarañca ‘‘kathaṃ nu kho ayyassa santikeva dhammaṃ sossāmā’’ti kolāhalavasena mahājanaṃ khobhetvā. ^b^Gato^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ so, tena rattiyaṃ dhammakathā katā’’ti jānanabhayena pariyattiappicchatāya pariveṇaṃ gato.
[03]^b^Tayo^eb^^a^V2.0105^ea^^b^kulaputtā viyā^eb^ti pācīnavaṃsadāye samaggavāsaṃ vutthā tayo kulaputtā viya. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena pacchā aggamaggeneva pajahitvā.
[06]Appicchatādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvarādīni naphāsubhāvāvahāni sarīrakhedāvahāni ca hontīti payojanavasena nātricchatādivasena tāni parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo na santosavirodhīti āha ^b^‘‘lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī’’^eb^ti. Mahagghacīvaraṃ, bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvāpi tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ…pe… dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hotī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ sesapaccayesupi yathābalayathāsāruppasantosaniddesesu apisaddaggahaṇe adhippāyo veditabbo. ^b^Yathāsāruppasantosoyeva aggo^eb^ alobhajjhāsayassa ukkaṃsanato.
[06]Dvādasavidhasantosavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Eko^eb^ti ^a^M2.0112^ea^ ekākī. ^b^Gacchatī^eb^ti cuṇṇikairiyāpathavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Caratī^eb^ti vihārato bahi sañcāravasena, ^b^viharatī^eb^ti divāvihārādivasena. ^b^Kāyaviveko^eb^ti ca nekkhammādhimuttassa bhāvanānuyogavasena vivekaṭṭhakāyatā, na jhānavivekamattaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nekkhammābhiratāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Parisuddhacittāna^eb^nti nīvaraṇādisaṃkilesato visuddhacittānaṃ. ^b^Paramavodānappattāna^eb^nti vitakkāditaṃtaṃjhānapaṭipakkhavigamena paramaṃ uttamaṃ vodānaṃ pattānaṃ. ^b^Nirupadhīna^eb^nti kilesupadhiādīnaṃ vigamena nirupadhīnaṃ.
[06]Tividhapavivekavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Saṃsīdati ^a^V2.0106^ea^ etenāti saṃsaggo, rāgo. Savanahetuko, savanavasena vā pavatto saṃsaggo ^b^savanasaṃsaggo^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Kāyasaṃsaggo^eb^ pana kāyaparāmāso. ^b^Itthī vā^eb^ti vadhū, yuvatī vā. ^b^Sandhānetu^eb^nti pubbenāparaṃ ghaṭetuṃ. ^b^Sotaviññāṇavīthivasenā^eb^ti idaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ savanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tassa piṭṭhivattakamanodvārikajavanavīthīsu uppannopi rāgo savanasaṃsaggoyeva. ^b^Dassanasaṃsagge^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Anitthigandhabodhisatto^eb^ parehi kathiyamānavasena pavattasavanasaṃsaggassa nidassanaṃ. ^b^Tissadaharo^eb^ attanā suyyamānavasena. Tattha paṭhamaṃ jātake veditabbanti itaraṃ dassento ^b^‘‘daharo kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kāmarāgena viddho^eb^ti rāgasallena hadaye appito anto anuviddho.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti dassanasaṃsaggo. ^b^Evaṃ veditabbo^eb^ti vatthuvasena pākaṭaṃ karoti. Tasmiṃ kira gāme yebhuyyena itthiyo abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā, tasmā thero ^b^‘‘sace antogāme na carissasī’’^eb^ti āha. Kālasseva paviṭṭhattā yāguṃ adāsi, tasmā yāgumeva gahetvā gacchantaṃ ^b^‘‘nivattatha, bhante, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāhī’’ti āhaṃsu. Yācitvā^eb^ti ‘‘na mayaṃ, bhante, bhikkhaṃ dātukāmā nivattema, apica idaṃ bhante kāraṇa’’nti yācitvā.

[03]Ādito ^a^M2.0113^ea^ lapanaṃ ^b^ālāpo,^eb^ vacanapaṭivacanavasena pavatto lāpo ^b^sallāpo. Bhikkhuniyā^eb^ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. Yāya kāyacipi itthiyā santakaparibhogavasena uppannarāgopi ^b^sambhogasaṃsaggova^eb^.
[06]Pañcavidhasaṃsaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Bhikkhuno bhikkhūhi kāyaparāmāso^eb^ kāyasambāhanādivasena. ^b^Kāyasaṃsagga^eb^nti kāyaparāmāsasaṃsaggaṃ. ^b^Gāhagāhako^eb^ti gaṇhanakānaṃ gaṇhanakoti attho. ^b^Gāhamuttako^eb^ti ayoniso āmisehi saṅgaṇhanakehi sayaṃ muccanako. ^b^Muttagāhako^eb^ti yathāvuttasaṅgahato muttānaṃ saṅgaṇhanako. ^b^Muttamuttako^eb^ti muccanakehi sayampi muccanako. ^b^Gahaṇavasena^eb^ saṅgaṇhanavasena. ^b^Upasaṅkamanti^eb^ tato kiñci ^a^V2.0107^ea^ lokāmisaṃ paccāsīsantā, na dakkhiṇeyyavasena. Bhikkhupakkhe ^b^gahaṇavasenā^eb^ti paccayalābhāya saṅgaṇhanavasenāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘āmisenā’’tiādinā vuttanayena.

[03]^b^Ṭhāna^eb^nti attano ṭhānāvatthaṃ. ^b^Pāpuṇituṃ na deti^eb^ uppannameva taṃ paṭisaṅkhānabalena nīharanto vikkhambheti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mantenā’’^eb^tiādi. Yathā jīvitukāmo puriso kaṇhasappena, amittena vā saha na saṃvasati, evaṃ khaṇamattampi kilesehi saha na saṃvasatīti attho.

[03]^b^Catupārisuddhisīlaṃ^eb^ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca. Tathā ^b^samādhi^eb^pi. Vipassanāya pādakā ^b^vipassanāpādakā^eb^ti aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇena yathā lokiyasamādhi gahito, evaṃ vipassanāpādakā etesanti ^b^vipassanāpādakā^eb^ti aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇeneva lokuttaro samādhi gahito. Yathā hi cattāri rūpajjhānāni adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā pavatto maggasamādhi vipassanāpādako, evaṃ cattāri arūpajjhānāni adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā pavattopi. Samāpattipariyāyo pana pubbavohārena veditabbo. Paṭipakkhasamucchedanena sammā āpajjanato vā yathā ‘‘sotāpattimaggo’’ti. Evamettha sīlasamādhīnampi missakabhāvo veditabbo, na paññāya eva. ^b^Vimuttīti ariyaphala^eb^nti vuttaṃ ‘‘vimuttisampanno’’ti vuttattā. Tañhi nipphādanaṭṭhena sampādetabbaṃ, na nibbānanti.

[03]Ettha ^a^M2.0114^ea^ ca appicchatāya laddhapaccayena paritussati, santuṭṭhatāya laddhā te agadhito amucchitoādīnavadassī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati, evaṃbhūto ca katthaci alaggamānasatāya pavivekaṃ paribrūhento kenaci asaṃsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā. So evaṃ ajjhāsayasampanno vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā, anadhigamassa adhigamāya. Ārabhanto ca yathāsamādinnaṃ attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhati, tassa sīlassa suparisuddhataṃ nissāya uppajjati avippaṭisāro, ayamassa ^b^sīlasampadā^eb^. Tassa avippaṭisāramūlakehi pāmojjapītipassaddhisukhehi sammā brūhitaṃ cittaṃ sammadeva samādhiyati, ayamassa ^b^samādhisampadā^eb^. Tato yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, ayamassa ^b^paññāsampadā^eb^. Vimuttacittatā panassa ^b^vimuttisampadā,^eb^ tato vimuttito ^b^ñāṇadassana^eb^nti etesaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ anupubbī veditabbā. Tassa yo dasahi kathāvatthūhi samannāgamo, ^b^ayaṃ attahitāya paṭipatti^eb^. Yā nesaṃ paresaṃ saṃkittanaṃ, ayaṃ ^b^parahitāya paṭipatti^eb^. Tāsu purimā ñāṇapubbaṅgamā ñāṇasampayuttā ca, itarā karuṇāpubbaṅgamā karuṇāsampayuttā cāti sabbaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākaṇḍaṃ vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dasahi^eb^^a^V2.0108^ea^^b^kathāvatthūhi^eb^ karaṇabhūtehi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ deti, ‘‘bhikkhunā nāma atricchatādike dūrato vajjetvā sammadeva appicchena bhavitabba’’ntiādinā taṃ taṃ kathāvatthuṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upadisatīti attho. Upadisanto hi tāni ‘‘tehi bhikkhū ovadatī’’ti vutto. ^b^Ovadatiyeva^eb^ sarūpadassanamattena. ^b^Sukhumaṃ atthaṃ parivattetvā^eb^ti evampi appicchatā hoti evampīti appicchatādivasena aparāparaṃ appicchatāvuttiṃ dassetvā tattha sukhumanipuṇaṃ appicchatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jānāpetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Viññāpetī^eb^ti yathāvuttehi visesehi viññāpeti. ^b^Kāraṇa^eb^nti yena kāraṇena appicchatā ijjhati, taṃ pana ‘‘mahicchatādīsu ete dosā, appicchatāya ayamānisaṃso’’tiādīnavānisaṃsadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammā hetunā appicchataṃ dassetīti ^b^sandassako. Gāhetu^eb^nti yathā gaṇhati, tathā kātuṃ, tattha paṭṭhapetunti attho. ^b^Ussāhajananavasenā^eb^ti yathā taṃ samādānaṃ niccalaṃ hoti, evaṃ ussoḷhiyā uppādanavasena sammadeva uttejetīti ^b^samuttejako. Ussāhajāte^eb^ti appicchatāya jātussāhe. ^b^Vaṇṇaṃ vatvā^eb^ tattha sampattiṃ āyatiñca labbhamānaguṇaṃ kittetvā ^b^sampahaṃseti^eb^ sammadeva pakārehi tosetīti ^a^M2.0115^ea^^b^sampahaṃsako.^eb^ Evaṃ santuṭṭhiādīsu yathārahaṃ yojanā kātabbā.
[06]Gāhagāhakādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^253^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Satthu sammukhā evaṃ vaṇṇo abbhuggato^eb^ti. Iminā tassa vaṇṇassa yathābhūtaguṇasamuṭṭhitataṃ dasseti. ^b^Mandamando viyā^eb^ti ati viya acheko viya. ^b^Abalabalo viyā^eb^ti ati viya abalo viya. ^b^Bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viyā^eb^ti ati viya dummukho viya. ^b^Anumassā^eb^ti anumasitvā, dasa kathāvatthūni sarūpato visesato ca anupariggahetvāti attho. Pariggaṇhanaṃ pana nesaṃ anupavisanaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anupavisitvā’’^eb^ti. Sabrahmacārīhi vaṇṇabhāsanaṃ eko lābhoti yojanā. Evaṃ sesesupi. ^b^Patthayamāno evamāha^eb^ dhammagarutāyāti adhippāyo.
[06]Pañcalābhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^254^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhiramanaṃ ^a^V2.0109^ea^ abhirataṃ, tadeva anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘abhiranta’’^eb^nti. Bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ. ^b^Anabhirati nāma natthi, abhiramitvā ciravihāropi natthi^eb^ sammadeva pariññātavatthukattā. Sabbasahā hi buddhā bhagavanto asayhalābhino.

[03]Pubbe dhammagarutākittanapasaṅgena gahitaṃ aggahitañca mahākassapapaccuggamanādiṃ ekadesena dassetvā vanavāsitissasāmaṇerassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā janapadacārikaṃ kathetuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā hī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ākāsagāmīhi saddhiṃ gantukāmo ^b^‘‘chaḷabhiññānaṃ ārocehī’’^eb^ti āha. Saṅghakammena sijjhamānāpi upasampadā satthu āṇāvaseneva sijjhanato ^b^‘‘buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī’’^eb^ti vuttanti vadanti. Apare ‘‘aparipuṇṇavīsativassasseva tassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto satthā ^b^‘buddhadāyajjaṃ te^eb^^a^M2.0116^ea^^b^dassāmī^eb^’ti avocā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Upasampādetvā^eb^ti dhammasenāpatinā upajjhāyena upasampādetvā.

[03]^b^Navayojanasatikaṃ^eb^ majjhimadesapariyāpannameva, tato paraṃ nādhippetaṃ dandhatāvasena gamanato. ^b^Samantā^eb^ti gatagataṭṭhānassa catūsu passesu. ^b^Aññenapi kāraṇenā^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanātaruṇabhāvato aññenapi majjhimamaṇḍale veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena nikkhamati, antomaṇḍalaṃ otarati. ^b^Sattahi vā^eb^tiādi ^b^‘‘ekaṃ māsaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādinā vuttānukkamena yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sarīraphāsukatthāyā^eb^ti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibaddhavāsena ussannadhātukassa sarīrassa virecanena phāsubhāvatthāya. ^b^Aṭṭhuppattikālābhikaṅkhanatthāyā^eb^ti aggikkhandhūpamasutta (a. ni. 7.72) maghadevajātakādidesanānaṃ (jā. 1.1.9) viya dhammadesanāya aṭṭhuppattikālassa ākaṅkhanena. Surāpānasikkhāpadapaññāpane (pāci. 326) viya ^b^sikkhāpadapaññāpanatthāya. Bodhaneyyasatte^eb^ aṅgulimālādike ^b^bodhanatthāya^eb^. Nibaddhavāsañca puggalaṃ uddissa cārikā ^b^nibaddhacārikā^eb^.

[03]^b^255^eb^^b^.^eb^ Apariggahabhāvaṃ katthaci alaggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yūthaṃ pahāya…pe… mattahatthī viyā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0110^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Asahāyakicco^eb^ti sahāyakiccarahito sīho viya. Tenassa ekavihāritaṃ tejavantatañca dasseti. ^b^Tadā pana kāyaviveko na sakkā laddhu^eb^nti idamettha kāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Bahūhī^eb^tiādi pana sabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Therassa parisā suvinītā ciṇṇagaruvāsā garuno icchānurūpameva vattati.

[03]Vuttakāraṇayutte addhānagamane cārikānaṃ vohāro sāsane niruḷhoti āha ^b^‘‘kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi. Kenacideva nimittena kismiñci atthe pavattāya saññāya tannimittarahitepi aññasmiṃ pavatti ^b^ruḷhī^eb^ nāma. Vijitamārattā ^b^saṅgāmavijayamahāyodho viya. Aññaṃ sevitvā^eb^ti ‘‘mama āgatabhāvaṃ satthu ārocehī’’ti ārocanatthaṃ aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ sevitvā.

[03]Bhagavā ^a^M2.0117^ea^ dhammaṃ desento taṃtaṃpuggalajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tadanucchavikameva dhammiṃ kathaṃ karotīti dassento ^b^‘‘cūḷagosiṅgasutte’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sāmaggirasānisaṃsa^eb^nti ‘‘kacci pana vo, anuruddhā, samaggā sammodamānā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.326) sāmaggirasānisaṃsaṃ kathesi. ^b^Āvasathānisaṃsa^eb^nti ‘‘sītaṃ uṇhaṃ paṭihanatī’’tiādinā (cūḷava. 295, 315) āvasathapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ. ^b^Satipaṭilābhika^eb^nti jotipālatthere lāmakaṃ ṭhānaṃ otiṇṇamatte mahābodhipallaṅke pana sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūrento āgato. Tādisassa nāma pamādavihāro na yuttoti yathā kassapo bhagavā bodhisattassa satiṃ paṭilabhituṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, tathā ayaṃ bhagavā tameva ^b^pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ^eb^ bhikkhūnaṃ ghaṭikārasuttaṃ (ma. ni. 2.282) kathesi. ^b^Cattāro dhammuddese^eb^ti – ‘‘upanīyati loko addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro, assako loko sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso cā’’ti (ma. ni. 2.305) ime cattāro dhammuddese kathesi. Kāmañcete dhammuddesā ^b^raṭṭhapālasutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 2.304) āyasmatā raṭṭhapālattherena rañño korabyassa kathitā, te pana bhagavato eva āharitvā therena tattha kathitāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘raṭṭhapālasutte’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ sutte – ‘‘atthi kho, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena cattāro dhammuddesā uddiṭṭhā’’tiādi (ma. ni. 2.305) ^b^pānakānisaṃsakatha^eb^nti ‘‘aggihuttaṃ mukhaṃ yaññā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 2.400; su. ni. 573) anumodanaṃ vatvā puna pakiṇṇakakathāvasena pānakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi. ^b^Ekībhāve ānisaṃsaṃ kathesi,^eb^ yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesī’’tiādi ^a^V2.0111^ea^ (ma. ni. 3.238). ^b^Anantanaya^eb^nti aparimāṇadesanānayaṃ appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puṇṇa, ayampi appicchakathāyevā’’^eb^tiādi bahūhi pariyāyehi nānānayaṃ deseti. Kathaṃ tathā desitaṃ thero aññāsīti āha ^b^‘‘paṭisambhidāpattassa…pe… ahosī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Cārikādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^256^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tato^eb^^a^M2.0118^ea^^b^paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti. Yadā jātibhūmakā bhikkhū satthu sammukhā therassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, tato paṭṭhāya. Sīsānulokī hutvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanaṃ therena samāgame ādaravasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ pāṭhe ‘‘appeva nāmā’’tiādi, ‘‘taramānarūpo’’ti ca. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīna’’^eb^ntiādi, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Na hi dhammasenāpati tassa therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇena jānituṃ na sakkoti. ‘‘Kacci nu kho maṃ adisvāva gamissatī’’ti ayampi cintā ādaravasenevāti yuttaṃ. Na hi satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgato sāvako api āyasmā aññātakoṇḍañño satthukappaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ tattha vasantaṃ adisvāva gacchanako nāma atthi. ^b^Divāvihāra^eb^nti sampadāne upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘divāvihāratthāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^257^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimakathāyā^eb^ti paṭhamālāpe. ^b^Appatiṭṭhitāyā^eb^ti nappavattitāya. ^b^Pacchimakathā na jāyatī^eb^ti pacchā vattabbakathāya avasaro na hoti. ^b^Satta visuddhiyo pucchi^eb^ diṭṭhasaṃsandanavasena. ^b^Ñāṇadassanavisuddhi^eb^ nāma ariyamaggo. Yasmā tato uttarimpi pattabbaṃ attheva, tasmā ^b^‘‘catupārisuddhisīlādīsu ṭhitassapi brahmacariyavāso matthakaṃ na pāpuṇātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti brahmacariyavāsassa matthakaṃ appattattā. ^b^Sabbaṃ paṭikkhipī^eb^ti sattamampi pañhaṃ paṭikkhipi, itaresu vattabbameva natthi.

[03]^b^Appaccayaparinibbāna^eb^nti anupādisesanibbānamāha. Idāni pakārantarenapi anupādāparinibbānaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dvedhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^gahaṇūpādāna^eb^nti daḷhaggahaṇabhūtaṃ upādānaṃ ^a^V2.0112^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāmupādānādika’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paccayūpādāna^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci paccayamāha. So hi attano phalaṃ upādiyati upādānavasena gaṇhatīti ^b^upādāna^eb^nti vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paccayūpādānaṃ nāma…pe… paccayā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī’’ti vacanato (mahāva. 28, 30) ^b^arahattaphalaṃ anupādāparinibbānanti kathenti. Na ca upādānasampayutta^eb^nti upādānehi etaṃ na sahitaṃ nāpi upādānehi saha pavatti hutvā. ^b^Na ca kañci dhammaṃ upādiyatī^eb^ti kassaci dhammassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena na upādiyati ^a^M2.0119^ea^. ^b^Parinibbutante^eb^ti aggamaggena kātabbakilesaparinibbānapariyosānante jātattā. ^b^Amatadhātumeva anupādāparinibbānaṃ kathenti,^eb^ kathentānañca yathā tassa koci paccayo nāma natthi, evaṃ adhigatopi yathā koci paccayo nāma na hoti, tathā parinibbānaṃ apaccayaparinibbānanti dassento ^b^‘‘ayaṃ anto’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Puna pucchaṃ ārabhi^eb^ anupādāparinibbānaṃ sarūpato patiṭṭhāpetukāmo.

[03]^b^258^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbaparivattesū^eb^ti sabbesu pañhaparivattanesu, pañhavāresūti attho. ^b^Sagahaṇadhammamevā^eb^ti ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā gaṇhatīti gahaṇaṃ, saha gahaṇenāti sagahaṇaṃ, upādāniyanti attho. Vivaṭṭasannissitassa abhāvato vaṭṭameva anugatoti ^b^vaṭṭānugato^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catupārisuddhisīlamattassapi abhāvato’’^eb^ti. Yo pana catubbidhe vivaṭṭūpanissaye sīle ṭhito, sopi ^b^‘‘aññatra imehi dhammehī’’^eb^ti vattabbataṃ arahati.
[06]Sattavisuddhipañhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^259^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nissakkavacanametaṃ^eb^ ‘‘yāva heṭṭhimasopānakaḷevarā’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Attho^eb^ti payojanaṃ. Cittavisuddhi hettha sīlavisuddhiṃ payojeti tassa tadatthattā. ^b^Sīlavisuddhikiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti^eb^ samādhisaṃvattanato. Samādhisaṃvattanikā hi sīlavisuddhi nāma. ^b^Sabbapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘cittavisuddhi yāvadeva diṭṭhivisuddhatthā’’tiādīsu sabbapadesu, diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṃ ṭhitassa cittavisuddhakiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hotītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sāvatthinagaraṃ viya sakkāyanagaraṃ^eb^ atikkamitabbattā. ^b^Sāketanagaraṃ viya nibbānanagaraṃ^eb^ pāpuṇitabbattā ^a^V2.0113^ea^. ^b^Accāyikassa kiccassa uppādakālo viya^eb^ navameneva khaṇena pattabbassa abhisamayakiccassa upādakālo. Yathā rañño sattamena rathavinītena sākete antepuradvāre oruḷhassa na tāva kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti, saṃvidhātabbasaṃvidhānaṃ ñātimittagaṇaparivutassa surasabhojanaparibhoge niṭṭhitaṃ nāma siyā, evametaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā kilese khepetvā tesaṃyeva paṭippassaddhipahānasādhakāriyaphalasamaṅgikāle abhisamayakiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti. Tenāha ^a^M2.0120^ea^^b^‘‘yogino…pe… kālo daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^paropaṇṇāsa kusaladhammā nāma^eb^ cittuppādapariyāpannā phassādayo paropaṇṇāsa anavajjadhammā. ^b^Nirodhasayane^eb^ti nibbānasayane.

[03]‘‘Visuddhiyo’’ti vā ‘‘kathāvatthūnī’’ti vā atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānanti tesaṃ atthato anaññabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘itī’’^eb^ti āraddhaṃ. ^b^Āyasmā puṇṇo dasa kathāvatthūni vissajjesī^eb^ti satta visuddhiyo nāma vissajjantopi dasa kathāvatthūni vissajjesi tesaṃ atthato anaññattā. Eteneva dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero satta visuddhiyo pucchanto dasa kathāvatthūni pucchīti ayampi attho vuttovāti veditabbo. Nti pañhaṃ. ^b^Kiṃ jānitvā pucchī^eb^ti visuddhipariyāyena kathāvatthūni pucchāmīti kiṃ jānitvā pucchi. Dasakathāvatthulābhinaṃ theraṃ visuddhiyo pucchanto pucchitaṭṭhāneyeva pucchanena kiṃ titthakusalo vā pana hutvā visayasmiṃ pucchi, udāhu pānīyatthikamatitthehi chinnataṭehi pātento viya atitthakusalo hutvā apucchitabbaṭṭhāne avisayasmiṃ pucchīti yojanā. Iminā nayena vissajjanapakkhepi atthayojanā veditabbā. Yadatthamassa vicāraṇā āraddhā, taṃ dassentena ^b^‘‘titthakusalo hutvā’’^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā visuddhikathāvatthūnaṃ atthato anaññattepi ayaṃ viseso veditabboti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tadaminā^eb^ti yaṃ ‘‘saṃkhittaṃ, vitthiṇṇa’’nti ca vuttaṃ, ^b^taṃ^eb^ iminā idāni vuccamānena nayena vidhinā veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekā sīlavisuddhī^eb^ti visuddhīsu visuṃ ekā sīlavisuddhi. Dasasu kathāvatthūsu ^b^cattāri kathāvatthūni hutvā āgatā^eb^ appicchatādīhi vinā sīlavisuddhiyā asambhavato. ^b^Appicchakathā^eb^tiādīsu kathāsīsena dasakathāvatthu gahitaṃ. Kathetabbattā vā vatthu ^b^kathāvatthū^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Evañca upakārato, sabhāvato vā catunnaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ sīlavisuddhisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tiṇṇaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ cittavisuddhisaṅgahepi eseva nayo. ^b^Pañca visuddhiyo^eb^ti nāmarūpaparicchedo diṭṭhivisuddhi, sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi, vipassanupakkilese pahāya uppannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ ^a^V2.0114^ea^ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi, udayabbayañāṇādi navavidhañāṇaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi, ariyamaggañāṇaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pañca visuddhiyo.
[06]Sattarathavinītavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^260^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sammoditu^eb^nti ^a^M2.0121^ea^ anantaraṃ vuccamānena sammodituṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhānaparikappenā^eb^ti akāraṇassa vatthuno parikappanena tadā asambhavantaṃ atthaṃ parikappetvā vacanena. ^b^Abhiṇhadassanassā^eb^ti niccadassanassa, niyatadassanassāti attho.

[03]^b^Ukkhipī^eb^ti guṇato kathitabhāvena ukkaṃseti. ^b^Therassā^eb^ti āyasmato puṇṇattherassa. ^b^Imasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ imasmiṃ kāraṇe ekapadeneva sāvakavisaye anaññasādhāraṇaguṇāvikaraṇanimittaṃ. Idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘amaccañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Apacāyamāno^eb^ti pūjayanto.

[03]‘‘Anumassa anumassa pucchitā’’ti vuttattā vicāraṇavasenāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ pana pañhassa pucchanaṃ bhāriyaṃ udāhu vissajjana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sahetukaṃ katvā^eb^ti yuttāyuttaṃ katvā. ^b^Sakāraṇa^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Pucchanampī^eb^ti evaṃ sahadhammena pucchitabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ sampādetvā pucchanampi bhāriyaṃ dukkaraṃ. ^b^Vissajjanampīti^eb^ sahadhammena vissajjanampi dukkaraṃ. Evañhi vissajjento viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhetīti. ^b^Yathānusandhināva desanā niṭṭhitā^eb^ādito saparikkhāraṃ sīlaṃ, majjhe samādhiṃ, ante vasībhāvappattaṃ paññaṃ dassetvā desanāya niṭṭhāpitattāti.
[06]Rathavinītasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^261^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nivappatīti ^a^V2.0115^ea^ nivāpo, nivāpaṃ vatteti, nivāpabhojanaṃ vā etassāti ^b^nevāpiko,^eb^ nivāpena mige palobhetvā gaṇhanakamāgaviko. ^b^Tiṇabījānī^eb^ti nivāpatiṇabījāni. ^b^Vappa^eb^nti sassaṃ viya vapitabbaṭṭhena vappaṃ. ‘‘Mayaṃ viya aññe ke īdisaṃ labhissantī’’ti ^b^mānamadaṃ āpajjissanti. Vissaṭṭhasatibhāva^eb^nti anussaṅkitaparisaṅkitabhāvaṃ. Tiracchānā hi vijātiyabalavatiracchānavasanaṭṭhānesu sāsaṅkā ubbiggahadayā appamattā honti visesato māgavikādimanussūpacāre, rasataṇhāya pana baddhā pamādaṃ āpajjassanti. Nivapati etthāti ^b^nivāpo,^eb^ nivāpabhūmi nivāpaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nivāpaṭṭhāne’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Yathākāmakaraṇīyā’’ti vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘ekaṃ kirā’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0122^ea^ vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^nīvāravanaṃ viyā^eb^ti nīvārassa samūho viya. ^b^Nīvāro^eb^ nāma araññe sayaṃjātavīhijāti. ^b^Meghamālā viyā^eb^ti meghaghaṭā viya. ^b^Ekagghananti^eb^ ekajjhaṃ viya aviraṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Pakkamantī^eb^ti āsaṅkaparisaṅkā hutvā pakkamanti. ^b^Kaṇṇe cālayamānā^eb^ti anāsaṅkantānaṃ pahaṭṭhākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Maṇḍalagumba^eb^nti maṇḍalakākārena ṭhitaṃ gumbaṃ.
[03]^b^262^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kappetvā^eb^ti upamābhāvena parikappetvā. Mige attano vase vattāpanaṃ ^b^vasībhāvo^eb^. So eva ijjhanaṭṭhena ^b^iddhi,^eb^ pabhāvanaṭṭhena ^b^ānubhāvo^eb^.

[03]^b^263^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhayena bhogato^eb^ti bhayena saha sabhayaṃ nivāpaparibhogato. ^b^Balavīriya^eb^nti kāyabalañca uṭṭhānavīriyañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana balameva vīriyaṃ. ^b^Bala^eb^nti ca sarīrabalaṃ, tañca atthato manasikāramaggehi aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakavātoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇavāyodhātū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^264^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sikkhitakerāṭikā^eb^ti paricitasāṭheyyā, vañcakāti attho. ^b^Iddhimanto viya^eb^ ānubhāvavanto viya. Pacurajanehi parabhūtā jātāti ^b^parajanā,^eb^ mahābhūtā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yakkhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samantā sappadesa^eb^nti samantato padesavantaṃ vipulokāsasannivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Tassa pana sappadesatā mahāokāsatāyāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mahantaṃ okāsa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^265^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ghaṭṭessantī^eb^ti ‘‘sabhayasamuṭṭhāna’’nti saññādānavasena cittaṃ cetessanti, tāsessantīti ^a^V2.0116^ea^ attho. ^b^Pariccajissantī^eb^ti nibbisissanti. ^b^Mahallako^eb^ti jātiyā mahallako jiṇṇo. ^b^Dubbalo^eb^ti byādhivasena, pakatiyā vā balavirahito.

[03]^b^267^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nivāpasadisatāya ^b^nivāpoti vā^eb^. Lokapariyāpannaṃ hutvā kilesehi āmasitabbatāya ^b^lokāmisānīti vā^eb^. Vaṭṭe āmisabhūtattā ^b^vaṭṭāmisabhūtānaṃ. Vasaṃ vattetī^eb^ti kāmaguṇehi kāmaguṇe giddhe satte tasseva gedhassa vasena attano vase vattetīti. Tenāha –
[21]‘‘Antalikkhacaro ^a^M2.0123^ea^ pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso;
[22]Tena taṃ bādhayissāmi, na me samaṇa mokkhasī’’ti. (saṃ. ni. 1.151; mahāva. 33);
[03]^b^Aya^eb^nti paṭhamamigajātūpamā. Vānapatthassa satova papañcaparadattikādisaputtadāranikkhamanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘saputtabhariyapabbajjāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^268^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmato cittassa vimutti idha cetovimuttīti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘cetovimutti nāma…pe… uppannājjhāsayo’’^eb^ti. Kāme vissajjetvā puna tattha nimuggatāya dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇā dutiyamigajātūpamā vuttā.

[03]^b^269^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇā yathāpariccatte kāme pariccajitvā evaṃ ṭhitā, na dutiyā viya tattha nimuggāti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘kiṃ pana te akaṃsū’’^eb^ti pucchati. Itare kāmaṃ ujukaṃ kāmaguṇesu na nimuggā, pariyāyena pana nimuggā diṭṭhijālena ca ajjhotthaṭāti dassento ^b^‘‘gāmanigamajanapadarājadhāniyo’’^eb^tiādimāha. Diṭṭhijālampi taṇhājālānugatamevāti āha ^b^‘‘mārassa pāpimato diṭṭhijālena parikkhipitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^271^eb^^b^.^eb^ Khandhakilesābhisaṅkhāramārā vā idha ^b^māra^eb^ggahaṇena gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Akkhīni bhindi^eb^ daṭṭhuṃ asamatthabhāvāpādanena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipassanāpādakajjhāna’’^eb^ntiādi. Kiñcāpi māro yaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpannassapi bhikkhuno cittaṃ imaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya vattatīti na jānāti, idhādhippetassa pana bhikkhuno vasena ^b^‘‘vipassanāpādakajjhāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Teneva pariyāyenā^eb^ti ‘‘na mārassa akkhīni bhindī’’ti evamādinā yathāvuttapariyāyena. ^b^Adassanaṃ gato^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Cakkhussa padaṃ patiṭṭhāti ca idha ārammaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ taṃ pariggayha ^a^V2.0117^ea^ pavattanatoti āha ^b^‘‘appatiṭṭhaṃ nirārammaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^So^eb^ti māro. ^b^Disvā^eb^ti dassanahetu. Yasmā maggena catusaccadassanahetu āsavā na parikkhīṇā. Phalakkhaṇe hi te khīṇāti vuccantīti.

[03]^b^Loke^eb^ti sattaloke saṅkhāraloke ca. ^b^Sattavisattabhāvenā^eb^ti laggabhāvena ceva savisesaṃ āsattabhāvena ca. ^b^Atha vā^eb^tiādinā ^b^niddesanayavasena^eb^ (mahāni. 3, cūḷani. mettagūmāṇavapucchāniddesa 22, 23; cūḷani. khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 124) visattikāpadaṃ niddisati. ^b^Visatā^eb^ti vitthaṭā ^a^M2.0124^ea^ rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu byāpanavasena ^b^visaṭā^eb^ti purimavacanameva takārassa ṭakāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Visālā^eb^ti vipulā. ^b^Visakkatī^eb^ti parisakkati sahati. Ratto hi rāgavatthunā pādena tāliyamānopi sahati. Osakkanaṃ, vipphandanaṃ vā ^b^visakkana^eb^ntipi vadanti. ^b^Visaṃharatī^eb^ti yathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito cittaṃ saṃharati saṅkhipati, visaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, taṃ harati upanetīti attho. ^b^Visaṃvādikā^eb^ti aniccādiṃ niccādito gaṇhāpentī visaṃvādikā hoti. Dukkhanibbattakassa kammassa hetubhāvato ^b^visamūlā,^eb^ visaṃ vā dukkhadukkhādibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti ^b^visamūlā^eb^. Dukkhasamudayattā visaṃ phalaṃ etissāti ^b^visaphalā^eb^. Taṇhāya rūpādikassa dukkhasseva paribhogo hoti, na amatassāti sā ^b^‘‘visaparibhogā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Sabbattha niruttivasena saddasiddhi veditabbā. Yo panettha padhāno attho, taṃ dassetuṃ puna ^b^‘‘visālā vā panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Nittiṇṇo uttiṇṇo^eb^ti upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Niravasesato vā tiṇṇo ^b^nittiṇṇo^eb^. Tena tena maggena uddhamuddhaṃ tiṇṇo ^b^uttiṇṇo^eb^. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Nivāpasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^272^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sādhumaya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0118^ea^ ettha ^b^sādhu^eb^-saddo āyācanattho, na ‘‘sādhāvuso’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. 182) viya abhinandanādiatthoti āha ^b^‘‘āyācantā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘labheyyāmā’’tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na sakkonti,^eb^ kasmā? ^b^Buddhā hi garū honti,^eb^ paramagarū uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ, na yathā tathā upasaṅkamanīyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekacāriko sīho’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^‘‘Pākaṭakiriyāyā’’^eb^ti saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘yaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhagavā sabbakālaṃ kimevamakāsīti? Na sabbakālamevamakāsi. Yadā pana akāsi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā paṭhamabodhiya’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Manussattabhāve^eb^ti iminā purisattabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti. ^b^Dhanapariccāgo kato nāma natthi^eb^ bhagavato dharamānakāleti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Mālākacavara^eb^nti ^a^M2.0125^ea^ milātamālākacavaraṃ. ^b^Rajojallaṃ na upalimpati^eb^ acchatarachavibhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘sukhumattā chaviyā kāye rajojallaṃ na limpatī’’ti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavā nahāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘utuggahaṇattha’’^eb^nti.
