[03]^b^Vihāro^eb^ti jetavanavihāro. ^b^Vīsatiusabhaṃ^eb^ gāvutassa catuttho bhāgoti vadanti. ^b^Kadācī^eb^ti kasmiñci buddhuppāde. ^b^Acalamevā^eb^ti aparivattameva anaññabhāvato, mañcānaṃ pana appamahantatāhi pādānaṃ patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānassa hānivaḍḍhiyo hontiyeva.

[03]^b^Yantanāḷikāhi^eb^ paripuṇṇasuvaṇṇarasadhārāhi. ^b^Nhānavatta^eb^nti ‘‘pabbajitena nāma evaṃ nhāyitabba’’nti nahānacārittaṃ dassetvā. Yasmā bhagavato sarīraṃ sudhantacāmīkarasamānavaṇṇaṃ suparisodhitapavāḷarucirakaracaraṇāvaraṃ suvisuddhanīlaratanāvaḷisadisakesatanuruhaṃ, tasmā tahaṃ tahaṃ vinissatajātihiṅgulakarasūpasobhitaṃ upari mahaggharatanāvaḷisañchāditaṃ jaṅgamamiva kanakagirisikharaṃ virocittha. Tasmiñca samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantato asītihatthappamāṇe padese ādhāvantī vidhāvantī ratanāvaḷiratanadāma-ratanacuṇṇa-vippakiṇṇaṃ viya, pasāritaratanacittakañcanapaṭṭamiva, āsiñcamānalākhārasadhārā-citamiva ^a^V2.0119^ea^, ukkāsatanipātasamākulamiva, nirantaraṃ vippakiṇṇa-kaṇikāra-kiṅkiṇika-pupphamiva, vāyuvegasamuddhata-cinapiṭṭhacuṇṇa-rañjitamiva, indadhanu-vijjulatā-vitānasanthatamiva, gaganatalaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ pavanañca sammā pharanti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vaṇṇabhūmi nāmesā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Attha^eb^nti upameyyatthaṃ. ^b^Upamāyo^eb^ti ‘‘īdiso ca hotī’’ti yathārahaṃ tadanucchavikā upamā. ^b^Kāraṇānī^eb^ti upamupameyyasambandhavibhāvanāni kāraṇāni. ^b^Pūretvā^eb^ti vaṇṇanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā. ^b^Thāmo veditabbo^eb^ ‘‘atitthe pakkhando’’ti avattabbattā.

[03]^b^273^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kaṇṇikā^eb^ti sarīragatabindukatāni maṇḍalāni. ^b^Parikkhārabhaṇḍa^eb^nti uttarāsaṅgaṃ saṅghāṭiñca sandhāya vadati. Kiṃ panāyaṃ nayo buddhānampi sarīre hotīti? Na hoti, vattadassanatthaṃ panetaṃ katanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Gamanavasena kāyassābhinīharaṇaṃ ^b^gamanābhihāro^eb^. Yathādhippāyāvattanaṃ ^b^adhippāyakopanaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Aññatarāya pāramiyā^eb^ti nekkhammapāramiyā. Vīriyapāramiyāti apare. ^b^Mahābhinikkhamanassā^eb^ti mahantassa carimabhave abhinikkhamanassa. Tañhi mahantaṃ ^a^M2.0126^ea^ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ mahantañca cakkavattisiriṃ pajahitvā sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa ca acinteyyāparimeyyabhedassa mahato atthāya hitāya sukhāya pavattattā mahanīyatāya ca mahantaṃ abhinikkhamananti vuccati.

[03]^b^Purimo^eb^ti ‘‘katamāya nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathā’’ti evaṃ vuttāttho. ^b^Kā ca pana vo^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireke. Tena yathāpucchitāya kathāya vakkhamānaṃ vippakatabhāvaṃ joteti. ^b^Pana^eb^-saddo vacanālaṅkāre. Yāya hi kathāya te bhikkhū sannisinnā, sā eva antarākathābhūtā vippakatā visesena puna pucchīyati. ^b^Aññā^eb^ti antarā-saddassa atthamāha. Aññattho hi ayaṃ antarā-saddo ‘‘bhūmantaraṃ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā) samayantara’’ntiādīsu viya, ^b^antarā^eb^ti vā vemajjheti attho. ^b^Dasakathāvatthunissitā^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ sīlaṃ nāma, kathañca pūretabbaṃ, kāni cassa saṃkilesavodānānī’’tiādinā appicchādinissitā sīlādinissitā ca kathā. ^b^Ariyo^eb^ti niddoso. Atha vā atthakāmehi araṇīyoti ^b^ariyo,^eb^ ariyānaṃ ayanti vā ^b^ariyo^eb^ti. Bhāvanāmanasikāravasena ^b^tuṇhī^eb^ bhavanti, na ekaccabāhirakapabbajitā viya mūgabbatasamādānena. ^b^Dutiyajjhānampi ariyo tuṇhībhāvo^eb^ vacīsaṅkhārapahānato. ^b^Mūlakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pārihāriya kammaṭṭhānampi. ^b^Jhāna^eb^nti dutiyajjhānaṃ.

[03]^b^274^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Sannipatitānaṃ ^a^V2.0120^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, dvaya’’nti (ma. ni. 1.273; udā. 12, 28, 29) aṭṭhuppattivasena desanā pavattāti tassā uparidesanāya sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanāti ko anusandhī’’^eb^ti anusandhiṃ pucchati. ^b^Ayaṃ tumhākaṃ pariyesanā^eb^ti yā mahābhinikkhamanapaṭibaddhā dhammī kathā, sā tumhākaṃ dhammapariyesanā dhammavicāraṇā ariyapariyesanā nāma. ^b^Apāyamagga^eb^nti anatthāvahaṃ maggaṃ. ^b^Uddesānukkamaṃ bhinditvā^eb^ti uddesānupubbiṃ laṅghitvā. ^b^Dhamma^eb^-saddo ‘‘amosadhammaṃ nibbāna’’ntiādīsu viya pakatipariyāyo. ^b^Jāyanasabhāvo^eb^ti jāyanapakatikoti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti yathā ‘‘puttabhariya’’nti dvandasamāsavasena ekattaṃ, esa nayo sabbattha ‘‘dāsidāsa’’ntiādīsu sabbapadesu. Parato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā ^a^M2.0127^ea^ sabbadā jātarūpameva hotīti ^b^jātarūpaṃ,^eb^ suvaṇṇaṃ. Dhavalasabhāvatāya rañjīyatīti ^b^rajataṃ,^eb^ rūpiyaṃ. Idha pana suvaṇṇaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci upabhogaparibhogārahaṃ rajataṃteva gahitaṃ. Upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti ^b^upadhayo. Cutīsaṅkhātaṃ maraṇa^eb^nti ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ maraṇamāha. Khaṇikanirodho pana khaṇe khaṇe. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sattānaṃ viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saṃkilissatī^eb^ti dūsavisena viya attānaṃ dūsissati. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘pañcime, bhikkhave, jātarūpassa upakkilesā ayo loha’’ntiādi (a. ni. 5.23). ^b^Malaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti yehi sahayogato malinaṃ hoti, tesaṃ malinabhāvapaccayānaṃ vasena malaṃ gahetvā. Jīraṇato jarādhammavāre jātarūpaṃ gahitanti yojanā. Ye pana jātidhammavārepi jātarūpaṃ na paṭhanti, tesaṃ itaresaṃ viya jīraṇadhammavāre sarūpato anāgatampi upadhiggahaṇena gahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pariggahe ṭhitānaṃ pana vasena vuccamāne apākaṭānampi jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ vasena yojanā labbhateva. Jātarūpasīsena cettha sabbassapi anindriyabaddhassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, puttabhariyādiggahaṇena viya mittāmaccādiggahaṇaṃ.
[03]^b^275^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ariyehi pariyesanā, ariyānaṃ pariyesanāti vā ^b^ariyapariyesanā^eb^ti samāsadvayaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘ayaṃ, bhikkhave’’^eb^tiādinā.

[03]^b^276^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mūlato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti yaṃ mahābhinikkhamanassa mūlabhāvesuādīnavadassanaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya. Yasmā te bhikkhū tattha mahābhinikkhamanakathāya sannisinnā, sā ca nesaṃ antarākathā vippakatā, tasmā bhagavā tesaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya mahābhinikkhamanakathaṃ kathetuṃ ārabhi. ^b^Ahampi pubbe^eb^ti visesavacanaṃ aparipakkañāṇena sayaṃ carimabhave tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakaparivārassa dibbasampattisadisāya mahāsampattiyā anubhavanaṃ, abhinikkhamitvā padhānapadahanavasena ^a^V2.0121^ea^ attakilamathānuyogañca sandhāyāha. ^b^Anariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesi^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Pañcavaggiyāpī^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ gihibhogaṃ anuyuttā taṃ pahāya pabbajitvā attakilamathānuyoge ṭhitā satthu dhammacakkapavattanadesanāya (saṃ. ni. 5.1081; mahāva. 13; paṭi. ma. 2.30) tampi pahāya ariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesiṃsūti.

[03]^b^277^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmaṃ ^a^M2.0128^ea^^b^dahara^eb^-saddo ‘‘daharaṃ kumāraṃ mandaṃ uttānaseyyaka’’nti (ma. ni. 1.496) ettha bāladārake āgato, ‘‘bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato’’ti pana vakkhamānattā yuvāvatthā idha dahara-saddena vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘taruṇova samāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhamavayena^eb^ ekūnatiṃsavayattā. Jātiyā hi yāva tettiṃsavayā paṭhamavayo. ^b^Anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ^eb^ yathā ‘‘devadattassa rudantassa pabbajī’’ti. Kāmaṃ assumuccanaṃ rodanaṃ, taṃ ^b^assumukhāna^eb^nti iminā pakāsitaṃ, taṃ pana vatvā ^b^‘‘rudantāna’’^eb^nti vacanaṃ balavasokasamuṭṭhānaṃ ārodanavatthuṃ pakāsetīti āha ^b^‘‘kanditvā rodamānāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kiṃ kusalanti gavesamāno^eb^ti kinti sabbaso avajjarahitaṃ ekanta niyyānikaṃ pariyesamāno. ^b^Varapada^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi ekantena varaṇīyaṭṭhena varaṃ, pajjitabbaṭṭhena padaṃ. Tuṅgasarīratāya dīgho, piṅgalacakkhutāya piṅgaloti ^b^dīghapiṅgalo. Dhammo^eb^ti vinayo, samayoti attho. ^b^Sutvāva uggaṇhi^eb^nti tena vuccamānassa savanamatteneva uggaṇhiṃ vācuggataṃ akāsiṃ.

[03]^b^Paṭilapanamattakenā^eb^ti puna lapanamattakena. Jānātīti ñāṇo, ñāṇoti vādo ñāṇavādo, taṃ ^b^ñāṇavādaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Vadāmī’’ti āgatattā ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘jānāmī’’^eb^ti uttamapurisavasena attho vutto. ^b^Aññepi bahū^eb^ti aññepi bahū mama tathābhāvaṃ jānantā ‘‘ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ jānātī’’ti, ‘‘akampanīyatāya thiro’’ti vā evaṃ vadanti. ^b^Lābhīti aññāsī^eb^ti dhammassa uddisanena mahāpaññatāya ‘‘ayaṃ attanā gatamaggaṃ pavedeti, na anussutiko’’ti aññāsi. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bodhisattassa. ^b^Etadahosī^eb^ti etaṃ ‘‘na kho āḷāro kālāmo’’tiādi manasi ahosi, cintesīti attho.

[03]Heṭṭhimasamāpattīhi vinā uparimasamāpattīnaṃ sampādanassa asambhavato ^b^‘‘satta samāpattiyo maṃ jānāpesī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Payogaṃ kareyya^eb^nti bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjeyyanti attho. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘ahaṃ, āvuso’’tiādimāha, sattannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhigamaṃ paccaññāsīti attho.

[03]^b^Anusūyako^eb^ti anissukī. Tena mahāpurise pasādaṃ pavedesi. Bodhisattassa tā samāpattiyo ^a^V2.0122^ea^ nibbattetvā ṭhitassa purimajātiparicayena ñāṇassa ca mahantatāya tāsaṃ gati ca abhisamparāyo ca upaṭṭhāsi ^a^M2.0129^ea^. Tena ‘‘vaṭṭapariyāpannā evetā’’ti nicchayo udapādi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nāyaṃ dhammo nibbidāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Ekaccānaṃ virāgabhāvanāsamatikkamāvahopi neva tesampi accantāya samatikkamāvaho, sayañca vaṭṭapariyāpannoyeva, tasmā neva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya, yadaggena na nibbidāya, tadaggena na virajjanatthāya, rāgādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ na nirujjhanatthāya, na upasamatthāya, tasmā taṃ abhiññeyyadhammaṃ na abhijānanatthāya…pe… saṃvattatīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Yāvadeva ākiñcaññāyatanupapattiyā^eb^ti sattasu samāpattīsu ukkaṭṭhaṃ gahetvā vadati. Uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya acutidhammaṃ pariyesituṃ yuttattā tañca anatikkantajātidhammamevāti mahāsatto pajahatīti āha ^b^‘‘yañca ṭhānaṃ pāpetī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti yadā samāpattidhammassa gatiñca abhisamparāyañca abbhaññāsi, tato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Makkhikāvasenā^eb^ti bhojanassa makkhikāmissatāvasena. ^b^Manaṃ na uppādeti^eb^ bhuñjitunti adhippāyo. ^b^Mahantena ussāhenā^eb^ti idaṃ katipāhaṃ tattha bhāvanānuyogamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ viya kasiṇaparikammādikaraṇaṃ. Na hi antimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ samāpattinibbattane bhāriyaṃ nāma. ^b^Analaṅkaritvā^eb^ti anu anu alaṃkatvā punappunaṃ ‘‘iminā na kiñci payojana’’nti katvā.
[03]^b^278^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vācāya uggahitamattovā^eb^ti ettha pubbe vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^279^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahāvelā viya ^b^mahāvelā,^eb^ vipulavālikapuñjatāya mahanto velātaṭo viyāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāvālikarāsīti attho’’^eb^ti. Uru maru sikatā vālukā vaṇṇu vālikāti ime saddā samānatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.

[03]Senā nigacchi nivisi etthāti ^b^senānigamo,^eb^ senāya niviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Senānigāmo^eb^ti pana ayaṃ samaññā aparakālikā. Gocaragāmanidassanañcetaṃ. ^b^Uparisuttasmi^eb^nti mahāsaccakasutte. ^b^Idha pana bodhipallaṅko adhippeto^eb^ ariyapariyesanāya vuccamānattā.

[03]^b^280^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Ñāṇadassana’’nti ^a^M2.0130^ea^ ca ekajjhaṃ gahitapadadvayavisayavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā ‘‘me’’ti ca gahitattā anavasesañeyyāvabodhanasamatthameva ñāṇavisesaṃ bodheti, na ñāṇamattaṃ, na dassanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘sabbadhammadassanasamatthañca me sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akuppatāyā^eb^ti vimokkhantatāya sabbaso paṭipakkhadhammehi asaṅkhobhanīyatāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rāgādīhi^eb^^a^V2.0123^ea^^b^na kuppatī’’^eb^ti. Ārammaṇasantatāyapi tadārammaṇānaṃ atthi viseso yathā taṃ ‘‘āneñjavihāre’’ti āha ^b^‘‘akuppārammaṇatāya cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paccavekkhaṇañāṇampī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇameva, atha kho yathādhigate paṭivedhasaddhamme ekūnavīsatividhapaccavekkhaṇañāṇampi.

[03]^b^281^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭividdhoti^eb^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.64; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.172; sārattha. ṭī. mahāvagga 3.7) sayambhuñāṇena ‘‘idaṃ dukkha’’ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ nibbijjhanavasena patto, yathābhūtaṃ avabuddhoti attho. ^b^Gambhīro^eb^ti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uttānabhāvapaṭikkhepavacanameta’’^eb^nti. Yo alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho, so ogāhitumasakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato ca passituṃ na sakkāti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīrattāva duddaso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhena daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti kicchena kenacideva daṭṭhabbo. Yaṃ pana daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha ^b^‘‘duddasattāva duranubodho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhena avabujjhitabbo^eb^ avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne – ‘‘taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā’’ti ^b^suttapadaṃ^eb^ (saṃ. ni. 5.1115) vattabbaṃ. Santārammaṇatāya vā ^b^santo.^eb^ Nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya^b^ nibbuto^eb^. Padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti vā ^b^paṇīto^eb^. Atittikaraṭṭhena ^b^atappako^eb^ sādurasabhojanaṃ viya. Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti ^b^santārammaṇaṃ,^eb^ maggasaccaṃ santaṃ santārammaṇañcāti ^b^santārammaṇaṃ^eb^. Anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ saṅkhārānañca abhāvato nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya santapaṇītabhāveneva ca asecanakatāya atappakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vutta’’^eb^nti. Uttamañāṇavisayattā ^b^na takkena avacaritabbo,^eb^ tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya ca ^b^saṇho^eb^. Sukhumasabhāvattā ca ^b^nipuṇo,^eb^ bālānaṃ avisayattā ^a^M2.0131^ea^ paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti ^b^paṇḍitavedanīyo^eb^. Ālīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena sevīyantīti ^b^ālayā,^eb^ pañca kāmaguṇā. Ālayanti allīyantī abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti ^b^ālayā,^eb^ taṇhāvicaritāni. ^b^Ramantī^eb^ti ratiṃ vindanti kīḷanti laḷanti. ^b^Ālayaratā^eb^ti ālayaniratā.

[03]^b^Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti ṭhāna-saddaṃ sandhāya. Atthato pana ^b^ṭhāna^eb^nti ca paṭiccasamuppādo eva adhippeto. Tiṭṭhati phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ^b^ṭhānaṃ,^eb^ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā avijjādayo. Imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayāti idappaccayā, avijjādayova. Idappaccayā eva ^b^idappaccayatā^eb^ yathā ‘‘devo eva devatā’’ti, idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo ^a^V2.0124^ea^ uppādanasamatthatā ^b^idappaccayatā^eb^. Tena samatthapaccayalakkhaṇo paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hoti. Paṭicca samuppajjati phalaṃ etasmāti ^b^paṭiccasamuppādo^eb^. Padadvayenapi dhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭho eva vibhāvito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ etaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.572-573) vuttanayena veditabbo.

[03]^b^Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabba^eb^nti sabbasaṅkhārasamathādisaddābhidheyyaṃ sabbaṃ atthato ^b^nibbānameva^eb^. Idāni tassa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^Āgammā^eb^ti paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvahetu. ^b^Sammantī^eb^ti appaṭisandhikūpasamavasena sammanti. Tathā santā savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘vūpasammantī’’^eb^ti. Etena ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamatho,^eb^ nibbāna’’nti dasseti. Sabbasaṅkhatavisaṃyutte ca nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Paṭinissaṭṭhā^eb^ti samucchedavasena pariccattā honti. ^b^Sabbā taṇhā^eb^ti aṭṭhasatappabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā. ^b^Sabbe kilesarāgā^eb^ti kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā, sabbepi vā kilesā idha ‘‘kilesarāgā’’ti veditabbā, na lobhavisesā eva cittassa vipariṇatabhāvāpādanato ^a^M2.0132^ea^. Yathāha ‘‘rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇata’’nti (pārā. 271). ^b^Virajjantī^eb^ti palujjanti.

[03]Ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena ^b^kāyakilamatho^eb^ ceva ^b^kāyavihesā^eb^ ca veditabbā. Sā ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ vasena vuttā, jānantānaṃ pana desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamova. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesī’’ti (udā. 10). Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so mama kilamatho assā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhaya^eb^nti cittakilamatho ceva cittavihesā cāti ubhayampetaṃ ^b^buddhānaṃ natthi^eb^ bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.

[03]^b^Anubrūhanaṃ^eb^ sampiṇḍanaṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti ‘‘apissū’’ti nipāto. ^b^Ma^eb^nti paṭi-saddayogena sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘mamā’’^eb^ti. Vuddhippattā vā acchariyā ^b^anacchariyā^eb^. Vuddhiatthopi hi a-kāro hoti yathā ‘‘asekkhā dhammā’’ti (dha. sa. 11ṭikamātikā). Kappānaṃ satasahassaṃ cattāri ca asaṅkhyeyyāni sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo pūretvā ^a^V2.0125^ea^ idāni adhigatadhammarajjassa tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanatā, gāthātthassa acchariyatā, tassa vuddhippatti cāti veditabbaṃ. Atthadvārena hi gāthānaṃ anacchariyatā. ^b^Gocarā ahesu^eb^nti upaṭṭhahesuṃ. Upaṭṭhānañca vitakketabbatāti āha ^b^‘‘parivitakkayitabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃsū’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yadi sukhāpaṭipadāva, kathaṃ kicchatāti āha ^b^‘‘pāramīpūraṇakāle panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evamādīni^eb^ duppariccajāni ^b^dentassa. Ha^eb^-iti vā ‘‘byatta’’nti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto. Ekaṃsattheti keci. Ha byattaṃ, ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa desitanti yojanā. ^b^Hala^eb^nti vā ‘‘ala’’nti iminā samānatthaṃ padaṃ ‘‘halanti vadāmī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.65; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.172) viya. ^b^Rāgadosapariphuṭṭhehī^eb^ti phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena dosena ca samphuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehi. ^b^Rāgadosānugatehī^eb^ti rāgena ca dosena ca anubandhehi.

[03]Kāmarāgarattā ^a^M2.0133^ea^ bhavarāgarattā ca nīvaraṇehi nivutatāya, diṭṭhirāgarattā viparītābhinivesena. ^b^Na dakkhantī^eb^ti yāthāvato dhammaṃ na paṭivijjhissanti. ^b^Evaṃ gāhāpetu^eb^nti ‘‘anicca’’ntiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhammaṃ jānāpetuṃ. Rāgadosaparetatāpi nesaṃ sammūḷhabhāvenevāti āha ^b^‘‘tamokhandhena āvuṭā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^282^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā panā’’^eb^tiādinā sayameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tattha ^b^aññātavesenā^eb^ti imassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvūpagamanena aññātarūpena. Tāpasavesenāti keci. So pana arahattādhigameneva vigaccheyya. Tividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ appossukkatāpattiyā paṭipakkhassa balavabhāvo, dhammassa gambhīratā, tattha ca sātisayaṃ gāravanti, ta dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tassa hī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. (Tattha ^b^paṭipakkhā^eb^ nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarattā. Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalapurisaṃ adhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā anekasatayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sunicitaṃ ghanasannivesaṃ kaṇṭakaduggampi adhisenti. Dūrappabhedaducchejjatāhi dubbisodhiyataṃ pana dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘athassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ca anto amaṭṭhatāya ^b^kañjiyapuṇṇā lābu^eb^. Cirapārivāsikatāya ^b^takkabharitā cāṭi^eb^. Snehatintadubbalabhāvena ^b^vasāpītapilotikā^eb^. Telamissitatāya ^b^añjanamakkhitahattho^eb^ dubbisodhanīyā vuttā, hīnūpamā cetā rūpapabandhabhāvato acirakālikattā ca malīnatāya, kilesasaṃkileso eva pana dubbisodhanīyataro anādikālikattā ^a^V2.0126^ea^ anusayitattā ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atisaṃkiliṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Yathā ca dubbisodhanīyataratāya, evaṃ gambhīraduddasaduranubodhānampi vuttaupamā hīnūpamāva).

[03]Paṭipakkhavigamanena gambhīropi dhammo supākaṭo bhaveyya. Paṭipakkhavigamanaṃ pana sammāpaṭipattipaṭibaddhaṃ, sā saddhammassavanādhīnā. Taṃ satthari dhamme ca pasādāyattaṃ, so garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ ajjhesanahetukoti panāḷikāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā brahmayācanānimittanti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Upakkilesabhūtaṃ ^a^M2.0134^ea^ appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etassāti apparajaṃ, apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti katvā ^b^apparajakkhajātikā^eb^ti ayamattho vibhāvito ^b^‘‘paññāmaye’’^eb^tiādinā. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ taṃsabhāvā ^b^apparajakkhajātikā^eb^ti evampi saddattho sambhavati. Dānādidasapuññakiriyavatthūni saraṇagamanaparahitapariṇāmanehi saddhiṃ (dvādasa hontīti) ^b^‘‘dvādasapuññakiriyavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Rāgādimalena ^b^samalehi^eb^ pūraṇādīhi ^b^chahi satthārehi^eb^ satthupaṭiññehi kabbaracanāvasena cintākaviādibhāve ṭhatvā takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ ^b^cintito^eb^. Te kira buddhakolāhalānussavena sañjātakutūhalaṃ lokaṃ vañcetvā kohaññe ṭhatvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānantā yaṃ kiñci adhammaṃyeva dhammoti dīpesuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Apāpureta^eb^nti etaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānanagarassa mahādvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ saddhammadesanāhatthena apāpura vivara.

[03]Selapabbato ucco hoti thiro ca, na paṃsupabbato missakapabbato cāti āha ^b^‘‘sele yathā pabbatamuddhanī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammamayaṃ pāsāda^eb^nti lokuttaradhammamāha. So hi sabbaso pasādāvaho, sabbadhamme atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca. Paññāpariyāyo vā idha ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo. Sā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena ‘‘pāsādo’’ti ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 16) niddiṭṭhā. Tathā cāha –
[21]‘‘Paññāpāsādamāruyha, asoko sokiniṃ pajaṃ;
[22]Pabbataṭṭhova bhūmaṭṭhe, dhīro bāle avekkhatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 28);
[03]^b^Uṭṭhehī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0127^ea^ vā dhammadesanāya appossukkatāsaṅkhātasaṅkocāpattito kilāsubhāvato uṭṭhaha.

[03]^b^283^eb^^b^.^eb^ Garuṭṭhāniyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā ajjhesanā, sāpi atthato yācanāva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ajjhesananti yācana’’^eb^nti. Padesavisayaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ ahutvā buddhānaṃyeva ^a^M2.0135^ea^ āveṇikabhāvato idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ ‘‘buddhacakkhū’’ti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ buddhacakkhūti nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇāna^eb^nti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammacakkhū’’^eb^ti nāmaṃ catusaccadhammadassanamattabhāvato. Yato tāni ñāṇāni vijjūpamabhāvena vuttāni, aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā na dassanamattaṃ hotīti ‘‘dhammacakkhū’’ti na vuccati, tato taṃ vajirūpamabhāvena vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘apparajakkhā’’ti ettha vuttanayena. Yasmā mandakilesā ^b^‘‘apparajakkhā’’^eb^ti vuttā, tasmā bahalakilesā ^b^‘‘mahārajakkhā’’^eb^ti veditabbā. Paṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya ^b^tikkhāni^eb^ sūrāni visadāni, vuttavipariyāyena ^b^mudūni. Saddhādayo ākārā^eb^ti saddahanādippakāre vadati. ^b^Sundarā^eb^ti kalyāṇā. ^b^Sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ (vibha. aṭṭha. 814) pana ‘‘yesaṃ āsayādayo koṭṭhāsā sundarā, te svākārā, viparītā dvākārā’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandati sametīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma paccayākāro, saccāni vā.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ panettha pāḷī^eb^ti ettha apparajakkhādipadānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassatthassa vibhāvanī pāḷi. Saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ balavabhāvo tappaṭipakkhānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dubbalabhāveneva hoti, tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvenāti vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ atthitānatthitāvasena apparajakkhamahārajakkhatādayo pāḷiyaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā. Khandhādayo eva lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena ^b^loko^eb^. Sampattibhavabhūto loko ^b^sampattibhavaloko,^eb^ sugatisaṅkhāto upapattibhavo. Sampatti sambhavati etenāti ^b^sampattisambhavaloko^eb^. Sugatisaṃvattaniyo kammabhavo. Duggati saṅkhātaupapattibhavaduggati saṃvattaniyakammabhavā ^b^vipattibhavalokavipattisambhavalokā^eb^.

[03]Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘eko loko’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Āhārādayo viya hi āhāraṭṭhitikā saṅkhārā lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti. Ettha ^b^eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā^eb^ti yāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavutti, tāya sabbe saṅkhārā ekova loko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato. ^b^Dve lokā^eb^tiādīsupi iminā ^a^M2.0136^ea^ nayena attho veditabbo. Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā. Nanu ca ^b^āhāraṭṭhitikā^eb^ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā ^a^V2.0128^ea^ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ idha ‘‘loko’’ti adhippetattā. Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṃ-gahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā ^b^upādānakkhandhā. Dasāyatanānī^eb^ti dasa rūpāyatanāni. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.

[03]Vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa adhippetattā tassa ca sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ garahitabbaṃ vajjitabbañca hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjaṃ, sabbe bhavagāmikammā vajja’’^eb^nti. Apparajakkhamahārajakkhādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa katvā ^b^‘‘paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā anvayato byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Ettha ca apparajakkhādibhabbādivasena āvajjentassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.

[03]Uppalāni ettha santīti ^b^uppalinī,^eb^ gacchopi jalāsayopi, idha pana jalāsayo adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘uppalavane’’^eb^ti. Yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti, tāni ^b^antonimuggaposīni. Dīpitānī^eb^ti ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pakāsitāni, idheva vā ‘‘aññānipī’’tiādinā bhāsitāni.

[03]^b^Ugghaṭitaññū^eb^ti ugghaṭitaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ, ñāṇe ugghaṭitamatte eva jānātīti attho. Vipañcitaṃ vitthāritameva atthaṃ jānātīti ^b^vipañcitaññū^eb^. Uddesādīhi netabboti ^b^neyyo. Saha udāhaṭavelāyā^eb^ti udāhāre udāhaṭamatteyeva. ^b^Dhammābhisamayo^eb^ti catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ^b^‘‘ugghaṭitaññū’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe ^a^M2.0137^ea^ vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo ^b^‘‘vipañcitaññū’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Uddesato^eb^ti uddesahetu, uddisantassa, uddisāpentassa vāti attho. ^b^Paripucchato^eb^ti atthaṃ paripucchantassa. ^b^Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti anukkamena arahattappatti hoti. ^b^Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamo^eb^ti ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamoti vuccati.

[03]^b^Kammāvaraṇenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0129^ea^ (vibha. aṭṭha. 826) pañcavidhena ānantariyakammena. ^b^Vipākāvaraṇenā^eb^ti ahetukapaṭisandhiyā. Yasmā pana duhetukānampi ariyamaggapaṭivedho natthi, tasmā duhetukā paṭisandhipi ‘‘vipākāvaraṇamevā’’ti veditabbā. ^b^Kilesāvaraṇenā^eb^ti niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā. ^b^Assaddhā^eb^ti buddhādīsu saddhārahitā. ^b^Acchandikā^eb^ti kattukamyatākusalacchandarahitā. Uttarakurukā manussā acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. ^b^Duppaññā^eb^ti bhavaṅgapaññāya parihīnā. Bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti, sopi duppañño eva nāma. ^b^Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta^eb^nti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā. ^b^Na kammāvaraṇenā^eb^tiādīni vuttavipariyāyena veditabbāni.

[03]^b^Nibbānassa dvāraṃ^eb^ pavisanamaggo. ^b^Vivaritvā ṭhapito^eb^ mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhuñāṇena adhigatattā. ^b^Saddhaṃ pamuñcantū^eb^ti attano saddhaṃ pavesentu, saddahanākāraṃ upaṭṭhapentūti attho. Sukhena akicchena pavattanīyatāya ^b^suppavattitaṃ. Na bhāsiṃ^eb^ na bhāsissāmīti cintesiṃ.

[03]^b^284^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dhammaṃ desessāmīti evaṃ pavattitadhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttassa vitakkassa sattamasattāhato paraṃ aṭṭhamasattāheyeva uppannattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhame sattāhe’’^eb^ti. Na itarasattāhāni viya paṭiniyatakiccalakkhitassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma pavattitassa sabbhāvā.

[03]^b^Vivaṭa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0138^ea^ devatāviggahena vivaṭāṅgapaccaṅganiddāya janānaṃ pākaṭaṃ vippakāranti attho. ‘‘Buddhattaṃ anadhigantvā na paccāgamissāmī’’ti uppannavitakkātisayahetukena ^b^pathavīparivattanacetiyaṃ nāma dassetvā^eb^. Sākiyakoliyamallarajjavasena ^b^tīṇi rajjāni. Rukkhamūle^eb^ti nigrodhamūle. ^b^Vatvā pakkāmi,^eb^ pakkamantiyā cassā mahāsatto ākāraṃ dassesi suvaṇṇathālaggahaṇāya, sā ‘‘tumhākaṃ taṃ pariccattamevā’’ti pakkāmi.

[03]^b^Divāvihāraṃ katvā^eb^ti nānāsamāpattiyo samāpajjanena divāvihāraṃ viharitvā. ‘‘Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, upasussatu sarīre maṃsalohita’’ntiādinā ^b^sutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 2.184; saṃ. ni. 2.237; a. ni. 2.5; 8.13; mahāni. 17, 196) āgatanayena ^b^caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^.

[03]^b^Navayojana^eb^nti ubbedhato vuttaṃ, puthulato dvādasayojanā, dīghato yāva cakkavāḷā āyatāti ^a^V2.0130^ea^ vadanti. Ajjhottharanto upasaṅkamitvā – ‘‘uṭṭhehi so, siddhattha, ahaṃ imassa pallaṅkassa anucchaviko’’ti vatvā tattha sakkhiṃ otārento attano parisaṃ niddisi. Ekappahāreneva – ‘‘ayameva anucchaviko, ayameva anucchaviko’’ti kolāhalamakāsi, taṃ sutvā ^b^mahāsatto…pe… hatthaṃ pasāreti^eb^. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Acetanāyaṃ pathavī, aviññāya sukhaṃ dukhaṃ;
[22]Sāpi dānabalā mayhaṃ, sattakkhattuṃ pakampathā’’ti. (cariyā. 1.124);

[03]Pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ visodhetvāti ānetvā sambandho sīhāvalokanañāyena. ^b^Vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ sammasitvā^eb^ti catusaccamanasikāraṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Imassa pallaṅkassa atthāyā^eb^ti pallaṅkasīsena adhigatavisesaṃ dasseti. Tattha hi sikhāppattavimuttisukhaṃ avijahanto antarantarā ca paṭiccasamuppādaṅgaṃ manasikaronto ekapallaṅkena nisīdi. ^b^Ekaccāna^eb^nti yā adhigatamaggā sacchikatanirodhā ekadesena ca buddhaguṇe jānanti, tā ṭhapetvā tadaññesaṃ devatānaṃ. ^b^Aññepi buddhattakarā^eb^ti visākhāpuṇṇamato paṭṭhāya rattindivaṃ evaṃ niccasamāhitabhāvahetukānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ upari aññepi ^a^M2.0139^ea^ buddhattasādhakā, ‘‘ayaṃ buddho’’ti buddhabhāvassa paresaṃ vibhāvanā dhammā kiṃ nu kho atthīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Animisehī^eb^ti dhammapītivipphāravasena pasādavikasitaniccalatāya nimesarahitehi. ^b^Ratanacaṅkame^eb^ti devatāhi māpite ratanamayacaṅkame. Ratanabhūtānaṃ sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ tattha ca anantanayassa dhammaratanassa sammasanena ^b^taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jāta^eb^ntipi vadanti. ^b^Evanti^eb^ vakkhamānākārena. Chabbaṇṇānaṃ rasmīnaṃ dantehi nikkhamanato ^b^chaddantanāgakulaṃ viyā^eb^ti nidassanaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇo^eb^ti navabhūmakassa sabbapaṭhamassa lohapāsādassa heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇo. ^b^Khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (mahāva. aṭṭha. 5) pana tattha ‘‘bhaṇḍāgāragabbhappamāṇa’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Paccagghe^eb^ti abhinave. Paccekaṃ mahagghatāya ^b^paccagghe^eb^ti keci, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Na hi buddhā bhagavanto mahagghaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti paribhuñjanti vā. ^b^Piṇḍapāta^eb^nti ettha manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ^a^V2.0131^ea^ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Ayaṃ vitakko^eb^ti – ‘‘kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya’’nti ayaṃ parivitakko.

[03]^b^Paṇḍiccenā^eb^ti samāpattipaṭilābhasaṃsiddhena adhigamabāhusaccasaṅkhātena paṇḍitabhāvena. ^b^Veyyattiyenā^eb^ti samāpattipaṭilābhapaccayena pārihāriyapaññāsaṅkhātena byattabhāvena. ^b^Medhāvī^eb^ti tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāsaṅkhātāya taṃtaṃitikattabbatāpaññāsaṅkhātāya ca medhāya samannāgatoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Mahājāniyo^eb^ti mahāparihāniko. ^b^Āgamanapādāpi natthī^eb^ti idaṃ paṭhamaṃ vattabbaṃ, athāhaṃ tattha gaccheyyaṃ, gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa sotuṃ sotapasādopi natthīti yojanā. Kiṃ pana bhagavatā attano buddhānubhāvena te dhammaṃ ñāpetuṃ na sakkāti? Āma, na sakkā. Na hi parato ghosaṃ antarena sāvakānaṃ dhammābhisamayo sambhavati, aññathā itarapaccayarahitassapi dhammābhisamayena bhavitabbaṃ, na ca taṃ atthi. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘dveme, bhikkhave, paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya parato ca ghoso ajjhattañca yonisomanasikāro’’ti (a. ni. 2.127). Pāḷiyaṃ rāmasseva samāpattilābhitā āgatā, na udakassa, taṃ tassa bodhisattena samāgatakālavasena vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0140^ea^. So hi pubbepi tattha yuttappayutto viharanto mahāpurisena khippaññeva samāpattīnaṃ nibbattitabhāvaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto mahāsatte tato nibbijja pakkante ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbattoti addasā’’^eb^ti. Ete aṭṭha brāhmaṇāti sambandho. ^b^Chaḷaṅgavā^eb^ti chaḷaṅgaviduno. ^b^Manta^eb^nti mantapadaṃ. ‘‘Nijjhāyitvā’’ti vacanaseso, mantetvāti attho. ^b^Viyākariṃsū^eb^ti kathesuṃ.

[03]^b^Yathāmantapada^eb^nti lakkhaṇamantasaṅkhātavedavacanānurūpaṃ. ^b^Gatā^eb^ti paṭipannā. ‘‘Dveva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.33; 3.199-200; ma. ni. 2.384, 398) vuttaniyāmena nicchinituṃ asakkontā brāhmaṇā vuttameva paṭipajjiṃsu, na mahāpurisassa buddhabhāvappattiṃ paccāsīsiṃsu. ^b^Ime pana^eb^ koṇḍaññādayo ^b^pañca^eb^ ‘‘ekaṃsato buddho bhavissatī’’ti jātanicchayattā ^b^mantapadaṃ atikkantā. Puṇṇapatta^eb^nti tuṭṭhidānaṃ. ^b^Nibbitakkā^eb^ti nibbikappā, na dvedhā takkā.

[03]^b^Vappakāle^eb^ti vapanakāle. Vapanatthaṃ bījāni nīharaṇantena tattha aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ ^b^bījaggadānaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^Lāyanaggā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. Dhaññaphalassa nātipariṇatakāle ^b^puthukakāle. Lāyane^eb^ti sassalāyane. Yathā lūnaṃ hatthakaṃ katvā veṇivasena bandhanaṃ ^b^veṇikaraṇaṃ^eb^. Veṇiyo pana purisabhāravasena ^a^V2.0132^ea^ bandhanaṃ ^b^kalāpo^eb^. Khale kalāpānaṃ ṭhapanadivase aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ ^b^khalaggaṃ^eb^. Madditvā vīhīnaṃ rāsikaraṇadivase aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ ^b^bhaṇḍaggaṃ^eb^. Koṭṭhāgāre dhaññassa pakkhipanadivase dānaṃ ^b^koṭṭhaggaṃ. Uddharitvā^eb^ti khalato dhaññassa uddharitvā. ^b^Navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattā^eb^ti idaṃ tassa rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvatthāya katābhinīhārānurūpaṃ pavattitasāvakapāramiyā ciṇṇante pavattitattā vuttaṃ. Tiṇṇampi hi bodhisattānaṃ taṃtaṃpāramiyā sikhāppattakāle pavattitaṃ puññaṃ apuññaṃ vā garutaravipākameva hoti, dhammassa ca sabbapaṭhamaṃ sacchikiriyāya vinā kathaṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvasiddhīti. ^b^Bahukārā kho ime pañcavaggiyā^eb^ti idaṃ pana upakārānussaraṇamattakameva paricayavasena āḷārudakānussaraṇaṃ viya.

[03]^b^285^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vivare^eb^ti majjhe. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tigāvutantare ṭhāne’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti^eb^ sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarā-saddayogena ^a^M2.0141^ea^ upayogavacanassa icchitattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antarāsaddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kata’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ abhibhavitvā^eb^ pariññābhisamayavasena atikkamitvā. ^b^Catubhūmakadhammaṃ^eb^ anavasesaṃ ñeyyaṃ sabbaso ñeyyāvaraṇassa pahīnattā sabbaññutaññāṇena ^b^avediṃ^eb^. Rajjanadussanamuyhanādinā ^b^kilesena^eb^. Appahātabbampi kusalābyākataṃ tappaṭibaddhakilesamathanena pahīnattā na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena.

[03]Kiñcāpi lokiyadhammānampi yādiso lokanāthassa adhigamo, na tādiso adhigamo parūpadeso atthi, lokuttaradhamme panassa lesopi natthīti āha ^b^‘‘lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭibhāgapuggalo^eb^ti sīlādīhi guṇehi paṭinidhibhūto puggalo. ^b^Sahetunā^eb^ti sahadhammena sapāṭihīrakatāya. ^b^Nayenā^eb^ti abhijānanatādividhinā. ^b^Cattāri saccānī^eb^ti idaṃ tabbinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. ^b^Sayaṃ buddho^eb^ti sayameva sayambhuñāṇena buddho. Vigatapariḷāhatāya ^b^sītibhūto^eb^. Tato eva ^b^nibbuto. Āhañchanti^eb^ āhanissāmi. Veneyyānaṃ amatādhigamāya ugghosanādiṃ katvā satthu dhammadesanā ^b^amatadundubhī^eb^ti vuttā.

[03]Anantañāṇo jitakilesoti ^b^anantajino. Evampi nāma bhaveyyā^eb^ti evaṃvidhe nāma rūparatane īdisena ñāṇena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ hissa pabbajjāya paccayo jāto, katādhikāro cesa. Tathā hi bhagavā tena samāgamatthaṃ padasāva taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
[03]^b^Koṭṭhāsasampannā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0133^ea^ aṅgapaccaṅgasaṅkhātāvayavasampannā. ^b^Aṭṭīyatī^eb^ti aṭṭo hoti, domanassaṃ āpajjatīti attho.

[03]^b^Avihaṃ upapannāse^eb^ti avihesu nibbattā. ^b^Vimuttā^eb^ti aggaphalavimuttiyā vimuttā. ^b^Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upajjhagu^eb^nti te upakā dayo mānusaṃ attabhāvaṃ jahitvā orambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānena avihesu nibbattamattāva aggamaggādhigamena dibbayogaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanaṃ samatikkamiṃsu.

[03]^b^286^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṇṭhapesu^eb^nti ^a^M2.0142^ea^ ‘‘neva abhivādetabbo’’tiādinā (mahāva. 12) saṇṭhaṃ kiriyākāraṃ akaṃsu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘katikaṃ akaṃsū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Padhānato^eb^ti pubbe anuṭṭhitadukkaracaraṇato. ^b^Pabhāvita^eb^nti vācāsamuṭṭhānaṃ, vacīnicchāraṇanti attho. ‘‘Ayaṃ na kiñci visesaṃ adhigamissatī’’ti ^b^anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Mayaṃ yattha katthaci gamissāmā’’ti ^b^mā vitakkayittha. Obhāso^eb^ti vipassanobhāso. ^b^Nimitta^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ. ^b^Ekapadenevā^eb^ti ekavacaneneva. ‘‘Anena pubbepi na kiñci micchā vuttapubba’’nti ^b^satiṃ labhitvā^eb^. Yathābhūtavādīti ^b^uppannagāravā^eb^.

[03]^b^Antovihāreyeva ahosi^eb^ daharakumāro viya tehi bhikkhūhi pariharito. ^b^Male^eb^ti saṃkilese. Gāmato bhikkhūhi nīhaṭaṃ upanītaṃ bhattaṃ etassāti nīhaṭabhatto, tena ^b^nīhaṭabhattena^eb^ bhagavatā. ^b^Ettakaṃ kathāmagga^eb^nti – ‘‘dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanā’’ti ārabhitvā yāva – ‘‘natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti padaṃ, ettakaṃ desanāmaggaṃ. Kāmañcettha – ‘‘tumhepi mamañceva pañcavaggiyānañca maggaṃ ārūḷhā, ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ pariyesanā’’ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ. Tena pana – ‘‘so kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, attanā jātidhammo samāno…pe… asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ ajjhagamanti, atha kho, bhikkhave, pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū mayā evaṃ ovadiyamānā…pe… anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ ajjhagamaṃsu…pe… natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti imasseva suttapadassa attho vibhāvitoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā yaṃ pubbe avaca tumhepi mamañceva pañcavaggiyānañca maggaṃ āruḷhā, ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ pariyesanāti. Imaṃ ekameva anusandhiṃ dassento āharī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^287^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anagāriyānampī^eb^ti pabbajitānampi. ^b^Pañcakāmaguṇavasena anariyapariyesanā hoti^eb^ gadhitādibhāvena paribhuñjanato. Micchājīvavasenapi anariyapariyesanā hotīti tato visesanatthaṃ ^a^V2.0134^ea^^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ sacchandarāgaparibhogassa adhippetattā. Idāni catūsu paccayesu kāmaguṇe niddhāretuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Paribhogaraso^eb^ti paribhogapaccayapītisomanassaṃ. Ayaṃ pana rasasamānatāvasena gahaṇaṃ upādāya ^a^M2.0143^ea^ ‘‘raso’’ti vutto, na sabhāvato. Sabhāvena gahaṇaṃ upādāya pītisomanassaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ siyā, na rasārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Appaccavekkhaṇaparibhogo^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇarahito paribhogo, idamatthitaṃ anissāya gadhitādibhāvena paribhogoti attho. ^b^Gadhitā^eb^ti taṇhāya baddhā. ^b^Mucchitā^eb^ti mucchaṃ mohaṃ pamādaṃ āpannā. ^b^Ajjhogāḷhā^eb^ti adhiogāḷhā, taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā ṭhitā. ^b^Ādīnavaṃ apassantā^eb^ti sacchandarāgaparibhoge dosaṃ ajānantā. Apaccavekkhitaparibhogahetuādīnavaṃ nissarati atikkamati etenāti ^b^nissaraṇaṃ,^eb^ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Pāsarāsi^eb^nti pāsasamudāyaṃ. Luddako hi pāsaṃ oḍḍento na ekaṃyeva, na ca ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne oḍḍeti, atha kho taṃtaṃmigānaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ sallakkhetvā tattha tattha oḍḍento bahūyeva oḍḍeti, tasmā te cittena ekato gahetvā ^b^‘‘pāsarāsī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vāgurassa vā pāsapadesānaṃ bahubhāvato ^b^‘‘pāsarāsī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Pāsarāsisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^288^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Setaparivāro^eb^ti ^a^V2.0135^ea^ setapaṭicchado, setavaṇṇālaṅkāroti attho. Pubbe pana ‘‘setālaṅkārā’’ti assālaṅkāro gahito, idha cakkapañjarakubbarādirathāvayavesu kātabbālaṅkāro. ^b^Evaṃ vuttenā^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘setāya suda’’ntiādinā pakārena saṃyuttamahāvagge (saṃ. ni. 5.4) vuttena. ^b^Nātimahā^eb^ yuddhamaṇḍale sañcārasukhatthaṃ. Yodho sārathīti ^b^dvinnaṃ,^eb^ paharaṇadāyakena saddhiṃ ^b^tiṇṇaṃ vā^eb^.

[03]^b^Nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti^eb^ nagarasobhanatthaṃ. Idaṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇiṭṭhānantaraṃ jātisiddhaṃ paramparāgataṃ cārittaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ito ettakehi divasehī’’^eb^tiādi. Cārittavasena nagaravāsinopi tathā tathā paṭipajjanti. Puññavādimaṅgalakathane niyuttā ^b^māṅgalikā^eb^. Suvatthipattanāya ^b^sovatthikā. Ādi^eb^-saddena vandīādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Yasasirisampattiyā^eb^ti yasasampattiyā sirisampattiyā ca, parivārasampattiyā ceva vibhavasobhāsampattiyā cāti attho.

[03]^b^Nagarābhimukho^eb^^a^M2.0144^ea^^b^pāyāsi^eb^ attano bhikkhācāravelāya. ^b^Paṇḍito maññe^eb^ti ettha ^b^maññe^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘maññatī’’ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadaṃ. Tassa iti-saddaṃ ānetvā atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘paṇḍitoti maññatī’’^eb^ti āha. Anumatipucchāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘udāhu no’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Taṃ kiṃ maññati bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiya’’nti hi vuttamevatthaṃ puna gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘paṇḍito maññe’’^eb^ti āha. Tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhavaṃ vacchāyano, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṇḍitoti maññati, udāhu no’’^eb^ti, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ kathehīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Ahaṃ ko nāma,^eb^ mama avisayo esoti dasseti. ^b^Ko cā^eb^ti hetunissakke paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘kuto cā’’^eb^ti. Tathā cāha ^b^‘‘kena kāraṇena jānissāmī’’^eb^ti, yena kāraṇena samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyyaṃ, taṃ kāraṇaṃ mayi natthīti adhippāyo. ^b^Buddhoyeva bhaveyya,^eb^ abuddhassa sabbathā buddhañāṇānubhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, oramattakaṃ sīlamattakaṃ, yena puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya (dī. ni. 1.7), atthi, bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā ^a^V2.0136^ea^ …pe… yehi tathāgatassa yathābhuccaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.28) ca. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘sopi nūnassa tādisovā’’ti etasmiṃ pade. ^b^Pasattha pasattho^eb^ti pasatthehi attano guṇeheva so pasattho, na tassa kittinā, pasaṃsāsabhāveneva pāsaṃsoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbaguṇāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Maṇiratana^eb^nti cakkavattino maṇiratanaṃ. Sadevake loke pāsaṃsānampi pāsaṃsoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pasatthehi vā’’^eb^ti dutiyavikappo gahito.

[03]Araṇīyato attho, so eva vasatīti vasoti ^b^atthavaso,^eb^ tassa tassa payogassa ānisaṃsabhūtaṃ phalanti āha ^b^‘‘atthavasanti atthānisaṃsa’’^eb^nti. Attho vā vuttalakkhaṇo vaso etassāti ^b^atthavaso,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Nāgavanavāsiko^eb^ti hatthināgānaṃ vicaraṇavane tesaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ vasanako. ^b^Anuggahitasippo^eb^ti asikkhitahatthisippo āyatavitthatassa padamattassa dassanena ‘‘mahā vata, bho nāgo’’ti niṭṭhāgamanato. ^b^Parato pana^eb^ bhagavatā vuttaṭṭhāne. ^b^Uggahitasippo puriso nāgavanikoti āgato^eb^ āyatavitthatassa ^a^M2.0145^ea^ padassa uccassa ca nisevitassa byabhicārabhāvaṃ ñatvā tattakena niṭṭhaṃ agantvā mahāhatthiṃ disvāva niṭṭhāgamanato. Ñāṇaṃ pajjati etthāti ^b^ñāṇapadāni,^eb^ khattiyapaṇḍitādīnaṃ dhammavinaye vinītattā vinayehi adhigatajjhānādīni. Tāni hi tathāgatagandhahatthino desanāñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānāni. ^b^Cattārī^eb^ti pana vineyyānaṃ idha khattiyapaṇḍitādivasena catubbidhānaṃyeva gahitattā.

[03]^b^289^eb^^b^.^eb^ Puggalesu paññāya ca nipuṇatā paṇḍitasamaññā nipuṇatthassa dassanasamatthatāvasenevāti āha ^b^‘‘sukhumātthantarapaṭivijjhanasamatthe’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kata^eb^-saddo idha nipphannapariyāyo. Pare pavadanti ettha, etenāti ^b^parappavādo,^eb^ parasamayo. Parehi pavadanaṃ ^b^parappavādo,^eb^ viggāhikakathāya paravādamaddanaṃ. Tadubhayampi ekato katvā pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘viññātaparappavāde ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicaye cā’’^eb^ti, parasamayesu paravādamaddanesu ca nipphanneti attho. ^b^Vālavedhirūpe^eb^ti vālavedhipatirūpe. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vālavedhidhanuggahasadise’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vāla^eb^nti anekadhā bhinnassa vālassa aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ vālaṃ. ^b^Bhindantā viyā^eb^ti ghaṭādiṃ saviggahaṃ muggarādinā bhindantā viya, diṭṭhigatāni ekaṃsato bhindantāti adhippāyo. ‘‘Atthaṃ guyhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā pucchissāmā’’ti saṅkhataṃ padapañhaṃ pucchantīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dupadampī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Vadanti etenāti ^b^vādo,^eb^ doso. Pucchīyatīti ^b^pañho,^eb^ attho. Pucchati etenāti ^b^pañho,^eb^ saddo. Tadubhayaṃ ekato gahetvā āha ^b^‘‘evarūpe pañhe’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Evaṃ puccheyya, evaṃ vissajjeyyā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0137^ea^ ca pucchāvissajjanānaṃ sikhāvagamanaṃ dasseti. ^b^Seyyo^eb^ti uttamo, paramo lābhoti adhippāyo.

[03]Evaṃ attano vādavidhamanabhayenapi pare bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ na visahantīti vatvā idāni vādavidhamanena vināpi na visahanti evāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Cittaṃ pasīdati^eb^ pare attano attabhāvampi vissatthaṃ niyyādetukāmā honti odhisakamettāpharaṇasadisattā tassa mettāyanassa. ^b^Dassanasampannā^eb^ti daṭṭhabbatāya sampannā dassanānuttariyabhāvato, ativiya dassanīyāti attho.

[03]^b^Saraṇagamanavasena^eb^^a^M2.0146^ea^^b^sāvakā^eb^ti lokiyasaraṇagamanena sāvakā, lokuttarasaraṇagamanena pana sāvakattaṃ parato āgamissati, tañca pabbajitavasena vuccati, idha gahaṭṭhavasena, ubhayatthāpi saraṇagamanena sāvakattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Te hi paralokavajjabhayadassāvino kulaputtā, ācārakulaputtāpi tādisā bhavanti. ^b^Thokenā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘manaṃ anassāmā’’ti padassatthaṃ vadati.

[03]^b^290^eb^^b^.^eb^ Udāharīyati ubbegapītivasenāti, tathā vā udāharaṇaṃ ^b^udānaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘udāhāraṃ udāharī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assa dhammassā^eb^ti assa paṭipattisaddhammapubbakassa paṭivedhasaddhammassa. ^b^So^eb^ti hatthipadopamo hatthipadopamabhāvena vuccamāno dhammo. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ettakena paribbājakena vuttakathāmaggamattena. Kāmaṃ tena vuttakathāmaggenapi hatthipadopamabhāvena vuccamāno dhammo paripuṇṇova arahattaṃ pāpetvā paveditattā, so ca kho saṅkhepato, na vitthāratoti āha ^b^‘‘na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotī’’^eb^ti. Yadi yathā vitthārena hatthipadopamo paripūro hoti, tathā desanā āraddhā, ^b^atha kasmā kusaloti na vutto^eb^ti codanā.

[03]^b^291^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āyāmatopī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena ubbedhenapi rassāti dasseti. Nīcakāyā hi tā honti. ^b^Uccā^eb^ti uccakā. Nisevanaṃ, nisevati etthāti vā ^b^nisevitaṃ^eb^. Nisevanañcettha kaṇḍuyitavinodanatthaṃ ghaṃsanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khandhappadese ghaṃsitaṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uccā^eb^ti anīcā, ubbedhavantiyoti attho. ^b^Kāḷārikā^eb^ti viraḷadantā, visaṅgatadantāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dantāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Kaḷāratāyā^eb^ti viraḷatāya. ^b^Ārañjitānī^eb^ti rañjitāni, vilikhitānīti attho. ^b^Kaṇerutāyā^eb^ti kuṭumalasaṇṭhānatāya. ^b^Ayaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vā^eb^-saddo saṃsayitanicchayattho yathā aññatthāpi ‘‘ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.181).

[03]^b^Nāgavanaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0138^ea^^b^viyā^eb^ti mahāhatthino vāmanikādīnañca padadassanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ nāgavanaṃ viya. ^b^Ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nīvaraṇappahānā dhammadesanā^eb^ tathāgatassa ^a^M2.0147^ea^ bāhiraparibbājakādīnañca padadassanabhāvato. ^b^Ādito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti ca ‘‘taṃ suṇāhī’’ti padato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Kusalo nāgavaniko viya yogāvacaro^eb^ pariyesanavasena pamāṇaggahaṇato. ^b^Matthake ṭhatvā^eb^ti imassa suttassa pariyosāne ṭhatvā. ^b^Imasmimpi ṭhāne^eb^ti ‘‘evameva kho brāhmaṇā’’tiādinā upameyyassa atthassa upaññāsanaṭṭhānepi.

[03]^b^Svāya^eb^nti (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.190) idha-saddamattaṃ gaṇhāti, na yathāvisesitabbaṃ idha-saddaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘katthaci padapūraṇamattamevā’’ti. ^b^Lokaṃ upādāya vuccati^eb^ loka-saddena samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttattā. Sesapadadvaye pana saddantarasannidhānamattena taṃ taṃ upādāya vuttatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Okāsa^eb^nti kañci padesaṃ indasālaguhāya adhippetattā. ^b^Padapūraṇamattameva^eb^ okāsāpadisanassapi asambhavato.

[03]Tathāgata-saddādīnaṃ atthaviseso ^b^mūlapariyāyaṭṭhakathā^eb^(ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.12)^b^ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu^eb^ vutto eva. Tathāgatassa sattanikāyantogadhatāya ^b^‘‘idha pana sattaloko adhippeto’’^eb^ti vatvā tatthāyaṃ yasmiṃ sattanikāye, yasmiñca okāse uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sattaloke uppajjamānopi cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe^eb^ti imissā eva lokadhātuyā. ‘‘Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyu’’nti (dī. ni. 3.161; ma. ni. 3.129; a. ni. 1.278; netti. 57; mi. pa. 5.1.1) ettha jātikhettabhūtā dasasahassilokadhātu ‘‘ekissā lokadhātuyā’’ti vuttā. Idha pana imaṃyeva lokadhātuṃ sandhāya ‘‘imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe’’ti vuttaṃ. Tisso hi saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane visayakhettaṃ āṇākhettaṃ jātikhettanti tividhe khette ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi, na uppajjantīti pana atthi. Kathaṃ? ‘‘Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati (ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341; mahāva. 11; kathā. 405; mi. pa. 4.5.11), ekomhi sammāsambuddho’’ti (ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341; kathā. 405; mahāva. 11) evamādīni imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā – ‘‘kiṃ panāvuso, sāriputta, atthetarahi ^a^M2.0148^ea^ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā samasamo sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭhāhaṃ, bhante, noti vadeyya’’nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ – ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā’’ti ^a^V2.0139^ea^ imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti.

[03]^b^Sujātāyā^eb^tiādinā vuttesu catūsu vikappesu paṭhamo vikappo buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattidassanavasena vutto. Āsannatarāya hi paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito ^b^‘‘uppajjatī’’^eb^ti vuccati uppādassa ekantikattā, pageva paṭipattiyā matthake ṭhito. Dutiyo buddhabhāvāvahapabbajjato paṭṭhāya āsannapaṭipattidassanavasena, tatiyo buddhakaradhammapāripūrito paṭṭhāya buddhabhāvāya paṭipattidassanavasena. Na hi mahāsattānaṃ tusitabhavūpapattito paṭṭhāya bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ nāma atthi. Catuttho buddhakaradhammasamārambhato paṭṭhāya. Bodhiyā niyatabhāvāpattito pabhuti hi viññūhi ^b^‘‘buddho uppajjatī’’^eb^ti vattuṃ sakkā uppādassa ekantikattā, yathā pana ‘‘tiṭṭhanti pabbatā, sandanti nadiyo’’ti tiṭṭhanasandanakiriyānaṃ avicchedamupādāya vattamānapayogo, evaṃ uppādatthāya paṭipajjanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya catūsu vikappesu ^b^‘‘uppajjati nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāva^eb^nti sabbehi upari vuccamānehi visesehi paṭhamaṃ tathāgatassa uppannatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthitāvisesaṃ.

[03]^b^So bhagavā^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 2.3.64) yo ‘‘tathāgato araha’’ntiādinā kittitaguṇo, so bhagavā. ^b^Imaṃ loka^eb^nti nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhāmattaṃ lokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sadevaka’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idāni vattabbaṃ nidassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pajātattā^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ kammakilesehi nibbattattā. ^b^Pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ^eb^ pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā. ^b^Sadevaka^eb^nti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho. ^b^Chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ^eb^ paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi so jāto tannivāsī ca. ^b^Brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇa^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Paccatthikapaccāmittasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0149^ea^ nidassanamattametaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ asamitābāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇivacanena gahitattā. Kāmaṃ ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo loka-saddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ, ‘‘salomako sapakkhako’’tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa’’^eb^nti.

[03]Arūpino ^a^V2.0140^ea^ sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā ‘‘dibbantīti ^b^devā’’^eb^ti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti āha ^b^‘‘sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaradevaloko gahito’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha ‘‘ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyata’’nti (a. ni. 3.117). ^b^Samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko gahito^eb^ tassa savisesaṃ mārassa vase vattanato. ^b^Rūpī brahmaloko gahito^eb^ arūpībrahmalokassa visuṃ gahitattā. ^b^Catuparisavasenā^eb^ti khattiyādicatuparisavasena. Itarā pana catasso parisā samārakādiggahaṇena gahitā evāti. ^b^Avasesasabbasattaloko^eb^ nāgagaruḷādibhedo.

[03]Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgasova lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicetthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato^eb^ti ukkaṃsagabhivijānanena. Pañcasu hi gatīsu devalokova seṭṭho. Tatthāpi arūpino ‘‘dūrasamussāritakilesadukkhatāya, santapaṇītāaneñjavihārasamaṅgitāya, ativiya dīghāyukatāyā’’ti evamādīhi visesehi ativiya itarehi ukkaṭṭhā. ^b^Brahmā mahānubhāvo^eb^tiādiṃ dasasahassiyaṃ mahābrahmuno vasena vadati. ‘‘Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato’’ti hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Anuttara^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ navalokuttaraṃ. ^b^Bhāvānukkamo^eb^ bhāvavasena paresaṃ ajjhāsayavasena ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ anukkamo. ^b^Tīhākārehī^eb^ti devamārabrahmasahitatāsaṅkhātehi tīhi pakārehi. ^b^Tīsu padesū^eb^ti ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādīsu tīsu padesu. ^b^Tena tenākārenā^eb^ti sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena. Tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti porāṇā panāhūti yojanā.

[03]^b^Abhiññā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0150^ea^ ya-kāralopenāyaṃ niddeso, abhijānitvāti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘abhiññāya, adhikena ñāṇena ñatvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anumānādipaṭikkhepo^eb^ti anumānaupamānātthāpattiādipaṭikkhepo ekappamāṇattā. Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇācāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto. ^b^Anuttaraṃ vivekasukha^eb^nti phalasamāpattisukhaṃ. Tena vītimissāpi kadāci bhagavato dhammadesanā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘hitvāpī’’^eb^ti. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti, yathāsutaṃ vā dhammaṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ khaṇaṃ pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti.

[03]Desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ ^b^desanā^eb^ti sā pariyattidhammavasena veditabbāti āha ^b^‘‘desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Sāsitabbapuggalagatena yathāparādhādisāsitabbabhāvena ^a^V2.0141^ea^ anusāsanaṃ tadaṅgavinayādivasena vinayanaṃ ^b^sāsana^eb^nti taṃ paṭipattidhammavasena veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘sīlasamādhivipassanā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kusalāna^eb^nti maggakusalānaṃ, ^b^kusalāna^eb^nti vā anavajjānaṃ. Tena phaladhammānampi saṅgaho siddho hoti. ^b^Ādi^eb^bhāvo sīladiṭṭhīnaṃ tammūlakattā uttarimanussadhammānaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe kathāvadhisaddappabandho gāthāvasena suttavasena ca vavatthito pariyattidhammo, yo idheva ‘‘desanā’’ti vutto. Tassa pana attho visesena sīlādi evāti āha ^b^‘‘bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento…pe… nibbānaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^sīlaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti sīlaggahaṇena sasambhāraṃ sīlaṃ gahitaṃ. Tathā maggaggahaṇena sasambhāro maggoti tadubhayena anavasesato pariyattiatthaṃ pariyādiyati. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti sīlādidassanena. Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo adhippeto. ^b^Kathikasaṇṭhitī^eb^ti kathikassa saṇṭhānaṃ kathanavasena samavaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Na so sātthaṃ deseti^eb^ niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya. ^b^Ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā^eb^ti sithilādibhedesu byañjanesu ekappakāreneva, dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttā vā damiḷabhāsā viya. Sabbattha niroṭṭhaṃ katvā vattabbatāya ^b^sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā^eb^ kirātabhāsā viya. Sabbattheva vissajjanīyayuttatāya ^a^M2.0151^ea^^b^sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā^eb^ yavanabhāsā viya. Sabbattheva sānusāratāya ^b^sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā^eb^ pārasikādimilakkhabhāsā viya. Sabbāpesā ekadesabyañjanavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti katvā ^b^‘‘abyañjanā’’^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Amakkhetvā^eb^ti apalicchetvā avināsetvā, ahāpetvāti vā attho.

[03]Bhagavā yamatthaṃ ñāpetuṃ ekagāthampi ekavākyampi deseti, tamatthaṃ tāya desanāya sabbaso paripuṇṇameva katvā deseti, evaṃ sabbatthāti āha ^b^‘‘ekadesanāpi aparipuṇṇā natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitenā^eb^ti saṃkilesapakkhato vaṭṭadukkhato ca uddharaṇasabhāvāvaṭṭhitena cittena. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ idha ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti iminā samānādhikaraṇāni sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Dūrasamussāritamānasseva sāsane sammāpaṭipatti sambhavati, na māna jātikassāti āha ^b^‘‘nihatamānattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ussannattā^eb^ti bahulabhāvato. Bhogārogyādivatthukā madā suppaheyyā honti nimittassa anavaṭṭhānato’ na tathā kulavijjāmadāti khattiyabrāhmaṇakulīnānaṃ pabbajitānampi jātivijjā nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha ^b^‘‘yebhuyyena hi…pe… mānaṃ karontī’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0142^ea^. ^b^Vijātitāyā^eb^ti nihīnajātitāya. ^b^Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontī^eb^ti suvisuddhiṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkonti. Sīlavasena hi sāsane patiṭṭhāti. ^b^Patiṭṭhātu^eb^nti vā saccapaṭivedhena lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ. Yebhuyyena hi upanissayasampannā sujātā eva honti, na dujjātā.

[03]^b^Parisuddha^eb^nti rāgādīnaṃ accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbaso visuddhaṃ. ^b^Saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī^eb^ti pothujjanikasaddhāvasena saddahati. Viññujātikānañhi dhammasampattigahaṇapubbikā saddhāsiddhi dhammapamāṇadhammappasannabhāvato. ^b^Jāyampatikā vasantī^eb^ti kāmaṃ ‘‘jāyampatikā’’ti vutte gharasāmikagharasāminivasena dvinnaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ viññāyati. Yassa pana ^a^M2.0152^ea^ purisassa anekā pajāpatiyo honti, tattha kiṃ vattabbaṃ? Ekāyapi tāya vāso sambādhoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘dve’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Rāgādinā ^b^sakiñcanaṭṭhena,^eb^ khettavatthuādinā ^b^sapalibodhaṭṭhena^eb^. Rāgarajādīnaṃ āgamanapathatāpi uppajjanaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi vaṇṇanā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ. ^b^Alagganaṭṭhenā^eb^ti asajjanaṭṭhena appaṭibaddhabhāvena. Evaṃ akusalakusalappavattīnaṃ ṭhānabhāvena gharāvāsapabbajjānaṃ sambādhabbhokāsataṃ dassetvā idāni kusalappavattiyā eva aṭṭhānaṭhānabhāvena tesaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṅkhepakathā^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā. ^b^Ekampi divasa^eb^nti ekadivasamattampi. ^b^Akhaṇḍaṃ katvā^eb^ti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena akhaṇḍitaṃ katvā. ^b^Kilesamalena amalīna^eb^nti taṇhāsaṃkilesādivasena asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ katvā. ^b^Paridahitvā^eb^ti nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. Agāravāso agāraṃ uttarapadalopena, tassa vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ ^b^agārassa hitaṃ. Bhogakkhandho^eb^ti bhogarāsi bhogasamudāyo. ^b^Ābandhanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ‘‘putto nattā’’tiādinā pemavasena saparicchedaṃ sambandhanaṭṭhena. ‘‘Amhākamete’’ti ñāyantīti ^b^ñātī^eb^. Pitāmahapituputtādivasena parivattanaṭṭhena ^b^parivaṭṭo^eb^.

[03]^b^292^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sāmaññavācīpi ^b^sikkhā^eb^-saddo sājīva-saddasannidhānato upari vuccamānavisesāpekkhāya ca visesaniviṭṭhova hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā’’^eb^ti. Sikkhitabbaṭṭhena ^b^sikkhā^eb^. Saha ājīvanti etthāti ^b^sājīvo. Sikkhanabhāvenā^eb^ti sikkhāya sājīve ca sikkhanabhāvena. ^b^Sikkhaṃ paripūrento^eb^ti sīlasaṃvaraṃ paripūrento. ^b^Sājīvañca avītikkamanto^eb^ti – ‘‘nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo’’ti (pārā. aṭṭha. 39) vuttasikkhāpadaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ avītikkamanto hutvāti attho. Idameva ^a^V2.0143^ea^ ca dvayaṃ ‘‘sikkhana’’nti vuttaṃ. Tattha sājīvānatikkamo sikkhāpāripūriyā paccayo. Tato hi yāva maggā sikkhāpāripūrī hotīti.

[03]^b^Pajahitvā^eb^ti samādānavasena pariccajitvā. ^b^Pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya…pe… viratovā^eb^ti etena pahānassa viratiyā ca samānakālataṃ dasseti ^a^M2.0153^ea^. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘pahāyā’’ti kathaṃ purimakālaniddesoti? Tathā gahetabbataṃ upādāya. Dhammānañhi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve apekkhite sahajātānampi paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena gahaṇaṃ purimapacchimabhāveneva hotīti gahaṇapavattiākāravasena paccayabhūtesu hirottappañāṇādīsu pahānakiriyāya purimakālavohāro, paccayuppannāsu ca viratīsu viramaṇakiriyāya aparakālavohāro ca hotīti ‘‘pahāya paṭivirato hotī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti vā samādānakālavasena vuttaṃ, pacchā vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyogavasena ^b^paṭivirato^eb^ti. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti vā –
[21]‘‘Nihantvāna tamokhandhaṃ, uditoyaṃ divākaro;
[22]Vaṇṇapabhāya bhāseti, obhāsetvā samuggato’’ti ca. (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.578) –

[07]Evamādīsu viya samānakālavasena veditabbo. Atha vā pāṇo atipātīyati etenāti ^b^pāṇātipāto,^eb^ pāṇaghātahetubhūto ahirikānottappadosamohavihiṃ sādiko cetanāpadhāno saṃkilesadhammo, taṃ samādānavasena pahāya. ^b^Tato…pe… viratova hotī^eb^ti avadhāraṇena tassā viratiyā kālādivasena apariyantataṃ dasseti. Yathā hi aññe samādinnaviratikāpi anavaṭṭhitacittatāya lābhajīvikādihetu samādānaṃ bhindanteva, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya orato viratoti. ^b^Adinnādānaṃ pahāyā^eb^tiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.

[03]Daṇḍanaṃ daṇḍanipātanaṃ ^b^daṇḍo^eb^. Muggarādipaharaṇavisesopi idha paharaṇavisesoti adhippeto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇa’’^eb^nti. Daṇḍanasaṅkhātassa paraviheṭhanassa parivajjitabhāvadīpanatthaṃ daṇḍasatthānaṃ nikkhepavacananti āha ^b^‘‘parūpaghātatthāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vihiṃsanabhāvato^eb^ti vibādhanabhāvato. ^b^Lajjī^eb^ti ettha vuttalajjāya ottappampi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi pāpajigucchanapāputtāsarahitaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthi. Yassa vā dhammagarutāya dhammassa ca attādhīnattā attādhipatibhūtā lajjākiccakārī, tassa ^a^V2.0144^ea^ lokādhipatibhūtaṃ ottappaṃ kiccakaranti vattabbameva natthīti ‘‘lajjī’’icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Dayaṃ mettacittataṃ āpanno^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu ^a^M2.0154^ea^^b^dayā^eb^-saddo ‘‘adayāpanno’’tiādīsu karuṇāya vattatīti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana dayā-saddo anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya ca karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno vutto. Mijjati siniyhatīti mettā, sā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, mettaṃ cittaṃ etassa atthīti mettacitto, tassa bhāvo ^b^mettacittatā,^eb^ mettāicceva attho.

[03]^b^Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī^eb^ti etena tassā viratiyā sattavasena apariyantataṃ dasseti. ^b^Pāṇabhūte^eb^ti pāṇajāte. ^b^Anukampako^eb^ti karuṇāyanako. Yasmā pana mettā karuṇāya visesapaccayo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tāya eva dayāpannatāyā’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ yehi dhammehi pāṇātipātā virati sampajjati, tehi lajjāmettākaruṇādhammehi samaṅgibhāvo dassito, saddhiṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakadhammehīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthāha – kasmā ‘‘pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā’’ti ekavacananiddeso kato, nanu niravasesānaṃ pāṇānaṃ atipātato virati idhādhippetā? Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharatī’’ti. Teneva hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako’’ti puthuvacananiddesoti? Saccametaṃ, pāṇabhāvasāmaññavasena panettha pāḷiyaṃ ādito ekavacananiddeso kato, sabbasaddasannidhānena puthuttaṃ viññāyamānamevāti sāmaññaniddesaṃ akatvā bhedavacanicchāvasena dassetuṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ bahuvacanavasena attho vutto. Kiñca bhiyyo – sāmaññato saṃvarasamādānaṃ, tabbisesato saṃvarabhedoti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ vacanabhedo katoti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Viharatī^eb^ti vuttappakāro hutvā ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā attabhāvaṃ harati pavattetīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iriyati pāletī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Na kevalaṃ kāyavacīpayogavasena ādānameva, atha kho ākaṅkhapissa pariccattavatthuvisayāvāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cittenapī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Theneti theyyaṃ karotīti ^b^theno,^eb^ coro. ^b^Sucibhūtenā^eb^ti ettha sucibhāvo adhikārato saddantarasannidhānato ca theyyasaṃkilesaviramaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘athenattāyeva sucibhūtenā’’^eb^ti. Kāmañcettha ‘‘lajjī ^a^M2.0155^ea^ dayāpanno’’tiādi na vuttaṃ, adhikāravasena pana atthato vā vuttamevāti veditabbaṃ. Yathā hi lajjādayo pāṇātipātapahānassa visesapaccayo, evaṃ adinnādānapahānassapīti, tasmā sāpi pāḷi ānetvā vattabbā. Esa nayo ito paresupi. Atha vā ^b^sucibhūtenā^eb^ti etena hirottappādīhi ^a^V2.0145^ea^ samannāgamo, ahirikādīnañca pahānaṃ vuttamevāti ‘‘lajjī’’tiādi na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Aseṭṭhacariyanti aseṭṭhānaṃ cariyaṃ, aseṭṭhaṃ vā cariyaṃ. Mithunānaṃ vuttākārena sadisabhūtānaṃ ayanti ^b^mithuno,^eb^ yathāvutto durācāro. ^b^Ārācārī methunā^eb^ti etena – ‘‘idha brāhmaṇa, ekacco…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanaṃ sādiyati, so tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ āpajjatī’’tiādinā (a. ni. 7.50) vuttā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogāpi paṭivirati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Saccena sacca^eb^nti purimena vacīsaccena pacchimaṃ vacīsaccaṃ ^b^sandahati^eb^ asaccena anantarikattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Haliddirāgo viya na thirakato hotī^eb^ti ettha kathāya anavaṭṭhitabhāvena haliddirāgasadisatā veditabbā, na puggalassa. ^b^Pāsāṇalekhā viyā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Saddhā ayati pavattati etthāti saddhāyo, saddhāyo eva ^b^saddhāyiko^eb^ yathā ‘‘venayiko’’ti (ma. ni. 1.246; a. ni. 8.11; pārā. 8), saddhāya vā ayitabbo ^b^saddhāyiko,^eb^ saddheyyoti attho. ^b^Vattabbataṃ āpajjati^eb^visaṃvādanatoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Anuppadātā^eb^ti (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.9; a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.198) anubalappadātā, anuvattanavasena vā padātā. Kassa pana anuvattanaṃ padānañcāti? ‘‘Sahitāna’’nti vuttattā sandhānassāti viññāyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sandhānānuppadātā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana anuvattanavasena sandhānassa padānaṃ ādhānaṃ, rakkhaṇaṃ vā daḷhīkaraṇaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dve jane samagge disvā’’^eb^tiādi. Āramanti etthāti ^b^ārāmo,^eb^ ramitabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmā pana ā-kārena vināpi ayamattho labbhati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samaggarāmotipi pāḷi, ayamevettha attho’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Etthā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0156^ea^ –
[21]‘‘Nelaṅgo setapacchādo, ekāro vattatī ratho;
[22]Anīghaṃ passa āyantaṃ, chinnasotaṃ abandhana’’nti. (saṃ. ni. 4.347; udā. 65; peṭako. 25;dī. ni. ṭī. 1.9) –

[07]Imissā ^a^V2.0146^ea^ gāthāya. Sīlañhettha ‘‘nelaṅga’’nti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – citto gahapati, ‘‘nelaṅganti kho, bhante, sīlānametaṃ adhivacana’’nti (saṃ. ni. 4.347; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.9). ^b^Sukumārā^eb^ti apharusatāya mudukā. ^b^Purassa esā^eb^ti ettha ^b^pura^eb^-saddo tannivāsīvācako daṭṭhabbo ‘‘gāmo āgato’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.9) viya. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘nagaravāsīna’’^eb^nti. Manaṃ appāyati vaḍḍhetīti ^b^manāpā^eb^. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cittavuddhikarā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kālavādī^eb^tiādi samphappalāpāpaṭiviratassa paṭipattidassanaṃ. Atthasaṃhitāpi hi vācā ayuttakālapayogena atthāvahā na siyāti anatthaviññāpanavācaṃ anulometi, tasmā samphappalāpaṃ pajahantena akālavāditā pariharitabbāti vuttaṃ ‘‘kālavādī’’ti. Kāle vadantenapi ubhayānatthasādhanato abhūtaṃ parivajjetabbanti āha ^b^‘‘bhūtavādī’’^eb^ti. Bhūtañca vadantena yaṃ idhaloka-paraloka-hitasampādakaṃ, tadeva vattabbanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atthavādī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Atthaṃ vadantenapi lokiyadhammasannissitameva avatvā lokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vattabbanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammavādī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yathā ca attho lokuttaradhammasannissito hoti, taṃdassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘vinayavādī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Pañcannañhi saṃvaravinayānaṃ, pañcannañca pahānavinayānaṃ vasena vuccamāno attho nibbānādhigamahetubhāvato lokuttaradhammasannissito hotīti. Evaṃ guṇavisesayuttova attho vuccamāno desanākosalle sati sobhati, kiccakaro ca hoti, na aññathāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idāni taṃ desanākosallaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘kālenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Pucchādivasena hi otiṇṇavācāvatthusmiṃ ekaṃsādibyākaraṇavibhāgaṃ sallakkhetvā ṭhapanāhetūdāharaṇaṃ saṃsandanādiṃ taṃtaṃkālānurūpaṃ vibhāventiyā parimitaparicchinnarūpāya vipulatara-gambhīrodāra-paramattha-vitthārasaṅgāhikāya kathāya ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ pare yāthāvato dhamme patiṭṭhāpento ‘‘desanākusalo’’ti vuccatīti evamettha atthayojanā veditabbā.

[03]^b^293^eb^^b^.^eb^ Evaṃ ^a^M2.0157^ea^ paṭipāṭiyā satta mūlasikkhāpadāni vibhāvetvā satipi abhijjhādipahānaindriyasaṃvarasatisampajaññajāgariyānuyogādike uttaradesanāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ taṃ pariharitvā ācārasīlasseva vibhajanavasena pāḷi pavattāti tadatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bījānaṃ gāmo samūho ^b^bījagāmo.^eb^ Bhūtānaṃ jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ rukkhagacchalatādīnaṃ samūho ^b^bhūtagāmo^eb^. Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā, cittarahitatā ca paripphandābhāvato chinne viruhanato visadisajātikabhāvato catuyoniapariyāpannato ca veditabbā, vuḍḍhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇānampi vijjatīti na tesaṃ jīvabhāve ^a^V2.0147^ea^ kāraṇaṃ, visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya ciñcādenaṃ, tathā dohaḷādayo, tattha kasmā bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirati icchitāti? Samaṇasāruppato tannivāsisattānurakkhaṇato ca. Tenevāha – ‘‘jīvasaññino hi moghapurisa manussā rukkhasmi’’ntiādi (pāci. 89).

[03]Mūlameva bījaṃ ^b^mūlabījaṃ,^eb^ mūlabījaṃ etassātipi ^b^mūlabījaṃ^eb^. Sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Phaḷubīja^eb^nti pabbabījaṃ. Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhaṇasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bījasaddo tadatthasaṃsiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-saddena visesetvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bījabīja’’^eb^nti ‘‘rūparūpaṃ (visuddhi. 2.449), dukkhadukkha’’nti (saṃ. ni. 4.327; 5.165; netti. 11) ca yathā. Kasmā panettha bījagāmabhūtagāmaṃ uddharitvā bījagāmo eva niddiṭṭhoti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nanu avocumha – ‘‘mūlameva bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ, mūlabījaṃ etassātipi mūlabīja’’nti. Tattha purimena bījagāmo niddiṭṭho, dutiyena bhūtagāmo, duvidhopesa mūlabījañca mūlabījañca ^b^mūlabīja^eb^nti sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘pañcavidhassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassā^eb^ti allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena osadhigacchalatādīnaṃ saṅgaho.

[03]Ekaṃ bhattaṃ ekabhattaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti ^b^ekabhattiko^eb^. So pana rattibhojanenapi siyāti tannivattanatthaṃ āha ^b^‘‘rattūparato’’^eb^ti. Evampi aparaṇhabhojīpi siyā ekabhattikoti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘virato vikālabhojanā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0158^ea^ vuttaṃ. Aruṇuggamanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma, tadañño ^b^vikālo^eb^. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana dutiyapadena rattibhojanassa paṭikkhittattā ^b^‘‘atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]‘‘Sabbapāpassa akaraṇa’’ntiādinayappavattaṃ (dī. ni. 2.90; dha. pa. 183; netti. 30, 50, 116, 124) bhagavato sāsanaṃ accantarāguppattiyā naccādidassanaṃ na anulometīti āha ^b^‘‘sāsanassa ananulomattā’’^eb^ti. Attanā payojiyamānaṃ, parehi payojāpiyamānañca naccaṃ naccabhāvasāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ ekeneva ^b^nacca^eb^-saddena gahitaṃ, tathā gītavādita-saddena cāti āha ^b^‘‘naccananaccāpanādivasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena gāyanagāyāpanavādanavādāpanāni saṅgayhanti. Dassanena cettha savanampi saṅgahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena ^a^V2.0148^ea^. Yathāsakaṃ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasabbhāvato ^b^‘‘dassanā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā’’ti. Avisūkabhūtassa gītassa savanaṃ kadāci vaṭṭatīti āha ^b^‘‘visūkabhūtā dassanā’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ paramatthajotikāyaṃ ^b^khuddakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (khu. pā. aṭṭha. 2.pacchimapañcasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) ‘‘dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ gītaṃ vaṭṭati, gītūpasaṃhito dhammo na vaṭṭatī’’ti. ^b^Yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti ganthitaṃ vā aganthitaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ. ^b^Gandhajāta^eb^nti gandhajātikaṃ. Tassapi ‘‘yaṃ kiñcī’’ti vacanato pisitassa apisitassapi yassa kassaci vilepanādi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.

[03]^b^Uccā^eb^ti ucca-saddena samānatthaṃ ekaṃ saddantaraṃ. Seti etthāti ^b^sayanaṃ^eb^. Uccāsayanaṃ mahāsayanañca samaṇasārupparahitaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘pamāṇātikkantaṃ akappiyattharaṇa’’^eb^nti. Āsanañcettha sayaneneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārā kiriyā paṭikkhittāva hoti, tasmā ‘‘uccāsayanamahāsayanā’’icceva vuttaṃ, atthato ^a^M2.0159^ea^ pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayanañca ^b^uccāsayanamahāsayana^eb^nti etasmiṃ atthe ekasesena ayaṃ niddeso kato yathā ‘‘nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana’’nti (ma. ni. 3.126; saṃ. ni. 2.1; udā. 1), āsanakiriyāpubbakattā vā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇena āsanampi gahitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchantī^eb^ti ^b^iti^eb^-saddena evaṃpakāre dasseti. Aññehi gāhāpane upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘neva naṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggaṇhāpeti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatī’’^eb^ti. Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena vācāya manasāti. Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^uggaṇhanaṃ,^eb^ vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^uggahāpanaṃ,^eb^ manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^sādiyana^eb^nti tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ‘‘paṭiggahaṇā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘neva naṃ uggaṇhātī’’^eb^tiādi. Esa nayo ^b^āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^tiādīsupi. Nīvārādiupadhaññassa sāliādimūladhaññantogadhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sattavidhassā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sukaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa’’nti (mahāva. 262) vuttattā idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ nāma, tassa pana ‘‘kāle paṭiggahita’’nti (mahāva. 262) vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭati. Sati paccayeti āha ^b^‘‘aññatra odissa anuññātā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Sarūpena ^a^V2.0149^ea^ vañcanaṃ ^b^rūpakūṭaṃ,^eb^ patirūpena vañcanāti attho. Aṅgena attano sarīrāvayavena vañcanaṃ ^b^aṅgakūṭaṃ^eb^. Gahaṇavasena vañcanaṃ ^b^gahaṇakūṭaṃ^eb^. Paṭicchannaṃ katvā vañcanaṃ ^b^paṭicchannakūṭaṃ. Akkamatī^eb^ti nippīḷeti, pubbabhāge akkamatīti sambandho.
[03]^b^Hadaya^eb^nti nāḷiādīnaṃ mānabhājanānaṃ abbhantaraṃ. Tilādīnaṃ nāḷiādīhi minanakāle ussāpitasikhāyeva sikhā. ^b^Sikhābhedo^eb^ tassāhāpanaṃ.

[03]^b^Kecī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0160^ea^ sārasamāsācariyā, uttaravihāravāsino ca. ^b^Vadho^eb^ti muṭṭhipahārakasātāḷanādīhi vihesanaṃ, vibādhananti attho. Viheṭhanatthopi hi vadha-saddo dissati ‘‘attānaṃvadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī’’tiādīsu (pāci. 879, 881). Yathā hi apariggahabhāvasāmaññe satipi pabbajitehi appaṭiggahitabbavatthuvibhāgasandassanatthaṃ itthikumāridāsidāsādayo vibhāgena vuttā. Evaṃ parassa haraṇabhāvato adinnādānabhāvasāmaññe satipi tulākūṭādayo adinnādānavisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ vibhāgena vuttā, na evaṃ pāṇātipātapariyāyassa vadhassa puna gahaṇe payojanaṃ atthi, tattha sayaṃkāro, idha paraṃkāroti ca na sakkā vattuṃ ‘‘kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā chappayogā’’ti vacanato. Tasmā yathāvutto evettha attho yutto. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^‘‘vadhoti māraṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, tampi pothanameva sandhāyāti ca sakkā viññātuṃ māraṇa-saddassapi vihiṃsane dissanato.

[03]^b^294^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cīvarapiṇḍapātānaṃ yathākkamaṃ kāyakucchipariharaṇamattajotanāyaṃ avisesato aṭṭhannaṃ parikkhārānaṃ antare tappayojanatā sambhavatīti dassento ^b^‘‘te sabbepī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Etepī^eb^ti navaparikkhārikādayopi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva. Na hi tatthakena mahicchatā, asantuṭṭhitā vā hotīti.

[03]Catūsu disāsu sukhaṃ viharati, tato eva sukhavihāraṭṭhānabhūtā catasso disā assa santīti vā ^b^cātuddiso^eb^. Tattha cāyaṃ satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihaññatīti ^b^appaṭigho^eb^. Dvādasavidhassa santosassa vasena santussanako ^b^santussamāno. Itarītarenā^eb^ti uccāvacena. ^b^Parissayānaṃ^eb^ bāhirānaṃ sīhabyagghādīnaṃ, abbhantarānañca kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittupaddavānaṃ abhibhavanato parissayānaṃ ^b^sahitā^eb^. Thaddhabhāvakarabhayābhāvena ^b^acchambhī. Eko^eb^ asahāyo. Tato eva khaggamigasiṅgasadisatāya ^b^khaggavisāṇakappo^eb^ careyyāti attho.

[03]Chinnapakkho ^a^V2.0150^ea^, asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo gantuṃ na sakkotīti ^b^‘‘pakkhī sakuṇo’’^eb^ti pakkhi-saddena visesetvā sakuṇo pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti ^a^M2.0161^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘pakkhayutto sakuṇo’’^eb^ti. Yassa sannidhikāraparibhogo kiñci ṭhapetabbaṃ sāpekkhāya ṭhapanañca natthi, tādiso ayaṃ bhikkhūti dassento ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ariyanti apenti tato dosā, tehi vā ārakāti ^b^ariyo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘ariyenāti niddosenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ajjhatta^eb^nti attani. ^b^Niddosasukha^eb^nti nirāmisasukhaṃ kilesavajjarahitattā.

[03]^b^295^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathāvutte sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhitasseva indriyasaṃvaro icchitabbo tadadhiṭṭhānato, tassa ca paripālakabhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sesapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘na nimittaggāhī hotī’’tiādīsu padesu. Yasmā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.15) vuttaṃ, tasmā tassa ^b^līnatthappakāsiniyaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.15) vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Rūpādīsu nimittādiggāhaparivajjanalakkhaṇattā indriyasaṃvarassa kilesehi anavasittasukhatā avikiṇṇasukhatā cassa vuttā.

[03]^b^296^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccayasampatti^eb^nti paccayapāripūriṃ. ^b^Ime cattāro^eb^ti sīlasaṃvaro santoso indriyasaṃvaro satisampajaññanti ime cattāro araññavāsassa sambhārā. ^b^Tiracchānagatehi vattabbataṃ āpajjati^eb^ isisiṅgassa pituādayo viya. ^b^Vanacarakehī^eb^ti vanacarakamātugāmehi. ^b^Bheravasaddaṃ sāventi,^eb^ tāvatā apalāyantānaṃ ^b^hatthehi sīsaṃ…pe… karonti^eb^. Paṇṇattivītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^kāḷakaṃ vā^eb^. Micchāvitakkasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^tilakaṃ vā. Ta^eb^nti pītiṃ vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhānato ^b^khayato sammasanto^eb^.

[03]^b^Vivitta^eb^nti janavivittaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suñña’’^eb^nti. Sā ca vivittatā nissaddabhāvena lakkhitabbāti āha ^b^‘‘appasaddaṃ appanigghosa’’^eb^nti. Āvasathabhūtaṃ senāsanaṃ viharitabbaṭṭhena ^b^vihārasenāsanaṃ^eb^. Masārakādi mañcapīṭhaṃ tattha attharitabbaṃ bhisiupadhānañca mañcapīṭhasambandhito ^b^mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ^eb^. Cimilikādi bhūmiyaṃ santharitabbatāya ^b^santhatasenāsanaṃ^eb^. Rukkhamūlādi paṭikkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ caṅkamanādīnaṃ okāsabhāvato ^b^okāsasenāsanaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^‘‘Anucchavikaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0151^ea^^b^dassento’’^eb^ti vatvā tameva anucchavikabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Acchanna^eb^nti iṭṭhakachadanādinā antamaso rukkhasākhāhipi na channaṃ.

[03]^b^Bhattassa^eb^^a^M2.0162^ea^^b^pacchato^eb^ti bhattabhuñjanassa pacchato. ^b^Ūrubaddhāsana^eb^nti ūrūnaṃ adhobandhanavasena nisajjaṃ. Heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṭṭhapanaṃ nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti. ^b^Ujuṃ kāya^eb^nti ettha ^b^kāya^eb^-saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha ^b^‘‘uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato ca dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhārasā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na paṇamantī^eb^ti na oṇamanti. ^b^Na paripatatī^eb^ti na vigacchati, vīthiṃ na vilaṅgheti. Tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati. Mukhasamīpe^eb^ti mukhassa samīpe nāsikagge vā uttaroṭṭhe vā. Idha ^b^pari^eb^-saddo abhi-saddena samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānābhimukha’’^eb^nti, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho. ^b^Parīti pariggahaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘pariṇāyikā’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 16) viya. ^b^Niyyānaṭṭho^eb^ paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho, tasmā ^b^pariggahitaniyyānasati^eb^nti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho.

[03]^b^Vikkhambhanavasenā^eb^ti ettha vikkhambhanaṃ anuppādanaṃ appavattanaṃ na paṭipakkhena suppahīnatā. ^b^Pahīnattā^eb^ti ca pahīnasadisataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ jhānassa anadhigatatā. Tathāpi nayidaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya sabhāvato vigatābhijjhaṃ, atha kho bhāvanāvasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti yathā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sabhāvena vigatābhijjhaṃ abyāpannañca, na bhāvanāya vikkhambhitattā, na evamidaṃ. Idaṃ pana cittaṃ bhāvanāya parisodhitattā abyāpannaṃ vigatathinamiddhaṃ anuddhataṃ nibbicikicchañcāti attho. ^b^Idaṃ ubhaya^eb^nti satisampajaññamāha.

[03]^b^297^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ucchinditvā pātentī^eb^ti ettha ucchindanaṃ pātanañca tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppajjituṃ appadānameva. Iti mahaggatānuttarapaññānaṃ ekaccāya ca parittapaññāya anuppattihetubhūtā nīvaraṇā dhammā itarāya ca samatthataṃ vihanantiyevāti ^b^paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā^eb^ vuttā. Idampi paṭhamajjhānaṃ veneyyasantāne patiṭṭhāpiyamānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pajjati etthāti ^b^ñāṇapadaṃ^eb^. Ñāṇaṃ vaḷañjeti etthāti ^b^ñāṇavaḷañjaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^299^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na^eb^^a^V2.0152^ea^^b^tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato^eb^ bāhirakānaṃ ñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānānipi siyunti. Yadi evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇe maggañāṇapade kathaṃ na niṭṭhaṅgatoti āha ^a^M2.0163^ea^^b^‘‘maggakkhaṇepī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gato hotī^eb^ti buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattitañca ārabbha ñāṇena niṭṭhaṃ nicchayaṃ upagato hoti. Kāmañcettha paṭhamamaggeneva sabbaso vicikicchāya pahīnattā sabbassapi ariyasāvakassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā natthi, tattha pana yathā paññāvepullappattassa arahato savisaye ñāṇaṃ savisesaṃ ogāhati, na tathā anāgāmiādīnanti ratanattaye sātisayaṃ ñāṇanicchayagamanaṃ sandhāya ‘‘aggamaggavasena tatthaniṭṭhāgamanaṃ vutta’’nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Cūḷahatthipadopamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^300^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jaṅgalāna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0153^ea^ ettha yo nipicchalena amuduko nirudakatāya thaddhalūkhabhūmippadeso, so ‘‘jaṅgalo’’ti vuccati. Tabbahulatāya pana idha sabbo bhūmippadeso jaṅgalo, tasmiṃ jaṅgale jātā, bhavāti vā jaṅgalā, tesaṃ jaṅgalānaṃ. Evañhi nadīcarānampi hatthīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti. Samodhātabbānaṃ viya hi samodhāyakānampi jaṅgalaggahaṇena gahetabbato. ^b^Pathavītalacārīna^eb^nti iminā jalacārino na nivatteti adissamānapādattā. ^b^Pāṇāna^eb^nti sādhāraṇavacanampi ‘‘padajātānī’’ti saddantarasannidhānena visesaniviṭṭhameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sapādakapāṇāna’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Muttagata’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.119; a. ni. 9.11) gata-saddo anatthantaro viya, ^b^jāta^eb^-saddo anatthantaroti āha ^b^‘‘padajātānīti padānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samodhāna^eb^nti samavarodhaṃ, antogamaṃ vā. ^b^Mahantattenā^eb^ti vipulabhāvena.

[03]^b^Kusalā dhammā^eb^ti anavajjasukhavipākā dhammā, na anavajjamattadhammā. Kusalattike āgatanayena hi idha kusalā dhammā gahetabbā, na bāhitikasutte āgatanayena. ^b^Catubbidho saṅgaho^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu ekavidhovettha saṅgaho adhippetoti? Na, atthaṃ aggahetvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva gahitattā. Saṅgaha-saddo tāva attano atthavasena ^a^M2.0164^ea^ catubbidhoti ayañhettha attho. Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso sāmaññena gahetabbataṃ patto ‘‘saṅgahaṃ gacchatī’’ti ettha saṅgaha-saddena vacanīyataṃ gatoti na koci doso, niddhārite visese tassa ekavidhatā siyā, na tato pubbeti. ^b^Sajātisaṅgaho^eb^ti samānajātiyā, samānajātikānaṃ vā saṅgaho. Dhātukathāvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana ^b^‘‘jātisaṅgaho’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ, taṃ jāti-saddassa sāpekkhasaddattā jātiyā saṅgahoti vutte attano jātiyāti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa avuttattāti katvā vuttaṃ. Idha pana ^b^rūpakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 594) viya pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sajātisaṅgaho’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Sañjāyanti etthāti sañjāti, sañjātiyā saṅgaho ^b^sañjātisaṅgaho,^eb^ sañjātidesavasena saṅgahoti attho. ‘‘Sabbe rathikā’’ti vutte sabbe rathayodhā rathena yujjhanakiriyāya ekasaṅgahoti. ‘‘Sabbe dhanuggahā’’ti vutte sabbe issāsā dhanunā vijjhanakiriyāya ekasaṅgahoti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ kiriyavasena saṅgaho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita^eb^nti rūpakkhandhena ekasaṅgahaṃ rūpakkhandhoteva gaṇitaṃ, gahaṇaṃ gatanti attho.

[03]^b^Diyaḍḍhameva^eb^^a^V2.0154^ea^^b^saccaṃ bhajati^eb^ maggasaccadukkhasaccekadesabhāvato. Saccekadesantogadhampi saccantogadhameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘saccānaṃ antogadhattā’’^eb^ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ sāsanato ca lokato ca upamaṃ āha ritvā dīpetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sādhikamidaṃ, bhikkhave, diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasata^eb^nti idaṃ yasmiṃ kāle taṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ, tadā paññattasikkhāpadavasena vuttaṃ, tato paraṃ pana sādhikāni dvesatāni sikkhāpadānīti. ^b^Sikkhānaṃ antogadhattā^eb^ adhisīlasikkhāya.
