Ettha ca ‘‘sīlaṃ sikkhantopi tisso sikkhā sikkhatī’’ti visamoyaṃ upaññāso. Tattha hi yo pahātabbaṃ pajahati, saṃvaritabbato saṃvaraṃ āpajjati, ayamassa ^b^adhisīlasikkhā^eb^. Yo tattha cetaso avikkhepo, ayamassa ^b^adhicittasikkhā^eb^. Yā tattha vīmaṃsā, ayamassa ^b^adhipaññāsikkhā^eb^. Iti so kulaputto sarūpato labbhamānā eva tisso sikkhā sikkhatīti dīpito, na sikkhānaṃ antogadhatāmattena. Tenāha ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘yo tathābhūtassa saṃvaro, ayamettha adhisīlasikkhā, yo tathābhūtassa ^a^M2.0165^ea^ samādhi, ayamettha adhicittasikkhā, yā tathābhūtassa paññā, ayaṃ adhipaññāsikkhā. Imā tisso sikkhā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tāya satiyā tena manasikārena sikkhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotī’’ti. Idha pana saccānaṃ antogadhattā sacca-saddābhidheyyatāmattena catūsu saccesu gaṇanantogadhā hontīti? Na, tatthāpi hi nippariyāyato adhisīlasikkhāva labbhati, itarā pariyāyatoti katvā ^b^‘‘sikkhānaṃ antogadhattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti ca tato amuccitvā tasseva antogadhataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā ‘‘yathā ca ekassa hatthipadassā’’tiādinā dassitā hatthipadopamā samatthitā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Ekasmimpi dvīsupi tīsupi saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā dhammā^eb^ti idaṃ na kusalattikavaseneva veditabbaṃ, atha kho tikadukesu yathārahaṃ labbhamānapadavasena veditabbaṃ. Tattha ekasmiṃ sacce gaṇanaṃ gato dhammo asaṅkhatadhammo daṭṭhabbo, dvīsu saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā kusalā dhammā, tathā akusalā dhammā, abyākatā ca dhammā, tīsu saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā saṅkhatā dhammā, evaṃ aññesampi tikadukapadānaṃ vasena ayamattho yathārahaṃ vibhajitvā vattabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekasmimpi…pe… gatāva hontī’’^eb^ti. Ekadeso hi samudāyantogadhattā viseso viya sāmaññena samūhena saṅgahaṃ labhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saccānaṃ antogadhattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Desanānukkamo^eb^ti ariyasaccāni uddisitvā dukkhasaccaniddesavasena pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ vibhajanaṃ. Tattha ca rūpakkhandhaniddesavasenāadito ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā vibhajananti. Ayaṃ imissā desanāya anukkamo.

[03]^b^301^eb^^b^.^eb^ Taṃ ^a^V2.0155^ea^ panetaṃ upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sujāta^eb^nti sundaraṃ, susaṇṭhitaṃ supariṇatañcāti adhippāyo. ^b^Pesiyo^eb^ti vilīve. Mudubhāvato ^b^kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya. Itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse^eb^ti pañcadhā bhinnakoṭṭhāsesu itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse. ^b^Itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse^eb^tiādito catudhā bhinnakoṭṭhāsesu itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse.

[03]^b^Rājaputtūpamāyā^eb^ti rañño jeṭṭhaputtaupamāya. Nti piḷandhanaṃ. Ure vāyāmajanitāriyajātiyā ^b^oraso. Mukhato jāto^eb^ti mukhato niggatadhammadesanāya ^a^M2.0166^ea^ jāto, buddhānaṃ vā dhammakāyassa mukhabhūtāriyadhammato jāto. Tato eva ^b^dhammajo dhammanimmito^eb^. Satthu dhammadāyādasseva gahitattā ^b^dhammadāyādo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘no āmisadāyādo’’^eb^ti. Nti ‘‘bhagavato putto’’tiādivacanaṃ. Mahāpaññatādiguṇehi sātisayaṃ anupubbabhāve ṭhitattā ^b^sammā^eb^ yathābhūtaṃ ^b^vadamāno^eb^ vattuṃ sakkonto ^b^vadeyya^eb^.
[03]^b^Akutobhayaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ nibbānagāminiñca. Rāgarajādīnaṃ vigamena vigatarajaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parosahassaṃ payirupāsatīti yojanā.

[03]^b^‘‘Sevetha bhajathā’’^eb^ti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘paṇḍitā bhikkhū anuggāhakā’’^eb^ti. Paṇḍitāpi samānā na appassutā, atha kho ovādānusāsanīhi anuggāhakāti purimā upamā therasseva vasena udāhaṭā, dutiyā pana bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassapi vasena udāhaṭā.

[03]^b^302^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajjhattikā^eb^ti sattasantānapariyāpannā. ^b^Ajjhattaṃ paccatta^eb^nti padadvayenapi taṃtaṃpāṭipuggalikadhammā vuccantīti āha ^b^‘‘ubhayampetaṃ niyakādhivacanamevā’’^eb^ti. Sasantatipariyāpannatāya pana attāti gahetabbabhāvūpagamanavasena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaṃ ^b^ajjhattaṃ,^eb^ taṃtaṃsattasantānapariyāpannatāya ^b^paccattaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.307) ‘‘attani pavattattā ajjhattaṃ, attānaṃ paṭicca paṭicca pavattattā paccatta’’nti. ^b^Kakkhaḷa^eb^nti kathinaṃ. Yasmā taṃ thaddhabhāvena sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘thaddha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Kharigata^eb^nti kharasabhāvesu gataṃ tappariyāpannaṃ, kharasabhāvamevāti attho. Yasmā pana kharasabhāvaṃ pharusākārena upaṭṭhānato pharusākāraṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pharusa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Upādinnaṃ^eb^ nāma sarīraṭṭhakaṃ. Tattha yaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ nippariyāyato ^b^‘‘upādinna’’^eb^nti vuccati, itaraṃ ^b^anupādinnaṃ^eb^. Tadubhayampi idha taṇhādīhi ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sarīraṭṭhakañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ādinna^eb^nti abhiniviṭṭhaṃ. Mamanti ^b^gahitaṃ^eb^. Ahanti ^b^parāmaṭṭhaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0156^ea^. ^b^Dhātukammaṭṭhānikassā^eb^ti catudhātuvavatthānavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ pariharantassa. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0167^ea^ etasmiṃ dhātukammaṭṭhāne. ^b^Tīsu koṭṭhāsesū^eb^ti tippakāresu koṭṭhāsesu. Na hi te tayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā.

[03]^b^Vuttappakārā^eb^ti ‘‘kesā lomā’’tiādinā vuttappakārā. ^b^Nānāsabhāvato^eb^ti satipi kakkhaḷabhāvasāmaññe sasambhāravibhattito pana kesādisaṅghātagatanānāsabhāvato. ^b^Ālayo^eb^ti apekkhā. ^b^Nikantī^eb^ti nikāmanā. ^b^Patthanā^eb^ti taṇhāpatthanā. ^b^Pariyuṭṭhāna^eb^nti taṇhāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Gahaṇa^eb^nti kāmupādānaṃ. ^b^Parāmāso^eb^ti parato āmasanā micchābhiniveso. ^b^Na balavā^eb^ ālayādi. Yadi evaṃ kasmā vibhaṅge bāhirāpi pathavīdhātu vitthāreneva vibhattāti? Yathādhammadesanattā tattha vitthāreneva desanā pavattā, yathānulomadesanattā panettha vuttanayena desanā saṃkhittā.

[03]^b^Yojetvā dassetī^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ katvā dasseti. ^b^Sā^eb^ti ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu. ^b^Sukhapariggaho hoti^eb^ ‘‘na me so attā’’ti. Siddhe hi anattalakkhaṇe dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ aniccalakkhaṇañca siddhameva hoti saṅkhatadhammesu tadavinābhāvatoti. ^b^Visūkāyatī^eb^ti visūkaṃ virūpakiriyaṃ pavatteti. Sā pana atthato vipphandanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘vipphandatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā. ^b^Acetanābhāvo pākaṭo hoti^eb^ dhātumattatāya dassanato. ^b^Taṃ ubhayampī^eb^ti taṃ pathavīdhātudvayampi.

[03]^b^Tato visesatarenā^eb^ti tato bāhiramahāpathavito visesavantatarena, lahutarenāti attho. ^b^Kuppatī^eb^ti luppati. ^b^Vilīyamānā^eb^ti pakatiudake loṇaṃ viya vilayaṃ gacchantī. ^b^Udakānugatā^eb^ti udakaṃ anugatā udakagatikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘udakameva hotī’’^eb^ti. Abhāvo ^b^eva abhāvatā,^eb^ na bhavatīti vā abhāvo, tathāsabhāvo dhammo. Tassa bhāvo ^b^abhāvatā^eb^. Vayo vināso dhammo sabhāvo etassāti vayadhammo, tassa bhāvo ^b^vayadhammatā,^eb^ atthato khayo eva. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbehipi imehi padehi aniccalakkhaṇameva vutta’’^eb^nti. Viddhaṃsanabhāvassa pana paveditabbattā kāmaṃ aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ sarūpato, itarānipi atthato vuttānevāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Mattaṃ ^a^M2.0168^ea^ khaṇamattaṃ tiṭṭhatīti mattaṭṭho, appamattaṭṭho ^b^mattaṭṭhako,^eb^ atīttarakhaṇikoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parittaṭṭhitikassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ṭhitiparittatāyā^eb^ti ekacittapavattimattatāṭhānalakkhaṇassa itarabhāvena ^a^V2.0157^ea^. Ekassa cittassa pavattikkhaṇamatteneva hi sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanakkhaṇo paricchinno. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Jīvita^eb^nti jīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^Sukhadukkhā^eb^ti sukhadukkhā vedanā. Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsveva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^Attabhāvo^eb^ti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā vuttā. ^b^Kevalā^eb^ti attaniccabhāvena avomissā. ^b^Ekacittasamāyuttā^eb^ti ekena cittena sahitā ekacittakkhaṇikā. ^b^Lahuso vattate khaṇo^eb^ti tāya eva ekakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atīttaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati vītivattatīti attho. ^b^Ida^eb^nti gāthāvacanaṃ.

[03]Yasmā sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ aparāparasañcaraṇaṃ labhamānameva pavattati, na alabhamānaṃ, tasmā ^b^assāsapassāsūpanibaddhaṃ^eb^. Tathā mahābhūtānaṃ samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva pavattati. Pathavīdhātuyā hi āpodhātuādīnaṃ vā aññatarapakopena balasampannopi puriso patthaddhakāyo vā, atisārādivasena kilinnapūtikāyo vā, mahāḍāhapareto vā, sañchijjamānasandhibandhano vā hutvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti. Kabaḷīkārāhārānaṃ yuttakāle labhantasseva jīvitaṃ pavattati, alabhantassa parikkhayaṃ gacchati, viññāṇe pavattamāneyeva ca jīvitaṃ pavattati, na tasmiṃ appavattamāne.^b^ Jīvita^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddena iriyāpathūpanibaddhatāsītuṇhūpanibaddhatādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Catunnañhi iriyāpathānaṃ samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva jīvitaṃ pavattati, aññatarassa pana adhimattatāya āyusaṅkhārā upacchijjanti, sītuṇhānampi samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva pavattati, atisītena pana atiuṇhena vā abhibhūtassa vipajjatīti.

[03]^b^Taṇhupādinnassā^eb^ti iminā hi paccayuppannatākittanena sarasapabhaṅgutaṃyeva vibhāveti. Dukkhānupassanāya taṇhāggāhassa aniccānupassanāya mānaggāhassa anattānupassanāya diṭṭhiggāhassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato ekaṃseneva tīhi anupassanāhi gāhāpi vigacchantīti āha^b^ ‘‘noteva hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekaṃyeva āgataṃ^eb^ bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā antaradhānadassanapavattajotanāya.

[03]^b^Pariggaha^eb^nti ^a^M2.0169^ea^ dhātupariggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Paṭṭhapento^eb^ti ārabhanto desento. Sotadvāre balaṃ dassetīti yojanā. Kammaṭṭhānikassa baladassanāpadesena kammaṭṭhānassa ānubhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Vācāya ghaṭṭanameva vuttaṃ^eb^ sotadvāre baladassanabhāvato. ^b^Bala^eb^nti ca bāhirāya viya ajjhattikāyapi pathavīdhātuyā acetanābhāvadassanena ^a^V2.0158^ea^ rukkhassa viya akkosantepi paharantepi nibbikāratā. ^b^Sampativattamānuppannabhāvenā^eb^ti tadā paccuppannabhāvena. ^b^Samudācāruppannabhāvenā^eb^ti āpāthagate tasmiṃ aniṭṭhe saddārammaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātauppattivasena sotadvāre javanavedanā dukkhāti vacanato. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘upanissayavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vedanādayopī^eb^ti ‘‘vedanā aniccā’’ti ettha vuttavedanā ceva saññādayo ca. Te hi phassena samānabhūmikā na pubbe vuttavedanā. ^b^Dhātusaṅkhātameva ārammaṇa^eb^nti yathāpariggahitaṃ pathavīdhātusaṅkhātameva visayaṃ. ^b^Pakkhandatī^eb^ti vipassanācittaṃ aniccantipi dukkhantipi anattātipi sammasanavasena anupavisati. Etena bahiddhāvikkhepābhāvamāha, ^b^pasīdatī^eb^ti pana iminā kammaṭṭhānassa vīthipaṭipannataṃ. ^b^Santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti iminā uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena avatthānaṃ paṭipakkhābhibhavena niccalabhāvato. ^b^Vimuccatī^eb^ti iminā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhato visesena muccanaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana samuṭṭhānavasena attho vutto ^b^‘‘adhimokkhaṃ labhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe āpāthagate^eb^ti idaṃ mūlapariññāya mūladassanaṃ. Sotadvārehi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjayato voṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho, aniṭṭhe ca paṭigho uppajjati, manodvāre pana ‘‘itthī, puriso’’ti rajjanādi hoti, tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ ^b^mūlaṃ,^eb^ sabbaṃ vā bhavaṅgādi. Evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlavasena ^b^pariññā^eb^. ^b^Āgantukatāvakālikapariññā^eb^ pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena itarabhāvavasena ca veditabbā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana satipaṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto eva.

[03]Yāthāvato dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanavasena katapariggahassapi anādikālabhāvanāvasena ^b^ayoniso āvajjanaṃ sacepi uppajjati. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā^eb^ti voṭṭhabbanakiccataṃ patvā. ^b^Ekaṃ dve vāre āsevanaṃ labhitvā, na^eb^ āsevanapaccayaṃ. Na hi upekkhāsahagatāhetukacittaṃ āsevanapaccayabhūtaṃ atthi. Yadi siyā, paṭṭhāne kusalattike paṭiccavārādīsu ^a^M2.0170^ea^ ‘‘na maggapaccayā āsevane dve, āsevanapaccayā na magge dve’’ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, ‘‘na maggapaccayā āsevane ekaṃ (paṭṭhā. 1.1.221), āsevanapaccayā na magge eka’’nti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.152) ca pana vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekaṃ dve vāre^eb^ti ettha ca ekaggahaṇaṃ vacanasiliṭṭhatāya vasena vuttaṃ. Na hi dutiye moghavāre ekavārameva voṭṭhabbanaṃ pavattati. Dvikkhattuṃ vā tassa pavattiṃ sandhāya ekavāraggahaṇaṃ, tikkhattuṃ pavattiṃ sandhāya dvevāraggahaṇaṃ. Tattha dutiyaṃ tatiyañca pavattamānaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ viya hoti. Yasmā pana ‘‘voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāreāsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva otaratī’’ti idaṃ dutiyamoghavāravasena vuttaṃ bhaveyya. So ca ārammaṇadubbalatāya eva hotīti ^b^abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ niyamito. Idha pana tikkhānupassanānubhāvena akusaluppattiyā asambhavavasena ayonisova āvajjato ayoniso vavatthānaṃ ^a^V2.0159^ea^ siyā, na yoniso, tasmiñca pavatte mahati atimahati vā ārammaṇe javanaṃ na uppajjeyyāti ayamattho vicāretvā gahetabbo.

[03]Etasseva vā satipi duvidhatāparikappane so ca yadi anulome vedanāttike paṭiccavārādīsu ‘‘āsevanapaccayā na magge dve, na maggapaccayā āsevane dve’’ti ca vuttaṃ siyā, (labbheyya), na ca vuttaṃ. Yadi pana voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā, kusalākusalānampi siyā. Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayatāpi dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti avutto atthi, voṭṭhabbanassa pana kusalākusalānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo avutto – ‘‘kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā. Akusalaṃ…pe… nāsevanapaccayā’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.93-94) vacanato paṭikkhitto ca. Athāpi siyā asamānavedanānaṃ vaseneva vuttanti ca, evamapi yathā – ‘‘āvajjanā kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.417) vuttaṃ, evaṃ ‘‘āsevanapaccayena paccayo’’tipi vattabbaṃ siyā. Taṃ jātibhedā na vuttanti ce? Bhūmibhinnassa kāmāvacarassa rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo viya jātibhinnassapi bhaveyyāti vattabbo eva siyā, abhinnajātikassa ca vasena yathā – ‘‘āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo’’ti ^a^M2.0171^ea^ vuttaṃ, evaṃ ‘‘āsevanapaccayena paccayo’’tipi vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca vuttaṃ. Tasmā vedanāttikepi ‘‘āsevanapaccayā na magge ekaṃ, na maggapaccayā āsevane eka’’nti evaṃ gaṇanāya niddhāriyamānāya voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattassa abhāvā ayaṃ moghavāro upaparikkhitvā gahetabbo.

[03]Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana vīthivipākasantatiyā āvaṭṭanato āvajjanā, tato visadisassa javanassa karaṇato manasikāroti ca vattabbataṃ labheyya, evañca katvā ^b^paṭṭhāne^eb^ ‘‘voṭṭhabbanaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo’’tiādi na vuttaṃ, ‘‘āvajjanā’’icceva (paṭṭhā. 1.1.417) vuttaṃ, tampi voṭṭhabbanato paraṃ catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā javanānaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaṃ bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ rūpādiṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. ^b^Javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā^eb^ti ca javanassa uppajjanaṭṭhāne dvikkhattuṃ pavattitvāti attho, na javanabhāvenāti. ^b^Āsevanaṃ labhitvā^eb^ti cettha āsevanaṃ viya āsevananti vuttovāyamattho. Vipphārikattā cassa dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā pavattiyeva cettha āsevanasadisatā. Vipphārikatāya hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatā cassa vuccati. Vipphārikampi javanaṃ viya anekakkhattuṃ appavattiyā asuppatiṭṭhitatāya ca na nippariyāyato āsevanabhāvena ^a^V2.0160^ea^ vattatīti na imassa āsevanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana phalacittesu maggapariyāyo viya pariyāyavasena vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Aya^eb^nti ‘‘sacepī’’tiādinā vutto ekavārampi rāgādīnaṃ anuppādanavasena vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto yogāvacaro. ^b^Koṭippatto^eb^ti matthakaṃ patto. Paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtattā visadavipassanāñāṇatāya ^b^tikkhavipassako. Ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti^eb^ ‘‘evaṃ me javanaṃ javita’’nti sārammaṇassa javanassa hutvā abhāvavavatthāpanassa kammaṭṭhānabhāvato, tathā āvajjanavasena vā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā tāvadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti. ^b^Dutiyassa pana vasenā^eb^ti ‘‘aparassa rāgādivasena ekavāraṃ javanaṃ javatī’’tiādinā vuttassa nātitikkhavipassakassa vasena ‘‘tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṃ pakkhandatī’’tiādinā imasmiṃ sutte āgatattā. ‘‘Tamenaṃ upadhipahānāya paṭipannaṃ upadhipaṭinissaggāya kadāci karahaci satisammosā upadhipaṭisaṃyuttā sarasaṅkappā samudācaranti. Dandho udāyi satuppādo, atha kho ^a^M2.0172^ea^ naṃ khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametī’’ti ^b^laṭukikopame^eb^. Tassa hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sotāpannādayo tāva pajahantu, puthujjano kathaṃ pajahatī’’ti codanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ‘‘āraddhavipassako hi satisammosena sahasā kilese uppanne ‘mādisassa nāma bhikkhuno kileso uppanno’ti saṃvegaṃ katvā vīriyaṃ paggayha vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggena kilese samugghāteti, iti so pajahati nāmā’’ti attho vutto. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṃ pakkhandatītiādinā imasmiṃ sutte āgatattā’’tiādi. ^b^Indriyabhāvane ca^eb^ majjhimassa vasena ^b^ayamattho veditabbo^eb^.

[03]^b^Pariggahavasenā^eb^ti dhātupariggahavasena. Mammacchedanādivasena pavattākkosanādiṃ aniṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ patvā ^b^sotadvāre kilamati^eb^ puggalo, tathā pothanapaharaṇādikaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ patvā ^b^kāyadvāre kilamati^eb^.

[03]^b^Samudācarantī^eb^ti sabbaso uddhaṃ ācaranti. Tayidaṃ amanāpehi samudācaraṇaṃ nāma pothanapaharaṇādivasena upakkamanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘upakkamantī’’^eb^ti, bādhantīti attho. ^b^Tathāsabhāvo^eb^ti yathā pāṇippahārādīhi ghaṭṭitamatto vikāraṃ āpajjati, tathāsabhāvo. ‘‘Ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacenā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.232) ovādadānaṃ nāma anaññasādhāraṇaṃ buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikanti āha ^b^‘‘vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatāti anussarantopi…pe… kakacūpamovādaṃ anussarantopī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tassapi pariyattidhammabhāvatoti keci ^a^V2.0161^ea^. Yaṃ pana kakacokantakesupi manussesu appadussanaṃ nibbikāraṃ, taṃ satthusāsanaṃ anussarantopi sammāpaṭipattilakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ anussaratiyevāti evaṃ vā ettha attho veditabbo. ^b^Bhikkhuno guṇa^eb^nti ariyadhammādhigamanasiddhaṃ guṇamāha. So ca sabbesampi ariyānaṃ guṇoti taṃ anussarantopi saṅghaṃ anussarati evāti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Vipassanupekkhā adhippetā,^eb^ tasmā upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātīti vipassanāvasena sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate ajjhupekkhanaṃ na labhatīti attho. ^b^Chaḷaṅgupekkhā^eb^ti chaḷaṅgupekkhā viya chaḷaṅgupekkhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikāratāsāmaññena ^a^M2.0173^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sā panesā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Chaḷaṅgupekkhāṭhāne ṭhapeti^eb^ ‘‘lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me’’tiādinā attamanataṃ āpajjanto.

[03]^b^303^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āpogata^eb^nti ābandhanavasena āpo, tadeva āposabhāvaṃ gatattā āpogataṃ, sabhāveneva āpobhāvaṃ vā pattanti attho. Yasmā pana so āpobhāvasaṅkhāto allayūsabhāvo sasambhārapathavīsasambhāraudakādigate sabbasmimpi āpasmiṃ vijjati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbāapesu gataṃ allayūsabhāvalakkhaṇa’’^eb^nti, dravabhāvalakkhaṇanti attho. ‘‘Pakuppatī’’ti pākatikapakopaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘oghavasena vaḍḍhatī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayamassa pākatiko pakopo’’^eb^ti. Itaraṃ pana dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘āposaṃvaṭṭakāle panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ogacchantī^eb^ti ettha ogamananti pariyādānaṃ adhippetaṃ, na adhogamanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘uddhane…pe… pāpuṇantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^304^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbatejesu gata^eb^nti indhanādivasena anekabhedesu sabbesu tejokoṭṭhāsesu gataṃ pavattaṃ. Yathā pīti eva pītigataṃ, evaṃ ^b^tejo eva tejogataṃ,^eb^ tejanavasena pavattimattanti attho. Evaṃ āpogataṃ, vāyogatañca veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘purime’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekāhikajarādibhāvenā^eb^ti ekāhikādijarābhedena. ^b^Usumajāto^eb^ti usmābhibhūto. ^b^Jīratī^eb^ti jiṇṇo hoti. Tejodhātuvasena labbhamānā imasmiṃ kāye jarāpavatti pākaṭajarāvasena veditabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘indriyavekallatta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Valipalitādibhāva^eb^nti valitapalitabhāvaṃ, aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ sithilabhāvañca.^b^ Kuppitenā^eb^ti khubhitena. Satakkhattuṃ tāpetvā tāpetvā sītūdake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭasappi ^b^satadhotasappī^eb^ti vadanti. Sarīre pakatiusumaṃ atikkamitvā uṇhabhāvo ^b^santāpo,^eb^ sarīrassa dahanavasena pavatto mahādāho ^b^paridāho^eb^ti ayameva tesaṃ viseso. ^b^Asita^eb^nti suttaṃ. ^b^Khāyita^eb^nti khāditaṃ. ^b^Sāyita^eb^nti assāditaṃ. ^b^Sammā paripākaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Asammāparipākopi visamapākiniyā gahaṇiyā ^a^V2.0162^ea^ vasena veditabbo. ^b^Rasādibhāvenā^eb^ti rasarudhiramaṃsamedanhāruaṭṭhiaṭṭhimiñjasukkabhāvena. ^b^Viveka^eb^nti puthubhāvaṃ aññamaññaṃ visadisabhāvaṃ. Asitādibhedassa ^a^M2.0174^ea^ āhārassa pariṇāme raso hoti, taṃ paṭicca rasadhātu uppajjatīti attho. Evaṃ rasassa pariṇāme ‘‘rudhira’’ntiādinā sabbaṃ netabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Haritantanti haritameva,^eb^ anta-saddena padavaḍḍhanaṃ kataṃ yathā ‘‘vanantaṃ suttanta’’nti. ^b^Cammanillekhanaṃ^eb^ cammaṃ likhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ.

[03]^b^305^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uggārahikkārādī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena uddekakhīpanādipavattakavātānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Uccārapassāvādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pittasemhalasikādinīharaṇavātassa ceva usumavātassa ca saṅgaho veditabbo. Yadipi ^b^kucchi^eb^-saddo udarapariyāyo, koṭṭha-saddena pana abbhantarassa vuccamānattā tadavasiṭṭho udarapadeso idha kucchi-saddena vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samiñjanapasāraṇādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ālokanavilokanauddharaṇādikā sabbā kāyikakiriyā saṅgahitā. Avasavati udakaṃ etasmāti ^b^ossavanaṃ,^eb^ chadananto. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne.

[03]^b^306^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nissattabhāva^eb^nti anattakataṃ. Yathādassitā hi catasso dhātuyo anattaniyaṃ kevalaṃ dhātumattā nissattanijjīvāti imamatthaṃ dasseti. ^b^Parivārito^eb^ti parivāritabhāvena ṭhito parivuto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etānī’’^eb^tiādi, kaṭṭhādīni sannivesavisesavasena ṭhapitānīti adhippāyo. Aññathā agārasamaññāya bhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kaṭṭhādīsu panā’’^eb^tiādi. Yadatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘seyyathāpi, āvuso’’tiādi āraddhaṃ, tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā kaṭṭhādīnī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Kāmaṃ heṭṭhā ‘‘mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.302) avibhāgena ekadesena ca upādārūpampi kathitaṃ, tathā vedanādayo khandhabhāvena pariggahetvā na kathitā, tathā taṇhāpi samudayasaccabhāvena. Itarāni pana saccāni sabbena sabbaṃ na kathitāni. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā…pe… na kathitānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cakkhupasāde niruddhe^eb^ti cakkhupasāde vinaṭṭhe. ^b^Upahate^eb^ti pubbakimiādīhi upaddute. ^b^Palibuddhe^eb^ti pubbādiuppattiyā vinā paṭicchādite. ^b^Tajjo^eb^ti tassānurūpo, cakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā anurūpoti attho. Cakkhussa ^a^M2.0175^ea^ rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate uppajjanamanasikāro hadayasannissayopi cakkhumhi sati hoti, asati na hotīti ^a^V2.0163^ea^ katvā ^b^‘‘cakkhuṃ paṭicca uppajjanamanasikāro’’^eb^ti vutto. Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ tassa yathā ārammaṇapaccaye, evaṃ pasādapaccayepi hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhuñca rūpe ca paṭiccā’’^eb^ti. Nti cakkhudvāre kiriyamanodhātucittaṃ. ^b^Aññavihitassā^eb^ti aññārammaṇapasutassa. ^b^Tadanurūpassā^eb^ti tesaṃ cakkhurūpatadābhogānaṃ anurūpassa.

[03]^b^Cattāri saccāni dasseti^eb^ sarūpato atthāpattito cāti adhippāyo. Tappakāro bhūto, tappakāraṃ vā patto ^b^tathābhūto,^eb^ tassa, yathā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, tādisassa paccayākārasamavetassāti attho. ^b^Tisamuṭṭhānarūpa^eb^nti utukammāhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ. Idañca satipi tadā bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanacittasamuṭṭhānarūpe kevalaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasamuṭṭhitarūpassa abhāvamattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṅgahaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti nagaraṃ viya rajje rūpakkhandhe saṅgahetabbataṃ gahetabbataṃ gacchati. ‘‘Tathābhūtassā’’ti vuttattā ^b^vedanādayo cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttāva, viññāṇampi cakkhuviññāṇameva. Saṅkhārāti cetanāva vuttā^eb^ cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhassāti adhippāyo. Tattha pana phassajīvitindriyamanasikāracittaṭṭhitiyopi saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāva. ^b^Ekato saṅgaho^eb^ ‘‘pañcakkhandhā’’ti ekato gaṇanā. ^b^Samāgamoti^eb^ yathāsakaṃ paccayavasena samodhānaṃ. ^b^Samavāyo^eb^ti aññamaññassa paccayabhāvena samavetatāya samuditabhāvo.

[03]Paccayuppannadhammo paṭicca samuppajjati etasmāti ^b^paṭiccasamuppādo,^eb^ paccayākāro. Paccayadhamme passantopi paccayuppannadhamme passati, te passantopi paccayadhamme passatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yo paṭiccasamuppāda’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Chandakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti taṇhāyanavasena. ^b^Ālayakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti apekkhākaraṇavasena. ^b^Anunayakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti anurajjanavasena. ^b^Ajjhogāhitvā^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya gilitvā viya niṭṭhapetvā viya daḷhaggahaṇavasena. Chandarāgo vinayati pahīyati etthāti ^b^chandarāgavinayo chandarāgapahānañcā^eb^ti vuccati nibbānaṃ. ^b^Āharitvā^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatampi atthato ānetvā saṅgaṇhanavasena gahetabbaṃ. Āharaṇavidhiṃ pana dassento ^b^‘‘yā imesū’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Imesu tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti yathāvuttesu sukhadukkhādīsu tīsu abhisamayaṭṭhānesu. ^b^Diṭṭhī^eb^ti pariññābhisamayādivasena pavattā sammādiṭṭhi yāthāvadassanaṃ. Evaṃ saṅkappādayopi ^a^M2.0176^ea^ yathārahaṃ veditabbā. ^b^Bhāvanāpaṭivedho^eb^ti bhāvanāvasena paṭivedho, na ārammaṇakaraṇamattena. ^b^Ayaṃ maggo^eb^ti ayaṃ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena pavatto aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. ^b^Ettāvatāpī^eb^ti evaṃ ekasmiṃ cakkhudvāre vatthu pariggahamukhenapi catusaccakammaṭṭhānassa matthakaṃ pāpanena ^b^bahuṃ^eb^ vipulaṃ paripuṇṇameva ^b^bhagavato sāsanaṃ kataṃ^eb^ anuṭṭhitaṃ ^b^hoti^eb^.

[03]Uppajjitvā ^a^V2.0164^ea^ niruddhameva bhavaṅgacittaṃ āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘taṃ niruddhampī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mandathāmagatamevā^eb^ti mahatiyā niddāya abhibhūtassa vasena vuttaṃ, kapimiddhaparetassa pana bhavaṅgacittaṃ kadāci āvajjanassa paccayo bhaveyyāti. ^b^Bhavaṅgasamayenevā^eb^ti bhavaṅgasseva pavattanasamayena paguṇajjhānapaguṇakammaṭṭhānapaguṇaganthesu tesaṃ paguṇabhāveneva ābhogena vināpi manasikāro pavattati. Tathā hi paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ paguṇabhāveneva nirantaraṃ viya ajjhayamāne aññavihitatāya ‘‘ettako gantho gato, ettako avasiṭṭho’’ti sallakkhaṇā na hoti. ^b^Catusamuṭṭhānampī^eb^ti sabbaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ, na pubbe viya tisamuṭṭhānamevāti adhippāyo. Pubbaṅgamattā oḷārikattā ca phassacetanāva saṅkhārakkhandhoti gahitā, na aññesaṃ abhāvā. ^b^Ekadesameva sammasanto^eb^ti yathāuddiṭṭhaṃ atthaṃ heṭṭhā anavasesato aniddisitvā ekadesameva niddisanavasena desanāya āmasanto. ^b^Imasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti yathāuddiṭṭhassa atthassa ‘‘ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhu’’ntiādinā (ma. ni. 1.306) chadvāravasena niddisanaṭṭhāne. ^b^Heṭṭhā parihīnadesana^eb^nti – ‘‘yaṃ upādārūpaṃ cattāro arūpino khandhā upari tīṇi ariyasaccānī’’ti niddesavasena parihīnaṃ atthajātaṃ sabbaṃ. ^b^Taṃtaṃdvāravasenā^eb^ti cakkhudvārādikaṃ taṃtaṃdvāravasena. Catusaccavasena āraddhā desanā catusacceneva pariyosāpitāti āha ^b^‘‘yathānusandhināva suttantaṃ niṭṭhapesī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Mahāhatthipadopamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^307^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nacirapakkante^eb^ti ^a^M2.0177^ea^^a^V2.0165^ea^ na ciraṃ pakkante, pakkantassa sato na cirasseva. ^b^Saliṅgenevā^eb^ti muṇḍiyakāsāyaggahaṇādinā attano purimaliṅgeneva. ^b^Pāṭiyekke jāte^eb^ti vipannācāradiṭṭhitāya pakāsanīyakammakaraṇato paraṃ aññatitthiyasadise visuṃ bhūte. ^b^Kulaputto^eb^ti jātimattena kulaputto. ^b^Asambhinnāyā^eb^ti sambhedarahitāya, jātisaṅkaravirahitāyāti atto. Jātisīsena idha jātivatthukaṃ dukkhaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘otiṇṇoti yassa jāti anto anupaviṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Jāto hi satto jātakālato paṭṭhāya jātinimittena dukkhena anto anupaviṭṭho viya vibādhīyati. ^b^Jarāyā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Cattāro paccayā labbhantīti lābhā, catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ labbhamānānaṃ sukatabhāvo suṭṭhu abhisaṅkhatabhāvo. ^b^Vaṇṇabhaṇana^eb^nti guṇakittanaṃ. ^b^Apaññātā^eb^ti sambhāvanāvasena na paññātā. Lābhādinibbattiyābhāvadassanañhetaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ghāsacchādanamattampi na labhantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Appesakkhā^eb^ti appānubhāvā. Sā pana appesakkhatā adhipateyyasampattiyā ca parivārasampattiyā ca abhāvena pākaṭā hoti. Tattha parivārasampattiyā abhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘appaparivārā’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Sārenapi keci ajānanena aññālābhena vā asārabhūtampi kattabbaṃ karontīti tato visesanatthaṃ ‘‘sārena sārakaraṇīya’’nti vuttanti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘akkhacakkayuganaṅgalādika’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Brahmacariyassā^eb^ti sikkhāttayasaṅgahassa sāsanabrahmacariyassa. Mahārukkhassa maggaphalasārassa ñāṇadassanapheggukassa samādhitacassa sīlapapaṭikassa cañcalasabhāvā saṃsappacārīti ca ^b^cattāro paccayā sākhāpalāsaṃ nāma. Tenevā^eb^ti lābhasakkārasilokanibbattaneneva. ^b^Sāro me patto^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane adhigantabbasāro nāma iminā lābhādinibbattanena anuppattoti vosānaṃ niṭṭhitakiccaṃ āpanno.

[03]^b^310^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ñāṇadassana^eb^nti ñāṇabhūtaṃ dassanaṃ visayassa sacchikaraṇavasena pavattaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃ. ^b^Sukhumaṃ rūpa^eb^nti devādīnaṃ, aññampi vā sukhumasabhāvaṃ rūpaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antamaso…pe… viharantī’’^eb^ti, dibbacakkhu hi idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ‘‘ñāṇadassana’’nti gahitaṃ.

[03]^b^311^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Asamayavimokkhaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0178^ea^^a^V2.0166^ea^^b^ārādhetī^eb^ti ettha adhippetaṃ asamayavimokkhaṃ pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katamo asamayavimokkho’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhannañhi samāpajjanasamayopi atthi asamayopi, maggavimokkhena pana vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi. Yassa saddhā balavatī, vipassanā ca āraddhā, tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa bhuñjantassa ca maggaphalapaṭivedho nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ, iti maggavimokkhena vimuccantassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti so ^b^asamayavimokkho^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokiyasamāpattiyo hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Na kuppati, na nassatīti ^b^akuppā,^eb^ kadācipi aparihānasabhāvā. Sabbasaṃkilesehi paṭippassaddhivasena cetaso vimuttīti ^b^cetovimutti^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘arahattaphalavimuttī’’^eb^ti. Ayamattho payojanaṃ etassāti ^b^etadatthaṃ,^eb^ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ, tassa ^b^esā^eb^ paramakoṭi. Yathāraddhassa sāropamena phalena desanā niṭṭhāpitāti āha ^b^‘‘yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesī’’^eb^ti. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahāsāropamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^312^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Piṅgaladhātuko^eb^ti ^a^V2.0167^ea^ piṅgalasabhāvo piṅgalacchaviko, piṅgalakkhoti vā attho. ^b^Pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho,^eb^ na sīlādiguṇehi saṅgahitabbabhāvena. Saṅgho etesaṃ atthi parivārabhūtoti ^b^saṅghino. Svevā^eb^ti so eva pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto. ^b^Ācārasikkhāpanavasenā^eb^ti attanā parikappitācelavatādiācārasikkhāpanavasena. ^b^Paññātā^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ samādinnavatavasena ceva viññātaladdhivasena ca paññātā. ^b^Laddhikarā^eb^ti tassā micchādiṭṭhiyā uppādakā. ^b^Bahujanassā^eb^ti puthujanassa. Tassa pana āgamasampadāpi nāma natthi, kuto adhigamoti ekaṃsato andhaputhujjano evāti āha ^b^‘‘assutavato andhabālaputhujjanassā’’^eb^ti. Na hi viññū appasādanīye pasīdanti. Maṅgalesu kātabbadāsakiccakaro dāso ^b^maṅgaladāso^eb^.

[03]^b^Tantāvutāna^eb^nti ^a^M2.0179^ea^ tante pasāretvā vītānaṃ. ^b^Gaṇṭhanakileso^eb^ti saṃsāre bandhanakileso. ^b^Evaṃ vāditāyā^eb^ti evaṃ paṭiññatāya, evaṃ diṭṭhitāya vā. ^b^Niyyānikā^eb^ti niyyānagatisappāṭihīrakā anupārambhabhūtattāti adhippāyo. No ce niyyānikāti ānetvā yojanā. Tesaṃ sabbaññupaṭiññāya abhūtattā tassā abhūtabhāvakathanena tassa brāhmaṇassa na kāci atthasiddhīti āha ^b^‘‘nesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvakathanena atthābhāvato’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^318^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nihīnalokāmise līno ajjhāsayo etassa, na pana nibbāneti. ^b^Līnajjhāsayo. Sāsanaṃ sithilaṃ katvā gaṇhāti^eb^ sikkhāya na tibbagāravattā.

[03]^b^323^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Heṭṭhā^eb^ti anantarātītasutte mahāsāropame. ^b^Paṭhamajjhānādidhammā vipassanāpādakā^eb^ti vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtā. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ cūḷasāropame āgatā. ^b^Nirodhapādakā^eb^ti anāgāmino, arahanto vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ samatthā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti nirodhapādakattā. Paṭhamajjhānādidhammā ñāṇadassanato ^b^uttaritarā^eb^ti veditabbā.
[06]Cūḷasāropamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca opammavaggavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^325^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ñātīnaṃ ^a^V2.0168^ea^^a^M2.0180^ea^ (a. ni. ṭī. 3.6.19) nivāsaṭṭhānabhūto gāmo ñātiko, so eva ^b^nātiko^eb^. So kira gāmo yesaṃ santako, tesaṃ pubbapurisena attano ñātīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena nivesito, tena ‘‘nātiko’’ti paññāyittha. Atha pacchā tattha dvīhi dāyādehi dvidhā vibhajitvā paribhutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā’’^eb^ti. Giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhiyeva kato āvasatho ^b^giñjakāvasatho^eb^. Tasmiṃ kira padese mattikā sakkharamarumbavālikādīhi asammissā akaṭhinā saṇhā sukhumā, tāya katāni kulālabhājanānipi silāmayāni viya daḷhāni, tasmā te upāsakā tāya mattikāya dīghaputhulaiṭṭhakā kāretvā tāhi ṭhapetvā dvārabāhavātapānakavāṭatulāyo sesaṃ sabbaṃ dabbasambhārena vinā iṭṭhakāhi eva pāsādaṃ kāresuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iṭṭhakāhevā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Gosiṅgasālavanadāya^eb^nti gosiṅgasālavananti laddhanāmaṃ rakkhitaṃ araññaṃ. ^b^Jeṭṭhakarukkhassā^eb^ti vanappatibhūtassa sālarukkhassa. ^b^Sāmaggirasa^eb^nti samaggabhāvādiguṇaṃ vivekasukhaṃ. ^b^Uparipaṇṇāsake^eb^ upakkilesasutte (ma. ni. 3.237-238) puthujjanakālo kathito, ^b^idha^eb^ cūḷagosiṅgasutte ^b^khīṇāsavakālo kathito^eb^. Katakiccāpi hi te mahātherā attano diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanañca sampassantā paramañca vivekaṃ anubrūhantā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā tattha viharanti. ^b^Tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ upakkilesasuttadesanākāle. ^b^Te^eb^ti anuruddhappamukhā kulaputtā. ^b^Laddhassādā^eb^ti vipassanāya vīthipaṭipattiyā adhigatassādā. Vipassanā hi pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantī pavattamānā sātisayaṃ pītisomanassaṃ āvahati. Tenāha bhagavā –
[21]‘‘Yato yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ;
[22]Labhati pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 374);
[03]^b^Laddhapatiṭṭhā^eb^^a^V2.0169^ea^^a^M2.0181^ea^ maggaphalādhigamanena. Sati hi maggaphalādhigame sāsane patiṭṭhā laddhā nāma hoti, no aññathā.

[03]Kāmaṃ sāriputtamoggallānāpi mahāsāvakapariyāpannāva, aggasāvakabhāvena pana nesaṃ visesadassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā’’^eb^ti visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Satipi hi sāmaññayoge visesavanto visuṃ gayhanti yathā ‘‘brāhmaṇā āgatā, vāsiṭṭhopi āgato’’ti. Tesu pana visuṃ gahitesupi ^b^‘‘asītimahāsāvakesū’’^eb^ti ^b^asīti^eb^ggahaṇaṃ appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanupagaṃ na hotīti. ^b^Antamaso^eb^ti idaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa upaṭṭhākabhāvena āsannacāritāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Anīkā^eb^ti hatthānīkā, hatthānīkato hatthisamūhatoti attho. Kāḷasīho yebhuyyena yūthacaroti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yūthā nissaṭo kāḷasīho viyā’’^eb^ti. Kesarī pana ekacarova. ^b^Vātacchinno valāhako viyā^eb^ti vātacchinno pabbatakūṭappamāṇo valāhakacchedo viya. ^b^Tesaṃ paggaṇhanato^eb^ti yathā nāma jighacchitassa bhojane, pipāsitassa pānīye, sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhe, uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sīte, dukkhitassa sukhe abhiruci uppajjati, evamevaṃ bhagavato kosambake bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādāpanne disvā apare samaggāvāsaṃ vasante āvajjitassa ime tayo kulaputtā āpāthaṃ āgamiṃsu, atha ne paggaṇhitukāmo upasaṅkami, evāyaṃ paṭipattianukkamena kosambakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayanupāyo hotīti. Tenāha ‘‘tesaṃ paggaṇhanato’’ti. Eteneva ^b^pacchimajanataṃ anukampanato^eb^ti idampi kāraṇaṃ ekadesena saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ukkaṃsitvā^eb^ti yathābhūtehi guṇehi sampahaṃsanena visesetvā visiṭṭhe katvā pasaṃsāvasena cetaṃ āmeḍitavacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Taṃ araññaṃ rakkhati^eb^ vanasāminā āṇatto. Rakkhitagopitaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ, na mahāvanādi viya apariggahitaṃ. Sīlādippabhedāya attatthāya paṭipannā ^b^attakāmā,^eb^ na apariccattasinehāti āha ^b^‘‘attano hitaṃ kāmayamānā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Bhindeyyā^eb^ti vināseyya.

[03]^b^Dubbalamanussā^eb^ti paññāya dubbalā aviddasuno manussā. ^b^Tānī^eb^ti abhijātiādīsu uppannapāṭihāriyāni. ^b^Cīvaragabbhena paṭicchādetvā^eb^ti cīvarasaṅkhāte ovarake nigūhitvā viya. Na hi cīvarapārupanamattena buddhānubhāvo paṭicchanno hoti. ‘‘Mā sudha kocimaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ aññāsī’’ti pana ^a^M2.0182^ea^ tathārūpena iddhābhisaṅkhārena taṃ chādetvā gato bhagavā tathā vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññātakavesena agamāsī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Abhikkamathā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0170^ea^ padaṃ abhimukhabhāvena vidhimukhena vadatīti āha ^b^‘‘ito āgacchathā’’^eb^ti. Buddhānaṃ kāyo nāma suvisuddhajātimaṇi viya sobhano, kiñci malaṃ apanetabbaṃ natthi, kimatthaṃ bhagavā pāde pakkhālesīti āha ^b^‘‘buddhāna’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^326^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anuruddhā^eb^ti vā ekasesanayena vuttaṃ virūpekasesassapi icchitabbattā, evañca katvā bahuvacananiddesopi samatthito hoti. ^b^Iriyāpatho khamatī^eb^ti sarīrassa lahuṭṭhānatāya catubbidhopi iriyāpatho sukhappavattiko. ^b^Jīvitaṃ yāpetī^eb^ti yāpanālakkhaṇaṃ jīvitaṃ imaṃ sarīrayantaṃ yāpeti sukhena pavatteti. ^b^Uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vā^eb^ti idaṃ makaravuttiyā missakabhattena yāpanaṃ vattanti katvā vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhikkhācāravattaṃ pucchatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Aññamaññaṃ saṃsandatī^eb^ti satipi ubhayesaṃ kalāpānaṃ paramatthato bhede pacurajanehi duviññeyyanānattaṃ khīrodakasammoditaṃ accantameva saṃsaṭṭhaṃ viya hutvā tiṭṭhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘visuṃ na hoti, ekattaṃ viya upetī’’^eb^ti. Piyabhāvadīpanāni cakkhūni ^b^piyacakkhūni^eb^. Piyāyati, piyāyitabboti vā ^b^piyo^eb^ti. Samaggavāsassa yaṃ ekantakāraṇaṃ, taṃ pucchanto bhagavā ^b^‘‘yathā kathaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādimāhāti ^b^‘‘kathanti kāraṇapucchā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yo nesaṃ mettāsahitānaṃyeva kammādīnaṃ aññamaññasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhānākāro, taṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^nti pucchā. Tathā hi parato ‘‘evaṃ kho mayaṃ, bhante’’tiādinā therehi vissajjanaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03]Mittaṃ etassa atthīti ^b^mettaṃ,^eb^ kāyakammaṃ. ^b^Āvī^eb^ti pakāsaṃ. ^b^Raho^eb^ti appakāsaṃ. Yañhi uddissa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti, taṃ tassa sammukhā ce, pakāsaṃ hoti, parammukhā ce, appakāsaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ceva parammukhā cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itarānī^eb^ti parammukhā kāyavacīkammāni. ^b^‘‘Tatthā’’^eb^tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘yaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Sammajjanādivasena ^b^paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ vā. Tathevā^eb^ti yathā sammukhā kate mettākāyakamme vuttaṃ, tatheva ^a^M2.0183^ea^. ‘‘Kacci khamanīya’’nti evamādikā kathā ^b^sammodanīyakathā^eb^. Yathā parehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti, tathā paṭisanthāravasena pavattā kathā ^b^paṭisanthārakathā^eb^. ‘‘Aho tadā therena mayhaṃ dinno ovādo, dinnā anusāsanī’’ti evaṃ kālantare saritabbayuttā, chasāraṇīyapaṭisaṃyuttā vā kathā ^b^sāraṇīyakathā^eb^. Suttapadaṃ nikkhipitvā tassa atthaniddesavasena sīlādidhammapaṭisaṃyuttā kathā ^b^dhammīkathā^eb^. Sarena suttassa uccāraṇaṃ ^b^sarabhaññaṃ^eb^. Pañhassa ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa pucchanaṃ ^b^pañhapucchanaṃ^eb^. Tassa yathāpucchitassāadisanaṃ ^a^V2.0171^ea^^b^pañhavissajjanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Evaṃ samannāharato^eb^ti evaṃ manasikaroto, evaṃ mettaṃ upasaṃharatoti attho.

[03]Ekato kātuṃ na sakkā, tasmā ^b^nānā. Hitaṭṭhenā^eb^ti attano viya aññamaññassa hitabhāvena. ^b^Nirantaraṭṭhenā^eb^ti antarābhāvena bhedābhāvena. ^b^Aviggahaṭṭhenā^eb^ti avirodhabhāvena. ^b^Samaggaṭṭhenā^eb^ti sahitabhāvena. ^b^Paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā^eb^ti bahalatanumattikālepehi limpetvā. ^b^Cīvaraṃ vā dhovantī^eb^ti attano cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti. ^b^Paribhaṇḍaṃ vā^eb^ti attano paṇṇasālāya paribhaṇḍaṃ vā karonti.

[03]^b^327^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭiviruddhā evā^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘yebhuyyenā’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Tesaṃ appamādalakkhaṇa^eb^nti tesaṃ appamajjanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā^eb^ti etthāpi ^b^vo^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, paccattavacanaṃ vā, kacci tumheti evamattho veditabbo. ^b^Samuggapāti^eb^nti samuggapuṭasadisaṃ pātiṃ.

[03]Paṇṇasālāyaṃ anto bahi ca sammajjanena sodhitaṅgaṇatā ^b^vattapaṭipatti. Paṭivisamattamevā^eb^ti attano yāpanapaṭivisamattameva. ^b^Osāpetvā^eb^ti pakkhipitvā. ^b^Pamāṇamevā^eb^ti attano yāpanapamāṇameva. ^b^Vuttanayena jahitvā^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanayena jahitvā.

[03]^b^Hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantā^eb^ti attano hatthena itarassa hatthaṃ daḷhaggahaṇavasena bandhantā. Vilaṅgheti desantaraṃ pāpeti etenāti vilaṅghako, hattho. Hattho eva vilaṅghako hatthavilaṅghako, tena ^b^hatthavilaṅghakena^eb^.

[03]^b^Taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā^eb^ti taṃ tīsupi divasesu dhammassavanaṃ pavattanavasena akhaṇḍikaṃ katvā. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘pañcāhikaṃ kho panā’’tiādivacanaṃ. Pañcame pañcame ^a^M2.0184^ea^ ahani bhavatīti ^b^pañcāhikaṃ. Bhagavatā pucchitena^eb^ anuruddhattherena. ^b^Pamādaṭṭhānesuyevā^eb^ti aññesaṃ pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva. ^b^‘‘Pamādaṭṭhānesuyevā’’^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘aññesañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Papañcakaraṇaṭṭhānānī^eb^ti kathāpapañcassa karaṇaṭṭhānāni vissaṭṭhakathāpavattanena kammaṭṭhāne pamajjanaṭṭhānāni. Tatthāpi ‘‘mayaṃ, bhante, kammaṭṭhānaviruddhaṃ na paṭipajjāmā’’ti sikhāppattaṃ attano appamādalakkhaṇaṃ thero dasseti. ^b^Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ muñcitvā^eb^ti pana idaṃ tadā vihārasamāpattīnaṃ vaḷañjābhāvena vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^328^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jhānassa ^a^V2.0172^ea^ adhippetattā ^b^‘‘alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Attano sammāpaṭipannatāya satthu cittārādhanatthaṃ tassa ca visesādhigamassa satthu paccakkhabhāvato thero ^b^‘‘kiñhi no siyā, bhante’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Yāvadevā^eb^ti yattakaṃ kālaṃ ekaṃ divasabhāgaṃ vā sakalarattiṃ vā yāva satta vā divase.

[03]^b^329^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samatikkamāyā^eb^ti sammadeva atikkamanāya. Sati hi upari visesādhigame heṭṭhimajjhānaṃ samatikkantaṃ nāma hoti paṭippassaddhi ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭippassaddhiyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ñāṇadassanaviseso^eb^ti kāraṇūpacārena vuttoti veditabbo. ^b^Vedayitasukhato^eb^ti vedanāsahitajjhānasukhato vā phalasukhato vā. ^b^Avedayitasukha^eb^nti nibbānasukhaṃ viya vedanārahitaṃ sukhaṃ. ^b^Avedayitasukha^eb^nti ca nidassanamattametaṃ, taṃ pana aphassaṃ asaññaṃ acetananti sabbacittacetasikarahitameva. Tato ca satipi rūpadhammappavattiyaṃ tassa acetanattā sabbaso saṅkhāradukkhavirahitatāya santatarā paṇītatarā ca nirodhasamāpattīti vuccate. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avedayitasukhaṃ santataraṃ paṇītataraṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘imamhā cā’’tiādi.

[03]^b^330^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāmaggirasānisaṃsameva nesaṃ bhagavā kathesi^eb^ ajjhāsayānukūlattā tassa. ^b^Anusāvetvā^eb^ti anupagamanavasena sammadeva ārocetvā. ‘‘Anusaṃsāvetvā’’ti vā pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^Tato paṭinivattitvā^eb^ti etarahi bhagavato ekavihāre ajjhāsayoti satthu manaṃ gaṇhantā ‘‘idheva tiṭṭhathā’’ti vissajjitaṭṭhānato nivattitvā ^a^M2.0185^ea^. ^b^Pabbajjādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena upasampadā-visuddhi-dhutakammaṭṭhānānuyoga-jhānavimokkha-samāpatti-ñāṇadassana-maggabhāvanā-phalasacchikiriyādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Adhigantvāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena yathādhigatānampi. ^b^Attano guṇakathāya aṭṭiyamānā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ nissāya adhigantvāpi dhammādhikaraṇaṃ satthuvihesābhāvadīpane bhagavato pākaṭaguṇānaṃ kathāya aṭṭiyamānāpīti yojanā. ^b^Devatā^eb^ti taṃtaṃsamāpattilābhiniyo devatā. ^b^Mukhaṃ me sajja^eb^nti mukhaṃ me kathane samatthaṃ, kathane yogyanti attho.

[03]^b^331^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ āgato^eb^ti evaṃ āṭānāṭiyasutte āgato. ^b^Paliveṭhente^eb^ti codente. ^b^Maccharāyantī^eb^ti attano guṇānaṃ bhagavatopi ārocanaṃ asahamānā maccharāyantīti so cintetīti katvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^01^eb^^b^Tesaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0173^ea^^b^lābhā^eb^ti tesaṃ vajjirājūnaṃ vajjiraṭṭhavāsīnañca manussattaṃ, patirūpadesavāsādiko, bhagavato tiṇṇañca kulaputtānaṃ dassanavandanadānadhammassavanādayo lābhā. Suladdhā lābhāti yojanā. ^b^Pasannacittaṃ anussareyyā^eb^ti taṃ kulañhetaṃ sīlādiguṇe cittaṃ pasādetvā anussareyya. Vuttaṃ tesaṃ ‘‘anussaraṇampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmī’’ti (itivu. 104; saṃ. ni. 5.184).
[06]Cūḷagosiṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^332^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kocidevā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0174^ea^ gosiṅgasālavanasāmantato niviṭṭhesu yo koci gāmo gocaragāmo bhavissati, tasmā anibaddhabhāvato gocaragāmo na gahito, vasanaṭṭhānameva paridīpitaṃ, tato eva araññanidānakaṃ nāmetaṃ. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti devaloke manussaloke ca. ^b^Thirakārakehī^eb^ti sāsane thirabhāvakārakehi. ^b^Savanante jātattā^eb^ti catusaccagabbhassa dhammassavanassa pariyosāne ariyāya jātiyā jātattā. Yathā paṭivedhabāhusaccaṃ ijjhati, tathā dhammassa savanato sāvakā ^a^M2.0186^ea^. ^b^Sūriyo viya^eb^ bhāsuraguṇaraṃsitāya mohandhakāravidhamanato. ^b^Cando viya^eb^ ramaṇīyamanoharasītalaguṇatāya kilesapariḷāhavūpasamato. ^b^Sāgaro viya^eb^ gambhīrathiravipulānekaguṇatāya ṭhitadhammasabhāvato. Guṇamahantatāya therassa abhiññātatā, guṇamahantatā ca suttesu āgatanayeneva ñātabbāti taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na kevala’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sīhanādasutta^eb^nti majjhimanikāye āgataṃ mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ (ma. ni. 1.146). ^b^Therapañhasutta^eb^nti suttanipāte aṭṭhakavagge āgataṃ ^b^sāriputtasuttaṃ^eb^ (su. ni. 961-981). ^b^Therasīhanādasutta^eb^nti imassa ca therassa janapadacārikāya satthu sammukhā ^b^sīhanādasuttaṃ^eb^. ^b^Abhinikkhamana^eb^nti therasseva mahatā ñātiparivaṭṭena mahatā ca bhogaparivaṭṭena saha gharāvāsapariccāgo abhinikkhamanaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^Yadida^eb^nti nipāto, yo ayanti attho.

[03]^b^Mahāpaññe bhikkhū gahetvā^eb^ti āyasmato kira sāriputtattherassa parivārabhikkhūpi mahāpaññā eva ahesuṃ. Dhātuso hi sattā saṃsandanti. ^b^Sayaṃ iddhimā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panattho ^b^dhātusaṃyuttena^eb^ (saṃ. ni. 2.99) dīpetabbo – gijjhakūṭapabbate gilānaseyyāya nisinno bhagavā ārakkhatthāya parivāretvā vasantesu sāriputtamoggallānādīsu ekamekaṃ attano parisāya saddhiṃ caṅkamantaṃ voloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi – ‘‘passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, sāriputtaṃ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ caṅkamantanti. Evaṃ, bhante. Sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū mahāpaññā’’ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vanante^eb^ti upavanante. ^b^Meghavaṇṇāyā^eb^ti nīlābhāya. Samuddakucchito uggacchantassa viya upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Cakkavāḷapabbatamatthakasamīpe ābhāpharaṇavasena pavattiyā ^b^‘‘pācīnacakkavāḷapabbatamatthake’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na cakkavāḷapabbatamatthake candamaṇḍalassa vicaraṇato. Tathā ^a^V2.0175^ea^ sati lokantarikanirayesupi candimasūriyānaṃ ābhā phareyya. Ubbedhavasena hi cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhato candimasūriyā vicaranti. Sālakusumapabhānaṃ atirattatāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘lākhārasena siñcamānaṃ viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upagāyamānā viyā^eb^ti payirupāsanavasena upecca gāyamānā viya ^a^M2.0187^ea^. ^b^Kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā^eb^ti ajja jhānasamāpattiratiyā eva nu kho, udāhu dhammasākacchāratiyā dhammadesanāratiyāti cintesi.

[03]^b^Dve candamaṇḍalāni viya^eb^ paramasobhaggappattāya kantiyā. ^b^Dve sūriyamaṇḍalāni viya^eb^ ativiya suvisuddhasamujjalāya guṇavibhūtiyā. ^b^Dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya^eb^ mahānubhāvatāya. ^b^Dve sīhā viya^eb^ tejussadatāya. ^b^Dve byagghā viya^eb^ anolīnavuttitāya. ^b^Sabbapāliphullamevāti^eb^ sabbameva samantato vikasitaṃ.

[03]^b^333^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kathā upacarati pavattati etthāti kathāupacāro, savanūpacāro padeso, taṃ ^b^kathāupacāraṃ^eb^. Ramaṇīyameva ^b^rāmaṇeyyakaṃ^eb^. ^b^Ujjaṅgale^eb^ti lūkhapadese kaṭhinapadese. Dosehi itā apagatāti ^b^dosinā^eb^ ta-kārassa na-kāraṃ katvā. ^b^Dibbā maññe gandhā^eb^ti devaloke gandhā viya. Divi bhavāti ^b^dibbā^eb^. ^b^Dve therā^eb^ti sāriputtattherāanandattherā. Ānandatthero tāva mamāyatu akhīṇāsavabhāvato, sāriputtatthero kathanti? Na idaṃ mamāyanaṃ gehassitapemavasena, atha kho guṇabhattivasenāti nāyaṃ doso.

[03]Anumatiyā pucchā ^b^anumatipucchā,^eb^ anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pucchanaṃ. Tattha yasmā adhammikampi vuddhassa anumatiṃ itaro paṭikkhipituṃ na labhati, tena sā anujānitabbāva hoti, tasmā saṅghakhuddakato paṭṭhāya anumati pucchitabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anumatipucchā nāmesā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Khuddakato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti kaṇiṭṭhato paṭṭhāya. Paṭibhāti upaṭṭhātīti paṭibhānaṃ, yathādhippeto attho, ^b^taṃ paṭibhānaṃ. Sikhāppattā vepullappattā na bhavissati^eb^ padesañāṇe ṭhitehi bhāsitattā. ^b^Sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati^eb^ sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsanditattā. Vuttamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paccatthikā aṭṭiyanti dukkhāyanti etenāti ^b^aṭṭo,^eb^ vinicchitabbavohāro. ^b^Gāmabhojaka^eb^nti yasmiṃ gāme so uppanno, taṃ gāmabhojakaṃ. ^b^Janapadabhojaka^eb^nti yasmiṃ janapade so uppanno, taṃ janapadabhojakaṃ. ^b^Mahāvinicchayāmacca^eb^nti yasmiṃ rajje so janapado, tassa rājadhāniyaṃ mahāvinicchayāmaccaṃ. ^b^Senāpati^eb^nti yassa rañño so amacco, tassa senāpatiṃ. Tathā ^b^uparāja^eb^nti ^a^M2.0188^ea^. Idaṃ panettha pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ upameyyatthānurūpatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Aparāparaṃ na sañcarati^eb^ vinicchayanārahena vinicchitabhāvato.

[03]Pakaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V2.0176^ea^ (a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.22) ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato, sabhāvaniruttivasena buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti ^b^pāḷi,^eb^ pariyattidhammo. Purimassa atthassa pacchimena atthena anusandhānaṃ ^b^anusandhi^eb^. Atthamukhena pana pāḷipadesānampi anusandhi hotiyeva, so ca pubbāparānusandhi-pucchānusandhi-ajjhāsayānusandhi-yathānusandhivasena catubbidho. Taṃtaṃdesanānaṃ pana pubbāparasaṃsandanaṃ ^b^pubbāparaṃ^eb^. Pāḷivasena anusandhivasena pubbāparavasenāti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Uggahita^eb^nti byañjanaso atthaso ca uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gahitaṃ, pariyāpuṇanavasena ceva paripucchāvasena ca hadayena gahitanti attho. Vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sotabbato sutaṃ, pariyattidhammo, taṃ dhāretīti ^b^sutadharo^eb^. Yo hi sutadharo, sutaṃ tasmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti suppatiṭṭhitaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sutassa ādhārabhūto’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. Ekapadaṃ ekakkharampi avinaṭṭhaṃ hutvā sannicīyatīti sannicayo, sutaṃ sannicayo etasminti ^b^sutasannicayo. Ajjhosāyā^eb^ti anupavisitvā. ^b^Tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti na mussati.

[03]^b^Ṭhitā paguṇā^eb^ti paguṇā vācuggatā. ^b^Niccalita^eb^nti aparivattitaṃ. ^b^Saṃsanditvā^eb^ti aññehi saṃsanditvā. ^b^Samanuggāhitvā^eb^ti paripucchāvasena atthaṃ ogāhetvā. Pabandhassa vibandhābhāvato ^b^gaṅgāsotasadisaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘bhavaṅgasotasadisa’’nti vā pāṭho, akittimaṃ sukhappavattīti attho. Suttekadesassa suttassa ca vacasā paricayo idha nādhippeto, vaggādivasena pana adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘suttadasaka…pe… sajjhāyitā’’^eb^ti, ‘‘dasa suttāni gatāni, dasa vaggāgatā’’tiādinā sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho. Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā cintitā ^b^manasānupekkhitā. Rūpagataṃ viya paññāyatī^eb^ti rūpagataṃ viya cakkhussa vibhūtaṃ hutvā paññāyati. ^b^Suppaṭividdhā^eb^ti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.

[03]Pajjati attho ñāyati etenāti ^b^padaṃ,^eb^ tadeva atthaṃ byañjetīti ^b^byañjana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjana’’^eb^nti. Akkharapāripūriyā padabyañjanassa ^a^M2.0189^ea^ parimaṇḍalatā, sā pana pāripūrī evaṃ veditabbāti āha ^b^‘‘dasavidhabyañjanabuddhiyo aparihāpetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññaṃ upārambhakara^eb^nti yathānikkhittasuttato aññaṃ tassa ananulomakaṃ suttaṃ āharati. ^b^Tadatthaṃ otāretī^eb^ti tassa āhaṭasuttasseva atthaṃ vicāreti. ^b^Tassa kathā aparimaṇḍalā nāma hoti^eb^ atthassa aparipuṇṇabhāvato. Yathānikkhittassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvaseneva suttantarampi ānento ^b^bahi ekapadampi na gacchati nāma. Amakkhento^eb^ti avināsento. Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthitaṃ katvā dassento ^b^tulikāya paricchindanto viya^eb^. Gambhīrataramatthaṃ ^a^V2.0177^ea^ gamento ^b^gambhīramātikāya udakaṃ pesento viya.^eb^ Uttānamātikāya hi mariyādaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ aññathā gaccheyya. Ekaṃyeva padaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi punappunaṃ saṃvaṇṇento padaṃ ^b^koṭṭento sindhavājānīyo viya^eb^. So hi vaggitāya gatiyā pade padaṃ koṭṭento gacchati. Kathāmaggena ^b^tassa kathā parimaṇḍalā nāma hoti^eb^ dhammato atthato anusandhito pubbāparato ācariyuggahatoti sabbaso paripuṇṇabhāvato.

[03]^b^Anuppabandhehī^eb^ti vissaṭṭhehi āsajjamānehi. Nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ nirantaraṃ ekarasañca katvā parisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ kathento vissaṭṭhāya kathāya katheti nāma, na aññathāti dassento ^b^‘‘yo bhikkhū’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Araṇiṃ manthento viya, uṇhakhādanīyaṃ khādanto viyā^eb^ti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ kathanassa udāharaṇaṃ, ^b^gahitaṃ gahitamevā^eb^tiādi laṅghetvā kathanassa. Purāṇapaṇṇantaresu hi paripātiyamānagodhā kadāci dissati, evamekaccassa atthavaṇṇanā katthaci na dissati. ^b^Ohāyā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā. ^b^Yopī^eb^tiādinā ekarūpena kathāya akathanaṃ dasseti. ^b^Petaggi^eb^ nijjhāmataṇhikapetassa mukhato niccharaṇakāggi. ^b^Vitthāyatī^eb^ti appaṭitānatamāpajjati. Kenaci rogena dukkhaṃ patto viya ^b^nitthunanto. Kandanto viyā^eb^ti ukkuṭṭhiṃ karonto viya. ^b^Appabandhā nāma hoti^eb^ sukhena appavattabhāvato. ^b^Ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhito^eb^ti ācariyuggahaṃ amuñcanto, yathā ca ācariyā taṃ taṃ suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ, teneva nayena saṃvaṇṇentoti attho. ^b^Acchinnadhāraṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇika’’ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena avicchinnaṃ kathāpabandhaṃ katvā. ^b^Anusayasamugghātāyā^eb^ti iminā tassā kathāya arahattapariyosānataṃ dasseti ^a^M2.0190^ea^. ^b^Evarūpenā^eb^ti nayidaṃ ekavacanaṃ tattakavasena gahetabbaṃ, atha kho lakkhaṇe pavattanti dassento ^b^‘‘tathārūpeneva bhikkhusatena bhikkhusahassena vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pallaṅkenā^eb^ti pallaṅkapadesena, pallaṅkāsanantenāti attho. ^b^Iminā nayenā^eb^ti vārantarasādhāraṇaṃ atthaṃ atidisati, asādhāraṇaṃ pana vakkhatevāti.
[03]^b^334^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āramati etenāti ^b^ārāmo^eb^.

[03]^b^335^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhuvasevana^eb^nti niyatasevitaṃ. ^b^Pāsādapariveṇe^eb^ti pāsādaṅgaṇe. ^b^Nābhiyā patiṭṭhitāna^eb^nti nābhiyā bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitānaṃ. ^b^Arantarānī^eb^ti aravivarāni taṃtaṃarānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānāni.
[03]^b^336^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samādinnāraññadhutaṅgo āraññiko,^eb^ na araññavāsamattena.
[03]^b^337^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na^eb^^a^V2.0178^ea^^b^osādentī^eb^ti na avasādenti, na avasādanāpekkhā aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantīti attho. ^b^Pavattinī^eb^ti paguṇā.
[03]^b^338^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lokuttarā vihārasamāpatti^eb^ nāma therassa arahattaphalasamāpattiyo, pariyāyato pana nirodhasamāpattipi veditabbā.

[03]^b^339^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sādhukāro ānandattherassa dinno^eb^. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘yathā taṃ ānandova sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā’’tiādi. ^b^Sammā^eb^ti suṭṭhu, yathāajjhāsayanti adhippāyo. Yena hi yaṃ yathācittaṃ kathitaṃ, taṃ sammā kathitaṃ nāma hoti. Sampattavasena hi yathākārī tathāvādī sobhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano anucchavikamevā’’^eb^tiādi. Bahussuto bhikkhu tattha tattha sutte sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne tesaṃ suviditattā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno tāni paripūretīti āha ^b^‘‘sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne’’^eb^tiādi. Maggādipasavanāya ^b^vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā^eb^ paripākaṃ gametvāti attho.
[03]^b^340^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Eseva nayo’’ti atidesavasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘āyasmā hi revato’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[03]^b^342^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aparepi^eb^^a^M2.0191^ea^^b^nānappakāre kilese^eb^ti aparepi nānappakāre dosamohādikilese. ^b^Dhunitvā^eb^ti vidhametvā.

[03]^b^343^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṃ byākāsīti sambandho. Sakalampi cakkhuviññāṇavīthigataṃ cittaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti aggahetvā cakkhusannissitameva pana viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tadanantaraṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ, tadanantaraṃ santīraṇantiādinā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ atīttarakhaṇavantaṃ ^b^cittantaraṃ^eb^ cittanānattaṃ. Khandhādīnañca nānattasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^khandhantarādi^eb^. Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tatheva tatiyaṃ jhānantiādinā ārammaṇaṃ anukkamitvā jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ ^b^jhānokkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma. Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇetiādinā jhānaṃ anukkamitvā ārammaṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ ^b^ārammaṇokkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Paṭhamajjhānaṃ pañcaṅgika’’ntiādinā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ duvaṅgikanti jhānaṅgamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ^b^aṅgavavatthānaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Idaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ…pe… idaṃ odātakasiṇa’’nti ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ^b^ārammaṇavavatthānaṃ^eb^. Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ ^a^V2.0179^ea^^b^aṅgasaṅkanti^eb^. Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇeti evaṃ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ^b^ārammaṇasaṅkanti. Ekatovaḍḍhanaṃ ubhatovaḍḍhana^eb^nti idaṃ khandhādidesanāyaṃ labbhati. Abhidhammabhājanīye hi vedanākkhandhaṃ bhājento bhagavā tike gahetvā dukesu pakkhipi, duke gahetvā tikesu pakkhipi, idaṃ ^b^ekatovaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. Tike ca duke ca ubhatovaḍḍhananīhārena kathesi, idaṃ ^b^ubhatovaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ sesakhandhesu dhātāyatanādīsu ca yathārahaṃ ^b^vibhaṅgappakaraṇe^eb^ (vibha. 32-33; 155-156, 183-184) abhidhammabhājanīye āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ābhidhammikadhammakathikasseva pākaṭa’’^eb^nti. Khandhādīsu sabhāvadhammesu tīsu lakkhaṇesu paññattiyaṃ samayantaresu ca kosallābhāvato ^b^ayaṃ sakavādo ayaṃ paravādoti na jānāti^eb^. Tato eva ^b^sakavādaṃ…pe… dhammantaraṃ visaṃvādeti^eb^. Khandhādīsu pana kusalatāya ^b^ābhidhammiko sakavādaṃ…pe… na visaṃvādeti^eb^.

[03]^b^344^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cittaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0192^ea^^b^attano vase vattetuṃ sakkoti^eb^ paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalehi pariggaṇhanasamatthattā. Idāni tamatthaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘duppañño hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sabbānassā^eb^ti sabbāni assa. ^b^Visevitavipphanditānī^eb^ti kilesavisūkāyikāni ceva duccaritavipphanditāni ca. ^b^Bhañjitvā^eb^ti madditvā. ^b^Bahī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānato bahi puthuttārammaṇe.

[03]^b^345^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pariyāyenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^pariyāya^eb^-saddo ‘‘atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 8.11; pārā. 3-9) viya kāraṇatthoti āha ^b^‘‘sobhanakāraṇaṃ atthī’’^eb^ti. Yadi bhagavā – ‘‘idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto’’tiādinā attano mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha, evaṃ sante sammāsambuddheheva saṅghārāmo sobhetabbo, na aññehīti āpannanti āha ^b^‘‘apica pacchimaṃ janata’’^eb^ntiādi. Nibbānatthāya paṭipattisāraṃ etassāti paṭipattisāro, taṃ ^b^paṭipattisāraṃ. Nippariyāyenevā^eb^ti kenaci pariyāyena lesena vinā mukhyena nayeneva. Yo ‘‘arahattaṃ appatvā na vuṭṭhahissāmī’’ti daḷhasamādānaṃ katvā nisinno taṃ adhigantvāva uṭṭhahati. Evarūpena idaṃ gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobhati, sāsane sabbārambhānaṃ tadatthattāti attho. Āsavakkhayāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ ārabhitvā āsavakkhayeneva desanāya pariyosāpitattā ^b^yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesī^eb^ti.
[06]Mahāgosiṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^346^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0180^ea^ gopālakasutte. ^b^Tisso kathā^eb^ti (a. ni. ṭī. 3.11.17) tisso aṭṭhakathā, tividhā suttassa atthavaṇṇanāti attho. Ekekaṃ padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti evaṃsaññitā ^b^ekanāḷikā,^eb^ ekekaṃ vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ atthaniggamanamaggo etissāti ^b^ekanāḷikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekekapadassa atthakathana’’^eb^nti. Cattāro aṃsā bhāgā atthasallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti ^b^caturassā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathana’’^eb^nti. Niyamato nisinnassa āraddhassa ^a^M2.0193^ea^ vatto saṃvatto etissā atthīti ^b^nisinnavattikā,^eb^ yathāraddhassa atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpikāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṇḍitaṃ gopālakaṃ dassetvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekekapadassā^eb^ti piṇḍatthadassanavasena bahunnaṃ padānaṃ ekajjhaṃ atthaṃ akathetvā ekamekassa padassa atthavaṇṇanā. Ayaṃ sabbattheva labbhati. ^b^Catukkaṃ bandhitvā^eb^ti kaṇhapakkhe upamūpameyyadvayaṃ, tathā sukkapakkheti idaṃ catukkaṃ yojetvā. Ayaṃ īdisesu eva suttesu labbhati. ^b^Pariyosānagamana^eb^nti keci tāva āhu – ‘‘kaṇhapakkhe upamaṃ dassetvā upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyasampaṭidānatthāti upameyyatthaṃ āharitvā saṃkilesapakkhaniddeso ca vodānapakkhavibhāvanatthāyāti sukkapakkhampi upamūpameyyavibhāgena āharitvā suttatthassa pariyosāpana’’nti. Kaṇhapakkhe upameyyaṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanādīsupi eseva nayo. Apare pana ‘‘kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhe ca taṃtaṃupamūpameyyatthānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpetvāva kathanaṃ pariyosānagamana’’nti vadanti. ^b^Aya^eb^nti nisinnavattikā. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ gopālakasutte. ^b^Sabbācariyānaṃ āciṇṇā^eb^ti sabbehipi pubbācariyehi ācaritā saṃvaṇṇitā, tathā ceva pāḷi pavattāti.

[03]Aṅgīyanti avayavabhāvena ñāyantīti ^b^aṅgāni,^eb^ bhāgā. Tāni panettha yasmā sāvajjasabhāvāni, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘aṅgehīti aguṇakoṭṭhāsehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gomaṇḍala^eb^nti gosamūhaṃ. ^b^Pariharitu^eb^nti rakkhituṃ. Taṃ pana pariharaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vicaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘pariggahetvā vicaritu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vaḍḍhi^eb^nti gunnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ bahugorasatāsaṅkhātaṃ parivuddhiṃ. ‘‘Ettakamida’’nti rūpīyatīti ^b^rūpaṃ,^eb^ parimānaparicchedopi sarīrarūpampīti āha ^b^‘‘gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na pariyesati^eb^ vinaṭṭhabhāvasseva ajānanato. ^b^Nīlā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. Tena setasabalādivaṇṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Dhanusattisūlādī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0181^ea^ ettha issāsācariyānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ ^b^dhanulakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Kumārabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ ^b^sattilakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Issarabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ ^b^sūlalakkhaṇa^eb^nti yojanā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena rāmavāsudevagaṇādīnaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ pharasucakkādilakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
[03]^b^Nīlamakkhikā^eb^ti piṅgalamakkhikā, khuddamakkhikā eva vā. Saṭati rujati etāyāti sāṭikā, saṃvaddhā sāṭikāti ^b^āsāṭikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vaḍḍhantī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Vākenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0194^ea^ vākapattena. ^b^Cīrakenā^eb^ti pilotikena. ^b^Antovasse^eb^ti vassakālassa abbhantare. ^b^Niggāha^eb^nti susumārādiggāharahitaṃ. ^b^Pīta^eb^nti pānīyassa pītabhāvaṃ. Sīhabyagghādiparissayena ^b^sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo^eb^.
[03]Pañca ahāni bhūtāni etassāti pañcāhito, so eva vāroti ^b^pañcāhikavāro^eb^. Evaṃ ^b^sattāhikavāro^eb^ti veditabbo. ^b^Ciṇṇaṭṭhāna^eb^nti caritaṭṭhānaṃ gocaraggahitaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Pituṭṭhāna^eb^nti pitarā kātabbaṭṭhānaṃ, pitarā kātabbakaraṇanti attho. ^b^Yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantī^eb^ti gunnaṃ rucianurūpaṃ gocarabhūmiyaṃ vā nadipāraṃ vā gahetvā gacchanti. ^b^Gobhatta^eb^nti kappāsaṭṭhikādimissaṃ gobhuñjitabbaṃ bhattaṃ, bhattaggahaṇeneva yāgupi gahitā.

[03]^b^347^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Dvīhākārehī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ ākāradvayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatā^eb^ti ‘‘upacayo santatī’’ti jātiṃ dvidhā bhinditvā hadayavatthuṃ aggahetvā ‘‘dasa āyatanāni pañcadasa sukhumarūpānī’’ti evaṃ rūpakaṇḍapāḷiyaṃ (dha. sa. 651-655) āgatā. ^b^Pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsā^eb^ti salakkhaṇato aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvato rūpabhāgā. ^b^Rūpakoṭṭhāsā^eb^ti vā visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā kalāpabhāveneva pavattanato rūpakalāpā. ^b^Koṭṭhāsā^eb^ti ca aṃsā, avayavāti attho. ^b^Koṭṭha^eb^nti vā sarīraṃ, tassa aṃsā kesādayo koṭṭhāsāti aññepi avayavā koṭṭhāsā viya ^b^koṭṭhāsā. Seyyathāpī^eb^ti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tattha ^b^rūpaṃ pariggahetvā^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇato ñāṇena pariggaṇhitvā. ^b^Arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā^eb^ti taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya ārammaṇañca katvā pavattamāne vedanādike cattāro khandhe ‘‘arūpa’’nti vavatthapetvā. ^b^Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā^eb^ti puna tattha yaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ rūpaṃ, tadaññaṃ arūpaṃ, ubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci natthi attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti evaṃ rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā. Tadubhayañca avijjādinā paccayena sappaccayanti ^b^paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā^eb^ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ ^a^V2.0182^ea^^b^āropetvā^eb^ yo kalāpasammasanādikkamena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti, so na vaḍḍhatīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Ettakaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0195^ea^^b^rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotaghānajivhākāyāyatanaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ kammavasena, kāyaviññatti vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ cittavasenāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Saddāyatanamekaṃ utucittavasena ^b^dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Rūpassa lahutā mudutā kammaññatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhāravasena ^b^tisamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Rūpagandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu āpodhātu kabaḷīkāro āhāroti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhārakammavasena ^b^catusamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Upacayo santati jaratā rūpassa aniccatāti ^b^ettakaṃ^eb^ rūpaṃ ^b^na kutoci samuṭṭhātīti na jānāti. Samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānanto^eb^tiādīsu vattabbaṃ ‘‘gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto’’tiādesu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Kammalakkhaṇo^eb^ti attanā kataṃ duccaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, bālo. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Duccintitacintī hoti, dubbhāsitabhāsī, dukkaṭakammakārī. Imāni kho…pe… lakkhaṇānī’’ti (a. ni. 3.2; netti. 116). Attanā kataṃ sucaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^kammalakkhaṇo,^eb^ paṇḍito. Vuttampi cetaṃ – ‘‘tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Sucintitacintī hoti, subhāsitabhāsī, sukatakammakārī. Imāni kho…pe… paṇḍitalakkhaṇānī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.253; a. ni. 3.3; netti. 116). Tenāha ^b^‘‘kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ paṇḍitamālalakkhaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevatī^eb^ti yaṃ bālapuggale vajjetvā paṇḍitasevanaṃ atthakāmena kātabbaṃ, taṃ na karoti. Tathābhūtassa ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ puna ^b^‘‘bāle vajjetvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ bhagavatā ‘‘idaṃ vo kappatī’’ti anuññātaṃ, tadanulomañce, taṃ ^b^kappiyaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ ‘‘idaṃ vo na kappatī’’ti paṭikkhittaṃ, tadanulomañce, taṃ ^b^akappiyaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ kosallasambhūtaṃ, taṃ ^b^kusalaṃ,^eb^ tappaṭipakkhaṃ ^b^akusalaṃ^eb^. Tadeva ^b^sāvajjaṃ,^eb^ kusalaṃ ^b^anavajjaṃ^eb^. Āpattito ādito dve āpattikkhandhā ^b^garukaṃ,^eb^ tadaññaṃ ^b^lahukaṃ^eb^. Dhammato mahāsāvajjaṃ ^b^garukaṃ,^eb^ appasāvajjaṃ ^b^lahukaṃ^eb^. Sappaṭikāraṃ ^b^satekiccaṃ,^eb^ appaṭikāraṃ ^b^atekicchaṃ^eb^. Dhammatānugataṃ ^b^kāraṇaṃ,^eb^ itaraṃ ^b^akāraṇaṃ^eb^. ^b^Taṃ ajānanto^eb^ti kappiyākappiyaṃ garukalahukaṃ satekicchātekicchaṃ ajānanto suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti, kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ajānanto khandhādīsu ^a^M2.0196^ea^^a^V2.0183^ea^ akusalatāya rūpārūpapariggahampi kātuṃ na sakkoti, kuto tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkotī’’^eb^ti.
[03]Govaṇasadise attabhāve uppajjitvā tattha dukkhuppattihetuto micchāvitakkā āsāṭikā viyāti ^b^āsāṭikā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana’’nti vacanato (a. ni. 8.56) chahi vaṇamukhehi vissandamānayūso gaṇḍo viya pilotikakhaṇḍena chahi dvārehi vissandamānakilesāsuci attabhāvavaṇo satisaṃvarena pidahitabbo, ayaṃ pana evaṃ na karotīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti, evaṃ saṃvaraṃ na sampādetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yathā dhūmo indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjamāno saṇho sukhumo taṃ taṃ vivaraṃ anupavissa byāpento sattānaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādiparissayaṃ vinodeti, aggijālasamuṭṭhānassa pubbaṅgamo hoti, evaṃ dhammadesanāñāṇassa indhanabhūtaṃ rūpārūpadhammajātaṃ nissāya uppajjamānā saṇhā sukhumā taṃ taṃ khandhantaraṃ āyatanantarañca anupavissa byāpeti, sattānaṃ micchāvitakkādiparissayaṃ vinodeti, ñāṇaggijālasamuṭṭhānassa pubbaṅgamoti dhūmo viyāti ^b^dhūmo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karotī’’^eb^ti. Attano santikaṃ upagantvā nisinnassa kātabbā tadanucchavikā dhammakathā ^b^upanisinnakathā^eb^. Katassa dānādipuññassa anumodanakathā ^b^anumodanā^eb^. ^b^Tato^eb^ti dhammakathādīnaṃ akaraṇato. ^b^‘‘Bahussuto guṇavā’’^eb^ti na jānantīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu attano jānāpanatthaṃ dhammakathādi na kātabbamevāti? Saccaṃ, na kātabbameva, suddhāsayena pana dhamme kathite tassa guṇajānanataṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā –
[21]‘‘Nābhāsamānaṃ jānanti, missaṃ bālehi paṇḍitaṃ;
[22]Bhāsaye jotaye dhammaṃ, paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhaja’’nti. (saṃ. ni. 2.241);

[03]Taranti etthāti ^b^titthaṃ,^eb^ nadītaḷākādīnaṃ nahānādiatthaṃ otaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā pana taṃ udakena otiṇṇasattānaṃ sarīramalaṃ pavāheti, parissamaṃ vinodeti, visuddhiṃ uppādeti, evaṃ bahussutā attano samīpaṃ otiṇṇasattānaṃ ^a^M2.0197^ea^ dhammūdakena cittamalaṃ pavāhenti, parissamaṃ vinodenti, visuddhiṃ uppādenti, tasmā te titthaṃ viyāti ^b^titthaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Byañjanaṃ kathaṃ ropetabba^eb^nti, bhante, idaṃ byañjanaṃ ayaṃ saddo kathaṃ imasmiṃ atthe ^a^V2.0184^ea^ ropetabbo, kena pakārena imassa atthassa vācako jāto. ‘‘Nirūpetabba’’nti vā pāṭho, nirūpetabbaṃ ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti kathamettha niruḷhāti adhippāyo. ^b^Imassa bhāsitassa ko attho^eb^ti saddatthaṃ pucchati. ^b^Imasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti imasmiṃ pāḷipadese. ^b^Pāḷi kiṃ vadetī^eb^ti bhāvatthaṃ pucchati. ^b^Attho kiṃ dīpetī^eb^ti bhāvatthaṃ vā saṅketatthaṃ vā. ^b^Na paripucchatī^eb^ti vimaticchedanapucchāvasena sabbaso pucchaṃ na karoti. ^b^Na paripañhatī^eb^ti pari pari attano ñātuṃ icchaṃ na ācikkhati na vibhāveti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na jānāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Te^eb^ti bahussutabhikkhū. ^b^Vivaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma atthassa vibhajitvā kathananti āha ^b^‘‘bhājetvā na dassentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anuttānīkata^eb^nti ñāṇena apākaṭīkataṃ guyhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. ^b^Na uttānīkarontī^eb^ti sinerumūlakaṃ vālikaṃ uddharanto viya pathavīsandhārodakaṃ vivaritvā dassento viya ca uttānaṃ na karonti. Evaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena bahussutā ‘‘tittha’’nti vuttā pariyāyato, idāni tameva dhammaṃ nippariyāyato titthanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Dhammo hi taranti etena nibbānaṃ nāma taḷākanti ^b^‘‘tittha’’^eb^nti vuccati. Tenāha bhagavā sumedhabhūto –
[21]‘‘Evaṃ kilesamaladhovaṃ, vijjante amatantaḷe;
[22]Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe’’ti. (bu. vaṃ. 2.14);
[03]Dhammasseva nibbānassotaraṇatitthabhūtassa otaraṇapakāraṃ ajānanto ^b^‘‘dhammatitthaṃ na jānātī’’^eb^ti vutto.

[03]^b^Pītāpīta^eb^nti gogaṇe pītaṃ apītañca gorūpaṃ na jānāti na vindati. Avindanto hi na labhatīti vutto. ^b^‘‘Ānisaṃsaṃ na vindatī’’^eb^ti vatvā tassa avindanākāraṃ dassento ^b^‘‘dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ lokuttaro^eb^ti padaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ariya’’^eb^nti. Paccāsattiñāyena anantaravidhippaṭisedho vā, ariya-saddo vā niddosapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Aṭṭhaṅgika^eb^nti ca visuṃ ekajjhañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ upādāya gahetabbaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgatā ^a^M2.0198^ea^ bāhullato ca. Evañca katvā sattaṅgassapi ariyamaggassa saṅgaho siddho hoti.

[03]^b^Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne^eb^tiādīsu avisesena satipaṭṭhānā vuttā. Tattha kāyavedanācittadhammārammaṇā ^a^V2.0185^ea^ satipaṭṭhānā lokiyā, tattha sammohaviddhaṃsanavasena pavattā nibbānārammaṇā lokuttarāti evaṃ ^b^ime lokiyā, ime lokuttarāti yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti^eb^.

[03]^b^Anavasesaṃ duhatī^eb^ti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto kismiñci dāyake saddhāhāniyā kismiñci paccayahāniyā anavasesaṃ duhati. Vācāya abhihāro ^b^vācābhihāro^eb^. Paccayānaṃ abhihāro ^b^paccayābhihāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī^eb^ti iminā navakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti ācariyupajjhāyesu pitupemassa anupaṭṭhāpanato. Tena ca sikkhāgāravatābhāvadīpanena saṅgahassa abhājanabhāvaṃ, tena therānaṃ tesu anuggahābhāvaṃ. Na hi sīlādiguṇehi sāsane thirabhāvappattā ananuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti, niratthakaṃ vā anuggahaṃ karonti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘navake bhikkhū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammakathābandha^eb^nti paveṇiāgataṃ pakiṇṇakadhammakathāmaggaṃ. Saccasattapaṭisandhipaccayākārapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ suññatādīpanaṃ ^b^guyhaganthaṃ^eb^. ^b^Vuttavipallāsavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘na rūpaññū’’tiādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepavasena aggahaṇavasena. ^b^Yojetvā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanāto vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ jānātī’’tiādinā, ‘‘tassa gogaṇopi na parihāyati, pañcagorasaparibhogatopi na paribāhiro hotī’’tiādinā ca atthaṃ yojetvā. ^b^Veditabbo^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ padese yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
[06]Mahāgopālakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^350^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Celukkāhī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0186^ea^ celamayāhi ukkāhi. Ukkabhūtāni celāni etthāti ^b^ukkacelā,^eb^ nagaraṃ. ^b^Sabbā gaṅgā pākaṭā hutvā paññāyatī^eb^ti pakaticakkhussa ^a^M2.0199^ea^ pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhāti, dibbacakkhussa pana samantacakkhussa vā yattha katthaci nisinnassapi bhagavato pākaṭā hutvā paññāyateva. ^b^Sotthī^eb^ti anupaddavo. ^b^Vaḍḍhī^eb^ti aparihāni. ^b^Ārogya^eb^nti arogatā ābādhābhāvo.

[03]Magadho janapado nivāso etassāti māgadho, māgadhova ^b^māgadhiko^eb^. Paññāya nāma duṭṭhubhāvo natthi ekantānavajjatāya, tasmā ^b^du^eb^-saddo abhāvavācī ‘‘dussīlo’’tiādīsu viya, ^b^jāti^eb^-saddo ca sabhāvatthoti āha ^b^‘‘nippaññasabhāvo’’^eb^ti. -Saddo ārambhatthoti āha ^b^‘‘patāresīti tāretuṃ ārabhī’’^eb^ti paratīraṃ gāvīnaṃ appattattā. ^b^Suvidehāna^eb^nti sundaravidehānaṃ. Videharaṭṭhaṃ kira bhūmibhāgadassanasampattiyā ca vanarāmaṇeyyakādinā ca sundaraṃ. ^b^Āmaṇḍalikaṃ karitvā^eb^ti āvatte patitā temaṇḍalākārena paribbhamitvā. Katipayāpi gāviyo asesetvā nadīsotena vūḷhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avaḍḍhiṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇiṃsū’’^eb^ti. Katipayāsupi hi avasiṭṭhāsu gāvīsu anukkamenapi siyā gogaṇassa vaḍḍhīti. ^b^Vissamaṭṭhāna^eb^nti parissamavinodanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Titthā bhaṭṭhā^eb^ti gahetuṃ asamatthatāya titthaṃ appattā. ^b^Arogo nāma nāhosī^eb^ti lomamattampi asesetvā sabbā gāviyo nadīsote vinaṭṭhāti attho.

[03]Yesu khandhāyatanadhātūsu idha lokasamaññā, te ajānantā ‘‘akusalā imassa lokassā’’ti vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘idhaloke khandhadhātāyatanesu akusalā achekā’’^eb^ti. Ayameva nayo ‘‘akusalā parassa lokassā’’ti etthāpīti āha ^b^‘‘paralokepi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti. Māro ettha dhīyatīti ^b^māradheyyaṃ. Māro^eb^ti cettha kilesamāro veditabbo. Khandhābhisaṅkhārā hi tassa pavattanabhāvena gahitā, maccumāro visuṃ gahito eva, kilesamāravaseneva ca devaputtamārassa kāmabhave ādhipaccanti. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti ye idhalokādīsu achekā, tesaṃ. Te pana ukkaṭṭhaniddesena dassento āha ^b^‘‘iminā cha satthāro dassitā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^351^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Balavagāvo^eb^ti balavante gorūpe. Te pana dammataṃ upagatagoṇā ceva dhenuyo cāti āha ^a^V2.0187^ea^^b^‘‘dantagoṇe ceva dhenuyo cā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0200^ea^. ^b^Avijātagāvoti na^eb^ vijātagāviyo. ^b^Vacchake^eb^ti khuddakavacche. Appattho hi ayaṃ ka-saddo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taruṇavacchake’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kisābalake^eb^ti dubbale.

[03]^b^352^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mārassa taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā^eb^ti khandhamārasambandhītaṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ samucchinditvā. ^b^Tayo koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitā^eb^ti anāgāmino sandhāyāha. ^b^Sabbavāresū^eb^ti sakadāgāmisotāpannāṭṭhamakavāresu. Tattha pana yathākkamaṃ catumaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ dve koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitā, ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ khepetvā ṭhitā, paṭhamaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ khepentoti vattabbaṃ. Dhammaṃ anussaranti, dhammassa vā anussaraṇasīlāti ^b^dhammānusārino. Dhammo^eb^ti cettha paññā adhippetā. Saddhaṃ anussaranti, saddhāya vā anussaraṇasīlāti ^b^saddhānusārino^eb^.

[03]^b^Jānatā^eb^ti ettha jānanakiriyāvisayassa avisesitattā adhikāravasena anavasesañeyyavisesā adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbadhamme jānantenā’’^eb^ti. Antosāravirahato abbhuggataṭṭhena ca naḷo viyāti ^b^naḷo,^eb^ mānoti āha ^b^‘‘vigatamānanaḷaṃ kata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Khemaṃ patthethā^eb^ti ettha catūhi yogehi anupaddavattā ‘‘khema’’nti arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^Patthanā^eb^ ca chandapatthanā, na taṇhāpatthanāti āha ^b^‘‘kattukamyatāchandena arahattaṃ patthethā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pattāyeva nāma^eb^ tassa pattiyā na koci antarāyo. Sotthinā pāragamanaṃ uddissa desanaṃ ārabhitvā khemappattiyā desanāya pariyosāpitattā ^b^yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesī^eb^ti.
[06]Cūḷagopālakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[03]^b^353^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Haṃsavaṭṭakacchannenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0188^ea^ haṃsavaṭṭakapaṭicchannena, haṃsamaṇḍalākārenāti attho.

[03]Vadanti etenāti vādo, maggo. Kiṃ vadanti? Uttaraṃ. Vādānaṃ satāni ^b^vādasatāni^eb^. ‘‘Nigaṇṭho pañcavādasatāni, nigaṇṭhī pañcavādasatānī’’ti evaṃ ^b^nigaṇṭho^eb^^a^M2.0201^ea^^b^ca nigaṇṭhī ca pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahetvā vicarantā^eb^. Kiriyato te ^b^pucchiṃsu,^eb^ liṅgato pana nigaṇṭhabhāvo ñāto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ahaṃ vādaṃ āropessāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Jagganto^eb^ sammajjanādivasena. ^b^Divātara^eb^nti atidivaṃ. ‘‘Kassa pucchā, kassa vissajjanaṃ hotū’’ti paribbājikāhi vutte thero āha ^b^‘‘pucchā nāma amhākaṃ pattā’’^eb^ti. Pucchā vādānaṃ pubbapakkho, yasmā tumhe vādapasutā vādābhiratā dhajaṃ paggayha vicaratha, tasmā vādānaṃ pubbapakkho amhākaṃ patto, evaṃ santepi tumhākaṃ mātugāmabhāvato pubbapakkhaṃ demāti āha ^b^‘‘tumhe pana mātugāmā nāma paṭhamaṃ pucchathā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tā^eb^ paribbājikā ekekā aḍḍhateyyasatavādamaggaṃ pucchantiyo ^b^vādasahassaṃ pucchiṃsu^eb^. Yathā nisitassa khaggassa kumudanāḷacchedane kimatthi bhāriyaṃ, evaṃ paṭisambhidāppattassa sāvakesu paññavantānaṃ aggabhāve ṭhitassa dhammasenāpatino puthujjanaparikappitapañhavissajjane kimatthi bhāriyaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘thero khaggenā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā^eb^ti yathā tā puna tattha jaṭaṃ gaṇṭhiṃ kātuṃ na visahanti, tathā vijaṭetvā kathesi. Ayaṃ thero caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre sahassavaṭṭikaṃ dīpento viya aññesaṃ avisaye andhakārabhūte pañhe pucchitamatteyeva vissajjesīti therassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ disvā sayañca antimabhavikatāya kohaññe ṭhātuṃ asakkontiyo ^b^‘‘ettakameva, bhante, mayaṃ jānāmā’’^eb^ti āhaṃsu. ^b^Therassa visaya^eb^nti therassa paññāvisayaṃ.

[03]^b^Neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ addasaṃsū^eb^ti ekanti vattabbassa bahubhāvato tassā pucchāya attho evamanto evamavasānakoṭīti na passiṃsu na jāniṃsu. Thero tāsaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ olokento pabbajjāruciṃ disvā āha ^b^‘‘idāni kiṃ karissathā’’^eb^ti? ^b^Uttaritarapañño^eb^ti vādamaggaparicayena medhāvitāya ca yādisā tāsaṃ paññā, tato uttaritarapañño.

[03]^b^Kathāmaggo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0189^ea^ vādamaggo. Tasmā tehi tehi parappavādādīhi bhassaṃ vādamaggaṃ pakārehi vadetīti ^b^bhassappavādako. Paṇḍitavādo^eb^ti ahaṃ paṇḍito nipuṇo bahussutoti evaṃvādī. ^b^Yaṃ yaṃ nakkhattācārena ādisatī^eb^ti nakkhattagatiyā kālañāṇena ‘‘asukadivase candaggāho bhavissati, sūriyaggāho bhavissatī’’tiādinā yaṃ yaṃ ādesaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^Sādhuladdhiko^eb^ ñāṇasampattiyā sundaro. ^b^Āropito^eb^ti paṭiññāhetunidassanādidosaṃ ^a^M2.0202^ea^ upari āropito vādo svāropito. Dosapadaṃ āropentena vādinā paravādimhi abhibhuyya tassa dhātukkhobhopi siyā, cittavikkhepena yena doso tena saṅkappito sampavedhitoti. ^b^Thūṇa^eb^nti sarīraṃ khobhitanti katvā. ^b^Thūṇa^eb^nti hi lohitapittasemhānaṃ adhivacanaṃ sabbaṅgasarīradhāraṇato. Apica thūṇapado nāma atthi kathāmaggo vādamaggaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ. Saccako pana kohaññe ṭhatvā attano vādappabhedavasena pare vimhāpento ^b^‘‘thūṇaṃ cepāha’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Sāvakānaṃ vinayaṃ nāma sikkhāpadaṃ, tañca dhammadesanā hotīti esā eva cassa anusāsanīti vinayanādimukhena sammāsambuddhassa mataṃ sāsanaṃ pucchanto saccako ^b^‘‘kathaṃ pana, bho, assajī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Athassa thero ‘‘lakkhaṇattayakathā nāma anaññasādhāraṇā buddhāveṇikā dhammadesanā, tatra ca mayā aniccakathāya samuṭṭhāpitāya taṃ asahanto saccako tucchamānena paṭapaṭāyanto kurumāno licchavī gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamissati, athassa bhagavā vādaṃ madditvā aniccanti patiṭṭhapento dhammaṃ kathessati, tadā bhavissati vijahitavādo sammāpaṭipattiyā patiṭṭhito’’ti cintetvā aniccānattalakkhaṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ bhagavato anusāsanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘evaṃ, bho, aggivessanā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Kasmā panettha dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ aggahitanti āha ^b^‘‘thero panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Upārambhassa okāso hotī’’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘maggaphalānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^pariyāyenā^eb^ti saṅkhāradukkhatāpariyāyena. ^b^Aya^eb^nti saccako. ^b^Nayidaṃ tumhākaṃ sāsanaṃ nāmā^eb^ti yattha tumhe avaṭṭhitā, idaṃ tumhākaṃ sabbaññusāsanaṃ nāma na hoti dukkhato anissaraṇattā, atha kho ^b^mahāāghātanaṃ nāmetaṃ,^eb^ mahādukkhaniddiṭṭhattā pana ^b^nirayussado nāma^eb^ ussadanirayo nāma, tasmā ^b^natti^eb^ nāma ^b^tumhākaṃ sukhāsā. Uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāyā^eb^ti ussukkaṃ katvā, ^b^dukkhameva jīrāpentā^eb^ sabbaso dukkhameva anubhavantā, ^b^āhiṇḍatha^eb^ vicarathāti. Sabbamidaṃ tassa micchāparikappitameva. Kasmā? Dukkhasaccūpasañhitāyeva hettha nippariyāyakathā nāma. Tassa hi pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati. Maggaphalāni saṅkhārabhāvena ‘‘yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha’’nti pariyāyato dukkhaṃ, na nippariyāyato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sotuṃ ayuttaṃ^eb^ micchāvādattāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^354^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saha ^a^V2.0190^ea^^a^M2.0203^ea^ atthānusāsanaṃ agāranti sandhāgāraṃ, rājakulānaṃ santhāpanāgārantipi sandhāgāraṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^santhāgāre^eb^ti attho. Ekasmiṃ kāle tādise kāle rājakiccānaṃ santhānamettha vicārentīti sandhāgāraṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^santhāgāre^eb^tipi attho. ^b^Patiṭṭhita^eb^nti ‘‘aniccaṃ anattā’’ti ca paṭiññātaṃ. ^b^Idāneva piṭṭhiṃ parivattento^eb^ti bhagavato nalāṭaṃ anoloketvā vimukhabhāvaṃ āpajjanto. ^b^Surāghare^eb^ti surāsampādakagehe. ^b^Piṭṭhakilañja^eb^nti piṭṭhaṭhapanakiḷañjaṃ. ^b^Vāla^eb^nti caṅgavāraṃ. ^b^Sāṇasāṭakakaraṇattha^eb^nti sāṇasāṭakaṃ karonti etenāti ^b^sāṇasāṭakakaraṇaṃ,^eb^ suttaṃ, tadatthaṃ. Sāṇavākā etesu santīti ^b^sāṇavākā,^eb^ sāṇadaṇḍā. Te gahetvā sāṇānaṃ dhovanasadisaṃ kīḷitajātaṃ yathā ‘‘uddālapupphabhañjikā, sāṇabhañjikā’’ti ca. ^b^Kiṃ so bhavamāno^eb^ti kīdiso hutvā so bhavamāno, kiṃ honto loke aggapuggalassa sammāsambuddhassa vādāropanaṃ nāma tato uttaritarasūraguṇo eva yakkhādibhāvena so bhavamāno abhisambhuṇeyya. Ayaṃ pana appānubhāvatāya pisācarūpo kiṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ niddāyanto ajja pabujjhitvā evaṃ vadatīti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ yakkho’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^355^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāmajjhanhikasamaye^eb^ti mahati majjhanhikakāle, gaganamajjhe sūriyagatavelāya. ^b^Divāpadhānikā^eb^ padhānānuyuñjakā. ^b^Vattaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti pacchābhattaṃ divāvihārūpagamanato pubbe kātabbavattaṃ dassetvā paṭipajjitvā. ^b^Bhagavantaṃ dassento^eb^ti bhagavati gāravabahumānaṃ vibhāvento ubho hatthe kamalamakulākāre katvā ukkhippa bhagavantaṃ dassento.

[03]^b^Taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti taṃ aparicchinnagaṇanaṃ sandhāya evaṃ ‘‘mahatiyā licchaviparisāyā’’ti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ sīsena bhūmiṃ paharanteneva vandanā katā hoti? ^b^Kerāṭikā^eb^ti saṭhā. ^b^Mocentā^eb^ti bhikkhādānato mocentā. ^b^Avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍo viyā^eb^ti heṭṭhākhittamattikāpiṇḍo viya. ^b^Yattha katthacī^eb^ti attano anurūpaṃ vacanaṃ asallapento yattha katthaci.

[03]^b^356^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dissati ^a^M2.0204^ea^ ‘‘idaṃ imassa phala’’nti apadissati etenāti ^b^deso,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ, tadeva tassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya okāsoti āha ^b^‘‘kañcideva desanti kañci okāsaṃ kiñci kāraṇa’’^eb^nti. Okāso ṭhānanti ca kāraṇaṃ vuccati ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.161; ma. ni. 3.128-131; a. ni. 1.268-295; vibha. 809). ^b^Yadākaṅkhasīti na vadanti^eb^ anavasesadhammavisayattā paṭiññāya. ^b^Tumha^eb^nti tumhākaṃ. ^b^Yakkha…pe… paribbājakāna^eb^nti ettha ‘‘pucchāvuso, yadākaṅkhasī’’tiādīni (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. āḷavakasutta) pucchāvacanāni yathākkamaṃ yojetabbāni.
[03]^b^Ñatvā^eb^^a^V2.0191^ea^^b^sayaṃ lokamimaṃ parañcā^eb^ti idaṃ mahāsatto nirayaṃ saggañca tesaṃ paccakkhato dassetvā āha.

[03]^b^Taggha te ahamakkhissaṃ, yathāpi kusalo tathā^eb^ti yathā pakārena sukusalo sabbaññū jānāti katheti, tathā ahaṃ kathessāmi. Tassa pana kāraṇaṃ akāraṇañca avijānanto rājānaṃ karotu vā mā vā, ahaṃ pana te akkhissāmīti āha ^b^‘‘rājā ca kho…pe… na vā’’^eb^ti.
