[03]^b^Kathitaniyāmeneva kathento^eb^ti teparivaṭṭakathāya dukkhalakkhaṇampesa kathessati, idha pana aññathā sāvakena assajinā kathitaṃ, aññathā samaṇena gotamenāti vacanokāsapariharaṇatthaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ anāmasitvā therena kathitaniyāmeneva aniccānattalakkhaṇameva kathentena bhagavatā – ‘‘rūpaṃ anattā yāva viññāṇaṃ anattā’’ti vutte saccako taṃ asampaṭicchanto upamāya atthañāpane upamāpamāṇaṃ yathā ‘‘go viya gavayo’’ti attānaṃ upameyyaṃ katvā upamāpamāṇena patiṭṭhāpetukāmo āha ^b^‘‘upamā maṃ, bho gotama, paṭibhātī’’^eb^ti, upamaṃ te karissāmi, upamāyapidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānantīti adhippāyo. Bhagavā upamāsatena, aññena vāpi pamāṇena tava attā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na labbhā attano viya pamāṇassapi anupalabbhanatoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭibhātu taṃ aggivessanā’’^eb^ti. Yathā hi attā nāma koci paramatthato na upalabbhati ekaṃsena anupaladdhito, evassa ñāpakapuggalaṃ pamāṇampi na upalabbhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āhara taṃ^eb^^a^M2.0205^ea^^b^upamaṃ vissattho’’^eb^ti, na tena tava attavādo patiṭṭhaṃ labhatīti adhippāyo.

[03]Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ kāyikaṃ vā puññāpuññaṃ purisapuggale upalabbhati, tena viññāyati ^b^rūpattāyaṃ purisapuggalo,^eb^ tathā yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ purisapuggale upalabbhati, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nīlādisañjānanaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ rajjanadussanādi, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇapaṭivijānanaṃ purisapuggale upalabbhati, tena viññāyati ^b^viññāṇattāyaṃ purisapuggalo^eb^ti. Evaṃ rūpādilakkhaṇo attā tattha tattha kāye kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā kammaphalasambandho na yujjeyyāti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘iminā kiṃ dīpetī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^te^eb^ti sattā. ^b^Patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti nissāya. ‘‘Rūpattāyaṃ purisapuggalo’’tiādinā rūpādidhamme ‘‘attā’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘rūpe patiṭṭhāyā’’tiādiṃ vadanto ayaṃ nigaṇṭho attano vādaṃ bhindati patiṭṭhānassa, patiṭṭhāyakassa ca abhedadīpanato. Rūpādayo ^a^V2.0192^ea^ vedanādisabhāvā attā tannissayena puññādikiriyāsamupaladdhito idha yaṃ nissāya puññādikiriyā samupalabbhati, te rūpādayo sattasaññitā attasabhāvā diṭṭhā yathā taṃ devatādīsu, ye pana sattasaññitā tato aññe asattasabhāvā diṭṭhā yathā taṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarādīsūti evaṃ sādhetabbaṃ atthaṃ sahetuṃ katvā dassento nigaṇṭho nidassanaṃ ānesīti āha ^b^‘‘ativiya sakāraṇaṃ katvā upamaṃ āharī’’^eb^ti. Tassa pana ‘‘balakaraṇīyā’’ti vuttapurisappayogā viya bījagāmabhūtagāmāpi sajīvā evāti laddhīti te sadisūdāharaṇabhāvena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sace pana ye jīvassa ādhāraṇabhāvena sahitena pavattetabbabhāvena sallakkhetabbā, te sajīvāti icchitā, na kevalena pavattetabbabhāvena. Evaṃ sati ‘‘balakaraṇīyā kammantā’’ti vadantena visadisūdāharaṇabhāvena upanītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Samattho nāma natthi^eb^ attavādabhañjanassa anattatāpatiṭṭhāpanassa ca sugatāveṇikattā. Yaṃ panetarahi sāsanikā yathāsatti tadubhayaṃ karonti, taṃ buddhehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā tesaṃ desanānusārato. ^b^Nivattetvā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0206^ea^ nīharitvā, visuṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Sakalaṃ vesāli^eb^nti sabbavesālivāsinaṃ janaṃ nissayūpacārena nissitaṃ vadati yathā ‘‘gāmo āgato’’ti. ^b^Saṃvaṭṭitvā^eb^ti sampiṇḍitvā, ekajjhaṃ gahetvāti attho.

[03]^b^357^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Patiṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti yathā taṃ vādaṃ na avajānāti, evaṃ paṭiññaṃ kāretvāti attho. ^b^Ghāti^eb^-saddo hiṃsanattho, tato ca saddavidū arahatthaṃ tāya-saddaṃ uppādetvā ghātetāyanti rūpasiddhiṃ icchantīti āha ^b^‘‘ghātāraha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Jāpetāya^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Vattituñca marahatī^eb^ti ma-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^Visesetvā dīpetī^eb^ti ‘‘vattati’’icceva avatvā ‘‘vattituñca marahatī’’ti dutiyena padena bhagavatā vuttaṃ visesetvā dīpeti.

[03]^b^Pāsādikaṃ abhirūpa^eb^nti abhimatarūpasampannaṃ sabbāvayavaṃ. Tato eva susajjitaṃ sabbakālaṃ suṭṭhu sajjitākārameva. ^b^Evaṃvidha^eb^nti yādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘dubbaṇṇa’’^eb^ntiādinā. ^b^Imasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti ‘‘vattati te tasmiṃ rūpe vaso’’ti etasmiṃ kāraṇaggahaṇe. Kāraṇañhetaṃ bhagavatā gahitaṃ ‘‘vattati…pe… mā ahosī’’ti. Tenetaṃ dasseti rūpaṃ anattā avasavattanato, yañhi vase na vattati, taṃ anattakameva diṭṭhaṃ yathā taṃ sampatti. ^b^Vāda^eb^nti dosaṃ niggahaṃ āropessati. ^b^Sattadhā muddhā phalatī^eb^ti sahadhammikasākacchāhi tathāgate, pucchante abyākaraṇena vihesāya kayiramānattā tatiye vāre dhammatāvasena vihesakassa sattadhā muddhā phalati yathā taṃ sabbaññupaṭiññāya bhagavato sammukhabhāvūpagamane. Vajirapāṇi ^a^V2.0193^ea^ pana kasmā ṭhito hotīti? Bhagavā viya anukampamāno mahantaṃ bhayānakaṃ rūpaṃ māpetvā tāsetvā imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ vissajjāpemīti tassa purato ākāse vajiraṃ āharanto tiṭṭhati, na muddhaṃ phāletukāmo. Na hi bhagavato purato kassaci anattho nāma hoti. Yasmā pana bhagavā ekaṃsato sahadhammikameva pañhaṃ pucchati, tasmā ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘pucchite’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Āditta^eb^nti dippamānaṃ. ^b^Akkhināsādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena eḷakasīsasadisakesamassuādīnaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^‘‘Diṭṭhivissajjāpanattha’’^eb^nti vatvā nayidaṃ yadicchāvasena ^a^M2.0207^ea^ āgamanaṃ, atha kho ādito mahābrahmānaṃ purato katvā attanā katapaṭiññāvasenāti dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nti vajirapāṇiṃ. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ saccakassa paṭiññāya parivattana^b^kāraṇaṃ. Aññepi nu kho^eb^tiādi saccakassa vīmaṃsakabhāvadassanaṃ. Avīmaṃsakena hi taṃ disvā mahāyakkhoti vadeyya, tenassa asāruppaṃ siyā, ayaṃ pana aññesaṃ abhītabhāvaṃ upadhāretvā ‘‘addhāme yakkhaṃ na passanti, tasmā mayhameva bhayaṃ uppanna’’nti tīretvā yuttappattavasena paṭipajji.

[03]^b^358^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upadhāretvā^eb^ti byākātabbamatthaṃ sallakkhetvā. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti saṅkhāraviññāṇesupi saññāya viya nayoti attho. ^b^Vuttavipariyāyenā^eb^ti ‘‘akusalā dukkhā vedanā mā ahosi, akusalā domanassasampayuttā saññā mā ahosī’’tiādinā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Sappadaṭṭhavisa^eb^nti sabbasattānaṃ sappadaṭṭhaṭṭhāne sarīrapadese patitaṃ visaṃ. ^b^Allīno^eb^ti saṃsiliṭṭho. ^b^Upagato^eb^ti na apagato. ^b^Ajjhosito^eb^ti gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhito. ^b^Parito jāneyyā^eb^ti samantato sabbaso kiñcipi asesetvā jāneyya. ^b^Parikkhepetvā^eb^ti āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanavasena sabbaso khepetvā. Tathābhūto cassa khayavayaṃ upaneti nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘khayaṃ vayaṃ anuppādaṃ upanetvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^359^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attano vādassa asārabhāvato, yathāparikappitassa vā sārassa abhāvato antosāravirahito ^b^ritto. Vippakāra^eb^nti diṭṭhiyā sīlācārassa ca vasena virūpataṃ sāparādhataṃ sāvajjataṃ tesaṃ upari āropetvā. ^b^Sinnapatto^eb^ti tanukapatto. ^b^Viphārita^eb^nti viphāḷitaṃ.

[03]^b^Asārakarukkhaparicito^eb^ti palāsādiasārarukkhakoṭṭane kataparicayo. ^b^Thaddhabhāva^eb^nti vipakkabhāvaṃ, tikkhabhāvanti attho. ^b^Natthī^eb^ti sadā natthīti na vattabbaṃ. ^b^Parisatī^eb^ti catuparisamajjhe ^a^V2.0194^ea^. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā paṭicchannasarīrā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Yantāruḷhassa viyā^eb^ti byākaraṇatthaṃ vāyamayantaṃ āruḷhassa viya.

[03]^b^360^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Diṭṭhivisūkānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0208^ea^ diṭṭhikiñcakāni. ^b^Diṭṭhisañcaritānī^eb^ti diṭṭhitāḷanāni. ^b^Diṭṭhivipphanditānī^eb^ti diṭṭhīñjitāni. ^b^Tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti tesaṃ licchavikumārānaṃ iñjiteneva ajjhāsayaṃ jānitvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ime’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^361^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmiṃ adhigate puggalo satthusāsane visārado hoti parehi asaṃhāriyo, taṃ ñāṇaṃ visāradassa bhāvoti katvā ^b^vesārajja^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vesārajjappattoti ñāṇappatto’’^eb^ti. Tato evamassa na paro paccetabbo etassa atthīti ^b^aparappaccayo^eb^. Na paro pattiyo saddahātabbo etassa atthīti ^b^aparappattiyo^eb^. Kāmaṃ saccako sekkhabhūmi asekkhabhūmīti idaṃ sāsanavohāraṃ na jānāti. Passatīti pana dassanakiriyāya vippakatabhāvassa vuttattā ‘‘na ettāvatā bhikkhukiccaṃ pariyosita’’nti aññāsi, tasmā puna ‘‘kittāvatā panā’’ti pucchaṃ ārabhi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘passatīti vuttattā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yathābhūtaṃ passatīti dassanaṃ, visiṭṭhaṭṭhena anuttariyaṃ, dassanameva anuttariyanti ^b^dassanānuttariyaṃ,^eb^ dassanesu vā anuttariyaṃ ^b^dassanānuttariyaṃ^eb^. ^b^Lokiyapaññā^eb^ti cettha vipassanāpaññā veditabbā. Sā hi sabbalokiyapaññāhi visiṭṭhaṭṭhena ‘‘anuttarā’’ti vuttā. Lokiyapaṭipadānuttariyesupi eseva nayo. Idāni nippariyāyatova tividhampi anuttariyaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘suddhalokuttaramevā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Satipi sabbesampi lokuttaradhammānaṃ anuttarabhāve ukkaṭṭhaniddesena aggamaggapaññā tato uttaritarassa abhāvato ^b^dassanānuttariyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sesāni maggaṅgānī^eb^ti sesāni arahattamaggaṅgāni. Tāni hi matthakappattāni nibbānagāminī paṭipadāti. ^b^Aggaphalavimuttī^eb^ti aggamaggassa phalavimutti arahattaphalaṃ. ^b^Khīṇāsavassā^eb^ti sabbaso khīyamānāsavassa. ^b^Nibbānadassana^eb^nti aggamaggasammādiṭṭhiyā sacchikiriyābhisamayamāha. Tattha ^b^maggaṅgānī^eb^ti aṭṭha maggaṅgāni. Catusaccantogadhattā sabbassa ñeyyadhammassa ^b^‘‘cattāri saccāni buddho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Saccānugatasammohaviddhaṃsaneneva hi bhagavato sabbaso ñeyyāvaraṇappahānaṃ. ^b^Nibbisevano^eb^ti niruddhakilesavisevano.

[03]^b^362^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhaṃsī^eb^ti anuddhaṃsanasīlā. ^b^Anupahata^eb^nti avikkhittaṃ. ^b^Sakala^eb^nti anūnaṃ. ^b^Kāyaṅga^eb^nti ^a^V2.0195^ea^ kāyameva aṅganti vadanti, kāyasaṅkhātaṃ aṅgaṃ sīsādiavayavanti ^a^M2.0209^ea^ attho. Tathā ‘‘hotu, sādhū’’ti evamidaṃ vācāya avayavo ^b^vācaṅga^eb^nti.

[03]^b^363^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āharantī^eb^ti abhiharanti. ^b^Puñña^eb^nti puññaphalasaṅkhāto ānubhāvo. Puññaphalampi hi uttarapadalopena ‘‘puñña’’nti vuccati – ‘‘kusalānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ samādānahetu evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.80). Tenāha ^b^‘‘āyatiṃ vipākakkhandhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Puññamahī^eb^ti mahati puññaphalavibhūti setacchattamakuṭacāmarādi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vipākakkhandhānaṃyeva parivāro’’^eb^ti. Licchavīhi pesitena khādanīyabhojanīyena samaṇo gotamo sasāvakasaṅgho mayā parivisito, tasmā licchavīnameva taṃ puññaṃ hotīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṃ dāyakānaṃ sukhāya hotū’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca saccakena dānaṃ dinnaṃ, na licchavīhi, tasmā bhagavā saccakassa satiṃ parivattento ^b^‘‘yaṃ kho’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iti bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nigaṇṭhassa matena vināyevā^eb^ti saccakassa cittena vinā eva tassa dakkhiṇaṃ khettagataṃ katvā dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano dinnaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ…pe… niyyātesī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Cūḷasaccakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^364^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0196^ea^^b^samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharatī^eb^ti iminā tadā bhagavato vesāliyaṃ nivāsaparicchinno pubbaṇhādibhedo sabbo samayo sādhāraṇato gahito, tathā ^b^tena kho pana samayenā^eb^ti ca iminā. ^b^Pubbaṇhasamaya^eb^nti pana iminā tabbiseso, yo bhikkhācāratthāya paccavekkhaṇakālo. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^‘‘tīhi padehi ekova samayo vutto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ visesassa sāmaññantogadhattā. Mukhadhovanassa pubbakālakiriyābhāvasāmaññato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mukhaṃ dhovitvā’’^eb^ti. Mukhaṃ dhovitvā eva hi vāsadhuro ce, velaṃ sallakkhetvā yathāciṇṇaṃ bhāvanānuyogaṃ, ganthadhuro ce, ganthaparicaye katipaye nisajjavāre anuyuñjitvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya vitakkamāḷaṃ upagacchati.

[03]^b^Kāraṇaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0210^ea^ yuttaṃ, anucchavikanti attho. Pubbe yathācintitaṃ pañhaṃ apucchitvā aññaṃ pucchanto maggaṃ ṭhapetvā ummaggato parivattento viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘passena tāva pariharanto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^365^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^nāma^eb^-saddo vimhayatthoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vimhayatthavasenā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Andho nāma pabbataṃ abhiruhissatī’’tiādīsu viya vimhayavācīsaddayogena hi ‘‘bhavissatī’’ti anāgatavacanaṃ. ^b^Kāyanvaya^eb^nti kāyānugataṃ. ‘‘Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.379; ma. ni. 1.112; ma. ni. 3.154) kāyassa asubhāniccāditāya anupassanā kāyabhāvanāti āha ^b^‘‘kāyabhāvanāti pana vipassanā vuccatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anāgatarūpa^eb^nti abhīte atthe anāgatasaddāropanaṃ anāgatappayogo na sameti. ^b^Atthopī^eb^ti ‘‘ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissatī’’ti vuttātthopi na sameti. ^b^Aya^eb^nti attakilamathānuyogo. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti nigaṇṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^366^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attano adhippetakāyabhāvanaṃ vitthārento vitthārato dassento ye taṃ anuyuttā, te nāmagottato vibhāvento ^b^‘‘nando vaccho’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kiliṭṭhatapāna^eb^nti kāyassa kilesanatapānaṃ puggalānaṃ. ^b^Jātameda^eb^nti medabhāvāpattivasena uppannamedaṃ. ^b^Purimaṃ pahāyā^eb^ti kālaparicchedena anāhārāppāhāratādivasena kāyassa apacinanaṃ khedanaṃ pariccajitvā. ^b^Kāyabhāvanā^eb^^a^V2.0197^ea^^b^pana na paññāyatī^eb^ti niyamaṃ paramatthato kāyabhāvanāpi tava ñāṇena na ñāyati, sesatopi na dissati.

[03]^b^367^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne^eb^ti ‘‘kāyabhāvanampi kho tvaṃ, aggivessana, na aññāsi, kuto pana tvaṃ cittabhāvanaṃ jānissasī’’ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Tathā ‘‘yo tvaṃ evaṃ oḷārikaṃ dubbalaṃ kāyabhāvanaṃ na jānāsi, so tvaṃ kuto santasukhumaṃ cittabhāvanaṃ jānissasī’’ti etasmiṃ atthavaṇṇanāṭhāne. ^b^Abuddhavacanaṃ nāmetaṃ pada^eb^nti kāyabhāvanāsaññitavipassanāto cittabhāvanā santā, vipassanā pana pādakajjhānato oḷārikā ceva dubbalā cāti ayañca etassa padassa attho. ‘‘Abuddhavacanaṃ nāmetaṃ vacanaṃ ^a^M2.0211^ea^ siyā’’ti vatvā thero pakkamituṃ ārabhati. Atha naṃ mahāsīvatthero ‘‘vipassanā nāmesā na ādito subrūhitā balavatī tikkhā visadā hoti, tasmā taruṇavasenāyamattho veditabbo’’ti dassento ^b^‘‘dissati, bhikkhave’’^eb^ti suttapadaṃ (saṃ. ni. 2.62) āhari. Tattha ^b^ādāna^eb^nti paṭisandhi. ^b^Nikkhepana^eb^nti cuti. ^b^Oḷārika^eb^nti arūpadhammehi duṭṭhullabhāvattā oḷārikaṃ. ^b^Kāya^eb^nti catusantatirūpasamūhabhūtaṃ kāyaṃ. ^b^Oḷārika^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, oḷārikākārenāti attho. Teneva vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ādānampi nikkhepanampī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^368^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukhasārāgena samannāgato^eb^ti sukhavedanāya balavatararāgena samaṅgībhūto. ^b^Paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā^eb^ avacaneneva. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti sukhe ṭhite eva dukkhassānuppajjanato. ^b^Evaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati dukkhā vedanā’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ, na anantarāva uppajjanato. ^b^Khepetvā^eb^ti kusalāni khepetvā. ^b^Gaṇhitvā^eb^ attano eva okāsaṃ gahetvā. ^b^Ubhatopakkhaṃ hutvā^eb^ti ‘‘kadāci sukhavedanā, kadāci dukkhavedanā’’ti pakkhadvayavasenapi vedanā cittassa pariyādāya hoti yathākkamaṃ abhāvitakāyassa abhāvitacittassa.

[03]^b^369^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vipassanā ca sukhassa paccanīkā^eb^ti sukkhavipassakassāadikammikassa mahābhūtapariggahādikāle bahi cittacāraṃ nisedhetvā kammaṭṭhāne eva satiṃ saṃharantassa aladdhassādaṃ kāyasukhaṃ na vindati, sambādhe vaje sanniruddho gogaṇo viya vihaññati vipphandati, accāsannahetukañca sarīre dukkhaṃ uppajjateva. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dukkhassa āsannā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Addhāne gacchante gacchante^eb^ti mahābhūtapariggahādivasena kāle gacchante. ^b^Tattha tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sarīrapadese. ^b^Dukkhaṃ dūrāpagataṃ hoti^eb^ samāpattibalena vikkhambhitattā appanābhāvato. ^b^Anappakaṃ^eb^ vipulaṃ. ^b^Sukha^eb^nti jhānasukhaṃ ^a^V2.0198^ea^. ^b^Okkamatī^eb^ti jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpavasena rūpakāyaṃ anupavisati, nāmakāyokkamane vattabbameva natthi. Kāyapassaddhikammikassapi sammasanabhāvanā paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa kassaci āditova kāyakilamathacittupaghātāpi sambhavanti, samādhissa pana apaccanīkattā siniddhabhāvato ca ^a^M2.0212^ea^ na sukkhavipassanā viya sukhassa vipaccanīko, anukkamena ca dukkhaṃ vikkhambhetīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā samādhī’’^eb^ti. Yathā samādhi, vipassanāya panetaṃ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘na ca tathā vipassanā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tena vutta^eb^nti yasmā vipassanā sukhassa paccanīkā, sā ca kāyabhāvanā, tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, bhāvitattā kāyassā’’^eb^ti. Tathā yasmā samādhi dukkhassa paccanīko, so ca cittabhāvanā, tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, bhāvitattā cittassā’’^eb^ti yojanā.
[03]^b^370^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Guṇe ghaṭṭetvā^eb^ti apadesena vinā samīpameva netvā. Taṃ vata mama cittaṃ uppannā sukhā vedanā pariyādāya ṭhassatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti yojanā.

[03]^b^371^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kiṃ na bhavissati,^eb^ sukhāpi dukkhāpi vedanā yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjatevāti attho. ^b^Tamattha^eb^nti sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ uppattiyā attano cittassa anabhibhavanīyatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ. ^b^Tattha^eb^ tāva pāsarāsisutte ^b^bodhipallaṅke nisajjā^eb^ ‘‘tattheva nisīdi’’nti vuttā. ^b^Idha^eb^ mahāsaccakasutte ^b^dukkarakārikāya^eb^ dukkaracaraṇe ^b^nisajjā^eb^ ‘‘tattheva nisīdi’’nti vuttā.

[03]^b^374^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chandakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti taṇhāyanavasenāti attho. ^b^Sinehakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti sinehanavasena. ^b^Mucchākaraṇavasenā^eb^ti mohanavasena pamādāpādanena. ^b^Vipāsākaraṇavasenā^eb^ti pātukamyatāvasena. ^b^Anudahanavasenā^eb^ti rāgagginā anudahanavasena. ^b^Lokuttaramaggavevacanameva^eb^ vaṭṭanissaraṇassa adhippetattā.

[03]Allaggahaṇena kilesānaṃ asamucchinnabhāvaṃ dasseti, sasnehaggahaṇena avikkhambhitabhāvaṃ, udake pakkhittabhāvaggahaṇena samudācārāvatthaṃ, udumbarakaṭṭhaggahaṇena attabhāvassa asārakattaṃ. ^b^Imināva nayenā^eb^ti ‘‘allaṃ udumbarakaṭṭha’’ntiādinā vuttanayena. ^b^Saputtabhariyapabbajjāyā^eb^ti puttabhariyehi saddhiṃ kataparibbājakapabbajjāvasena veditabbā. Kuṭīcakabahūdakahaṃsa-paramahaṃsādibhedā ^b^brāhmaṇapabbajjā^eb^.

[03]^b^376^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kutopi ^a^M2.0213^ea^^a^V2.0199^ea^ imassa āposineho natthīti ^b^koḷāpaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘chinnasinehaṃ nirāpa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Koḷa^eb^nti vā sukkhakaliṅgaraṃ vuccati, koḷaṃ koḷabhāvaṃ āpannanti ^b^koḷāpaṃ^eb^. Paṭipannassa upakkamamahattanissitatā pakatiyā kilesehi anabhibhūtatāya. ^b^Atintatā^eb^ paṭipakkhabhāvanāya. Tathā hi sukkhakoḷāpabhāvo, ārakā udakā thale nikkhittabhāvo ca nidassito. ^b^Opakkamikāhī^eb^ti kilesātiniggaṇhanupakkamappabhavāhi. ^b^Vedanāhī^eb^ti paṭipattivedanāhi. Dukkhā paṭipadā hi idhādhippetā.

[03]^b^377^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kiṃ pana na samattho,^eb^ yato evaṃ parehi cintitumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ chabbassāni akāsīti adhippāyo. ^b^Katvāpi akatvāpi samatthova^eb^ kāraṇassa nipphannattā. ‘‘Yathāpi sabbesampi kho bodhisattānaṃ carimabhave antamaso sattāhamattampi dhammatāvasena dukkaracariyā hotiyeva, evaṃ bhagavā samattho dukkaracariyaṃ kātuṃ, evañca naṃ akāsi, na pana tāya buddho jāto, atha kho majjhimāya eva paṭipattiyā’’ti tassā byatirekamukhena sadevakassa lokassa bodhāya amaggabhāvadīpanatthaṃ, imassa pana bhagavato kammavipākavasena chabbassāni dukkaracariyā ahosi. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Avacāhaṃ jotipālo, kassapaṃ sugataṃ tadā;
[22]Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
[21]Tena kammavipākena, acariṃ dukkaraṃ bahuṃ;
[22]Chabbassānuruvelāyaṃ, tato bodhimapāpuṇiṃ.
[21]Nāhaṃ etena maggena, pāpuṇiṃ bodhimuttamaṃ;
[22]Kumaggena gavesissaṃ, pubbakammena vārito’’ti.

[03]Dukkaracariyāya bodhāya amaggabhāvadassanatthaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ akāsīti keci. Atha vā lokanāthassa attano parakkamasampattidassanatthāya dukkaracariyā. Paṇītādhimuttiyā hi paramukkaṃsagatabhāvato abhinīhārānurūpaṃ sambodhiyaṃ tibbachandatāya sikhāppattiyā tadatthaṃ īdisampi nāma dukkaracariyaṃ akāsīti loke attano vīriyānubhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ – ‘‘so ca me pacchā pītisomanassāvaho bhavissatī’’ti lokanātho dukkaracariyaṃ ^a^M2.0214^ea^ akāsi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sadevakassa lokassā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^vīriyanimmathanaguṇo^eb^ti vīriyassa saṃvaḍḍhanasampādanaguṇo. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ ^a^V2.0200^ea^ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘pāsāde’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṅgāme dve tayo sampahāre^eb^ti dvikkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ vā parasenāya pahārapayoge. ^b^Padhānavīriya^eb^nti sammappadhānehi āsevanavīriyaṃ, sabbaṃ vā pubbabhāgavīriyaṃ.

[03]^b^Abhidanta^eb^nti abhibhavanadantaṃ, uparidantanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uparidanta’’^eb^nti. So hi itaraṃ musalaṃ viya udukkhalaṃ visesato kassaci khādanakāle abhibhuyya vattati. ^b^Kusalacittenā^eb^ti balavasammāsaṅkappayuttena kusalacittena. ^b^Akusalacitta^eb^nti kāmavitakkādisahitaṃ akusalacittaṃ. Akusalacittassa pavattituṃ appadānaṃ ^b^niggaho^eb^. Taṃtaṃpaṭikkhepavasena vinodanaṃ ^b^abhinippīḷanaṃ^eb^. Vīriyatāpena vikkhambhanaṃ ^b^abhisantāpanaṃ. Sadaratho^eb^ti sapariḷāho. ^b^Padhānenā^eb^ti padahanena, kāyassa kilamathuppādakena vīriyenāti attho. ^b^Viddhassā^eb^ti tudassa. ^b^Sato^eb^ti samānassa.

[03]^b^378^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sīsaveṭhana^eb^nti sīsaṃ rajjuyā bandhitvā daṇḍakena parivattakaveṭhanaṃ. ^b^Arahanto nāma evarūpā hontī^eb^ti iminā yathāyaṃ, evaṃ visaññībhūtāpi hutvā viharantīti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘matakasadisā’’^eb^ti, vedanāppattā viya hontīti attho. ^b^Supinappaṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇe setavāraṇasupinaṃ passitvā brāhmaṇehi byākatakālato paṭṭhāya.

[03]^b^379^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dhammasarīrassa arogabhāvena sādhūti marisaniyoti ^b^māriso,^eb^ piyāyanavacanametaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sampiyāyamānā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ajajjita^eb^nti evaṃ abhuñjitaṃ bhakārassa jakārādesaṃ katvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhojana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Evaṃ mā karitthā^eb^ti ‘‘lomakūpehi ajjhohāressāma anuppavesessāmā’’ti yathā tumhehi vuttaṃ, evaṃ mā karittha. Kasmā? ^b^Yāpessāmaha^eb^nti ahañca yāvadatthaṃ āhāramattaṃ bhuñjanto yathā yāpessāmi, evaṃ āhāraṃ paṭisevissāmi.

[03]^b^380-81^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etāva parama^eb^nti ettakaṃ paramaṃ, na ito paraṃ opakkamikadukkhavedanāvediyanaṃ atthīti attho. Rañño gahetabbanaṅgalato aññāni sandhāya ^a^M2.0215^ea^^b^‘‘ekena ūna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ suvaṇṇaparikkhataṃ, itarāni rajataparikkhatāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘amaccā ekenūnāṭṭhasatarajatanaṅgalānī’’^eb^ti. Āḷārudakasamāgame laddhajjhānāni vaṭṭapādakāni, ānāpānasamādhi pana kāyagatāsatipariyāpannattā sabbesañca bodhisattānaṃ vipassanāpādakattā ‘‘bodhāya maggo’’ti vutto. ^b^Bujjhanatthāyā^eb^ti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ, sabbasseva vā ñeyyadhammassa abhisambujjhanāya ^a^V2.0201^ea^. Satiyā anussaraṇakaviññāṇaṃ ^b^satānusāriviññāṇaṃ^eb^. Kassā pana satiyāti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nayida’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^382^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccupaṭṭhitā^eb^ti taṃtaṃvattakaraṇavasena patiupaṭṭhitā upaṭṭhāyakā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṇṇasālā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paccayabāhulliko^eb^ti paccayānaṃ bāhullāya paṭipanno. ^b^Āvatto^eb^ti pubbe paccayagedhappahānāya paṭipanno, idāni tato paṭinivatto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rasagiddho…pe… āvatto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammaniyāmenā^eb^ti dhammatāya. Tameva dhammataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bodhisattassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Bārāṇasimeva^eb^ tatthāpi ca sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitadhammacakkapavattanaṭṭhānameva ^b^agamaṃsu^eb^. Pañcavaggiyā kira visākhamāsassa addhamāsiyaṃ gatā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tesu gatesu aḍḍhamāsaṃ kāyavivekaṃ labhitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^387^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Addhābhoto gotamassa sāvakācittabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti, no kāyabhāvana’’nti imaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Imaṃ dhammadesana^eb^nti ‘‘abhijānāmi kho panāha’’ntiādikaṃ dhammadesanaṃ. ^b^Asallīno^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhikilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tehi sabbaso na litto. ^b^Anupalitto^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ taṇhānandiyā abhāvena. ^b^Gocarajjhattamevā^eb^ti gocarajjhattasaññite phalasamāpattiyā ārammaṇe, nibbāneti attho. Yaṃ sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte’’ti vuttaṃ ^b^sannisīdāpemī^eb^ti phalasamāpattisamādhinā accantasamādānavasena cittaṃ sammadeva nisīdāpemi. ^b^Pubbābhogenā^eb^ti samāpajjanato pubbe pavattāabhogena. ^b^Paricchinditvā^eb^ti samāpajjanakkhaṇaṃ paricchinditvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sādhukāra…pe… avicchinneyevā’’^eb^ti. Evamassa paricchinnakālasamāpajjanaṃ yathāparicchinnakālaṃ vuṭṭhānañca buddhānaṃ na bhāriyaṃ vasībhāvassa tathāsuppaguṇabhāvatoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. Dhammasampaṭiggāhakānaṃ ^b^assāsavāre^eb^ vā. Tadā hi desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ upadhāretuṃ na ^a^M2.0216^ea^ sakkonti, tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe desitadesanā niratthakā siyā. Na hi buddhānaṃ niratthakā kiriyā atthi.

[03]^b^Okappanīyameta^eb^nti ‘‘tassā eva kathāyā’’tiādinā vuttaṃ ativiya acchariyagataṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ sutvā īdisī paṭipatti sammāsambuddhasseva hotīti upavādavasena vadati, na sabhāvena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘satthari pasādamattampi na uppanna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kāyadaratho^eb^ti paccayavisesavasena rūpakāyassa parissamākāro. ^b^Upādinnake^eb^ti indriyabaddhe. ^b^Anupādinnake^eb^ti anindriyabaddhe. ^b^Vikasanti^eb^ sūriyarasmisamphassena. Tadabhāvena ^b^makulāni honti. Kesañci^eb^ tintinikādirukkhānaṃ ^a^V2.0202^ea^. ^b^Patilīyanti^eb^ nissayarūpadhammāvipphārikatāya. Arūpadhammatāya pañcaviññāṇānañceva kiriyāmayaviññāṇānañca appavattisaññitā avipphārikatā hoti, yattha niddāsamaññā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘darathavasena bhavaṅgasotañca idha niddāti adhippeta’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^darathavasenā^eb^ti darathavaseneva, na thinamiddhavasenāti avadhāraṇaṃ avadhāraṇaphalañca niddhāretabbaṃ. ^b^Taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti kāyassa darathasaṅkhātasarīragilānahetukaṃ niddaṃ sandhāya. Sarīragilānañca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ ‘‘piṭṭhi me āgilāyatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.300; ma. ni. 2.22; cūḷava. 345) vacanato. ^b^Sammohavihārasmi^eb^nti paccatte etaṃ bhummavacananti āha ^b^‘‘sammohavihāroti vadantī’’^eb^ti, ^b^sammohavihārasmiṃ^eb^ vā pariyāpannaṃ etaṃ vadanti, yadidaṃ divā niddokkamananti yojanā.

[03]^b^389^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upanītehī^eb^ti dosamaggaṃ nindāpathaṃ upanītehi. ^b^Abhinanditvā^eb^ti sampiyāyitvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittena sampaṭicchanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anumoditvā^eb^ti ‘‘sādhu sādhū’’ti desanāya thomanavasena anumoditvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vācāyapi pasaṃsanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sampatte kāle^eb^ti pabbajjāyogge kāle anuppatte.

[03]^b^Gaṇaṃ vinodetvā^eb^ti gaṇaṃ apanetvā gaṇapalibodhaṃ chinditvā. ^b^Papañca^eb^nti avasesakilesaṃ. ^b^‘‘Puññavā rājapūjito’’^eb^ti vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘tasmiñhi kāle’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Chandavāsaharaṇena ^b^uposathakammaṃ karonto^eb^.

[03]Sakalaṃ ^a^M2.0217^ea^ rattiṃ buddhaguṇānaṃyeva kathitattā therassa ñāṇaṃ desanāvibhavañca vibhāvento āha ^b^‘‘ettakāva, bhante, buddhaguṇā’’^eb^ti. Imāya, bhante, tumhākaṃ dhammakathāya anavasesato buddhaguṇā kathitā viya jāyanti, evaṃ santepi anantāparimeyyāva te, kiṃ ito parepi vijjantevāti theraṃ tattha sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmo āha ^b^‘‘udāhu aññepi atthī’’^eb^tiādi. Rajjassa padesikattā, yathāvuttasubhāsitassa ca anagghattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ me duggatapaṇṇākāro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tiyojanasatika^eb^nti idaṃ parikkhepavasena vuttaṃ, tañca kho manussānaṃ paribhogavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Mahāsaccakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^390^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatrā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0203^ea^ tasmiṃ pubbārāmamigāramātupāsādānaṃ atthavibhāvane ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ idāni vuccamānā ^b^anupubbī kathā. Maṇīna^eb^nti ettha padumarāgamaṇīnaṃ adhippetattā āha ^b^‘‘aññehi cā’’^eb^ti. Tena indanīlādimaṇīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassarakabaravaṇṇavasena ^b^sattavaṇṇehi^eb^.

[03]Taṇhā sabbaso khīyanti etthāti ^b^taṇhāsaṅkhayo^eb^ (a. ni. ṭī. 3.7.61), tasmiṃ. ^b^Taṇhāsaṅkhaye^eb^ti ca visaye idaṃ bhummanti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vimuttacittatāyā^eb^ti sabbasaṃkilesehi vimuttacittatāya. Aparabhāgapaṭipadā nāma ariyasaccābhisamayo, sā sāsanacārigocarā paccattaṃ veditabbatoti āha ^b^‘‘pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ saṃkhittena desethāti pucchatī’’^eb^ti. Akuppadhammatāya khayavayasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ atītāti accantā, so eva aparihānasabhāvattā accantā niṭṭhā etassāti ^b^accantaniṭṭho^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekantaniṭṭho satataniṭṭhoti attho’’^eb^ti. Na hi paṭividdhassa lokuttaradhammassa dassanaṃ kuppanaṃ nāma atthi. Accantameva catūhi yogehi khemo etassa atthīti ^b^accantayogakkhemī^eb^. Maggabrahmacariyassa vusitattā, tassa ca aparihānasabhāvattā accantaṃ brahmacārīti ^a^M2.0218^ea^^b^accantabrahmacārī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niccabrahmacārīti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariyosāna^eb^nti brahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ.

[03]^b^Vegāyatī^eb^ti turitāyati. ^b^Sallakkhesī^eb^ti cintesi, attanā yathā sutāya satthu desanāya anussaraṇavasena upadhāresi. ^b^Anuggaṇhitvāvā^eb^ti atthavinicchayavasena anuggahetvā eva. Chasu dvāresu niyuttāti ^b^chadvārikā,^eb^ tehi.

[03]^b^Pañcakkhandhā^eb^ti pañcupādānakkhandhā. Sakkāyasabbañhi sandhāya idha ^b^‘‘sabbe dhammā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ vipassanāvisayassa adhippetattā, tasmā āyatanadhātuyopi taggatikā eva daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘nālaṃ abhinivesāyā’’ti. ^b^Na yuttā abhinivesāya^eb^ ‘‘etaṃ mama, eso me attā’’ti ajjhosānāya. ‘‘Alameva nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjitu’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.272; saṃ. ni. 2.124-125, 128, 134, 143) viya ^b^alaṃ^eb^-saddo yuttatthopi hotīti āha ^b^‘‘na yuttā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sampajjantī^eb^ti bhavanti. Yadipi ‘‘tatiyā, catutthī’’ti idaṃ visuddhidvayaṃ ^a^V2.0204^ea^ abhiññāpaññā, tassā pana sappaccayanāmarūpadassanabhāvato, sati ca paccayapariggahe sappaccayattā (nāmarūpassa aniccatā, aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ, dukkhañca anattāti atthato) lakkhaṇattayaṃ supākaṭameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ñātapariññāya abhijānātī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatheva tīraṇapariññāyā^eb^ti iminā aniccādibhāvena nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti nāmarūpassa upasaṃharati, na abhiññāpaññānaṃ sambhāradhammānaṃ. Purimāya hi atthato āpannalakkhaṇattayaṃ gaṇhāti salakkhaṇasallakkhaṇaparattā tassā, dutiyāya sarūpato tassā lakkhaṇattayāropanavasena sammasanabhāvato. Ekacittakkhaṇikatāya abhinipātamattatāya ca ^b^appamattakampi^eb^. Rūpapariggahassa oḷārikabhāvato ^b^arūpapariggahaṃ dasseti^eb^. Dassento ca vedanāya āsannabhāvato, visesato sukhasārāgitāya, bhavassādagadhitamānasatāya ca ^b^sakkassa vedanāvasena nibbattetvā dasseti^eb^.

[03]^b^Uppādavayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti udayabbayasabhāvena uppajjitvā nirujjhanena. ^b^Aniccā^eb^ti addhu vā. Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ aniccatā udayavayatā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ khayato vayato dassanañāṇaṃ aniccānupassanā, taṃsamaṅgī ca puggalo aniccānupassī ^a^M2.0219^ea^, tasmā. ^b^Khayavirāgo^eb^ti khayasaṅkhāto virāgo saṅkhārānaṃ palujjanā. Yaṃ āgamma sabbaso saṅkhārehi virajjanā hoti, taṃ nibbānaṃ ^b^accantavirāgo. Nirodhānupassimhipī^eb^ti nirodhānupassipadepi. ^b^‘‘Eseva nayo’’^eb^ti abhidisitvā taṃ ekadesena vivaranto ^b^‘‘nirodhopi hi…pe… duvidhoyevā’’^eb^ti āha. Sabbāsavasaṃvare vuttavossaggova idha ‘‘paṭinissaggo’’ti vuttoti dassento ^b^‘‘paṭinissaggo vuccati vossaggo’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pariccāgavossaggo^eb^ vipassanā. Pakkhandanavasena appanato ^b^pakkhandanavossaggo^eb^ maggo aññassa tadabhāvato. ^b^So^eb^ti maggo. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ti kiccasādhanavasena ārammaṇakaraṇato. Evañhi maggato aññesaṃ nibbānārammaṇānaṃ pakkhandanavossaggābhāvo siddho hoti. Pariccajanena pakkhandanena cāti ^b^dvīhipi vā kāraṇehi^eb^. Sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ vossajjanaṃ tappaṭibaddhasaṃkilesappahānena daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Cittaṃ pakkhandatī^eb^ti maggasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Ubhayampetaṃ^eb^ vossajjanaṃ. ^b^Tadubhayasamaṅgī^eb^ti vipassanāsamaṅgī maggasamaṅgī ca. ‘‘Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’tiādivacanato (paṭi. ma. 1.52) yathā vipassanāya kilesānaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo labbhati, evaṃ āyatiṃ tehi kilesehi uppādetabbakhandhānampi pariccāgapaṭinissaggo vattabbo, pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo pana magge labbhamānāya ekantakāraṇabhūtāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya vasena veditabbo, magge pana tadubhayampi ñāyāgatameva nippariyāyatova labbhamānattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tadubhayasamaṅgī puggalo’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Pucchantassa ^a^V2.0205^ea^ ajjhāsayavasena ‘‘na kiñci loke upādiyatī’’ti ettha kāmupādānavasena upādiyanaṃ paṭikkhipīyatīti āha ^b^‘‘taṇhāvasena na upādiyatī’’^eb^ti. Taṇhāvasena vā asati upādiyane diṭṭhivasena upādiyanaṃ anavakāsamevāti ^b^‘‘taṇhāvasena’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Na parāmasatī^eb^ti nādiyati, diṭṭhiparāmāsavasena vā ‘‘nicca’’ntiādinā ^b^na parāmasati. Saṃkhitteneva khippaṃ kathesī^eb^ti tassa ajjhāsayavasena papañcaṃ akatvā kathesi.

[03]^b^391^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhisamāgantvā^eb^ti abhimukhañāṇena ñeyyaṃ samāgantvā yāthāvato viditvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jānitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yathāparisaviññāpakattā^eb^ti yathāparisaṃ ^a^M2.0220^ea^ dhammasampaṭiggāhikāya mahatiyā, appakāya vā parisāya anurūpameva viññāpanato. ^b^Pariyantaṃ na niccharatī^eb^ti na pavattati. ^b^Mā niratthakā agamāsī^eb^ti idaṃ dhammatāvasena vuttaṃ, na satthu ajjhāsayavasena. Ekañhetaṃ satthu vacīghosassa aṭṭhasu aṅgesu, yadidaṃ parisapariyantatā. ^b^Chiddavivarokāso^eb^ti chiddabhūto, vivarabhūto vā okāsopi natthi, bhagavato saddāsavanakāraṇaṃ vuttameva. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yathāvuttakāraṇato.

[03]Pañca aṅgāni etassāti pañcaṅgaṃ, pañcaṅgaṃ eva ^b^pañcaṅgikaṃ^eb^. Mahatīādi vīṇāvisesopi ātatamevāti ^b^‘‘cammapariyonaddhesū’’^eb^ti visesitaṃ. ^b^Ekatalaṃ^eb^ kumbhathūṇadaddarādi. Cammapariyonaddhaṃ hutvā tantibaddhaṃ ^b^ātatavitataṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tantibaddhapaṇavādī’’^eb^ti. Gomukhīādīnampi ettheva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Vaṃsādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṅkhasiṅgādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Sammādī^eb^ti sammatāḷakaṃsatāḷasilāsalākatāḷādi. Tattha ^b^sammatāḷaṃ^eb^ nāma daṇḍamayatāḷaṃ. ^b^Kaṃsatāḷaṃ^eb^ lohamayaṃ. Silāya ayopattena ca vādanatāḷaṃ ^b^silāsalākatāḷaṃ. Samappito^eb^ti sammā appito upeto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘upagato’’^eb^ti. Upaṭṭhānavasena pañcahi tūriyasatehi upeto. Evaṃbhūto ca yasmā tehi upaṭṭhito samannāgato nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samaṅgībhūtoti tasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paricāretī^eb^ti parito cāreti. Kāni pana cāreti, kathaṃ vā cāretīti āha ^b^‘‘sampattiṃ…pe… cāretī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^tato tato^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vādite tattha tattha ca vādakajane. ^b^Apanetvā^eb^ti vādakajane nisedhetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nissaddāni kārāpetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Devacārikaṃ gacchatiyeva^eb^ devatānaṃ manussānañca anukampāya. Svāyamattho ^b^vimānavatthūhi^eb^ (vi. va. 1) dīpetabbo.

[03]^b^392^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Appeva sakena karaṇīyenā^eb^ti mārisa, moggallāna, mayaṃ sakena karaṇīyena appeva bahukiccāpi na homa. ^b^Apica devānaṃyevā^eb^ti apica kho pana devānaṃyeva tāvatiṃsānaṃ karaṇīyena ^a^V2.0206^ea^ visesato ^a^M2.0221^ea^ bahukiccāti atthayojanā. Bhummaṭṭhakadevatānampi keci aṭṭā sakkena vinicchitabbā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘pathavito paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Niyamento^eb^ti avadhārento. Taṃ pana karaṇīyaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘devānaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tāsa^eb^nti devadhītudevaputtapādaparicārikānaṃ. ^b^Maṇḍanapasādhanakārikā^eb^ti maṇḍanapasādhanasaṃvidhāyikā. ^b^Aṭṭakaraṇaṃ natthi^eb^ saṃsayasseva abhāvato.

[03]^b^Ya^eb^nti savanuggahaṇādivasena suparicitampi yaṃ atthajātaṃ. ^b^Na dissati,^eb^ paññācakkhuno sabbaso na paṭibhātīti attho. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti sārasamāsācariyā. ^b^Somanassasaṃvega^eb^nti somanassasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṃvegaṃ, na cittasantāsaṃ.

[03]^b^Samupabyūḷho^eb^ti yujjhanavasena sahapatito samogāḷho. Evaṃbhūto ca yasmā samūhavasena sampiṇḍito hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sannipatito rāsibhūto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anantare attabhāve^eb^ti idaṃ dutiyaṃ sakkattabhāvaṃ tato anantarātītena sakkattabhāvena sakkattabhāvasāmaññato ekamiva katvā gahaṇavasena vuttaṃ, aññathā ‘‘tatiye attabhāve’’ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Maghattabhāvo hi ito tatiyoti. Atha vā yasmiṃ attabhāve so devāsurasaṅgāmo ahosi, tassa anantarattā maghattabhāvassa vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anantare attabhāve’’^eb^ti. Sattānaṃ hitesitāya mātāpitūpaṭṭhānādinā cariyāhi ^b^bodhisattacariyā viyassa cariyā ahosi. Satta vatapadānī^eb^ti satta vatakoṭṭhāse.

[03]^b^Mahāpāna^eb^nti mahantaṃ surāpānaṃ. ^b^Gaṇḍapāna^eb^nti gaṇḍasurāpānaṃ, adhimattapānanti attho. ^b^Pariharamānā^eb^ti parivārentā. ^b^Vedikāpādā^eb^ti sinerussa pariyante vedikāparikkhepā. ^b^Pañcasu ṭhānesū^eb^ti pañcasu paribhaṇḍaṭṭhānesu nāgasenādīhi ^b^ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi^eb^.

[03]^b^393^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rāmaṇeyyaka^eb^nti ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ. ^b^Masāragallatthambhe^eb^ti kabaramaṇimaye thambhe. ^b^Suvaṇṇādimaye ghaṭake^eb^ti ‘‘rajatatthambhesu suvaṇṇamaye, suvaṇṇatthambhesu rajatamaye’’tiādinā suvaṇṇādimaye ghaṭake vāḷarūpakāni ca. Pabāḷhaṃ mattoti ^b^pamatto^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ativiya matto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nāṭakaparivārenā^eb^ti accharāparivārena.

[03]^b^Acchariyabbhuta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0222^ea^ padadvayenapi vimhayanākārova vutto, tasmā sañjātaṃ acchariyabbhutaṃ vimhayanākāro etesanti ^b^sañjātācchariyābbhutā,^eb^ tathā pavattacittuppādā. Acchariyabbhutahetukā sañjātā ^a^V2.0207^ea^ tuṭṭhi etesanti ^b^sañjātatuṭṭhino. Saṃvigga^eb^nti sañjātasaṃvegaṃ. Svāyaṃ saṃvego yasmā purimāvatthāya cittassa calanaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘calita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^394^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tamaṃ vinodita^eb^nti pāṭihāriyadassanena ‘‘aho therassa iddhānubhāvo’’ti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ sañjātabahumāno, īdisaṃ nāma sāsanaṃ labhitvāpi mayaṃ niratthakena bhogamadena sammattā bhavāmāti yoniso manasikāruppādanena sammohatamaṃ vinoditaṃ vidhamitaṃ. ^b^Ete^eb^ti mahāthero sakko cāti te dvepi samānabrahmacariyatāya ^b^sabrahmacārino^eb^.

[03]^b^395^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paññātāna^eb^nti pākaṭānaṃ cātumahārāja-suyāma-santusita-paranimmitavasavattimahābrahmānaṃ aññataro, na yesaṃ kesañcīti adhippāyo. Āraddhadhammavaseneva pariyosāpitattā ^b^yathānusandhināva niṭṭhapesi^eb^.
[06]Cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^396^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Laddhimatta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0208^ea^ micchāgāhamattaṃ, na diṭṭhābhiniveso. ^b^Sassatadiṭṭhī^eb^ti niccābhiniveso. ^b^So^eb^ti ariṭṭho bhikkhu. Kathetvā samodhānentanti yojanā. ^b^Samodhānenta^eb^nti ca nigamentanti attho. ^b^Tattha tatthevā^eb^ti tesu tesu eva bhavesu ^b^nirujjhanti,^eb^ na bhavantaraṃ saṅkamanti. ^b^Viññāṇaṃ pana^eb^ abhinnasabhāvaṃ anaññanti adhippāyo. ^b^Idhalokato^eb^ti imasmā attabhāvā. ^b^Paralokanti^eb^ parabhavasaññitaṃ attabhāvaṃ. ^b^Sandhāvatī^eb^ti niccatāya kenaci asambaddhaṃ viya gacchati. Tena idhalokato paralokagamanamāha. ^b^Saṃsaratī^eb^ti iminā paralokato idhāgamanaṃ. ^b^Sandhāvatī^eb^ti vā bhavantarasaṅkamanamāha. ^b^Saṃsaratī^eb^ti tattha tattha aparāparasañcaraṇaṃ.

[03]‘‘Paccaye ^a^M2.0223^ea^ sati bhavatī’’tiādinā viññāṇassa anvayato byatirekato ca paṭiccasamuppannabhāvaṃ dassento sassatabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^Buddhena akathitaṃ kathesī^eb^ti iminā ‘‘yaṃ abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena, taṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpetī’’ti (cūḷava. 352, 353) imasmiṃ bhedakaravatthusmiṃ sandissatīti dasseti. ^b^Jinacakke pahāraṃ detī^eb^ti ‘‘tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ…pe… anañña’’nti niccataṃ paṭijānanto – ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā (dha. pa. 277), rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anicca’’nti (saṃ. ni. 3.93-94) ca ādinayappavatte satthu dhammacakke khīlaṃ uppādento pahāraṃ deti. Sabbaññutaññāṇena aniccanti diṭṭhaṃ paveditañca viññāṇaṃ niccanti paṭijānanto ^b^vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhati. Sotukāmaṃ jana^eb^nti ariyadhammādhigamassa ekantaupāyabhūtaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ sotukāmaṃ janaṃ niccaggāhapaggaṇhanena ^b^visaṃvādeti^eb^. Tato eva ^b^ariyapathe^eb^ ariyadhammavīthiyaṃ tassā paṭikkhipanena ^b^tiriyaṃ nipatitvā^eb^.

[03]^b^398^eb^^b^.^eb^ Viññāṇasīsena attanā gahitaṃ attānaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘yvāyaṃ, bhante’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^vado vedeyyo^eb^tiādayo sassatadiṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesākārā. Vadatīti ^b^vado,^eb^ vacīkammassa kārakoti attho. Iminā hi kārakabhāvupāyikasattānaṃ hitasukhāvabodhanasamatthataṃ attano dasseti. Vediyova ^b^vedeyyo,^eb^ jānāti anubhavati cāti attho. Īdisānañhi padānaṃ bahulā kattusādhanataṃ saddavidū maññanti. ^b^Vedayatī^eb^ti taṃ taṃ anubhavitabbaṃ anubhavati. ^b^Tahiṃ tahi^eb^nti tesu tesu bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsasattanikāyesu.

[03]^b^399^eb^^b^.^eb^ Taṃ ^a^V2.0209^ea^ vādaṃ paggayha ṭhitattā sātissa chinnapaccayatā aviruḷhadhammatā ca veditabbā. ^b^Heṭṭhā^eb^ti alagaddasuttasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.236-237) sandhāyāha. Parato ^b^heṭṭhā^eb^ti vuttaṭṭhānepi eseva nayo. ^b^Pāṭiyekko anusandhī^eb^ti tīhipi anusandhīhi avomisso visuṃyeveko anusandhi. Nanu cāyampi sātissa ajjhāsayavasena pavattitattā ajjhāsayānusandhiyevāti? Na, niyyānamukhena appavattattā. Niyyānañhi purakkhatvā pucchādivasena pavattā itarā desanāpucchānusandhiādayo. Idha tadabhāvato ^a^M2.0224^ea^ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pāṭiyekko anusandhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parisāya laddhiṃ sodhento^eb^ti yādisī sātissa laddhi, tadabhāvadassanavasena parisāya laddhiṃ sodhento, parisāya laddhisodhaneneva sāti gaṇato nissārito nāma jāto.

[03]^b^400^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yaṃ yadevā^eb^ti idaṃ yadipi avisesato paccayadhammaggahaṇaṃ, ‘‘viññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī’’ti pana vuttattā taṃtaṃviññāṇassa samaññānimittapaccayajātaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ – ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī’’tiādi. Atha vā taṃtaṃdvāraniyataṃ itarampi sabbaṃ tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccayajātaṃ idha ‘‘yaṃ yadevā’’ti gahitaṃ, tattha pana yaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ, tena samaññāti ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇantvevā’’tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dvārasaṅkantiyā abhāva^eb^nti viññāṇassa dvārantarasaṅkamanassa abhāvaṃ. Svāyaṃ oḷārikanayena mandabuddhīnaṃ sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ nayadassanavasena vutto. Na hi kadāci paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ vigacchantaṃ anantaraviññāṇaṃ saṅkamati anantarādipaccayālābhe tassa anuppajjanato.

[03]^b^Evamevā^eb^ti yathā aggi upādānaṃ paṭicca jalanto anupādāno tattheva nibbāyati, na katthaci saṅkamati, evameva. ^b^‘‘Paccayavekallena tattheva nirujjhatī’’^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, na hettha anuppādanirodho icchito tādisassa nirodhassa idha anadhippetattā, atha kho khaṇanirodho, so ca sābhāvikattā na paccayavekallahetuko? Saccametaṃ, taṃtaṃdvārikassa pana viññāṇassa dvārantaraṃ asaṅkamitvā tattha tattheva nirujjhanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Yesañca paccayānaṃ vasena dvārantarikaviññāṇena bhavitabbaṃ, tesaṃ tadabhāvato paccayavekallaggahaṇaṃ, tasmā paccayavekallena na sotādīni saṅkamitvā sotaviññāṇantiādi saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti yojanā. Etena yaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhurūpādipaccayasāmaggiyā vasena cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tattha tattheva nirujjhati tāvakālikabhāvato, tassa pana sotasaddādipaccayābhāvato kuto sotaviññāṇādisamaññā, evamappavattito tassa kuto saṅkamoti dassitaṃ hoti. ^b^Viññāṇappavatte^eb^ti viññāṇappavattiyaṃ. ^b^Dvārasaṅkantimatta^eb^nti dvārantarasaṅkamanamattampi na vadāmi tattha tattheva ^a^V2.0210^ea^ bhijjanato paccayassa uppādavantato sati ca uppāde avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccatā dīpitā hotīti.

[03]^b^401^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Paṭiccasamuppannaṃ ^a^M2.0225^ea^ viññāṇaṃ vuttaṃ mayā, aññatra paccayā natthi viññāṇassa sambhavo’’ti pāḷiyā anvayato ca byatirekato ca viññāṇassa saṅkhatatāva dassitāti āha ^b^‘‘sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā’’^eb^ti. Hetupaccayehi jātaṃ nibbattaṃ ‘‘bhūta’’nti idhādhippetaṃ, taṃ atthato pañcakkhandhā tabbinimuttassa sappaccayassa abhāvato, yañca khandhapañcakaṃ attano tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ, taṃ ‘‘bhūtamida’’nti bhagavā avocāti āha ^b^‘‘idaṃ khandhapañcaka’’^eb^nti. Attano phalaṃ āharatīti āhāro, paccayo. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo, āhāro sambhavo etassāti ^b^āhārasambhavaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paccayasambhava’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tassa paccayassa nirodhā^eb^ti yena avijjādinā paccayena khandhapañcakaṃ sambhavati, tassa paccayassa anuppādanirodhā. Khaṇanirodho pana kāraṇanirapekkho.

[03]^b^Nossūti^eb^ saṃsayajotano nipātoti āha ^b^‘‘bhūtaṃ nu kho idaṃ, na nu kho bhūta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhūtamidaṃ nossū^eb^ti ca iminā khandhapañcakameva nu kho idaṃ, udāhu attattaniyanti evaṃjātiko saṃsayanākāro gahito. ^b^Tadāhārasambhavaṃ nossū^eb^ti pana iminā sahetukaṃ nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ, udāhu ahetukanti yathā ahetukabhāvāpanno saṃsayanākāro gahito, evaṃ visamahetukabhāvāpannopi saṃsayanākāro gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Visamahetunopi paramatthato bhūtassa ahetukabhāvato. Visamahetuvādopi parehi parikappitamattatāya sabhāvaniyatiyadicchādivādehi samānayogakkhamoti. ^b^Nirodhadhammaṃ nossū^eb^ti iminā yathā aniccaṃ nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ, udāhu niccanti aniccataṃ paṭicca saṃsayanākāro gahito, evaṃ dukkhaṃ nu kho, udāhu na dukkhaṃ, anattā nu kho, udāhu na anattātipi saṃsayanākāro gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ aniccassa dukkhabhāvādiavassaṃbhāvato, nicce ca tadubhayābhāvato. ^b^Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato^eb^ti aviparītasarasato salakkhaṇato ca, kiccato ceva sabhāvato cāti attho. Vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtāpi paññā vipassanā evāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vipassanāpaññāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sarasato^eb^ti ca sabhāvato. ^b^Salakkhaṇato^eb^ti sāmaññalakkhaṇato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipassanāpaññāya sammā passantassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato’’ti vuttanayeneva. ^b^Ye ye^eb^ti tassaṃ parisāyaṃ ye ye bhikkhū. ^b^Sallakkhesu^eb^nti sammadeva upadhāresuṃ.

[03]^b^Tehī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0226^ea^^a^V2.0211^ea^ tehi bhikkhūhi. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tissaṃ vipassanāpaññāyaṃ. ^b^Nittaṇhabhāva^eb^nti taṇhābhāvaṃ ‘‘etaṃ mama’’nti taṇhāggāhassa pahīnataṃ. Etenapi bhagavā ‘‘ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammesupi taṇhāpahānameva vaṇṇemi, sāti pana moghapuriso attabhāvepi taṇhāsaṃvaddhaniṃ viparītadiṭṭhiṃ paggayha tiṭṭhatī’’ti sātiṃ niggaṇhāti. ^b^Sabhāvadassanenā^eb^ti dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvadassanena. ^b^Paccayadassanenā^eb^ti kāraṇadassanena anavasesato hetuno paccayassa ca dassanena. ^b^Allīyethā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena nissayetha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṇhādiṭṭhīhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kelāyethā^eb^ti pariharaṇakeḷiyā parihareyyātha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kīḷamānā vihareyyāthā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhanaṃ viya icchantā^eb^ti dhanaṃ viya drabyaṃ viya icchaṃ taṇhaṃ janentā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gedhaṃ āpajjeyyāthā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mamattaṃ uppādeyyāthā^eb^ti ‘‘mamamida’’nti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinivesaṃ janeyyātha. Nikantivasenapi gahaṇatthāya no desito, tassa vā saṇhasukhumassa vipassanādhammassa gahaṇaṃ nāma nikantiyā eva siyā, na oḷārikataṇhāyāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nikantivasenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^402^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paṭicca etasmā phalaṃ etīti ^b^paccayo,^eb^ sabbo kāraṇavisesoti āha ^b^‘‘khandhānaṃ paccayaṃ dassento’’^eb^ti. Yāva avijjā hi sabbo nesaṃ kāraṇaviseso idha dassito. Puna ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā, antato paṭṭhāya yāva ādīti anulomato paṭilomato ca vaṭṭavivaṭṭadassanavasena nānānayehi paṭiccasamuppādo dassito, niccaggāhassa nimittabhūto kilesopi idha natthīti dīpeti. ^b^Tampi vuttatthamevā^eb^ti tampi ‘‘ime ca, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārā’’tiādi yāva ‘‘taṇhāpabhavā’’ti pāḷipadaṃ, tāva vuttatthameva ^b^sammādiṭṭhisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.89). Sesaṃ paṭiccasamuppādakathābhāvato ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.570) ^b^vitthāritāvā^eb^ti imināva saṅgahitaṃ.
[03]^b^404^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ ^b^udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (udā. aṭṭha. 1) vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^407^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭidhāvanā^eb^ti paṭisaraṇaṃ, pubbe attano āgataṃ atītaṃ addhānaṃ uddissa taṇhādiṭṭhivasena paṭigamananti attho. Nanu vicikicchāvasena pāḷiyaṃ ^a^M2.0227^ea^ paṭidhāvanā āgatāti? Saccaṃ āgatā, sā pana taṇhādiṭṭhihetukāti ‘‘taṇhādiṭṭhivasenā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ yathādhigate ñāṇadassane.

[03]^b^Niccalabhāva^eb^nti ^a^V2.0212^ea^ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ, titthiyavādavātehi akampiyabhāvañca. ^b^Garū^eb^ti garuguṇayutto. ^b^Bhāriko^eb^ pāsāṇacchattasadiso. ^b^Akāmā anuvattitabbo^eb^ti saddhāmattakeneva anuvattanamāha, na aveccappasādena. ^b^Kicca^eb^nti satthukiccaṃ. ^b^Brāhmaṇāna^eb^nti jātimantabrāhmaṇānaṃ. ^b^Vatasamādānānī^eb^ti magavatādivatasamādānāni. ^b^Diṭṭhikutūhalānī^eb^ti taṃtaṃdiṭṭhiggāhavasena ‘‘idaṃ saccaṃ, idaṃ sacca’’ntiādinā gahetabbakutūhalāni. ^b^Evaṃ nissaṭṭhānī^eb^ti yathā mayā tumhākaṃ ovādo dinno, evaṃ nissaṭṭhāni vatādīni taṃ atikkamitvā kiṃ gaṇheyyātha. ^b^Sayaṃ ñāṇena ñāta^eb^nti paraneyyataṃ muñcitvā attano eva ñāṇena yāthāvato ñātaṃ. Evaṃbhūtañca sayaṃ paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sayaṃ paññācakkhunā diṭṭha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sayaṃ vibhāvita^eb^nti tehi bhikkhūhi tassa atthassa paccattaṃ vibhūtabhāvaṃ āpāditaṃ. ^b^Upanītā^eb^ti upakkamena dhammadesanānusārena nītā. ^b^Mayā^eb^ti kattari karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Dhammenā^eb^ti kāraṇena. ^b^Etaṃ vacana^eb^nti etaṃ ‘‘sandiṭṭhiko’’tiādivacanaṃ.

[03]^b^408^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃ^eb^ sammohaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^assa^eb^ lokassa. ^b^Samodhānenā^eb^ti samāgamena. Gabbhati attabhāvabhāvena vattatīti ^b^gabbho,^eb^ kalalādiavattho dhammapabandho, tannissitattā pana sattasantāno ‘‘gabbho’’ti vutto yathā ‘‘mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī’’ti. Tannissayabhāvato mātukucchi ‘‘gabbho’’ti veditabbo, gabbho viyāti vā. Yathā hi nivāsaṭṭhānatāya sattānaṃ ovarako ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuccati, evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ yāva abhijāti nivāsaṭṭhānatāya mātukucchi ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuttoti.

[03]^b^Yamekaratti^eb^nti yassaṃ ekarattiyaṃ. Bhummatthe hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, accantasaṃyoge vā. ^b^Paṭhama^eb^nti sabbapaṭhamaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe. ^b^Gabbhe^eb^ti mātukucchiyaṃ. ^b^Māṇavo^eb^ti satto. Yebhuyyena sattā rattiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti ^a^M2.0228^ea^ rattiggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Abbhuṭṭhitovā^eb^ti uṭṭhitābbho viya, abhimukhabhāvena vā uṭṭhito eva maraṇassāti adhippāyo. ^b^So yātī^eb^ti so māṇavo yāti paṭhamakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya gacchateva. ^b^Sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī^eb^ti so evaṃ gacchanto khaṇamattampi na nivattati, aññadatthu maraṇameva upagacchatīti gāthāya attho.

[03]^b^Utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,^eb^ na lokasamaññātarajassa lagganadivasamattaṃ. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘mātugāmassa kira yasmi’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ gabbhāsaye. ^b^Saṇṭhahitvā^eb^ti nibbattitvā. ^b^Bhijjitvā^eb^ti aggahitagabbhā eva bhinnā hutvā. Ayañhi tassā sabhāvo. ^b^Vatthu suddhaṃ hotī^eb^ti paggharitalohitattā anāmayattā ca gabbhāsayo suddho hoti. Suddhavatthuttā ^a^V2.0213^ea^ tato paraṃ katipayadivasāni ^b^khettameva hoti^eb^ gabbhasaṇṭhahanassa parittassa lohitalesassa vijjamānattā. Sambhavassa pana kathaṃ sabbhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ samaye’’^eb^tiādi. Itthisantānepi sukkadhātu labbhateva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṅgaparāmasanenapi dārako nibbattatiyevā’’^eb^ti. Yathā pārikāya nābhiparāmasanena sāmassa bodhisattassa, diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena maṇḍabyassa nibbatti. ^b^Gandhabbo^eb^ti gandhanato uppajjanagatiyā nimittupaṭṭhāpanena sūcanato gandhoti laddhanāmena bhavagāmikammunā abbati pavattatīti ^b^gandhabbo,^eb^ tattha uppajjanakasatto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatrūpagasatto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kammayantayantito^eb^ti tatrūpapattiāvahena kammasaṅkhātena pellanakayantena tathattāya pellito upanīto. ^b^Mahantena jīvitasaṃsayenā^eb^ti vijāyanaparikkilesena ‘‘jīvissāmi kho, na nu kho jīvissāmi ahaṃ vā, putto vā me’’ti evaṃ pavattena jīvitasaṃsayena vipulena garutarena saṃsayena. ^b^Taṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti thanappadesamāha. Kīḷanti tenāti kīḷanaṃ, kīḷanameva ^b^kīḷanakaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^409^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sārajjatī^eb^ti sārattacitto hoti. ^b^Byāpajjatī^eb^ti byāpannacitto hoti. ^b^Kāye^eb^ kesādidvattiṃsāsucisamudāye taṃsabhāvārammaṇā ^b^sati kāyasati. Anupaṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti anuppādetvā, yathāsabhāvato kāyaṃ anupadhāretvāti attho. ^b^Parittacetaso^eb^ti kilesehi ^a^M2.0229^ea^ parito khaṇḍitacitto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akusalacitto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ete^eb^ akusaladhammā. ^b^Nirujjhantī^eb^ti nirodhaṃ pattā honti. ^b^Taṇhāvasena abhinandatī^eb^ti sappītikataṇhāvasena abhimukhaṃ hutvā nandati. ^b^Abhivadatī^eb^ti taṇhāvasena taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhinivissa vadati. ^b^Ajjhosāyā^eb^ti anaññasādhāraṇaṃ viya ārammaṇaṃ taṇhāvasena anupavisitvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhaṃ kathaṃ abhinandatī^eb^ti ettha dukkhahetukaṃ abhinandanto dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana yāvatā yassa dukkhe diṭṭhitaṇhā abhinandanā appahīnā, tāvatāyaṃ dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ahaṃ dukkhito mama dukkhanti gaṇhanto abhinandati nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tena gāhadvayahetukā tattha abhinandanāti dasseti. ^b^Puna ekavāra^eb^nti punapi ekavāraṃ. Phalahetusandhihetuphalasandhivasena ^b^dvisandhī^eb^. ‘‘Gabbhassāvakkanti hotī’’tiādinā atthato sarūpato ca etarahi phalasaṅkhepassa. ^b^Sarūpeneva^eb^ ca itaradvayassa desitattā āha ^b^‘‘tisaṅkhepa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^410-414^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samathayānikassa bhikkhuno vedanāmukhena saṅkhepeneva yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ idha kathitanti āha ^b^‘‘saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ dhārethā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Imaṃ taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutti’’nti ca bhagavā yathādesitaṃ desanaṃ avocāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘imaṃ…pe… vimuttidesana’’^eb^nti ^a^V2.0214^ea^. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ desanā vimuttīti āha ^b^‘‘desanā hi…pe… vimuttīti vuttā’’^eb^ti. Yassā taṇhāya vasena sāti bhikkhu sassataggāhamahāsaṅghāṭapaṭimukko, sā sabbabuddhānaṃ desanā hatthāvalambamānepi durugghāṭiyā jātāti āha ^b^‘‘mahātaṇhājālataṇhāsaṅghāṭapaṭimukka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Mahātaṇhājāle^eb^ti mahante taṇhājaṭe. ^b^Taṇhāsaṅghāṭe^eb^ti taṇhāya saṅghāṭe. Tathābhūto ca tassa abbhantare kato nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘anupaviṭṭho antogadho’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^415^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jānapadino^eb^ti ^a^V2.0215^ea^ janapadavanto, janapadassa vā issarā rājakumārā gottavasena ^b^aṅgā nāma^eb^. Tesaṃ nivāso yadi eko janapado ^a^M2.0230^ea^, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘ruḷhīsaddenā’’^eb^ti. Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni (pāṇini 1.2.51) icchanti. Ayamettha ruḷhī yathā ‘‘kurūsu viharati, mallesu viharatī’’ti ca. Tabbisesane pana janapadasadde jātisadde ekavacanameva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṅgesu janapade’’^eb^ti. Assā vuccanti pāsāṇāni, tāni sundarāni tattha santīti ^b^‘‘assapura’’^eb^nti so nigamo vuttoti kecī. Apare pana ājānīyo asso rañño tattha gahaṇaṃ upagatoti ^b^‘‘assapura’’^eb^nti vuttoti vadanti. Kiṃ tehi, nāmametaṃ tassa nigamassa. Yasmā pana tattha bhagavato nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānaṃ kiñci nāhosi, tasmā ^b^‘‘taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā viharati’’^eb^cceva vuttaṃ. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘assapuraṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamo’’ti gocaragāmakittanameva kataṃ.

[03]^b^Evarūpena sīlenā^eb^tiādīsu sīlaggahaṇena vārittasīlamāha. Tena sammāvācākammantājīve dasseti. Ācāraggahaṇena cārittasīlaṃ. Tena parisuddhaṃ kāyavacīsamācāraṃ. Paṭipattiggahaṇena samathavipassanāmaggaphalasaṅgahaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ. ^b^Lajjino^eb^ti iminā yathāvuttasīlācāramūlakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Pesalā^eb^ti iminā pārisuddhiṃ. ^b^Uḷāraguṇā^eb^ti iminā paṭipattiyā pāripūriṃ. ^b^Bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathentī^eb^ti idaṃ tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ yebhuyyena bhikkhūnaṃ guṇakittanapasutatāya vuttaṃ. Te pana saddhammepi sammāsambuddhepi abhippasannā eva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā’’^eb^ti. Vatthuttaye hi ekasmiṃ abhippasannā itaradvaye abhippasannā eva tadavinābhāvato. ^b^Piṇḍapātāpacāyane^eb^ti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ yathā ‘‘kākehi sappi rakkhitabba’’nti, tasmā paccayapaṭipūjaneti vuttaṃ hoti. Paccayadāyakānañhi kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇaṃ idha ‘‘piṇḍapātāpacāyana’’nti adhippetaṃ.

[03]^b^Samaṇakaraṇā^eb^ti samaṇabhāvakarā, samaṇabhāvassa kārakāti attho. Te pana ekantato attano santāne uppāditā vaḍḍhitā ca hontīti āha ^b^‘‘samādāya paripūritā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samaṇa^eb^ggahaṇañcettha samaṇavasena, na sāmaññamattenāti āha ^b^‘‘samitapāpasamaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Brāhmaṇakaraṇā^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayenevattho veditabbo. Byañjanato eva cāyaṃ bhedo, yadidaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇāti ^a^V2.0216^ea^, na atthato. ^b^Samaṇena^eb^^b^kattabbadhammā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0231^ea^ samaṇadhamme ṭhitena sampādetabbadhammā. Yo hi heṭṭhimasikkhāsaṅkhātasamaṇabhāve suppatiṭṭhito, tena ye uparisikkhāsaṅkhātasamaṇabhāvā sampādetabbā, tesaṃ vaseneva vuttasamaṇena kattabbadhammā vuttāti. Tathā hi tesaṃ samaṇabhāvāvahataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tepi ca samaṇakaraṇā hontiyevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Idha panā^eb^ti mahāassapure. ^b^Hirottappādivasena desanā vitthāritā^eb^ti hirottappa-parisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācārājīvaindriyasaṃvara-bhojanemattaññuta- jāgariyānuyogasatisampajañña-jhānavijjāvasena samaṇakaraṇadhammadesanā vitthārato desitā, na tikanipāte viya saṅkhepato. ^b^Phala^eb^ggahaṇeneva vipākaphalaṃ gahitaṃ, taṃ pana ukkaṭṭhaniddesena catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ānisaṃsa^eb^ggahaṇena piyamanāpatādiudrayo. ^b^Tasseva attho^eb^ti tasseva avañcāpadasseva atthaniddeso. ^b^‘‘Yassā hī’’^eb^tiādinā byatirekavasena atthaṃ vadati. ^b^Ettakena ṭhānenā^eb^ti ettakena pāḷipadesena. ^b^Hirottappādīnaṃ^eb^ upari pāḷiyaṃ vuccamānānaṃ samaṇakaraṇa^b^dhammānaṃ. Vaṇṇaṃ kathesī^eb^ti guṇaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ abhāsi. ^b^Satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘apica vaṇṇabhaṇanameta’’ntiādinā ^b^satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.373; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.106) vuttanayena.

[03]^b^416^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yaṃ hirīyatī^eb^ti yena dhammena hetubhūtena vā jigucchati. Karaṇe hetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. ^b^Ya^eb^nti vā liṅgavipallāsena vutto, dhammoti attho. ^b^Hirīyitabbenā^eb^ti upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, hirīyitabbayuttakaṃ kāyaduccaritādinti attho. ^b^Ottappitabbenā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ajjhattaṃ niyakajjhattaṃ jātiādi samuṭṭhānaṃ etissāti ^b^ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī,^eb^ bahiddhā attato bahibhūto parasatto samuṭṭhānaṃ etissāti ^b^bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ^eb^. Attādhipatito āgatā ^b^attādhipateyyā,^eb^ attānaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā pavattā. ^b^Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā^eb^ti pāpajigucchanasabhāvaṭṭhāyinī. Sappatissavalakkhaṇattā garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patissavo, saha patissavenāti ^b^sappatissavaṃ,^eb^ patissavabhūtaṃ taṃsabhāvañca yaṃ kiñci gāravaṃ. Jātiādimahattatāpaccavekkhaṇena uppajjamānā ca hirī tattha gāravavasena pavattatīti sappatissavalakkhaṇāti vuccati. ^b^Bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhita^eb^nti pāpato bhāyanasabhāvaṭṭhāyī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇattā ^a^M2.0232^ea^ vajjaṃ bhāyati taṃ bhayato passatīti ^b^vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvī,^eb^ evaṃsabhāvaṃ ottappaṃ. Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hirottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāveneva vuccati, na paresaṃ kadāci aññamaññavippayogā. Na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ hotīti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1.balarāsivaṇṇanā) vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Lokamariyādassa pālanato ^b^lokapāladhammā nāma. Sukkā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0217^ea^ odātā pabhassarabhāvakārakā, sukkābhijātihetutāya ^b^vā sukkā. Sambheda^eb^nti ācāramariyādāsaṅkaraṃ. Devabhāvāvahā dhammāti ^b^devadhammā^eb^.
[03]^b^Sukkadhammasamāhitā^eb^ti yathāvuttasukkadhammasamaṅgino. ^b^Santo^eb^ti vūpasantadosā. ^b^Sappurisā^eb^ti santajanā. Saparahitasādhakā hi sādhavo.

[03]Avayavavinimuttassa samudāyassa abhāvato, avayavena ca samudāyassa apadisitabbato ovādūpasampadāvahaovādekadeso ^b^ovādūpasampadā^eb^ti. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ assapure. ^b^Ete^eb^ hirottappadhammā. ^b^Samaṇadhammā nāmāti dassitā^eb^ mūlabhūtasamaṇabhāvakarā dhammāti katvā. Tathā hi tesaṃ ādito gahaṇaṃ.

[03]Yassa adhigamena nippariyāyato samaṇā nāma honti, so ariyamaggo ‘‘samaṇassa kammaṃ paṭipadā’’ti katvā sāmaññaṃ, tassa pana phalabhāvato, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena araṇīyato phalanibbānāni ^b^sāmaññattho^eb^. Rāgaṃ khepetīti ^b^rāgakkhayo,^eb^ ariyamaggo. Rāgo khīyati etthāti ^b^rāgakkhayo,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. Phalaṃ pana kāraṇūpacārena ^b^rāgakkhayo^eb^ daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Dosakkhayo mohakkhayo^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sāmaññabhūto attho ^b^sāmaññattho,^eb^ maggo, sāmaññassa atthoti ^b^sāmaññattho,^eb^ phalanti āha ^b^‘‘maggampi phalampi ekato katvā sāmaññattho kathito’’^eb^ti. Tayidaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena vuttaṃ. Sīlādipubbabhāgapaṭipadāpi hi idha ‘‘sāmaññattho’’ti gahitā. Tenevāha ‘‘sati uttarikaraṇīye’’ti. ^b^Paṭivedayāmī^eb^ti punappunaṃ ñāpemi.

[03]^b^417^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammapathavasenevā^eb^ti akusalakammapathabhāveneva, tato tādisampi akusalakammaṃ bhikkhussa kātuṃ na yuttanti duṭṭhullabhāveneva tato ^a^M2.0233^ea^ oramatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Sikkhāpadabaddhenā^eb^ti sikkhāpadapaññāpanena. ^b^Pānīyaghaṭe vā patte vā kākānaṃ hatthaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā leḍḍuṃ vā^eb^ti sabbamidaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yattha katthaci hi ṭhitānaṃ aññesampi pāṇīnaṃ uṭṭhāpanādi sabbaṃ aniṭṭhakaraṇaṃ idha aparisuddhakāyasamācārabhāveneva saṅgahitanti. ^b^Uttāno^eb^ti uddhamuddhaṃ tanotīti uttāno. Evaṃbhūto ca kenaci anuppādabhūmiyaṃ sañjātasālakalyāṇīkhandho viya uparūpari uggatuggato pākaṭo ca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘uggato pākaṭo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anāvaṭo^eb^ti anivuto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asañchanno’’^eb^ti, nacchādetabboti attho. ^b^Ekasadiso^eb^ visuddhabhāvena. ^b^Antarantare chiddarahito^eb^ pubbenāparaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā sandhānena. ^b^Saṃvuto^eb^ kāyikassa saṃvarassa anupakkilesato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kilesānaṃ dvāraṃ pidahanenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^418^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ettha ^a^V2.0218^ea^ yathā lahukataraṃ kākuṭṭhāpanādikāyakammaṃ kāyasamācārassa aparisuddhabhāvāvahaṃ sallekhavikopanato, micchāvitakkanamattañca manosamācārassa, evaṃ yaṃ kiñci aniyyānakathākathanamattaṃ vacīsamācārassa aparisuddhabhāvāvahaṃ sallekhavikopanato, na hasādhippāyena musākathananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hasādhippāyena hi musākathanaṃ sikkhāpadabaddheneva paṭikkhittanti.

[03]^b^420^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ājīvopi ekacco kammapathavasena vārito labbhati. So pana atioḷāriko kāyavacīsamācāravāresu vuttanayo evāti na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ye pana ‘‘tādiso bhikkhūnaṃ ayogyato na gahito’’ti vadanti, taṃ micchā tathā sati kāyavacīsamācāravārepi tassa aggahetabbabhāvāpattito. ‘‘Khādatha pivathā’’ti pucchā attano khāditukāmatādīpanena, pariyāyakathābhāvato panesā sallekhavikopanā jātā.

[03]^b^422^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye pariyesanto ^b^pariyesanamattaññū^eb^ nāma. Dāyakassa deyyadhammassa attano ca pamāṇaññutāpaṭiggaṇhanto ^b^paṭiggahaṇamattaññū^eb^ nāma. Yoniso paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanto ^b^paribhogamattaññū^eb^ nāma.

[03]^b^423^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekasmiṃ^eb^^a^M2.0234^ea^^b^koṭṭhāse^eb^ti majjhimayāmasaññite ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse. ^b^‘‘Vāmena passena sentī’’^eb^ti evaṃ vuttā. ^b^Dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi^eb^ dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādipayogakkhamato. Purisavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Tejussadattā^eb^ti iminā sīhassa abhīrukabhāvaṃ dasseti. Bhīrukā hi sesamigā attano āsayaṃ pavisitvā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti, sīho pana abhīrukabhāvato satokārī bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dve purimapāde’’^eb^tiādi. Seti abyāvaṭabhāvena pavattati etthāti ^b^seyyā,^eb^ catutthajjhānameva seyyā. Kiṃ pana taṃ catutthajjhānanti? Ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ. Tattha hi ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigato tathāgato jātoti keci, tayidaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na seyyā. Apare pana ‘‘catutthajjhānasamanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī’’ti vuttapadaṃ gahetvā ‘‘lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpatti tathāgataseyyā’’ti vadanti, tathā sati parinibbānakālikā tathāgataseyyāti āpajjati, na ca bhagavā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjanabahulo vihāsi, aggaphalajhānaṃ panettha ‘‘catutthajjhāna’’nti adhippetaṃ. Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddupagamanalakkhaṇā seyyā ^a^V2.0219^ea^ bhavaṅgacittavāravasena hoti, tañca tesaṃ paṭhamajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ, evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ ‘‘tathāgataseyyā’’ti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sīhaseyyā^eb^ti seṭṭhaseyyāti āha ^b^‘‘uttamaseyyā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^426^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vigatantānī^eb^ti iṇamūlāni. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti iṇamūlānaṃ. ^b^Pariyanto^eb^ti avaseso.

[03]Pavattinivāraṇena ^b^catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto. Ābādhatī^eb^ti pīḷeti. ^b^Dukkhito^eb^ti sañjātadukkho. Appaṃ balaṃ ^b^balamattā^eb^. Appattho hi ayaṃ ^b^mattā^eb^-saddo ‘‘mattāsukhapariccāgā’’tiādīsu (dha. pa. 290) viya, balavattho pana ^b^mattā^eb^-saddo anatthantaro. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti ‘‘tassa hi bandhanā muttomhīti āvajjayato tadubhayaṃ hotī’’tiādinā vattabbaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Sabbapadesū^eb^ti vuttāvasiṭṭhesu sabbapadesu. Yenakāmaṃ yathāruci gacchatīti ^b^yenakāmaṃgamo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0235^ea^ anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā niddeso. Bhujo attano yathāsukhaviniyogo isso icchitabbo etthāti ^b^bhujisso,^eb^ sāmiko. So pana aparasantakatāya ^b^‘‘attano santako’’^eb^ti vutto. Dullabhāapatāya kaṃ tārenti etthāti ^b^kantāro^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘nirudakaṃ dīghamagga’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Vināsetī^eb^ti khādanadubbiniyojanādīhi yathā iṇamūlaṃ kiñci na hoti, tathā karoti. ^b^Yamhi^eb^ rāgavatthumhi. ^b^So^eb^ puggalo. ^b^Tena^eb^ rāgavatthunā, puriso ce itthiyā, itthī ce purisena. ^b^Iṇaṃ viya kāmacchando daṭṭhabbo^eb^ pīḷāsamānato.
[03]^b^Na vindatī^eb^ti na jānāti. ^b^Upaddavethā^eb^ti sukhavihārassa upaddavaṃ karotha, vibādhethāti attho. ^b^Rogo viya byāpādo daṭṭhabbo^eb^ sukhabhañjanasamānato.

[03]Nānāvidhahetūpāyālaṅkatatāya khandhāyatanadhātupaṭiccasamuppādādidhammanītivicittatāya ca ^b^vicittanaye. Dhammassavane^eb^ti dhammakathāyaṃ. Kathā hi sotabbaṭṭhena ‘‘savana’’nti vuttā. Evamettha sīlaṃ vibhattaṃ, evaṃ jhānābhiññā, evaṃ vipassanāmaggaphalānīti ^b^neva tassa^eb^ dhammassavanassa ^b^ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ jānāti. Uṭṭhite^eb^ti niṭṭhite. ^b^Aho kāraṇa^eb^nti tattha tattha paṭiññānurūpena nikkhittasādhanavasena gahitakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Aho upamā^eb^ti tasseva kāraṇassa patiṭṭhāpanavasena anvayato byatirekato ca patiṭṭhaṃ udāharaṇādi. ^b^Bandhanāgāraṃ viya thinamiddhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ^eb^ dukkhato niyyānassa vibandhanato.

[03]Yasmā ^a^V2.0220^ea^ kukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccarahitaṃ natthi, yasmā vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ samānakiccāhārapaṭipakkhaṃ, tasmā kukkuccassa visayaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vinaye apakataññunā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yathā hi uddhaccaṃ sattassa avūpasamakaraṃ, tathā kukkuccampi. Yathāpi uddhaccassa ñātivitakkādi āhāro, tathā kukkuccassapi. Yathā ca uddhaccassa samatho paṭipakkho, tathā kukkuccassapīti. ^b^Dāsabyaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ^eb^ aseribhāvāpādanato.

[03]Soḷasavatthukā vicikicchā aṭṭhavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ anupaviṭṭhāti āha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vicikicchā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vicikicchanto^eb^ti saṃsayanto. ^b^Adhimuccitvā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0236^ea^ pattiyāyetvā. ^b^Gaṇhitu^eb^nti saddheyyavatthuṃ pariggahetuṃ. Abhimukhaṃ sappanaṃ ^b^āsappanaṃ,^eb^ parito sappanaṃ ^b^parisappanaṃ^eb^. Padadvayenapi cittassa anicchanākārameva vadati. Khemantagāmimaggaṃ na pariyogāhati etenāti ^b^apariyogāhanaṃ,^eb^ ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitabhāvena chambhitaṃ hoti cittaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena, so dhammo ^b^chambhitatta^eb^nti vicikicchanākāramāha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittassa uppādayamānā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kantāraddhānamaggo viyā^eb^ti sāsaṅkakantāraddhānamaggo viya ^b^daṭṭhabbā^eb^ appaṭipattihetubhāvato.

[03]Natthi ettha iṇanti aṇaṇo, tassa bhāvo ^b^āṇaṇyaṃ,^eb^ kassaci iṇassa adhāraṇaṃ. ^b^Samiddhakammanto^eb^ti nipphannajīvikappayogo. Paribundhati uparodhetīti ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā palibodho, aserivihāro, tassa mūlaṃ kāraṇanti ^b^palibodhamūlaṃ. Cha dhamme bhāvetvā^eb^ti asubhanimittaggāhādike cha dhamme uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā. ^b^Cha dhamme bhāvetvā^eb^ti ca mettānimittaggāhādayo ca tattha tattha cha dhammāti vuttāti veditabbo. ^b^Pajahatī^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena pajahati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ācārapaṇṇattiādīni sikkhāpiyamāno’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paravatthumhī^eb^ti visabhāgavatthusmiṃ, paravisaye vā. Paravisayā hete bhikkhuno, yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā. ^b^Āṇaṇyamiva kāmacchandappahānaṃ āha^eb^ piyavatthuabhāvāvahato.
[03]Ācāravipattipaṭibāhakāni sikkhāpadāni ^b^ācārapaṇṇattiādīni. Ārogyamiva byāpādappahānaṃ āha^eb^ kāyacittānaṃ phāsubhāvāvahato.
[03]^b^Bandhanā mokkhamiva thinamiddhappahānaṃ āha^eb^ cittassa niggahitabhāvāvahato.
[03]^b^Bhujissaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccappahānaṃ āha^eb^ cittassa seribhāvāvahato.
[03]^b^Tiṇaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0221^ea^^b^viyā^eb^ti tiṇamiva katvā. ^b^Agaṇetvā^eb^ti acintetvā. ^b^Khemantabhūmiṃ viya vicikicchāpahānaṃ āha^eb^ anussaṅkitāparisaṅkitabhāvena sammāpaṭipattihetubhāvato.

[03]^b^427^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kirīyati (a. ni. ṭī. 3.5.28-29) gabbhāsaye khipīyatīti karo, sambhavo, karato jātoti ^b^karajo,^eb^ mātāpettikasambhavoti attho. Mātuyā hi sarīrasaṇṭhāpanavasena ^a^M2.0237^ea^ karato jātoti ^b^karajo^eb^ti apare. Ubhayathāpi ^b^karajakāya^eb^nti catusantatirūpamāha. ^b^Temetī^eb^ti tintaṃ karoti. Ko panettha tintabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘snehetī’’^eb^ti, pītisnehena pīṇanaṃ karotīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ karotī’’^eb^ti. Pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi sakalassa karajakāyassa pariphuṭatāya cettha taṃsamuṭṭhāpakapītisukhānaṃ sabbattha pavatti jotitā. ^b^Parisandetī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tatthāpi hi ‘‘samantato sandeti temeti sneheti, sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ karotī’’tiādinā yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo. ^b^Paripūretī^eb^ti vāyunā bhastaṃ viya imaṃ karajakāyaṃ pītisukhena pūreti. ^b^Samantato phusatī^eb^ti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ pītisukhena phusati. ^b^Sabbāvato^eb^ti a-kārassa ā-kāro kato, sabbāvayavavatoti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘sabbakoṭṭhāsavato’’^eb^ti, maṃsādisabbābhāgavatoti attho. ^b^Aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti^eb^ pītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi rūpehi sabbatthakameva byāpitattā. Kātuñceva yojetuñca cheko sannetuṃ paṭibaloti yojanā. Nhānīyacuṇṇānaṃ parimaddanavasena piṇḍaṃ karontena hatthena bhājanaṃ nippīḷetabbaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sannentassa bhijjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anugatā^eb^ti anupaviṭṭhā. ^b^Parigatā^eb^ti parito samantato tintā. Tintabhāveneva samaṃ antaraṃ bāhirañca etissāti ^b^santarabāhirā. Sabbatthakamevā^eb^ti sabbattheva. ^b^Na ca pagghariṇī^eb^ pamāṇayuttasseva udakassa sittattā. Ettha ca nhānīyapiṇḍaṃ viya karajakāyo, taṃ temetvā sampiṇḍitapamāṇayuttaudakaṃ viya paṭhamajjhānasukhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^428^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā uggacchanaudako^eb^ti rahadassa adhothūladhārāvasena ubbhijja uṭṭhahanaudako. ^b^Antoyeva ubbhijjanaudako^eb^ti rahadassa abbhantareyeva thūladhārā ahutvā uṭṭhitaudakasirāmukhehi ubbhijjanako. ^b^Āgamanamaggo^eb^ti nadītaḷākakandarasarāadito āgamanamaggo.

[03]^b^429^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uppalagacchāni ettha santīti ^b^uppalinī^eb^ (a. ni. ṭī. 3.5.28-29), vāri. ^b^Ayamettha vinicchayo,^eb^ tathā hi loke rattakkhiko ‘‘puṇḍarīkakkho’’ti vuccati. Keci pana ^a^V2.0222^ea^ ‘‘rattaṃ padumaṃ, setaṃ puṇḍarīka’’nti vadanti. Uppalādīni viya karajakāyo, udakaṃ ^a^M2.0238^ea^ viya tatiyajjhānasukhanti ayampi attho ^b^‘‘purimanayenā’’^eb^ti atideseneva vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^430^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nirupakkilesaṭṭhenā^eb^ti rajojallādinā anupakkiliṭṭhatāya amalīnabhāvena. Amalīnampi kiñci vatthu pabhassarasabhāvaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pabhassaraṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Utupharaṇa^eb^nti uṇhautupharaṇaṃ. Sabbatthakameva jhānasukhena phuṭṭho karajakāyo yathā utunā phuṭṭhavatthasadisoti āha ^b^‘‘vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti ‘‘vatthaṃ viyā’’tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati, karajakāyassa vatthasadisattā catutthajjhānasukhassa ca utupharaṇasadisattāti attho. Santasabhāvattā ñāṇuttarattā cettha upekkhāpi sukhe saṅgahitāti catutthajjhānepi sukhaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. ‘‘Parisuddhena pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hotī’’ti vacanato catutthajjhānacittassa vatthasadisatā vuttā. Catutthajjhānasamuṭṭhānarūpehi bhikkhuno kāyassa phuṭabhāvaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ utupharaṇaṃ viyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Purisassa kāyo viya bhikkhuno karajakāyoti ayaṃ panattho pākaṭoti na gahito, gahito eva vā ‘‘yathā hi katthaci…pe… kāyo phuṭo hotī’’ti vuttattā.

[03]^b^431^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbenivāsañāṇaupamāya^eb^nti pubbenivāsañāṇassa dassitaupamāyaṃ. ^b^Taṃdivasaṃkatakiriyā^eb^gahaṇaṃ pākatikasattassapi yebhuyyena pākaṭā hotīti dassanatthaṃ. ^b^Taṃdivasagatagāmattaya^eb^ggahaṇeneva mahābhinīhārehi aññesampi pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ tīsu bhavesu katā kiriyā yebhuyyena pākaṭā hotīti dīpitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^432^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sammukhadvārā^eb^ti aññamaññassa abhimukhadvārā. ^b^Aparāparaṃ sañcarante^eb^ti taṃtaṃkiccavasena ito cito ca sañcarante. ^b^Ito pana gehā…pe… pavisanavasenapī^eb^ti idaṃ cutūpapātañāṇassa visayadassanavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ṭhatvā^eb^ti dvinnaṃ gehadvārānaṃ sammukhaṭṭhānabhūte antaravīthiyaṃ vemajjhe ṭhatvā. Tesu hi ekassa ce pācīnamukhadvāraṃ itarassa pacchimamukhaṃ, tassa sammukhaṃ ubhinnaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitassa dakkhiṇāmukhassa, uttarāmukhassa vā cakkhumato purisassa tattha pavisanakanikkhamanakapurisā yathā sukheneva ^a^M2.0239^ea^ pākaṭā honti, evaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇasamaṅgino cavanakaupapajjanakapurisā. Yathā pana tassa purisassa aññeneva khaṇena pavisantassa dassanaṃ, aññena nikkhamantassa dassanaṃ, evaṃ imassapi aññeneva khaṇena cavamānassa dassanaṃ, aññena upapajjamānassa dassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ñāṇassa pākaṭāti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti ñāṇassa.

[03]^b^433^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pabbatasikharaṃ ^a^V2.0223^ea^ yebhuyyena saṃkhittaṃ saṅkucitaṃ hotīti idha pabbatamatthakaṃ ^b^‘‘pabbatasaṅkhepo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, pabbatapariyāpanno vā padeso ^b^pabbatasaṅkhepo. Anāvilo^eb^ti akālusso. Sā cassa anāvilatā kaddamābhāvena hotīti āha ^b^‘‘nikkaddamo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi^eb^ gāvīsu. ^b^Vijjamānāsū^eb^ti labbhamānāsu. ^b^Itarā^eb^ ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi ^b^carantīti vuccanti^eb^ sahacaraṇañāyena. ^b^Tiṭṭhantameva,^eb^ na kadācipi carantaṃ. ^b^Dvaya^eb^nti sippisammukaṃ macchagumbanti imaṃ ubhayaṃ ^b^tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ,^eb^ carantampīti adhippāyo. Kiṃ vā imāya sahacariyāya, yathālābhaggahaṇaṃ panettha daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakkharakathalassa hi vasena ‘‘tiṭṭhanta’’nti, sippisambukassa macchagumbassa ca vasena ‘‘tiṭṭhantampi, carantampī’’ti yojanā kātabbā.

[03]^b^434^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhikkhū^eb^ti bhinnakilesoti bhikkhu. So hi paramatthato samaṇotināmako. Tattha ariyamaggena sabbaso pāpānaṃ samitāvīti ^b^samaṇo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samitapāpattā’’^eb^ti. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmā vuccati sammāsambuddho, tato āgatoti brahmā, ariyamaggo, taṃ asammohapaṭivedhavasena aññāsīti ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^. Taṃsamaṅgitāya hissa pāpānaṃ bāhitabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo’’^eb^ti. Aṭṭhaṅgikena ariyamaggajalena nhātavā niddhotakilesoti ^b^nhātako. Gatattā^eb^ti pahānābhisamayavasena paṭividdhattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘viditattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nissutattā^eb^ti samucchedappahānavasena santānato sabbaso nihatattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apahatattā’’^eb^ti, mariyādavasena kilesānaṃ hiṃsitattā ariyamaggehi odhiso sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchinnattāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘hatattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ārakattā^eb^ti suppahīnatāya vippakaṭṭhabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dūrībhūtattā’’^eb^ti. Ubhayampi ubhayattha yojetabbaṃ – kilesānaṃ ārakattā ^a^M2.0240^ea^ hatattā dūrībhūtattā ca ^b^ariyo,^eb^ tathā ^b^araha^eb^nti. Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ uttānatthattā suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahāassapurasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^435^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimasadisamevā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0224^ea^ ‘‘assapuravāsīnaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe gāravabahumānaṃ nipaccakārañca disvā bhikkhū piṇḍapātāpacāyane niyojento idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsī’’ti purimasutte mahāassapure (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.415) vuttasadisameva. ^b^Samaṇānaṃ anucchavikā^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ samaṇabhāvassa anucchavikā patirūpā. ^b^Samaṇānaṃ anulomappaṭipadā^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa anukūlappaṭipadā.

[03]^b^436^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ete dhammā^eb^ti ete pāḷiyaṃ āgatā abhijjhābyāpādādayo pāpadhammā. ^b^Uppajjamānā^eb^ti uppajjamānā eva, pageva santāne bhāvitā. ^b^Maline^eb^ti malavante kiliṭṭhe. ^b^Malaggahite^eb^ti gahitamale sañjātamale. ^b^Samaṇamalā^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ samaṇabhāvassa malā. ^b^Dussantī^eb^ti vipajjanti vinassanti. ^b^Samaṇadosā^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ samaṇabhāvadūsanā. ^b^Kasaṭe^eb^ti asāre. ^b^Niroje^eb^ti nitteje. Ayato sukhato apetāti apāyā, nirayādayo, taṃ phalaṃ arahanti, taṃ payojanaṃ vā etesanti ^b^āpāyikā. Ṭhānāni^eb^ abhijjhādayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apāye’’^eb^tiādi. Kāraṇabhāvena duggatipariyāpannāya vedanāya hitānīti ^b^duggativedaniyāni^eb^. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘duggatiyaṃ vipākavedanāya paccayāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tikhiṇaṃ aya^eb^nti vekantakasadisaṃ sārāyaṃ. ^b^Ayenā^eb^ti ayoghaṃsakena. Koñcasakuṇānaṃ kira kucchiyaṃ nivutthaṃ yaṃ kiñci kharaṃ tikhiṇañca hoti. Tathā hi tesaṃ vaccaṃ aṭṭhimpi pāsāṇampi vilīyāpeti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘koñcasakuṇe khādāpentī’’^eb^ti. Taṃ kira ayacuṇṇaṃ aggināpi kicchena dayhati, bhesajjabalena pana sukhena dayheyya. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘susikkhitā ca naṃ ayakārā bahuhatthakammamūlaṃ labhitvā karontī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Atitikhiṇaṃ hoti,^eb^ aññataraṃ ayobandhanaṃ pheggudaṇḍaṃ viya sukheneva chindanti. Sasabiḷāracammehi ^a^M2.0241^ea^ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena ^b^saṅghāṭī^eb^ti vuccati āvudhaparicchadoti āha ^b^‘‘saṅghāṭiyāti kosiyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariyonaddha^eb^nti parito onaddhaṃ chāditaṃ. ^b^Samantato veṭhitanti^eb^ sabbaso pihitaṃ.

[03]^b^437^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rajo^eb^ti āgantukarajo. ^b^Jalla^eb^nti sarīre uṭṭhānakaloṇādimalaṃ. Rajojallañca vatasamādānavasena anapanītaṃ etassa atthīti ^b^rajojalliko,^eb^ tassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rajojalladhārino’’^eb^ti. ^b^Udakaṃ orohantassā^eb^tiādīnamattho mahāsīhanādasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva. ^b^Sabbameta^eb^ntiādīsu sabbasopi vatasamādānavasenāti adhippāyo. Yasmā sabbametaṃ bāhirasamayavaseneva ^a^V2.0225^ea^ kathitaṃ, tasmā ^b^saṅghāṭikassā^eb^ti pilotikakhaṇḍehi saṅghaṭitattā ‘‘saṅghāṭī’’ti laddhanāmavatthadhārinoti attho. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘saṅghāṭikassa’’icceva vuttaṃ, na ‘‘bhikkhuno’’ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. Kasmā panettha bhagavatā saṅghāṭikattādīniyeva vatasamādānāni paṭikkhittānīti? Nayadassanametaṃ aññesampi pañcātapamūgavatādīnaṃ tappaṭikkhepeneva pasiddhito. Apare pana bhaṇanti – ‘‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmī’’ti vutte tattha nisinno koci titthantaraladdhiko acelakattaṃ nu kho kathanti cintesi, apare rajojallakattaṃ nu kho kathanti, evaṃ taṃ taṃ cintentānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā imāneva vatasamādānāni idha paṭikkhipīti. ^b^Saṅghāṭika^eb^nti nivāsanapārupanavasena saṅghāṭivantaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅghāṭikaṃ vattha’’^eb^ntiādi. Attano ruciyā mittādayo ^b^saṅghāṭikaṃ kareyyuṃ,^eb^ pacchā viññutaṃ pattakāle saṅghāṭikatte samādapeyyuṃ.

[03]^b^438^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Attānaṃ visujjhantaṃ passati^eb^ abhijjhādīnaṃ samudācārābhāvato. Maggena asamucchinnattā ^b^visuddhoti pana na vattabbo. Pāmojja^eb^nti taruṇapītimāha. Tassa hi attano sammāpaṭipattiyā kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā cittassa visuddhataṃ passantassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati, taṃ tuṭṭhākāraṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tuṭṭhākāro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pītī^eb^ti passaddhiāvahā balavapīti. ^b^Nāmakāyo passambhatī^eb^ti iminā ubhayampi passaddhiṃ vadati. ^b^Vediyatī^eb^ti anubhavati vindati. Idāni tena nīvaraṇehi cittassa visodhanattaṃ laddhanti āha ^a^M2.0242^ea^^b^‘‘appanāppattaṃ viya hotī’’^eb^ti. Aññattha uṭṭhitā aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatāti ettakena upamābhāvena uccanīcatāsāmaññena heṭṭhā asaddhammānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena desanāya pariyosāpitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yathānusandhinā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mahāsīhanādasutte maggo pokkharaṇiyā upamito^eb^ ‘‘seyyathāpi, sāriputta, pokkharaṇī’’tiādiṃ (ma. ni. 1.154) ārabhitvā upamāsaṃsandane ‘‘tathāyaṃ puggalo paṭipanno, tathā ca iriyati, tañca maggaṃ samāruḷho, yathā āsavānaṃ khayā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.154) vuttattā. Yathā hi puratthimādidisāhi āgatā purisā taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ āgamma visuddharūpakāyā vigatapariḷāhā ca honti, evaṃ khattiyādikulato āgatā tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ sāsanaṃ āgamma visuddhanāmakāyā vigatakilesapariḷāhā ca honti. Tasmā ^b^sabbakilesānaṃ samitattā paramatthasamaṇo hotī^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Cūḷāssapurasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca mahāyamakavaggavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^439^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahājanakāye^eb^^a^M2.0243^ea^^a^V2.0226^ea^^b^sannipatite^eb^ti keci ‘‘pahaṃsanavidhiṃ dassetvā rājakumāraṃ hāsessāmā’’ti, keci ‘‘taṃ kīḷanaṃ passissāmā’’ti evaṃ mahājanasamūhe sannipatite. ^b^Devanaṭa^eb^nti dibbagandhabbaṃ. ^b^Kusalaṃ kusalanti vacanaṃ upādāyā^eb^ti ‘‘kacci kusalaṃ? Āma kusala’’nti vacanapaṭivacanavasena pavattakusalavāditāya te manussā ādito kusalāti samaññaṃ labhiṃsu. Tesaṃ kusalānaṃ issarāti rājakumārā ^b^kosalā^eb^. Kosale jātā. Tesaṃ nivāsoti sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so padeso kosalāti vuccatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Cārikaṃ caramāno^eb^ti sāmaññavacanampi ‘‘mahatā…pe… tadavasarī’’ti vacanato visesaṃ niviṭṭhamevāti āha ^b^‘‘aturitacārikaṃ caramāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mahatā^eb^ti guṇamahattenapi saṅkhyāmahattenapi mahatā. Tasmiñhi bhikkhusamūhe keci adhisīlasikkhāvasena sīlasampannā, tathā keci sīlasamādhisampannā, keci sīlasamādhipaññāsampannāti guṇamahattenapi so bhikkhusamūho mahāti. Taṃ anāmasitvā saṅkhyāmahattameva dassento ^b^‘‘sataṃ vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Aññagāmapaṭibaddhajīvikāvasena samosaranti etthāti ^b^samosaraṇaṃ, gāmo^eb^ nivāsagāmo. Nti sālaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ. ^b^Vihāro^eb^ti bhagavato viharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ^b^sāleyyakasutte. Aniyamito^eb^ti asukasmiṃ ārāme pabbate rukkhamūle vāti na niyamito, sarūpaggahaṇavasena na niyamitvā vutto. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti aniyamitattā. Atthāpattisiddhamatthaṃ parikappanavasena dassento ^b^‘‘vanasaṇḍo bhavissatī’’^eb^ti āha, addhā bhaveyyāti attho.

[03]^b^Upalabhiṃsū^eb^ti (sārattha. ṭī. 1.1.verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanā; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.255; a. ni. ṭī. 2.3.64) savanavasena upalabhiṃsūti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sotadvāra…pe… jāniṃsū’’^eb^ti āha. Avadhāraṇaphalattā sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘padapūraṇamatte vā^eb^^a^V2.0227^ea^^b^nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avadhāraṇatthe^eb^ti pana iminā iṭṭhatthāvadhāraṇatthaṃ kho-saddaggahaṇanti dasseti. ‘‘Assosu’’nti ^a^M2.0244^ea^ padaṃ kho-sadde gahite tena phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti, tena ca purimapacchimapadāni saṃsiliṭṭhāni honti, na tasmiṃ aggahiteti āha ^b^‘‘padapūraṇena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Matta^eb^-saddo visesanivattiattho. Tenassa anatthantaradīpanataṃ dasseti, ^b^eva^eb^-saddena pana byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya ekantikataṃ. Sālāyaṃ jātā saṃvaḍḍhakā ^b^sāleyyakā^eb^ yathā ‘‘katteyyakā ubbheyyakā’’ti.

[03]^b^Samitapāpattā^eb^ti accantaṃ anavasesato savāsanaṃ samitapāpattā. Evañhi bāhirakavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamanato bhagavato pāpasamanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ idha anussavattho adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘khalūti anussavanatthe nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ālapanamatta^eb^nti piyālāpavacanaṃ. Piyasamudāhārā hete ‘‘bho’’ti vā ‘‘āvuso’’ti vā ‘‘devānaṃpiyā’’ti vā. ^b^Gottavasenā^eb^ti ettha taṃ tāyatīti ^b^gottaṃ^eb^. Gotamoti hi pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya tāyati rakkhatīti ^b^gotamagottaṃ^eb^. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. So pana atthato aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Uccākulaparidīpanaṃ^eb^ uditoditavipulakhattiyakulavibhāvanato. Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ. ^b^Kenaci pārijuññenā^eb^ti ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenacipi pārijuññena parihāniyā ^b^anabhibhūto^eb^ anajjhotthaṭo. Tathā hi kadācipi tassa kulassa tādisapārijuññābhāvo, abhinikkhamanakāle ca tato samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññātoti. ^b^Sakyakulā pabbajito^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato ^b^saddhāpabbajitabhāvadīpanaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitabhāvadīpanato. Ettha ca ^b^samaṇo^eb^ti iminā parikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatādīpanato, ^b^gotamo^eb^ti iminā lokiyajanehi uḷāratamakulīnatādīpanato.
