Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekacittakkhaṇikāvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sace sañjānātī^eb^ti sace saññattiṃ gacchati. ^b^Yāguṃ pivāhīti uyyojetabbo^eb^ dhammasākacchāya abhabbabhāvatoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^463^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Puññābhisaṅkhārādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kāyasañcetanādi lakkhaṇe kāyasaṅkhārādikepi saṅgaṇhāti, na apuññāneñjābhisaṅkhāre eva. ^b^Kāyapaṭibaddhattā kāyena saṅkharīyati,^eb^ na kāyasamuṭṭhānattā. Cittasamuṭṭhānā hi te dhammāti. ^b^Nibbattīyatī^eb^ti ca idaṃ kāye sati sabbhāvaṃ ^a^V2.0262^ea^, asati ca abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Vāca^eb^nti vacīghosaṃ. ^b^Saṅkharotī^eb^ti janeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbattetī’’^eb^ti. Na hi taṃ vitakkavicārarahitacittaṃ vacīghosaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkoti. ^b^Cittapaṭibaddhattā^eb^ti etena cittassa nissayādipaccayabhāvo cittasaṅkhārasaṅkharaṇanti dasseti. ^b^Aññamaññamissā^eb^ti atthato bhinnāpi kāyasaṅkhārādivacanavacanīyabhāvena aññamaññamissitā abhinnā viya, tato eva ^b^āluḷitā^eb^ saṃkiṇṇā ^b^avibhūtā^eb^ apākaṭā ^b^duddīpanā^eb^ duviññāpayā. ^b^Ādānaggahaṇamuñcanacopanānī^eb^ti yassa kassaci kāyena ādātabbassa ādānasaṅkhātaṃ gahaṇaṃ, vissajjanasaṅkhātaṃ muñcanaṃ, yathātathācalanasaṅkhātaṃ copananti imāni ^b^pāpetvā^eb^ sādhetvā ^b^uppannā^eb^. Kāyato pavattā saṅkhārā, kāyena saṅkharīyantīti ca ^b^kāyasaṅkhārātveva vuccanti. Hanusaṃcopana^eb^nti hanusañcalanaṃ. ^b^Vacībheda^eb^nti vācānicchāraṇaṃ. Vācaṃ saṅkharontīti katvā idha ^b^vacīsaṅkhārātveva vuccanti^eb^.

[03]^b^464^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samāpajjissa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0284^ea^ padaṃ nirodhassa āsannānāgatabhāvavisayaṃ āsannaṃ vajjetvā dūrassa gahaṇe payojanābhāvato. Nirodhapādakassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacittassa ca gahaṇato paṭṭhāya nirodhaṃ samāpajjati nāmāti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘padadvayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattikālo kathito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotī^eb^ti ettha addhānaparicchedacittaggahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ nānantariyabhāvato. Na hi baladvayañāṇasamādhicariyānaṃ vasībhāvāpādanacittehi vinā addhānaparicchedacittaṃ acittakabhāvāya hoti.

[03]^b^Sesasaṅkhārehī^eb^ti kāyasaṅkhāracittasaṅkhārehi. ^b^Dutiyajjhāneyeva nirujjhati^eb^ anuppattinirodhena. Itaresupi eseva nayo. ^b^Vuṭṭhahissa^eb^nti padaṃ vuṭṭhahanassa āsannānāgatabhāvavisayaṃ āsannaṃ vajjetvā dūrassa gahaṇe payojanābhāvato. Nirodhato vuṭṭhānassa ca cittuppādena paricchinnattā tato oramevāti āha ^b^‘‘padadvayena antonirodhakālo kathito’’^eb^ti. Tathā ^b^cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotī^eb^ti yathā yathāparicchinnakālameva acittakabhāvo, tato paraṃ sacittakabhāvo hoti, tathā nirodhassa parikammacittaṃ uppāditaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Paṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhāya idameva kātabbaṃ jānitvā appavattimattaṃ. ^b^Samāpajjantī^eb^ti acittakabhāvaṃ sampadeva āpajjanti. Atha kasmā sattāhameva samāpajjantīti? Yathākālaparicchedakaraṇato, tañca yebhuyyena āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ upādinnakapavattassa ekadivasaṃ bhuttāhārassa sattāhameva yāpanato.

[03]Sabbā ^a^V2.0263^ea^ phalasamāpatti assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti idaṃ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘samuṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti. Yā pana na samuṭṭhāpeti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘imassa pana…pe… na samuṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha ^b^imassā^eb^ti idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttanirodhasamāpajjanabhikkhuno. Tassa pana phalasamāpatti catutthajjhānikāvāti niyamo natthīti āha ^b^‘‘kiṃ vā etenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Abbohārikā^eb^ti sukhumattabhāvappattiyā ‘‘atthī’’ti voharituṃ asakkuṇeyyāti keci. Nirodhassa pana pādakabhūtāya catutthajjhānādisamādhicariyāya vasena acatutthajjhānikāpi nirodhānantaraphalasamāpatti assāsapassāse ^a^M2.0285^ea^ na samuṭṭhāpetīti abhāvato eva te abbohārikā vuttā. Evañca katvā sañjīvattheravatthumhi ānītasamāpattiphalanidassanampi suṭṭhu upapajjati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhavaṅgasamayenevetaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakāle^eb^ti ettha kiriyamayapavattaṃ kāyavacīviññattivipphāro, tassa vaḷañjanakāle pavattanasamaye. ^b^Vācaṃ abhisaṅkhātuṃ na sakkonti^eb^ aviññattijanakattā tesaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ.

[03]^b^Saguṇenā^eb^ti sarasena, sabhāvenāti attho. ^b^Suññatā nāma phalasamāpatti^eb^ rāgādīhi suññattā. Tathā rāganimittādīnaṃ abhāvā ^b^animittā,^eb^ rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvā ^b^appaṇihitā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘animittāppaṇihitesupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti. Animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaphalasamāpattiyaṃ phasso animitto phasso appaṇihito phasso nāmāti imamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā atidisati.

[03]Attasuññatādassanato anattānupassanā suññatā, niccanimittugghāṭanato aniccānupassanā animittā, sukhappaṇidhipaṭikkhepato dukkhānupassanā appaṇihitāti āha – ^b^‘‘suññatā…pe… vipassanāpi vuccatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aniccato vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti saṅkhārānaṃ aniccākāraggāhiniyā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā parato ekatovuṭṭhānaubhatovuṭṭhānehi nimittapavattato vuṭṭhāti. ^b^Aniccato pariggahetvā^eb^ti ca idaṃ ‘‘na ekantikaṃ evampi hotī’’ti katvā vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Appaṇihitavipassanāya maggotiādinā, suññatavipassanāya maggotiādinā ca yojanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vikappo āpajjeyya^eb^ āgamanassa vavatthānassa abhāvena avavatthānakarattā. ^b^Evañhi tayo phassā phusantī^eb^ti evaṃ saguṇato ārammaṇato ca nāmalābhe suññatādināmakā tayo phassā phusantīti aniyamavacanaṃ. ^b^Sameti^eb^ yujjati ekasseva phassassa nāmattayayogato.

[03]Sabbasaṅkhatavivittatāya ^a^V2.0264^ea^^b^nibbānaṃ viveko nāma^eb^ upadhivivekoti katvā. ^b^Ninnatā^eb^ tappaṭipakkhavimukhassa tadabhimukhatā. ^b^Poṇatā^eb^ onamanaṃ, ^b^pabbhāratā^eb^ tato vissaṭṭhabhāvo.

[03]^b^465^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cakkhādito rūpādīsu pavattarūpakāyato uppajjanato ^b^pañcadvārikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ nāma, manodvārikaṃ^eb^ cetophassajātāya ^b^cetasikaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0286^ea^^b^nāma. Sabhāvaniddeso^eb^ sukhayatīti katvā. ^b^Madhurabhāvadīpaka^eb^nti iṭṭhabhāvajotanaṃ. ^b^Vedayitabhāvadīpaka^eb^nti vedakabhāvavibhāvakaṃ. Vedanā eva hi paramatthato ārammaṇaṃ vedeti, ārammaṇaṃ pana veditabbanti. Dukkhanti sabhāvaniddesotievamādiatthavacanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ṭhitisukhā^eb^ti ṭhitiyā dharamānatāya sukhā, na ṭhitikkhaṇamattena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atthibhāvo sukha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vipariṇāmadukkhā^eb^ti vipariṇamanena vigamanena dukkhā, na nirodhakkhaṇena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘natthibhāvo dukkha’’^eb^nti. Apariññātavatthukānañhi sukhavedanuparamo dukkhato upaṭṭhāti. Svāyamattho piyavippayogena dīpetabbo. ^b^Ṭhitidukkhā vipariṇāmasukhā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atthibhāvo dukkhaṃ, natthibhāvo sukha’’^eb^nti. Dukkhavedanuparamo hi sattānaṃ sukhato upaṭṭhāti. Evañhi vadanti – ‘‘tassa rogassa vūpasamena aho sukhaṃ jāta’’nti. ^b^Jānanabhāvo^eb^ti yāthāvasabhāvato avabujjhanaṃ. Adukkhamasukhañhi vedanaṃ jānantassa sukhaṃ hoti tassa sukhumabhāvato, yathā tadaññe dhamme salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca sammadeva avabodho paramaṃ sukhaṃ. Tenevāha –
[21]‘‘Yato yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ;
[22]Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 374);

[03]^b^Ajānanabhāvo^eb^ti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Dukkhañhi sammohavihāroti. Aparo nayo ^b^jānanabhāvo^eb^ti jānanassa ñāṇassa sabbhāvo. Ñāṇasampayuttā hi ñāṇopanissayā ca adukkhamasukhā vedanā sukhā iṭṭhākārā. Yathāha ‘‘iṭṭhā ceva iṭṭhaphalā cā’’ti. ^b^Ajānanabhāvo dukkha^eb^nti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Katamo anusayo anusetī^eb^ti kāmarāgānusayādīsu sattasu anusayesu katamo anusayo anusayavasena pavattati? Appahīnabhāvena hi santāne anusayantīti ^b^anusayā,^eb^ anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti attho. Etena kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanārahatā nesaṃ dassitā. Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appahīnaṭṭhena sayito viya hotī’’^eb^ti. Te ca nippariyāyato ^a^M2.0287^ea^ anāgatā kilesā daṭṭhabbā, atītā paccuppannā ^a^V2.0265^ea^ ca taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti. Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi. Yadi appahīnaṭṭho anusayaṭṭho, nanu sabbepi kilesā appahīnā anusayā bhaveyyunti? Na mayaṃ appahīnatāmattena anusayaṭṭhaṃ vadāma, atha kho pana appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā kilesā anusayā. Idaṃ thāmagamanañca rāgādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo, yato abhidhamme – ‘‘thāmagataṃ anusayaṃ pajahatī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti rāgānusayo. ^b^Appahīno^eb^ti appahīnabhāvamukhena anusayanaṭṭhamāha. So ca apariññātakkhandhavatthuto, pariññātesu patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya so appahīno’’^eb^ti. Ārammaṇavasena cāyaṃ anusayaṭṭho adhippeto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatīti attho’’^eb^ti.
[03]Vatthuvasenapi pana anusayaṭṭho veditabbo, yo ‘‘bhūmiladdha’’nti vuccati. Tena hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.834) vuttaṃ –

[03]‘‘Bhūmīti vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā. Bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma tesu khandhesu uppattirahaṃ kilesajātaṃ. Tena hi sā bhūmiladdhā nāma hoti, tasmā bhūmiladdhanti vuccati, sā ca kho na ārammaṇavasena. Ārammaṇavasena hi sabbepi atītānāgate pariññātepi ca khīṇāsavānaṃ khandhe ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti mahākaccānauppalavaṇṇādīnaṃ khandhe ārabbha soreyyaseṭṭhinandamāṇavakādīnaṃ viya. Yadi ca taṃ bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma siyā, tassa appaheyyato na koci bhavamūlaṃ pajaheyya, vatthuvasena pana bhūmiladdhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yattha yattha hi vipassanāya apariññātā khandhā uppajjanti, tattha tattha uppādato pabhuti tesu vaṭṭamūlaṃ kilesajātaṃ anuseti. Taṃ appahīnaṭṭhena bhūmiladdhanti veditabba’’ntiādi.

[03]^b^Esa nayo sabbatthā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘na sabbāya dukkhāya vedanāya so appahīno, na sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatī’’tiādiṃ atidisati. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Yo anusayo yattha anuseti ^a^M2.0288^ea^, so pahīyamāno tattha pahīno nāma hotī’’ti tattha tattha pahānapucchā, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ pahātabbanti ayaṃ pahānapucchā nāmā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ekeneva byākaraṇenā^eb^ti ‘‘idhāvuso, visākha, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.374) ekeneva vissajjanena. ^b^Dve pucchā^eb^ti anusayapucchā pahānapucchāti dvepi pucchā vissajjesi. ‘‘Rāgaṃ tena pajahatī’’ti idamekaṃ vissajjanaṃ, ‘‘na tattha rāgānusayo anusetī’’ti idamekaṃ vissajjanaṃ, pucchānukkamañcettha anādiyitvā pahānakkamena vissajjanā pavattā ^a^V2.0266^ea^. ^b^‘‘Dve pucchā vissajjesī’’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘idhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^tathāvikkhambhitameva katvā^eb^ti iminā yo rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā puna uppajjituṃ appadānato tathāvikkhambhitameva katvā maggena samugghāteti, tassa vasena ‘‘rāgaṃ tena pajahati, na tattha rāgānusayo anusetī’’ti vattabbanti dasseti. Kāmoghādīhi catūhi oghehi saṃsārabhavogheneva vā vegasā vuyhamānesu sattesu taṃ uttaritvā pattabbaṃ, tassa pana gādhabhāvato ^b^patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ^eb^. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.238; itivu. 69; pu. pa. 187).

[03]Suññatādibhedena anekabhedattā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘anuttaresū’’ti bahuvacananiddesoti ^b^‘‘anuttarā vimokkhā’’^eb^ti vatvā puna tesaṃ sabbesampi arahattabhāvasāmaññena ^b^‘‘arahatte’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Visaye cetaṃ bhummaṃ. ^b^Patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassā^eb^ti ‘‘aho vatāhaṃ arahattaṃ labheyya’’nti patthanaṃ upaṭṭhapentassa, patthentassāti attho. ^b^Paṭṭhapentassā^eb^ti cettha hetumhi ^b^anta^eb^saddo. Kathaṃ pana arahattavisayā patthanā uppajjatīti? Na kāci arahattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā patthanā uppajjati anadhigatattā avisayabhāvato. Parikappitarūpaṃ pana taṃ uddissa patthanā uppajjati. ^b^‘‘Uppajjati pihāpaccayā’’ti vuttaṃ^eb^ paramparapaccayataṃ sandhāya, ujukaṃ pana paccayabhāvo natthīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ uppajjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Idaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ domanassaṃ^eb^ akusalappahānassa kusalābhivuḍḍhiyā ca nimittabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘domanassampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.359-362). Tīhi māsehi sampajjanakā ^b^temāsikā^eb^^a^M2.0289^ea^. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Imasmiṃ vāre^eb^ti imasmiṃ pavāraṇavāre. ^b^Visuddhipavāraṇa^eb^nti ‘‘parisuddho aha’’nti evaṃ pavattaṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ. Arahantānameva hesa pavāraṇā.

[03]Na kadāci pahātabbassa pahāyakatā atthīti dassento ^b^‘‘na domanassena vā’’^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā pariyāyenetaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato vitthārena āgamissati. ^b^Paṭipadaṃ gahetvā^eb^ patthanaṃ katvā patthanaṃ ṭhapetvā. ^b^Paṭisañcikkhatī^eb^ti ovādavasena attānaṃ samuttejento katheti. ^b^Sīlena hīnaṭṭhāna^eb^nti aññehi arahattāya paṭipajjantehi sīlena hīnaṭṭhānaṃ kiṃ tuyhaṃ atthīti adhippāyo. ^b^Suparisuddha^eb^nti akhaṇḍādibhāvato sudhotajātimaṇi viya suṭṭhu parisuddhaṃ. ^b^Supaggahita^eb^nti kadācipi saṅkocābhāvato vīriyaṃ suṭṭhu paggahitaṃ. ^b^Paññā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññā paṭipakkhehi anadhibhūtatāya akuṇṭhā tikkhavisadā saṅkhārānaṃ sammasane ^b^sūrā hutvā vahati^eb^ pavattati. ^b^Pariyāyenā^eb^ti tassa domanassassa ^a^V2.0267^ea^ arahattupanissayatāpariyāyena. Ārammaṇavasena anusayanaṃ idhādhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘na taṃ ārabbha uppajjatī’’^eb^ti. Anuppajjanamettha pahānaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pahīnova tattha paṭighānusayoti attho’’^eb^ti. Tatiyajjhānena vikkhambhetabbā avijjā, sā eva ariyamaggena samucchindīyatīti ^b^‘‘avijjānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, anusayasadisatāya vā. ‘‘Rāgānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā’’ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Catutthajjhāne nānuseti nāma^eb^ tattha kātabbakiccākaraṇato.

[03]^b^466^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmā^eb^ti paccanīkattā sabhāvato kiccato paccayato cāti adhippāyo. ^b^Visabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito^eb^ ‘‘kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Andhakārā^eb^ti andhakārasadisā appakā sabhāvato. ^b^Avibhūtā^eb^ apākaṭā anoḷārikabhāvato. Tato eva ^b^duddīpanā^eb^ duviññāpanā. ^b^Tādisāvā^eb^ti upekkhāsadisāva. Yathā upekkhā sukhadukkhāni viya na oḷārikā, evaṃ avijjā rāgadosā viya na oḷārikā. Atha kho andhakārā avibhūtā duddīpanā duviññāpanāti attho. ^b^Sabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito^eb^ ‘‘paṇidhi paṭighoso’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Yattakesu ṭhānesū^eb^ti dukkhādīsu yattakesu ṭhānesu, yattha vā ñeyyaṭṭhānesu. ^b^Visabhāgapaṭibhāgo^eb^ti andhakārassa ^a^M2.0290^ea^ viya āloko vighātakapaṭibhāgo. ^b^Vijjā^eb^ti maggañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, ^b^vimuttī^eb^ti phalanti āha ^b^‘‘ubhopete dhammā anāsavā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anāsavaṭṭhenā^eb^tiādīsu paṇītaṭṭhenātipi vattabbaṃ. Sopi hi vimuttinibbānānaṃ sādhāraṇo, vimuttiyā asaṅkhataṭṭhena nibbānassa visabhāgatāpi labbhateva. ^b^Pañhaṃ atikkamitvā gatosi,^eb^ apucchitabbaṃ pucchantoti adhippāyo. ^b^Pañhānaṃ paricchedapamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ^eb^ yuttaṭṭhāne aṭṭhatvā tato paraṃ pucchanto ^b^nāsakkhi^eb^ pañhānaṃ pariyantaṃ gahetuṃ. ^b^Appaṭibhāgadhammassā^eb^ti nippariyāyato sabhāgapaṭibhāgena appaṭibhāgadhammassa. Anāgatādipariyāyena nibbānassa sabhāgapaṭibhāgo vutto, visabhāge ca attheva saṅkhatadhammā, tasmā nippariyāyato kiñci sabhāgapaṭibhāgaṃ sandhāya pucchatīti katvā ^b^‘‘accayāsī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Asaṅkhatassa hi appatiṭṭhassa ekantaniccassa sato nibbānassa kuto nippariyāyena sabhāgassa sambhavo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbānaṃ nāmeta’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Viraddho^eb^ti ettha sabhāgapaṭibhāgaṃ pucchissāmīti nicchayābhāvato pucchitamatthaṃ virajjhitvāva pucchi, na ajānitvāti attho. Etena heṭṭhā sabbapucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandananayena jānitvāva pavattāti dīpitaṃ hoti. Therī pana taṃ taṃ pucchitamatthaṃ sabhāvato vibhāventī satthu desanāñāṇaṃ anugantvāva vissajjesi. ^b^Nibbānogadha^eb^nti nibbānaṃ ogāhitvā ṭhitaṃ nibbānantogadhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbānabbhantaraṃ nibbānaṃ anupaviṭṭha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti brahmacariyassa.

[03]^b^467^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṇḍiccena^eb^^a^V2.0268^ea^^b^samannāgatā^eb^ti ettha vuttapaṇḍiccaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dhātukusalā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – ‘‘kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito hoti? Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hoti, āyatanakusalo ca paṭiccasamuppādakusalo ca ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo ca. Ettāvatā nu kho, ānanda, bhikkhu paṇḍito hotī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.124). ^b^Paññāmahattaṃ^eb^ nāma theriyā asekkhappaṭisambhidappattāya paṭisambhidāyo pūretvā ṭhitatāti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘mahante atthe’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Rājayuttehī^eb^ti rañño kamme niyuttapurisehi. ^b^Āhaccavacanenā^eb^ti satthārā karaṇādīni āhanitvā pavattitavacanena. Yadettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
[06]Cūḷavedallasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^468^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhammoti^eb^^a^M2.0291^ea^^a^V2.0269^ea^^b^gahitagahaṇānī^eb^ti dhammo vā hotu itaro vā, dhammoti paggahitaggāhappavattā cariyāva. ^b^Āyūhanakkhaṇe^eb^ti tassa dhammoti gahitassa pavattanakkhaṇe. ^b^Sukha^eb^nti akicchaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sukara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dukkhavipāka^eb^nti aniṭṭhaphalavipaccanaṃ.

[03]^b^469^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ, evaṃ manasopi. Te ca visayā iṭṭhākārato gahaṇe na koci doso, purisattabhāve na ca te dosaṃ pavattentīti ayaṃ tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhīti āha ^b^‘‘vatthukāmesupi kilesakāmesupi doso natthī’’^eb^ti, assādetvā visayaparibhoge natthi ādīnavo, tappaccayā na koci antarāyoti adhippāyo. ^b^Pātabyataṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti paribhuñjanakataṃ upagacchanti. Paribhogattho hi ayaṃ ^b^pā^eb^-saddo kattusādhano ca ^b^tabya^eb^-saddo, yathāruci paribhuñjantīti attho. Kilesakāmopi assādiyamāno vatthukāmantogadhoyeva, kilesakāmavasena pana nesaṃ assādetabbatāti āha ^b^‘‘vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena pātabyata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kilesakāmenā^eb^ti karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Pātabyataṃ paribhuñjitabbata^eb^nti etthāpi kattuvaseneva attho veditabbo. ^b^Moḷiṃ katvā^eb^ti veṇibandhavasena moḷiṃ katvā. ^b^Tāpasaparibbājikāhī^eb^ti tāpasapabbajjūpagatāhi. ^b^Pariññaṃ paññapentī^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘pahānamāhaṃsū’’ti padasseva vevacananti ^b^‘‘pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapentī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tena kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammāti yāthāvato parijānanaṃ idha ‘‘pahāna’’nti adhippetaṃ, na vinābhāvamattanti dasseti. ^b^Māluvāsipāṭikā^eb^ti māluvāvidalaṃ māluvāphale poṭṭalikā. ^b^Santāsaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti sāle adhivatthadevatāya pavattiṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Tadā hi tassā evaṃ hoti. ^b^Koviḷārapattasadisehī^eb^ti mahākoviḷārapattasaṇṭhānehi. Saṇṭhānavasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ, māluvāpattā pana koviḷārapattehi mahantatarāni ceva ghanatarāni ca honti. Vipulabahughanagarupattatāya ^b^mahantaṃ bhāraṃ janetvā. Sāti^eb^ māluvālatā. ^b^Oghana^eb^nti heṭṭhato olambanahetubhūtaṃ ghanabhāvaṃ.

[03]^b^Andhavanasubhagavana^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0292^ea^ tesaṃ abhilakkhitabhāvato. ^b^Nāḷikerādīsu^eb^ tiṇajātīsu. Khādanupalakkhaṇaṃ upacikānaṃ uṭṭhahanaggahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘uṭṭhaheyyu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Keḷiṃ karontī viyā^eb^ti vilambananadī ^a^V2.0270^ea^ viya keḷiṃ karontī. Idāni ahaṃ taṃ ajjhottharinti pamodamānā viya ito cito ca vipphandamānā ^b^vilambantī. Samphassopi sukho^eb^ mudutaluṇakomalabhāvato. ^b^Dassanampi sukhaṃ^eb^ ghanabahalapattasaṃhatatāya. ^b^Somanassajātā^eb^ti pubbe anussavavasena bhavanavināsabhayā santāsaṃ āpajji, idāni tassā sampattidassanena palobhitā somanassajātā ahosi.

[03]^b^Viṭabhiṃ kareyyā^eb^ti ātānavitānavasena jaṭentī jālaṃ kareyya. Tathābhūtā ca ghanapattasañchannatāya chattasadisī hotīti āha ^b^‘‘chattākārena tiṭṭheyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakalaṃ rukkha^eb^nti upari sabbasākhāpasākhaṃ sabbarukkhaṃ. ^b^Bhassamānā^eb^ti paliveṭhanavaseneva otaramānā. ^b^Yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhī^eb^ti māluvā bhārena onamitvā rukkhassa yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhi puna abhiruhamānā. ^b^Sabbasākhā^eb^ti heṭṭhā majjhe upari cāti sabbāpi sākhāyo paliveṭhentī. ^b^Saṃsibbitvā^eb^ jālasantānakaniyāmena jaṭetvā. Evaṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsibbanena ^b^ajjhottharantī. Sabbasākhā heṭṭhā katvā sayaṃ upari ṭhatvā^eb^ mahābhārabhāvena ^b^vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante padāleyya. Sākhaṭṭhakavimāna^eb^nti sākhāpaṭibaddhaṃ vimānaṃ. Yasmā idha satthārā ‘‘seyyathāpi, bhikkhave’’tiādinā bhūtapubbameva vatthu upamābhāvena āhaṭaṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘idaṃ pana vimāna’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^471^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bahalarāgasabhāvo^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇāhi nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya balavā hutvā abhibhavanarāgadhātuko. ^b^Rāgaja^eb^nti rāganimittajātaṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhe diṭṭhe ārammaṇe^eb^ti diṭṭhe diṭṭhe visabhāgārammaṇe. ^b^Nimittaṃ gaṇhātī^eb^ti kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ anubyañjanaso nimittaṃ gaṇhāti, sikkhāgāravena pana kilesehi nissitaṃ maggaṃ na paṭipajjati, tato eva ācariyupajjhāyehi āṇattaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ karoteva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na tveva vītikkamaṃ karotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Hatthaparāmāsādīnī^eb^ti – ‘‘ehi tāva tayā vuttaṃ mayā vuttañca amutra gantvā vīmaṃsissāmā’’tiādinā hatthaggahaṇādīni karonto, na karuṇāmettānidānavasena. ^b^Mohajātiko^eb^ti bahalamohasabhāvo.

[03]^b^472^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammaniyāmenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0293^ea^ purimajātisiddhena lobhussadatādiniyamitena kammaniyāmena. Idāni taṃ lobhussadatādiṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassa hī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^kammāyūhanakkhaṇe^eb^ti kammakaraṇavelāya. ^b^Lobho balavā^eb^ti tajjāya sāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato lobho adhiko ^a^V2.0271^ea^ hoti. ^b^Alobho mando^eb^ti tappaṭipakkho alobho dubbalo hoti. Kathaṃ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattanti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ‘‘ekakkhaṇe pavattantī’’ti, nikantikkhaṇaṃ pana āyūhanakkhaṇameva katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesu. ^b^Pariyādātu^eb^nti abhibhavituṃ na sakkoti. Yo hi ‘‘evaṃsundaraṃ evaṃvipulaṃ evaṃmahagghañca na sakkā parassa dātu’’ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena pavattāya cetanāya sampayutto alobho sammadeva lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. Dosamohānaṃ anuppattiyaṃ tādisapaccayalābheneva ^b^adosāmohā balavanto. Tasmā^eb^ti lobhādosāmohānaṃ balavabhāvato alobhadosamohānañca dubbalabhāvatoti vuttameva kāraṇaṃ paccāmasati. ^b^So^eb^ti taṃsamaṅgī. ^b^Tena kammenā^eb^ti tena lobhādiupanissayavatā kusalakammunā. ^b^Sukhasīlo^eb^ti sakhilo. Tamevatthaṃ ^b^akkodhano^eb^ti pariyāyena vadati.

[03]^b^Mandā alobhādosā^eb^ lobhadose pariyādātuṃ na sakkonti, ^b^amoho pana balavā^eb^ mohaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkotīti evaṃ yathārahaṃ paṭhamavāre vuttanayeneva atidesattho veditabbo. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti pubbe vuttanayānusārena. ^b^Duṭṭho^eb^ti kodhano. ^b^Dandho^eb^ti mandamañño. ^b^Sukhasīlako^eb^ti sukhasīlo.

[03]Ettha ca lobhavasena, dosamoha-lobhadosa-lobhamoha-dosamoha-lobhadosamohavasenāti tayo ekakā, tayo dukā, eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkhe eva satta vārā, tathā kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti. Tattha alobhadosamohā, alobhādosamohā, alobhadosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti. Tathā ^a^M2.0294^ea^ akusalapakkhe lobhādosāmohā, lobhadosāmohā, lobhādosamohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadāmohussadādosāmohussadavārā gahitā evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā. Ye pana ubhayasammissatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā kāmaṃ dassetabbā, tesaṃ asambhavato eva na dassitā. Na hi ‘‘ekasmiṃ santāne antarena avatthantaraṃ lobho ca balavā alobho cā’’tiādi yujjati. Paṭipakkhavasena vāpi etesaṃ balavadubbalabhāvo sahajātadhammavasena ^a^V2.0272^ea^ vā. Tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena anabhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo, tathā dosamohānaṃ adosāmohehi. Alobhādīnaṃ pana lobhādianabhibhavanato. Sabbesañca samānajātiyasamadhibhuyya pavattivasena sahajātadhammato balavabhāvo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.472) – ‘‘lobho balavā, alobho mando. Adosāmohā balavanto, dosamohā mandā’’tiādi, so ca nesaṃ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kammaniyāmenā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Cūḷadhammasamādānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^473^eb^^b^.^eb^ Evaṃ ^a^V2.0273^ea^ idāni vuccamānākāro kāmo kāmanaṃ icchā etesanti ^b^evaṃkāmā^eb^. Evaṃ chando chandanaṃ rocanaṃ ajjhāsayo etesanti ^b^evaṃchandā^eb^. Abhimukhaṃ, abhinivissa vā pakārehi eti upagacchatīti adhippāyo, laddhi. Sā hi laddhabbavatthuṃ abhimukhaṃ ‘‘evameta’’nti abhinivisantī tena tena pakārena upagacchati, hatthagataṃ katvā tiṭṭhati na vissajjeti. Evaṃ vuccamānākāro adhippāyo etesanti ^b^evaṃadhippāyā^eb^. Bhagavā mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ etesaṃ yāthāvato adhigamāyāti ^b^bhagavaṃmūlakā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Amhākaṃ^eb^^b^dhammā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0295^ea^ tehi attanā adhigantabbatāya vuttaṃ. Sevitabbānañhi yāthāvato adhigamañāṇāni adhigacchanakasambandhīni, tāni ca sammāsambuddhamūlakāni anaññavisayattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pubbe kassapasambuddhenā’’^eb^tiādi. Bhagavā netā tesanti ^b^bhagavaṃnettikā. Netā^eb^ti sevitabbadhamme vineyyasantānaṃ pāpetā. ^b^Vinetā^eb^ti asevitabbadhamme vineyyasantānato apanetā. Tadaṅgavinayādivasena vā ^b^vinetā. Anunetā^eb^ti ime dhammā sevitabbā, ime na sevitabbāti ubhayasampāpanāpanayanatthaṃ paññapetā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathāsabhāvato’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Paṭisaranti etthāti paṭisaraṇaṃ, bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti ^b^bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā^eb^. Paṭisarati sabhāvasampaṭivedhavasena paccekamupagacchatīti vā paṭisaraṇaṃ, bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti ^b^bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Paṭivedhavasenā^eb^ti paṭivijjhitabbatāvasena. Asatipi mukhe atthato evaṃ vadanto viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘phasso āgacchati, ahaṃ bhagavā kiṃ nāmo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭibhātū^eb^ti ettha paṭi-saddāpekkhāya ‘‘bhagavanta’’nti upayogavacanaṃ, attho pana sāmivacanavaseneva veditabboti dassento āha ^b^‘‘bhagavato’’^eb^ti ^b^paṭibhātū^eb^ti ca bhagavato bhāgo hotu. Bhagavato hi esa bhāgo, yadidaṃ dhammassa desanā, amhākaṃ pana bhāgo savananti adhippāyo. Keci pana ^b^paṭibhātū^eb^ti padissatūti atthaṃ vadanti, ñāṇena dissatu, desīyatūti vā attho. ^b^Upaṭṭhātū^eb^ti ca ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhātu.

[03]^b^474^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nissayitabbe^eb^ti ^a^V2.0274^ea^ attano santāne uppādanavasena apassayitabbe. Tatiyacatutthadhammasamādānāni hi apassāya sattānaṃ etarahi āyatiñca sampattiyo abhivaḍḍhanti. ^b^Bhajitabbe^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Sevitabbe^eb^ti vā sappurisupassayasaddhammassavanayonisomanasikāre sandhāyāha. ^b^Bhajitabbe^eb^ti tappaccaye dānādipuññadhamme.

[03]^b^475^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uppaṭipāṭiākārenā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ saṃkilesadhamme dassetvā pacchā vodānadhammadassanaṃ satthu desanāpaṭipāṭi, yathā – ‘‘vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā’’ti (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 498; visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.14), tathā uppaṭipāṭipakārena, sā ca kho purimesu dvīsu dhammasamādānesu ^a^M2.0296^ea^, pacchimesu pana paṭipāṭiyāva mātikā paṭṭhapitā. ^b^Yathādhammarasenevā^eb^ti pahātabbapahāyakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāveneva. Sabhāvo hi yāthāvato rasitabbato jānitabbato ‘‘raso’’ti vuccati. Paṭhamaṃ pahātabbadhamme dassetvā tadanantaraṃ ‘‘ime dhammā etehi pahīyantī’’ti pahāyakadhammadassanaṃ desanānupubbī. ^b^Gahaṇaṃ^eb^ ādiyanaṃ attano santāne uppādanaṃ.

[03]^b^478^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vadhadaṇḍādīhi bhītassa upasaṅkamane, micchā caritvā tathā apagamane ca pubbāparacetanānaṃ vasena micchācāro dukkhavedano hoti, tathā issānindādīhi upaddutassa aparacetanāvasena, evaṃ abhijjhāmicchādiṭṭhīsupi yathārahaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tissannampi cetanāna^eb^nti pubbāparasanniṭṭhāpakacetanānaṃ. Adinnādānaṃ musāvādo pisuṇavācā samphappalāpoti imesaṃ catunnaṃ sanniṭṭhāpakacetanānaṃ sukhasampayuttā vā upekkhāsampayuttā vāti ayaṃ nayo idha adhikatattā na uddhaṭo. ^b^Domanassameva cettha dukkha^eb^nti idaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgacetanāpi cettha āsannā domanassasahagatā eva hontīti katvā vuttaṃ. Anāsannā pana sandhāya ^b^‘‘pariyeṭṭhiṃ vā āpajjantassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Teneva micchācārābhijjhāmicchādiṭṭhīnaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgacetanā āsannā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāgatikāvāti dassitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Pariyeṭṭhi^eb^nti micchācārādīsu vītikkamitabbavatthumālāgandhādipariyesanaṃ. Pāṇātipātādīsu māretabbavatthuāvudhādipariyesanaṃ ^b^āpajjantassa^eb^. Akicchenapi tesaṃ pariyesanaṃ sambhavatīti ^b^‘‘vaṭṭatiyevā’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.

[03]^b^479^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukhavedanā hontī^eb^ti sukhavedanāpi hontīti adhippāyo. Tāsaṃ cetanānaṃ asukhavedanatāpi labbhatīti ^b^‘‘sukhavedanāpi hontiyevā’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkavacanaṃ. ^b^Somanassameva cettha sukha^eb^nti idaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgacetanāpi somanassasahagatā eva hontīti katvā vuttaṃ. Tañca kho ^a^V2.0275^ea^ micchācāravajjānaṃ channaṃ vasena. Micchācārassa pana pubbāparabhāgassa vasena ^b^‘‘kāyikaṃ sukhampi vaṭṭatiyevā^eb^ti sāsaṅkavacanaṃ.

[03]^b^480^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dosajapariḷāhavasenassa siyā kāyikampi dukkhanti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘so gaṇhantopi dukkhito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Cetodukkhameva vā sandhāya tassa aparāparuppattidassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘dukkhito domanassito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^481^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dasasupi^eb^^a^M2.0297^ea^^b^padesū^eb^ti dasasupi koṭṭhāsesu, vākyesu vā. Upekkhāsampayuttatāpi sambhavatīti ^b^‘‘sukhasampayuttā hontiyevā’’^eb^ti idha sāsaṅkavacanaṃ. Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa kāyopi siyā vigatadarathapariḷāhoti pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādipaccayā kāyikapaṭisaṃvedanāpi sambhavatīti ^b^sahāpi sukhenā^eb^ti ettha kāyiyasukhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
[03]^b^482^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tittakālābū^eb^ti upabhuttassa ummādādipāpanena kucchitatittakaraso alābu. ^b^Na ruccissati^eb^ aniṭṭharasatāya aniṭṭhaphalatāya ca.
[03]^b^483^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rasaṃ detī^eb^ti rasaṃ dasseti vibhāveti.

[03]^b^484^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pūtimutta^eb^nti pūtisabhāvamuttaṃ. ^b^Taruṇa^eb^nti dhārāvasena nipatantaṃ hutvā uṇhaṃ. Tenassa uparimuttatamāha. Muttañhi passāvamaggato muccamānaṃ kāyusmāvasena uṇhaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^485^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yaṃ bhagandarasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ lohitaṃ pakkhandatī^eb^ti bhagandarabyādhisahitāya lohitapakkhandatāya vasena yaṃ lohitaṃ vissavati. Pittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ lohitaṃ pakkhandatīti ānetvā sambandho.

[03]^b^486^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ubbiddhe^eb^ti dūre. Abbhamahikādiupakkilesavigamena hi ākāsaṃ uttuṅgaṃ viya dūraṃ viya ca khāyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dūrībhūte’’^eb^ti. Tamaṃyeva ^b^tamagataṃ^eb^ ‘‘gūthagataṃ muttagata’’nti (ma. ni. 2.119; a. ni. 9.11) yathā. ^b^Bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate^eb^ ca idaṃ catutthaṃ dhammasamādānaṃ vibhajantena kusalakammapathassa vibhajitvā dassitattā.

[03]Saṅgararukkho ^a^V2.0276^ea^ kandamādasapova. ^b^Sarabhaññavasenā^eb^ti atthaṃ avibhajitvā padaso sarabhaññavasena. ^b^Osārentassā^eb^ti uccārentassa. ^b^Sadde^eb^ti osāraṇasadde. Adhigatavisesaṃ anārocetukāmā ^b^devatā tattheva antaradhāyi. Taṃ divasa^eb^nti satthārā desitadivase. Iti attano visesādhigamanimittatāya ayaṃ devatā imaṃ suttaṃ piyāyati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Mahādhammasamādānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^487^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atthavīmaṃsako^eb^ti ^a^M2.0298^ea^^a^V2.0277^ea^ attatthaparatthādiatthavijānanako. ^b^Saṅkhāravīmaṃsako^eb^ti saṅkhatadhamme salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato vā āyatanādivibhāgato ca vīmaṃsako. ^b^Satthuvīmaṃsako^eb^ti ‘‘satthā nāma guṇato ediso ediso cā’’ti satthu upaparikkhako. ^b^Vīmaṃsako^eb^ti vicārako. Yaṃ cetaso sarāgādivibhāgato paricchindanaṃ, taṃ ^b^cetopariyāyo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittapariccheda’’^eb^nti. Yasmā cetopariyāyañāṇalābhī – ‘‘idaṃ cittaṃ ito paraṃ pavattaṃ idamito para’’nti parassa cittuppattiṃ pajānāti, tasmā vuttaṃ ‘‘^b^cetopariyāyanti cittavāra’’^eb^nti. Vāratthepi hi ^b^pariyāya^eb^-saddo hoti – ‘‘kassa nu kho, ānanda, pariyāyo ajja bhikkhuniyo ovaditu’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.398). Cittacārantipi pāṭho, cittapavattinti attho. ^b^Evaṃ vijānanatthāyā^eb^ti idāni vuccamānākārena vīmaṃsanatthāya.

[03]^b^488^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kalyāṇamittūpanissaya^eb^nti kalyāṇamittasaṅkhātaṃ brahmacariyavāsassa balavasannissayaṃ. ^b^Upaḍḍhaṃ attano ānubhāvenā^eb^ti iminā puggalena sampādiyamānassa brahmacariyassa upaḍḍhabhāgamattaṃ attano vimuttiparipācakadhammānubhāvena sijjhati. ^b^Upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittānubhāvenā^eb^ti itaro pana upaḍḍhabhāgo yaṃ nissāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati, tassa kalyāṇamittassa upadesānubhāvena ^b^hoti,^eb^ sijjhatīti attho. Lokasiddho eva ayamattho. Lokiyā hi –
[21]‘‘Pādo siddho ācariyā, pādo hissānubhāvato;
[22]Taṃvijjāsevakā pādo, pādo kālena paccatī’’ti. –

[07]Vadanti. ^b^Attano dhammatāyā^eb^ti attano sabhāvena, ñāṇenāti attho. ^b^Kalyāṇamittatā^eb^ti kalyāṇo bhadro sundaro mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto, tassa bhāvo ^b^kalyāṇamittatā,^eb^ kalyāṇamittavantatā. Sīlādiguṇasampannehi kalyāṇapuggaleheva ayanaṃ pavatti ^b^kalyāṇasahāyatā^eb^. Tesu eva cittena ceva kāyena ca ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena pavatti ^b^kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā. Māheva^eb^nti evaṃ mā āha, ‘‘upaḍḍhaṃ brahmacariyassā’’ti mā kathehīti attho. ^b^Tadaminā^eb^ti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ ^a^M2.0299^ea^ da-kāro padasandhikaro i-kārassa a-kāraṃ katvā niddeso. ^b^Imināpī^eb^ti idāni vuccamānenapīti ^a^V2.0278^ea^ attho. ^b^Pariyāyenā^eb^ti kāraṇena. Idāni taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘mamaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Yathā cettha, aññesupi suttesu kalyāṇamittupanissayameva visesoti dassento ^b^‘‘bhikkhūnaṃ bāhiraṅgasampattiṃ kathentopī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^vimuttiparipācaniyadhamme^eb^ti vimuttiyā arahattassa paripācakadhamme. ^b^Paccaye^eb^ti gilānapaccayabhesajje. ^b^Mahājacco^eb^ti mahākulīno.

[03]^b^Kāyiko samācāro^eb^ti abhikkamapaṭikkamādiko satisampajaññaparikkhato pākatiko ca. ^b^Vīmaṃsakassa^eb^ upaparikkhakassa. ^b^Cakkhuviññeyyo nāma^eb^ cakkhudvārānusārena viññātabbattā. ^b^Sotaviññeyyo^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Saṃkiliṭṭhā^eb^ti rāgādisaṃkilesadhammehi vibādhitā, upatāpitā vidūsitā malīnā cāti attho. Te pana tehi samannāgatā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘kilesasampayuttā’’^eb^ti. Yadi na cakkhusotaviññeyyā, pāḷiyaṃ kathaṃ tathā vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘yathā panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kāyavacīsamācārāpi^eb^^b^saṃkiliṭṭhāyeva nāma^eb^ saṃkiliṭṭhacittasamuṭṭhānato. Bhavati hi taṃhetukepi tadupacāro yathā ‘‘semho guḷo’’ti. ‘‘Mā me idaṃ asāruppaṃ paro aññāsī’’ti pana ^b^paṭicchannatāya na na upalabbhanti. ‘‘Na kho mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato kiñci garahāmā’’^eb^ti vatvā garahitabbābhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘bhagavā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Abhāvitamaggassa hi garahitabbatā nāma siyā, na bhāvitamaggassa. ^b^Esa^eb^ uttaro māṇavo ‘‘buddhampi garahitvā pakkamissāmī’’ti katvā anubandhi. ^b^Evaṃ cintesi^eb^ mahābhinikkhamanadivase attano vacane aṭṭhitattā. ^b^Kiñci vajjaṃ apassanto^eb^ māro evamāha –
[21]‘‘Satta vassāni bhagavantaṃ, anubandhiṃ padāpadaṃ;
[22]Otāraṃ nādhigacchissaṃ, sambuddhassa satīmato’’ti. (su. ni. 448);

[03]^b^Kāle kaṇhā, kāle sukkā^eb^ti yathāsamādinnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ parisuddhaṃ katvā pavattetuṃ asakkontassa kadāci kaṇhā aparisuddhā kāyasamācārādayo, kadāci sukkā parisuddhāti evaṃ antarantarā byāmissavasena ^a^M2.0300^ea^^b^vomissakā. Nikkilesā^eb^ti nirupakkilesā anupakkiliṭṭhā.

[03]^b^Anavajjaṃ^eb^ vajjarahitattā. ^b^Dīgharatta^eb^nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Samāpanno^eb^ti sammā āpanno samaṅgībhūto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samannāgato’’^eb^ti. Attanā katassa asāruppassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ ^b^āraññako^eb^^a^V2.0279^ea^^b^viya hutvā. Tassa parihāra^eb^nti uḷārehi pūjāsakkārehi manussehi tassa parihariyamānataṃ. ^b^Atidappito^eb^ti evaṃ manussānaṃ sambhāvanāya ativiya datto gabbito.

[03]^b^Na ittarasamāpannoti jānāti^eb^. Kasmā? Sīlaṃ nāma dīghena addhunā jānitabbaṃ, na ittarena. Idāni anekajātisamudācāravasena tathāgato imaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ dīgharattaṃ samāpanno, tañcassa ativiya acchariyanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anacchariyaṃ ceta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Araññagāmake^eb^ti araññapadese ekasmiṃ khuddakagāme. Tattha nesaṃ divase divase piṇḍāya caraṇassa avicchinnataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘piṇḍāya carantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pivantī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Dullabhaloṇo hoti^eb^ samuddassa dūratāya.

[03]Tadā kira videharaṭṭhe soḷasa gāmasahassāni mahantāneva. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘hitvā gāmasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni soḷasā’’^eb^ti. Idāni kasmā ^b^‘‘sannidhiṃ dāni kubbasī’’^eb^ti maṃ ghaṭṭethāti vatthukāmo taṃ anāvikatvā ^b^‘‘loṇa…pe… na karothā’’^eb^ti āha. Gandhāro tassādhippāyaṃ vibhāvetukāmo ^b^‘‘kiṃ mayā kataṃ vedehīsī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Itaro attano adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘hitvā’’^eb^ti gāthamāha. Itaro ^b^‘‘dhammaṃ bhaṇāmī’’^eb^ti gāthanti evaṃ sabbāpi nesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanagāthā. Tattha ^b^pasāsasī^eb^ti ghaṭṭento viya anusāsasi. ^b^Na pāpamupalimpati^eb^ cittappakopābhāvato. ^b^Mahatthiya^eb^nti mahāatthasaṃhitaṃ. ^b^No ce assa sakā buddhī^eb^tiādi vedehaisino – ‘‘ācariyo mama hitesitāya ṭhatvā dhammaṃ eva bhaṇatī’’ti yoniso ummujjanākāradassanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evañca pana vatvā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]‘‘Ñattā’’ti loke ñāyati vissutoti ñāto, ñātassa bhāvo ^b^ñattaṃ. Ajjhāpanno^eb^ti upagato. Ñatta-ggahaṇena patthaṭayasatā vibhāvitāti ^a^M2.0301^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘yasañca parivārasampatti’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ki^eb^nti kiṃpayojanaṃ, ko ettha dosoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Tattha tattha vijjhanto^eb^ti yasamadena parivāramadena ca matto hutvā gāmepi vihārepi janavivittepi saṅghamajjhepi aññe bhikkhū ghaṭṭento ‘‘mayhaṃ nāma pādā itaresaṃ pādaphusanaṭṭhānaṃ phusantī’’ti aphusitukāmatāya aggapādena bhūmiṃ phusanto viya carati. ^b^Onamatī^eb^ti nivātavuttitāya avanamati anuddhato atthaddho hoti. ^b^Akiñcanabhāva^eb^nti ‘‘pabbajitena nāma akiñcanañāṇena ^a^V2.0280^ea^ samapariggahena bhavitabba’’nti akiñcanajjhāsayaṃ paṭiavekkhitvā. ^b^Lābhepi tādī, alābhepi tādī^eb^ti yathā alābhakāle lābhassa laddhakālepi tathevāti tādī ekasadiso. ^b^Yase^eb^ satipi mahāparivārakālepi.

[03]^b^Abhayo hutvā uparato^eb^ti nibbhayo hutvā bhayassa abhāveneva oramitabbato uparato bhayahetūnaṃ pahīnattā. Tañca kho na katipayakālaṃ, atha kho accantameva uparatoti ^b^accantūparato^eb^. Atha kho bhāyitabbavatthuṃ avekkhitvā tato ^b^bhayena uparato^eb^. Kilesā eva bhāyitabbato ^b^kilesabhayaṃ^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Satta sekkhā^eb^ti satta sekkhāpi bhayūparatā, pageva puthujjanoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Thaṇḍilapīṭhaka^eb^nti thaṇḍilamañcasadisaṃ pīṭhakanti attho. ^b^Nissāyā^eb^ti apassāya taṃ apassāyaṃ katvā. Dvinnaṃ majjhe thaṇḍilapīṭhakā dvāre ṭhatvā olokentassa nevāsikabhikkhussa na paññāyi. ^b^Asaññatanīhārenā^eb^ti na saññatākārena. ‘‘Maṃ bhāyanto heṭṭhāmañcaṃ paviṭṭho bhavissatī’’ti heṭṭhāmañcaṃ ^b^oloketvā. Ukkāsi^eb^ ‘‘bahi gacchanto akkositvā mā apuññaṃ pasavī’’ti. ^b^Adhivāsetu^eb^nti tādisaṃ iddhānabhāvaṃ disvāpi paṭapaṭāyanto attano kodhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto.

[03]^b^Khayenevā^eb^ti rāgassa accantakkhayeneva vītarāgattā. ^b^Na paṭisaṅkhāya vāretvā^eb^ti na paṭisaṅkhānabalena rāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ nivāretvā vītarāgattā. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ vuttappakārena. Kāyasamācārādīnaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhānaṃ vītikkamiyānañca abhāvaṃ ācārassa vodānaṃ cirakālasamāciṇṇatāya ñātassa sahitabhāvepi anupakkiliṭṭhatāya abhayūparatabhāvasamannesanāya ākarīyati ñāpetuṃ icchito attho pakārato ñāpīyati etehīti ^b^ākārā,^eb^^a^M2.0302^ea^ upapattisādhanakāraṇāni. Tāni pana yasmā attano yathānumatassa atthassa ñāpakabhāvena vavatthīyanti, tasmā tāni tesaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtāni anumānañāṇāni ca dassento bhagavā – ‘‘ke panāyasmato ākārā ke anvayā’’ti avocāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘ākārāti kāraṇāni, anvayāti anubuddhiyo’’^eb^ti āha. Yathā hi loke diṭṭhena dhūmena adiṭṭhaṃ aggiṃ anveti anumānato jānāti, evaṃ vīmaṃsako bhikkhu – ‘‘bhagavā ekekavihāresu suppaṭipannesu duppaṭipannesu ca yathā ekasadisatādassanena abhayūparatataṃ anveti anumānato jānāti, suppaṭipannaduppaṭipannapuggalesu anussādanānapasādanappattāya satthu aviparītadhammadesanatāya sammāsambuddhataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca anveti anumānato jānāti, evaṃ jānanto ca abhayūparato tathāgato sabbadhi vītarāgattā, yo ^a^V2.0281^ea^ yattha vītarāgo, na so tannimittaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ passati seyyathāpi brahmā kāmabhavanimittaṃ, tathā sammāsambuddho bhagavā aviparītadhammadesanattā, svākhāto dhammo ekantaniyyānikattā, suppaṭipanno saṅgho aveccappasannattā’’ti vatthuttayaṃ guṇato yāthāvato jānāti.

[03]^b^Gaṇabandhanenā^eb^ti ‘‘mama saddhivihārikā mama antevāsikā’’ti evaṃ gaṇe apekkhāsaṅkhātena bandhanena baddhā payuttā. ^b^Tāya tāya paṭipattiyā^eb^ti ‘‘sugatā duggatā’’ti vuttāya suppaṭipattiyā duppaṭipattiyā ca. ^b^Ussādanā^eb^ti guṇavasena ukkaṃsanā. ^b^Apasādanā^eb^ti hīḷanā. Ubhayattha ^b^gehassitavasenā^eb^ti iminā sammāpaṭipattiyā paresaṃ uyyojanatthaṃ – ‘‘paṇḍito, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.205; 3.285, 322) guṇato ukkaṃsanampi āyatiṃ saṃvarāya yathāparādhaṃ garahaṇampi na nivāreti.

[03]^b^489^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vīmaṃsakassapi adhippāyo vīmaṃsanavasena pavatto. ^b^Mūlavīmaṃsako^eb^ hetuvāditāya. Gaṇṭhivīmaṃsakassa anussutibhāvato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṅgato’’^eb^ti. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘parassa cetopariyāyaṃ ajānantenā’’ti. ^b^Tathāgatova paṭipucchitabbo^eb^ti iminā pubbe sādhāraṇato vuttaṃ anumānaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā vadati. Ukkaṃsagatañhetaṃ anumānaṃ, yadidaṃ sabbaññuvacanaṃ avisaṃvādaṃ sāmaññato aputhujjanagocarassa ^a^M2.0303^ea^ atthassa anumānato. Tividho hi attho, koci paccakkhasiddho, yo rūpādidhammānaṃ paccattavedaniyo aniddisitabbākāro. Koci anumānasiddho, yo ghaṭādīsu pasiddhena paccayāyattabhāvena sādhiyamāno saddādīnaṃ aniccatādiākāro. Koci okappanasiddho, yo pacurajanassa accantamadiṭṭho saddhāvisayo paralokanibbānādi. Tattha yassa satthuno vacanaṃ paccakkhasiddhe anumānasiddhe ca atthe na visaṃvādeti aviparītappavattiyā, tassa vacanena saddheyyatthasiddhi, saddheyyarūpā eva ca yebhuyyena satthuguṇā accantasambhavato.

[03]^b^Esa mayhaṃ patho^eb^ti yvāyaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlasaṅkhāto mayhaṃ oramattako guṇo, esa aparacittaviduno vīmaṃsakassa bhikkhuno mama jānanapatho jānanamaggo. ^b^Esa gocaro^eb^ti eso ettako eva tassa mayi gocaro, na ito paraṃ. Tathā hi ^b^brahmajālepi^eb^ (dī. ni. 1.7) bhagavatā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlameva niddiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Etāpātho^eb^ti ettakāpātho. Yo sīle patiṭṭhito ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’ti, ‘‘imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’’ti taṇhāya parāmasanto, tassa ^a^V2.0282^ea^ visesabhāgiyatāya, nibbedhabhāgiyatāya vā akāraṇena taṇhaṃ anativattanato so tammayo nāma. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na tammayo na sataṇho’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Sutassa uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena ^b^uttaruttarañceva^eb^ tassa ca visesassa anukkamena paṇītatarabhāvato ^b^paṇītatarañca katvā deseti. Savipakkhanti^eb^ pahātabbapahāyakabhāvena sappaṭipakkhaṃ. ^b^Kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā sukka^eb^nti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ kaṇhaṃ nāma, imassa pahāyakaṃ idaṃ sukkaṃ nāmāti evaṃ kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā sukkaṃ. ^b^Sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇha^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. Idha pana ‘‘iminā pahātabba’’nti vattabbaṃ. ^b^Saussāha^eb^nti sabyāpāraṃ. Kiriyamayacittānañhi anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmānādike santāne sabyāpāratā saussāhatā, savipākadhammatāti attho. ^b^Tasmiṃ desite dhamme^eb^ti tasmiṃ satthārā desite lokiyalokuttaradhamme. ^b^Ekaccaṃ^eb^ ekadesabhūtaṃ maggaphalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^paṭivedhadhammaṃ abhiññāya^eb^ abhivisiṭṭhāya maggapaññāya jānitvā. ^b^Paṭivedhadhammena maggena. Desanādhamme^eb^ti desanāruḷhe pubbabhāgiye bodhipakkhiyadhamme ^b^niṭṭhaṃ gacchati^eb^ – ‘‘addhā imāya ^a^M2.0304^ea^ paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī’’ti. Pubbe pothujjanikasaddhāyapi pasanno, tato ^b^bhiyyosomattāya^eb^ aviparītadhammadesano ^b^sammāsambuddho so bhagavāti satthari pasīdati. Niyyānikattā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhato eva tato niyyānāvahattā. ^b^Vaṅkādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena aññaṃ asāmīcipariyāyaṃ sabbaṃ dosaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^490^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imehi satthuvīmaṃsanakāraṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘parisuddhakāyasamācāratādīhi ceva uttaruttaripaṇītapaṇītāviparītadhammadesanāhi cā’’ti imehi yathāvuttehi satthūpaparikkhanakāraṇehi. ^b^Akkharasampiṇḍanapadehī^eb^ti tesaṃyeva kāraṇānaṃ sambodhanehi akkharasamudāyalakkhaṇehi padehi. ^b^Idha vuttehi akkharehī^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte vuttehi yathāvuttassa atthassa abhibyañjanato byañjanasaññitehi akkharehi. ^b^Okappanā^eb^ti saddheyyavatthuṃ okkantitvā pasīdanato okappanalakkhaṇā. ^b^Saddhāya mūlaṃ nāmā^eb^ti aveccappasādabhūtāya saddhāya mūlaṃ nāma kāraṇanti saddahanassa kāraṇaṃ parisuddhakāyasamācārādikaṃ. ^b^Thirā^eb^ paṭipakkhasamucchedena suppatiṭṭhitattā. ^b^Harituṃ na sakkā^eb^ti apanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā. Itaresu samaṇabrāhmaṇadevesu vattabbameva natthīti āha ^b^‘‘samitapāpasamaṇena vā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]‘‘Buddhānaṃ ^a^V2.0283^ea^ kesañci sāvakānañca vibādhanatthaṃ māro upagacchatī’’ti sutapubbattā ^b^‘‘ayaṃ māro āgato’’^eb^ti cintesi. Ānubhāvasampannena ariyasāvakena pucchitattā ^b^musāvādaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Ete^eb^ti yathāvutte samitapāpasamaṇādayo ṭhapetvā. ^b^Sabhāvasamannesanā^eb^ti yāthāvasamannesanā aviparītavīmaṃsā. ^b^Sabhāvenevā^eb^ti sabbhāveneva yathābhūtaguṇato eva. ^b^Suṭṭhu^eb^ sammadeva. ^b^Samannesito^eb^ti upaparikkhito. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Vīmaṃsakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^491^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0284^ea^ yasmā kosambarukkhavatī, tasmā nagaraṃ kosambītisaṅkhamagamāsi. Kusambassa vā isino nivāsabhūmi kosambī, tassāvidūre bhavattā nagaraṃ ^b^kosambī^eb^.

[03]^b^Ghositaseṭṭhinā^eb^^a^M2.0305^ea^^b^kārite ārāme^eb^ti ettha ko ghositaseṭṭhi, kathañcānena ārāmo kāritoti antolīnāya codanāya vissajjane samudāgamato paṭṭhāya ghositaseṭṭhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘addilaraṭṭhaṃ nāma ahosī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Kedāraparicchinna^eb^nti tattha tattha kedārabhūmiyā paricchinnaṃ. ^b^Gacchanto^eb^ti kedārapāḷiyā gacchanto. ^b^Pahūtapāyasa^eb^nti pahūtataraṃ pāyasaṃ, taṃ pana garu siniddhaṃ antarāmagge appāhāratāya mandagahaṇiko samāno jīrāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto’’^eb^tiādi. Yasavati rūpavati ^b^kulaghare nibbatti. Ghositaseṭṭhi nāma jāto^eb^ti evamettha saṅkhepeneva ghositaseṭṭhivatthuṃ katheti, vitthāro pana ^b^dhammapadavatthumhi^eb^ (dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.sāmāvatīvatthu) vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]^b^Upasaṃkappanavasenā^eb^ti upasaṅkappananiyāmena. ^b^Āhāraparikkhīṇakāyassā^eb^ti āhāranimittaparikkhīṇakāyassa, āhārakkhayena parikkhīṇakāyassāti attho. ^b^Suññāgāre^eb^ti janavivitte phāsukaṭṭhāne.

[03]^b^Kalahassa pubbabhāgo bhaṇḍanaṃ nāmā^eb^ti kalahassa hetubhūtā paribhāsā taṃsadisī ca aniṭṭhakiriyā bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma. ^b^Hatthaparāmāsādivasenā^eb^ti kujjhitvā aññamaññassa hatthe gahetvā parāmasanāccantabandhanādivasena. ‘‘Ayaṃ dhammo’’tiādinā viruddhavādabhūtaṃ āpannāti ^b^vivādāpannā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘viruddhabhūta’’^eb^ntiādi. Mukhasannissitatāya vācā idha ‘‘mukha’’nti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘mukhasattīhīti vācāsattīhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saññatti^eb^nti saññāpanaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo’’ti saññāpetabbataṃ. ^b^Nijjhatti^eb^nti yāthāvato tassa nijjhānaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^‘‘saññattivevacanameveta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sace hoti desessāmī^eb^ti subbacatāya sikkhākāmatāya ca āpattiṃ passi. ^b^Natthi te āpattī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0285^ea^ anāpattipakkhopi ettha sambhavatīti adhippāyenāha. Sā panāpatti eva. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^492^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kalahabhaṇḍanavasenā^eb^ti kalahabhaṇḍanassa nimittavasena. ^b^Yathānusandhināva gata^eb^nti kalahabhaṇḍanānaṃ sāraṇīyadhammapaṭipakkhattā tadupasamāvahā ^a^M2.0306^ea^ heṭṭhādesanāya anurūpāva uparidesanāti yathānusandhināva uparisuttadesanā pavattā. ^b^Saritabbayuttā^eb^ti anussaraṇārahā. ^b^Sabrahmacārīna^eb^nti sahadhammikānaṃ. Piyaṃ piyāyitabbaṃ karontīti ^b^piyakaraṇā^eb^. Garuṃ garuṭṭhāniyaṃ karontīti ^b^garukaraṇā. Saṅgahaṇatthāyā^eb^ti saṅgahavatthuvisesabhāvato sabrahmacārīnaṃ saṅgaṇhanāya saṃvattantīti sambandho. ^b^Avivādanatthāyā^eb^ti saṅgahavatthubhāvato eva na vivādanāya. Sati ca avivādanahetubhūtasaṅgāhaṇatte tesaṃ vasena sabrahmacārīnaṃ samaggabhāvo bhedābhāvo siddhoyevāti āha ^b^‘‘sāmaggiyā’’^eb^tiādi. Mijjati siniyhati etāyāti mettā, mittabhāvo, mettā etassa atthīti ^b^mettaṃ,^eb^ kāyakammaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā mettāsahagatacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mettacittena kattabbaṃ kāyakamma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Imāni^eb^ mettakāyakammādīni ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni^eb^ pāṭhe bhikkhūhi paccupaṭṭhapetabbatāvacanato. ^b^Bhikkhu^eb^ggahaṇeneva cettha sesasahadhammikānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhikkhuno sabbampi anavajjakāyakammaṃ ābhisamācārikakammantogadhamevāti āha – ^b^‘‘mettacittena…pe… kāyakammaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti. Vattavasena pavattiyamānā cetiyabodhīnaṃ vandanā mettāsadisīti katvā tadatthāya gamanaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammanti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena cetiyabodhibhikkhūsu vuttāvasesāpacāyanādiṃ mettāvasena pavattaṃ kāyikaṃ kiriyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ^eb^ kathiyamānanti adhippāyo. ^b^Tīṇi sucaritāni^eb^ kāyavacīmanosucaritāni. ^b^Cintana^eb^nti iminā evaṃ cintanamattampi mettaṃ manokammaṃ, pageva vidhipaṭipannā bhāvanāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ purato. Tesu karontesuyeva hi sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ ^b^sammukhā kāyakammaṃ nāma^eb^ hoti. Kevalaṃ ‘‘devo’’ti avatvā guṇehi thirabhāvajotanaṃ ^b^devatthero^eb^ti vacanaṃ ^b^paggayha vacanaṃ^eb^. Mamattabodhanaṃ vacanaṃ ^b^mamāyanavacanaṃ^eb^. Ekantatirokkhakassa manokammassa sammukhatā nāma viññattisamuṭṭhāpanavaseneva hoti, tañca kho loke kāyakammanti pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ hatthavikārādiṃ anāmasitvā eva ^a^M2.0307^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘nayanāni ummīletvā’’^eb^ti āha. Tathā hi vacībhedavasena pavatti na gahitā.

[03]Laddhapaccayā ^a^V2.0286^ea^ labbhantīti ^b^lābhā,^eb^ parisuddhāgamanā paccayā. Na sammā gayhamānāpi na dhammaladdhā nāma na hontīti tappaṭisedhanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammaladdhā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Deyyaṃ dakkhiṇeyyañca appaṭivibhattaṃ katvā bhuñjatīti ^b^appaṭivibhattabhogī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dve paṭivibhattāni nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cittena vibhajana^eb^nti etena – ‘‘cittuppādamattenapi vibhajanaṃ paṭivibhattaṃ nāma, pageva payogato’’ti dasseti.

[03]^b^Paṭiggaṇhantova…pe… passatī^eb^ti iminā āgamanato paṭṭhāya sādhāraṇabuddhiṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ hissa sādhāraṇabhogitā sukarā, sāraṇīyadhammo cassa supūro hoti. ^b^Vatta^eb^nti sāraṇīyadhammapūraṇavattaṃ.

[03]^b^Dātabba^eb^nti avassaṃ dātabbaṃ. Attano palibodhavasena sapalibodhasseva pūretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā odissakadānampissa na sabbattha vāritanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tena panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Adātumpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena dussīlassapi atthikassa sati sambhave dātabbanti dasseti. Dānañhi nāma kassaci na nivāritaṃ.

[03]^b^Mahāgirigāmo nāma^eb^ nāgadīpapasse eko gāmo. ^b^Sāraṇīyadhammo me, bhante, pūrito…pe… pattagataṃ na khīyatī^eb^ti āha tesaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ. Taṃ sutvā tepi therā ‘‘sāraṇīyadhammapūrako aya’’nti abbhaññaṃsu. Daharakāle eva kiresa sāraṇīyadhammapūrako ahosi, tassā ca paṭipattiyā avañjhabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantī’’^eb^ti āha.
[03]Ahaṃ sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā, mama pattapariyāpannenapi sabbāpimā bhikkhuniyo yāpessantīti āha ^b^‘‘mā tumhe tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayitthā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā, vemajjhe^eb^ti ca idaṃ uddesāgatapāḷivasena vuttaṃ. Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ anukkamo atthi. ^b^Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyā^eb^ti vatthante, dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya. ^b^Khaṇḍa^eb^nti khaṇḍavantaṃ, khaṇḍitaṃ vā. ^b^Chidda^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo ^a^M2.0308^ea^. Visabhāgavaṇṇena upaḍḍhaṃ, tatiyabhāgaṃ vā sambhinnavaṇṇaṃ ^b^sabalaṃ,^eb^ visabhāgavaṇṇeheva pana bindūhi antarantarā vimissaṃ ^b^kammāsaṃ,^eb^ ayaṃ imesaṃ viseso. ^b^Taṇhādāsabyato mocana^eb^vacaneneva tesaṃ sīlānaṃ vivaṭṭupanissayatamāha. ^b^Bhujissabhāvakaraṇato^eb^ti iminā bhujissakarāni bhujissānīti uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti dasseti. Aviññūnaṃ appamāṇatāya ^a^V2.0287^ea^^b^‘‘viññuppasatthānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā^eb^ti – ‘‘imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’’ti taṇhāparāmāsena – ‘‘imināhaṃ sīlena devo hutvā tattha nicco dhuvo sassato bhavissāmī’’ti diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca aparāmaṭṭhattā. ^b^Parāmaṭṭhu^eb^nti codetuṃ. Sīlaṃ nāma avippaṭisārādipārampariyena yāvadeva samādhisampādanatthanti āha ^b^‘‘samādhisaṃvattakānī’’^eb^ti. Samānabhāvo sāmaññaṃ, paripuṇṇacatupārisuddhibhāvena majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvato sīlena sāmaññaṃ sīlasāmaññaṃ, taṃ gato upagatoti ^b^sīlasāmaññagato^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samānabhāvūpagatasīlo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Yāyaṃ diṭṭhī^eb^ti yā ayaṃ diṭṭhi mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā. Catusaccadassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhi, ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā anattā’’ti, ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti ca diṭṭhiyā sāmaññaṃ ^b^samānadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ. Aggaṃ^eb^ itaresaṃ sāraṇīyadhammānaṃ padhānabhāvato. Etasmiṃ sati sukhasiddhito tesaṃ saṅgāhikaṃ, tato eva tesaṃ saṅghāṭanikaṃ gopānasiyo aparipatante katvā saṅgaṇhāti dhāretīti ^b^saṅgāhikaṃ. Saṅghāṭa^eb^nti aggabhāvena saṅghāṭabhāvaṃ. Saṅghāṭanaṃ etesaṃ atthīti ^b^saṅghāṭanikaṃ,^eb^ saṅghāṭaniyanti vā pāṭho, saṅghāṭane niyuttanti vā saṅghāṭanikaṃ, ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā ^b^saṅghāṭaniyaṃ^eb^. Sāmaññato eva gahitattā napuṃsakaniddeso.

[03]^b^493^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhipi evaṃsabhāvā, aññamaggasammādiṭṭhīsu vattabbameva natthīti āha ^b^‘‘yāyaṃ sotāpattimaggadiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ettāvatāpī^eb^ti ettakenapi rāgādīsu ekekena pariyuṭṭhitacittatāyapi ^b^pariyuṭṭhitacittoyeva nāma hoti,^eb^ pageva dvīhi, bahūhi vā pariyuṭṭhitacittatāya. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu aṭṭhasupi vāresu. ^b^Suṭṭhu ṭhapita^eb^nti yathā maggabhāvanā upari saccābhisambodho hoti, evaṃ sammā ṭhapitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saccānaṃ bodhāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0309^ea^ ‘‘natthi kho me taṃ pariyuṭṭhāna’’ntiādinā pavattaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. ^b^Ariyānaṃ hotī^eb^ti ariyānameva hoti. Tesañhi ekadesatopi pahīnaṃ vattabbataṃ arahati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na puthujjanāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ariyanti vuttaṃ^eb^ ‘‘ariyesu jāta’’nti katvā. Lokuttarahetukatāya ^b^lokuttaranti vuttaṃ^eb^. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yesaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā hissa puthujjanehi asādhāraṇatā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puthujjanānaṃ pana abhāvato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbavāresū^eb^ti sabbesu itaresu chasu vāresu.

[03]^b^494^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccatta^eb^nti pāṭiyekkaṃ attani mama citteyeva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano citte’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Paccattaṃ ^a^V2.0288^ea^ attano citte nibbutiṃ kilesavūpasamaṃ labhāmī’’ti imamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā atidisati.

[03]^b^495^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘yathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato’’ti imassa atthassa paccāmasananti āha ^b^‘‘tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyāti evarūpāya sotāpattimaggadiṭṭhiyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^496^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabhāvenā^eb^ti niyatapañcasikkhāpadatādisabhāvena. ^b^Saṅghakammavasenā^eb^ti mānattacariyādisaṅghakammavasena. ^b^Daharo^eb^ti bālo. ^b^Kumāro^eb^ti dārako. Yasmā daharo ‘‘kumāro’’ti ca ‘‘yuvā’’ti ca vuccati, tasmā ^b^mando^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Mandindriyatāya hi ^b^mando^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cakkhusotādīnaṃ mandatāyā’’^eb^ti. Evampi yuvāvatthāpi keci mandindriyā hontīti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘uttānaseyyako’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yadi uttānaseyyako, kathamassa aṅgārakkamananti? Yathā tathā aṅgārassa phusanaṃ idha ‘‘akkamana’’nti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘ito cito cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Manussāna^eb^nti mahallakamanussānaṃ. ^b^Na sīghaṃ hattho jhāyati^eb^ kathinahatthatāya. ^b^Khippaṃ paṭisaṃharati^eb^ mudutaluṇasarīratāya. ^b^Adhivāseti^eb^ kiñci payojanaṃ apekkhitvā.

[03]^b^497^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uccāvacānī^eb^ti mahantāni ceva khuddakāni ca. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti sudhākammādimhiyeva. ^b^Kasāvapacanaṃ^eb^ sudhādisaṅkharaṇatthaṃ, ^b^udakānayanaṃ^eb^ dhovanādiatthaṃ, haliddivaṇṇadhātulepanatthaṃ ^b^kucchakaraṇaṃ. Bahalapatthano^eb^ti daḷhachando. ^b^Vacchaka^eb^nti nibbattadhenupagavacchaṃ. ^b^Apacinātī^eb^ti apavindati, āloketīti ^a^M2.0310^ea^ attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apaloketī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tanninno hotī^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhādininnova hoti uccāvacānampi kiṃkaraṇīyānaṃ cārittasīlassa pūraṇavaseneva karaṇato, yonisomanasikāravaseneva ca tesaṃ paṭipajjanato. ^b^Therassa santike aṭṭhāsi^eb^ yonisomanasikārābhāvato ‘‘taṃ taṃ samullapissāmī’’ti.

[03]^b^498^eb^^b^.^eb^ Balaṃ eva ^b^balatā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘balena samannāgato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atthikabhāvaṃ katvā^eb^ti tena dhammena savisesaṃ atthikabhāvaṃ uppādetvā. ^b^Sakalacittenā^eb^ti desanāyāadimhi majjhe pariyosāneti sabbattheva pavattatāya sakalena anavasesena cittena.

[03]^b^500^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabhāvo^eb^ti ariyasāvakassa puthujjanehi asādhāraṇatāya āveṇiko sabhāvo. ^b^Suṭṭhu samannesito^eb^ti sammadeva upaparikkhito. ^b^Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyā^eb^ti sotāpattiphalassa sacchikaraṇena, sacchikatabhāvenāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sotāpattiphalasacchikatañāṇenā’’^eb^ti. Paṭhamamaggaphalassa ^a^V2.0289^ea^ paccavekkhaṇañāṇavisesā hete pavattiākārabhinnā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sattahi mahāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayaṃ tāva ācariyānaṃ samānakathā^eb^ti ‘‘idamassa paṭhamaṃ ñāṇa’’ntiādinā vuttāni paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, na maggañāṇānīti evaṃ pavattā paramparāgatā pubbācariyānaṃ samānā sādhāraṇā imissā pāḷiyā ^b^aṭṭhakathā^eb^ atthavaṇṇanā. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘lokuttaramaggo hi bahucittakkhaṇiko nāma natthī’’^eb^ti. Yadi so bahucittakkhaṇiko siyā nānābhisamayo, tathā sati saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ ekadesappahānaṃ pāpuṇātīti ariyamaggassa anantaraphalattā ekadesasotāpannatādibhāvo āpajjati, phalānaṃ vā anekabhāvo, sabbametaṃ ayuttanti tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikova ariyamaggo.

[03]Yaṃ pana suttapadaṃ nissāya vitaṇḍavādī ariyamaggassa ekacittakkhaṇikataṃ paṭikkhipati, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘satta vassānīti hi vacanato’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Kilesā pana lahu…pe… chijjantī^eb^ti vadantena hi khippaṃ tāva kilesappahānaṃ, dandhapavattikā maggabhāvanāti paṭiññātaṃ hoti. Tattha sace maggassa bhāvanāya āraddhamattāya kilesā pahīyanti, sesā maggabhāvanā niratthakā siyā, atha pacchā kilesappahānaṃ, kilesā pana lahu ^a^M2.0311^ea^ chijjantīti idaṃ micchā, ‘‘sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyā’’ti vakkhatīti. ^b^Tato^eb^ suttapaṭijānanato. ^b^Maggaṃ abhāvetvā^eb^ti ariyamaggaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā abhāvetvā. ^b^Attharasaṃ viditvā^eb^ti suttassa aviparīto attho eva attharaso, taṃ yāthāvato ñatvā. Evaṃ vitaṇḍavādivādaṃ bhinditvā vuttamevatthaṃ nigametuṃ ^b^‘‘imāni satta ñāṇānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Kosambiyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^501^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Sassato ^a^V2.0290^ea^ attā ca loko cā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.30) evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi ^b^sassatadiṭṭhi^eb^ (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.175). ^b^Saha kāyenā^eb^ti saha tena brahmattabhāvena. ^b^Brahmaṭṭhāna^eb^nti attano brahmavatthuṃ. ^b^‘‘Aniccaṃ nicca’’nti vadati^eb^ aniccatāya attano apaññāyamānattā. ^b^Thira^eb^nti daḷhaṃ, vināsābhāvato sārabhūtanti attho. Uppādavipariṇāmābhāvato ^b^sadā vijjamānaṃ. Kevala^eb^nti paripuṇṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akhaṇḍa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kevala^eb^nti vā jātiādīhi amissaṃ, virahitanti adhippāyo. Uppādādīnaṃ abhāvato eva ^b^acavanadhammaṃ. Koci jāyanako vā…pe… upapajjanako vā natthi^eb^ niccabhāvato. Ṭhānena saddhiṃ tannivāsīnaṃ niccabhāvañhi so paṭijānāti. ^b^Tisso jhānabhūmiyo^eb^ti dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānabhūmiyo. Catutthajjhānabhūmivisesā hi asaññasuddhāvāsāruppabhavā. ^b^Paṭibāhatī^eb^ti santaṃyeva samānaṃ ajānantova natthīti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Avijjāya gato^eb^ti avijjāya saha gato pavatto. Sahayoge hi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samannāgato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññāṇī^eb^ti avidvā. Paññācakkhuvirahato andho bhūto, andhabhāvaṃ vā pattoti ^b^andhībhūto^eb^.

[03]^b^502^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tadā bhagavato subhagavane viharaṇassa avicchinnataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘subhagavane viharatīti ñatvā’’^eb^ti. Tattha pana tadāssa bhagavato adassanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kattha nu kho gatoti olokento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Brahmalokaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā^eb^ti iminā katipayacittavāravasena tadā bhagavato ^a^M2.0312^ea^ brahmalokagamanaṃ jātaṃ, na ekacittakkhaṇenāti dasseti. Na cettha kāyagatiyā cittapariṇāmanaṃ adhippetaṃ – ‘‘seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyyā’’tiādivacanato (ma. ni. 1.501). Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^Vichanda^eb^nti chandavigamaṃ. ^b^Apasādito^eb^ti diṭṭhiyā gāhassa viparivattanena santajjito. ‘‘Metamāsado’’ti vacanena ^b^upatthambho hutvā^eb^.

[03]^b^Anvāvisitvā^eb^ti āvisanavasena tassa attabhāvaṃ adhibhavitvā. Tathā abhibhavato hi tassa sarīraṃ paviṭṭho viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sarīraṃ pavisitvā’’^eb^ti. Yañhi sattaṃ devayakkhanāgādayo āvisanti, tassa pākatikakiriyamayaṃ cittappavattiṃ nivāretvā attano iddhānubhāvena yaṃ icchitaṃ hasitalapitādi, taṃ tena kārāpenti, kārentā ca āviṭṭhapuggalassa cittavasena ^a^V2.0291^ea^ kārenti. ‘‘Attanovā’’ti na vattabbametaṃ acinteyyattā kammajassa iddhānubhāvassāti keci. Apare pana yathā tadā cakkhuviññāṇādipavatti āviṭṭhapuggalasseva, evaṃ kiriyamayacittapavattipi tasseva, āvesakānubhāvena pana sāmaññatā parivattati. Tathā hi mahānubhāvaṃ puggalaṃ te āvisituṃ na sakkonti, tikicchāvuṭṭhāpane pana chavasarīraṃ anupavisitvā satantaṃ karoti vijjānubhāvena. Korakhattiyādīnaṃ pana chavasarīrassa uṭṭhānaṃ vacīnicchāraṇañca kevalaṃ buddhānubhāvena. Acinteyyā hi buddhānaṃ buddhānubhāvāti. ^b^Abhibhavitvā ṭhito^eb^ti sakalalokaṃ attano ānubhāvena abhibhavitvā ṭhito. ^b^Jeṭṭhako^eb^ti padhāno, tādisaṃ vā ānubhāvasampannattā uttamo. Passatīti ^b^daso^eb^. Visesavacanicchāya abhāvato anavasesavisayo daso-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ passatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbajana^eb^nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbasattakāyaṃ. ^b^Vase vatteti,^eb^ seṭṭhattā nimmāpakattā ca attano vase vatteti. Lokassa īsanasīlatāya ^b^issaro^eb^. Sattānaṃ kammassa kārakabhāvena ^b^kattā^eb^. Thāvarajaṅgamavibhāgaṃ sakalaṃ lokaṃ nimmānetīti ^b^nimmātā^eb^.

[03]Guṇavisesena loke pāsaṃsattā ^b^seṭṭho^eb^. Tādiso ca ukkaṭṭhatamo hotīti āha ^b^‘‘uttamo’’^eb^ti. Sattānaṃ nimmānaṃ tathā tathā sajanaṃ visajanaṃ viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘tvaṃ khattiyo’’^eb^tiādi. Jhānādīsu attano citte ca ciṇṇavasittā ^b^vasī. Bhūtāna^eb^nti nibbattānaṃ. Bhavaṃ abhijātaṃ ^a^M2.0313^ea^ arahantīti bhabyā, sambhavesino, tesaṃ ^b^bhabyānaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṇḍajajalābujā sattā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Pathavīādayo niccā dhuvā sassatā. Ye tesaṃ ‘‘aniccā’’tiādinā garahakā jigucchā sattā, te ayathābhūtavāditāya matakāle apāyaniṭṭhā ahesuṃ. Ye pana pathavīādīnaṃ ‘‘niccā dhuvā’’tiādinā pasaṃsakā, te yathābhūtavāditāya brahmakāyūpagā ahesunti māro pāpimā anvayato byatirekato ca pathavīādimukhena saṅkhārānaṃ pariññāpaññāpane ādīnavaṃ vibhāveti tato vivecetukāmo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pathavīgarahakā’’^eb^tiādi. Ettha ca māro pathavīādidhātumahābhūtaggahaṇena manussalokaṃ, bhūtaggahaṇena cātumahārājike, devaggahaṇena avasesakāmadevalokaṃ, pajāpatiggahaṇena attano ṭhānaṃ, brahmaggahaṇena brahmakāyike gaṇhi. Ābhassarādayo pana avisayatāya eva anena aggahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Taṇhādiṭṭhivasenā^eb^ti taṇhābhinandanāya diṭṭhābhinandanāya ca vasena. ‘‘Etaṃ mama, eso me attā’’ti ^b^abhinandino^eb^ abhinandakā, abhinandanasīlā vā. ^b^Brahmuno ovāde ṭhitānaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ dassetī^eb^ti tesaṃ tattha sannipatitabrahmānaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ tassa mahābrahmuno ovāde ṭhitattā nibbattaṃ katvā dasseti. ^b^Yasenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0292^ea^ ānubhāvena. ^b^Siriyā^eb^ti sobhāya. ^b^Maṃ brahmaparisaṃ upanesī^eb^ti yādisā brahmaparisā issariyādisampattiyā, tattha maṃ uyyojesi. ^b^Mahājanassa māraṇato^eb^ti mahājanassa vivaṭṭūpanissayaguṇavināsanena ānubhāvena māraṇato. ^b^Ayasa^eb^nti yasapaṭipakkhaṃ akittikammānubhāvañcāti attho.

[03]^b^503^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kasiṇaṃ āyu^eb^nti vassasataṃ sandhāya vadati. Upanissāya setīti upasayo, upasayova ^b^opasāyiko^eb^ yathā ‘‘venayiko’’ti (ma. ni. 1.246; a. ni. 8.11; pārā. 8) āha ^b^‘‘samīpasayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saya^eb^ggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘maṃ gacchanta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ vattanattho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Mama vatthusmiṃ sayanako^eb^ti mayhaṃ ṭhāne visaye vattanako. ^b^Bāhitvā^eb^ti nīcaṃ katvā, abhibhavitvā vā. ^b^Jajjharikāgumbato^eb^ti ettha ^b^jajjharikā^eb^ nāma pathaviṃ pattharitvā jātā ekā gacchajāti.

[03]^b^Iminā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0314^ea^ ‘‘sace kho tvaṃ bhikkhū’’tiādivacanena. ^b^Esa^eb^ brahmā. ^b^Upalāpetī^eb^ti saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Apasādetī^eb^ti niggaṇhāti. ^b^Sesapadehī^eb^ti vatthusāyiko yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāhiteyyoti imehi padehi. ^b^Mayhaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhissasī^eb^ti mama ārakkhako bhavissasi. ^b^Lakuṇḍakatara^eb^nti nīcataraṃ nihīnavuttisarīraṃ.

[03]^b^Phusitumpi samatthaṃ kiñci na passati,^eb^ pageva ñāṇavibhavanti adhippāyo. ^b^Nipphatti^eb^nti nipphajjanaṃ, phalanti attho. Tañhi kāraṇavasena gantabbato adhigantabbato ^b^gatī^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Ānubhāva^eb^nti pabhāvaṃ. So hi jotanaṭṭhena virocanaṭṭhena ^b^jutī^eb^ti vuccati. Mahatā ānubhāvena paresaṃ abhibhavanato mahesoti akkhāyatīti ^b^mahesakkho^eb^. Tayidaṃ abhibhavanaṃ kittisampattiyā parivārasampattiyā cāti āha ^b^‘‘mahāyaso mahāparivāro’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pariharantī^eb^ti sineruṃ dakkhiṇato katvā parivattanti. ^b^Disā^eb^ti bhummatthe etaṃ paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘disāsu virocamānā’’^eb^ti. Attano jutiyā dibbamānāya vā. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti candimasūriyehi. ^b^Tattakena pamāṇenā^eb^ti yattake candimasūriyehi obhāsiyamāno lokadhātusaṅkhāto eko loko, tattakena pamāṇena. Idaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ padhānaṃ, tasmā yebhuyyena etthupapannā devatā aññesu cakkavāḷesu devatā abhibhuyya vattanti. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati dasasahassabrahmaparivāro bhagavato santikaṃ upagañchi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettha cakkavāḷasahasse tuyhaṃ vaso vattatī’’^eb^ti. Idāni ^b^‘‘ettha te vattate vaso’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ vase vattanaṃ sarūpato ^a^V2.0293^ea^ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paroparañca jānāsī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^ettha^eb^-saddaṃ ānetvā attho veditabboti dassento ^b^‘‘ettha cakkavāḷasahasse’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Uccanīce^eb^ti jātikularūpabhogaparivārādivasena uḷāre ca anuḷāre ca. ^b^Ayaṃ iddho^eb^^b^ayaṃ pakatimanusso^eb^ti iminā ‘‘sarūpato evassa sattānaṃ paroparajānanaṃ, na samudāgamato’’ti dasseti. Yaṃ pana vakkhati ^b^‘‘sattānaṃ āgatiṃ gati^eb^nti, taṃ kāmaloke sattānaṃ ādānanikkhepajānanamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na kammavipākajānanaṃ. Yadi hi samudāgamato jāneyya, attanopi jāneyya, na cassa taṃ atthīti, tathā āha ^b^‘‘itthambhāvoti^eb^^a^M2.0315^ea^^b^idaṃ cakkavāḷa’’^eb^ntiādi. Rāgayogato rāgo etassa atthīti vā rāgo, virajjanasīlo virāgī, ^b^taṃ rāgavirāginaṃ. Sahassibrahmā nāma tvaṃ^eb^ cūḷaniyā eva lokadhātuyā jānanato. ^b^Tayā^eb^ti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Catuhatthāyā^eb^ti anekahatthena sāṇipākārena kātabbapaṭappamāṇaṃ dīghato catuhatthāya, vitthārato dvihatthāya pilotikāya kātuṃ vāyamanto viya gopphake udake nimujjitukāmo viya ca pamāṇaṃ ajānanto vihaññatīti niggaṇhāti.

[03]^b^504^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃ kāya^eb^nti tadeva nikāyaṃ. ^b^Jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpī^eb^ti anaññasādhāraṇā mayhaṃ sīlādayo guṇavisesā tāva tiṭṭhantu, īdisaṃ lokiyaṃ parittakaṃ jānitabbaṭṭhānampi patvā. Ayaṃ imesaṃ atisayena nīcoti nīceyyo, tassa bhāvo ^b^nīceyya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘tayā nīcatarabhāvo pana mayhaṃ kuto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Heṭṭhūpapattiko^eb^ti uparūparito cavitvā heṭṭhā laddhūpapattiko. Evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anuppanne buddhuppāde’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Heṭṭhūpapattikaṃ katvā^eb^ti heṭṭhūpapattikaṃ patthanaṃ katvā. Yathā kenaci bahūsu ānantariyesu katesu yaṃ tattha garutaraṃ balavaṃ, tadeva paṭisandhiṃ deti, itarāni pana tassa anubalappadāyakāni honti, na paṭisandhidāyakāni, evaṃ catūsu rūpajjhānesu bhāvitesu yaṃ tattha garutaraṃ chandapaṇidhiadhimokkhādivasena sābhisaṅkhārañca, tadeva ca paṭisandhiṃ deti, itarāni pana aladdhokāsatāya tassa anubalappadāyakāni honti, na paṭisandhidāyakāni, tannibbattitajjhāneneva āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti āha ^b^‘‘tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti subhakiṇhabrahmaloke. Puna ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ābhassarabrahmaloke. ^b^Paṭhamakāle^eb^ti tasmiṃ bhave paṭhamasmiṃ kāle. ^b^Ubhaya^eb^nti atītaṃ attano nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nibbattiyā hetubhūtaṃ attano katakammanti ubhayaṃ. ^b^Pamussitvā^eb^ kālassa ciratarabhāvato. ^b^Vītināmeti paṭipajjantī^eb^ti ca tadā tassā kiriyāya pavattikkhaṇaṃ upādāya pavattamānapayogo.

[03]^b^Apāyesī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0294^ea^ pāyesi. ^b^Pipāsite^eb^ti tasite. ^b^Ghammanī^eb^ti ghammakāle. ^b^Samparete^eb^ti ghammapariḷāhena pipāsāya abhibhūte. Nti pānīyadānaṃ. ^b^Vatasīlavatta^eb^nti samādānavasena vatabhūtaṃ cārittasīlabhāvena samāciṇṇattā ^a^M2.0316^ea^ sīlavattaṃ. ^b^Suttappabuddhova anussarāmī^eb^ti supitvā pabuddhamatto viya supinaṃ tava pubbanivutthaṃ mama pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena anussarāmi, sabbaññutaññāṇena viya paccakkhato passāmīti attho.
[03]^b^Karamare^eb^ti vilumpitvā ānīte. ^b^Kammasajja^eb^nti yuddhasajjaṃ, āvudhādāyininti attho.
[03]^b^Eṇīkūlasmi^eb^nti eṇīmigabāhullena ‘‘eṇīkūla’’nti saṅkhaṃ gate gaṅgāya tīrappadese. ^b^Gayhaka nīyamāna^eb^nti gayhavasena karamarabhāvena corehi attano ṭhānaṃ nīyamānaṃ.
[03]Āvāhavivāhavasena ^b^mittasanthavaṃ katvā^eb^. ‘‘Evaṃ amhesu kīḷantesu gaṅgeyyako nāgo kupito’’ti ^b^mayi saññampi na karontī^eb^ti. ^b^Susukāra^eb^nti susūti pavattaṃ bheravanāganissāsaṃ.
[03]^b^Gahītanāva^eb^nti viheṭhetukāmatāya gatinivāraṇavasena gahitaṃ niggahitaṃ nāvaṃ. ^b^Luddenā^eb^ti kurūrena. ^b^Manussakappā^eb^ti nāvāgatānaṃ manussānaṃ viheṭhetukāmatāya.
[03]^b^Baddhacaro^eb^ti paṭibaddhacariyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antevāsiko’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṃ nissāyevā^eb^ti raññā upaṭṭhiyamānopi rājānaṃ pahāya taṃ kappaṃ antevāsiṃ nissāyeva.
[03]^b^Sambuddhimantaṃ vatinaṃ amaññī^eb^ti ayaṃ sammadeva buddhimā vatasampannoti amaññi sambhāvesi ca.
[03]^b^Nānattabhāvesū^eb^ti nānā visuṃ visuṃ attabhāvesu.

[03]^b^Addhā^eb^ti ekaṃsena. ^b^Mametamāyu^eb^nti mayhaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tattha tattha bhave pavattaṃ āyuṃ. Na kevalaṃ mama āyumeva, atha kho ^b^aññampi^eb^ sabbaññeyyaṃ ^b^jānāsi,^eb^ na tuyhaṃ aviditaṃ nāma atthi. ^b^Tathā hi buddho^eb^ sammāsambuddho tuvaṃ. No ce kathamayamattho ñāto? ^b^Tathā hi^eb^ sammāsambuddhattā ^b^eva te ayaṃ jalito^eb^ jotamāno ^b^ānubhāvo obhāsayaṃ^eb^ sabbampi ^b^brahmalokaṃ^eb^ obhāsento dibbamāno ^b^tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti satthu asamasamataṃ pavedesi.

[03]^b^Pathavattenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0317^ea^^a^V2.0295^ea^ pathavīattena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pathavīsabhāvenā’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca yasmā – ‘‘sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti’’ādinā (mahāva. 7; dī. ni. 2.64, 67; ma. ni. 1.281; saṃ. ni. 1.172) sādhāraṇato, ‘‘yattha neva pathavī’’ti asādhāraṇato ca pathaviyā asabhāvena nibbānassa gahetabbatā atthi, taṃ nivattetvā pathaviyā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ gahetuṃ ^b^‘‘pathaviyā pathavattenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nāpahosi^eb^nti na pāpuṇiṃ. Idha pathaviyā pāpuṇanaṃ nāma ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā gahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘taṇhādiṭṭhimānaggāhehi na gaṇhi’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Vāditāyā^eb^ti vādasīlatāya. ^b^Sabbanti akkharaṃ niddisitvā^eb^ti ‘‘sabbaṃ kho ahaṃ brahme’’tiādinā bhagavatā vuttaṃ sabba-saddaṃ – ‘‘sace kho te mārisa sabbassa sabbattena ananubhūta’’nti paccanubhāsanavasena niddisitvā. ^b^Akkhare dosaṃ gaṇhanto^eb^ti bhagavatā sakkāyasabbaṃ sandhāya sabba-sadde gahite sabbasabbavasena tadatthaparivattanena sabba-saddavacanīyatāsāmaññena ca dosaṃ gaṇhanto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘satthā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha yadi sabbaṃ ananubhūtaṃ ‘‘natthi sabba’’nti loke anavasesaṃ pucchati. Sace sabbassa sabbattena anavasesasabhāvena ananubhūtaṃ appattaṃ, taṃ gaganakusumaṃ viya kiñci na siyā. ^b^Athassa ananubhūtaṃ atthī^eb^ti assa sabbattena ananubhūtaṃ yadi atthi, ‘‘sabba’’nti idaṃ vacanaṃ micchā, sabbaṃ nāma taṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mā heva te rittakamevā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ahaṃ sabbañca vakkhāmi, ananubhūtañca vakkhāmī^eb^ti ahaṃ ‘‘sabba’’nti ca vakkhāmi, ‘‘ananubhūta’’nti ca vakkhāmi, ettha ko dosoti adhippāyo. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ āharanto^eb^ti sabbassa sabbattena ananubhūtassa atthibhāve kāraṇaṃ niddisanto. ^b^Vijānitabba^eb^nti maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇehi visesato sabbasaṅkhatavisiṭṭhatāya jānitabbaṃ. ^b^Anidassana^eb^nti idaṃ nibbānassa sanidassanaduke dutiyapadasahitatādassananti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘cakkhuviññāṇassa āpāthaṃ anupagamanato anidassanaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sabbasaṅkhatavidhuratāya vā natthi etassa nidassananti ^b^anidassanaṃ^eb^. Natthi etassa antoti ^b^anantaṃ^eb^. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tayida’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Bhūtānī^eb^ti paccayasambhūtāni. ^b^Asambhūta^eb^nti paccayehi asambhūtaṃ, nibbānanti attho. Apabhassarabhāvahetūnaṃ sabbaso abhāvā sabbato ^a^M2.0318^ea^ pabhāti ^b^sabbatopabhaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbānato hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – ‘‘tamo tattha na vijjatī’’ti. (Netti. 104) ^b^pabhūtamevā^eb^ti pakaṭṭhabhāvena ukkaṭṭhabhāvena vijjamānameva. Arūpībhāvena adesikattā sabbato pabhavati vijjatīti ^b^sabbatopabhaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puratthimadisādīsū’’^eb^tiādi. Pavisanti etthāti pavisaṃ, tadeva ^a^V2.0296^ea^ sa-kārassa bha-kāraṃ, vi-kārassa ca lopaṃ katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pabha’’^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘titthassa nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vādaṃ patiṭṭhapesī^eb^ti evaṃ mayā sabbañca vuttaṃ, ananubhūtañca vuttaṃ, tattha yaṃ tayā adhippāyaṃ ajānantena sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya dosaggahaṇaṃ, taṃ micchāti brahmānaṃ niggaṇhanto bhagavā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhapesi.

[03]^b^Gahitagahita^eb^nti ‘‘idaṃ nicca’’ntiādinā gahitagahitaṃ gāhaṃ. Tattha tattha dosadassanamukhena niggaṇhantena ^b^satthārā vissajjāpito kiñci gahetabbaṃ^eb^ attano paṭisaraṇaṃ ^b^adisvā^eb^ parājayaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ ^b^laḷitakaṃ^eb^^b^kātukāmo^eb^ vādaṃ pahāya iddhiyā pāṭihāriyalīḷaṃ dassetukāmo. ^b^Yadi sakkosi mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ,^eb^ na pana sakkhissasīti adhippāyo. ^b^Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ gantukāmo^eb^ti attano pākatikena attabhāvena ṭhātukāmo. So hi paṭisandhikāle nibbattasadisatāya mūlapaṭisandhīti vutto. ^b^Aññesa^eb^nti heṭṭhā aññakāyikānaṃ brahmūnaṃ. ^b^Na adāsi^eb^ abhisaṅkhatakāyenevāyaṃ tiṭṭhatu, na pākatikarūpenāti cittaṃ uppādesi. Tena so abhisaṅkhatakāyaṃ apanetuṃ avisahanto attabhāvapaṭicchādakaṃ andhakāraṃ nimminituṃ ārabhi. Satthā taṃ tamaṃ viddhaṃseti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mūlapaṭisandhiṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Bhavevāha^eb^nti bhave eva ahaṃ. Ayañca eva-saddo aṭṭhānapayuttoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘ahaṃ bhave bhayaṃ disvāyevā’’^eb^ti, sabbasmiṃ bhave jātiādibhayaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā yāthāvato disvā. ^b^Sattabhava^eb^nti sattasaṅkhātaṃ bhavaṃ. Kammabhavapaccaye hi upapattibhave sattasamaññā. ^b^Vibhava^eb^nti vimuttiṃ. Pariyesamānampi upāyassa anadhigatattā ^b^bhaveyeva disvā^eb^. ^b^Bhavañca vibhavesinaṃ^eb^ vibhavaṃ nibbutiṃ esamānānaṃ sattānaṃ bhavaṃ, bhavesu uppattiñca disvāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Na abhivadi^eb^nti ‘‘aho vata sukha’’nti evaṃ abhivadāpanākārābhāvato na abhinivisiṃ, lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ. Gāhattho eva vā abhivāda-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘nābhivadi’’^eb^nti, ^b^‘‘na^eb^^a^M2.0319^ea^^b^gavesi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhava^eb^ggahaṇenettha dukkhasaccaṃ, ^b^nandī^eb^gahaṇena samudayasaccaṃ, ^b^vibhava^eb^ggahaṇena nirodhasaccaṃ, ^b^nandiñca na upādiyinti^eb^ iminā maggasaccaṃ pakāsitanti āha ^b^‘‘iti cattāri saccāni pakāsento’’^eb^ti. Tadidaṃ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ gāthāya vibhāvanadassanaṃ. Satthā pana tesaṃ brahmūnaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ saccāni vitthārato pakāsento vipassanaṃ pāpetvā arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. Te ca brahmāno keci sotāpattiphale, keci sakadāgāmiphale, keci anāgāmiphale, keci arahatte ca patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saccāni pakāsento satthā dhammaṃ desesī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Acchariyajātā^eb^ti sañjātacchariyā. ^b^Samūlaṃ bhava^eb^nti taṇhāvijjāhi samūlaṃ bhavaṃ.

[03]^b^505^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mama^eb^^a^V2.0297^ea^^b^vasaṃ ativattitānī^eb^ti sabbaso kāmadhātusamatikkamanapaṭipadāya mayhaṃ visayaṃ atikkamitāni. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ tesaṃ ariyabhūmisamokkamanaṃ jānātīti? Nayaggāhato – ‘‘samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desento saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ, nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsento veneyyajanaṃ nibbānaṃ diṭṭhameva karoti, tassa desanā avañjhā amoghā indena vissaṭṭhavajirasadisā, tassa ca āṇāya ṭhitā saṃsāre na dissantevā’’ti nayaggāhena anumānena jānāti. ^b^Sace tvaṃ evaṃ anubuddho^eb^ti yathā tvaṃ paresaṃ saccābhisambodhaṃ vadati, evaṃ tvaṃ attano anurūpato sayambhuñāṇena buddho dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito. ^b^Taṃ dhammaṃ mā upanayasī^eb^ti tayā paṭividdhadhammaṃ mā sāvakapaṭivedhaṃ pāpesi. ^b^Ida^eb^nti idaṃ anantaraṃ vuttaṃ brahmaloke patiṭṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya māro vadati, te dassento ^b^‘‘anuppanne hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Apāyapatiṭṭhānaṃ pana ājīvakanigaṇṭhādipabbajjaṃ upagate titthakare, ye keci vā pabbajitvā micchāpaṭipanne jane sandhāya vadati. ^b^Anuppanne^eb^ti asañjāte, appatteti attho. ^b^Anullapanatāyā^eb^ti yathā māro upari kiñci uttaraṃ lapituṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ tathā uttarabhāsanena. ^b^Nimantanavacanenā^eb^ti viññāpanavacanena. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ nimantanaṃ, brahmuno vā nimantanaṃ ettha atthīti ^b^brahmanimantanikaṃ,^eb^ suttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Brahmanimantanikasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^506^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭho^eb^ti ^a^M2.0320^ea^^a^V2.0298^ea^ āsayo vaccaguttaṭṭhānatāya koṭṭhaṃ, tassa abbhantarañhettha koṭṭhaṃ. Anurūpo hutvā paviṭṭho anupaviṭṭho. Sukhumañhi tadanucchavikaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā ayaṃ tattha paviṭṭho. ^b^Garugaro viyā^eb^ti garukagaruko viya. U-kārassa hi o-kāraṃ katvā ayaṃ niddeso, ativiya garuko maññeti attho. Garugaru viya icceva vā pāṭho. Māsabhattaṃ māso uttarapadalopena, māsabhattena ācitaṃ pūritaṃ ^b^māsācitaṃ maññe^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘māsabhattaṃ bhuttassa kucchi viyā’’^eb^ti. Uttarapadalopena vinā atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘māsapūritapasibbako viyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tintamāso viyā^eb^ti tintamāso pasibbako viya. Kiṃ nu kho etaṃ mama kucchiyaṃ pubbaṃ bhārikattaṃ, kiṃ nu kho kathaṃ nu kho jātanti adhippāyo? ^b^Upāyenā^eb^ti pathena ñāyena. Byatirekato panassa anupāyaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Attānameva vā sandhāya ^b^‘‘mā tathāgataṃ vihesesī’’^eb^ti āha. Yathā hi ariyasaṅgho ‘‘tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū’’tiādīsu (khu. pā. 6.18; su. ni. 241) ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti vuccati, evaṃ tappariyāpannā ariyapuggalā, yathā ca purimakā dutiyāggasāvakā kappānaṃ satasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā āgatā, ayampi mahāthero tathā āgatoti ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti. ^b^Patiaggaḷeva aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti aggaḷassa bahibhāge aṭṭhāsi.

[03]^b^507^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rukkhadevatā nāma cātumahārājikesu nihīno kāyo, tasmā nesaṃ manussagandho paricitattā nātijegucchoti āha ^b^‘‘ākāsaṭṭhadevatāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ābādhaṃ karotī^eb^ti dukkhaṃ janeti. ^b^Nāgariko^eb^ti sukumāro. ^b^Paricokkho^eb^ti sabbaso sucirūpo. ^b^Ñātikoṭi^eb^nti ñātibhāgaṃ. Anādimati hi saṃsāre ñātibhāgarahito nāma satto kassacipi natthīti adhippāyo. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘so me tvaṃ bhāgineyyo hosī’’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Paveṇivasenā^eb^ti tadā mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo hutvā idāni māraṭṭhāne ṭhitoti imissā paveṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Aññassa vā vesamaṃ dhuro ^b^vidhuro^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññehi saddhiṃ asadiso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Appadukkhenā^eb^ti sukheneva. Panthānaṃ ^a^M2.0321^ea^ avanti gacchantīti ^b^pathāvino. Ettakenā^eb^ti ettāvatā citakasannisayena. ^b^Udakaleṇa^eb^nti udakanissandanaleṇaṃ. ^b^Samāpattito^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattito. ^b^Samāpattiphala^eb^nti nirodhasamāpattiphalaṃ.

[03]^b^508^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dasahi akkosavatthūhī^eb^ti dasahipi akkosavatthūhi, tato kiñci ahāpentā. ^b^Paribhāsathā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0299^ea^ garahatha. ^b^Ghaṭṭethā^eb^ti anūnāhi kathāhi imesu ovijjhatha. ^b^Dukkhāpethā^eb^ti citte dukkhaṃ janetha. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tumhākaṃ akkosanādīhi bhikkhūnaṃ kilesuppattiyā. Tenettha ^b^dūsī māro^eb^ otāraṃ labhati nāmāti adhippāyo. Upaṭṭhātabbaṃ ibhaṃ arahantīti ibbhā, hatthibhaṇḍakā, hīnajīvikatāya hete ibbhā viyāti ^b^ibbhā,^eb^ te pana sadutiyakavasena ^b^‘‘gahapatikā’’^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Kaṇhā^eb^ti kaṇhābhijātikā. Pādato jātattā ^b^pādānaṃ apaccā. Ālasiyajātā^eb^ti kasivaṇijjādikammassa akaraṇena sañjātālasiyā. ^b^Gūthaniddhamanapanāḷī^eb^ti vaccakūpato gūthassa nikkhamapadeso.

[03]^b^Manussānaṃ akusalaṃ na bhaveyya^eb^ tesaṃ tādisāya abhisandhiyā abhāvato. Āvesakassa ānubhāvena āviṭṭhassa cittasantati viparivattatīti vuttovāyamattho. ^b^Visabhāgavatthu^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ santike itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhunīnaṃ santike purisarūpanti īdisaṃ, aññaṃ vā pabbajitānaṃ asāruppaṃ visabhāgavatthuṃ. ^b^Vippaṭisārārammaṇa^eb^nti passantānaṃ vippaṭisārassa paccayaṃ. ^b^Lepayaṭṭhi^eb^nti lepalittaṃ vākurayaṭṭhiṃ.

[03]^b^510^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Somanassavasenā^eb^ti gehassitasomanassavasena. ^b^Aññathatta^eb^nti uppilāvitattaṃ. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘sace māro manussānaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā’’tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena. Yadi mārova tathā kareyya, manussānaṃ kusalaṃ na bhaveyya, mārasseva bhaveyya, sarīre pana anadhimuccitvā tādisaṃ pasādanīyaṃ pasādavatthuṃ dassesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^511^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Asubhasaññāparicitenā^eb^ti sakalaṃ kāyaṃ asubhanti pavattāya saññāya sahagatajjhānaṃ asubhasaññā, tena paricitena paribhāvitena. ^b^Cetasā^eb^^a^M2.0322^ea^ cittena. ^b^Bahula^eb^nti abhiṇhaṃ. ^b^Viharato^eb^ti viharantassa, asubhasamāpattibahulassāti attho. ^b^Patilīyatī^eb^ti saṅkucati tattha paṭikūlatāya saṇṭhitattā. ^b^Patikuṭatī^eb^ti apasakkati. ^b^Pativattatī^eb^ti nivattati. Tato eva ^b^na sampasāriyati. Rasataṇhāyā^eb^ti madhurādirasavisayāya taṇhāya.

[03]^b^Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññā^eb^ti tīsupi bhavesu aruccanavasena pavattā vipassanābhāvanā. Nibbidānupassanā hesā. ^b^Lokacitresū^eb^ti hatthiassarathapāsādakūṭāgārādibhedesu ceva ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādibhedesu ca loke cittavicittesu. ^b^Rāgasantāni^eb^ vūpasantarāgāni. ^b^Dosamohasantānī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Imesaṃ evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ sabbesaṃ sappāyabhāvato.

[03]^b^512^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sakkharaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0300^ea^^b^gahetvā^eb^ti sakkharāsīsena tattakaṃ bhinnapāsāṇamuṭṭhinti āha ^b^‘‘antomuṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhanapamāṇaṃ pāsāṇa’’^eb^nti. Muṭṭhipariyāpannanti attho. Ayañhi pāsāṇassa heṭṭhimakoṭi. ^b^Hatthināgo^eb^ti mahāhatthī. Mahantapariyāyo ^b^nāga^eb^-saddoti keci. Ahināgādito vā visesanatthaṃ hatthināgoti vuttaṃ. Sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesīti vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na vāya^eb^nti ettha ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇatthoti āha ^b^‘‘neva pamāṇaṃ aññāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sahāpalokanāyāti ca vacanato^eb^ti iminā vacanena imaṃ vacanamattaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Uḷāre^eb^ti uḷāraguṇe. Bhagavantañhi ṭhapetvā natthi tadā sadevake loke tādiso guṇavisesayuttoti.

[03]Visuṃ visuṃ paccattavedaniyo ayasūlena saddhiṃ bhūtāni cha phassāyatanāni etassāti cha phassāyatanaṃ, dukkhaṃ. Taṃ ettha atthīti ^b^cha phassāyataniko,^eb^ nirayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘chasu phassā…pe… paccayo’’^eb^ti. Samāhanatīti samāhato, anekasatabhedo saṅkusamāhato ettha atthīti ^b^saṅkusamāhato,^eb^ nirayo. Visesapaccayatāya vedanāya ṭhitoti vedaniyo, kāraṇākārakena vinā paccattaṃ sayameva vedaniyoti ^b^paccattavedaniyo. Ayasūlena saddhiṃ ayasūla^eb^nti pādapadesato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ abhihananavasena āgatena paṇṇāsāya ^a^M2.0323^ea^ janehi gahitena ayasūlena saha sīsapadesato paṭṭhāya āgataṃ. Ayasūlabhāvasāmaññena cetaṃ ekavacanaṃ, satamattāni patitāni sūlāni. ^b^Iminā te ṭhānena cintetvā^eb^ti nissitavohārena nissayaṃ vadati. ^b^Evaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘tadā jāneyyāsi vassasahassaṃ me niraye paccamānassā’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuṭṭhānima^eb^nti vuṭṭhāne bhavaṃ, antimanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vipākavuṭṭhānavedana’’^eb^nti, vipākassa pariyosānaṃ vedananti attho. ^b^Dukkhatarā hoti^eb^ padīpassa vijjhāyanakkhaṇe mahantabhāvo viya.

[03]^b^513^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ghaṭṭayitvā^eb^ pothetvā. ^b^Pāṭiyekkavedanājanakā^eb^ti paccekaṃ mahādukkhasamuppādakā. Ayato apagato ^b^nirayo,^eb^ so ^b^devadūtasuttena^eb^ (ma. ni. 3.261) dīpetabbo. Atthavaṇṇanā panassa parato sayameva āgamissati. Imaṃ pana atītavatthuṃ āharitvā attano ñāṇānubhāvadīpanamukhena māraṃ santajjento mahāthero ^b^‘‘yo^eb^^b^etamabhijānātī’’^eb^ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – ^b^yo^eb^ mahābhiñño ^b^etaṃ^eb^ kammaṃ kammaphalañca hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya abhimukhaṃ katvā paccakkhato jānāti. Sabbaso bhinnakilesatāya ^b^bhikkhu^eb^ sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako, ^b^tādisaṃ^eb^ uḷāraguṇaṃ ^b^āsajja^eb^ ghaṭṭayitvā ekantakāḷakehi pāpadhammehi samannāgatattā ^b^kaṇha^eb^ māra āyatiṃ mahādukkhaṃ vindissasi.

[03]^b^Udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā^eb^ti tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammaphalena mahāsamuddaudakameva adhiṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V2.0301^ea^ katvā. Tathā hi tāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kappaṭṭhāyino’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti vimānānaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ yathāvuttavimānavatthuṃ tāsaṃ accharānaṃ sampattiṃ, tassa ca kāraṇaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ katvā ^b^jānāti. Pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayī^eb^ti pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍitamahāpāsādaṃ attano pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ pāsādakampanasuttena dīpetabba’’^eb^nti. Idanti ‘‘yo vejayanta’’nti imissā gāthāya atthajātaṃ ^b^cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisutteneva^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.393) ^b^dīpetabbaṃ^eb^.

[03]Tassa brahmagaṇassa tathācintanasamanantarameva tasmiṃ brahmaloke sudhammaṃ brahmasabhaṃ gantvā. ^b^Tepī^eb^ti mahāmoggallānādayo. ^b^Paccekaṃ disāsū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0324^ea^ mahāmoggallānatthero puratthimadisāyaṃ, mahākassapatthero dakkhiṇadisāyaṃ, mahākappinatthero pacchimadisāyaṃ, anuruddhatthero uttaradisāyanti evaṃ cattāro therā brahmaparisamatthake majjhe nisinnassa bhagavato samantato catuddisā nisīdiṃsu. ^b^Gāthā vuttā^eb^ti ‘‘yo brahmaṃ paripucchatī’’ti gāthā vuttā. ^b^Aññatarabrahmasuttenā^eb^ti – ‘‘tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hotī’’tiādinā (saṃ. ni. 1.176) mahāvagge āgatena aññatarabrahmasuttena.

[03]^b^Jhānavimokkhena phusī^eb^ti jhānavimokkhasannissayena abhiññāñāṇena phassayi. Vananti jambudīpaṃ aphassayīti sambandho. Jambudīpo hi vanabahulatāya idha ‘‘vana’’nti vutto. Tenāha ‘‘jambusaṇḍassa issaro’’ti. ^b^Pubbavidehānaṃ dīpa^eb^nti pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ dīpaṃ, pubbavidehadīpanti attho. ^b^Bhūmisayā narā^eb^ nāma aparagoyānakā uttarakurukā ca. Yasmā te gehapariggahābhāvato bhūmiyaṃyeva sayanti, na pāsādādīsu. ^b^Paṭilabhī^eb^ti uppādesi. ^b^Etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsī^eb^ti esā yathā pubbe dūsimārassa, evaṃ tuyhaṃ āsā dīgharattaṃ anatthāvahā, tasmā edisaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsīti mārassa ovādaṃ adāsi. Sesaṃ sabbattha suviññeyyameva.

[06]Māratajjanīyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca cūḷayamakavaggavaṇṇanā.
[06]Mūlapaṇṇāsaṭīkā samattā.
[06]Dutiyo bhāgo niṭṭhito.
